tika-abh08t0:4_0: 8. Tattha tesu catubbidhesu paramatthesu, jātiniddhāraṇaṃ. Cittanti cittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:4_1: Vijānātīti vijānanaṃ, visayānaṃ vijānanaṃ visayavijānanaṃ. Cittasarūpaparidīpanamidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:4_2: vacanaṃ. Tassa pana cittassa ko vacanattho ko saddattho. Vuccate ācariyena. Sabbasaṅgāhakavasena
tika-abh08t0:4_3: sabbesaṃ cittānaṃ saṅgāhakanayavasena. Ārammaṇaṃ cinteti jānātīti cittaṃ, tadā sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:4_4: cittaṃ adhippetaṃ. Javanavīthivasena attasantānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ, tadā kusalākusalamahākiriyācittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:4_5: adhippetaṃ. Aññesaṃ javanānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni eva yebhuyyavasena sattakkhattuṃ
tika-abh08t0:5_0: 9. Vicittaṃ karaṇaṃ yassa taṃ vicittakaraṇaṃ, tassa bhāvo vicittakaraṇā. “Imassa
tika-abh08t0:5_1: rūpassa uddhaṃ idaṃ hotu, heṭṭhā idaṃ hotu, ubhayapasse ida”nti cintetvā yathācintitena
tika-abh08t0:5_2: kamena sesacittarūpanipphādanaṃ hoti, evaṃ yaṃ kiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ, sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:5_3: taṃ citteneva karīyati. Evaṃ vicittakaraṇatāya cittaṃ. Tadā karaṇatāya cittaṃ karotīti
tika-abh08t0:5_4: cittaṃ. Idaṃ taddhitapadaṃ. Vā ayaṃ añño nayo. Taṃ attano cittatāya aññadeva sarāgaṃ
tika-abh08t0:5_5: cittaṃ, aññaṃ sadosaṃ, aññaṃ samohaṃ. Aññaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, aññaṃ rūpāvacarādibhedaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:5_6: Aññaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, aññaṃ saddādiārammaṇaṃ. Rūpārammaṇesupi aññaṃ nīlārammaṇaṃ, aññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:5_7: pītādiārammaṇaṃ. Saddādiārammaṇesupi eseva nayo. Sabbesupi tesu aññaṃ hīnaṃ, aññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:5_8: majjhimaṃ, aññaṃ paṇītaṃ. Hīnādīsupi aññaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:5_9: aññaṃ vīriyādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ vīmaṃsādhipateyyaṃ, tasmā yassa imesaṃ sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:5_10: vasena attano cittatāya cittaṃ. Citto etasmiṃ atthīti cittaṃ. Tadā sabbaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:5_11: Paññattiyampi viññāṇe vicitte cittassa kammaṃ cittakammaṃ, cittakammameva cittakammakaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:5_12: cittakammake vicitte idha imasmiṃ adhikāre cittasammuti cittasaddo viññāṇe citte viññunā daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:6_0: Taṃ pana sabbasaṅgāhakavasena cintetītiādinā vuttappakāraṃ cittaṃ. Sārammaṇato sārammaṇabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:6_1: ekavidhaṃ. Savipākāvipākato savipākāvipākavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha tasmiṃ duvidhe
tika-abh08t0:6_2: citte savipākaṃ nāma cittaṃ kusalākusalaṃ, avipākaṃ abyākataṃ, kusalākusalabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:6_3: akathitanti attho. Kusalajāti akusalajāti abyākatajātīti jātibhedato tividhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:7: Tattha tasmiṃ vacane “kusala”nti etassa saddassa pana ko vacanattho.
tika-abh08t0:8_0: 10. Kucchitānaṃ salanato pāpakānaṃ dhammānaṃ kampanato viddhaṃsanato. Kucchitenākārena
tika-abh08t0:8_1: sayantīti kusā, kusānaṃ akusalasaṅkhātānaṃ lavanena chindanato. Kucchite sāti tanuṃ
tika-abh08t0:8_2: karotīti kusaṃ, kusena ñāṇena lātabbattā gahetabbattā. Vā ayaṃ añño nayo.
tika-abh08t0:9_0: 11. Kusalasaddoyaṃ ayaṃ kusalasaddo cheke atthe ārogyatthe anavajjatthe iṭṭhavipāke
tika-abh08t0:9_1: atthepi diṭṭho amhehi. Idha imasmiṃ adhikāre anavajjādike atthe diṭṭho. Ādi-saddena
tika-abh08t0:9_2: ārogyatthaiṭṭhavipākatthā gahetabbā. Diṭṭho yasmā, tasmā anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:9_3: kusalaṃ. Natthi avajjaṃ kilesāvajjaṃ kilesadoso kilesadaratho etassāti anavajjaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:9_4: kammena vipaccīyateti vipāko, iṭṭhāniṭṭhādiārammaṇānubhavanavasena, attano sabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:9_5: ca iṭṭho vipāko etassāti iṭṭhavipākaṃ, anavajjameva iṭṭhavipākaṃ, taṃ lakkhīyati
tika-abh08t0:9_6: anena aviññātaṃ lakkhitabbaṃ kusalanti lakkhaṇaṃ, anavajjaiṭṭhavipākaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:9_7: etassāti anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ. Anavajjaiṭṭhavipākameva kusalaṃ. Nanu kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:9_8: sayameva attano lakkhaṇaṃ bhaveyyāti codanā bhaveyya viññātāviññātasaddatthabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:9_9: lakkhaṇalakkhitabbabhāvayuttito. Kusalasaddatthavasena hi aviññātaṃ apākaṭaṃ kusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:9_10: lakkhitabbaṃ hoti. Anavajjaiṭṭhavipākasaddatthavasena viññātaṃ pākaṭaṃ kusalaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:9_11: hoti. Akusalaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ akusalānaṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ akusalaviddhaṃsanaṃ, taṃ raso
tika-abh08t0:9_13: vodānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, vodānaupaṭṭhānākāraṃ vodānagayhākāraṃ. Vā ayaṃ añño nayo. Vajjapaṭipakkhattā
tika-abh08t0:9_14: anavajjalakkhaṇameva kusalaṃ, vajjapaṭipakkhalakkhaṇaṃ kusalanti attho. Vodānabhāvarasaṃ
tika-abh08t0:9_16: padañca taṃ ṭhānañcāti padaṭṭhānaṃ, ubho kāraṇatthādhivacanaṃ, tasmā āsannakāraṇanti
tika-abh08t0:9_17: attho, itarathā punaruttidoso siyā, yonisomanasikāro padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ etassāti
tika-abh08t0:10_0: Sāvajjāniṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ akusalaṃ. Tadubhayaviparītaṃ tehi ubhayehi kusalākusalehi
tika-abh08t0:10_1: viparītaṃ avipākalakkhaṇaṃ etassāti tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇaṃ abyākataṃ. Vā ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:12: 12. Uddānato saṅkhepavasena kilesavatthuvasena duve kāmā honti. Chandarāgova kileso, tebhūmake pavattaṃ vaṭṭasahitaṃ vatthu, vasati kileso etthāti vatthu.
tika-abh08t0:13: 13. Kilesakāmo vatthuṃ kāmeti icchati, vatthu kilesakāmena kāmīyati icchīyatīti kattukārakakammakārakadvaye sādhanadvaye esa eso duvidhopi kāmo sijjhati.
tika-abh08t0:14: 14-5. So ayaṃ duvidhopi kāmo yasmiṃ padese sampattīnaṃ vasena avacarati, iti tasmā kāraṇā so pana padeso catupāyānaṃ channaṃ devānaṃ manussānaṃ vasena eva ekādasavidho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:15_0: 16. Kāmovacaratīti ettha etasmiṃ ekādasavidhe padese kāmo avacarati, iti tasmā kāraṇā
tika-abh08t0:15_1: so padeso assa kāmassa anena kāmena abhilakkhitattā kāmāvacarasaññito. Abhilakkhitasaddappayoge
tika-abh08t0:15_2: tatiyatthe “assā”ti chaṭṭhī hotīti saddasatthavidū paṭhanti. Sasatthāvacaro padeso
tika-abh08t0:15_3: viya satte sasanti hiṃsanti tehīti satthā, saha satthehīti sasatthā, sasatthā purisā
tika-abh08t0:15_4: avacaranti etthāti sasatthāvacaro. Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā purisā avacaranti,
tika-abh08t0:15_5: so padeso vijjamānesupi aññesu dvipadacatuppadesu avacarantesu tesaṃ upalakkhitattā
tika-abh08t0:15_6: “sasatthāvacaro”tveva vuccati, evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu tattha avacarantesu
tika-abh08t0:16_0: 17. Yathā rūpabhavo uttarapadassa lopaṃ katvā rūpanti vutto, evaṃ tathā svāyaṃ so
tika-abh08t0:16_1: ayaṃ eso kāmāvacaro uttarapadassa lopaṃ katvā kāmo iti saññito kāmo nāma udīrito paṇḍitena kathito.
tika-abh08t0:17_0: 18. Tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ tasmiṃ kāmāvacare sadā avacarati, iti tasmā kāraṇā kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:17_1: iti evaṃ kāmaghātinā kāmānaṃ vināsakena buddhena kathitaṃ. Kiñcāpi etaṃ rūpārūpabhavesupi
tika-abh08t0:17_2: avacarati, yathā pana saṅgāme yebhuyyena avacaraṇato “saṅgāmāvacaro”ti laddhanāmo
tika-abh08t0:17_3: nāgo nagare carantopi “saṅgāmāvacaro”tveva vuccati, thalacarajalacarā pāṇino athale
tika-abh08t0:17_4: ajale ṭhitāpi “thalacarajalacarā”tveva vuccanti, evaṃ idaṃ aññattha avacarantampi
tika-abh08t0:17_5: kāmāvacaramevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā ettha kāmo avacaratītipi kāmāvacaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:17_6: Kāmañcesa rūpārūpāvacaresupi avacarati, yathā pana vadatīti vaccho, mahiyaṃ setīti
tika-abh08t0:17_7: mahiṃsoti vutte na yattakā vadanti, mahiyaṃ vā senti, sabbesaṃ taṃ nāmaṃ hoti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:18_0: 19. Paṭisandhiṃ bhave kāme kāmabhavasaṅkhāte kāme paṭisandhiṃ avacārayati, iti tasmā
tika-abh08t0:18_1: kāmāvacaraṃ. Iti evaṃ vā ayaṃ añño nayo. Tatra tasmiṃ kāmāvacare pariyāpannaṃ antogadhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:19_0: 20. Aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ. Dasapuññakiriyavatthuvaseneva
tika-abh08t0:19_1: puññakiriyā eva tesaṃ tesaṃ phalānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni kāraṇānīti puññakiriyavatthūni,
tika-abh08t0:20_0: 21. Dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā pattidānaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ dhammadesanā anumodanā diṭṭhijubhāvo
tika-abh08t0:20_1: saṃsuti dhammassavanañca apacāyo apacāyanaṃ, evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññāni
tika-abh08t0:20_2: eva vatthūni puññavatthūni, tesaṃ pabhedo puññavatthuppabhedo ñeyyo paṇḍitena jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:21_0: 22-3. Gacchanti saṅgahaṃ dāne pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, veyyāvaccāpacāyanā
tika-abh08t0:21_1: sīlamaye puññe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, dhammadesanā dhammassavanaṃ diṭṭhiujukā bhāvanāmaye
tika-abh08t0:21_2: puññe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, dasa puññakiriyāpi ca tīṇi eva sambhonti.
tika-abh08t0:22: 24. Sabbānussatipuññañca pasaṃsā saraṇattayaṃ ratanattayaguṇapasaṃsā ca ete diṭṭhijukammamhi saṅgayhanti, tasmiṃ saṅgahapāpuṇe saṃsayo sandeho natthi.
tika-abh08t0:23_0: 25. Purimā cetanā tato pubbabhāge pavattā cetanā, muñcacetanā paccuppannā cetanā,
tika-abh08t0:23_1: paracetanā pacchākāle pavattā cetanā, tissopi cetanā dānamaye puññe honti. Evanti
tika-abh08t0:23_2: yathā tissopi cetanā dānamaye puññe honti, evaṃ tathā dānamayapuññato sesesupi sīlamayabhāvanāmayesu
tika-abh08t0:24_0: Hi saccaṃ yadā pana yo puggalo deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ āgamma paṭicca.
tika-abh08t0:24_1: Paṭiggāhakādisampattinti ettha ādi-saddena desakālakalyāṇamittādayo gahitā. Aññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:24_3: saṅgaho. Atthi dinnaṃ dānassa phalaṃ atthi. Ādi-saddena atthihutādayo gahitā. Purakkhatvāti
tika-abh08t0:24_4: purato katvā. Parehi anussāhito acodito dānādīni puññāni karoti. Dānādīnīti vacanena
tika-abh08t0:24_5: deyyadhammaṃ nissāya pavattadānacetanā gahetabbā. Tadā assa puggalassa. Saṅkharaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:24_6: saṅkhāro, natthi saṅkhāro etassāti asaṅkhāro, taṃ eva asaṅkhārikaṃ, appayoganti attho.
tika-abh08t0:24_8: panatthe saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro nāma attano vā pavattassa pubbappayogassa adhivacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:24_9: parassa vā pavattapubbappayogassa adhivacanaṃ. Ayamassa adhippāyo – yadā yo “dānādīni
tika-abh08t0:24_10: karissāmī”ti cittaṃ samuppādetvā nākāsi, pacchā attano pubbacetanāya ussāhito karoti,
tika-abh08t0:24_11: tadā sasaṅkhārikaṃ hoti, attano pubbappayogena saha pavattatīti attho. Paṭipattidassanena
tika-abh08t0:24_12: paṭipajjitabbā sīlādīhi paṭipajjanti jānanti gacchanti vā nibbānaṃ etāyāti paṭipatti,
tika-abh08t0:24_13: tāya dassanaṃ paṭipattidassanaṃ, tena. Jāto paricayo etesanti jātaparicayā. Sahasāti
tika-abh08t0:25: 26. Dasapuññakriyādīnaṃ vasena ca bahūnipi bhavanti etāni pana cittāni dasapuññakiriyādīnaṃ vasenapi bahūnipi bhavanti iti evaṃ pakāsaye bhagavā pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t0:27: Sattarasa sahassāni, dve satāni asīti ca;
tika-abh08t0:29: Kāmāvacarapuññāni sattarasa sahassāni ca dve satāni ca asīti ca bhavanti, iti vacanaṃ viniddise ācariyo katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:31: Kāyādīhi ca tīheva, hīnādīhi ca tīhi tu.
tika-abh08t0:32_0: Dvīsu bhavesu kāmabhavarūpabhavesu. Paṭipadādibhedato dukkhāpaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:32_1: dukkhāpaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ, sukhāpaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, sukhāpaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:32_3: pavattaṃ rūpāvacarūpapattinipphādakaṃ rūpāvacare upapattiyā paṭisandhiyā nipphādakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:33_0: Savatthukāvatthukabhedatoti arūpāvacaraṃ yadā kāmarūpe jāyati, tadā hadayavatthuṃ
tika-abh08t0:33_1: nissāya jāyati, iti tasmā savatthukaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Yadā arūpe jāyati, tadā hadayavatthuṃ
tika-abh08t0:33_2: anissāya jāyati, iti tasmā avatthukaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:34_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanassa kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Viññāṇañcāyatanassa tattha pavattaviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:34_1: tasmiṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Ākiñcaññāyatanassa
tika-abh08t0:34_2: tassa apagamo tassa ākāsānañcāyatanassa apagamo abhāvo vohāro ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa
tika-abh08t0:35_0: Rūpe saññā rūpasaññā. Saññāsīsena cittampi gahitaṃ. Samatikkamā kasiṇugghāṭimākāsasamatikkamanena.
tika-abh08t0:35_1: Paṭighe dvārārammaṇānaṃ saṅghaṭṭane pavattā saññā paṭighasaññā. Dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:35_2: adhivacanaṃ. Tāsaṃ paṭighasaññānaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ atthaṅgamā atthaṅgamena. Nānā
tika-abh08t0:35_3: attā sabhāvo etassāti nānattaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ, nānatte nānāsabhāve pavattā saññā nānattasaññā,
tika-abh08t0:35_4: nānā attā sabhāvo etissāti vā nānattā, sāyeva saññā nānattasaññā, kāmāvacarasaññāti
tika-abh08t0:36_1: hadayavatthuṃ nissāya uppajjanato. Itare pana tayo maggā aniyatavatthukā. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:36_2: Kāmarūpesu hadayavatthuṃ nissāya jāyanti, arūpe hadayavatthuṃ anissāya jāyanti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:36_3: aniyatavatthukā. Tīhi vimokkhamukhehīti suññataanimittaappaṇihitasaṅkhātehi tīhi vimokkhamukhehi.
tika-abh08t0:37_0: Yassa saṃvijjanti, taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanā. Sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsāyeva
tika-abh08t0:37_3: Mānopi ekadesato apāyagāmikoyeva pahiyyate. Sotāpattimaggena nissesato na pahiyyate.
tika-abh08t0:37_4: Sesakilesesupi eseva nayo. Uddhaccaṃ pana ekadesatopi apāyagāmikampi na pahiyyati.
tika-abh08t0:37_6: pahānaṃ kasmā na vuttanti ce? Paṭhamamaggato dutiyamaggassa mahantattā paṭhamamaggena
tika-abh08t0:37_7: nāsitā saṃyojanā dutiyamaggena nāsitāti paññāyati, iti yasmā, tasmā na vuttaṃ. Tatiyacatutthamaggesupi
tika-abh08t0:37_8: eseva nayo. Ettha etasmiṃ lokuttaracitte. Ekekanti vicchāvasena vuttaṃ. Maggānurūpanti
tika-abh08t0:38_0: 28. Kāme aṭṭheva kāmāvacare aṭṭha eva cittāni, rūpe rūpabhave pañca cittāni, arūpisu
tika-abh08t0:38_1: cattāri cittāni, anuttarāni lokuttaracittāni cattāri, evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
tika-abh08t0:39_0: 29. Kusalākusalāpagatena satā muninā kusalato, akusalato ca apagatena satā satisampannena
tika-abh08t0:39_1: kusale kusalena chekena vasinā pañcavasīhi samannāgatena yaṃ kusalacittaṃ catubhūmigataṃ
tika-abh08t0:39_2: catūsu bhūmīsu pavattaṃ sakalaṃ sabbaṃ lapitaṃ kathitaṃ, taṃ kusalacittaṃ mayāpi
tika-abh08t0:40_1: jāyati, aññabhūmīsu na jāyati, tasmā niyatavatthukaṃ hoti. Itarāni pana akusalāni
tika-abh08t0:40_2: kāmarūpesu uppajjanakāle hadayavatthuṃ nissāya jāyanti, arūpe hadayavatthuṃ anissāya
tika-abh08t0:40_3: jāyanti, tasmā aniyatavatthukāni, tena. Paṭisandhijanakājanakavasena cāti uddhaccasahagataṃ
tika-abh08t0:40_4: paṭisandhiṃ na janeti. Yadi paṭisandhiṃ janeyya, apāyesuyeva janeyya. Kasmā? Sotāpattimaggena
tika-abh08t0:40_5: ekadesato apāyagāmikampi na jahitaṃ, sabbaṃ na jahitanti attho. Sopi maggo apāyagāmī
tika-abh08t0:40_6: na hoti. Aññe pana kilesā ekadesavasena apāyagāmikā jahitā, tena paṭhamamaggenāti
tika-abh08t0:40_7: tasmā na janeti. Ekādasavidhaṃ pana paṭisandhiṃ janeti, tena.
tika-abh08t0:41: Diṭṭhamaṅgalādīnīti ādi-saddena sutamaṅgalādīni gahitāni. Sārato uttamato pacceti saddahati. Sabhāvatikkhena sabhāvo tikkho etassāti sabhāvatikkhaṃ, tena sabhāvatikkhena.
tika-abh08t0:42: Assa pana paṭighasampayuttassa pāṇātipātādīsu akusalakammesu tikkhappavattikāle asaṅkhārikassa uppatti, mandappavattikāle sasaṅkhārikassa uppatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:45: 30. Lobhamūlavasena aṭṭha cittāni, dosamūlavasā duve cittāni, mohamūlavasena dve cittāni. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena akusalāni dvādasappakārāni siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:46_0: 31. Yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ yaṃ akusalacittaṃ pāpāpāpesu pāpaapāpesu kusalākusalesu apāpena
tika-abh08t0:46_1: appavattena pāpāpāpappahīnena vuttaṃ īritaṃ kathitaṃ, taṃ pāpamānasaṃ taṃ akusalacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:47_0: Yathā panassa yathā pana assa vipākassa kusalaṃ dānādivasena dānādīnaṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:47_1: vasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati, idaṃ vipākacittaṃ tathā na pavattati. Hi saccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:47_3: chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi kusalasampayuttadhammato
tika-abh08t0:47_4: assa vipākassa, sampayuttadhammānañca nānatte asatipi idaṃ vipākaṃ ādāsatalādīsu
tika-abh08t0:47_5: dhammajātesu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ. Ayamassādhippāyo – yathā ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:47_6: mukhe calite calati, acalite na calati, mukhassa kāraṇaṃ vinā mukhanimittassa viya
tika-abh08t0:47_7: kāraṇaṃ natthi, evaṃ kusalakāraṇā vipākassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi, nirussāhaṃ vipākaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:48: 32. Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ manussānaṃ ime aṭṭha mahāvipākā duhetukatihetukānaṃ kāmāvacaradevānaṃ, manussānañca paṭisandhiyo bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:49_0: 33-4. Tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā balavārammaṇe atimahantavibhūtārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:49_1: tadārammaṇañca hutvā tato paraṃ maraṇakālasmiṃ cuti hutvā pavattanti, evaṃ iminā
tika-abh08t0:49_2: mayā vuttappakārena catūsu ṭhānesu vipaccanti vipākabhāvena jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:50_0: 35. Sabhūmikusaleheva mahāpākā samā vinā mahāpākā kammadvāraṃ kammakāraṇaṃ vinā,
tika-abh08t0:50_1: kammañca mahāpuññānaṃ kiriyavatthukaṃ vinā vajjetvā sabhūmikusaleheva attano bhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:50_2: pavattehi kusalehi eva samā sadisā. Kammadvāraṃ nāma kāyaviññattikammadvāraṃ, vacīviññattikammadvāraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:50_3: bhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ manodvāraṃ, iti tividhaṃ kammadvāraṃ kammakāraṇaṃ. Kammaṃ nāma
tika-abh08t0:51_0: 36. Pākā kusalavipākā aviññattijanattā ca viññatti ca viññatti ca viññattiviññattiyoti
tika-abh08t0:51_1: vattabbe sarūpekasesaṃ katvā “viññattī”ti vuttaṃ, tā janentīti viññattijanā, na viññattijanā
tika-abh08t0:51_2: aviññattijanā, tesaṃ bhāvo aviññattijanattaṃ. Tasmā aviññattijanattā kāyaviññattivacīviññattisaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:51_3: kammadvārānaṃ ajanakattā manodvārasaṅkhātassa kammadvārassa vasena ca appavattanato
tika-abh08t0:51_4: avipākasabhāvato ca akammabhāvato ca appavattanato ceva puññakiriyavatthuvasena appavattanato
tika-abh08t0:52_0: 37-9. Parittārammaṇattā hi tesamekantato tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ekantato parittārammaṇattā
tika-abh08t0:52_1: kāmāvacarārammaṇattā tesu vipākesu sattapaññattikārammaṇā karuṇāmuditā kadāci kismiñci
tika-abh08t0:52_2: kāle na jāyanti, tathā evaṃ tisso pana viratiyo etesu vipākesu na jāyanti, hi kasmā
tika-abh08t0:52_3: kāraṇā na jāyanti, pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāti kusalā nāmāti satthunā vuttā yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:52_4: tasmā na jāyanti. Tathādhipatinopettha tathā evameva cattāro adhipatinopi etesu vipākesu
tika-abh08t0:52_5: na santi. Kasmā? Chandādīni dhammajātāni puretaraṃ katvā anuppajjanato na santi,
tika-abh08t0:53_1: puññato kusalato āgamanavasena ñeyyaṃ. Tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena mukhe calite
tika-abh08t0:53_2: ādāsatale mukhanimittacalanaṃ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro hoti,
tika-abh08t0:53_3: sasaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko sasaṅkhāro hoti, evaṃ āgamanavasena ñeyyaṃ. Paccayato
tika-abh08t0:53_4: ceva ñeyyaṃ tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi
tika-abh08t0:53_5: uppanno asaṅkhāro dubbalehi sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ paccayavasena viññeyyaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:54_0: 41-2. Hīnādīnaṃ puññānaṃ vipākattā hīnādayo vipākā puññavādinā jinena paridīpitā
tika-abh08t0:54_1: bhavanti, iti evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena pavattaṃ idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ ekantena
tika-abh08t0:54_2: savatthukaṃ kāmalokasmiṃ jāyate, aññattha pana aññāsu bhūmīsu na jāyate.
tika-abh08t0:55_0: Viññāṇapañcakaṃ niyatārammaṇanti cakkhuviññāṇassa rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ, na saddādayo.
tika-abh08t0:55_1: Sesattayaṃ yadā cakkhuviññāṇena gahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tadāssa rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:55_2: hoti. Yadā sotaviññāṇena gahitaṃ, tadāssa saddo ārammaṇo hoti. Yadā ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi
tika-abh08t0:55_3: gahitāni ārammaṇāni karonti, tadāssa gandharasaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇāni honti. Manoviññāṇadhātudvayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:55_4: yadā tadārammaṇaṃ hoti, tadā chaārammaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:56_0: Rūpārammaṇāya kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamo padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ etassāti apagamapadaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:56_1: tāya āvajjanaṃ katvā ṭhitāya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccaṃ karīyatīti attho. Tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:57_0: 43. Kāmāvacarapuññassa kāmāvacarakusalassa soḷasa vipākā honti. Iti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:57_1: taṃ vacanaṃ tihetukapuññassa ukkaṭṭhassa vasena ācariyo paridīpaye. Ayamettha attho
tika-abh08t0:57_3: datvā pavatte aṭṭha ahetukakusalavipākāni, aṭṭha mahākusalavipākānīti soḷasa pākāni nipphādeti.
tika-abh08t0:58_0: 44. Kusalānugataṃ katvā bhājitaṃ kiṃ mahaggataṃ vipākacittaṃ kusalānugataṃ kusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:58_1: anugataṃ katvā mahaggatakusalacittena samānaṃ katvā bhagavatā bhājitaṃ desitaṃ. Kiṃ
tika-abh08t0:58_2: kena kāraṇena? Kāmāvacarapuññaṃva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ iva asamānaphalaṃ natthi yato
tika-abh08t0:58_3: yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā vipākaṃ kusalānugataṃ katvā bhagavatā bhājitaṃ desitaṃ. Kāmāvacarapuññaṃvāti
tika-abh08t0:58_4: yathā aṭṭhavidhesu kāmāvacarakusalesu ukkaṭṭhatihetukakusalaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:58_5: datvā pavatte soḷasa kusalavipākāni nipphādeti, tihetukaomakañca duhetukaukkaṭṭhañca
tika-abh08t0:58_6: kāmasugatiyaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukavirahitāni ahetukaduhetukasaṅkhātāni
tika-abh08t0:58_7: vipākāni nipphādeti, duhetukaomakaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte
tika-abh08t0:58_8: aṭṭha ahetukavipākāni nipphādeti, evaṃ kāmāvacarapuññaṃ asamānaphalaṃva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:59: 45. Gajādīnaṃ chāyā gajādisadisā hoti yathā, evaṃ mahaggatavipākaṃ sabbathā sabbapakārena attano kusaleheva samānaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:60_1: aparāpariyavedanaṃ aparasmiṃ bhave phaladāyakaṃ na hoti, jhānā aparihīnassa bhavagāmino
tika-abh08t0:60_2: paṭisandhigāmino sattassa kusalānantaraṃyeva phalaṃ uppajjati, iti ca ñāpanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:60_3: etassa mahaggatavipākassa kusalānugataṃ kusalānugamanaṃ bhagavatā kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:61: 48. Ettha etasmiṃ mahaggatavipāke paṭipadākkamo tesañca hīnādīnaṃ bhedato jhānāgamanato mahaggatakusalajhānassa āgamanavasena vibhāvinā paṇḍitena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:62: 49. Ettha vipāke chandādiadhipatīnaṃ abhāvo, ayameva visesato kusalato ayaṃ eva viseso, sesaṃ sabbapakāraṃ avisesena kusalena samaṃ mataṃ kathitaṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:63_0: 50. Suññataṃ animittanti, tathāpaṇihitantipi suññataṃ anattā, animittaṃ aniccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:63_1: appaṇihitaṃ dukkhaṃ iti etāni tīṇi nāmāni maggassa anantare catubbidhassa maggassa
tika-abh08t0:64_0: 51. Labbhanti parabhāgasmiṃ maggānantare pavattaphalato aññasmiṃ kāle vaḷañjanaphalesu
tika-abh08t0:64_1: phalasamāpattisamāpajjanakālesu etāni tīṇi nāmāni na labbhante, phalehi vipassanāvaseneva
tika-abh08t0:64_2: anattaaniccadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vipassanānaṃ vasena eva tāni tīṇi nāmāni labbhare phalehi labbhante.
tika-abh08t0:65: 52. Honti sādhipatīneva lokuttaraphalāni tu ekantato sādhipatīni eva honti, lokuttaraphalāni ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ vipāke adhipatī natthi.
tika-abh08t0:66: 53. Maggo attano maggabhāvena maggo nāma vuccate bhagavatā. Phalaṃ maggaṃ upādāya aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ nissayaṃ katvā maggo nāma iti vacanaṃ vuccate bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:67_0: 54. Ime satta akusalavipākā. Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, tassadisattā gocaro ārammaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:67_1: attho, aniṭṭho ca aniṭṭhamajjhatto ca aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattā, teyeva gocaro aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattagocaro,
tika-abh08t0:67_2: tasmiṃ aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattagocare vattare vattanti. Sukhādittayayuttā te te aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:67_4: ime ime satta ahetukaakusalavipākā dukkhupekkhāvedanāhi sahagatā.
tika-abh08t0:68_0: 55. Evaṃ chattiṃsadhā pākaṃ pākasāsanapūjito sugato. Kiṃ visiṭṭho? Pākaṃ nāma asuraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:68_1: taṃ sāsati, pākena attano puññaphalena deve anusāsatīti vā pākasāsano, ko so? Sakko.
tika-abh08t0:68_2: Tena pākasāsanena pūjito savipākāvipākesu kusalavipākakiriyesu kusalo cheko evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:68_3: iminā mayā vuttappakārena pākaṃ cittaṃ chattiṃsappakāraṃ abrvi avoca.
tika-abh08t0:69: Anuḷāresūti khuddakesu. Tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā chaḷārammaṇavijānanagayhākārā. Sabbaññutaññāṇassa gati viya gati etissāti sabbaññutaññāṇagatikā.
tika-abh08t0:70: 56. Somanassayuttānaṭṭha, kusalākusalāni ca somanassayuttāni aṭṭha kusalākusalāni ca, kriyato pana pañca evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena hāsacittāni terasa.
tika-abh08t0:71: 57. Puthujjanā hasantettha ettha etesu terasacittesu puthujjanā pana aṭṭhahi cittehi hasanti. Sekhā satta ariyā chahi cittehi hasanti. Asekhā khīṇāsavā pañcahi cittehi hasanti.
tika-abh08t0:72_0: Kusalāni pana rūpārūpakusalāni sekhaputhujjanānaṃ uppajjanti. Imāni rūpārūpakiriyāni
tika-abh08t0:72_1: khīṇāsavānaṃ bhāvanāyeva kāro bhāvanākāro, tassa vaso bhāvanākāravaso, tena pavattāni.
tika-abh08t0:72_2: Tāni rūpārūpakusalāni bhāvanāpuññavasappavattāni bhāvanākusalavasena pavattāni. Imesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:73_0: 58-9. Yā puthujjanakālasmiṃ, abhinibbattitā pana puthujjanakālasmiṃ puthujjanabhāvaṭṭhitena
tika-abh08t0:73_1: yoginā abhinibbattitā yā rūpārūpasamāpatti, sā rūpārūpasamāpatti so yogī khīṇāsavo
tika-abh08t0:73_2: bhikkhu hutvā naṃ rūpārūpasamāpattiṃ yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ na samāpajjate, tāva tattakena
tika-abh08t0:73_3: kālena tassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno kusalā eva rūpārūpakusalā eva hoti. Khīṇāsavena sā
tika-abh08t0:73_4: rūpārūpasamāpatti sace yadi samāpannā samāpajjitā, kriyā rūpārūpakiriyā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:74: 60. Ekādasavidhaṃ kāme kāmāvacare kiriyacittaṃ ekādasavidhaṃ, rūpe rūpāvacare pañca, arūpisu cattāri iti sabbāni kriyacittāni vīsati.
tika-abh08t0:75_0: 61. Lokuttarakriyacittaṃ, pana kasmā na vijjati? Maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā na
tika-abh08t0:75_1: vijjati. Ayamettha adhippāyo – catumaggaṭṭho khīṇāsavo nāma na hoti, maggānantarameva
tika-abh08t0:75_2: phalaṃ uppajjati, maggopi ekacittakkhaṇiko yadi cittaṃ bahucittakkhaṇikaṃ, phalasamaṅgino
tika-abh08t0:75_3: khīṇāsavassapi maggacittaṃ bhaveyya, evaṃ sati lokuttarakiriyacittaṃ bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:76_0: 62. Kriyākriyāpattivibhāgadesako karaṇaṃ kriyaṃ, kriyaṃ nāma vinayapariyāyena akattabbassa
tika-abh08t0:76_1: karaṇaṃ, na karaṇaṃ akriyaṃ, akriyaṃ nāma vinayapariyāyena kattabbassa akaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:76_2: āpajjanaṃ āpatti, kriyāya karaṇena āpatti kriyāpatti, akriyāya akaraṇena āpatti akriyāpatti,
tika-abh08t0:76_3: kriyāpatti ca akriyāpatti ca kriyāpatyākriyāpattiyo, ekassa āpatti-saddassa lopaṃ
tika-abh08t0:76_4: katvā “kriyākriyāpattiyo”ti vuttaṃ, tāsaṃ vibhāgo kriyākriyāpattivibhāgo, desetīti
tika-abh08t0:76_5: desako, tassa desako kriyākriyāpattivibhāgadesako. Ṇvu-tu-paccayesu paresu kammatthe
tika-abh08t0:76_6: chaṭṭhī hotīti vadanti. Jino kiṃ visiṭṭho? Kriyākriyāpattivibhāgadesako hitāhitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:76_7: sakriyākriyārato hitassa sakriyāya rato, ahitassa akriyāya rato, yaṃ kriyākriyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:76_8: kriyaṃ nāma kriyacittaṃ, akriyaṃ nāma kusalākusalavipākacittaṃ icchanti eke. Taṃ
tika-abh08t0:76_9: na. Kasmā? Kusalādhikāre “kusalaṃ muninā lapitaṃ” akusalādhikāre “pāpamānasaṃ pāpāpāpesvapāpena
tika-abh08t0:76_10: vuttaṃ” vipākādhikāre “pākaṃ sugato abravī”ti vatvā puna kriyādhikāre “kusalākusalavipākāni
tika-abh08t0:76_11: avocā”ti vacanassa vattabbābhāvato. Tena vāssa kriyākriyaṃ etassāti kriyākriyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:76_12: kriyākriyasabhāvanti attho. Ayameva sārato paccetabbo. Yaṃ kriyākriyaṃ cittaṃ kriyākriyāsabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:76_13: avoca desesi, taṃ kriyākriyaṃ kriyākriyasabhāvaṃ mayā samīritaṃ, sammā pakārena īritaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:77: 64. Ekūnanavuti sabbe, cittuppādā mahesinā lokuttare aṭṭha katvā ekūnanavuti sabbe cittuppādā mahesinā tathāgatena samāsato saṅkhepato niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t0:78_0: 65. Piṭake abhidhammasmiṃ, ye bhikkhū pāṭavatthino abhidhammapiṭake paṭuno bhāvo
tika-abh08t0:78_1: pāṭavaṃ, tena attho pāṭavattho, so etesaṃ atthīti pāṭavatthino, chekabhāvatthikā
tika-abh08t0:78_2: ye bhikkhū, tehi bhikkhūhi ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro uggahetabbo sikkhitabbo punappunaṃ cintitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:79: 66. Ye janā tassaṅkāsena taṃsannibhena abhidhammāvatārena abhidhammamahodadhiṃ mahāsāgarasannibhaṃ abhidhammaṃ taranti, te imaṃ lokaṃ paralokañca taranti. Itīti parisamāpane.
tika-abh08t0:85: 67. Cittānantaramuddiṭṭhā, ye ca cetasikā mayā ye ca cetasikā cittānantaraṃ mayā uddiṭṭhā, ito paraṃ idāni tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ vibhājanaṃ karissāmi ahaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:86_0: Imesu pana karuṇāmuditāvasena bhāvanākāle karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā, appanāpattāya karuṇāya
tika-abh08t0:86_1: pubbabhāgo, tasmiṃ pubbabhāge, karuṇāto pubbabhāge kāmāvacaracitteti attho. Ekā karuṇā
tika-abh08t0:86_2: uppajjati. Muditāpubbabhāge vā appanāpattāya muditāya pubbabhāge ekā muditā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:86_3: Iminā kāmāvacaracittena yogī micchākammantādīhi dhammehi viramati. Ramu-dhātu kīḷāyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:87_0: 68. Ādinā puññacittena, tettiṃsa niyatā matā ādinā puññacittena paṭhamamahākusalacittena
tika-abh08t0:87_1: saha niyatā tettiṃsa cetasikā bhagavatā matāti, atha vā karuṇāmuditā aniyatā ekena
tika-abh08t0:88: 69. Kasmā panettha mettā ca, upekkhā ca na uddhaṭā ettha etesu yevāpanakadhammesu, niddhāraṇaṃ, mettā ca upekkhā ca dhammarājena satthunā na uddhaṭā na vuttā kasmā kāraṇā.
tika-abh08t0:89: 70. Abyāpādena mettāpi abyāpādena mettā gahitā, upekkhāti tatramajjhattatāya ca gahitā yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā ubhopetā bhagavatā na gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:90_0: 71. Kasmā yevāpanā dhammā, buddhenādiccabandhunā sabbe te yevāpanā dhammā yevāpananāmakā
tika-abh08t0:90_1: pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena eva. Bandhati snehena etasminti bandhu, ādiccassa bandhu ādiccabandhu,
tika-abh08t0:90_2: tena ādiccabandhunā buddhena na ca uddhaṭā na desitā.
tika-abh08t0:91_0: 72. Kasmā kāraṇā? Yasmā aniyatā keci yevāpanakā aniyatā, yasmā kāraṇā rāsiṃ dukavaggādirāsiṃ
tika-abh08t0:91_1: na bhajanti na sevanti, yasmā kāraṇā keci yevāpanakā dubbalā, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ bhagavatā na vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:96: Chandādhimokkho muditā manasikāro majjhattatā karuṇā viratittayañca puññesukusalesu niyatā cattāro aniyatā pañca sabbe yevāpanā na ca eva tena munivarena vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:97_0: 74-80. Kasmā panettha phassova, paṭhamaṃ samudīrito ettha etesu cetasikesu, jātiniddhāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:97_1: phassova paṭhamaṃ samudīrito kathito. Kasmā kāraṇā? Kira mayā sutaṃ, ārammaṇe cittassa
tika-abh08t0:97_2: paṭhamaṃ abhinipātattā phasso paṭhamaṃ samudīrito, phusitvā pana phassena phassena
tika-abh08t0:97_3: ārammaṇaṃ phusitvā yogino vedanāya ārammaṇaṃ vedaye, saññāya sañjānāti, cetanāya
tika-abh08t0:97_4: ārammaṇaṃ cetaye. Sahajātānaṃ cetasikānaṃ phassova idha imasmiṃ citte mahesinā paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:97_5: vutto. Hi kasmā kāraṇā? Yasmā balavapaccayattā, tasmā vutto. Akāraṇamidaṃ sabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:97_6: cittānaṃ tu saheva ca “paṭhamābhinipātattā”ti ca “balavapaccayattā”ti ca idaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:97_7: vacanaṃ akāraṇaṃ ahetukaṃ ayuttaṃ, kasmā kāraṇā? Cittajānaṃ cittehi sahappavattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:97_9: pavattito akāraṇaṃ ayuttaṃ. Ayaṃ tu paṭhamuppanno, ayaṃ pacchāti natthidaṃ ayaṃ dhammo
tika-abh08t0:97_10: paṭhamuppanno, ayaṃ dhammo pacchākāle uppanno iti idaṃ vacanaṃ natthi. Balavapaccayattepi
tika-abh08t0:97_11: kāraṇaṃ na ca dissati. Desanākkamato ceva paṭhamaṃ samudīrito iccevaṃ iti evaṃ iti
tika-abh08t0:97_12: iminā mayā vuttappakārena phassassa paṭhamaṃ samudīritataṃ viññunā vibhāvinā viññeyyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:97_13: visesato visesena aññathā na viññeyyaṃ. Na ca pariyesitabboyaṃ, tasmā pubbāparakkamo
tika-abh08t0:97_14: yasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ pubbāparakkamo viññunā na ca pariyesitabbo na gavesitabbo, dhammā
tika-abh08t0:98: Iṭṭhākārānubhavanarasā iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanakiccā subhojanarasaṃ anubhavanto rājā viya. Cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānā cetasikapassaddhipadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:99_1: sakiṃ sañjānitvāpi dāruharesu suttassa paṭipasāraṇaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Yathāgahitanimittavasenāti
tika-abh08t0:100_0: Āyūhanarasā pavattanakiccasādhakā. Mahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viya yathā mahāvaḍḍhakī sayampi
tika-abh08t0:100_1: dāruṃ tacchati, parepi dāruṃ tacchāpeti, evaṃ sayampi ārammaṇe sandahati, sampayuttadhammepi abhisandahāpeti.
tika-abh08t0:101: Āhananaṃ bhuso hananaṃ, pariyāhananaṃ samantā hananaṃ, taṃ raso etassāti āhananapariyāhananaraso.
tika-abh08t0:103: Pinayatīti pīti, sahajātadhamme ārammaṇe pinayatīti attho. Kāyacittapharaṇarasā. Udaggassa cittassa bhāvo odagyaṃ, taṃ paccupaṭṭhānaṃ etassāti odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:104: Saddahanti vatthuttayaṃ saddahanti. Akālusiyapaccupaṭṭhānā anāvilabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Saddheyyavatthupadaṭṭhānā saddahitabbavatthuttayāsannakāraṇā.
tika-abh08t0:105: Araññagatasudesako viya araññe gato maggasudesako viya.
tika-abh08t0:106_0: Attanā avinibbhuttānaṃ dhammānanti avigatānaṃ cetasikānaṃ. Tesanti tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:106_1: dhammānaṃ. Santepi ca tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva
tika-abh08t0:106_2: taṃ tesaṃ pāletabbānaṃ cetasikānaṃ pavattakkhaṇeyeva taṃ jīvitaṃ te dhamme pāletabbe
tika-abh08t0:106_3: cetasike anupāleti. Udakaṃ viyāti yathā udakaṃ attani uppalādīni anupāleti, tathā
tika-abh08t0:106_4: anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne santepi tesaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva anupāleti, vijjamānakkhaṇeva
tika-abh08t0:106_5: anupāletīti adhippāyo. Paccayuppannepi ca dhamme anupāleti, dhāti viya kumāraṃ aññāya
tika-abh08t0:106_6: janitaṃ kumāraṃ rakkhantī dhāti viya, parassa puttaṃ aṅkādinā dhāretīti dhāti. Sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva
tika-abh08t0:106_7: pavattati attanā pavattitehi dhammehi sampavattati. Niyāmako viya yathā niyāmako
tika-abh08t0:106_8: ekanāvāya vutthehi janehi saha pavattati, bhaṅgato uddhaṃ taṃ jīvitaṃ na pavattayati,
tika-abh08t0:106_9: attano ca abhāvā ṭhapayitabbānaṃ cetasikānañca abhāvā, bhaṅgakkhaṇe cetasike na ṭhapeti
tika-abh08t0:106_10: sayaṃ bhijjamānattā, vaṭṭisneho khīyamāno padīpasikhaṃ na karoti yathā.
tika-abh08t0:108: Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho ime khandhā gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:109: Nimmaddanarasāti nimmaddanakiccā. Kāyacittānaṃ avūpasamatāuddhaccādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti ādiggahaṇena kukkuccaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:115_0: 89. Sabbe cetasikā vuttā, buddhenādiccabandhunā ye sabbe cetasikā ādiccabandhunā
tika-abh08t0:115_1: buddhena vuttā, te sabbe cetasikā nāmasāmaññato nāmasamānabhāvena dvepaññāsabhavanti
tika-abh08t0:116_0: 90-92. Catupaññāsadhā kāme, rūpe pañcadaseritā kāme kāmāvacare catupaññāsa cittāni
tika-abh08t0:116_1: īritā. Rūpe rūpāvacare pañcadasa cittāni īritā bhavanti. Dvādasārūpe arūpāvacare
tika-abh08t0:116_2: dvādasa cittāni bhavanti. Cattālīsa manāsavā lokuttaracittāni cattālīsa bhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:116_3: ekavīsasataṃ sabbe cittuppādā samāsato saṅkhepato ekavīsasataṃ hoti. Etesu tesamuppattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:116_4: ito paraṃ etesu mayā vuttesu cittesu tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ
tika-abh08t0:116_5: uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya ahaṃ pavakkhāmi desissāmi.
tika-abh08t0:117: 93. Ekaggatā cittekaggatā manakkāro manasikāro jīvitaṃ phassapañcakaṃ ete aṭṭha cetasikā avinibbhogā aññamaññato avigatā ekuppādā samānuppādā sahakkhayā sahavayā.
tika-abh08t0:118: 94. Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitindriyaṃ ekaggatā manakkāro ime cetasikā sabbasādhāraṇā sabbacittehi sādhāraṇā, sabbacittānaṃ sādhāraṇā vā.
tika-abh08t0:119_0: 95. Vitakko pañcapaññāsa-cittesu samudīrito. Cāro chasaṭṭhicittesu vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaresu
tika-abh08t0:119_1: ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti pañcapaññāsacittesu bhagavatā samudīrito.
tika-abh08t0:119_3: ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu jāyati. Ettha etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi.
tika-abh08t0:121_1: dvāsaṭṭhicittesu jāyati. Dukkhindriyaṃ panekasmiṃ akusalavipāke kāyaviññāṇe jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:121_2: Tathekamhi sukhindriyaṃ tathā ekasmiṃ puññapāke kāyaviññāṇe hoti.
tika-abh08t0:122_0: 98. Pañcuttarasate citte, vīriyaṃ āha nāyako jino pañcadvārāvajjanadvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavajjite
tika-abh08t0:122_1: pañcuttarasate citte vīriyaṃ āha kathesi. Catuttarasate citte, samādhindriyamabrvi
tika-abh08t0:123: 99. Sabbāhetukacittāni, ṭhapetvā cekahetuke sabbāni aṭṭhārasa ahetukacittāni ekahetukacittadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ ekuttarasate citte chandassa uppattiṃ uddise paṇḍito katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:124: 100. Ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇādike dasa viññāṇe ca vicikicchāyutampi cittaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ dasuttarasate citte adhimokkho bhagavatā udīrito.
tika-abh08t0:125_0: 101-2. Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattaṃ cha yugaḷā ca iti ime
tika-abh08t0:125_1: ekūnavīsati dhammā niyatā hutvā ekanavutiyā citte jāyanti. Ekūnavīsati dhammā ahetukesu
tika-abh08t0:125_2: aṭṭhārasasu apuññesu dvādasasu akusalesu na jāyare na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:126_0: 103. Ekūnāsītiyā citte, paññā jāyati sabbadā paññā dvādasaakusalaaṭṭhārasaahetukamahākusalañāṇavippayuttamahāvipākañāṇavippayuttamahākiriyāñāṇavippayuttavajjite
tika-abh08t0:126_1: ekūnāsītiyā citte jāyati. Aṭṭhavīsatiyā citte, karuṇāmuditā siyuṃ karuṇāmuditā aṭṭhasu
tika-abh08t0:127: 104. Kāmāvacarapuññesu, sabbalokuttaresu ca kāmāvacaramahākusalesu cittesu sabbesu lokuttaresu cāti saha aṭṭhake cattālīsavidhe citte viratittayaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:128: 105. Saddhā sati hirottappaṃ alobhādittayampi ca yugaḷāni cha ca majjhattaṃ karuṇāmuditāpi ca.
tika-abh08t0:129: 106. Tathā tisso viratiyo sabbe te pañcavīsati dhammā mahākusalacittasampayuttaabyākatacittasampayuttāti kusalena sabbesuyeva dhammesu chekena vijitaṅgaṇena pakāsitā.
tika-abh08t0:130: 107. Ahirīkaṃ anottappaṃ, moho uddhaccameva cāti ime cattāro dhammā niyatā hutvā dvādasāpuññacittesuyeva dvādasaakusalacittesuyeva jāyare jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:131_0: 108-9. Lobho doso ca moho ca, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo vicikicchā middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:131_1: kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ macchariyampi ca ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ issā ca domanassakaṃ ete dhammā
tika-abh08t0:131_2: akusalā akusalacittasampayuttā ekantena mahesinā vijitaṅgaṇavigatamalena vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:132_0: 110. Lobho aṭṭhasu lobhamūlesu cittesu bhagavatā niddiṭṭho dassito. Diṭṭhi catūsu
tika-abh08t0:132_1: diṭṭhisampayuttesu cittesu vuttā. Māno diṭṭhivippayuttesu catūsu gāhūpavādappabhindanena
tika-abh08t0:132_2: vutto. Doso dvīsu eva paṭighasampayuttesu cittesu munindena vutto.
tika-abh08t0:133_0: 111. Issāmaccherakukkuccā dvīsu dosamūlesu cittesu jāyanti, no saha saha no jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:133_1: ekekova jāyantīti attho. Vicikicchā panekasmiṃ vicikicchā pana ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte
tika-abh08t0:134_0: 112-3. Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitaṃ mano vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti vīriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:134_1: samādhi ca chando cevādhimokkho ca manasikāro ca cuddasa dhammā kusalā ca kusalacetasikā
tika-abh08t0:134_2: ca honti. Akusalā ceva akusalacetasikā ceva abyākatāpi ca abyākatacetasikā ca honti.
tika-abh08t0:135_0: 114. Ekūnatiṃsacittesu, jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ mataṃ catūsu somanassasahagatākusalesu,
tika-abh08t0:135_2: tīsu rūpapaṭhamajjhānacittesu, aṭṭhasu lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti ekūnatiṃsacittesu
tika-abh08t0:135_3: pañcaṅgikaṃ pañcāvayavajhānayuttaṃ jhānaṃ sugatena mataṃ. Upekkhāsahagatāni cattāri
tika-abh08t0:135_4: lobhamūlāni ca dve dosamūlāni ca dve mohamūlāni ca manodhātuttikañca upekkhāsahagatā
tika-abh08t0:135_6: tīṇi rūpadutiyajjhānacittāni aṭṭha lokuttaradutiyajjhānacittāni cāti sattatiṃsa cittāni
tika-abh08t0:135_7: catujhānaṅgayuttāni catujhānāvayavayuttāni iti evaṃ niddise katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:136_1: aṭṭhalokuttaratatiyajjhānacittāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ tiavayavajhānayuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:137_0: 116. Sabhāvenāvitakkesu, jhānaṅgāni na uddhare sabhāvena pakatiyā avitakkesu vitakkavirahitesu
tika-abh08t0:137_1: dvipañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni jhānāvayavāni jino na uddhare. Ayametthādhippāyo – aññattha
tika-abh08t0:137_2: vitakko jhānacittena vippahīno bhāsito, imesu pana neva jhānacittena pahīnā, pakatiyā
tika-abh08t0:137_3: vitakkavirahitāni dvipañcaviññāṇāni sabbāhetukacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni jino
tika-abh08t0:138_0: 117. Budho jino dvipañcaviññāṇesu manodhātuttike ca tīsu santīraṇesu cāti soḷasacittesu
tika-abh08t0:138_1: tīṇindriyāni vade katheyya. Ekasmiṃ pana cattāri ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte
tika-abh08t0:138_2: cattāri indriyāni honti, ekādasasu akusalacittesu vicikicchāyuttacittavajjitesu hasituppāde
tika-abh08t0:138_3: ceva voṭṭhabbanacitte cāti terasasu cittesu pañca indriyāni budho bhagavā uddhare uddhareyya.
tika-abh08t0:139_0: 118. Satta dvādasacittesu, indriyāni jinobrvi jino buddho ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu
tika-abh08t0:139_1: dvādasacittesu satta indriyāni abrvi kathesi, ekenūnesu aṭṭheva, cattālīsamanesu
tika-abh08t0:139_3: pañcadasasu rūpesu, dvādasasu arūpesu cāti ekenūnesu cattālīsamanesu aṭṭheva indriyāni abrvi.
tika-abh08t0:140_0: 119. Cattālīsāya lokuttaracittesu navakaṃ indriyanavakaṃ nāyako abrvi kathesi. Evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:140_1: indriyayogopi, veditabbo vibhāvinā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittesu indriyayogo
tika-abh08t0:140_2: vibhāvinā visesena paññaṃ bhāvetuṃ pakāsetuṃ sīlametassāti vibhāvī, tena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:141_0: 120. Amaggaṅgāni nāmettha, aṭṭhārasa ahetukā ettha etesu cittesu aṭṭhārasa ahetukā
tika-abh08t0:141_1: natthi maggo etesūti amaggaṅgāni nāma, jhānaṅgāni na vijjanti, viññāṇesu dvipañcasu
tika-abh08t0:142_0: 121. Ekaṃ cittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ ekaṃ vicikicchāsahagatacittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ dumaggāvayavaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:142_1: catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttākusalacittesu ca dvīsu paṭighayuttesu ca uddhaccayuttesu cāti
tika-abh08t0:142_2: sattasu cittesu ca timaggaṅgāni timaggāvayavāni honti. Cattālīsāya cittesu, maggo
tika-abh08t0:142_5: rūpāvacaresu, dvādasasu arūpāvacaresu cāti cattālīsāya cittesu caturaṅgiko maggo
tika-abh08t0:143_1: dvādasasu, tīsu rūpapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti pañcaddasasu cittesu pañcaṅgiko pañcāvayavo
tika-abh08t0:143_2: maggo bhagavatā mato. Dvattiṃsacittesu maggo sattaṅgikopi ca lokuttaradutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātesu
tika-abh08t0:144_0: 123. Maggo aṭṭhasu cittesu maggaphalavasena aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko
tika-abh08t0:144_1: aṭṭhāvayavo hoti. Iti parisamāpane. Tu padapūraṇe. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
tika-abh08t0:144_2: sabbacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni dhīro uddhareyya, deseyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:145_0: 124. Balāni dve dvicittesu hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātesu dvīsu cittesu dve balāni
tika-abh08t0:145_1: honti. Ekasmiṃ tīṇi dīpaye ekasmiṃ vicikicchāyutte tīṇi balāni dhīro dīpaye pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t0:145_2: Vicikicchāyuttato sesesu ekādasasu akusalesu cattāri balāni honti. Cha dvādasasu
tika-abh08t0:146_2: ekūnāsītiyā cittesu satta balāni honti. Soḷasevābalāni tu dvipañcaviññāṇāni ca tisso
tika-abh08t0:146_3: manodhātuyo ca tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti soḷasa eva cittāni abalāni balavirahitāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:146_4: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittaṃ sabalaṃ balena sahagataṃ abalampi ca balavirahitañcāpi
tika-abh08t0:147_0: 126. Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalindriyāni, cittesu jāyanti hi yesu yāni yesu cittesu yāni
tika-abh08t0:147_1: jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalaindriyāni jāyanti, mayā samāsena samuddharitvā asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ uddharitvā
tika-abh08t0:147_2: tesu cittesu sabbānipi tāni jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalaindriyāni samāsena saṅkhepena mayā
tika-abh08t0:156: Ahaṃ ito paraṃ ito paricchedato paraṃ ekavidhādikaṃ nayaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ buddhiyā vuddhitthāya pavakkhāmi desessāmi.
tika-abh08t0:157: 128. Sabbamekavidhaṃ cittaṃ, vijānanasabhāvato sabbaṃ cittaṃ vijānanasabhāvato ekavidhaṃ, duvidhañca bhave cittaṃ ahetukasahetukato idaṃ cittaṃ duvidhaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:158: 129. Puññāpuññavipākā hi, kāme dasa ca pañca ca hi saccaṃ kāme kāmāvacare kusalākusalavipākā dasa pañca ca kiriyā tisso iti sabbe aṭṭhārasa cittuppādā ahetukā.
tika-abh08t0:159: 130. Ahetukato cittuppādato sesā ekasattati cittuppādā sahetukāti sahetukā nāmāti mahesinā tādinā aviparītasabhāvena hetuvādinā paccayavādinā niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t0:160: 131. Savatthukāvatthukato savatthukaavatthukavasena tathā ubhayavasena savatthukavasena, avatthukavasena ca sabbaṃ vuttappakārena ca mānasaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:161_0: 132-4. Sabbo kāmavipāko ca, rūpe pañcadasāpi ca cittuppādā ādimaggo paṭhamamaggo
tika-abh08t0:161_1: hasituppādo manodhātukiriyāpi ca domanassadvayañcāpi tecattālīsa mānasā vinā vatthuṃ
tika-abh08t0:161_2: vatthuṃ vajjetvā na uppajjanti, ekantena savatthukā nāma. Arūpāvacaravipākā ca ekantena
tika-abh08t0:161_3: avatthukā, mayā vuttato cittuppādato sesāni dvecattālīsa cittāni ubhayathā savatthukāvatthukavasena siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:162: 135. Ekekārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, pañcārammaṇameva ca cittaṃ chaḷārammaṇakañceti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārenāpi tividhaṃ cittaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:163_0: 136-8. Viññāṇāni ca dve pañca, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca abhiññāmānasaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:163_1: mahaggatañcevāti tecattālīsa cittuppādā pana ekekārammaṇā viññeyyā dhīrena. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:163_2: citte manodhātuttayaṃ pañcārammaṇaṃ īritaṃ bhagavatā. Mayā vuttacittato sesāni tecattālīsa
tika-abh08t0:163_3: cittāni chaḷārammaṇikāni matāni satthunā, tathā evaṃ cittaṃ kusalākusalādito tividhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:164: 139. Ahetukaṃ cittaṃ ekahetukañca cittaṃ dvihetukañca cittaṃ tihetukañca cittanti evaṃ iminā pakārena cittaṃ catubbidhaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:165_0: 140-2. Heṭṭhā mayāpi niddiṭṭhā aṭṭhārasa cittuppādā ahetukā, vicikicchuddhaccasaṃyuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:165_1: cittaṃ ekahetukaṃ evaṃ udīritaṃ bhagavatā. Kāme kāmāvacare puññavipākakriyato kusalavasena
tika-abh08t0:165_2: ca vipākavasena ca kiriyāvasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā akusalā ca dasadhā cāti
tika-abh08t0:165_3: bāvīsati cittuppādā duhetukā. Kāme kāmāvacare puññavipākakriyato puññavasena ca vipākavasena
tika-abh08t0:165_4: ca kiriyāvasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā. Sabbaṃ mahaggatañceva appamāṇaṃ lokuttaracittañca tihetukaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:166_1: rūpairiyāpathajanakavasena ca rūpajanakavasena ca tikiccājanakavasena cātiādīhi pakārehi
tika-abh08t0:166_2: sabbaṃ cittaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha tasmiṃ citte dvādasākusalā, kāmadhātuyā kusalā,
tika-abh08t0:166_3: tathā kāme dasa kiriyā, abhiññāmānasaṃ dvayaṃ, ime bāttiṃsa mānasā rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti,
tika-abh08t0:166_4: iriyāpathaṃ kappenti, viññattiṃ janayanti. Kusalā mahaggatamānasā kiriyā ca mahaggatamānasā,
tika-abh08t0:166_5: aṭṭha anāsavacittāni, chabbīsati ca mānasā rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti, iriyāpathaṃ kappenti.
tika-abh08t0:166_6: Copanaṃ na pāpenti viññattiṃ na janayantīti attho. Ime cittuppādā dukiccaniyatā,
tika-abh08t0:166_7: dasa viññāṇe ṭhapetvā dvīsu bhūmīsu vipākā manodhātudvayasantīraṇattayamahāvipākarūpavipākānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:166_8: vasena aṭṭhārasa pākā manodhātu kiriyā cevāti imāni ekūnavīsati cittāni rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti,
tika-abh08t0:166_9: itaradvayaṃ na karonti, puna dvepañcaviññāṇā paṭhamaṃ “dasa viññāṇe”ti vuttattā “punā”ti
tika-abh08t0:166_10: vuttā. Arūpīsu vipākā ca sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisandhicittañca arahato cuticittañca
tika-abh08t0:166_11: ime soḷasa mānasā tikiccāni na karonti.
tika-abh08t0:167: 151. Ekadviticatuṭṭhāna-pañcaṭṭhānappabhedato ekakiccadvikiccatikiccacatukiccapañcakiccabhedena pañcadhā cittaṃ pañcapakāraṃ cittaṃ pañcanimmalalocano buddho akkhāsi kathesi.
tika-abh08t0:171: 153. Sabbeva pañcapaññāsa cittuppādā javanaṭṭhānatoyeva javanakiccavaseneva ekaṭṭhāne ekakicce nippapañcena satthunā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivirahitena satthunā niyāmitā kathitā.
tika-abh08t0:172: 154. Puna dvepañcaviññāṇā cittuppādā dassane savane tathā ghāyane sāyanaṭṭhāne phusane paṭipāṭiyā satthunā niyāmitā.
tika-abh08t0:173: 155. Manodhātuttikaṃ āvajjane paṭicchane, ete aṭṭhasaṭṭhi cittuppādā ekaṭṭhānikataṃ ekakiccabhāvaṃ gatā pattā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:174_0: 156-8. Cittadvayaṃ dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma udīritaṃ bhagavatā, somanassayutaṃ cittaṃ pañcadvāre
tika-abh08t0:174_1: santīraṇaṃ siyā. Chadvāre tadālambaṇañca balavārammaṇe atimahantārammaṇe sati siyā,
tika-abh08t0:174_2: tathā voṭṭhabbanaṃ pañcadvāresu voṭṭhabbanaṃ hoti. Manodvāresu pana sabbesaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:174_3: āvajjanaṃ hoti, idaṃ cittadvayaṃ dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:175_0: 159. Paṭisandhiyā ṭhānato paṭisandhiyā kiccavasena bhavaṅgassa ṭhānato bhavaṅgassa
tika-abh08t0:175_1: kiccavasena cutiyā ṭhānato cutiyā kiccavasena te mahaggatavipākā nava tiṭṭhānikā
tika-abh08t0:176_0: 160-3. Aṭṭha kāmā mahāpākā, paṭisandhibhavaṅgato paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena tadārammaṇato
tika-abh08t0:176_1: ceva tadārammaṇavasena ca eva cutiṭṭhānavasena ca aṭṭha cittāni catuṭṭhānikacittāni
tika-abh08t0:176_2: honti, iti vacanaṃ dhīro niddise, kusalākusalapākopekkhāsahagatadvayaṃ pañcadvāre
tika-abh08t0:176_3: santīraṇaṃ bhave, chadvārikesupi balavārammaṇe sati tadārammaṇatā siyā. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:176_4: ṭhānavasena ca cutiṭṭhānavasena ca idaṃ cittadvayaṃ pañcaṭṭhānikacittaṃ nāmāti udīritaṃ muninā.
tika-abh08t0:177: 164. Pañcakiccaṃ dvayaṃ cittaṃ, aṭṭhakaṃ pana catukiccaṃ, navakaṃ tikiccaṃ, dve cittuppādā dvikiccā, imesaṃ imehi cittuppādehi sesaṃ ekakaṃ kiccaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:181_0: 166. Chabbidhaṃ hoti taṃ channaṃ taṃ cittaṃ channaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanoviññāṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:182: 167. Ekekārammaṇaṃ chakkaṃ, pañcārammaṇabhedato chaḷārammaṇato ceva chaḷārammaṇacittavasena mano cittaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:183: 168. Tattha tasmiṃ citte dvepañcaviññāṇā ekekagocarā honti, dve cittuppādā rūpārammaṇikā, dve dve cittuppādā saddādigocarā.
tika-abh08t0:184: 169. Pañcābhiññāvivajjitaṃ sabbaṃ mahaggataṃ, sabbaṃ lokuttarañca iti idaṃ cittaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh08t0:185: 170. Idaṃ chakkaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ vibhāvinā ñeyyaṃ, manodhātuttayaṃ pañcārammaṇikaṃ nāma bhave.
tika-abh08t0:186: 171. Kāmāvacaracittāni cattālīsaṃ tathā ekekaṃ sabbāni abhiññāni ca chaḷārammaṇikānīti chaḷārammaṇikāni nāma paṇḍitena viññeyyāni.
tika-abh08t0:187: 172. Sattaviññāṇadhātūsu pacchimaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuñca kusalākusalābyākatavasena tidhā katvā navavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:188: 173. Manoviññāṇadhātuyā bhedo puññāpuññavaseneva vipākakiriyabhedato chasattatividho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:189: 174. Manodhātuṃ vipākakiriyabhedato dvidhā katvā pubbe vuttehi navadhā cittehi mānasaṃ dasadhā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:190_1: tidhā katvā, manoviññāṇadhātuñca kusalākusalābyākatavasena tividhā katvā cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi
tika-abh08t0:190_2: saha cittaṃ ekādasavidhaṃ hoti, iti idaṃ vacanaṃ paṇḍito paridīpaye.
tika-abh08t0:191_1: vibhajitvāna taṃ cittaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi saha tippakārāya manodhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:192_0: 177-9. Cittaṃ cuddasaṭṭhānabhedena cuddasadhā bhave, paṭisandhiyā vasena ca bhavaṅgavasena
tika-abh08t0:192_1: ca cutiyā vasena ca āvajjanassa vasena ca pañcannaṃ dassanādīnaṃ kiccānaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:192_2: ca sampaṭicchanacetaso vasena ca santīraṇassa vasena ca voṭṭhabbanajavanānaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:192_3: ca, yathā evaṃ tadārammaṇacittassa vasena cāti evaṃ iminā pakārena ṭhānabhedato kiccabhedena
tika-abh08t0:192_4: cuddasadhā cittaṃ hoti, iti idaṃ vacanaṃ dhīro paridīpaye paridīpeyya.
tika-abh08t0:193: 180. Bhūmipuggalanānattavasena bhūminānattavasena, puggalanānattavasena ca cittānaṃ pavattito idaṃ cittaṃ bahudhā hoti, iti vacanañca dhīro vibhāvaye pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t0:194_0: 181. Idha imasmiṃ sāsane yo bhikkhu matimā imasmiṃ ekavidhādinaye kusalo cheko hoti,
tika-abh08t0:194_1: abhidhamme pavattā atthā tassa bhikkhuno hatthagatā hatthapaviṭṭhā āmalakā viya suddhamaṇikā viya honti.
tika-abh08t0:203_0: Ahaṃ ito paraṃ buddhivuddhikaraṃ nayaṃ mativaddhikaraṃ nayaṃ pavakkhāmi desessāmi.
tika-abh08t0:203_1: Cittānaṃ bhūmisuppattiṃ puggalānaṃ vasena ca bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ, puggalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:204_0: 183. Devā ceva manussā ca, tisso ca apāyabhūmiyo honti, gatiyo pañca tesaṃ devamanussatiracchānapetanirayagatīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:204_1: vasena pañca gatiyo niddiṭṭhā satthunā dassitā bhagavatā. Tayo bhavā pana kāmarūpārūpabhavavasena
tika-abh08t0:205_0: 184-5. Bhūmiyo tattha tiṃseva, tāsu tiṃseva puggalā tattha tesu tīsu bhavesu tiṃsa
tika-abh08t0:205_1: eva bhūmiyo honti, tāsu bhūmīsu uppannā puggalā tiṃsa eva honti, etāsu bhūmīsu uppannā
tika-abh08t0:205_2: sabbe ca pana puggalā paṭisandhikacittānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsati honti. Paṭisandhi ca
tika-abh08t0:205_3: nāmesā esā paṭisandhi ca nāma duvidhā dvippakārā samudīritā satthunā kathitā.
tika-abh08t0:206_0: 186. Acittakā paṭisandhi, sacittakā paṭisandhi ca iti duvidhā paṭisandhi hoti, asaññibrahmānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:206_1: paṭisandhi acittakā rūpapaṭisandhi hoti. Sesā rūpapaṭisandhito sesā sacittakā sacittakapaṭisandhi
tika-abh08t0:206_2: ñeyyā paṇḍitena jānitabbā. Sā pana sacittakā paṭisandhi ekūnavīsati hoti.
tika-abh08t0:207_0: 187. Paṭisandhivaseneva sacittakapaṭisandhivasena eva vīsati puggalā honti. Idha
tika-abh08t0:207_1: imasmiṃ cittādhikāre cittādhikārattā acittakapaṭisandhi rūpapaṭisandhi na ca uddhaṭā na ca kathitā mayā.
tika-abh08t0:208_0: 188. Ahetudvitihetūti, puggalā tividhā siyuṃ ahetukadvihetukatihetukā iti tividhā
tika-abh08t0:208_1: tippakārā puggalā siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ. Ariyā pana puggalā aṭṭha iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
tika-abh08t0:208_2: sabbe puggalā ekādasa īritā kathitā bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:209_0: 189. Bhūmīsu tiṃsabhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ etesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ pabhedato
tika-abh08t0:209_1: bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca gaṇhato gaṇhantassa mama vacanaṃ nibodhatha, tumhe jānātha suṇātha.
tika-abh08t0:210: 190. Tīsu bhūmīsu kati cittāni jāyanti? Me mayhaṃ vada tāni cittāni tvaṃ kathehi, sabbāsu bhūmīsu cuddasa eva cittāni. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:213: 191. Sadā vīsati cittāni, kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ vīsati cittāni kāmeyeva bhave sadā sabbasmiṃ kāle siyuṃ bhaveyyunti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:216_0: Ghānādiviññāṇattayanti kusalavipākaghānādittayaṃ. Pākā apuññajā akusalato jātā ahetukā
tika-abh08t0:216_1: satta vipākā. Pañca rūpabhaveyeva pañca cittāni rūpabhaveyeva bhavanti. Cattāreva
tika-abh08t0:216_2: arūpisu cattāri cittāni arūpīsuyeva honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:226: Dvecattālīsa cittāni, honti tīsu bhavesupi dvecattālīsa cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:232: 193. Ṭhapetvā pana sabbesaṃ, catassopāyabhūmiyo catasso apāyabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā vajjetvā apāyato sesānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ chabbīsabhūmīsu terasa eva cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:236: 194. Aparāni catassopi, ṭhapetvāruppabhūmiyo catasso arūpabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu chabbīsabhūmīsu aparāni cha cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:240: 195. Suddhāvāsikadevānaṃ, ṭhapetvā pañca bhūmiyo pañca bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavīsatibhūmīsu pañca cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:246: Catassopāyabhūmiyo nevasaññānāsaññañca ṭhapetvāyeva pañcavīsatibhūmīsu aparāni duve cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:249: 197. Dvepi cittāni jāyanti, catuvīsatibhūmisu catassopāyabhūmiyo ākiñcaññañca nevasaññañca ṭhapetvā sesāsu catuvīsatibhūmīsu dvepi cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:252: 198. Apāyabhūmiyo hitvā catasso apāyabhūmiyo tisso upari arūpabhūmiyo hitvā chaḍḍetvā sesāsu tevīsatibhūmīsu dveyeva pana cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:255: 199. Arūpe ca apāye ca aṭṭha bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu bāvīsatibhūmīsu ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:258: 200. Suddhāvāse apāye ca nava bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekavīsāsu bhūmīsu niccampi cattāro eva mānasā honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:262: 201. Ekaṃ sattarasasveva, cittaṃ jāyati bhūmisu suddhāvāsaapāyāruppabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā avasesāsu sattarasasu bhūmīsu ekaṃ cittaṃ jāyati. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:267: Ṭhapetvā pana sabbāpi, bhūmiyo hi mahaggatā. –
tika-abh08t0:268: Ekūnavīsatibhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekādasasu bhūmīsu dvādasa cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:271: 203. Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ vasena ca manussānaṃ vasena ca sattasu kāmāvacarabhūmīsu aṭṭha cittāni sabbadā jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:273: Sadā sattasu etāni, hitvā tevīsa bhūmiyo.
tika-abh08t0:274_0: 204. Pañcamajjhānapākeko, jāyate chasu bhūmisu eko pañcamajjhānavipāko vehapphalādīsu
tika-abh08t0:274_1: chasu bhūmīsu jāyati. Cattāri pana rūpavipākacittāni tīsu tīsu bhūmīsu jāyanti. Ayametthādhippāyo
tika-abh08t0:274_3: eko dutiyarūpavipāko, eko tatiyarūpavipāko ca parittābhāappamāṇābhāābhassarānaṃ tīsu
tika-abh08t0:274_4: bhūmīsu jāyati, eko catuttharūpavipāko parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:275_0: 205. Cattāri pana cittāni, honti ekekabhūmisu arūpāvacaravipākānaṃ vasena cattāri
tika-abh08t0:275_1: pana cittāni ekekabhūmīsu ekekāsu bhūmīsu honti, iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
tika-abh08t0:275_2: sabbāsu bhūmīsu cittuppādaṃ paridīpaye paṇḍito katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:276_0: 206-7. Kusalākusalā kāme kāme vīsati kusalākusalā, tesaṃ pākā ahetukā tesaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:276_1: ahetukā pañcadasa vipākā āvajjanadvayañca iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sattatiṃsa
tika-abh08t0:276_2: mānasā narakādīsu catūsu apāyesupi jāyare. Avasesāni dvipaññāsa cittāni kadācipi
tika-abh08t0:281: 208. Kāme devamanussānaṃ kāmāvacare devamanussānaṃ mahaggatā nava pākā neva jāyanti, asīti hadayā mānasā sadā jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:286_0: 209-12. Kāme kāmāvacare aṭṭha mahāvipākā domanassadvayampi ca tathā ghānādiviññāṇattayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:286_1: kusalavipākaṃ apuññajā satta pākā. Natthi āruppapākā ca, rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ arūpapākā
tika-abh08t0:286_2: ca cattāro rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ natthi. Ayametthādhippāyo – rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:286_3: mahāvipākā kāmasugatisattānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipākacittattā na honti, jhānena vikkhambhitattā
tika-abh08t0:286_5: natthi, aniṭṭhārammaṇānaṃ abhāvato satta akusalavipākā ca natthi, arūpapākā ca natthi.
tika-abh08t0:286_6: Kasmā? Arūpānaṃ vipākacittattā. Imehi saha cittehi imehi catuvīsaticittehi saha tayo
tika-abh08t0:286_7: maggā phaladvayaṃ sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo ca sotāpattiphalasakadāgāmiphalāni
tika-abh08t0:286_8: ca cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā vicikicchāsaṃyuttampi ca cattāro heṭṭhimā pākā ca suddhāvāse
tika-abh08t0:286_9: na labbhare na labbhanti. Ayametthādhippāyo – puthujjanasotāpannasakadāgāmipuggalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:286_10: asādhāraṇattā suddho ca āvāso, atha vā ghorātikkamaṭṭhitattā anāgāmipuggalā suddhā
tika-abh08t0:286_11: nāma, caturoghatiṇṇattā khīṇāsavā suddhā nāma, tesaṃ suddhānaṃ dvinnaṃ uttamasattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:287_1: na vijjanti. Kasmāti ce? Anāgāmiphalaṭṭhānaṃyeva tasmiṃ uppajjanato cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā
tika-abh08t0:287_2: ca vicikicchāyuttañca pañca akusalacittānaṃ sotāpannena vināsitattā, iti tasmā kāraṇā
tika-abh08t0:287_3: na jāyanti. Cattāro heṭṭhimavipākā heṭṭhimānaṃ rūpabrahmānaṃ vipākacittattā natthi.
tika-abh08t0:287_4: Sesāni ekapaññāsa cittāni suddhāvāse pana labbhanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:289: Kāmapuññāni aṭṭha ca, rūpapuññāni pañca vā.
tika-abh08t0:294: Rūpāvacarikā sabbe sabbāni rūpāvacarāni pañcadasa cittāni, kāmadhātuyā sabbe tevīsati vipākā.
tika-abh08t0:295_0: 213. Domanassādimaggo ca domanassadvayañca ādimaggo ca sotāpattimaggo ca, kriyā ca
tika-abh08t0:295_1: dve ahetukā pañcadvārāvajjanahasituppādāni kiriyāni cāti tecattālīsa cittāni arūpabhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:295_2: natthi. Pañca rūpāvacaravipākā rūpīnaṃ vipākacittattā natthi. Rūpajavanāni heṭṭhimajhānānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:295_3: virattattā natthi. Cakkhusotaviññāṇāni puññajāni pasādarahitattā natthi. Ghānādiviññāṇāni
tika-abh08t0:295_4: pakatiyāyeva natthi. Kusalavipākā manodhātu cakkhādiggahitapañcārammaṇattā arūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:295_5: dhammārammaṇattā natthi, asati cakkhādiviññāṇe sā ca puññajā manodhātu tāya ca asatiyā
tika-abh08t0:295_6: cakkhādiviññāṇampi natthiyeva. Kiriyāmanodhātupi pañcārammaṇattāyeva natthi, hasituppādopi
tika-abh08t0:295_7: rūpakāyābhāvā sitassābhāvā natthi, pubbeva diṭṭhasaccā ariyā rūpabhūmikā, tasmā ādimaggopi natthi.
tika-abh08t0:296_0: 214. Evaṃ bhūmivaseneva, cittuppattiṃ vibhāvaye evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena bhūmivasena
tika-abh08t0:296_1: cittuppattiṃ vibhāvaye dhīro katheyya. Tathā evaṃ ekādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena cittuppattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:303_0: 216. Evaṃ catūsvapāyabhūmīsu manussabhūmiyañcāti pañcabhūmīsu ahetukassa sattassa
tika-abh08t0:303_1: jāyante uppajjanti. Dvepaññāsāvasesāni, na jāyanti kadācipi avasesāni dvepaññāsa
tika-abh08t0:303_2: cittāni kadācipi na jāyanti na uppajjanti, tāni sarūpato vuttāneva.
tika-abh08t0:304: 217. Ahetukassa sattassa uppajjantehi sattatiṃsacittehi saha duhetukā, catumahāvipākā cāti cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekakaṃ duhetukassa sattassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:305_0: 218-23. Sabbe mahaggatā ceva sabbe sattavīsatividhā mahaggatā ceva sabbepi ca anāsavā
tika-abh08t0:305_1: sabbe aṭṭha lokuttarā ceva cattāro tihetukavipākā ca kāme hasituppādo sahetukamahākiriyā
tika-abh08t0:305_2: cāti nava kriyāpi ceti cattālīsaṃ tathā aṭṭha ca duhetuno sattassa na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:306_0: Ayametthādhippāyo – duhetuno rūpārūpasamāpattiyā asamatthatāya sattavīsa mahaggatā
tika-abh08t0:306_1: na jāyanti, maggaphalaṃ adhigantuṃ asamatthatāya aṭṭha lokuttarā na jāyanti, tihetukavipākā
tika-abh08t0:306_2: tihetukānaṃ sattānaṃ vipākacittattā na jāyanti, nava kiriyāni khīṇāsavānaṃyeva uppajjamānattā
tika-abh08t0:306_3: na jāyantīti. Kāmāvacarasattassa, tihetupaṭisandhino puthujjanassa catupaññāsa mānasā
tika-abh08t0:306_4: jāyanti. Katamāni tāni? Duhetukassa vuttāni cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekañca kāmadhātuyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:306_5: cattāro ñāṇasampayuttavipākā rūpārūpesu nava puññāni cāti catupaññāsa mānasā jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:306_6: Puthujjanassa tihetuno kāmasattassa pañcatiṃsa cittāni na jāyare na jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:308: Nava mahaggatā pākā, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh08t0:311: Chadevesu manussesu cāti sattasu bhūmīsu jātassa sotāpannassa dehino sattassa paññāsa cittāni jāyanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro niddise katheyya. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:316: Assa sotāpannassa navatiṃseva cittāni na uppajjanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro dīpaye deseyya. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:318: Nava mahaggatā pākā, satta lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh08t0:321: 224. Paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā sotāpannassa puggalassa vuttāni cittāni attano sakadāgāmino phalena sakadāgāmiphalena saha sakadāgāmipuggalassa siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:322_0: 225. Sotāpannassa vuttāni, ṭhapetvā paṭighadvayaṃ dutiyañca phalaṃ sakadāgāmiphalañca
tika-abh08t0:322_1: hitvā attano anāgāmiphalena saha sotāpannassa sattassa vuttāni yāni aṭṭhacattālīsa
tika-abh08t0:322_2: cittāni atthi, tāni anāgāmissa sattassa jāyanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise.
tika-abh08t0:323_0: 226. Kati cittāni jāyanti, kāme arahato pana kāme sattasu kāmabhūmīsu jātassa arahato
tika-abh08t0:323_1: khīṇāsavassa kati cittāni jāyanti? Cattāri ca cattārīsañca cittāni kāme sattasu kāmabhūmīsu
tika-abh08t0:323_2: jātassa arahato siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:326: 227. Maggaṭṭhānaṃ catunnampi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ maggacittaṃ siyā bhaveyya. Ekacittakkhaṇā hi te hi saccaṃ taṃ mayā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ. Te maggā ekacittakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:327_0: 228. Puthujjanassa tīsveva, paṭhamajjhānabhūmisu tīsu eva paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa
tika-abh08t0:327_1: puthujjanassa brahmuno pañcatiṃsa eva cittāni jāyanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise
tika-abh08t0:333_0: 229-234. Ghānādīsu pasādesu pavattaṃ kusalavipākaṃ viññāṇattayaṃ satta apuññajā pākā
tika-abh08t0:333_1: aṭṭha mahāpākā tathā uparijhānabhūmīsu jātā pākā āruppā cattāro vipākāpi ca domanassadvayampi
tika-abh08t0:333_2: ca āvajjanadvayavajjā aṭṭhārasa kriyā ceva aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca etāni catupaññāsa
tika-abh08t0:333_3: cittāni paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu tīsu nibbattassa puthujjanassa dehino sattassa na ca
tika-abh08t0:333_4: labbhare na labbhanti. Tāsu tīsu bhūmīsu nibbattassa puthujjanassa brahmuno vuttesu
tika-abh08t0:333_5: cittesu apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā tattha tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu nibbattassa sotāpannassa
tika-abh08t0:333_6: brahmuno paṭhamaphalena saha ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare jāyanti. Sakadāgāmino tattha
tika-abh08t0:333_7: tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa sakadāgāmino brahmuno tesu cittesu paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:333_8: ṭhapetvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ pakkhipitvā ekatiṃseva cittāni jāyare. Anāgāmissa tattheva
tika-abh08t0:333_9: tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu eva jātassa anāgāmissa dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalacittena
tika-abh08t0:337_0: 236-7. Arahattaphalaṃ paṭhamajjhānato sambhavo pāko sattavīsati cittāni arahantassa
tika-abh08t0:337_1: khīṇāsavassa jāyare. Puthujjanassa tīsveva tīsu eva dutiyajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa puthujjanassa
tika-abh08t0:337_2: brahmuno dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānapākena saha chattiṃsa cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:344_0: 238-241. Puthujjanassa vuttesu, hitvā vāpuññapañcakaṃ attano phalena saha bāttiṃsa
tika-abh08t0:344_1: cittāni sotāpannassa jāyanti. Sotāpannassa vuttesu, ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ sotāpannassa
tika-abh08t0:344_2: vuttesu paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalacittena saha bāttiṃsa cittāni, sakadāgāmissa
tika-abh08t0:344_3: vuttesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā anāgāmiphalena saha bāttiṃseva cittāni assa anāgāmino
tika-abh08t0:344_4: bhavanti. Arahantassa tīsveva, aṭṭhavīsati attano tīsu eva dutiyajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa
tika-abh08t0:344_5: arahato attano phalena dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānapākato pākehi saha aṭṭhavīsati cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:349_0: 242-6. Parittakasubhādīnaṃ, devānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu catutthajjhānavipākena saha pañcatiṃseva
tika-abh08t0:349_1: cittāni jāyanti. Sotāpannassa tattheka-tiṃsa cittāni jāyaretattha tāsu tīsu parittakasubhādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:349_2: bhūmīsu sotāpannassa ca ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare. Yathā evaṃ sakadāgāmino ekatiṃsa
tika-abh08t0:349_3: cittāni jāyare. Tathā anāgāmino ekatiṃsa jāyare. Tattheva tāsu tīsu bhūmīsu eva jātassa
tika-abh08t0:349_4: khīṇāsavassa sattavīsati mānasā honti, tathā evaṃ vehapphale vehapphalabhūmiyaṃ jātānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:349_5: puthujjanasekkhānaṃ pañcannaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ mānasā honti. Pañcasu suddhāvāsikabhūmīsu
tika-abh08t0:349_6: jātassa anāgāmino sattassa ekatiṃseva cittāni honti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro paridīpaye
tika-abh08t0:349_7: deseyya. Tattheva tāsu suddhāvāsabhūmīsu eva jātassa arahato sattavīsati mānasā honti.
tika-abh08t0:349_8: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena rūpīsu pañcadasasu rūpibhūmīsu jātānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:350: 247. Catuvīsati cittāni, paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ paṭhamaāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa catuvīsati cittāni jāyanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:354_1: eva sotāpannassa puggalassa apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā attano phalena saha vīsati cittāni
tika-abh08t0:354_2: honti. Tathā tattha tissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ sakadāgāmino, anāgāminopi ca puggalassa
tika-abh08t0:354_3: pubbaṃ pubbaṃ phalaṃ vinā vajjetvā attano phalena saha vīsati cittāni jāyanti. Khīṇāsavassa
tika-abh08t0:354_4: tattheva tattha tissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ eva jātassa khīṇāsavassa dasa pañca mānasā
tika-abh08t0:357: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa tevīsati cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:361: Iti evaṃ iminā pakārena vatvā kathetvā dhīro paṇḍito vibhāvaye deseyya. Ettha etissaṃ dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātānaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ sekkhānampi ekūnavīsati cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:366: 252. Cuddaseva tu cittāni dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa kiriyacittāni dvādasa eko pāko arahattaphalañcāti cuddaseva cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:369: 253. Puthujjanassa sattassa, tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ tatiyaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa bāvīsati cittāni bhavanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro pakāsaye. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:373: 254-5. Aṭṭhāraseva cittāni, sotāpannassa puggalassa aṭṭhārasa eva cittāni jāyare. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:378_0: Sakadāgāmino paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena tāni aṭṭhārasa cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:378_1: Sakadāgāmino vuttesu cittesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena saha aṭṭhārasa
tika-abh08t0:379: 256. Teraseva ca cittāni, tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ tatiyaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa teraseva cittāni jāyanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:382: 257. Ekavīsati cittāni, catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ catutthaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa ekavīsati cittāni jāyanti. Iti idaṃ vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:386: 258-260. Sotāpannassa sattassa, sattarasa cittāni dhīro pakāsaye. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:390_0: Sakadāgāmino paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā tāni eva cittāni saphalena honti. Sakadāgāmino
tika-abh08t0:390_1: vuttesu cittesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena sattarasa mānasā anāgāmissa
tika-abh08t0:390_2: honti. Dvādaseva tu cittāni, catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa arahantassa dvādasa eva
tika-abh08t0:393: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puggalānaṃ vasena bhūmīsu cittappavattiṃ vidū dhīro vibhāvaye.
tika-abh08t0:394_0: 261-2. Heṭṭhimānaṃ arūpīnaṃ, brahmānaṃ uparūpari jātā arūpakusalā ceva kiriyāpi ca
tika-abh08t0:394_1: uppajjanti. Uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bhāge jātānaṃ arūpīnaṃ brahmānaṃ heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā āruppā
tika-abh08t0:394_2: heṭṭhābhāge jātā arūpāvacarā pana neva jāyanti. Kasmā kāraṇāti? Kira mayā sutaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:395_0: 263-5. Ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ ṭhapetvā kusalānuttarā tayo tayo
tika-abh08t0:395_1: anuttarā kusalā tayo maggā, kāmāvacarapuññāni aṭṭha, tathā dasa apuññāni cittāni,
tika-abh08t0:395_2: arūpapuññāni cattāri. Sabbe pākā anuttarā sabbāni lokuttaraphalāni, paṭhamāruppapāko
tika-abh08t0:395_3: ca nava kāmakiriyāpi ca, arūpāpi sabbā kiriyā, etāni pana tecattālīsa mānasā paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:396_0: 266-7. Sabbo tevīsatikāmavipāko, sabbo pannarasavidho mahaggato rūpo cittuppādo,
tika-abh08t0:396_1: manodhātu kiriyāmanodhātu, domanassadvayampi ca ādimaggo ca tathā upari jātā tayo
tika-abh08t0:396_2: arūpapākā cāti chacattālīsa cittāni ettha etissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:397_0: 268-9. Vuttesu pana cittesu, paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ vuttesu cittesu kusalapākakiriyāvasena
tika-abh08t0:397_1: paṭhamāruppattayaṃ ṭhapetvā attano pāko cāti cattālīsa cittāni dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:397_2: jāyanti. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sesadvaye paṭhamadutiyāruppato sesaākiñcaññāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmidvaye
tika-abh08t0:397_3: heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimaṃ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena heṭṭhābhāge jātaṃ arūpattayaṃ hitvā attano
tika-abh08t0:397_4: attano pākā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena ñeyyā jānitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:398_0: 270-3. Cattāro ca anāsavā, vipākā cattāri lokuttaraphalacittāni, sabbe sabbāni ca
tika-abh08t0:398_1: catūsu āruppabhūmīsu honti. Voṭṭhabbanena cittena saha kāme aṭṭha mahākiriyā, catasso
tika-abh08t0:398_2: arūpakiriyāpi cāti terasa eva kiriyā paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:398_3: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ hitvā dvādasa eva kiriyā
tika-abh08t0:398_4: honti. Tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamadutiyāruppakiriyāni hitvā
tika-abh08t0:398_5: ekādasa kiriyā honti. Catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamadutiyatatiyāruppakiriyāni
tika-abh08t0:402_0: Āvajjanadvayaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbā kiriyā, arahattaphalañcāti ekūnavīsati cittāni arahato
tika-abh08t0:402_1: pana honti. Āvajjanadvayaṃ kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa honti, evampi aññesaṃ puthujjanasekkhānampi
tika-abh08t0:402_2: hontiyeva. Ekūnavīsati cittāni khīṇāsavassa eva honti, na aññesanti ñāpanatthaṃ “āvajjanadvayaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:403_0: 275-6. Catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānañca tihetukaputhujjane ca teraseva cittāni
tika-abh08t0:403_1: bhavanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro pakāsaye. Taṃ yathā – cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā mahāvipākāni,
tika-abh08t0:403_2: nava rūpārūpapākā ca ime teraseva cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:404_0: 277-9. Catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānañca duhetukaputhujjane ca ñāṇaparihīnāni cattāri
tika-abh08t0:404_1: vipākāni eva jāyare. Puthujjanānaṃ tiṇṇampi, catunnaṃ ariyadehinaṃ ariyagatānaṃ sattannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:404_2: puggalānaṃ sattaraseva cittāni bhavanti. Taṃ yathā – duve pañcaviññāṇāni, manodhātuttayasantīraṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:405_0: 280-5. Heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ, tihetukaputhujjane catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ mahaggatāni
tika-abh08t0:405_1: eva kusalāni honti. Tiṇṇaṃ puthujjanānañca, ādito tiṇṇaṃ ariyānaṃ heṭṭhā ariyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:405_2: teraseva cittāni uppajjanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro niddise. Aṭṭheva kāmapuññāni, apuññato
tika-abh08t0:405_3: akusalavasena diṭṭhihīnā cattāro cittuppādāpi, uddhaccasampayuttañcāti terasa cittāni
tika-abh08t0:405_4: honti. Heṭṭhā dvinnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmipuggalānaṃ sabbaputhujjane
tika-abh08t0:405_5: ahetukaduhetukatihetukaputhujjane domanassayuttaṃ dvayameva cittaṃ jāyate. Tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:405_6: puthujjanānañca pañca eva jāyare. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:408: Tesaṃ catunnaṃ maggaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ ekameva maggacittaṃ bhave bhaveyya. Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena dhīro paṇḍito vibhāvaye cittappavattiṃ pakāsaye.
tika-abh08t0:409_0: 286-9. Mayā bhavesu cittānaṃ, puggalānaṃ vasena ca. Bhavesu sabbabhavesu cittānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:409_1: puggalānaṃ vasena ca cittappavatti bhikkhūnaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya
tika-abh08t0:409_2: chekabhāvāya mayā pakāsitā. Evaṃ sabbamidaṃ cittaṃ, bhūmipuggalabhedato evaṃ iminā
tika-abh08t0:409_3: mayā vuttappakārena bhūmipuggalabhedato idaṃ sabbaṃ cittaṃ bahudhāpi ca bahuppakārampi
tika-abh08t0:409_4: ca hoti. Iti gahaṇaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ. Sakkā vuttānusārena mayā vuttassa anusārena
tika-abh08t0:409_5: bhedo cittabhedo vibhāvinā ñātuṃ vijānituṃ sakkā. Ganthavitthārabhītena mayā idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:409_6: cittappavattidīpakavacanaṃ saṃkhittaṃ, pubbāparaṃ viloketvā, cintetvā ca punappunaṃ
tika-abh08t0:410_0: 290. Imañcābhidhammāvatāraṃ susāraṃ, varaṃ sattamohandhakārappadīpaṃ imañca abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:410_1: susāraṃ sundarasārabhūtaṃ varaṃ sattaandhakārasadise mohe padīpaṃ pajjotappadīpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:410_2: yo naro sādhukaṃ cinteti vācetipi, taṃ naraṃ rāgadosā ciraṃ cirakālaṃ nopayanti na upagacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:418: Dassayissāmahaṃ tena, vinā natthi hi sambhavo.
tika-abh08t0:419_0: Ito paraṃ ito paricchedato paraṃ ahaṃ etesaṃ pana cittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassayissāmi.
tika-abh08t0:419_1: Hi kasmā? Tena vinā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā cittānaṃ sambhavo natthi yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:421: Rūpaṃ saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ, phoṭṭhabbaṃ dhammameva ca;
tika-abh08t0:423: Chaḷārammaṇesu chekā paṇḍitā ārammaṇaṃ chadhā chappakāraṃ āhu kathesuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:424_0: 293. Tattha bhūte upādāya. Tattha tesu ārammaṇesu bhūte upādāya bhūte paṭicca vaṇṇo
tika-abh08t0:424_1: catusamuṭṭhito kammacittautuāhārasaṅkhātehi catūhi paccayehi samuṭṭhito nibbatto
tika-abh08t0:424_2: nidassanena saha pavatto paṭighena saha pavatto rūpārammaṇasaññito.
tika-abh08t0:425_0: 294. Duvidhopi samuddiṭṭho, saddo cittotusambhavo saddo duvidhopi muninā samuddiṭṭho
tika-abh08t0:425_1: cittotusambhavo, saviññāṇakasaddova cittasamuṭṭhito hoti. Kathaṃ? Vacībhedakacittena
tika-abh08t0:425_2: bhūtāya jātāya bhūmiyā pathavīdhātuyā vikāratā pathavīlakkhaṇabhāvato atithaddhalakkhaṇatā
tika-abh08t0:425_3: vikāratā nāma. Sā vacīviññatti viññāyatīti viññattiyā upādiṇṇaghaṭṭanassa kammajapathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:425_4: ghaṭṭanassa kāraṇaṃ cittajapathavīdhātuyā kammajapathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanañca saddo
tika-abh08t0:426: 295. Aviññāṇakasaddo yo so aviññāṇakasaddo utusamuṭṭhito hoti. Ayaṃ duvidhopi saddo saddārammaṇataṃ gato saddārammaṇabhāvaṃ patto.
tika-abh08t0:427_0: 296. Dharīyatīti gacchanto gacchanto janehi dharīyateti gandho. Gamu sappa gatimhi,
tika-abh08t0:427_1: dhara dhāraṇe. Sūcanato attano sādhāraṇassa pupphādino vatthussa pakāsanatopi vā
tika-abh08t0:427_2: gandho nāma. Gandha sūcane. Ayaṃ gandho catūhi samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti catusamuṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:428_0: 297. Rasamānā rasantīti, rasoti parikittito janā rasamānā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ rasanti
tika-abh08t0:428_1: anubhavanti, iti yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā raso iti raso nāma paṇḍitehi parikittito,
tika-abh08t0:429: 298. Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ janehi phusīyatīti tasmā phoṭṭhabbaṃ, pathavītejavāyavo. Taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ catusambhūtaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:430_0: 299. Sabbaṃ nāmañca rūpañca, hitvā rūpādipañcakaṃ rūpādipañcakaṃ hitvā sabbaṃ nāmañca
tika-abh08t0:430_1: cittacetasikanibbānanāmañca rūpañca pañcapasādasukhumarūpañca lakkhaṇāni ca aniccadukkhaanattalakkhaṇāni
tika-abh08t0:431_0: 300. Chārammaṇāni labbhanti, kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ chārammaṇāni labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:431_1: Tīṇi rūpāvacare rūpasaddadhammārammaṇavasena labbhanti. Arūpe pana ekekaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:432_0: 301-3. Khaṇavatthuparittattā, āpāthaṃ na vajanti ye ye rūpādayo pañca visayā khaṇavatthuparittattā
tika-abh08t0:432_1: pañcārammaṇānaṃ khaṇassa parittattā mandattā tesaṃ appāyukattā vatthuparittattā pañcārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:432_2: atikhuddakavatthukattā āpāthaṃ pañcadvāresu pākaṭabhāvaṃ na vajanti, pañcapasādesu
tika-abh08t0:432_3: ghaṭṭanakiccaṃ na sādhenti, te rūpādayo pañca visayā dhammārammaṇaṃ honti. Iti yesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:432_4: ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ mataṃ hoti. Kirāti anussavanatthe nipāto. Te paṭikkhipitabbāva
tika-abh08t0:432_5: te evaṃ vādino ekacce ācariyā paṭikkhipitabbā, mayā paṭisedhitabbā. Kasmā? Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:432_6: sotaviññāṇassa gocarabhūtaṃ saddaṃ na paṭianubhoti, sotaviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:432_7: gocarabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ na paṭianubhoti. Iti aññamaññassa gocaraṃ neva paccanubhontānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:432_8: tesaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tañca gocaraṃ manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:432_9: javanaṃ pana paccanubhoti. Iti vacanassa bhagavatā vuttattā paṭikkhipitabbā. Rūpādayo
tika-abh08t0:433_0: 304-6. Dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ, rūpādīneva gocarā tāni rūpādīni eva gocarā dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:433_1: anāpāthagatānaṃ eva pākaṭabhāvaṃ appattāneva. Itipi vacanaṃ vuttaṃ na yujjati. Yaṃ
tika-abh08t0:433_2: dhammajātaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ bhavantaṃ, taṃ dhammajātaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena dhammārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:433_3: bhaveyya? Evaṃ sati rūpārammaṇassa dhammārammaṇatte sati etesaṃ rūpārammaṇadhammārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:433_4: niyamopi kathaṃ bhave kena pakārena bhaveyya? Sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etaṃ etaṃ sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:433_5: chabbidhaṃ chappakāraṃ bhagavatā samudīritaṃ. Taṃ parittattikādīnaṃ vasena bahuppakārehi mataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:434_0: 307. Sabbo kāmavipāko ca sabbo tevīsatikāmavipāko ca kriyāhetudvayampi ca manodhātuhasituppādavasena
tika-abh08t0:434_1: kiriyāhetudvayampi cāti pañcavīsati cittuppādā ekantaparittārammaṇā ekantakāmāvacarārammaṇā siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:435_0: 308-10. Iṭṭhādibhedā pañceva, rūpasaddādayo pana dvipañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā
tika-abh08t0:435_1: anukkamena gocarā honti. Rūpādipañcakaṃ sabbaṃ, manodhātuttayassa tu manodhātuttayassa
tika-abh08t0:435_2: pana sabbaṃ rūpādipañcakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, etesaṃ terasannaṃ pana cittānaṃ rūpakkhandhova
tika-abh08t0:435_3: gocaro ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Nārūpaṃ nāmaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti. Na ca paññattiṃ paññattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:435_4: ārammaṇaṃ na karonti. Nātītaṃ atītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti. Na canāgataṃ anāgataṃ
tika-abh08t0:435_5: ārammaṇaṃ na karonti eva. Hi saccaṃ vattamāno gocaro etesaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ, manodhātuttayassa
tika-abh08t0:435_6: cāti terasannaṃ cittānaṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vattamānaṃ eva paccuppannaṃ eva.
tika-abh08t0:436_0: 311. Terasetāni cittāni, jāyante kāmadhātuyaṃ etāni terasa cittāni kāmadhātuyaṃ jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:436_1: rūpāvacare puññajāni cakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanāni, kiriyāmanodhātu cāti cattāri
tika-abh08t0:436_2: cittāni jāyanti. Arūpisu arūpabhūmīsu neva kiñcipi ekampi cittaṃ neva jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:437_0: 312-3. Mahāpākānamaṭṭhannaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ pavattiyaṃ chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:437_1: rūpādichaparittāni gocarā. Santīraṇattayassapi pavattiyaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇattayakiccassa,
tika-abh08t0:437_2: chadvāresu tadālambaṇakiccassa ca rūpādichaparittāni gocarā. Rūpādayo parittā cha,
tika-abh08t0:437_3: hasituppādagocarā hasituppādassa rūpādayo cha parittā gocarā honti. Pañcadvāre paṭuppannā
tika-abh08t0:437_4: pañcasu dvāresu ye gocarā paccuppannā, manodvāre tikālikā ye gocarā tikālikā tīsu kālesu niyuttā.
tika-abh08t0:438_1: cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ niyataṃ niyatārammaṇaṃ hoti, taṃ chabbidhaṃ cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:438_3: “yassa yassa kusalajhānassa yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi hotī”ti
tika-abh08t0:438_4: vacanato sakasakakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ eva tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Nibbānārammaṇattā
tika-abh08t0:438_5: hi, ekantena anaññato aṭṭhānāsavacittānaṃ appamāṇova nibbānaṃ eva gocaraṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:438_6: hoti. Hi kasmā kāraṇā? Nibbānārammaṇattā, na aññato ārammaṇato.
tika-abh08t0:439_0: 316-320. Cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca, kāmāvacarapuññato kāmāvacarakusalavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā
tika-abh08t0:439_1: ca kriyato kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca dvādasākusalāni ca te parittārammaṇā
tika-abh08t0:439_2: ceva mahaggatagocarā ca, te na vattabbā ca honti. Kasmā? Paññattārammaṇattā. Cattāro
tika-abh08t0:439_3: ñāṇasaṃyuttā, puññato kusalavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, kriyato kiriyavasena cattāro
tika-abh08t0:439_4: ñāṇasampayuttā ca tathā abhiññādvayañca kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi ca ekādasannaṃ etesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:439_5: cittānaṃ gocaro parittamahaggataappamāṇavasena tividho hoti. Ime ekādasa na vattabbāpi
tika-abh08t0:439_6: honti. Kasmā? Paññattārammaṇattā. Yāni vuttāvasesāni vuttato cittato sesāni yāni
tika-abh08t0:439_7: cittāni, tāni na vattabbārammaṇānīti vibhāvinā viññeyyāni.
tika-abh08t0:444_0: 322-6. Viññāṇānaṃ dvipañcannaṃ dvinnaṃ pañcaviññāṇānaṃ, manodhātuttayassa ca terasannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:444_1: cittānaṃ gocarā rūpādayo pañca dhammā paccuppannāva, aṭṭha kāmamahāvipākā tadārammaṇakiccavasena
tika-abh08t0:444_7: javanakiccavasena paccuppannātītānāgatagocaraṃ. Iti ete dvādasa mānasā pana siyātītārammaṇā
