tika-abh08t0:444_8: atītārammaṇā siyuṃ. Paccuppannānāgatagocarā paccuppannārammaṇā anāgatārammaṇā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:444_9: Kāme vīsati kusalākusalā kriyato kiriyavasena kāme nava mānasā, voṭṭhabbaṃ voṭṭhabbanakiccavasena
tika-abh08t0:444_11: tikālārammaṇā, sante paññattikāle navattabbārammaṇā. Dve abhiññāmānasāpi abhiññākiccavasena
tika-abh08t0:444_12: atītādigocarā siyuṃ. Ime mānasā paññattikālepi sante navattabbā bhavanti. Rūpārūpabhavesu
tika-abh08t0:444_13: mayā vuttato sesāni sabbāni cittāni atītārammaṇādinā atītārammaṇādivasena paṇḍitena
tika-abh08t0:444_14: na vattabbāni na kathitabbāni honti eva, paññattārammaṇāni eva hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:445_0: 327. Kāmato ca kriyā pañca kāmāvacaravasena pañca kiriyā, rūpato rūpāvacaravasena
tika-abh08t0:445_1: pañcamī kriyā abhiññācittaṃ, etesaṃ channaṃ cittānaṃ natthi kiñci ekampi agocaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:445_2: anārammaṇaṃ, sabbārammaṇanti attho. “Pañcamī kriyā”ti vacanaṃ abhiññācittavasena
tika-abh08t0:445_3: vuttaṃ. Suddhajhānassa pañcamarūpakiriyassa paññattārammaṇaṃ evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:446: 328. Nibbānañca catubbidhaṃ phalaṃ, maggaṃ rūpañca arūpaṃ cittacetasikasaṅkhātaṃ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ yāni cittāni sakkonti, tāni cittāni me vada, ācariya, tāni mayhaṃ kathehi.
tika-abh08t0:447_0: 329-30. Cattāro ñāṇasaṃyuttā, puññato puññavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, kriyato
tika-abh08t0:447_1: tathā kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, dve abhiññāmānasā, kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi
tika-abh08t0:447_2: cāti ekādasa cittāni nibbānañca phalañca maggañca rūpañca arūpaṃ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:448_0: 331-4. Cittesu pana sabbesu yāni cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ
tika-abh08t0:448_1: sakkonti, tāni kati cittāni me vada tāni mayhaṃ tvaṃ kathehi. Sabbesu pana cittesu,
tika-abh08t0:448_2: cha ca cittāni me suṇa, bho bhaddamukha, tvaṃ mayhaṃ vacanaṃ suṇohi, sabbesu pana
tika-abh08t0:448_3: cittesu cha cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti. Cattāro
tika-abh08t0:448_4: ñāṇasaṃyuttā, kiriyā ca voṭṭhabbanampi ca kiriyābhiññāmano cāti cha ca cittāni gocaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:448_5: kātuṃ sakkonti. Puññato puññavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, puññato puññavasena abhiññācittañca
tika-abh08t0:448_6: arahattaphalaṃ maggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:449_0: 335-8. Arahato khīṇāsavassa maggacittaṃ phalamānasaṃ vā puthujjanā vā sekkhā vā vijānituṃ
tika-abh08t0:449_1: na sakkonti. Kasmā kāraṇā? Puthujjano sotāpannassa mānasaṃ na jānāti, sotāpanno sakadāgāmissa
tika-abh08t0:449_2: mānasaṃ na jānāti, sakadāgāmī anāgāmissa mānasaṃ na jānāti, anāgāmī arahantassa mānasaṃ
tika-abh08t0:449_3: na jānāti. Heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo puggalo uparūpari ṭhitassa puggalassa mānasaṃ neva jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:449_4: uparūpari ṭhito puggalopi heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa puggalassa mānasaṃ jānāti.
tika-abh08t0:450_0: 339-342. Yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ uddharitvā
tika-abh08t0:450_1: ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi. Kusalārammaṇaṃ kāme kāme aṭṭhavidhaṃ kusalaṃ aṭṭhavidhassa
tika-abh08t0:450_2: kāmāvacarakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Pubbeva kataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahākusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:450_5: anussaraṇakaālādīsu tassa aṭṭhavidhassa kusalassa javanakiccavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_6: vippaṭisārakālādīsu dvādasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, kusalassa abhiññāmānasassa
tika-abh08t0:450_7: ca kiriyassa abhiññāmānasassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, ekādasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākassa
tika-abh08t0:450_8: tadārammaṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Tathā kāmakriyassāti javanakiccavasena hasanassa
tika-abh08t0:450_9: āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa javanakiccavasena mahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_10: etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ siyā bhaveyya. Rūpāvacarapuññāni pañca tato charāsito
tika-abh08t0:450_11: kāmavipākaṃ vajjetvā pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇāni honti. Tadā lobhamūlamohamūlavasena
tika-abh08t0:450_12: attanā paṭiladdhajhānānaṃ anussaraṇakāle tassa dasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:450_13: hoti, tihetukapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa jhānaṃ paccavekkhato jhānārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:450_14: domanassayuttaṃ hoti, tadā tassa paṭighadvayassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kāmakriyassāti ekantaparittārammaṇāni
tika-abh08t0:451_0: 343. Āruppakusalañcāpi, tebhūmakusalassa ca mahākusalassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakusalassa
tika-abh08t0:451_1: ca dutiyacatutthaarūpakusalassa ca tebhūmakakriyassāpi voṭṭhabbanassa mahākiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:451_2: ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca dutiyacatutthāruppakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:451_3: hoti, dutiyāruppakiriyassa ca paṭhamāruppakiriyāya ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, catutthāruppakiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:451_4: ca tatiyāruppakiriyāya ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, evañca sati kathaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:451_6: ārammaṇaṃ hotīti ce vattabbaṃ, yadā puthujjanayogī vā sekkho vā yogī rūpasamāpattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:451_7: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā ākāsānañcāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamāruppasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-abh08t0:451_8: vītarāgo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā puthujjanasekkhakāle attanā anadhigataṃ
tika-abh08t0:451_9: dutiyaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajji, tadā khīṇāsavakāle samāpajjitaṃ dutiyaṃ arūpakiriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:451_10: paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, evaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:452_0: Yadā yogī rūpasamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:452_1: tatiyāruppakusalañca samāpajjitvā khīṇāsavo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:452_2: attanā anadhigataṃ catutthaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajji, tadā catutthāruppakiriyā
tika-abh08t0:452_3: tatiyāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, evaṃ catutthāruppakiriyassa tatiyāruppakusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:452_4: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, pacchā khīṇāsavakāle samāpajjitā rūpārūpasamāpattiyo honti. Yathā
tika-abh08t0:452_5: hoti, tathā eva akusalassapi ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:453_2: vuttaṃ, tadā dvinnaṃ arūpapākānaṃ paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppajavanāni ārammaṇāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:453_3: “yassa kusalassa jhānassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi hotī”ti vacanato
tika-abh08t0:453_5: ārammaṇāni honti, evaṃ arūpakusalaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭharāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti. Apariyāpannapuññampi
tika-abh08t0:453_7: ca kriyassa voṭṭhabbanassa, ñāṇasampayuttato kiriyassa ca rūpato rūpāvacaravasena
tika-abh08t0:453_8: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa cāti catunnaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:453_9: sadā hoti, ayamettha adhippāyo – sekkhānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa, voṭṭhabbanassa,
tika-abh08t0:453_10: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca tividhaṃ lokuttarapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Khīṇāsavassa
tika-abh08t0:453_11: voṭṭhabbanassa, ñāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca arahattapuññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:453_12: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yathā tathā eva sabbaṃ akusalaṃ kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa
tika-abh08t0:453_13: mahākusalassa, kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato pana rūpāvacaravasena
tika-abh08t0:453_14: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, yathā tathā
tika-abh08t0:453_15: eva sabbassa akusalassa ca kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ tadārammaṇakiccavasena ekādasannañcāti
tika-abh08t0:454_0: 348-352. Vipākārammaṇaṃ kāme sabbaṃ vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi kāmāvacaravasenapi
tika-abh08t0:454_1: kusalassa mahākusalassa, kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato
tika-abh08t0:454_2: ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca
tika-abh08t0:454_3: kāmāvacarapākānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekādasannañca tatheva akusalassa ca channaṃ
tika-abh08t0:454_4: rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Rūpe vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi
tika-abh08t0:454_5: ca kusalassa mahākusalassa, kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato
tika-abh08t0:454_6: ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva kusalassa ca apuññassa cāti pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocaro
tika-abh08t0:454_7: hoti, arūpāvacarapākesu ayaṃ nayo bhagavatā mato. Vaṭṭe na pariyāpannā nappaviṭṭhāti
tika-abh08t0:454_8: apariyāpannā, tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pākāpi kāmato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:454_9: kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa ca rūpatopi rūpāvacaravasenapi
tika-abh08t0:454_10: kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:454_11: ārammaṇaṃ hotīti. Etthāyamadhippāyo apariyāpannapuññe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:455_0: 353-6. Kāme idaṃ sabbakiriyacittaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi ca kusalassa
tika-abh08t0:455_1: mahākusalassa, kriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena
tika-abh08t0:455_2: ca eva kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca
tika-abh08t0:455_3: ekādasakāmāvacarapākassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:455_4: hoti. Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe rūpāvacare yaṃ kiriyāmānasaṃ, kāmapākaṃ tato vinā tato
tika-abh08t0:455_5: rāsito kāmapākaṃ vinā vajjetvā pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kāmāvacarato
tika-abh08t0:455_6: kāmāvacaravasena kiriyassa voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, hasanaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā
tika-abh08t0:455_7: rūpakiriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karoti. Kriyācittaṃ panāruppe arūpakiriyācittaṃ pana tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:455_8: pañcannaṃ eva ca rāsīnaṃ āruppakriyassāpi paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:455_9: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tatiyāruppakiriyaṃ catutthāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Iti channaṃ
tika-abh08t0:460: Dvicakkhuviññāṇamanodhātudvayasantīraṇattayamahāpākassa ca kāmakiriyassa cāti ekādasavidhassa kāmakiriyassa ca channaṃ etesaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:461_1: rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca kāmarūpakiriyassa ca khīṇāsavānaṃ voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:461_2: ca pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca ubhayassāpi cittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Apariyāpannato ceva
tika-abh08t0:461_3: lokuttaravasena ca eva phalassa, kusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:462_0: 361-2. Nānappakārakaṃ sabbaṃ, paññattārammaṇaṃ pana tebhūmakassa puññassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:462_1: suddhajhānassa pañcavidhassa rūpakusalassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakusalassa ca tatheva
tika-abh08t0:462_2: akusalassa ca rūpārūpavipākassa sabbassa rūpavipākassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppavipākassa
tika-abh08t0:462_3: ca tebhūmakakriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa sabbassa rūpakiriyassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:462_4: cāti navannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:463_0: 363-4. Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu dve cittuppādā rūpārammaṇikā, dve dve saddādigocarā dve
tika-abh08t0:463_1: dve cittuppādā saddārammaṇādigocarā, tayo manodhātusaṅkhātā cittuppādā pañcārammaṇikā
tika-abh08t0:463_2: nāma matā bhagavatā. Idha imasmiṃ kāmāvacarādhikāre ekacattālīseva cittuppādā chaḷārammaṇikā
tika-abh08t0:464_0: 365-9. Pañcābhiññā vivajjetvā, rūpārūpā anāsavā ime sabbe cittuppādā dhammārammaṇagocarā
tika-abh08t0:464_1: honti. Paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppacetaso kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, dutiyāruppacetaso
tika-abh08t0:464_2: vipākassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Dutiyāruppacetaso
tika-abh08t0:464_3: kiriyassa paṭhamāruppakusalārammaṇabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Paṭhamāruppapākoyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:464_4: dutiyāruppacetaso kusalassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso vipākassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:464_5: ca ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Hi kasmā? Tesaṃ dutiyāruppakusalavipākakiriyānaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t0:464_6: Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ paṭhamaṃ kiriyācittaṃ pana dutiyāruppacetaso puññassa ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:464_7: na hoti. Dutiyāruppacetaso vipākassa ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Rūpārūpabhavesu hi khīṇāsavā
tika-abh08t0:464_8: vipākacittāni cutivasena sakasakakusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonti. Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:464_9: pana dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
tika-abh08t0:465_0: 370-3. Puthujjanassa sekkhassa, arūpārammaṇaṃ dvidhā dvippakāraṃ kusalaṃ kusalassa
tika-abh08t0:465_1: dutiyāruppakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, taṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppavipākassa
tika-abh08t0:465_2: ārammaṇaṃ siyā bhaveyya. Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhussa, paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā
tika-abh08t0:465_3: tippakāraṃ hoti. Iti vacanaṃ mahesinā vuttaṃ. Kriyassāpi dutiyāruppakiriyassāpi paṭhamāruppakiriyā
tika-abh08t0:465_4: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kusalampi paṭhamāruppakusalampi dutiyāruppakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:465_5: hoti. Kusalaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Evaṃ iminā
tika-abh08t0:465_6: mayā vuttappakārena paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti. Tatiyāruppacittampi
tika-abh08t0:465_7: catutthāruppacetaso kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, catutthāruppacetaso vipākassa ca taṃ
tika-abh08t0:465_8: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Evameva yathā paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti, evameva
tika-abh08t0:465_9: tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti. Yathā paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:465_10: tidhā hoti, evameva tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā siyā.
tika-abh08t0:466: 374. Yaṃ yaṃ pana idhārabbha idha imasmiṃ adhikāre yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbha paṭicca ye ye cittuppādā jāyanti, so so gocaro tesañca tesañca cittuppādānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:467: 375. Yo pana naro imassa abhidhammāvatārassa kira pāraṃ duttaraṃ idha imasmiṃ loke uttarati, so naro abhidhammamahaṇṇave pāraṃ duttaraṃ uttaraṃ uttarati eva.
tika-abh08t0:478_0: Yena jinena anantañāṇena nikkilesena guṇesinā kāruṇikena tena jinena vutte vipākasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:478_1: matipāṭavatthaṃ matichekabhāvatthāya vipākacittappabhavaṃ mayā bhaṇamānaṃ vipākacittappavattiṃ tumhe suṇātha.
tika-abh08t0:479: 377. Ekūnatiṃsa kammāni, pākā dvattiṃsa bhagavatā dassitā, kammāni tīsu dvāresu dissare, vipākā chasu dvāresu dissanti.
tika-abh08t0:480_0: 378-9. Kusalaṃ kāmalokasmiṃ kāmalokamhi kusalaṃ pavatte, paṭisandhiyañca taṃtaṃpaccayamāgamma
tika-abh08t0:480_1: taṃtaṃpaccayaṃ paṭicca. So so paccayo taṃtaṃpaccayo, “tatapaccayo”ti vattabbe niggahītāgamavasena
tika-abh08t0:480_2: “taṃtaṃpaccayo”ti vuttaṃ. Vicchākammadhārayasamāsoyaṃ. Vividhaṃ phalaṃ dadāti. Ekāya
tika-abh08t0:480_3: cetanāya ekā paṭisandhi bhagavatā pakāsitā. Nānākammehi nānā paṭisandhiyo ca bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:481_0: 380-1. Tihetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ tihetukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:481_1: vipākaṃ duhetuñca vipākaṃ ahetuñca vipākaṃ deti. Duhetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ duhetukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:481_2: yaṃ kammaṃ pana, taṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ vipākaṃ na deti, attano vipākaṃ duhetuñca ahetuñca deti.
tika-abh08t0:482_0: 382-3. Tihetukena kammena, paṭisandhi tihetukā hoti, duhetukāpi paṭisandhi hoteva,
tika-abh08t0:482_1: ahetukā paṭisandhi neva hoti, ukkaṭṭhatihetukakammena tihetukā paṭisandhi, omakatihetukakammena
tika-abh08t0:482_2: duhetukā paṭisandhi hotīti adhippāyo. Duhetukena kammena duhetukā paṭisandhi, ahetukāpi
tika-abh08t0:482_3: paṭisandhi hoteva, tihetukā paṭisandhi neva hoti. Ukkaṭṭhaduhetukakammena duhetukā
tika-abh08t0:482_4: paṭisandhi, omakaduhetukakammena ahetukā paṭisandhi hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:483: 384. Asaṅkhārakammaṃ asaṅkhāravipākaṃ deti, sasaṅkhāravipākampi deti, sasaṅkhārakammaṃ sasaṅkhāraphalaṃ, tathā asaṅkhāraphalaṃ deti.
tika-abh08t0:484: 385. Ekāya cetanāyettha ettha etāsu cetanāsu ekāya kusalāya cetanāya soḷasavidhā vipākacittāni bhavanti. Iti vacanaṃ jino pakāsaye.
tika-abh08t0:485_0: 386-92. Vedanāparivattanaṃ ārammaṇena hoteva, tadārammaṇacittampi javanena niyāmitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:485_1: somanassayutte kusale javane javite tadārammaṇampi somanassayuttameva hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:485_2: Upekkhāyuttakusalepi eseva nayo. Kāmāvacaracittena kusalenādinā paṭhamena kusalena
tika-abh08t0:485_3: tulyena vipākacittena. Tatiyāvisesanaṃ. Yena sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce yadi, iṭṭhe
tika-abh08t0:485_4: balavārammaṇe manāpe atimahantārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhussa cakkhupasādassa āpāthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:485_5: pākaṭabhāvaṃ āgate sati manodhātuyā tāya bhavaṅgasmiṃ āvaṭṭite bhavaṅgasote chindite
tika-abh08t0:485_6: sati cakkhuviññāṇakādīsu vīthicittesu jātesu paṭhamaṃ kusalaṃ kāmamānasaṃ javanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:485_7: hutvā jāyate. Sattakkhattuvārāni javitvāna paṭhame mahākusale gate tadeva taṃ eva
tika-abh08t0:485_8: iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva paṭhamamahākusalena sadisaṃ tadārammaṇavipākacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:485_9: Sandhiyā tulyato paṭisandhiyā tulyabhāvena mūlabhavaṅganti mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma bhagavatā
tika-abh08t0:485_10: pavuccate. Tañca tadārammaṇacittaṃ santīraṇaṃ somanassayuttaṃ santīraṇaṃ dassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:485_11: sampaṭicchanaṃ ettha etasmiṃ vīthicitte gaṇanūpagacittāni gaṇanaṃ upagatāni cittāni
tika-abh08t0:486_0: 393-4. Yadā hi dutiyaṃ cittaṃ, kusalaṃ javanaṃ yadā yasmiṃ kāle tasseva somanassatihetuno
tika-abh08t0:486_1: puggalassa dutiyaṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ javanaṃ hoti, tadā tasmiṃ kāle tena javanena tulyavipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:486_2: tadārammaṇaṃ. Tassa sandhiyā asamānattā tassa tadārammaṇacittassa sandhiyā asamānattā
tika-abh08t0:486_3: dve nāmāni assa vipākacittassa anena vipākacittena labbhare labbhanti, “āgantukabhavaṅga”nti
tika-abh08t0:486_4: nāmaṃ “tadārammaṇaka”nti ca nāmaṃ iti dve nāmāni labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:487_0: 395-6. Yadā tasseva puggalassa tatiyaṃ puññaṃ javanaṃ hoti, tadā tena javanena sadisaṃ
tika-abh08t0:487_1: tatiyaṃ pākaṃ tadārammaṇikaṃ siyā. Idaṃ vipākacittaṃ āgantukabhavaṅganti āgantubhavaṅgaṃ
tika-abh08t0:487_2: nāma bhagavatā vuccate, purimāni ca pañca vipākacittāni iminā pana tatiyavipākena
tika-abh08t0:488_0: 397-8. Yadā catutthaṃ kusalaṃ javanaṃ hoti, tadā tena javanena tulyaṃ catutthavipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:488_1: tadārammaṇabhāvaṃ vaje gaccheyya. Catutthavipākaṃ āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ tadārammaṇanāmakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:488_2: hoti, purimāni cha pākāni iminā saha catutthapākena satta cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:489_0: 399-403. Yadā yasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ cakkhudvāre iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇaṃ pana tathā āpāthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:489_1: āgacchati ca, tadā vuttanayena āvajjanadassanasampaṭicchanacittesu jātesu idha imasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:489_2: majjhattārammaṇe ārammaṇavasena vedanā parivattati, tasmā upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:489_3: mano hoti. Upekkhāsahagatesu eva catūsupi javanesu javitesu tehi javanehi tulyāni
tika-abh08t0:489_4: cattāri vipākacittāni jāyare. Accantaṃ ekantena vedanāya upekkhāvedanāya purimehi
tika-abh08t0:489_5: somanassasahagatehi cittehi asamānattā cattāri cittāni nāmato piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni nāma
tika-abh08t0:489_6: honti, piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni somanassavipākānaṃ pacchābhāge bhavaṅgānīti attho. Imāni
tika-abh08t0:489_7: upekkhāsahagatāni pañca vipākāni purimehi sattahi vipākehi saddhiṃ dvādasa vipākāni
tika-abh08t0:490_0: 404-6. Yathā cakkhudvāre dvādasa vipākāni honti, tathā evaṃ sotādīsu dvāresupi dvādasa
tika-abh08t0:490_1: pākāni honti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro niddise, ime mayā vuttā vipākā samasaṭṭhi bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:490_2: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite samasaṭṭhi
tika-abh08t0:490_3: vipākāni uppajjanti, imasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi. Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu
tika-abh08t0:490_4: vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre dvādasa pākā, sotaviññāṇakādīni
tika-abh08t0:491_0: 407-11. Ekena tihetukakusalena asaṅkhārikena kammena āyūhite yathā, evameva sasaṅkhāratihetukakusalenāpi
tika-abh08t0:491_1: asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraupekkhāsahagatehipi kusalehi kamme āyūhite pavattite tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:491_2: kusalānaṃ vipākehi tīhipi dinnāya paṭisandhiyā eseva nayo paṇḍitena jānitabbo. Idha
tika-abh08t0:491_4: paṭhamaṃ dassetvā dassetabbātha pacchā tu, iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha atha pacchā mayā
tika-abh08t0:491_5: vuttacittappavattito pacchākāle pana idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhagocare ekekasmiṃ pana dvādasa
tika-abh08t0:491_6: dvādasa pākā paṇḍitena dassetabbā. Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:491_7: vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena soḷasa pākacittāni honti. Pubbe kāle mayā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:492_0: 412-4. Tihetukena kammena, paṭisandhi tihetukā bhavati, iti ayaṃ vāro ettāvatā ettakena
tika-abh08t0:492_1: vacanena mayā vutto. Ekaṃ kammaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janeti, tato paṭisandhito
tika-abh08t0:492_2: aparaṃ aññaṃ dutiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ na janeti, pavattiyaṃ anekāni vipākāni sañjaneti.
tika-abh08t0:492_3: Hi saccaṃ “ekaṃ kamma”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Ekasmā bījā ekato bījato ekaṃ aṅkuraṃ jāyati,
tika-abh08t0:492_4: assa bījassa bahūni phalāni hetuppavattito salilādihetuppattiyā honti.
tika-abh08t0:493_0: 415-21. Duhetukena kammena, paṭisandhi duhetukā hoti, iti vacanaṃ ayaṃ vāro anupubbena
tika-abh08t0:493_1: anupaṭipāṭiyā āgato. Idha imasmiṃ adhikāre duhetukena puññena somanassayuttena asaṅkhārikena
tika-abh08t0:493_2: cittena kamme āyūhite pana duhetukena somanassayuttakusalena tulyena pākena yena
tika-abh08t0:493_3: sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce, iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgate
tika-abh08t0:493_4: somanassayutte ñāṇahīne kusalamānase tasmiṃ duhetuke sattakkhattuṃ javitvāna gate
tika-abh08t0:493_5: taṃ eva ārammaṇaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ tassa javanassa anantaraṃ taṃsarikkhakaṃ tena
tika-abh08t0:493_6: javanena sadisaṃ ekantaṃ asaṅkhārikamānasaṃ jāyati. Tanti taṃ cittaṃ mūlabhavaṅganti
tika-abh08t0:493_7: mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma tadārammaṇamiccapi tadārammaṇaṃ nāma ubhayampi nāmaṃ tasseva nāmaṃ
tika-abh08t0:493_8: tassa cittassa eva nāmaṃ. Iti evaṃ iminā pakārena bhagavatā paridīpitaṃ. Duhetuke
tika-abh08t0:493_9: sasaṅkhāre kusale javane javitepi ca taṃsamaṃ tena cittena sadisaṃ āgantukasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:494_0: 422-9. Tatheva ca tathā eva ca iṭṭhamajjhattagocare duhetūnaṃ dvinnaṃ upekkhāyuttānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:494_1: javanānaṃ anantaraṃ tādisāni tehi javanehi sadisāni dve tadārammaṇamānasāni jāyante,
tika-abh08t0:494_3: hoti. Santīraṇadvayañceva dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ imāni dve bhavaṅgāni cāti aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:494_4: vipākā cakkhudvāre honti. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi ca aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:494_5: aṭṭha vipāke katvā pavattiyaṃ cattālīsa vipākāni bhavanti. Gahitāggahaṇenettha, cakkhudvāre
tika-abh08t0:494_6: panaṭṭha ca ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:494_7: ca vipākā sotaghānādinā vipākena saddhiṃ dvādasa eva vipākāni bhavanti. Ekāya cetanāyevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:494_8: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite pana sati dvādaseva
tika-abh08t0:494_9: vipākāni bhavanti. Iti vacanaṃ vijitakusalayuddhasaṅgāmena pakāsitaṃ desitaṃ. Duhetukattayenāpi,
tika-abh08t0:494_10: sesena sadisena tu mayā vuttato duhetuto sesena duhetukattayenāpi sadisena pākena
tika-abh08t0:494_11: ādinnasandhino gahitapaṭisandhikassa sattassa evaṃ nayo mato kathito niraṅgaṇena.
tika-abh08t0:494_12: Duhetukena kammena duhetukā paṭisandhi hoti. Iti ayaṃ vāro ca ettāvatā ettakena vacanena mayā vutto.
tika-abh08t0:495_0: 430-8. Duhetukena kammena ahetukā paṭisandhi hoti, iti ayaṃ vāro anupubbena paṭipāṭiyā
tika-abh08t0:495_1: āgato. Tesu catūsupi duhetukesu kusalesu cittesu aññatareneva hetukena kamme āyūhite
tika-abh08t0:495_2: pavattite sati tasseva duhetukassa kusalajavanassa pākabhūtāya upekkhāsahagatāhetukāya
tika-abh08t0:495_3: manoviññāṇadhātuyā ādinnapaṭisandhino sattassa sā paṭisandhi kammasadisā nāma na
tika-abh08t0:495_4: vattabbā paṇḍitehi. Hi saccaṃ “paṭisandhi na vattabbā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Kammaṃ duhetukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:495_5: hoti, paṭisandhi ahetukā hoti. Tassa dehino sattassa vuḍḍhimupetassa vuḍḍhiṃ upagatassa
tika-abh08t0:495_6: cakkhudvāre pana iṭṭhamajjhattagocare āpāthamāgate sati duhetukānaṃ catunnaṃ puññānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:495_7: yassa kassaci javanassa avasānamhi idaṃ ahetukaṃ mano tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:495_8: Ettha etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo sandeho natthi, taṃ ahetukacittaṃ mūlabhavaṅgañca tadārammaṇameva
tika-abh08t0:495_9: ca hoti. Cakkhuviññāṇakādīsupi vīthicittesu jātesu upekkhāsahagataṃyeva santīraṇampi
tika-abh08t0:495_10: ca hoti. Tesu ekaṃ ṭhapetvāna, gahitāggahaṇenidha tesu dvīsu santīraṇatadārammaṇakiccesu
tika-abh08t0:495_11: vipākesu ekaṃ santīraṇakiccaṃ tadārammaṇakiccaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ṭhapetvā gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:495_12: aggahaṇena idha iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe gaṇanūpagacittāni tīṇiyeva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:496_0: 439-41. Iṭṭhe ārammaṇe cakkhu-dvāre āpāthamāgate tadā santīraṇañceva somanassayuttaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:496_1: hoti, tadārammaṇamānasañca somanassayuttaṃyeva hoti, tesu santīraṇatadārammaṇakiccesu
tika-abh08t0:496_2: vipākesu ekekaṃ santīraṇakiccaṃ, tadārammaṇakiccaṃ vā cittaṃ gahetvā purimāni ca
tika-abh08t0:496_3: tīṇi cattāri eva vipākāni bhavanti. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi
tika-abh08t0:496_4: cattāri cattāri vipākacittānīti pavattiyaṃ vipākāni vīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:497_0: 442-8. Cakkhudvāre tu cattāri, gahitāggahaṇenidha gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena
tika-abh08t0:497_1: cakkhudvāre pana cattāri vipākāni idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe sotaghānādinā vipākena
tika-abh08t0:497_2: saddhiṃ ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ hoti eva. Ahetukapaṭisandhissa sattassa duhetukaṃ, tihetukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:497_3: vā tadārammaṇaṃ na bhave na bhaveyya, duhetupaṭisandhino sattassa tihetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:497_4: na bhave. Jātā sugatiyaṃ yena, pākena paṭisandhi tu sugatiyaṃ yena pākena paṭisandhi
tika-abh08t0:497_5: jātā, tena vipākena tulyampi, hīnaṃ vā tesaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya. Manussalokaṃ
tika-abh08t0:497_6: sandhāya, vuttañcāhetukaṭṭhakaṃ sugatiyaṃ ahetukaṭṭhakañca manussalokañca sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:497_7: paṭicca kāraṇaṃ katvā mayā vuttaṃ. Catūsupi apāyesu pana apeto ayo patiṭṭhā etehīti
tika-abh08t0:497_8: apāyo, tesu. Pavatte ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ āpāyikehi labbhati. Thero nerayikānaṃ tu,
tika-abh08t0:497_9: dhammaṃ deseti vassati thiro thirakāradhammo yasmiṃ atthīti thero, dutiyaaggasāvakabhūto
tika-abh08t0:497_10: iddhimā moggallānatthero nerayikānaṃ niraye jātānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti vassati,
tika-abh08t0:497_11: “ucchaṅge maṃ nisīditvā”tiādīsu viya devaṃ vassāpetīti attho. Gandhaṃ vāyuñca māpeti
tika-abh08t0:497_12: yadā, tadā pana tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ tehi nerayikasattehi theraṃ disvā, dhammañca
tika-abh08t0:497_13: sutvā, gandhañca ghāyitvā jalaṃ udakañca pivataṃ pivantānaṃ muduṃ vāyuñca tehi phusataṃ
tika-abh08t0:497_14: phusantānaṃ tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇakādīni pañcapi puññajāni eva kusalavipākāni
tika-abh08t0:497_15: eva santīraṇadvayaṃ puññajaṃ eva kusalavipākaṃ eva puññajā eva ekā manodhātu iti aṭṭhakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:498_0: 449-50. Ayaṃ tāva kathā “cakkhuviññāṇakādīni puññajānevā”tiādikā ayaṃ kathā iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattagocare
tika-abh08t0:498_1: kāmāvacare puññānaṃ javanānaṃ vasena mayā vuttā. Tadārammaṇacetaso tadārammaṇacittassa
tika-abh08t0:498_2: yaṃ niyamattaṃ “tadārammaṇamānasaṃ javanena niyāmita”ntiādivacanena mayā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:498_3: taṃ niyamattaṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Somanassayutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi
tika-abh08t0:498_4: somanassayuttameva hoti, upekkhāyutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi upekkhāyuttameva
tika-abh08t0:498_5: hoti, netaṃ akusale upekkhāyutte vicikicchādike akusale javane pana javite somanassayuttampi
tika-abh08t0:498_6: tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. Itipi vacanaṃ ācariyena dīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:499_0: 451-7. Idha imasmiṃ adhippāye akusalacittesu somanassayuttesu catūsupi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:499_1: tesu cittesu javitesu somanassayuttā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu tadanantaraṃ tesaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:499_2: anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati. Upekkhāyuttesu chasu akusalacittesu iṭṭhamajjhatte
tika-abh08t0:499_3: gocare javitesu puññajā upekkhāsahagatā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu eva tadanantaraṃ vā
tika-abh08t0:499_4: tesaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:499_5: Iṭṭhārammaṇayogasmiṃ buddharūpādiiṭṭhārammaṇayogasmiṃ kaṅkhato “buddho nu kho, no
tika-abh08t0:499_6: buddho”ti kaṅkhantassa sattassa uddhatassa vā sattassa tadārammaṇamānasaṃ somanassayuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:499_7: ahetukaṃ vipākaṃ hoti piṭṭhibhavaṅgaṃ. Somanassayute citte, javane javite pana somanassayuttā
tika-abh08t0:499_8: eva pañca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā. Upekkhāsahagate citte javane pana
tika-abh08t0:499_9: javite sati upekkhāsahagatā cha ca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:500_0: 458-63. Tihetusomanassena, ādinnapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa vippaṭisārino
tika-abh08t0:500_1: taṃ jhānaṃ paccavekkhato paccavekkhantassa domanassayuttaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Tassa domanassassa
tika-abh08t0:500_2: anantaraṃ kiṃ mānasaṃ jāyate, tvaṃ domanassayuttajavanassa anantaramānasaṃ brūhi
tika-abh08t0:500_3: kathehi. Paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā hi domanassassānantaraṃ somanassassa uppatti paṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:500_4: paṭisiddhā paṭṭhānappakaraṇe bhagavatā nivāritā, assa somanassassa vā anantaraṃ domanassassa
tika-abh08t0:500_5: uppatti paṭṭhāne paṭṭhānappakaraṇe paṭisiddhā bhagavatā nivāritā. Mahaggataṃ panārabbha
tika-abh08t0:500_6: mahaggataṃ paṭicca javane javitepi ca tadārammaṇamānasaṃ tattheva tasmiṃ paṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:500_7: eva paṭisiddhaṃ bhagavatā nivāritaṃ. Tasmā kāraṇā bhavaṅgapāto vā tadārammaṇameva
tika-abh08t0:500_8: vā na hoti. Kiṃ nu kātabbaṃ tesaṃ bhavaṅgatadārammaṇānaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:500_9: amhehi taṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ nu pucchāma, taṃ tadatthaṃ ābhidhammikabhāvena ābhidhammika
tika-abh08t0:500_10: taṃ kāraṇaṃ vada vadāhi. Upekkhāsahagatāhetumanoviññāṇadhātu puññāpuññavipākā tadārammaṇikā siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:501_0: 464-7. Imassa tadārammaṇassa āvajjanaṃ kiṃ natthi? Taṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:501_1: kena pakārena jāyate? Bhavaṅgaāvajjanānaṃ cittānaṃ kiṃ āvajjanamattaṃ? Maggassa anantarassa
tika-abh08t0:501_2: ca phalassāpi kiṃ āvajjanaṃ natthi? Nirodhā ca nirodhato vuṭṭhahantassa bhikkhuno
tika-abh08t0:501_3: phalacittassa vāti mayā sutaṃ, evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena āvajjanaṃ natthi. Vinā
tika-abh08t0:501_4: āvajjanenāpi, hotu jāyatu mānasaṃ cittaṃ āvajjanena vinā āvajjanaṃ vajjetvā hotu
tika-abh08t0:501_5: jāyatu, kimassārammaṇaṃ assa tadārammaṇamānasassa kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ, paṇḍita, tvaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:501_6: yadi jānāsi, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ brūhi mayhaṃ kathehi. Vinā ārammaṇenetaṃ etaṃ mānasaṃ
tika-abh08t0:501_7: ārammaṇena vinā ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā na jāyati. Hi saccaṃ “vinā ārammaṇeneta”ntiādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:501_8: vacanaṃ, tadārammaṇamānasaṃ yadā domanassayuttaṃ javanaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ javati,
tika-abh08t0:501_9: tadā tasmiṃyeva javanacittakkhaṇe parittesu kāmāvacarārammaṇesu yaṃ kiñci parittārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:502_0: 468-73. Utubījaniyāmo ca utuniyāmo bījaniyāmo ca kammadhammaniyāmatā ca kammaniyāmatā
tika-abh08t0:502_1: ca sīlādipāramīdhammaniyāmatā ca cittassa niyāmo cāti pañca niyāmatā paṇḍitena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t0:502_2: Tattha tesu pañcasu niyāmesu sabbesaṃ pana rukkhānaṃ ekappahārena phalapupphādidhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:502_3: utu, ayaṃ utuniyāmatā. Tesaṃ tesaṃ tu bījānaṃ, taṃtaṃtulyaphalubbhavo tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:502_4: bījānaṃ pana tehi tehi bījehi tulyānampi sassānaṃ phalānaṃ uppatti, ayaṃ bījaniyāmatā.
tika-abh08t0:502_5: Matthake nāḷikerassa nāḷikeraphalassa matthake chiddattaṃ chiddabhāvo, ayaṃ bījajo
tika-abh08t0:502_6: bījato jāto niyāmo. Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukañca vipākaṃ duhetukañca vipākaṃ ahetukañca
tika-abh08t0:502_7: vipākaṃ yato yaṃ kammaṃ deti, ayaṃ kammaniyāmatā. Bodhisattassa jātiyaṃ jinaṅkurassa
tika-abh08t0:502_8: jātikkhaṇe medanīkampanādikaṃ anekavisesattaṃ, ayaṃ sīlādipāramīdhammaniyāmatā. Tena
tika-abh08t0:502_9: gocarena pasādasmiṃ ghaṭṭite sati idha imasmiṃ cittavīthiyaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ cittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:503_0: 474. Yo puggalo dhīro dhīrasampanno guṇasampanno vikkhittapāpo mohandhakārāpagamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:503_1: andhakāramanissāya avijjānissaraṇaṃ yadicche sace iccheyya, so dhīro imaṃ abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:503_3: yassa hadayassa viddhaṃsanakaraṃ jalantaṃ dīpaṃ jalamānaṃ dīpaṃ. Payattoti pakārena
tika-abh08t0:503_4: yatati vīriyaṃ karotīti payatto, satataṃ sabbadā sikkhetha sajjhāyanadhāraṇacintanavasena sikkheyya.
tika-abh08t0:510: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ, etesaṃ mānasaṃ mayā;
tika-abh08t0:512: Idāni pana kāle etesaṃ tihetukadvihetukaahetukānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ mānasaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ chekabhāvatthāya mayā kathīyate uccate.
tika-abh08t0:513_0: 476-85. Panthamakkaṭako uṇṇanābhi panthamakkaṭako nāma pañcasu disāsu tassa suttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:513_1: pasāretvā jālamajjhe nipajjati. Paṭhamāya disāyettha ettha etāsu disāsu paṭhamāya
tika-abh08t0:513_2: disāya pasārite sutte pāṇakena paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya vā ghaṭṭite sati sā uṇṇanābhi
tika-abh08t0:513_3: kiñci calitvā phandanaṃ katvā nipannaṭṭhānato suttānusārena suttaṃ anusāretvā tassa
tika-abh08t0:513_4: pāṇakassa yūsaṃ yūsasaṅkhātaṃ soṇitaṃ pivati. Punāgantvā tattheva tasmiṃ jālamajjheyeva
tika-abh08t0:513_5: yathāsukhaṃ nipajjati, yathā paṭhamāya disāya calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti, evameva
tika-abh08t0:513_6: dutiyādīsu catūsu disāsu calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti, evaṃ pañcasu disāsu suttaṃ viya
tika-abh08t0:513_7: pañca pasādā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā, majjhe makkaṭako viya ca cittaṃ pana paṇḍitena
tika-abh08t0:513_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pāṇakādīhi khuddakatiracchānehi tassa saṅghaṭṭanā viya ārammaṇe pana
tika-abh08t0:513_9: pasādānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā. Jālamajjhe nipannāya uṇṇanābhiyā taṃ calanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:513_10: viya pasāde ghaṭṭetīti pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Ārammaṇaṃ. Tattha tissaṃ vīthiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:513_11: pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodhātukiriyācittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetīti bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:513_12: mataṃ bhagavatā. Tassa panthamakkaṭakassa suttānusāraṃva suttaṃ anugamanaṃ viya vīthicittappavattanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:513_13: paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīse pana vijjhitvā assa makkaṭassa yūsapānaṃ viya javanassa
tika-abh08t0:513_14: cittassa ārammaṇesu pavattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Puna āgantvā suttajālamajjhe
tika-abh08t0:513_15: nipajjanaṃ yathā vatthuṃyeva hadayavatthuṃ eva nissāya cittassa parivattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:514_0: 486-93. Idaṃ tu pana opammaṃ, atthaṃ dīpeti kiṃ tu hi idaṃ opammaṃ kaṃ atthaṃ dīpeti
tika-abh08t0:514_1: pakāseti? Paṭhamaṃ pasāde ārammaṇena ghaṭṭite sati pasādavatthuto pasādo vatthu nissayo
tika-abh08t0:514_2: etassāti pasādavatthu, cittaṃ, tato pasādavatthuto, paṭhamaṃ eva vatthusannissitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:514_3: bhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ mano jāyati, itipi attho tena opammena dīpito. Ekekārammaṇaṃ dvīsu
tika-abh08t0:514_4: dvīsu dvāresu sabbaso sabbappakārena pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati, ayamatthopi tena opammena
tika-abh08t0:514_5: dīpito “dvīsu dvīsu dvāresū”ti, ekaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe cakkhudvāre,
tika-abh08t0:514_6: manodvāre cāti dvīsu dvāresu āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti attho. Sotadvārādīsupi eseva nayo
tika-abh08t0:514_7: ñeyyo. Rūpaṃ cakkhupasādamhi ghaṭṭetvā taṅkhaṇe pana tassa khaṇe pana tathā manodvāre
tika-abh08t0:514_8: pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati, bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayo hotīti attho. Na saṃsayo etasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:514_9: vacane saṃsayo natthi. Yathā khago yathā sakuṇo. Hi saccaṃ mayā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ. Rukkhagge
tika-abh08t0:514_10: rukkhakoṭiyaṃ nilīyantova sākhino sākhaṃ ghaṭṭeti, tassa chāyā bhūmiyaṃ pathaviyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:514_11: pharati paṭihaññati. Idhāti nipāto. Sākhāya sakuṇena ghaṭṭanaṃ bhūmiyaṃ chāyāpharaṇāpi
tika-abh08t0:514_12: ca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇasmiṃyeva jāyare jāyanti. Evameva pana rūpassa, pasādassa
tika-abh08t0:514_13: ca ghaṭṭanaṃ, tatheva atthato atthavasena bhavaṅgacalanassāpi paccayattena paccayabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:514_14: manodvāre āpāthaṃ āgamanaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:515_0: 494-7. Tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasotaṃ chinditvā cakkhudvāre cakkhupasāde yathākkamaṃ āvajjane
tika-abh08t0:515_1: samuppanne, dassane samuppanne, sampaṭicchane samuppanne, santīraṇe samuppanne, tathā
tika-abh08t0:515_2: voṭṭhabbane ca samuppanne kusalaṃ javanacittaṃ javati, tathā akusalameva cittaṃ javati.
tika-abh08t0:515_3: Sotadvārādīsupi saddādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ ghaṭṭane eseva nayo avisesena viññunā viññeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:515_4: Etassa atthassa dīpane dovārikopamādīni vacanāni uddharitvā tato pakaraṇato nīharitvā
tika-abh08t0:516_0: 498-9. Asambhedena cakkhussāti tassāpi cakkhu asambhinnaṃ hoti. Jīvitā niruddhampi
tika-abh08t0:516_1: pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ
tika-abh08t0:516_2: sambhinnaṃ nāma, sakkontaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma hoti. Tena cakkhupasādassa asambhinnena
tika-abh08t0:516_3: rūpāpāthagamanena ālokasannissayenāpi. Tena tividhena paccayena samanakkārahetunā
tika-abh08t0:516_4: pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattanena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi saṃ ekato
tika-abh08t0:516_5: inti pavattantīti sametā, sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi, taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:516_6: cakkhupasādanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi cetasikehi saha jāyate.
tika-abh08t0:517_0: 500-1. Asambhedena sotassa sotapasādassa asambhinnena saddāpāthagamena ca saddassa
tika-abh08t0:517_1: āpāthagamanena ca. Ākāsanissayenāpi pihitakaṇṇacchiddassa sotaviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:517_2: Tena tividhena paccayena. Samanakkārahetunā pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena.
tika-abh08t0:517_3: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:518_0: 502-3. Asambhedena ghānassa ghānapasādassa asambhinnena gandhāpāthagamena ca gandhassa
tika-abh08t0:518_1: āpāthagamanena ca. Vāyosannissayenāpīti ghānabilamhi pavisantena vāyunāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:518_2: Tena tividhena paccayena. Samanakkārahetunā pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena.
tika-abh08t0:518_3: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:519_0: 504-5. Asambhedena jivhāya jivhāya asambhinnena rasāpāthagamena ca rasassa āpāthagamanena
tika-abh08t0:519_1: ca. Āposannissayenāpīti jivhātemanaṃ āpaṃ laddhā ca uppajjati, tena vinā sukkhakhādanīye
tika-abh08t0:519_2: jivhāya sāyitepi jivhāviññāṇaṃ nuppajjatīti attho. Tena tividhena paccayena. Samanakkārahetunā
tika-abh08t0:519_3: pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi
tika-abh08t0:519_4: samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:520_0: 506-7. Kāyapasādassa asambhedena phoṭṭhabbassa āpāthagamanena ca. Pathavīnissayenāpīti
tika-abh08t0:520_1: tena vinā kāyadvārampīti bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā
tika-abh08t0:520_2: pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati. Tena tividhena paccayena. Samanakkārahetunā
tika-abh08t0:520_3: pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi
tika-abh08t0:520_4: samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:521_0: 508-9. Asambhedā manassāpīti mananti bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa
tika-abh08t0:521_1: paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandatamagatameva vattamānampi sambhinnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:521_2: Āvajjanassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma. Manassa asambhedena dhammassa
tika-abh08t0:521_3: āpāthagamanena ca vatthusannissayena hadayavatthusannissayena. Tena tividhena paccayena.
tika-abh08t0:521_4: Samanakkārahetunā manodvārāvajjanena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi
tika-abh08t0:521_5: sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ manoviññāṇaṃ taṃ manoviññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:522_0: 510-11. Mano bhavaṅgacittaṃ nāma vibhāvinā veditabbaṃ. Āvajjanakriyācittaṃ āvajjanakiriyācittadvayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:522_1: samanakkāro nāma vibhāvinā saññitaṃ. Vatthusannissayena iti ayaṃ pāṭho sabbattha
tika-abh08t0:522_2: sabbesu bhavesu na gacchati. Pañcahi khandhehi vokāro vokiṇṇoti pañcavokāro, pañcavokārabhavaṃ
tika-abh08t0:522_3: sandhāya kāraṇaṃ katvā “vatthusannissayenā”ti ayaṃ pāṭho pana kathito mayā, pañcavokārabhavo
tika-abh08t0:522_4: nāma kāmarūpabhavo, arūpabhavo catuvokārabhavo nāma, asaññībhavo ekavokārabhavo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:522_5: Ayaṃ pāṭho catuvokāraarūpabhavaṃ sandhāya na kathitoti attho. Vatthussa rūpattā arūpabhave
tika-abh08t0:523_0: 512-4. Paṭisandhādicittāni, sabbānekūnavīsati honti, kāmāvacaresu dasa, rūpesu pañca,
tika-abh08t0:523_1: arūpīsu cattāri, sabbāni paṭisandhicittāni ekūnavīsati honti. Kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā.
tika-abh08t0:523_2: Kammanimittaṃ nāma rūpāni pañcārammaṇāni paññatti ca mahaggatacittañca. Tathā gatinimittakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:523_3: nāma kapparukkhādayo, akusalapakkhe rūpādiārammaṇabhūtā lohakumbhādayo ca. Iti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:523_4: iminā mayā vuttappakārena tesaṃ paṭisandhādicittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tividhaṃ bhagavatā
tika-abh08t0:523_5: udīritaṃ. Kāmāvacarasandhīnaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacarārammaṇaṃ bhagavatā mataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:523_6: Paccuppannaṃ rūpādipañcārammaṇaṃ, gatinimittaṃ pañcārammaṇañca paccuppannañca hoti.
tika-abh08t0:523_7: Atītaṃ vā kammaṃ kusalākusalacetanā atītāyeva, na paccuppannā. Anāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:524_0: 515-26. Aṭṭheva ca mahāvipākā, tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tadārammaṇasaññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:524_1: Ekādasavidhe citte tadārammaṇasaññite puññavipākāni kusalavipākā dasa honti, apuññajaṃ
tika-abh08t0:524_2: akusalavipākaṃ pana ekaṃ hoti. Mahāvipākā rūpārūpabhavadvaye na jāyanti, kāmarūpabhave
tika-abh08t0:524_3: santīraṇattayaṃ hoti. Yāni tadārammaṇacittāni satthunā jinena vuttāni, tesu tadārammaṇacittesu
tika-abh08t0:524_4: ekampi tadārammaṇacittaṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadācipi nappavattati.
tika-abh08t0:524_5: Kasmā kāraṇā? Tattha tasmiṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye “tadārammaṇaṃ na hotī”ti vacanaṃ codako
tika-abh08t0:524_6: bhaveyya, bījassābhāvato pana na hotīti parihāro. Akāmāvacarārammaṇe akāmāvacaradhamme
tika-abh08t0:524_7: idaṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ neva anubandhati. Hi kasmā kāraṇā? Parittārammaṇattā ca ekantena
tika-abh08t0:524_8: avassaṃ tadārammaṇamānasassa kāmāvacarārammaṇattā ca tathā aparicitattā ca sabbadā
tika-abh08t0:524_9: nānubandhati. Tañhi yathā pitaraṃ vā pitusadisaṃ vā ñātiṃ anubandhantopi taruṇadārako
tika-abh08t0:524_10: gharadvārantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anubandhati, na araññaṃ vā yuddhabhūmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:524_11: vā gacchati, evaṃ kāmāvacare dhamme anubandhantampi mahaggatalokuttaradhammamārabbha
tika-abh08t0:524_12: pavattamāne dhamme nānubandhati. Yasmā cassa sabbo kāmāvacarapāko ca kiriyāmanodhātu
tika-abh08t0:524_13: kiriyāahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā ime dhammā parittārammaṇāti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:524_14: accantaṃ parittameva ārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā cetaṃ mahaggatalokuttarārammaṇe kāmāvacaradhammepi
tika-abh08t0:525_0: 527-32. Kiṃ tena yuttivādena, vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu hi “janakaṃ tena tulya”ntiādikena
tika-abh08t0:525_1: tena, yuttiyā vādo yuttivādo, “janakaṃ tena tulya”ntiādikāya yuttikathāya kiṃ payojanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:525_2: vuttaṃ? Aṭṭhakathāsu hi saccaṃ “kiṃ tena yuttivādenā”ti vacanaṃ, “atthakathāsū”ti
tika-abh08t0:525_3: vattabbe samāse hi ttha-ssa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā “aṭṭhakathāsū”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmāvacare
tika-abh08t0:525_4: dhamme paṭicca tadārammaṇabhāvadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ. Tadārammaṇacittāni,
tika-abh08t0:525_5: ekādasapi sabbaso sabbappakārenapi tadārammaṇacittāni nāmagottaṃ panārabbha tissādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:525_6: nāmapaññattiṃ paṭicca kaccāyanagottakassapagottādikaṃ gottapaññattiṃ paṭicca javane
tika-abh08t0:525_7: javitepi ca tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti, rūpārūpabhavesu vā tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti.
tika-abh08t0:525_8: Yadā paññattimārabbha, javane javitepi vā yadā mayā vuttāya paññattiyā sesapaññattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:525_9: paṭicca javane javitepi vā tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena, tathā dukkhaaniccaanattalakkhaṇārammaṇikāya
tika-abh08t0:525_10: vipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena. Tadārammaṇā na labbhanti, micchattaniyatesupi
tika-abh08t0:525_11: micchatte micchāsabhāve “natthi dinna”ntyādivasena niyatāni cattāri diṭṭhiyuttajavanāni
tika-abh08t0:525_12: micchattaniyatāni, micchattaniyatesupi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena, lokuttaradhamme
tika-abh08t0:525_13: ārabbha javane gatepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena. Tathā mahaggate dhamme
tika-abh08t0:525_14: ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena, paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ ārabbha
tika-abh08t0:525_15: javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena. Manodvārepi sabbesaṃ javanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:526_0: 533-4. Manodvāre ārammaṇaghaṭṭanā na vijjati. Bhavaṅgato cetaso vīthicittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:526_1: kathaṃ kena pakārena hoti? Manodvārepi ghaṭṭanāya vinā ghaṭṭanaṃ vajjetvā āpāthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:526_2: āgacchanteva yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā vīthicittānaṃ sambhavo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:527_0: 535-6. Dvādasāpuññacittānaṃ dvādasaakusalacittānaṃ vipākā sattasattati pāpapākā dvādasapāpacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:527_1: vipākā caturāsīti pavattiyaṃ honti. Ekassa somanassayuttadiṭṭhisampayuttākusalassa
tika-abh08t0:527_3: akusalapākā honti. Tathā sesānaṃ ekādasannaṃ akusalānampi satta vipākā honti. Ekādasavidhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:527_4: tu, hitvā uddhaccamānasaṃ uddhaccamānasaṃ hitvā ekādasavidhānaṃ paṭisandhiyo ekādasavidhā ceva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:528_0: 537-8. Kriyacittesu sabbesu yaṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ javanaṃ na ca hoti, taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:528_1: karaṇamattattā kiriyāmattattā vātapupphasamaṃ vātapupphena sadisaṃ mataṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:528_2: Ayametthādhippāyo – khīṇāsave uppannakāle vā taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ
tika-abh08t0:528_3: yuttaṃ. Sabbesu puthujjanesu uppannakāle kathaṃ kiriyā hotīti ce? Karaṇamattattā
tika-abh08t0:528_4: aphaladāyakaṃ vātapupphaṃ viya aphaladāyakaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttihāro kiriyā
tika-abh08t0:528_5: pana hoti. Yaṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ kiccasādhanato javanakiccasādhanavasena javanattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:528_6: javanabhāvaṃ pattaṃ chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ aphalaṃ hoti yathā, evaṃ chinnāvijjātaṇhāmūlassa
tika-abh08t0:528_7: vītarāgassa taṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ aphalaṃ vipākavirahitaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:529_0: 539-40. Paṭicca pana etasmā, phalametīti paccayo ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca etasmā dhammato
tika-abh08t0:529_1: phalaṃ eti pavattati tasmā paccayo, yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā uppattiyāpi
tika-abh08t0:529_2: upakāro nāma hoti, so dhammo tassa dhammassa paccayoti paccayo nāma paṇḍitena pavuccate.
tika-abh08t0:529_3: Sambhavo pabhavo hetu kāraṇaṃ paccayo mato bhagavatā. Idaṃ vacanaṃ aññattha dīpanavacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:530: 541. Lobhādi pana yo dhammo, mūlaṭṭhenupakārako yo lobhādi pana dhammo mūlabhāvena phaladhammassa upakārako, so lobhādidhammo phaladhammassa hetūti hetu nāma vibhāvinā viññātabbo.
tika-abh08t0:531: 542. Lobho doso ca moho ca tathā alobhādayo tayo hetū, te cha eva hetuyo honti, jātito jātivasena kusalajātiakusalajātiabyākatajātivasena navadhā navahi koṭṭhāsehi siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:532_0: 543-4. Dhammānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ, kusalādittasādhako yo dhammo kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:532_1: kusalādittasādhako kusalādibhāvasādhako, so dhammo mūlaṭṭho nāma. Evaṃ vacanaṃ eke
tika-abh08t0:532_2: ekacce ācariyā vadanti. Evaṃ sante kusalākusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhakavasena
tika-abh08t0:532_3: mūlaṭṭhe sante taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpīsu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhānarūpesu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhitesu
tika-abh08t0:532_4: cittajarūpesu hetūnaṃ lobhādihetūnaṃ hetupaccayatā kadācipi neva sampajjati. Ayametthādhippāyo
tika-abh08t0:532_5: – yadi cittesu rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentesu te lobhādayopi cittānaṃ sampayuttacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:532_6: ekuppādattā ca rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentiyeva. Tadā tesaṃ mate tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:532_7: siyā. Na ca kadāci rūpāni kusalādināmakāni dissanti yasmā, tasmā cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādibhāvañāpanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:532_8: tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ te lobhādayo hetupaccayā na honti, iti vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:532_9: Evañca sati cittajarūpāni nāma kadācipi viyuttāni caranti, tasmā kusalādittasādhako mūlaṭṭho na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:533_0: 545-6. Hi saccaṃ “evaṃ sante tu hetūna”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Te lobhādayo hetū tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:533_1: rūpānaṃ kusalāditaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ na sādhenti na nipphādenti. Te hetū tesaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:533_2: rūpānaṃ paccayā na ca na hontiyeva, tasmā kāraṇā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako
tika-abh08t0:533_3: yo dhammo, so dhammo mūlaṭṭhoti mūlasabhāvo nāma samayaññunā samayavijānanasīlena
tika-abh08t0:534_1: yo attho, so attho hetūnaṃ lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭho mūlasabhāvo iti ca gahaṇaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:535_0: 548-9. Kusalākusalā hetū kusalā hetū, akusalā hetū, kriyāhetū sabbaso sabbappakārena
tika-abh08t0:535_1: sabbe kiriyāhetuyo ca sampayuttānaṃ pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ aññamaññapaccayabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:535_2: hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ cittajarūpānañca hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā,
tika-abh08t0:535_3: ete hetū catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā.
tika-abh08t0:536_0: 550-1. Kāme vipākahetūpi attanā sampayuttānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā, paṭisandhikkhaṇepi
tika-abh08t0:536_1: kaṭattārūpajātānaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā, tasmā paṭisandhicittuppādakkhaṇeyeva
tika-abh08t0:536_2: kammajarūpānaṃ uppādo hoti, yasmā kāraṇā pavattiyaṃ cittajānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ gatā.
tika-abh08t0:537_0: 552-5. Rūpe vipākahetū kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ hetuyo viya hetupaccayā honti, pañcavokāre
tika-abh08t0:537_1: lokuttaravipākahetavo cittajānaṃ rūpānañca sampayuttānañca pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā
tika-abh08t0:537_2: honti. Catuvokāre lokuttaravipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā
tika-abh08t0:537_3: bhavanti. Itare catuvokāre arūpabhave vipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva sabhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:537_4: attano bhūmiyaṃ arūpabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti. Hetuttho hetūnaṃ attho hetuyo ceva
tika-abh08t0:537_5: hetupaccayo ceva hetupaccayasambhavo hetupaccayuppatti, evameva evaṃ iminā pakārena.
tika-abh08t0:537_6: Sañjāto sukhahetu yassāti sañjātasukhahetu, tena viññeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:538_0: 556-8. Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ vīmaṃsā cāti catudhādhipatī lokādhipatinā satthunā
tika-abh08t0:538_1: vuttā. Chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittassa uppattikālasmiṃ yo chando, so chandādhipati
tika-abh08t0:538_2: nāma, chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhikaraṇacittassa eseva nayo sesesupi ca tīsu mayā
tika-abh08t0:538_3: vuttato chandādhipatito sesesupi ca adhipatīsu. Yo dhammo jeṭṭhaṭṭhena upakārako,
tika-abh08t0:538_4: so dhammo adhipatīti adhipati nāma bhagavatā niddiṭṭho.
tika-abh08t0:544_0: Yo yo jano imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ sumatimativibodhanaṃ sumatīnaṃ sundaramatīnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:544_1: matiyā vibodhanakaraṃ vicittaṃ kumatīnaṃ kucchitamatīnaṃ bālānaṃ matiindhane padhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:544_2: pāvakaṃ atimadhurakaraṃ avedi jāni, so so jano sakalaṃ jinavacanaṃ avedi jāni.
tika-abh08t0:553_0: Yāni lokikāni eva bāttiṃsa pākacittāni honti, etesaṃ pākacittānaṃ puññāpuññādisaṅkhārā
tika-abh08t0:553_1: bhavādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu paṭisandhipavattīsu yathā yena pakārena
tika-abh08t0:553_2: paccayā honti eva, imesaṃ vipākacittānaṃ tepi saṅkhārā bhavādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
tika-abh08t0:553_3: paṭisandhipavattīsu tathā tena pakārena vibhāvinā paṇḍitena viññātabbā. Tayo bhavā
tika-abh08t0:553_4: catasso ca yoniyo kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavavasena tayo bhavā, aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikayonivasena
tika-abh08t0:553_6: sandhisaññāya paṭisandhisaññāya nānattā nānābhāvato, kāyassāpi ca rūpakāyassāpi ca
tika-abh08t0:553_7: nānattā nānābhāvato kāmasugatiyo, nānā attā sabhāvo etassāti nānattā, nānatto rūpakāyo
tika-abh08t0:553_8: etesanti nānattakāyā, nānā sabhāvo etassāti nānattā, nānattāyeva saññā nānattasaññā,
tika-abh08t0:553_9: sā etesaṃ atthīti nānattasaññī nāma, paṭhamajjhānabhūmi ca caturāpāyabhūmiyo ca nānattakāyaekattasaññī
tika-abh08t0:553_11: ekattakāyaekattasaññī nāma, heṭṭhā ṭhitā rūpehi saddhiṃ sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, tiṭṭhanti
tika-abh08t0:553_12: viññāṇāni etthāti ṭhitiyo, viññāṇānaṃ ṭhitiyo viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, viññāṇassa abhāvato
tika-abh08t0:553_13: asaññībhūmi na gayhate, catutthāruppabhūmi ca paṭuviññāṇābhāvato na gayhate. Sattāvāsavasena
tika-abh08t0:553_14: asaññībhūmiṃ, catutthāruppabhūmiñca pana gahetvā te sattāvāsā nava eva honti.
tika-abh08t0:554_0: 563-8. Kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā pūrenti attano kārakaṃ pūrenti ca,
tika-abh08t0:554_1: ajjhāsayaṃ pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattentīti puññāni, abhisaṅkharonti vipākaṃ, kammajarūpañcāti
tika-abh08t0:554_2: abhisaṅkhārā, puññāni eva abhisaṅkhārā puññābhisaṅkhārā, teyeva saññitā puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā,
tika-abh08t0:554_3: kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā. Navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ upekkhāyuttāhetukamahāvipākavasena
tika-abh08t0:554_4: navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ pana nānā vattamānacetanākhaṇato paraṃ khaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:554_5: etassāti nānākhaṇaṃ, taṃ eva nānakkhaṇikaṃ, tameva kammaṃ nānakkhaṇikakammaṃ, vattamānacetanāto
tika-abh08t0:554_6: parā atītacetanāti attho. Balavā nissayapaccayo upanissayapaccayo, balavattho cettha
tika-abh08t0:554_8: cāti attho. Dvedhā dvīhi pakārehi tesaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayā bhavanti, tā aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:554_11: dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi pavattiyaṃ paccayā honti. Tāyeva cetanā
tika-abh08t0:554_12: tā eva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā rūpabhave pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:554_14: pavattiyaṃ paccayā honti. Aṭṭhannaṃ tu parittānaṃ, kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:554_16: pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pana paccayā
tika-abh08t0:554_17: na honti. Vuttappakārāva kāme sugatiyaṃ yathāvuttappakārāva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā
tika-abh08t0:554_18: kāmasugatiyaṃ tathā soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi
tika-abh08t0:554_19: paccayā honti, pavatte pavattikkhaṇe sattannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti. Paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_0: 569-74. Rūpe puññābhisaṅkhārā, rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā hontimāpuññasaṅkhārā, kāme duggatiyaṃ dvidhā ime apuññābhisaṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:555_2: imā kusalapaṭipakkhā uddhaccavajjā ekādasa cetanā kāmaduggatiyaṃ ekassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:555_4: honti. Dvādasa akusalacetanā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe eva channaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_5: akusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā no honti.
tika-abh08t0:555_6: Sattannampi bhavanteva pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe akusalavipākāni
tika-abh08t0:555_8: sugatiyaṃ tesaṃ, sattannampi tatheva ca dvādasākusalacetanā kāme sugatiyaṃ tatheva
tika-abh08t0:555_9: ca tesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_10: paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā na honti. Viññāṇānaṃ catunnampi, tesaṃ rūpabhave tathā tāyeva
tika-abh08t0:555_12: viññāṇānaṃ tathā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:555_13: paccayā na honti. So ca kāmabhaveniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ so ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro
tika-abh08t0:555_14: kāmabhave aniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ amanāparūpādīni ārammaṇāni upaladdhiyaṃ tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_15: catunnaṃ apuññajānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paccayo hoti. Hi saccaṃ “so ca kāmabhaveniṭṭha-rūpādiupaladdhiya”ntiādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_16: vacanaṃ. Aniṭṭharūpādayo nāma visayā brahmaloke na vijjare na vijjanti.
tika-abh08t0:556_0: 575-6. Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro na iñjati na phandati na calatīti āneñjaṃ, āneñjañca
tika-abh08t0:556_1: taṃ saṅkhāro cāti āneñjasaṅkhāro, tathā eva āneñjasaṅkhāro arūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:556_2: pākacittānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayo hoti. Bhavesvete
tika-abh08t0:556_3: bhavesu ete vuttappakārā paccayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīsu yathā ca yena
tika-abh08t0:556_4: yena ca pakārena nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā honti, tena paccayā
tika-abh08t0:556_5: tathā tena tena pakārena vibhāvinā vijānantena paṇḍitena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t0:557_0: 577. Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, yoniādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu eseva ca nayo
tika-abh08t0:557_1: bhavesu mayā vutto eva nayo paṇḍitena ñeyyo. Tatridaṃ tatra bhavesu ādito paṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:557_2: vuttaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ upāyamattadīpanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:558_1: ca puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena samānabhāvena dvīsu bhavesu kāmarūpabhavesu paṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:558_2: datvā so saṅkhāro sabbapākaṃ janeti nibbatteti. Tathā catūsu viññeyyo, aṇḍajādīsu
tika-abh08t0:558_3: yonisu dvibhavesu puññābhisaṅkhāro viya tathā catūsu aṇḍajādīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro
tika-abh08t0:558_4: paṇḍitena ñeyyo. “Aṇḍajādīsū”ti vacanaṃ padumapaccekabuddhānaṃ manussattaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:558_5: vuttaṃ. Bahudevamanussānaṃ vasena dvīsu gatīsu eva ca tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena
tika-abh08t0:558_7: ekattakāyanānattasaññī ekattakāyaekattasaññīnaṃ vasena catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu so
tika-abh08t0:558_9: vasena vuttappakārasmiṃ catubbidhe sattāvāse tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena
tika-abh08t0:558_10: ñeyyo. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññābhisaṅkhāro bhavādīsu bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
tika-abh08t0:558_11: yathārahaṃ soḷasannaṃ kāmakusalapākānaṃ, pañcannaṃ rūpapākānañcāti ekavīsatipākānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:559_2: ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ca ekasmiṃ pana sattāvāse dvidhā
tika-abh08t0:560_0: 584-6. Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro tathā eva āneñjasaṅkhāro, ekārūpabhave ekasmiṃ arūpabhave
tika-abh08t0:560_1: ekissā opapātikayoniyā ceva ekissā devagatiyāpi ca ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi
tika-abh08t0:560_2: ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmivasena tīsu eva cittaṭṭhitīsu catunnaṃ arūpabhūmīnaṃ vasena catubbidhe
tika-abh08t0:560_3: sattāvāse catunnaṃ arūpapākacittānaṃ dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammopanissayapaccayehi so
tika-abh08t0:560_4: āneñjābhisaṅkhāro paccayo hoti. Paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ, vasenevaṃ bhavādīsu evaṃ iminā
tika-abh08t0:560_5: mayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena bhavādīsu yathā ye saṅkhārā esaṃ
tika-abh08t0:560_6: pākacittānaṃ paccayā honti, tathā te saṅkhārā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena vijānitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:561_0: 587-90. Na rūpārūpadhammānaṃ, saṅkanti pana vijjati rūpadhammānaṃ, cittacetasikasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:561_1: nāmadhammānañca saṅkanti pana saṅkamanaṃ pana na vijjati. Saṅkantibhāve asati atītabhavato
tika-abh08t0:561_2: idha imasmiṃ bhave rūpadhammānaṃ saṅkamanabhāve asati paṭisandhicittaṃ kathaṃ kena
tika-abh08t0:561_3: pakārena siyā bhaveyya? Natthi cittassa saṅkanti, atītabhavato idha imasmiṃ bhave
tika-abh08t0:561_4: cittassa saṅkanti saṅkamanaṃ natthi, tato atītabhavato atītaṃ hetuṃ vinā vajjetvā
tika-abh08t0:561_5: idha imasmiṃ bhave cittassa pātubhāvo na vijjati. Suladdhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:561_6: suṭṭhu laddhapaccayaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:561_7: labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
tika-abh08t0:561_8: paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ bhavantaraṃ aññabhavaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:561_9: upeti upagacchati. Iti vacanaṃ samaññāya lokiyavohārena pavuccate, satto vā natthi,
tika-abh08t0:561_10: satto jīvoti vevacanaṃ, attā vāpi na vijjati.
tika-abh08t0:562_0: 591-9. Tassidaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā, paṭisandhikkamaṃ pana tassa sattassa idaṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_1: sudubbudhaṃ atidubbijānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ahaṃ dassayissāmi, tametaṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_2: sādhu sādhukaṃ nibodhatha, sādhu sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, vividhesu ārammaṇesu lobhavasena
tika-abh08t0:562_3: cittaṃ anāmetvā vajiramañjūsāya anagghamaṇiratanaṃ pakkhipanto viya citte ṭhapetvāti
tika-abh08t0:562_4: attho. Atītasmiṃ bhave tassa, āsannamaraṇassa hiito bhavato atītasmiṃ bhave āsannamaraṇassa
tika-abh08t0:562_5: tassa sarīrasmiṃ ātape pakkhittaṃ haritaṃ tālapaṇṇaṃ viya sussamāne sati cakkhundriyādike
tika-abh08t0:562_6: indriye naṭṭhe hadayavatthumattasmiṃ ṭhite kāyappasādike viññāṇe tasmiṃ khaṇe vatthusannissitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_8: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Pubbānusevitanti ito kālā pubbakāle tena pana anusevitaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_9: puññaṃ kammaṃ vā apuññaṃ eva vā kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā kammaphalena
tika-abh08t0:562_10: dvāresu paccupaṭṭhitaṃ ālambitvā manodvārāvajjanajavanavasena sevitacittaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:562_11: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pavattamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ taṃ javanacittaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_12: laddhārammaṇapaccayaṃ. Avijjāya paṭicchannādīnave visayeti akusalajavane javite tassa
tika-abh08t0:562_13: javanassa avijjāya appaṭicchannadose tasmiṃ kammādike ārammaṇe kusalajavane javite
tika-abh08t0:562_14: tato cittavīthito pubbabhāge pavattāya avijjāya paṭicchannadose tasmiṃ kammādike
tika-abh08t0:562_15: ārammaṇe. Taṇhāti akusalajavanena sahajo lobho, akusalajavane vā javite tato vīthicittato
tika-abh08t0:562_16: pubbabhāge pavatto lobho taṇhā. Nametīti aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggāhāpetvā daḷhaggāhavasena
tika-abh08t0:562_17: taṃ eva kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāpetīti attho. Sahajā saṅkhārā
tika-abh08t0:562_18: pana tassa cittassa sahajā ekato jātā cetanā pana tasmiṃ yevārammaṇe khipanti pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:562_19: Imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave ekasantativasā pavattāya taṇhāya namīyamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_20: orimā tīramhā rajjukaṃ ālambitvā mātikātikkamo puriso viya etaṃ purimaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_21: hadayavatthuṃ jahati chaḍḍeti, cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhatīti attho. Aparaṃ kammasambhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_22: nissayaṃ aparaṃ aññakammato sambhūtaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ labhitvā vā alabhitvāpi
tika-abh08t0:562_23: vā ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi taṃ paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ pavattati. “Labhitvā”ti
tika-abh08t0:562_24: vacanaṃ kāmarūpabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Alabhitvā”ti vacanaṃ arūpabhavaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:562_25: vuttaṃ. Ettha etesu cittesu purimaṃ “jahatī”ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ, cuticittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_26: pacchimaṃ “ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi pavattatī”ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:563_0: 600-6. Tadetaṃ taṃ etaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ purimā bhavato idha imasmiṃ pacchimabhave
tika-abh08t0:563_1: nāpi āgataṃ, kammādiñca hetuṃ vinā vajjetvā paṭisandhicittaṃ pātubhūtaṃ na ceva taṃ
tika-abh08t0:563_2: ettha etasmiṃ vacane etassa paṭisandhicittassa purimā bhavato idha imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave
tika-abh08t0:563_3: anāgamane atītabhavahetūhi atītabhave kammādipaccayehi etassa paṭisandhicittassa
tika-abh08t0:563_4: sambhave. Paṭighosadīpamuddādī, bhavantettha nidassanā ettha etasmiṃ tassa paṭisandhicittassa
tika-abh08t0:563_5: atītabhavato anāgamane atītabhave hetūhi sambhave paṭighosadīpamuddādiatthanidassanā
tika-abh08t0:563_6: upamā bhavanti. Aññatra aññasmiṃ paṭighosādīnaṃ atthānaṃ pavattiṭṭhāne āgantvā saddādihetukā
tika-abh08t0:563_7: saddādayo paccayā honti yathā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – imasmiṃ ṭhāne janehi pavattāpitā
tika-abh08t0:563_8: saddadīpamuddādayo atthā pabbatantarādīsu aññesu ṭhānesu pavattānaṃ paṭighosadīpamuddādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:563_9: atthānaṃ hetukā honti. Tesu saddādīsu paccayesu santesu ye te paṭighosādayo honti,
tika-abh08t0:563_10: asantesu na honti yathā, evameva ca viññāṇaṃ atītabhavato paccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:563_11: pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ vibhāvinā veditabbaṃ. Santānabandhato santānabandhavasena ekatā
tika-abh08t0:563_12: atītabhavapaccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattassa viññāṇassa ekībhāvo natthi, nānatāpi
tika-abh08t0:563_13: tassa viññāṇassa nānābhāvopi paccekabhāvo api. Sati santānabandhe tu, ekantenekatā
tika-abh08t0:563_14: siyā santānabandhe sati ekantena tassa viññāṇassa ekatā ekībhāvo siyā bhaveyya, khīrasabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:563_15: paggharaṇasabhāvato khīrato sambhūtaṃ ghanasabhāvaṃ kadācipi kismiñcipi kāle na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:563_16: sabbadā paggharaṇasabhāvakhīrameva bhaveyyāti attho. Athāpi aparo nayopi sā ekantanānatā
tika-abh08t0:563_17: tassa viññāṇassa so ekantanānābhāvo yadi bhaveyya, khīrasāmiko so puggalo dadhisāmi
tika-abh08t0:563_18: na bhaveyya. Khīrakāle khīrassa issarabhūto sāmiko paggharaṇasabhāvaṃ jahitvā dadhissa
tika-abh08t0:563_19: uppajjamānakāle tassa dadhissa issaro na bhaveyya, tato khīrasāmiko añño puggalo
tika-abh08t0:563_20: tassa dadhissa anissaro asāmiko bhaveyyāti attho. Yasmā kāraṇā ettha etasmiṃ paṭisandhikkamavinicchaye
tika-abh08t0:563_21: ekantaekatāpi vā ekantanānatāpi vā samayaññunā viññunā na ceva upagantabbā.
tika-abh08t0:564_0: 607-10. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena asaṅkantipātubhāve saṅkantipātubhāvarahite
tika-abh08t0:564_1: bhave sati imasmiṃ manussattabhāve khandhādisamatā abhisambhūtā ye khandhā honti,
tika-abh08t0:564_2: etesaṃ idha imasmiṃ manussattabhāve niruddhattā idha imasmiṃ manussattabhāve janehi
tika-abh08t0:564_3: katassa tassa kammassa phalahetuno phalassa paccayabhūtassa parattha parasmiṃ loke
tika-abh08t0:564_4: āgamato ceva evaṃ aññassa sattassa aññato kammato hi tato sattato aññena sattena
tika-abh08t0:564_5: katato aññato ceva kammato taṃ phalaṃ siyā bhaveyya, “aññassa sattassā”ti vacanena
tika-abh08t0:564_6: titthiyasattassapi kammaṃ aññassa ca phalaṃ dadeyyāti attho, tasmā kāraṇā etaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:564_7: eva ca tumhehi vuttavidhānaṃ na sundaraṃ. Etthāhāti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā codako āha
tika-abh08t0:564_8: – nanu evaṃ “asaṅkantipātubhāve bhave satī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ niyatīti? Vuccate – santāne
tika-abh08t0:564_9: yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ ekasmiṃ santāne pavattamānaṃ yaṃ etaṃ phalaṃ aññassa sattassa na
tika-abh08t0:564_10: hoti, aññato kammato na ca hoti, bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ santāne”tiādikassa
tika-abh08t0:565_0: 611-5. Ekasmiṃ pana santāne, vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana aññassa sattassāpi vā na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:565_1: taṃ phalaṃ aññato kammato na hoti. Bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:565_2: santāne”tiādikassa etassa atthassa sādhako nipphādako hoti, bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāre
tika-abh08t0:565_3: madhuādinā vatthunā janehi kate tassa bījassa santāne paṭhamaṃ laddhapaccayo paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:565_4: laddhamadhuādipaccayo tassa bījassa phalaṃ kālantare madhuādinā bījābhisaṅkharaṇato
tika-abh08t0:565_5: aññasmiṃ kāle madhuro hoti. Hi saccaṃ “bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāre”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Tāni
tika-abh08t0:565_6: hi tāni eva paṭhamaṃ madhuādinā janehi ropitāni bījāni abhisaṅkharaṇato kālantare
tika-abh08t0:565_7: madhurabhāvaṃ phalampi vā phalaṭṭhaṃ vā na pāpuṇanti. Evaṃ iminā pakārena idaṃ mayā
tika-abh08t0:565_8: vuttaṃ “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ. Api ca aparo nayo.
tika-abh08t0:565_9: Bālakāle taruṇakāle tena taruṇena payuttena vijjāsipposadhādinā kammenāpi tassa vuddhakālasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:565_10: phaladānasīlena ayaṃ “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādiko attho paṇḍitena dīpetabbo.
tika-abh08t0:566_0: 616-20. Codako punāha – evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena kamme
tika-abh08t0:566_1: santepi saṃvijjamānepi taṃ kammaṃ etasmiṃyeva khaṇe vijjamānampi vā phalassa paccayo
tika-abh08t0:566_2: hoti. Atha vāvijjamānakaṃ paccayo na bhaveyya. Etasmiṃyeva khaṇe avijjamānakaṃ kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:566_3: vā phalassa paccayo hoti. Sace yadi vijjamānaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti, tappavattikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:566_4: pana tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇe tassa kammassa vijjamānakāle pana hetunā kammeneva
tika-abh08t0:566_5: saddhiṃ pākena bhavitabbaṃ. Atha vā aparo nayo. Vijjamānaṃ niruddhaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa
tika-abh08t0:566_6: paccayo yadi bhaveyya, pavattikkhaṇato tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇato pubbe vā kāle,
tika-abh08t0:566_7: tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇato pacchā vā avijjamānakāleti attho. Niccaphalaṃ siyāti
tika-abh08t0:566_8: sabbadā kammapaccayavirahitaṃ phalaṃ siyāti attho. Ācariyena vuccate – “lobhaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-abh08t0:566_9: pajahatha, sotāpattipaṭilābhāya ahameva pāṭibhogo”tiādīsu pāṭhesu pāṭibhogo viya
tika-abh08t0:566_10: kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sotāpattiphalaṃ viya kammato sambhūtaṃ phalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kaṭattāyeva
tika-abh08t0:566_11: janehi kaṭattāyeva taṃ kammaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti, assa vijjamānattaṃ na ca hoti,
tika-abh08t0:566_12: tassa avijjamānassa kammassa vijjamānatā vā na ca neva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:567_1: sotūnaṃ puggalānaṃ pītibuddhivivaḍḍhano paṇḍitehi vividhesu ārammaṇesu cittaṃ anāmetvā
tika-abh08t0:573_0: 622. Vuttamādimhi yaṃ rūpaṃ, cittajānamanantaraṃ yaṃ rūpaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ anantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:573_1: ādimhi pakaraṇādimhi “cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā vacanena ācariyena vuttaṃ, ito
tika-abh08t0:573_2: paraṃ idāni tassa rūpassa vibhāvanaṃ samāsena saṅkhepena karissaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:574_0: 623. Yaṃ ruppatīti rūpanti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ ruppati sītādinā viruddhapaccayena vikāramāpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:574_1: Tathā rūpayatīti rūpaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vaṇṇavikāramāpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:574_2: ajjhāsayaṃ pakāseti, iti tasmā rūpaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Vaṇṇāyatanaṃ. Rūpārūpabhavātīto, surūpo
tika-abh08t0:574_3: rūpamabrvi bhagavā rūpārūpabhavaatīto surūpo rūpaṃ abrvi kathesi.
tika-abh08t0:575: 625-6. Mahābhūtenāti mahanto bhūto uppatti etassāti mahābhūto, tena. Vañcakattā mahābhūtasamāti vā.
tika-abh08t0:582_0: Atthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, anto kho, kaccāna, atthi iti ayaṃ eko anto koṭṭhāso,
tika-abh08t0:582_1: ayaṃ sassatadiṭṭhi. Natthīti kho, kaccāna, ayaṃ dutiyo anto, ayaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhi.
tika-abh08t0:582_2: Khantī saccānulomikanti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ anulomikañāṇaṃ, saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:582_3: Yathābhūtañca yaṃ ñāṇanti sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Etaṃ āsayasadditanti
tika-abh08t0:582_4: etaṃ āsayaṃ iti kathitaṃ. Evaṃ vuttappakārena āsaye ñāṇaṃ nāma. Anusayo nāma diṭṭhānusayādayo
tika-abh08t0:582_5: anusayā satta. Indriyānaṃ paropareti pare adhikabhāvena opare ca tikkhānubhāvena
tika-abh08t0:582_6: ayaṃ satto tikkhasaddhindriyo mudusaddhindriyo hīnasaddhindriyoti attho. Samādhindriyādīsupi
tika-abh08t0:582_7: eseva nayo. Iti sattānaṃ indriyānaṃ paraopare ñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:586: 647. Ete dasa catusamuṭṭhānā sambhārā catūhi paccayehi cattālīsa bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:589: 660-2. Visese satīti nissayabhūtānaṃ catunnaṃ visese sati, sabbaso sabbesaṃ visesaparikappanaṃ pahāya eva kammavisesena pasādānaṃ visesatā ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t0:591: 668. Paratoti paṭhamakappato aparabhāge paṭisandhiyaṃ bhāvadvayaṃ samuṭṭhātīti viññeyyaṃ. “Pavattepi samuṭṭhāyā”tiādikaṃ soṇakumārādayo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:592: 672. Na taṃ byañjanakāraṇanti taṃ indriyadvayaṃ byañjanassa kāraṇaṃ na siyā. Tassāti byañjanassa.
tika-abh08t0:594: 676-7. Annapānādikaṃ vatthu yaṃ kammajaṃ aggiṃ harati, kevalaṃ ekaṃ hutvā taṃ annapānādikaṃ vatthu jīvitaṃ pana pāletuṃ na ca sakkoti. Ekato jīvitaṃ pāletuñca sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:595_0: Kāyena rūpakāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ bhāvo kāyaggahaṇānusārena kāyaggahaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:595_1: anucintanena gahitāya vāyodhātuvikārasaṅkhātāya etāya dhammajātiyā paṇḍitehi viññāyate.
tika-abh08t0:596: 681. Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ heṭṭhā chahi cittehi vāyodhātusamuṭṭhitaṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvā.
tika-abh08t0:598_0: 690-1. Etāsaṃ pana lahutādīnaṃ tissannaṃ pavattiyaṃ nidassanaṃ kamato ārogyaṃ lahutā,
tika-abh08t0:598_1: madditaṃ dhammaṃ mudutā, dhantahemaṃ kammaññatā hoti. Lahutādittayaṃ pana kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:598_2: kātuṃ na sakkoti, āhārādittayaṃyeva lahutādittayaṃ karoti yasmā, tato taṃ tijaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:599_1: vuttaṃ. Veneyyānaṃ vasena vāti eke veneyyā ācayavasena jātirūpaṃ jānanti, eke anubandhatāvasena
tika-abh08t0:599_2: jānanti. Iti veneyyānaṃ jānanavasena jātirūpaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:601_0: Te middharūpavādācariyā paṭikkhipitabbā. Kathaṃ? Addhā munisi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā
tika-abh08t0:601_1: tavāti yo tvaṃ addhā ekantena muni asi sambuddho asi nīvaraṇā dhammā tava tuyhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:601_2: natthi, iti vacane sace middhaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ rūpe paviṭṭhaṃ siyā. Bhagavatā rūpakāyassa
tika-abh08t0:601_3: vijjamānattā “natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. Thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:601_4: avijjānīvaraṇena saha nīvaraṇañceva hoti, nīvaraṇasampayuttañca hoti. Iti sampayuttavacanato
tika-abh08t0:601_5: sampayuttassa rūpassa abhāvato tampi na vattabbaṃ siyā. Na purejātapaccayāti aññamaññapaccayāti
tika-abh08t0:601_6: attho. Sace thinamiddhaṃ rūpaṃ siyā, kathaṃ arūpepi aññamaññaṃ siyā, na siyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:601_7: Arūpepi kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uppajjati. Iti vacanena
tika-abh08t0:601_8: ca na middharūpaṃ siyā, arūpe kathaṃ siyāti attho. Arūpameva middhaṃ iti paṭikkhipitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:601_9: Arūpepi etassa middhassa uppattiyā sādhakavacanato niṭṭhaṃ ettha ca avagantabbaṃ “arūpa”nti viññunā.
tika-abh08t0:603_0: 707-17. Jāyeyyuṃ yadi tānipīti tāni jaratāaniccatārūpā yadi jāyeyyuṃ, evaṃ sante
tika-abh08t0:603_1: tu tesaṃ jaratāaniccatā bhedā siyuṃ. Hi saccaṃ vacanaṃ pāko na paccati, bhedo vā
tika-abh08t0:603_2: na ca bhijjati yasmā, tasmā tesaṃ pākabhedā siyunti, taṃ vacanaṃ natthi. Etaṃ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:603_3: jātassa nipphannarūpassa pākabhedattā na jāyati. Siyā kassaci buddhetthāti ettha
tika-abh08t0:603_4: jaratāaniccatāvinicchayādhikāre kassaci janassa buddhi ñāṇaṃ yadi siyā, “rūpassūpacayo”ti
tika-abh08t0:603_5: vacanena “jāti jāyatī”ti vacanaṃ dīpitaṃ yathā, evaṃ tathā pākopi paccatu, bhedopi
tika-abh08t0:603_6: paribhijjatu, evaṃ buddhi siyā. Jāti na ceva jāyate. Iti iminā pakārena vibhāvinā
tika-abh08t0:603_7: ñeyyā. Jāti jāyamānassa nipphannarūpassa nibbatti nāma pakāsitā. Tattha yassa siyā
tika-abh08t0:603_8: tattha vacane yassa janassa buddhi siyā. Yesaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ jāti atthi,
tika-abh08t0:603_9: sā jāti abhinibbattisammutiṃ tappaccayattavohāraṃ tesaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:603_10: laddhavohāraṃ kammajādikaṃ vohāraṃ labhateva yathā, tathā tesaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:603_11: te pākabhedā abhinibbattisammutiṃ nāma tappaccayattavohāraṃ labhanti, iti buddhi
tika-abh08t0:603_12: siyā. Tassa janassa evaṃ vattabbaṃ – idaṃ santatūpacayadvayaṃ kammādisambhavaṃ hoti
tika-abh08t0:603_13: yathā, evaṃ pākabhedā taṃ kammādisambhavavohāraṃ kadācipi na labhanti. Hi saccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:603_14: vacanaṃ kasmā kāraṇā janakānaṃ kammādipaccayānaṃ ānubhāvasaṅkhāte khaṇuppāde tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:603_15: pākabhedānaṃ abhāvato na labhanti. Vuttappakārena khaṇuppāde jātiparamparābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:603_16: sā jāti labbhate, tasmā kāraṇā jāti eva abhinibbattisammutiṃ paccayattavohāraṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t0:603_17: itaraṃ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ pana na labhati. Taṃ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ jiyyati iti
tika-abh08t0:603_18: bhijjati iti vā na vattabbaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Kammādipaccayānaṃ ānubhāvakkhaṇe tassa
tika-abh08t0:604_0: 718-23. Aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcetaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccasaṅkhātaṃ itipi vacanassa bhagavatā
tika-abh08t0:604_1: vuttattā jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ jāyati, evaṃ iti tvaṃ ce maññasi, evaṃ “jāyati evā”ti
tika-abh08t0:604_2: vacanaṃ bhagavatā na vattabbaṃ. Hi kasmā kāraṇā? “Aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcetaṃ, jarāmaraṇamiccapī”tivuttabhāvādinā
tika-abh08t0:604_3: ākāradesanāpariyāyena lesena bhagavatā aniccānaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:604_4: sabhāvato jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcāpi cittajānaṃ vikārattā viññattiyo “cittajā”ti
tika-abh08t0:604_5: vuttā viya, tathā evaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ atthe sati etaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇattayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:604_6: ajātattā ca sabbathā sabbākārena khaṃpupphaṃva natthi, asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ viya niccaṃvāti
tika-abh08t0:604_7: ca codako vadeyya, natthi niccanti idaṃ ubhayavacanaṃ no bhagavatā vattabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:604_8: Nissayadhammānaṃ āyattabhāvena pavattito pathaviyādīnaṃ nissayānaṃ bhāve sati tassa
tika-abh08t0:604_9: lakkhaṇattayassa bhāvato, tasmā khaṃpupphaṃva taṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ na natthi, atthīti
tika-abh08t0:604_10: attho. Pathavīādīnaṃ abhāve taṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ na ca labbhati yasmā, tasmā nibbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:605_0: 724-5. Paricchedādayo anipphannā. Tesameva ca rūpānaṃ tesameva nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:605_1: vikārattā nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā sesavasena vuttānaṃ pabhedakatoti dassanato. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-abh08t0:611_0: Yo bhikkhu abhidhamme piṭake dhammasenāpatinā samattaṃ sabhāvaṃ gantuṃ pāpuṇituṃ
tika-abh08t0:611_1: iccheyya, tena ca bhikkhunā hitatthinā sakkaccaṃ ādarena sammā tīraṇacintanasajjhāyanehi
tika-abh08t0:617_0: 769. Bhavābhavaṃ vinanatoti khuddakaṃ, mahantaṃ bhavaṃ sibbanato. Sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggoti
tika-abh08t0:617_2: Nibbānaṃ puṭṭhenāti sugatena nibbānaṃ puṭṭhena sāriputtattherena. Ubhinnaṃ suttānanti
tika-abh08t0:617_3: dhammasenāpativuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ suttānanti attho. Khayassa upanissayattāti khayassa
tika-abh08t0:617_4: balavakāraṇattā. Puthūnaṃ dhammānaṃ appamattakkhaṇe rāgādikkhayamattaṃ nibbānaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:617_5: Sabbe bālaputhujjanā samadhigatanibbānā sacchikatanirodhā bhaveyyuṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo
tika-abh08t0:617_6: kiṃ uttari kāraṇañca atthīti attho. Rāgādīnaṃ saṅkhatattā tesaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:617_7: saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ bhaveyya. Kiṃ panetthāti etesu khaṇesu kiṃ pana khaṇe tvaṃ vadesi.
tika-abh08t0:617_8: Khīṇesvevāti bhavādīsu khīṇesu eva. Niruttaroti nipphannahāro.
tika-abh08t0:618: 771. Assaddhoti bāhirasaddhāya virahito. Vantāsoti vantā vamitā āsā taṇhā yenāti vantāso.
tika-abh08t0:619_0: Nissaraṇiyāti nissaraṇe niyuttā. Yadidaṃ nekkhammaṃ yaṃ idaṃ kāmānaṃ etaṃ nissaraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:619_1: nirodho, tassa kiñcibhūtassa saṅkhatassa paṭiccasamuppannadhammajātassa nirodho nissaraṇanti,
tika-abh08t0:619_2: evaṃ iminā pakārena vuttassa tassa nissaraṇanāmakassa abhāvappattidosato nissaraṇanāmakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:619_3: paṭhamajjhānaākāsānañcāyatanānampi abhāvo bhaveyya. Atthi nissaraṇanti atthi nibbānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:622_2: sāraññu jinasāsanasāraññū vimhāpanaṃ accherakaraṃ imaṃ evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:622_3: yo jānāti, so jano gambhīre nipuṇe nipuṇañāṇagocare abhidhammapiṭake padaṃ niṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:628: Saṅkhāyatīti saṅkhā, kathīyatīti attho. Kinti kiṃ iti kathīyati. “Aha”nti “mama”nti kathīyati.
tika-abh08t0:629: Tajjāpaññattīti tassa cakkhusotādikassa anurūpavasena jātā paññattīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:630: Ekassavāti ekassa nāmadhammassa “accho”ti nāmaṃ gahetvā bahūnaṃ nāmadhammānaṃ “accho”ti nāmaṃ gahetvā. Samūhamevāti nāmadhammānaṃ samūhaṃ eva.
tika-abh08t0:631: Gahito pubbe saṅketo etenāti gahitapubbasaṅketaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Manodvārāvajjanajavanaviññāṇaṃ. Tena gahitāya paññattiyā viññāyati “sattā”ti “kammajā”ti kathīyati.
tika-abh08t0:632: Itthī ca puriso ca itthipurisā, te ādayo yesaṃ te itthipurisādayo, tesaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:639_0: Vedakassāti sukhadukkhavedakassa. Tadāyattavuttīnanti tesaṃ āyattā paṭibaddhā yesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:639_1: vipākānaṃ te tadāyattavuttino, tesaṃ. Atra imasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyena parihāro vuccate.
tika-abh08t0:639_2: Kutoyaṃ tava tatthānurodhoti tattha tasmiṃ aññassa attakārakassa abhāvepi sattusaṅkhātassa
tika-abh08t0:639_3: attano bhāvepi ayaṃ tava anurodho anunayo kuto kena kāraṇena idha imasmiṃ asati kattari
tika-abh08t0:639_4: kusalādīnaṃ atthibhāve kammavirodho kuto kena kāraṇena. Athāpīti aparo nayopi. Kiñcetthāti
tika-abh08t0:639_5: ettha etissaṃ codanāyaṃ kiñci vattabbaṃ atthi, avasiṭṭhaṃ tāva brūhi, aparisamattā
tika-abh08t0:639_6: te codanā. Tassāti attano. Kārakavedakattābhāvoti kārakavedakattassa abhāvo siyā.
tika-abh08t0:640_0: Atha na bhavatīti attano anāse cetanāpi anāso yadi na bhavati. Paṭiññā hīnāti “cetanāya
tika-abh08t0:640_1: anañño attā”ti paṭiññā hīnā. Vuttappakāratoti “attano anāse cetanāya nāso na bhavati”iti
tika-abh08t0:640_2: vuttappakārato. Viparītanti “attano anāse cetanāya anāso”iti viparītaggahaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:640_3: Attā nassatu, cetanā tiṭṭhatu, atha pana evaṃ na bhavatīti attā nassatu, cetanā tiṭṭhatu,
tika-abh08t0:640_4: evaṃ gahaṇaṃ pana na bhavati. Anaññattapakkhaṃ pariccaja pariccajāhi “cetanāya anañño
tika-abh08t0:640_5: attā”ti. Paṭiññā hīnā yassa so paṭiññāhīno.
tika-abh08t0:641_0: Ubhinnaṃ cetanattānaṃ ekadesatā ekadesabhāvo natthi. Evañca satīti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:641_1: ekadesassa abhāve sati ko doso iti tvaṃ ce vadeyyāsi. Yaṃ pana tayā vuttaṃ yathā
tika-abh08t0:641_2: rūparasagandhādīnaṃ ekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattanti yaṃ vacanaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:641_3: tayā vuttaṃ, taṃ vacanaṃ ayuttaṃ, nānurūpanti attho. Tava paṭiññā hīnāti “ekadese
tika-abh08t0:641_4: vattamānānaṃ cetanattānaṃ lakkhaṇato aññatta”nti paṭiññā hīnā.
