tika-abh08t0:642: Evañca satīti etaṃ cetanāya aññabhāve sati ko doso iti ce bhavaṃ vadeyya. “Acetano attā”ti vacanaṃ, pubbe vuttadosatoti “pākāratarupāsāṇatiṇasadiso siyā”ti pubbe vuttadosato.
tika-abh08t0:645: 783. Ekassa puggalassa aṭṭhisañcayo aṭṭhisamūho ekena kappena pabbatasamo rāsi siyā.
tika-abh08t0:646: 785. Bho māra, tvaṃ satto iti paccesi, kaṃ saddahasi, “satto”ti gahaṇaṃ te tava diṭṭhigataṃ, suddhasaṅkhārapuñjo ayaṃ, idha loke satto na upalabbhati.
tika-abh08t0:647: 787. Yo bhikkhu imaṃ ganthaṃ accantaṃ satatampi cinteti, tassa bhikkhuno paramā paññā vepulaṃ vipulabhāvaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh08t0:648_0: 788. Yo bhikkhu imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ atimatikaraṃ uttamaṃ abhiññāṇakaraṃ vimativināsakaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:648_1: kaṅkhacchedakaraṃ piyakkaraṃ pemakaraṃ sadā paṭhati, suṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno mati
tika-abh08t0:654_0: 789-93. Hitānayanti hitāvahaṃ. Mānasañca sugatanti suṭṭhu pavattamānasañca. Madhurā
tika-abh08t0:654_1: atthavaṇṇanā etassāti madhuratthavaṇṇanaṃ. Uttaraṃ tu manussānaṃ, dhammato ñāṇadassananti
tika-abh08t0:654_3: saṅkāya kaṅkhāya saritabbasamācāre. Acchiddaṃ akkhaṇḍaṃ akammāsaṃ. Atthakāmenāti attano hitakāmena.
tika-abh08t0:659: 809-10. Maraṇūpasamāyuttā satīti maraṇānussati upasamānussati. Āhāranissitasaññāti āhāre paṭikūlasaññā. Dhātuvavatthānanti catudhātuvavatthānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:660_0: 811-2. Anukūlā ime sabba-caritānanti vaṇṇitāti yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ saddhācaritassa anukūlaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:660_1: tameva paññācaritassa anukūlanti adhippāyo. Idaṃ sabbaṃ pana vacanaṃ ekantavipaccanīkabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:660_2: ekantapaṭipakkhabhāvato atisappāyato vuttaṃ, iti vibhāvinā ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:661: 835. Vipassanābhavasampatti-sukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ vipassanāsampattisukhānaṃ bhavasampattisukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:662: 838. Sammaṭṭhānaṃ manobhunoti manobhuhadayo tassa hadayassa sammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:664: 845. Saṃhārimanti ito cito ca haritabbakasiṇaṃ. Tatraṭṭhakanti tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ ito cito ca anāharitabbaṃ kasiṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:665: 849. Vivaṭṭaṃ pana micchatāti nibbānaṃ icchantena vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ vaṭṭaṃ kātuṃ taṃ kasiṇaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:666: 851-2. Hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ, tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalāti tato kasiṇamaṇḍalato hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ padese vidatthicaturaṅgule ucce. Parimukhaṃ satinti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ.
tika-abh08t0:667: 853-4. Nekkhammanti jhānaṃ. Khemato daṭṭhuṃ disvā ahaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā addhā ekantena pavivekasukhassa nibbānasukhassa bhāgī assaṃ bhaveyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:668: 856. So kasiṇassa vaṇṇo tena yoginā na pekkhitabbo, kasiṇassa lakkhaṇaṃ na pekkhitabbaṃ ussadassa vasena vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā.
tika-abh08t0:669_0: 860. Evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena ekaggacetaso ekaggacittassa yogino nimīletvā āvajjantassa
tika-abh08t0:669_1: yathā yena pakārena kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti ummīlite kālepi, tathā tena pakārena taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:669_2: āpāthaṃ yāti ce yadi āgacchati, uggahameva uggahanimittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:672: 866. Samannāharitabbanti kammaṭṭhānaṃ sumanena āharitabbaṃ, manasikātabbanti attho. Takkāhaṭanti vitakkena āhaṭaṃ phusitaṃ kare kareyya.
tika-abh08t0:674_0: 871-4. Imassāti paṭibhāganimittassa. Purimassāti uggahanimittassa. Ko pana ayaṃ viseso?
tika-abh08t0:674_1: Thavikā nīharitaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ majjitaṃ viya. Toyade kāḷameghe setabalākā viya.
tika-abh08t0:674_2: Tadā taṃ uggahanimittaṃ padāletvāva niggataṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Tato uggahanimittato.
tika-abh08t0:674_3: Tanti taṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Saṇṭhānavantañca vaṇṇavantañca na ca upaṭṭhākāramattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:675: 877-8. Upacārakkhaṇe tassāti tassa samādhino upacārakkhaṇe. Nīvaraṇappahānena samādhino paṭilābhakkhaṇe pana aṅgānaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ pātubhāvena iti dvīhi ākārehi.
tika-abh08t0:677: 882. Cakkavattiyagabbhova ratanaṃ viya assa anena sudullabhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:679: 891-2. Samataṃ vīriyassevāti vīriyasamabhāvaṃ. Layaṃ līnabhāvaṃ īsakampi yantaṃ gacchantaṃ mānasaṃ āvajjanacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:680_0: 895-9. Bhavaṅgaṃ pana pacchijja ucchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
tika-abh08t0:680_1: yogino manodvāramhi jāyati. Tatoti āvajjanato tatrevārammaṇe tasmiṃ pathavīkasiṇasaṅkhāte
tika-abh08t0:680_2: ārammaṇe tassa yogino javanāni cattāri vā pañca vā jāyante. Avasāne ekaṃ javanamānasaṃ
tika-abh08t0:680_3: rūpāvacarikaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ rūpāvacarike vitakkādayo aṅgā. Aññehi aññesaṃ cittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:680_4: aññehi vitakkādīhi balavatarā honti. Tāni appanābhāvaṃ appattāni appanācetaso parikammopacārato
tika-abh08t0:680_5: parikammabhāvato parikammānīti vuccante, upacārabhāvato upacārānīti ca vuccante.
tika-abh08t0:680_6: Tāni javanāni appanāyānulomattā anulomāni eva ca vuccanti. Ettha anulomakesu yaṃ
tika-abh08t0:682_0: 904-5. Purimehi javanehi yaṃ āsevanaṃ, taṃ balavapaccayaṃ laddhā labhitvā chaṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:682_1: javanaṃ, sattamaṃ vā javanaṃ appeti. Iti vacanaṃ pavuccati, ettha vāde godatto nāma
tika-abh08t0:682_2: ābhidhammiko ācariyo āha. Chinnataṭe mukhaṃ yassa chinnataṭamukho.
tika-abh08t0:684: 911-2. Kāmacchandassa nānāvisaye paluddhassa. Cetaso ekasmiṃ visaye samādhānena samādhi.
tika-abh08t0:685: 915. Sayañca atisantato sukhaṃ avūpasantasabhāvassa uddhaccakukkuccadvayassa paṭipakkhato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:687: 920-1. Vepullanti kammaṭṭhānassa vipulabhāvaṃ. Tañca paṭibhāganimittaṃ upacāraṃ vicāretvā vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:688_0: 928-31. Pamādayoginoti pamādavasena yogisampannassa kāmasahagatā saññāmanakkārā manasikārā
tika-abh08t0:688_1: ce caranti, tassa yogino taṃ jhānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ hoti. Sati santiṭṭhate tasmiṃ, santā
tika-abh08t0:688_2: tadanudhammatā tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhāne tadanudhammatā tassa paṭhamajjhānassa anurūpā
tika-abh08t0:688_3: sati nikanti santā saṃvijjamānā santiṭṭhate santiṭṭhati, taṃ jhānaṃ mandassa yogino
tika-abh08t0:688_4: ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ hoti, ṭhitiṃ bhajati. Visesabhāgiyaṃ hoti, visesaṃ dutiyādibhāvanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:688_5: pāpuṇātīti attho. Nibbidāsaṃyutā saññā, manakkārāti nibbidāvipassanāsaṃyuttā saññāmanakkārā.
tika-abh08t0:689: 933. Ayaṃ samāpatti āsannākusalārayo āsannākusalārikā yasmā takkacārānaṃ thūlattā ca, tasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ samāpatti aṅgadubbalā.
tika-abh08t0:692: 938. Nimittaṃ tu tadeva cāti tameva paṭhamanimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”iti evaṃ manasā karontassa.
tika-abh08t0:695: 948. Pīti nāma cetaso cittassa uppilāpanaṃ uppilāpitattaṃ yato yasmā kāraṇā.
tika-abh08t0:696_0: 961-2. Āsannapītidosāti pītiyeva dosā. Ettha etasmiṃ tatiyajjhāne yadeva yaṃ eva
tika-abh08t0:696_1: sukhaṃ iti evaṃ sukhaṃ cetaso ābhogo manasikāro. Evaṃ iminā pakārena sukhassa thūlattā
tika-abh08t0:697: 974-5. Sukhaṃ upekkhāya āsevanaṃ pana na hoti yasmā upekkhāya āsevanaṃ pana na hoti, yasmā upekkhāsahagatāni javanāni javanti, tasmā catutthajjhānaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ samudīritaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:699_0: 979. Ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro sumadhuravarataravacano kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati, atinisitavisado
tika-abh08t0:699_1: buddhippacāro yassa so atinisitavisadabuddhippacāro, so tena janena vedanīyo jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:705: 982-3. Rūpe kho vijjamānasminti rūpakāye vijjamāne daṇḍādānādayo daṇḍaggahaṇādayo. Iti rūpe rūpakāye ādīnavaṃ disvā.
tika-abh08t0:706: 984. Sūkarābhihatova sāti sūkaraṃ anubandhito sā sunakho viya.
tika-abh08t0:708_0: 988-990. Phuṭṭhokāsañca tena tanti tena cittena phuṭṭhaṃ tamokāsaṃ “ananto ākāso”iti
tika-abh08t0:708_1: ca manasā karonto eva ugghāṭeti. Iti vacanaṃ vuccate, ayamañño nayo, “ākāso” iti
tika-abh08t0:708_2: manasā karonto taṃ kasiṇaṃ na saṃvelleti.
tika-abh08t0:710: 1004. Ākāsaphuṭaviññāṇeti phuṭameva viññāṇaṃ phuṭaviññāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ ākāsārammaṇe phuṭaviññāṇe.
tika-abh08t0:711_0: 1005-6. Ayaṃ ākāso ananto iti evaṃ taṃ ākāsameva pharitvā pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañca
tika-abh08t0:711_1: iti vacanaṃ vuccate. Viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ nāma na hoti, anantārammaṇattā “viññāṇaṃ ananta”nti
tika-abh08t0:711_2: vuccate, taṃ viññāṇaṃ manakkāravasena api anantaṃ paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:712: 1010. Paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvo tassa eva paṭhamāruppassa suññato suññabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:713: 1013. Sati tiṭṭhati bhiyyo balavā sati tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:715: 1017-8. Dutiyāruppacakkhunāti cakkhunā dutiyāruppaṃ “natthi natthī”tiādinā ākārena parikammavasena manakkāre. Tassāpagamamattañca tassa paṭhamāruppassa apagamamattañca.
tika-abh08t0:716: 1029. Yā nāma ayaṃ samāpatti abhāvamattampi gocaraṃ katvā ṭhassati, ayaṃ samāpatti vata ekantena aho santāti padissati.
tika-abh08t0:717: 1033. Yāya saññāya nevasaññī, nāsaññī ca hoti, kevalaṃ ekantena atha kho sā saññā edisī na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:718_0: 1035-7. Paṭusaññāya kiccassa neva karaṇato ayaṃ samāpatti “nevasaññā”ti niddiṭṭhāti
tika-abh08t0:718_1: catutthaāruppato sambhavā pavattā tejodhātu sukhodake dahanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti
tika-abh08t0:720_0: 1041. Yo pana bhikkhu imaṃ rūpārūpajjhānasamāpattividhānaṃ sārataraṃ jānāti, so rūpārūpajjhānasamāpattipurekkho
tika-abh08t0:720_1: sekkho bhavaṃ kāmabhavaṃ abhibhuyya abhibhavitvā rūpārūpaṃ yāti pāpuṇāti.
tika-abh08t0:727: 1047. Yogāvacarabhikkhunā nibbattitāsu abhiññāsu assa yogāvacarassa bhikkhuno samādhibhāvanā niṭṭhaṃ pariyosānaṃ gatā siyā.
tika-abh08t0:728: 1050. Danteti dante ṭhite. Acaleti acale ṭhite.
tika-abh08t0:729_0: 1052-4. Abhiññāya pādakaṃ kāraṇaṃ abhiññāpādakaṃ yogī sataṃ vāpi sahassaṃ vāpi yadi
tika-abh08t0:729_1: sace icchati, abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato abhiññāpādakajhānato vuṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:729_2: vuṭṭhahitvā “sataṃ homi, sataṃ homi” iti evaṃ kāmāvacaraparikammamānasaṃ katvā abhiññāya
tika-abh08t0:729_3: pādakaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ punādhiṭṭhāti puna āpajjitvā tato jhānato vuṭṭhāya puna
tika-abh08t0:729_4: adhiṭṭhāti, sahādhiṭṭhānena cetasā adhiṭṭhānasaṅkhātena catutthajjhānacittena saha
tika-abh08t0:730: 1067-8. Eso adhigatābhiñño yogī pādakārammaṇena catutthajjhānassa paṭibhāganimittasaṅkhātena ārammaṇena phuṭṭhe okāse gate pavatte pana sadde suṇāti. Dibbasotañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:731: 1069. Parassa cittaṃ pariyati paricchijjatīti cetopariyaṃ, tameva mānasaṃ cetopariyamānasaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:732: 1070. Hadayaṃ pana nissāyāti hadayavatthuṃ nissāya pavattamānalohitaṃ, hadayakose pavattaṃ ruhiranti attho.
tika-abh08t0:733_1: sattānaṃ mānasañca. Kiṃ bhūtaṃ? Sarāgādippabhedakaṃ mānasaṃ sabbaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:734_0: 1077-82. Nisajjā sabbapacchimāti sabbesaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ pacchā jātā nisajjā bhikkhunā
tika-abh08t0:734_1: āvajjitabbā. Tato pabhuti tato sabbapacchimato nisajjāto pabhuti taṃ sabbaṃ pacchimanisajjaṃ
tika-abh08t0:734_2: ādiṃ katvā paṭilomakkamā paṭilomakkamena sabbaṃ attanā kataṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Asmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:734_3: bhave yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ sandhi paṭisandhi hoti, tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ kataṃ kiriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:734_4: tena bhikkhunā āvajjitabbaṃ. Purimasmiṃ bhavepi cutikkhaṇepi nibbattaṃ nāmarūpañca
tika-abh08t0:734_5: sādhukaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Cutikkhaṇe nibbatte tasmiṃ nāmarūpe evaṃ bhikkhunā āvajjitabbe
tika-abh08t0:734_6: yadā tadeva tameva nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cutikkhaṇe manodvāre manakkāro manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:735_0: 1086-96. Abhiññāpādakaṃ kasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā imesu tīsu
tika-abh08t0:735_1: kasiṇesu katapuññehi. Tasmā tamitaraṃ vāpīti ālokakasiṇaṃ vā itaraṃ vāpi kasiṇadvayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:735_2: yathākkamaṃ uppādetvā upacārabhūmiyaṃyeva ṭhatvā taṃ ālokakasiṇaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Appanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:735_3: paṇḍito na uppādeyya, sace uppādeti, taṃ ālokakasiṇaṃ pādakajjhānanissitaṃ pādakajjhānassa
tika-abh08t0:735_4: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Vaḍḍhitassa jhānassa antogadhaṃ rūpaṃ tena yoginā passitabbaṃ bhave
tika-abh08t0:735_5: bhaveyya. Taṃ rūpaṃ passato passantassa tassa yogino parikammassa vāro atikkamati,
tika-abh08t0:735_6: tāvade tasmiṃyeva khaṇe ālokopi tassa yogino ālokopi khippaṃ antaradhāyati. Tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:735_7: āloke antarahite rūpagataṃ rūpaṃ na dissati. Divasampi nisīditvā passato rūpadassanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:736: 1100-1. Taṃcittasaṃyutanti tena catutthajjhānena yuttaṃ cittaṃ. Anāgataṃsañāṇassa parikammaṃ, yathākammūpagassa ñāṇassa ca parikammaṃ. Dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:737_0: 1103. Yo bhikkhu idha imasmiṃ sāsane imaṃ pana ganthaṃ suṇāti, citte karoti ca, so
tika-abh08t0:737_1: bhikkhu anena tarena iminā ganthena taritvā abhidhammamahaṇṇavapāraṃ yāti pāpuṇāti, jānātīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:743_0: 1104. Anāgataṃsañāṇañcāti na āgato anāgato, na tāva sampattoti attho, anāgate aṃsā
tika-abh08t0:743_1: koṭṭhāsā tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ yathākammaṃ, taṃ upagacchati
tika-abh08t0:744_0: 1107-9. Tattha tesu ārammaṇattikesu. Cittasannissitaṃ katvāti taṃ kāyaṃ cittaṃ sannissitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:744_1: karitvā tameva kāyacittacetasikavasena mahaggate cittasmiṃ samāropeti ñāṇaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:744_2: tato kāyārammaṇato kāyassa parittattā kāmāvacarattā parittārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:745_0: 1110-3. Dissamānena kāyena, gantukāmo yadā bhave yo yogī dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo
tika-abh08t0:745_1: yadā bhaveyya, so yogī tadā cittaṃ kāyasannissitaṃ katvā rūpakāye sannissitaṃ katvā
tika-abh08t0:745_2: taṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ kāyavasena kāye āropeti, tadā jhānārammaṇato taṃ ñāṇaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:745_3: hoti, yaṃ ñāṇaṃ yadā anāgatañca dhammajātaṃ, atītañca dhammajātaṃ visayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:745_4: karoti, tadā taṃ ñāṇaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ hoti, tadā anāgatārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇakāle
tika-abh08t0:745_5: anāgatagocaraṃ hoti. Dissamānena kāyena tassa bhikkhuno gamane pana sati tassa yogino
tika-abh08t0:745_6: ñāṇassa gocaro paccuppanno nāma hoti, iti viniddise.
tika-abh08t0:746_0: 1114. Kāyaṃ cittassa vasena citte āropeti, cittaṃ kāyassa vasena kāye āropeti, iti
tika-abh08t0:746_1: pariṇāmanakālasmiṃ tassa yogino ñāṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ siyā. Sampavattati sattasūti
tika-abh08t0:748: 1122. Etassa cetopariyañāṇassa maggārammaṇatā pariyāyena eva matā ñātā.
tika-abh08t0:750_0: Tattha tesu paccuppannesu yaṃ paccuppannaṃ khaṇādikaṃ tikkhaṇasampattaṃ uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇasampattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:750_1: khaṇādikaṃ khaṇāyeva taṃ khaṇāvayavaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma. Ekadvesantativārapariyāpannanti
tika-abh08t0:751_0: 1131-2. Yena āvajjanacittena dhamme āvajjati, yena cetasā jānāti, tesaṃ dvinnaṃ āvajjanajavanacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:751_2: avassaṃ pana vijjhati”iti pariyosānaṃ vacanaṃ na yujjati. Āvajjanajavanānaṃ nānārammaṇabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:751_3: pattito āpajjanato ca na yujjati. Aniṭṭhe pana ṭhāne tesaṃ āvajjanajavanānaṃ ekārammaṇabhāve
tika-abh08t0:751_4: anicchite tasmiṃ ṭhāne na yujjati, aññasmiṃ pana ṭhāne maggavīthiyaṃ āvajjanaparikammajavanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:751_5: kasiṇādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, gotrabhulokuttaracittānañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:752_0: 1134-41. “Ekabbhavaparicchinnaṃ, paccuppannanti pacchima”nti vatvā puna aññena pariyāyena
tika-abh08t0:752_1: taṃ paccuppannaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ addhākhyaṃ addhānāma paccuppannaṃ javanavārato dīpetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:752_2: Iti vacanaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ. Yadā iddhimā yogī parassa cittaṃ ñātuṃ āvajjati, tassa āvajjanamano
tika-abh08t0:752_3: paccuppannakhaṇavhayaṃ paccuppannaṃ manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā tena cittena
tika-abh08t0:752_4: saddhiṃ nirujjhati, tesu niruddhesu tassa yogino cattāri, pañca vā javanāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:752_5: Etesaṃ catunnaṃ, pañcannaṃ javanānaṃ yaṃ pacchimaṃ cittaṃ iddhicittamudīritaṃ. Iddhicittato
tika-abh08t0:752_6: sesāni kāmāvacaracittāni. Etesaṃ kāmāvacare iddhijavanānaṃ tadeva ca paracittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:752_7: hoti yasmā, tasmā sabbāni tāni javanāni ekārammaṇataṃ yanti, tesaṃ javanānaṃ nānārammaṇatā
tika-abh08t0:752_8: addhāvasā na bhaveyya, paccuppannārammaṇato tesaṃ javanānaṃ ekārammaṇabhāvepi iddhimānasameva
tika-abh08t0:752_9: ca parassa cittaṃ jānāti. Itarāni kāmāvacarāni pana cittāni parassa cittaṃ na jānanti.
tika-abh08t0:752_10: Yathā cakkhudvāre tu viññāṇanti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ passati, tathā itaraṃ cittaṃ na passati.
tika-abh08t0:753: 1161. Anāgataṃsañāṇassāti anāgataṃsañāṇassa anāgataṃ dhammaṃ agocaraṃ, gocaraṃ na hotiyevāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:754: 1169. Vividhatthāni vaṇṇapadāni yasmiṃ so vividhatthavaṇṇapado, taṃ madhuratthamatinīharaṃ uttamaṃ sotujanassa hadayaṃ pītikaraṃ sacetano ko nāma manujo na suṇeyya.
tika-abh08t0:760: 1175. Yā sañjānanamattaṃva, saññā nīlādito panāti sā saññā nīlādivasena sañjānanamattaṃva karoti. Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhanti aniccādilakkhaṇapaṭibujjhanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:761: 1177. Taṃ viññāṇaṃ ussakkitvā uddhaṃ sakkaṃ katvā satte maggaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:762: 1178-9. Sabbesaṃ pana dhammānaṃ sabhāvapaṭivedhanaṃ aviparītavasena paṭibujjhanaṃ paññāya lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:764: 1181. Lakkhaṇenekadhāti sabbadhammaṃ paṭibujjhanalakkhaṇena paññāva ekadhā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:765: 1183. Bhūripaññenāti bhūte atthe aviparīte atthe ramatīti bhūri, bhūri paññā etassāti bhūripañño, tena.
tika-abh08t0:766_0: 1186-91. Tīsu atthadhammaniruttīsu ca ñāṇesu atthadhammaniruttīsu jātesu ñāṇesu ca
tika-abh08t0:766_1: ñāṇaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ phalaṃ dhammajātaṃ. Bhāsitatthoti pāḷiyā attho. Ete
tika-abh08t0:766_2: pañca dhammā atthasaññitā atthanāmakā. Phalanibbattako hetūti jananako paccayo. Bhāsitanti
tika-abh08t0:766_3: pāḷi. Dhammasaññitāti dhammanāmakā. Sabhāvaniruttīti aviparītavohāro. Pariyattīti
tika-abh08t0:769: 1203. Ekāsītiyā cittenāti lokuttaracittavajjitena vipassanābhūmibhūtena ekāsītiyā cittena.
tika-abh08t0:779: 1231. Iccevamādibāttiṃsakoṭṭhāsānaṃ paccayassa hetupaccaye tāva yogī manasā pariggaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:780: 1233. Hetvaṅkurassa bījaṃ tu bījaṃ aṅkurassa hetujanakaṃ, pathavādayo aṅkurassa paccayā.
tika-abh08t0:782: 1235. Kammaṃ puttassa janako pitā viya nāmarūpassa janakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:784: 1240. Yā sāti yā sā kaṅkhā. Pubbante pubbakoṭṭhāse.
tika-abh08t0:785: 1241. Sabbathā sabbakoṭṭhāsato anavasesāva tassa yogino sā kaṅkhā pahiyyati nāsīyate.
tika-abh08t0:787: Taṃ vipākanti upaghātakakammassa taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ eko yogī kammavipākavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
tika-abh08t0:788: 1246. Hetuphalassa sambandhavasenāti hetuphalasambandhavasena idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ kevalaṃ ekantena pavattati, iti sammā aviparītākārena saṃ anupassati.
tika-abh08t0:789: 1247. Pākappavattito uddhaṃ pākapaṭivedakaṃ na passati na jāniyate.
tika-abh08t0:790_0: 1250-1. Appavatti nāma na dissati, upapannaṃ dissati. Titthiyā etamatthaṃ anaññāya
tika-abh08t0:790_1: ajānitvā asayaṃvasī sattasaññanti “satto”ti saññaṃ gahetvāna sassataucchedadassino
tika-abh08t0:791: 1254. Ubhoti ubho kammavipākā aññamaññato suññā. Na ca kammaṃ vinā phalanti kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ na ca hoti.
tika-abh08t0:801: 1266-8. Uppajjato uppajjantassa nāmarūpadhammassa rāsito nicayato āgamanañca natthi. Disāgamananti disāya gamanaṃ. Niruddhassāpi nāmarūpadhammassa ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nicayoti ca natthi.
tika-abh08t0:802_0: 1270-1. Avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho. Taṇhāsamudayā rūpasamudayo,
tika-abh08t0:802_1: taṇhānirodhā rūpanirodho. Kammasamudayā rūpasamudayo, kammanirodhā rūpanirodho. Āhāranirodhā
tika-abh08t0:803: 1280. Sampattapaṭivedhassāti sampattalokuttarasaṅkhātamaggaphalassa sotāpannādipuggalassa. Vippaṭipannassāti paṭipattiyaṃ appaṭipannassa, viruddhavasena paṭipannassa vā.
tika-abh08t0:805: 1290. Yato yato paccayādito. Yaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ vijānataṃ vijānantānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ, tehi labhitabbaṃ amataṃ, amataṃ viya pītipāmojjaṃ vā.
tika-abh08t0:806: 1293. Appatteti attani maggaphalasmiṃ appatte. Pattasaññīti maggaphale ahaṃ patto asmi iti saññito hoti.
tika-abh08t0:807: 1297. Sāravedinoti sārajānanasīlā. Tanti taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ. Idaṃ ñāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassananti maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:815: 1306. Ayaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā eva saccānulomañāṇaṃ nāma pavuccati.
tika-abh08t0:816: 1309. Bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhāru-pekkhāgatanayenāti bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātena ñāṇena katanayena.
tika-abh08t0:817_0: 1314-6. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ, uddhañca anulomatoti uddhaṃ vattamānānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:817_1: anulomato, idaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pariyosānaṃ nāma bhāsitaṃ mahesinā
tika-abh08t0:817_2: kathitaṃ. Saccānulomañāṇaṃ āhacca uppannā, sabbappakārena gotrabhupariyosānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:824_0: 1319-22. Āvajjanassa hitaṃ āvajjaniyaṃ, taṃ ṭhānaṃ etassāti āvajjaniyaṭhānaṃ, gotrabhūti
tika-abh08t0:824_1: attho. Taṃ gotrabhucittaṃ maggacittassa āvajjaniyaṭhānattā. Paṭipadāñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:824_2: kudācanaṃ na ca bhajati, tatheva ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ kudācanaṃ na bhajateva. Ubhinnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:824_3: ñāṇānaṃ antarā ekaṃ abbohārikaṃ vohāre niyuttanti vohārikaṃ, na vohārikaṃ abbohārikaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:824_4: Vipassanāya sotasmiṃ vipassanāya sote patitattā vipassanā nāma voharitabbā. Tato nibbānato.
tika-abh08t0:826_0: 1326-9. Visaṅkhāranti saṅkhārehi vigataṃ. Paṭhamāvajjanañcevāti paṭhamāvajjanaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:826_1: Paṭhamābhogatāpi cāti paṭhamamanasikārā viya. Maggassa anantarādīhi paccayehi. Tassāti
tika-abh08t0:826_2: maggassa. Sikhāpattāya tāya vipassanāya muddhamhi matthake. Anāvattanti anivattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:827_0: 1330-3. Ekena āvajjanena ekissāyeva vīthiyā. Anulomagotrabhucetasanti anulomagotrabhucittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:827_1: nānārammaṇatā vuttā. Taṃ gotrabhucittaṃ anāvajjanampi maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā.
tika-abh08t0:827_2: Saññaṃ datvā viyāti “ahaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karomi, tvampi tamevārammaṇaṃ karohi”
tika-abh08t0:827_3: iti saññaṃ datvā viyāti adhippāyo. Saññitanti saññaṃ. Kadācipi anibbiddhapubbaṃ maggo
tika-abh08t0:829: 1338. Anekesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ dāyakena ādimaggena saṃyuttaṃ. Paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:830_0: 1341. Ekassāsevanaṃ natthi ekassa cittuppādassa āsevanapaccayo natthi, tasmā kāraṇā
tika-abh08t0:830_1: dve cittuppādā anulomakā. Tehīti cittuppādehi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhā labhitvā tatiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:831_0: 1345-7. Maggapekkhanahetu yassa āvajjanamanaso, taṃ maggapekkhanahetukaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:831_1: niruddheti tasmiṃ āvajjanacitte niruddhe maggassa paccavekkhaṇasaññitāni satta javanāni
tika-abh08t0:840: 1375. Idha pana imasmiṃ panādhikāre kāraṇūpacārena lābhādikāraṇassa vohārena, lābho ādi vatthu yassa anunayassāti lābhādivatthuko, tassa.
tika-abh08t0:842: 1376. Yena yena paṭhamamaggādiñāṇena yo yo saṃyojanādiko pahātabbo dhammo ghātaṃ vināsaṃ yāti, so so dhammo tena tena asesena ñāṇena evaṃ sādhu mayā sandassito.
tika-abh08t0:843: 1383. Pariññābhisamayenāti paricchinditvā jānanena. Dukkhaṃ abhisametīti dukkhaṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-abh08t0:844_0: 1394. Yo yogī imaṃ viditvā hitabhāvanaṃ vanaṃ vanetabbaṃ viditvā jānitvā ve ekantena
tika-abh08t0:844_1: sukhasaṃhitaṃ hitaṃ upeti, cittassa tamaṃ anuttamaṃ hīnaṃ vidhūya vināsetvā aviggahakampadaṃ
tika-abh08t0:844_2: padaṃ aviggahakaṃ sarīrarahitaṃ padaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ ñātabbaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ upeti pāpuṇāti ca.
tika-abh08t0:850: 1395. Rūpaṃ rūpassāti rūpaṃ rūpassa. Arūpassa nāmassa.
tika-abh08t0:853: 1399. Ekoti kammapaccayo. Dvekālikoti atītapaccuppannakālavasena dvīsu kālesu niyutto. Dassitoti bhagavatā desito.
tika-abh08t0:858_0: 1401. Sumatimativicārabodhanoti sumatīnaṃ sundarapaññānaṃ kavīnaṃ matiyā vicārassa
tika-abh08t0:858_1: bodhano. Vimativimohavināsanoti vimatīnaṃ bālānaṃ vimohassa vināsano. Kumatimatimahātamonāsoti
tika-abh08t0:858_2: kumatīnaṃ bālānaṃ mahātamasannibhāya matiyā nāsako. Paṭumatibhāsakaroti paṭūnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:859_0: 1402. Sumatināmako bhikkhu asamānato asadisāya pūjāya mama āyācito yato yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:859_1: tato tasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro. Padāto padāti koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsato. Hitavibhāvanā
tika-abh08t0:859_2: bhāvanāti hitappakāsanāya bhāvanāya mayā racito. Atha vā ahaṃ sumatinā bhikkhunā
tika-abh08t0:859_3: asamānato mānato āyācito yato yasmā, tato tasmā.
tika-abh08t0:860: 1405. Tividhā byappathānañhi gatiyoti byappathānaṃ vacanānaṃ atthaganthayuttivasena tividhā gatiyo.
tika-abh08t0:861: 1406. Nikāyantaraladdhīhīti aññasmiṃ nikāye laddhīhi. Vācanāmagganissitoti vacanappabandhanissito.
tika-abh08t0:866: 1414. Sallekhāti sallekhavutti. Sākhalyeti sakhilabhāve. Satāti satisampannena.
tika-abh08t0:891_3: hi atthato paṇāmakiriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā. Sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi
tika-abh08t0:891_7: rāgādimalavikkhālanena ca cittasantānaṃ parisodhetvā tannissitāya paññāya yathādhippetasiddhisampādakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:891_8: tikkhavisadabhāvamāvahati. Kiñci āciṇṇametaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ, yadidaṃ ganthasamārambhe
tika-abh08t0:891_10: āraddhāti evamādinā aññānipi bahūni payojanāni niddhāretabbāni. Tāni pana tattha
tika-abh08t0:891_11: tattha bahudhā vitthāritānīti taṃ papañcaparissamaṃ ṭhapetvā yathānuppattameva tāva vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-abh08t0:892_0: Ettha ca ratanattayappaṇāmaṃ kattukāmo tathāgatamūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:892_2: Thomanāpubbaṅgamena hi paṇāmena satthu guṇātisayayogo, tato cassa anuttaravandanīyabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:892_3: tena ca attano vandanāya khettaṅgatabhāvo, khettaṅgatāya ca vandanāya yathādhippetanipphattiyā
tika-abh08t0:893_0: Tattha vanditvāti pubbakālakiriyāniddeso. Tassa pana osānagāthāyaṃ “pavakkhāmī”ti
tika-abh08t0:893_1: iminā aparakālakiriyāvacanena saha sambandho. Buddhanti vandanakiriyāya kammaniddeso.
tika-abh08t0:893_2: “Anantakaruṇāpañña”ntiādikaṃ pana tabbisesanaṃ. Tattha kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:893_3: vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Kirīyati dukkhitesu pasārīyatīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā karotīti
tika-abh08t0:893_4: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ janayatīti attho. Kiṇātīti
tika-abh08t0:893_5: vā karuṇā, parassa dukkhaṃ paccayavekallakaraṇato hiṃsatīti attho. Pajānātīti paññā,
tika-abh08t0:893_6: yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Karuṇā ca paññā ca karuṇāpaññā, natthi
tika-abh08t0:893_7: etāsaṃ antoti anantā, anantā karuṇāpaññā etassāti anantakaruṇāpañño, taṃ anantakaruṇāpaññaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:894_0: Ettha ca uppādavayantatāvasena ceva santatipariyosānavasena ca satipi bhagavato karuṇāpaññānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:894_1: sapariyantabhāve anantārammaṇesu pavattanato anantatā veditabbā. Sammāsambuddhassa
tika-abh08t0:894_2: hi sabbasattānaṃ dukkhāpanayanākārappavattā anaññasādhāraṇā mahākaruṇā kañci sattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:894_3: avajjetvā sabbesu sattesu niravasesena pavattati, tathā sabbadhammasabhāvabodhanasamatthā
tika-abh08t0:894_4: sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātā paññāpi sakalañeyyadhammesu anavasesato pavattati, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:894_6: cettha bhagavato sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampatti dassitā hoti. Tathā hi karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-abh08t0:895_0: Apica sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi, paññā pariyosānaṃ. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
tika-abh08t0:895_1: hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthāya katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
tika-abh08t0:895_2: pūretvā anuttarasammāsambodhiyā adhigamena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭilabhi. Iti sakalabuddhaguṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:895_4: maggañāṇassa paṭilabhanato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato paññā pariyosānaṃ. Ādipariyosānadassanena
tika-abh08t0:895_5: ca sakalabuddhaguṇā nayato dassitā honti. Nayaggāho eva hi sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo,
tika-abh08t0:895_6: itarathā tādisassa sabbaññubuddhassapi vacanapathātītaṃ tathāgataguṇaṃ anupadaṃ vaṇṇento
tika-abh08t0:896_0: Evaṃ karuṇāpaññāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalabuddhaguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvāpi puna
tika-abh08t0:896_1: attano buddhaguṇasaṃkittane atittābhāvena ceva paresañca pasādabāhullajananatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:896_2: tadantogadhepi visiṭṭhaguṇe padhānabhāvena nīharitvā dassento āha “tathāgata”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:896_3: Tattha “tathāgata”nti tathā āgatatādīhi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:897_0: “Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato, tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato,
tika-abh08t0:897_1: tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato,
tika-abh08t0:897_2: tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato”ti.
tika-abh08t0:898_0: “Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
tika-abh08t0:898_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatā, kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena yena abhinīhārena
tika-abh08t0:898_2: te bhagavanto āgatā, teneva ca abhinīhārena ayampi bhagavā āgato, yathā ca te bhagavanto
tika-abh08t0:898_3: samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāgādīni sampādetvā āgatā, yathā ca te sattatiṃsa
tika-abh08t0:898_4: bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā, tathā ayampi bhagavā āgatoti evaṃ tāva
tika-abh08t0:899_0: “Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena
tika-abh08t0:899_1: gatā, yathā vā te samathavipassanāmaggehi taṃ taṃ akusalapakkhaṃ vidhamitvā gatā,
tika-abh08t0:899_2: tathā ayampi bhagavā gato, evaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato. (2)
tika-abh08t0:900_0: “Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato? Yasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:900_1: tathaṃ avitathaṃ, tañcesa tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgato yāthāvato adhigato, tasmā tathalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:900_2: āgatoti tathāgato gamanatthānaṃ bujjhanatthasambhavato. Tathā hi vadanti ‘ye gatiatthā,
tika-abh08t0:900_3: te bujjhanatthā. Ye bujjhanatthā, te gatiatthā’ti. (3)
tika-abh08t0:901_0: “Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Yasmā ‘idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave,
tika-abh08t0:901_2: avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho’tiādivacanato ca tathadhammasaṅkhāte
tika-abh08t0:901_3: saccapaṭiccasamuppāde yāthāvato āgato abhisambuddho, tasmā tathadhamme yāthāvato
tika-abh08t0:902_0: “Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Yasmā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:902_1: chadvāraggahite ārammaṇe aviparītameva passati jānāti, ñatvā ca panevaṃ ‘katamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:902_2: taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, yaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyā’tiādinā tathamesa aviparītaṃ vibhajati
tika-abh08t0:902_3: dasseti, tasmā tathaṃ āgacchati passati jānāti, taṃ vā āgamayati dassetīti tathāgatoti
tika-abh08t0:903_0: “Kathaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yasmā esa abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā rāgamadādinimmathanavasena
tika-abh08t0:903_1: ekasadisameva dhammaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ bhāsati, tasmā tathaṃ gadati, tatho aviparīto
tika-abh08t0:903_2: āgadovacanametassāti vā da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti vuttoti evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato. (6)
tika-abh08t0:904_0: “Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavā hi ‘yathā vādī tathā kārī’ti vacanato attano
tika-abh08t0:904_1: vācāya anurūpameva karoti, tasmā yathā vācā, tathā kāyopi gato pavatto imassāti tathāgatoti
tika-abh08t0:905_0: “Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Yasmā panesa anupamāya sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampadāya
tika-abh08t0:905_1: samannāgatattā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhuyya pavattati, tasmā abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:906_0: Tatrevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viyāti agado, desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
tika-abh08t0:906_1: ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino, sadevakañca
tika-abh08t0:906_2: lokaṃ abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto yathāvutto agado etassāti
tika-abh08t0:906_3: da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti vuccatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana
tika-abh08t0:931_0: Kenaci guṇena attano visiṭṭhassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
tika-abh08t0:931_1: Bhagavato hi avīcito paṭṭhāya yāva bhavaggaṃ tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu na koci
tika-abh08t0:931_2: kenaci guṇena samasamopi atthi, kuto pana uttaritaro. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:934_0: Vinditvāti tīhi vandanāhi tanninnatādivasena namassitvā. Kāyavacīmanodvāravasena
tika-abh08t0:934_1: hi tisso vandanā. Yathāha “tisso imā, bhikkhave, vandanā kāyena vandati, vacasā vandati,
tika-abh08t0:934_2: manasā vandatī”ti. Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānamaññatarā cetanā
tika-abh08t0:934_3: kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyadvārappavattivasena uppannā kāyavandanāti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:934_4: sāyeva vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārappavattivasena uppannā vacīvandanāti,
tika-abh08t0:934_5: ubhayaviññattiyo pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā kevalaṃ manodvārappavattivasena uppannā manovandanāti.
tika-abh08t0:934_6: Sirasāti uttamaṅgena karaṇabhūtena. Abujjhi, bodhetīti vā buddho. Ayañhi catusaccadhamme
tika-abh08t0:934_7: sayampi abujjhi, parepi bodheti, tasmā bujjhanabodhanaṭṭhena “buddho”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:934_8: Yathāha “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”ti. Atha vā budha-saddassa
tika-abh08t0:934_9: jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato abujjhi savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṃ vigato,
tika-abh08t0:934_10: buddhiyā vikasitavāti vā buddho. Bhagavā hi vatthusabhāvadassanavibandhikāya avijjāsaṅkhātāya
tika-abh08t0:934_11: niddāya ariyamaggañāṇena saha vāsanāya samucchinnattā tato accantaṃ vigato. Paramarucirasirisobhaggasamāgamena
tika-abh08t0:935_0: Ettāvatā ca dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti attahitasampattito, parahitapaṭipattito
tika-abh08t0:935_2: anupādisesanibbānādhigamo ca, parahitapaṭipatti pana āsayappayogavasena duvidhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:935_3: parahitasamīhanaṃ. Tattha dhammadesanāya abhājanesu devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi
tika-abh08t0:935_4: niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā aparipākagatindriyānaṃ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca āsayo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:935_6: payogo nāma. Duvidhāsu panetāsu parahitapaṭipattīsu, tividhāsu ca attahitasampattīsu
tika-abh08t0:935_7: anantakaruṇā-vacanena, tathā āgataṭṭhena ca tathāgata-saddena āsayavasena parahitapaṭipatti
tika-abh08t0:935_8: dassitā, bodhanaṭṭhena buddha-saddena, tathadassanaṭṭhena ca tathāgataṭṭhena ca tathāgatasaddena
tika-abh08t0:935_10: ca buddha-saddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti, anuttaravacanena ca attahitaparahitasampatti
tika-abh08t0:936_0: Apica hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehipi bhagavato thomanā pavattatīti
tika-abh08t0:936_1: taṃvasenapettha thomanā daṭṭhabbā. Tattha hetusampadā nāma mahākaruṇāsamāyogo, bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca
tika-abh08t0:936_2: tammūlakattā sakalabuddhaguṇānaṃ. Phalasampadā pana catubbidhā ñāṇasampadā, pahānasampadā,
tika-abh08t0:936_3: ānubhāvasampadā, rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:936_4: maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tammūlakāni ca dasabalādiñāṇāni ñāṇasampadā
tika-abh08t0:936_5: nāma. Aggamaggabhāvanāya sabbakilesānaṃ saha vāsanāhi anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ pahānasampadā.
tika-abh08t0:936_6: Acinteyyāparimitānaṃ sabbalokahitānaṃ nipphādane, sadevakalokābhibhavane ca ādhipaccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:936_8: attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma. Sattūpakāro heṭṭhā vuttaparahitapaṭipattivaseneva
tika-abh08t0:936_9: veditabbo. Imāsu pana anantakaruṇā-vacanena, tathā āgataṭṭhena ca tathāgata-saddena
tika-abh08t0:936_10: hetusampadā dassitā. Phalasampadāsu ñāṇasampadā ceva pahānasampadā ca anantapaññā-vacanena,
tika-abh08t0:936_13: ca vibhāvitā, rūpakāyasampadā pana rūpaggappattidīpakena anuttara-saddena dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:937_0: Evaṃ buddharatanassa thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto
tika-abh08t0:937_1: āha “dhammaṃ sādhugaṇampi cā”ti. Bhagavato thomanena ca svākkhātatādayo dhammaguṇā,
tika-abh08t0:937_2: suppaṭipannatādayo saṅghaguṇā ca dassitā honti tappabhavassa anaññathābhāvatoti na
tika-abh08t0:937_3: tesaṃ visuṃ thomanā katā. Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe puggale yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:937_4: paṭipajjamāne ca apāyadukkhesu ceva vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh08t0:937_5: so catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ, catunnañca sāmaññaphalānaṃ, nibbānassa, pariyattidhammassa
tika-abh08t0:942_0: Ettha hi kāmarāgādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati etenāti “rāgavirāgo”ti maggo kathito.
tika-abh08t0:942_1: Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya, antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā
tika-abh08t0:942_3: nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ. Avirodhadīpanato pana atthabyañjanassa sampannatāya, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato
tika-abh08t0:942_4: suṭṭhu vibhajitattā ca “appaṭikūla”ntiādinā sabbopi pariyattidhammo kathito. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:942_5: ariyamagganibbānāni nippariyāyeneva apāyādito dhāraṇato dhammo, phalapariyattiyo
tika-abh08t0:942_6: pana pariyāyena. Tathā hettha dhāraṇaṃ nāma apāyādinibbattakakilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:942_7: Iti ariyamaggassa kilesasamucchedakatāya, nibbānassa ca ālambaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyapi
tika-abh08t0:942_8: ubhinnampi nippariyāyato labbhati. Itaresu pana ariyaphalassa maggena samucchinnakilesānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:943_0: Attahitaparahitaṃ sādhentīti sādhū, tesaṃ gaṇo samudāyoti sādhugaṇo, sādhu cāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:943_1: gaṇo cāti vā sādhugaṇo, sādhuno vā sammāsambuddhassa āyatto gaṇo tassa orasaputtabhāvatoti
tika-abh08t0:943_2: sādhugaṇo. So pana catunnaṃ ariyamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ, catunnañca phalasamaṅgīnaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:943_3: aṭṭhavidho ariyasaṅgho, taṃ sādhugaṇaṃ. Picāti nipātasamudāyo, eko vā nipāto, tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:943_4: ratanānaṃ vandanakiriyāya sampiṇḍanattho. Keci “gaṇo”ti idha pakaraṇatova ariyagaṇapuggalova
tika-abh08t0:943_5: labbhatīti sādhūti bhāvanapuṃsakavasena “vanditvā”ti iminā saha yojenti, tadā pana
tika-abh08t0:944_0: 2. Evaṃ pakaraṇārambhe yathādhippetaṃ ratanattayappaṇāmaṃ katvā idāni yattha pāṭavatthāya
tika-abh08t0:944_1: idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ paṭṭhapīyati, taṃ saddhiṃ desakadesapaṭiggāhakasampattīhi vibhāvetvā
tika-abh08t0:944_2: dassento āha “paṇḍukambalanāmāyā”tiādi. Tattha devarājassa paṇḍukambalanāmāya silāya
tika-abh08t0:944_3: vimale sītale tale nisinno atulavikkamo devadevehi pūjito devadevo devapurakkhato
tika-abh08t0:944_4: devānaṃ devalokasmiṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ desesīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:945_0: Ayaṃ panettha attho – paṇḍukambalasarikkhavaṇṇatāya “paṇḍukambala”nti nāmaṃ samaññā
tika-abh08t0:945_1: etissāti paṇḍukambalanāmā. Sā hi sakkassa tādisapuññānubhāvena nibbattā paṇḍukambalajayasumanapupphasamānena
tika-abh08t0:945_2: vaṇṇena sabbakālaṃ virocati, pamāṇato pana saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā, paññāsayojanavitthārā,
tika-abh08t0:945_3: pannarasayojanubbedhā ca hoti. Silāyāti avayavasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ. Tulāya sammito
tika-abh08t0:945_4: tulyo, na tulyo atulyo, atulyo vikkamo balaṃ etassāti atulyavikkamo. Sammāsambuddhassa
tika-abh08t0:945_6: dasakoṭisahassapurisānaṃ balehi samappamāṇena kāyabalena, appamāṇena ca ñāṇabalena
tika-abh08t0:945_7: na kassaci devabrahmādīsu aññatarassa balatulanāya upanetabbaṃ atthi. Atha vā anaññasādhāraṇattā
tika-abh08t0:945_9: samannāgatattā vā atulyo sammappadhānasaṅkhāto vikkamo imassāti atulyavikkamo. “Atulyavikkamo”ti
tika-abh08t0:945_10: ca vattabbe gāthābandhavasena ya-kāralopaṃ katvā “atulavikkamo”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā
tika-abh08t0:945_11: sammitatthe a-kārapaccayassāpi sambhavato atulo vikkamo assāti “atulavikkamo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:946_0: Dibbantīti devā, pañcakāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti, tesu vā viharanti, vijayasamatthatāyogena
tika-abh08t0:946_2: taṃtaṃatthānusāsanañca karontā voharanti, puññañāṇānubhāvappattāya jutiyā jotenti,
tika-abh08t0:946_3: yathādhippetañca visayaṃ appaṭighātena gacchanti, yathicchitanipphādane ca sakkontīti
tika-abh08t0:946_4: attho. Atha vā devanīyā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi “saraṇaṃ parāyaṇa”nti gamanīyā,
tika-abh08t0:946_5: abhitthavanīyā sobhāvisesayogena kamanīyāti vā devā, te tividhā – sammutidevā upapattidevā
tika-abh08t0:946_6: visuddhidevāti. Tattha sammutidevā nāma mahāsammatādayo khattiyā. Upapattidevā nāma
tika-abh08t0:946_7: cātumahārājike upādāya taduttaridevā. Visuddhidevā nāma khīṇāsavā. Idha pana upapattidevā
tika-abh08t0:946_8: daṭṭhabbā. No ca kho tepi avisesena, ṭhapetvā pana yāmādike cātumahārājikatāvatiṃsavāsinova
tika-abh08t0:946_9: adhippetā. Tesaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi rañjanato rājā, devānaṃ rājā issaro devarājā,
tika-abh08t0:946_10: tassa devarājassa, “sakkassa devarañño”ti adhippāyo. Na hi aññesaṃ devalokesu nisinno
tika-abh08t0:947_0: 3. Yanti aniyamaniddeso, tassa pana “tatthā”ti iminā niyamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:947_1: tiṇṇampi devānaṃ uttamo devo tehi sabbehi adhikataraṃ kīḷanādiyogatoti devadevo,
tika-abh08t0:947_2: bhagavā. So hi niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānasiddhāya
tika-abh08t0:947_6: appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena vā lokena “saraṇa”nti gamanīyato,
tika-abh08t0:947_7: abhitthavanīyato, bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya
tika-abh08t0:947_8: ṭhitoti sabbadevehi pūjanīyataro devo, visuddhidevabhāvasaṅkhātassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa
tika-abh08t0:947_9: adhigatattā aññesañca devānaṃ atisayena devoti devadevo. Devānanti tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:947_11: gahaṇanti vadanti. Te pana upapattidevesveva saṅgahitā manussaarahantānaṃ tattha
tika-abh08t0:947_12: abhāvato. Devadevehīti visuddhidevehi. Visuddhidevā hi vuttanayena itaradevehi sātisayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:947_13: kīḷanādiyogato idha “devadevā”ti adhippetā, tehi. Pūjitoti pūjitabbo, pūjituṃ arahoti
tika-abh08t0:947_14: attho. Etena visuddhidevesupi bhagavato aggapuggalataṃ dīpeti. Desesīti madhurakaravīkasaddasadisaṃ
tika-abh08t0:947_15: brahmassaraṃ nicchārento pakāsesi. Devalokasminti tāvatiṃsadevaloke. Sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:947_16: dhāretīti dhammo, kusalādibhedo abhidhammo, idha pana tappakāsakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:947_17: “dhamma”nti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “piṭakuttame”ti. Devapurakkhatoti dasasahassacakkavāḷavāsidibbabrahmehi
tika-abh08t0:948_0: Nanu ca “devāna”nti vacaneneva devapurakkhatabhāvo siddhoti kiṃ “devapurakkhato”ti
tika-abh08t0:948_1: vacanena? Nāyaṃ doso. Bhagavā hi kadāci cūḷapanthakattherādīnaṃ viya parammukhepi
tika-abh08t0:948_2: nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjetvā sattānaṃ sammukhe nisinnaṃ viya dassento dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-abh08t0:948_3: kadācipi pārāyanikabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ viya sammukhepi nisīditvā aññehi ca parivuto aññesampi
tika-abh08t0:948_4: dhammaṃ deseti, idha pana na tathā, devehiyeva parivuto devānaṃ desetīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:949_0: 4. Evametasmiṃ pakaraṇe gāravajananatthaṃ tena sampādetabbapāṭavavisayaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:949_2: ca vibhāvetuṃ “tatthāha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “pāṭavatthāyā”ti iminā pakaraṇārambhapayojanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:949_5: “Aha”nti kattubhūtaṃ attānaṃ niddisati. Tathā hi yo paro na hoti, so niyakajjhattasaṅkhāto
tika-abh08t0:950_0: Paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṃ, taṃyeva attho payojanaṭṭhenāti pāṭavattho, tadatthāya. Taṃ
tika-abh08t0:950_1: sandhāya vividhanayaggahaṇasamatthassa sutamayañāṇassa uppādanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:950_2: Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanti, bhindanti vā pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhū, tesaṃ. Piṭakañca
tika-abh08t0:950_3: taṃ uttamañcāti piṭakuttamaṃ, tasmiṃ piṭakuttame, abhidhammapiṭaketi adhippāyo. Tañhi
tika-abh08t0:950_4: pariyattibhājanatthato piṭakaṃ, tīsu piṭakesu visiṭṭhabhāvato uttamañcāti piṭakuttamaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:950_5: Tattha pariyattibhājanatthatoti pariyattiatthena ceva bhājanatthena ca. Tathā hi
tika-abh08t0:950_6: “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu pariyatti piṭakanti vuccati. “Atha puriso āgaccheyya
tika-abh08t0:950_7: kudālapiṭaka”ntiādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhājanampi. Tasmā idampi pariyāpuṇitabbaṭṭhena pariyatti,
tika-abh08t0:950_8: abhidhammatthānamādhāraṇatthena bhājanañcāti pariyattibhājanatthato piṭakanti vuccati. Tenevāhu –
tika-abh08t0:955_0: Visiṭṭhabhāvo panassa lokavohāramatikkamma yathāsabhāvavasena desanato, visiṭṭhadhammakkhandhavibhāvanato
tika-abh08t0:955_1: ca veditabbo. Ettha hi “satto puggalo bhikkhū”tiādikaṃ lokavohāramatikkamma “khandhadhātuāyatana”ntiādinā
tika-abh08t0:955_2: yathādhammavaseneva bāhulladesanā pavattā, na itaresu viya yathāvuttavohāravasena,
tika-abh08t0:955_3: yato idaṃ yathādhammasāsananti vuccati. Sabbasaṅkhatadhammavisiṭṭho cettha paññākkhandho
tika-abh08t0:955_4: visesato vibhāvito, tasmā tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ buddhavacanabhāvepi yathāsabhāvānatikkamadesanādito
tika-abh08t0:955_5: idameva tīsu piṭakesu visiṭṭhanti yuttaṃ. Apica dhammātirekadhammavisesabhāvato cassa
tika-abh08t0:955_6: visiṭṭhabhāvo veditabbo. Abhidhamme hi nippadesato khandhāyatanādidhammānaṃ vibhattattā
tika-abh08t0:955_7: itaradvayato atirekatarā, visiṭṭhā ca pāḷi hoti, tasmā atirekassa, visiṭṭhassa ca
tika-abh08t0:955_8: pāḷidhammassa vasena idameva tīsu piṭakesu uttamanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Yathāvuttavisiṭṭhabhāvayogatoyeva
tika-abh08t0:955_9: cetaṃ “abhidhammapiṭaka”nti vuccati abhi-saddassa visiṭṭhabhāvajotanato. Apica vuḍḍhimantādidhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:955_10: ettha vuttattā cetaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ. Yathāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:957: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti. ;
tika-abh08t0:958_0: Tathā hettha “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti, mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā
tika-abh08t0:958_1: viharatī”tiādinā vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā, “rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:958_2: nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhitabbattā salakkhaṇāpi “sekkhā dhammā asekkhā dhammā, lokuttarā
tika-abh08t0:958_3: dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitā pūjārahāpi “phasso hoti, vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena
tika-abh08t0:958_4: sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi “mahaggatā dhammā appamāṇā dhammā, anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:958_5: nayena adhikā visiṭṭhāpi dhammā vuttā, tasmā abhi-saddassa vuḍḍhiādiatthesupi pavattanato
tika-abh08t0:958_6: “vuḍḍhimanto dhammā etthā”tiādinā nibbacanena idaṃ piṭakaṃ “abhidhamma”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:958_7: Abhidhammaṃ otaranti anenāti abhidhammāvatāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ. Iminā panassa atthānugatamabhidhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:958_8: dasseti. Tu-saddo padapūraṇe. Ācariyena hi gāthāpadapūraṇatthaṃ yebhuyyena tattha
tika-abh08t0:958_9: tattha nipātā vuccanti. Yattha pana nesaṃ payojanaviseso dissati, tattheva tamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:958_10: vakkhāma. Madhuranti nippariyāyato madhura-saddoyaṃ jivhāviññeyye rasavisese vattati,
tika-abh08t0:958_11: idha pana iṭṭhabhāvasāmaññena atthabyañjanasampatti madhurasaddena vuttā. Bhavati
tika-abh08t0:958_12: hi taṃsadisassa taṃ-saddenābhidhānaṃ yathā “aggimāṇavo”ti. Tena pana madhurena yogato
tika-abh08t0:958_13: idampi madhuraṃ yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīluppalanti. Nipuṇagambhīrāya byañjanasampattiyā
tika-abh08t0:958_14: ceva atthasampattiyā ca abhidhammavisayaṃ matiṃ vaḍḍhetīti mativaḍḍhanaṃ. Atha vā
tika-abh08t0:959_0: 5. Tāḷanti kuñcikaṃ, kuñcikāsadisanti attho. Muyhanti tenāti moho, avijjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:959_1: mohoyeva abhidhammamahāpuraṃ pavisantānaṃ pavesananivāraṇattā kavāṭabhūtoti mohakavāṭaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:959_2: tassa. Vighāṭeti, vighāṭīyati anenāti vā vighāṭanaṃ. Nanu ca avijjākavāṭaṃ paññāya
tika-abh08t0:959_3: ugghāṭīyati. Sā hi tassā ujuvipaccanīkabhūtāti? Saccaṃ, idampi tassā kāraṇabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:959_4: “mohakavāṭavighāṭanakara”nti vuttaṃ. Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇavasena vuccati yathā
tika-abh08t0:960_1: mandabuddhīhi tarituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā atiduttaraṃ, teneva cedaṃ mahodadhisamānattā
tika-abh08t0:960_2: “mahodadhī”ti vuttaṃ. Mahaṇṇavopi hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro na sakkā aññatra
tika-abh08t0:960_3: sinerupabbatarājato kenaci patiṭṭhaṃ laddhuṃ, evamidampi catugambhīratāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:960_4: aññatra tathāgatā na kenaci patiṭṭhaṃ laddhuṃ sakkāti. Tarantānanti atthaggahaṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:960_5: uttaritukāmānaṃ. Ettha ca “taraṃvā”ti adhikāravasena vattabbaṃ, vakkhamānaṃ vā ānetvā
tika-abh08t0:960_6: sambandhitabbaṃ. Tarantānanti paratīrasampāpuṇanatthaṃ uttarantānaṃ. Taraṃvāti uḷumpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:960_7: viya, taṃsamānanti attho. Makarā nāma macchajātikā, tesaṃ ākaro nivāsabhūmīti makarākaro, taṃ.
tika-abh08t0:961_0: 7. Abhidhamme niyuttā ābhidhammikā, tesaṃ. Hatthasāraṃ viyāti hatthasāraṃ. Yathā
tika-abh08t0:961_1: hi manussānaṃ bahūsu ratanādīsu vijjamānesupi āpadāsu ca sukhaparibhogatthaṃ hatthe
tika-abh08t0:961_2: kayiramānaṃ sāraratanādikaṃ “hatthasāra”nti vuccati, evamidampi satipi mahante abhidhammapiṭake
tika-abh08t0:961_3: tassa sabbaso vittiṇṇatāya pariharituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tadatthasārasampiṇḍanavasena
tika-abh08t0:961_5: “hatthasāra”nti vuttaṃ. Pavakkhāmīti pakārena kathessāmi, anāgatavacanañcetaṃ, vattamānasamīpattā
tika-abh08t0:961_6: vā anāgate vattamānūpacārato vattamānavacanaṃ, paṭiññānantarameva vakkhatīti. Atthavasena
tika-abh08t0:961_7: pakārena kathentopi saddavasena saṅkhipitvā kathessāmīti dassento āha “samāsenā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:961_8: Samasanaṃ saṃkhipanaṃ samāso, tena samāsena, na byāsavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā
tika-abh08t0:961_10: sotujanasamussāhanaṃ nāma tesaṃ sakkaccasavane niyuñjanaṃ, tasmā te tattha niyojento
tika-abh08t0:961_11: āha “taṃ suṇātha samāhitā”ti. Sakkaccasavanapaṭibaddhā hi sammāpaṭipattīti. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:961_12: tanti taṃ mayā vakkhamānaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ suṇātha nisāmayatha. Samāhitā sammā
tika-abh08t0:966_0: 8. Evaṃ tāva ratanattayappaṇāmādikaṃ dassetvā idāni yathāraddhappakaraṇassa atthasarīrabhūtamabhidhammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:966_1: saṅkhepato uddisanto āha “cittaṃ cetasika”ntiādi. Tattha cittasaddassa tāva vacanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:966_2: sayameva anantaraṃ vipañceti. “Cetasika”ntiādīsu pana avippayogībhāvena cetasi citte
tika-abh08t0:966_3: niyuttaṃ, tattha vā bhavaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti cetasikaṃ, vedanādikkhandhattayassetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:966_4: adhivacanaṃ. Ruppati, rūpīyatīti vā rūpaṃ, sītuṇhādīhi vikāramāpajjati, āpādīyatīti
tika-abh08t0:966_5: attho, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ, catuvīsatiupādārūpānañca vasena aṭṭhavīsatividhassa
tika-abh08t0:966_6: rūpakkhandhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Bhavābhavaṃ vinanato saṃsibbanato vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā,
tika-abh08t0:966_7: na vijjati sā ettha, tato vā nikkhantaṃ etanti nibbānaṃ, amataṃ asaṅkhataṃ vatthu.
tika-abh08t0:966_8: Iti-saddo nidassane. Natthi etassa uttaritaroti niruttaro. Atha vā catuvesārajjavihārattā
tika-abh08t0:966_9: natthi etassa uttaraṃ paccanīkavacananti niruttaro. Ñāṇappahānaantarāyaniyyānikesu
tika-abh08t0:966_10: hi sadevake loke na koci satthu sahadhammikaṃ uttaraṃ vacanaṃ kathetuṃ samattho atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:966_11: Tatra bhagavā utrāsābhāvato visāradova hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-abh08t0:967_0: “‘Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo
tika-abh08t0:967_1: vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti
tika-abh08t0:967_2: nimittametaṃ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmi, etamahaṃ, sāriputta, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto
tika-abh08t0:968: “Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇāti tatra vata maṃ…pe… viharāmi.
tika-abh08t0:969: “Ye ca kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā vuttā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyāti tatra vata maṃ…pe… viharāmi.
tika-abh08t0:970: “Yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito, so na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti tatra vata maṃ…pe… viharāmī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:971_1: hi cattāri ariyasaccāni. Yathāha, “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni. Katamāni
tika-abh08t0:971_2: cattāri? Dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:971_3: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti. Tattha tebhūmakā dhammā anekupaddavādhiṭṭhānatāya
tika-abh08t0:971_4: dhuvasubhādivirahena, kucchitatucchaṭṭhena ca dukkhaṃ nāma. Kammādivisesapaccayasamavāye
tika-abh08t0:971_5: dukkhuppattikāraṇabhāvena taṇhā samudayo nāma “samecca udeti dukkhaṃ imasmā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:971_6: Dukkhassa anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodho nibbānaṃ. Taṃ pana dukkhanirodhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:971_7: ālambaṇakaraṇavasena gamanato pāpuṇanato, tadadhigamāya paṭipadābhāvato cāti “dukkhanirodhagāminī
tika-abh08t0:971_8: paṭipadā”ti lokuttaramaggo vuccati. Saccaṭṭho pana tesaṃ tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:971_9: veditabbo. Vuttañhi “‘idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti
tika-abh08t0:971_10: vitthāro. Ettha pana catunnaṃ ariyaphalānaṃ, ariyamaggasampayuttānañca saccavinissaṭabhāvepi
tika-abh08t0:971_11: idha magganibbānappakāsanatāvacaneneva tappakāsanatthampi vuttaṃ hoti, anāsavabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:972_1: dasseti atathāvidhassa taṃdesanāsāmatthiyāyogato. Atha vā “niruttaro”ti vacanena
tika-abh08t0:972_2: catubbidhadhammassa anaññathattaṃ dīpeti. “Catusaccappakāsano”ti pana iminā ye te
tika-abh08t0:972_3: dhammā bhagavatā vineyyaparipācanatthaṃ desitā, na te idha adhippetā. Ye pana paripācitehi
tika-abh08t0:972_4: tehi abhisametabbavasena dukkhādayo catubbidhā vuttā, teyeva uddisitabbatthena adhippetāti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:973_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepato cattāro dhamme uddisitvā idāni uddeso nāma niddesatthāya hotīti yathāuddiṭṭhadhamme
tika-abh08t0:973_1: niddisituṃ “tattha citta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu cittādīsu dhammesu.
tika-abh08t0:973_2: Visayavijānanaṃ cittanti yaṃ visayasaṅkhātassa ārammaṇassa vijānanaṃ upaladdhi, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:973_3: cittanti attho. Iminā pana cittassa ārammaṇapaṭibaddhavuttitaṃ, aniccataṃ, akārakatañca
tika-abh08t0:973_4: dīpeti. “Visayavijānana”nti hi ārammaṇena cittaṃ upalakkhento tassa tadāyattavuttitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:973_5: taṃdīpanena ca tadabhimukhakāleyeva uppattidīpanato aniccabhāvañca dīpeti. Bhāvaniddesena
tika-abh08t0:973_6: pana vijānanamattadīpanato akārakabhāvaṃ. Yathāpaccayañhi pavattimattamevetaṃ, yadidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:973_7: sabhāvadhammo nāmāti. Evañca katvā sabbesampi cittacetasikadhammānaṃ bhāvasādhanameva
tika-abh08t0:973_8: nippariyāyato labbhati. Yaṃ pana “cintetīti cittaṃ, tena cittaṃ vicaratīti vicāro”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:973_9: kattukaraṇavasena nibbacanaṃ vuccati, taṃ pariyāyakathananti veditabbaṃ. Sakasakakiccesu
tika-abh08t0:973_10: hi dhammānaṃ attappadhānatāsamāropanena kattubhāvo, tadanukūlabhāvena taṃsampayuttadhammasamūhe
tika-abh08t0:973_11: kattubhāvasamāropanena karaṇattañca pariyāyatova labbhatīti. Tathā nidassanaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:974_0: “Visayavijānana”nti ca etena cittassa ārammaṇūpaladdhilakkhaṇatā vuttāti idānissa
tika-abh08t0:974_1: rasādīni vuccanti. Pubbaṅgamarasañhi cittaṃ sandhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:974_2: Dvāraṃ patvā tadārammaṇañhi vibhāvanaṭṭhena cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:974_3: hi cakkhudvārena daṭṭhabbaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ citteneva jānāti…pe… manodvārena viññātabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:974_4: dhammārammaṇaṃ citteneva jānāti. Yathā hi nagaraguttiko nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭake nisīditvā
tika-abh08t0:974_5: “ayaṃ nevāsiko, ayaṃ āgantuko”ti āgatāgataṃ janaṃ upadhāreti, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:974_6: tasmā dvāraṃ patvā tadārammaṇaṃ vibhāvanaṭṭhena purecārikanti pubbaṅgamarasaṃ. Pacchimaṃ
tika-abh08t0:974_7: pacchimaṃ uppajjamānaṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ nirantaraṃ katvā sandahamānamiva upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:974_8: gahaṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti sandhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Pañcavokāre panassa niyamato nāmarūpaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:974_9: catuvokārabhave nāmameva padaṭṭhānanti nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānañca hoti. Nānattaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:974_10: lakkhaṇādīnaṃ upari vakkhamānanayena veditabbaṃ. Vakkhati hi rūpaparicchede –
tika-abh08t0:975: “Sāmaññaṃ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh08t0:976: Kiccaṃ vā tassa sampatti, rasoti paridīpito.
tika-abh08t0:979: Yattha yattha pana lakkhaṇādīni vuccanti, tattha tattha imināva nayena tesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:980_0: Vacanatthavijānanena viditacittasāmaññassa uttari cittavibhāgo vuccamāno sobheyyāti
tika-abh08t0:980_1: vacanatthavijānanameva tāva ādimhi yuttataranti taṃ tāva kathetukamyatāya pucchati
tika-abh08t0:980_2: “tassa pana ko vacanattho”ti. Pañcavidhā hi pucchā – adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā
tika-abh08t0:980_3: vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti. Tattha yaṃ aññātaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:980_4: tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya pañhākaraṇaṃ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā nāma. Yaṃ pana ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:980_5: tassa aññehi paṇḍitehi saṃsandanatthāya pañhākaraṇaṃ diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:980_6: Pakatiyā pana saṃsayapakkhandanassa attano saṃsayasamugghāṭanatthaṃ pañhākaraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:980_7: vimaticchedanāpucchā nāma. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:980_8: vāti? Aniccaṃ, bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”tiādinā anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:980_9: pañhākaraṇaṃ anumatipucchā nāma. “Cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:980_10: pana taṃtaṃdhammānaṃ desanādhippāyena pañhākaraṇaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:981_0: Tāsu purimā tisso ācariyānaṃ na sambhavanti. Na hi te ganthakaraṇatthāya ārabhitvā
tika-abh08t0:981_1: idāni adiṭṭhaṃ jotenti, diṭṭhaṃ saṃsandenti, saṃsayaṃ vā pakkhandanti tabbisodhanapubbakameva
tika-abh08t0:981_2: ganthakaraṇe abhinivesanato. Itarā pana dve sambhavanti. Tāsu ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā.
tika-abh08t0:981_3: Apica codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpentā ācariyā aññaṃ codakaṃ parikappetvā tassa vacanavasena
tika-abh08t0:981_5: Tassāti tassa citta-saddassa. Citte hi adhigate tassa vācako saddopi sahacariyato
tika-abh08t0:981_6: adhigatova hotīti tassa idha ta-saddena pariggaho. Keci pana “tassa cittassā”ti atthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:981_7: vadanti, taṃ “tassa ko vacanattho”ti iminā na sameti. Na hi cittassa “ko vacanattho”ti
tika-abh08t0:982_0: Idāni yathāpucchitamatthaṃ vissajjetuṃ “vuccate”ti tāva paṭiññaṃ katvā “sabbasaṅgāhakavasenā”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:982_2: upādāya sabbesaṃ ārammaṇavijānanasabhāvattā tesaṃ sabbesameva saṅgāhakavasena, na
tika-abh08t0:982_3: pana vakkhamānanibbacanesu viya yathālābhavasenāti attho. Cintetīti vijānāti. Cintenti
tika-abh08t0:982_4: tena gocaranti vā cittaṃ. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ kattutāsamāropanena hissa karaṇabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:982_5: labbhati. Sabbasaṅgāhakavasena tāva atthaṃ dassetvā idāni yathālābhavasenapi dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:982_6: “attasantānaṃ vā cinotītipī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbacittasādhāraṇattā hi citta-saddassa
tika-abh08t0:982_7: yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā gahetabbo. Yassa
tika-abh08t0:982_8: pana cittassa yathāvuttaatthaviseso na labbhati, taṃ ruḷhīvasena cittanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:982_9: Yathā kilañjādīhi katampi tālapaṇṇehi katasarikkhakatāya ruḷhīsaddena “tālavaṇṭa”ntveva
tika-abh08t0:982_10: vuccatīti. Attasantānanti sakasantānaṃ, javanasantānanti attho. Atta-saddassa hi
tika-abh08t0:982_11: parapaccanīkavacanattā attano santānoti sadisavasena uppajjamāno javanasantāno vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:982_12: Taṃ cinoti rāsiṃ karotīti ayamattho sāsevanakānaṃ javanacittānaṃ vasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:982_13: Tāni hi purejātāni pacchājātānaṃ āsevanapaccayā hutvā attano javanasantānassa paguṇabalavabhāvakaraṇena
tika-abh08t0:982_14: taṃ cinanti nāma. Vā-saddo asabbasaṅgāhakatthavikappane. Pi-saddo kiriyāsampiṇḍanatthe.
tika-abh08t0:982_15: Atha vā “sabbasaṅgāhakavasenā”ti imassa idhāpi sambandho hotīti idampi sabbasaṅgāhakavasena
tika-abh08t0:982_16: vuttanti gayhamāne attasantānanti viññāṇavacanassa atta-saddassa sakatthavuttittāyeva
tika-abh08t0:982_17: taṃvasena cittasantānanti attho. Anantarādipaccayavasena hi cittasantānassa abbocchinnappavattikaraṇato
tika-abh08t0:982_18: sabbameva cittajātaṃ cittasantānaṃ cinoti nāma. Imasmiṃ panatthe vā-saddo kiriyāvikappanattho.
tika-abh08t0:982_19: Pi-saddo “citta”nti imassa ākaḍḍhanatthoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purimapakkhe pana cittanti
tika-abh08t0:983_0: 9. Vicittaṃ karoti, vicittassa vā karaṇanti vicittakaraṇaṃ, tato vicittakaraṇā, vicittacittakammādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:983_1: karaṇatoti attho. Lokasmiñhi yaṃ kiñci cittakammādibhedaṃ vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ, sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:983_2: taṃ citteneva cintetvā karīyatīti. Tenāha bhagavā – “diṭṭhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, caraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:983_3: nāma cittanti? Evaṃ, bhante. Tampi kho, bhikkhave, caraṇaṃ nāma cittaṃ citteneva
tika-abh08t0:983_5: vā vicittagatiādikaraṇato vā vicittakaraṇaṭṭhena cittaṃ. Nanu ca vicittagatiādayo
tika-abh08t0:984_0: “Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ gatiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati apadā dvipadā catuppadā
tika-abh08t0:984_1: bahuppadā rūpino arūpino saññino asaññino nevasaññīnāsaññino, kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh08t0:984_2: sattānaṃ upapattiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati uccanīcatā hīnapaṇītatā sugataduggatatā,
tika-abh08t0:984_3: kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ attabhāve nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā
tika-abh08t0:984_4: sujātadujjātatā susaṇṭhitadussaṇṭhitatā, kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ lokadhamme
tika-abh08t0:984_5: nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati lābhālābhe yasāyase nindāpasaṃsāyaṃ sukhadukkhe”ti.
tika-abh08t0:985_0: Tasmā kammabhedanibbattattā gatiādīnaṃ cittatā. Kammanti ca cetasikadhammabhūtā cetanā,
tika-abh08t0:985_1: abhijjhādayo ca vuccanti, na cittanti. Kathaṃ cittassa vicittagatiādikaraṇanti? Vuccate
tika-abh08t0:985_2: – kammassa cittasannissitattā tannipphāditampi citteneva kataṃ hoti, yathā rājayodhena
tika-abh08t0:985_3: parājito satturaññā jitoti vuccati. Vicittaṃ karaṇamassāti vā vicittakaraṇaṃ. Tato
tika-abh08t0:985_6: “rūpabhavo rūpa”ntiādīsu viya uttarapadalopo cittapariyāyena ca vicitta-saddena vā
tika-abh08t0:985_7: viggaho vi-saddalopo vā daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā “vicittakaraṇā”ti idaṃ cittavicittabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:985_8: ñāpakahetunidassanaṃ. Tena yasmā idaṃ vicittakaraṇaṃ, tasmā tassa vicittassa nipphādakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:985_9: sayampi tatheva vicittanti viññātabbanti evaṃ karaṇavicittatāya vicittattā cittanti
tika-abh08t0:985_10: attho. Ṭhapetvā taṃ karaṇavicittatāya vicittabhāvaṃ attano eva jātibhūmisampayogādivasena
tika-abh08t0:985_11: vicittatāya cittanti dassento āha “attano cittatāya vā”ti. Tattha yasmā aññadeva
tika-abh08t0:985_12: kusalaṃ, aññaṃ akusalaṃ, aññaṃ abyākataṃ, aññaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, aññaṃ rūpāvacarādibhedaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:985_13: aññaṃ sarāgaṃ, aññaṃ vītarāgaṃ, aññaṃ sadosaṃ, aññaṃ vītadosaṃ, aññaṃ samohaṃ, aññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:985_14: vītamohaṃ, aññaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, aññaṃ saddādiārammaṇaṃ, rūpārammaṇesu ca aññaṃ nīlārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:985_15: aññaṃ pītādiārammaṇaṃ. Evaṃ saddārammaṇādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ. Sabbesu ceva tesu
tika-abh08t0:985_16: aññaṃ hīnaṃ, aññaṃ majjhimaṃ, aññaṃ paṇītaṃ, hīnādīsu ca aññaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:985_17: aññaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ vīriyādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ vīmaṃsādhipateyyanti evamādinā
tika-abh08t0:985_19: tasmā imāya attavicittatāya vā cittanti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t0:986_0: Kāmañcettha ekameva cittaṃ evaṃ vicittaṃ nāma na hoti, vicittānaṃ pana antogadhattā
tika-abh08t0:986_1: etesu yaṃ kiñci ekampi vicittatāya cittanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati samudāyavohārena avayavassāpi
tika-abh08t0:986_2: vohariyamānattā yathā pabbatanadīsamuddādīnamekadesā diṭṭhā pabbatādayo diṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:986_3: yathā ca ekekacittasampayuttāpi vedanādayo rāsaṭṭhena khandhavohārena “vedanākkhandho
tika-abh08t0:986_4: saññākkhandho”tiādinā vuccanti. Apicettha vipākaviññāṇaṃ kammakilesehi citanti cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:986_5: taṃ kilesasahāyena kammunā phalabhāvena nibbattitaṃ tehi citaṃ nāma hoti. Hotu tāvidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:986_6: lokiyavipākaṃ sandhāya, lokuttaraṃ pana patvā kathanti? Vuccate – “katame dhammā
tika-abh08t0:986_7: kusalā, yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti…pe… tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā
tika-abh08t0:986_9: anusayā upanissayā hontīti tannibbattitassa vipākassa kammakilesasañcitatāpariyāyo
tika-abh08t0:986_10: labbhatīti. Citaṃ tāyatīti vā cittaṃ. Kammādisañcitopi hi attabhāvo viññāṇūparame
tika-abh08t0:987: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh08t0:989_0: So panāyaṃ citta-saddo kiñcāpi anekatthesu dissati. Tathā hesa “citto ca gahapatī”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:989_1: paññattiyaṃ āgato. “Sabbo loko paracittena acitto”tiādīsu viññāṇe. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-abh08t0:989_2: aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi, evaṃ citta”ntiādīsu vicitte, nānappakāreti attho.
tika-abh08t0:989_3: “Caraṇaṃ nāma citta”ntiādīsu cittakammake. Idha pana catubbidhadhamme niddesato pakaraṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:989_4: yathāvuttavacanatthayutto viññāṇavacanova daṭṭhabboti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “paññattiyampī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:989_5: Paññāpīyati etāyāti paññatti, tassaṃ nāmapaññattiyanti attho. Cittoti hi ekassa gahapatino
tika-abh08t0:989_6: nāmaṃ. Pi-saddo vakkhamānasampiṇḍanattho. Viññāṇeti savipākāvipākabhede citte. Tañhi
tika-abh08t0:989_7: vijānanaṭṭhena “viññāṇa”nti vuccati. Yathāha – “vijānātīti kho, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:989_8: tasmā viññāṇanti vuccatī”ti. Cittasammutīti cittavohāro. Daṭṭhabbāti viññātabbā.
tika-abh08t0:989_9: Idhāti imasmiṃ catubbidhadhammaniddesaṭṭhāne. Viññunāti vijānatā, ābhidhammikenāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:990_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgena vinā na hotīti cittassa vibhāgaṃ
tika-abh08t0:990_1: dassetuṃ “sārammaṇato”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ālambanti taṃ nissāya pavattantīti ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:990_2: paccayo, gocaro ca. Tathā hi “labhati māro ārammaṇaṃ, labhati māro otāra”ntiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:990_4: gocaro. Idha pana ubhayampi vaṭṭati sabbasseva cittassa sappaccayasagocarattā. Saha
tika-abh08t0:990_5: ārammaṇena vattati tadavinābhāvatoti sārammaṇaṃ. Bhāvappadhānaniddesavasena cettha
tika-abh08t0:990_6: sārammaṇabhāvo sārammaṇa-saddena vutto yathā “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ. Cakkhu
tika-abh08t0:990_7: suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”tiādīsu ratanaattattaniyādibhāvo ratanādīhi saddehīti,
tika-abh08t0:990_8: tato sārammaṇabhāvatoti attho. Evamaññatthāpi yathānurūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekavidhanti
tika-abh08t0:991_1: hi dvīsu atthesu pavattati. Katthaci vipakkabhāvamāpannesu arūpadhammesu, katthaci
tika-abh08t0:991_2: vipākuppādanasabhāve. Tathā hesa “vipākā dhammā”tiādīsu vipakkabhāvamāpannesu arūpadhammesu
tika-abh08t0:991_4: daṭṭhabbo. Itarathā hi abhiññākusalādīnaṃ savipāka-pade asaṅgahitabhāvāpatti siyā.
tika-abh08t0:991_5: Tathā hi yadi vipakkabhāvamāpannā eva dhammā idha gahitā siyuṃ, te yassa santi, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:991_6: savipākamitaramavipākanti abhiññākusalassa ceva kadāci avipākassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādikammassa
tika-abh08t0:991_7: bhāvanāyapahātabbākusalassa ca vipākuppattiyā abhāvato avipāka-padasaṅgaho siyā,
tika-abh08t0:991_8: evañca sati “avipākaṃ abyākata”nti vakkhamānattā nesaṃ abyākatabhāvo āpajjati, na
tika-abh08t0:991_9: cetamiṭṭhaṃ kusalākusalaniddeseyeva tesaṃ niddesato. Vipākuppādanasabhāve pana gahite
tika-abh08t0:991_10: taṃsabhāvo nāma anupacchinnāvijjamānataṇhānusayasmiṃ santāne sabyāpārappavatti evāti
tika-abh08t0:991_11: tassā tesupi atthitāya asatipi vipākuppādane savipāka-padasaṅgaho siddhoti na koci
tika-abh08t0:991_12: iṭṭhavighāto āpajjati. Yena pana kāraṇena abhiññākusalādikamavipākaṃ, yo cettha vattabbo
tika-abh08t0:991_13: vinicchayo, taṃ sabbaṃ tassa tassa āgataṭṭhāneyeva dassayissāma.
tika-abh08t0:992_0: Katamaṃ panettha savipākaṃ, katamamavipākanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha savipāka”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:992_1: Abyākatanti vipākakiriyāvasena duvidhamabyākataṃ. Tesu vipākacittaṃ tāva ādāsatale
tika-abh08t0:992_2: mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhattā vipākuppādane asamatthaṃ. Kiriyacittesu ca yadetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:992_3: khīṇāsavasantāneyeva niyatamaṭṭhārasavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ, taṃ upacchinnabhavamūlāya santatiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:992_4: pavattatīti samucchinnamūlāya latāya pupphaṃ viya phaladāyī na hoti. Āvajjanadvayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:992_5: pana anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne pavattamānaṃ anāsevanabhāvena dubbalattā moghapupphamiva
tika-abh08t0:992_6: bījabhāve asamatthaṃ aphalameva. Iti sabbametaṃ abyākataṃ vipākārahatābhāvato avipākanti
tika-abh08t0:992_7: vuttaṃ “avipākaṃ abyākata”nti. Jāyanti ettha asadisāpi sadisākārāti jāti, samānākāro,
tika-abh08t0:992_8: kusalākusalābyākatānaṃ jāti kusalākusalābyākatajāti, tassā bhedato tividhaṃ kusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:993_0: 10. “Kucchitāna”ntiādi vissajjanaṃ. Tattha kucchitānanti ninditānaṃ, asuci viya nāgarikehi
tika-abh08t0:993_1: viññūhi garahitabbānaṃ pāpadhammānanti attho. Salanatoti hiṃsanato, apanayanato vā.
tika-abh08t0:993_2: Kusalañhi yathānurūpaṃ tadaṅgādivasena akusaladhamme pajahantaṃ te hiṃsati, apanayatīti
tika-abh08t0:993_3: vā vuccati. Atha vā salanato saṃvaraṇato, pidahanatoti attho. Kusaladhammavasena
tika-abh08t0:993_4: hi akusalappavattinivāraṇena, appavattidhammatāpādanena ca manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu
tika-abh08t0:993_5: appavattiyā saṃvutā pihitā honti. Kusānanti rāgādiasucisampayogena nānāvidhadukkhahetutāya
tika-abh08t0:993_6: ca kucchitenākārena appahīnabhāvena santāne sayanti pavattantīti kusā, pāpadhammā.
tika-abh08t0:993_7: Atha vā kucchitānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ sāvajjadhammānaṃ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā,
tika-abh08t0:993_8: dosalobhādayo. Dosādīnañhi vasena cetanāya tikkhabhāvappattiyā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjatāti.
tika-abh08t0:993_9: Tesaṃ lavanena chindanena yathānurūpaṃ pajahanenāti attho. Kusenāti kucchitānaṃ sānato
tika-abh08t0:993_10: tanukaraṇato, osānakaraṇato vā “kusā”ti laddhanāmena ñāṇena. Lātabbattāti ādātabbattā,
tika-abh08t0:993_11: sahajātaupanissayabhāvena santāne pavattetabbattā. Ñāṇañhi tihetukakusalaṃ sahajātabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:993_12: ceva upanissayabhāvena ca, duhetukakusalaṃ upanissayabhāveneva santāne pavatteti.
tika-abh08t0:993_13: Evañca katvā kosallasambhūtaṭṭho kusalaṭṭhoti sabbakusalānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena attho
tika-abh08t0:993_14: vuccati. Atha vā kusenāti jātisaddatāya ekavacananiddeso, kusehīti pana attho. Puññakiriyāvasena
tika-abh08t0:993_15: hi pavattāni saddhādīni indriyāni yathāvuttanayena “kusānī”ti vuccanti, tehi lātabbattā
tika-abh08t0:994: “Kuso viya lunātīti, kusā viya lunāti vā;
tika-abh08t0:996_0: Tattha yathā kuso gahito ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthapadesaṃ lunāti, evamidampi uppannānuppannavasena
tika-abh08t0:996_1: ubhayabhāgagataṃ kilesapakkhaṃ lunāti chindati, seyyathāpi – “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:996_2: akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti, vāyamati, uppannānaṃ…pe… pahānāyā”ti
tika-abh08t0:996_3: āgataṃ sammappadhānaṃ. Tasmā kuso viya lunātīti kusalaṃ. Kusā viya lunātīti ettha
tika-abh08t0:996_4: “ku”iti bhūmi vuccati, dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisatāya idha rūpārūpakkhandho
tika-abh08t0:996_5: vutto. Attano nissayabhūtassa tassa etarahi, āyatiñca anudahanato vināsanato kuṃ
tika-abh08t0:996_6: sāyantīti kusā, rāgādayo, te viya attano nissayaṃ lunāti chindatīti kusalaṃ. Payogasampāditā
tika-abh08t0:996_7: hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindanti anupādisesanibbānadhātupāpanatoti.
tika-abh08t0:996_8: Vuttanayena pana “ku”nti laddhanāmassa rūpārūpakkhandhassa salanato apanayanato kuṃ
tika-abh08t0:996_9: saletīti kusalaṃ. Kusaṃ lunātīti pana kucchitā ettha sayantīti kuso, kāyo, taṃ lunāti
tika-abh08t0:997_1: Tattha “kusalo tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ, kusalānaccagītassa, sikkhitā cāturitthiyo”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:997_2: cheke diṭṭho, chekapariyāyo pavīṇatthoti attho. “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto
tika-abh08t0:997_3: anāmaya”ntiādīsu ārogye. “Katamo pana, bhante, kāyasamācāro kusalo? Yo kho, mahārāja,
tika-abh08t0:997_4: kāyasamācāro anavajjo”ti ca “aparaṃ pana, bhante, etadānuttariyaṃ, yathā bhagavā
tika-abh08t0:997_5: dhammaṃ deseti kusalesu dhammesū”ti ca evamādīsu anavajje. “Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samādānahetu
tika-abh08t0:997_6: evamidaṃ puññaṃ vaḍḍhati, kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā”ti ca ādīsu iṭṭhavipāke.
tika-abh08t0:997_8: anurūpattā vuttaṃ, na pana ārogyatthassa asambhavato. Kilesarogassa hi abhāvato kusalaṃ ārogyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:998_0: Vajjā rāgādayo, te yassa na santi, taṃ anavajjaṃ, iṭṭho vipāko catukkhandhasaṅkhāto
tika-abh08t0:998_1: yassa, taṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ, iṭṭhavipākatā cassa taṃsabhāvavantatāya daṭṭhabbā, na tassa
tika-abh08t0:998_2: avassaṃ iṭṭhavipākasambhavatoyeva, lakkhīyati anenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, anavajjañca taṃ
tika-abh08t0:999_0: Nanu ca kusalameva anavajjaiṭṭhavipākaṃ, vuttaniyāmena pana anavajjaiṭṭhavipākato
tika-abh08t0:999_1: aññaṃ kusalaṃ siyā. Na hi sayameva attano lakkhaṇanti sakkā vattunti? Nāyaṃ doso
tika-abh08t0:999_4: Evañca yena sabhāvena pariññātavacanatthassa saddassa attho hoti, yena ca apariññātavacanatthassa,
tika-abh08t0:999_5: tesaṃ pariññātāpariññātavacanatthasabhāvānaṃ bhedena taṃsamaṅgissa kusalassa ekassāpi
tika-abh08t0:999_6: bhedo parikappīyati yathā “pure bhavaṃ paṭu āsi, paṭutaro etarahī”ti guṇabhedena,
tika-abh08t0:999_7: vatthubhedena ca parikappīyati, tasmā pariññātavacanatthabhāvena lakkhaṇaṃ, apariññātavacanatthabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:999_8: lakkhitabbanti evaṃ parikappitabhede pariggayhamāne na koci doso āpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1000_0: Atha vā lakkhīyatīti lakkhaṇaṃ, anavajjaiṭṭhavipākañca taṃ lakkhaṇañcāti anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1000_1: yaṃ anavajjaiṭṭhavipākaṃ hutvā lakkhīyati, taṃ kusalanti attho. Atha vā anavajja-saddena
tika-abh08t0:1000_2: anavajjabhāvo vutto, iṭṭhavipākasaddena iṭṭhavipākabhāvo, tasmā anavajjo ca iṭṭhavipāko
tika-abh08t0:1000_3: ca anavajjaiṭṭhavipākaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇametassāti karaṇatthe, kammatthe vā lakkhaṇa-saddena
tika-abh08t0:1000_5: lakkhitabbaṃ vāti attho. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ padadvayapariggahena, nanu ekeneva
tika-abh08t0:1000_6: padena adhippetatthasiddhi siyā. Kiñcāpi hi “anavajjalakkhaṇa”nti vutte “aparaṃ pana,
tika-abh08t0:1000_7: bhante, etadānuttariyaṃ, yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti kusalesu dhammesū”tiādīsu viya
tika-abh08t0:1000_8: vajjarahitattā abyākatassāpi pasaṅgo siyāti iṭṭhavipāka-padaṃ vattabbameva, “iṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇa”nti
tika-abh08t0:1000_9: pana vutte itaraṃ na vattabbaṃ abyākatassa vipākārahabhāvena iṭṭhavipākatāpasaṅgabhāvato?
tika-abh08t0:1000_10: Saccametaṃ, anavajja-padena kusalassa pavattisukhataṃ, iṭṭhavipāka-padena ca vipākasukhataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1000_11: dassetuṃ padadvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Anavajjapadañhi attano pavattisabhāvavasena lakkhaṇavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1000_12: itaraṃ kālantare vipākuppādanasamatthatāvasenāti. Atha vā kusalassa atthavisuddhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1000_13: dassetuṃ purimapadaṃ vuttaṃ, parisuddhavipākataṃ dassetuṃ pacchimaṃ. Purimaṃ vā kusalassa
tika-abh08t0:1000_14: akusalasabhāvato nivattanaṃ, pacchimaṃ abyākatasabhāvatoti alamatipapañcena. Ettha
tika-abh08t0:1000_15: ca “anavajja…pe… lakkhaṇa”nti vacanena kusalassa sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ anavajjaiṭṭhavipākasabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1000_16: kusalajātiyā sādhāraṇattā. Akusalādīnamasādhāraṇabhāvena sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ vāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1001_2: tadaṅgādippahānānaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti? Vuccate – dānādipuññakiriyavatthugatena tena
tika-abh08t0:1001_3: tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa maccherādiakusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1001_4: dīpālokena andhakāraviddhaṃsanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ, kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ parittānubhāvatāya
tika-abh08t0:1001_5: tehi attano ṭhitikkhaṇe viddhaṃsitānamakusalānaṃ tadapagame sati puna āgamena vottharaṇato.
tika-abh08t0:1001_6: Tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanasaṅkhātaṃ pavattinivāraṇavasena pahānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1001_7: vikkhambhanappahānaṃ, taṃ ghaṭappahārena jalatale sevālaviyūhanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1001_8: Yathā hi balavatā ghaṭappahārena dūrīkataṃ sevālaṃ tasmiṃ apanītepi taṃpahāravegena
tika-abh08t0:1001_9: sahasā na ottharati, evameva upacārappanābhedena jhānena vikkhambhitā kāmacchandādayo
tika-abh08t0:1001_10: tadappavattikālepi tassa balena sahasā na ottharantīti. Anuppattidhammatāpādanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1001_11: sammā ucchedavasena pahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ, taṃ pana asanisampātena rukkhādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1001_12: samūlaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi ariyamaggena samucchinnakilesā anusayamattakenāpi
tika-abh08t0:1001_13: santāne pavattanti. Yathā pana ekavārappavattenapi indagginā saha mūlehi viddhaṃsitā
tika-abh08t0:1001_14: rukkhādayo na puna viruhanti, evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikenapi tena attano uppādamatteneva
tika-abh08t0:1001_15: anusayamattaṭṭhāyinopi kilesā sabbena sabbaṃ viddhaṃsitāyeva honti.
tika-abh08t0:1002: Vodānaṃ visuddhi, saṃkilesamalavimuttīti attho, tathā hutvā paccupaṭṭhānamassāti vodānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, parisuddhākārena yogino ñāṇassa upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1003_1: ca rasapaccupaṭṭhānāni vatvā puna vajjapaṭipakkhabhāvavasena ca lakkhaṇaṃ, sampattiphalavasena
tika-abh08t0:1003_2: ca rasādikaṃ dassetuṃ “vajjapaṭipakkhattā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vajjānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1003_3: vajjapaṭipakkhattaṃ, tato. Etena “anavajjalakkhaṇa”nti ettha a-kāro paṭipakkhatthoti
tika-abh08t0:1003_4: dasseti, tena panassa abyākatato nivattanaṃ kataṃ. Itarathā hi nāssa vajjaṃ, vajjato
tika-abh08t0:1003_5: aññaṃ vā anavajjanti abyākatassāpi taṃlakkhaṇatāpasaṅgo siyā. “Vajjapaṭipakkhattā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1003_6: pana vutte yasmā kusalākusalānameva pahāyakappahātabbabhāvena ālokandhakārānaṃ viya
tika-abh08t0:1003_7: aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvo, tasmā kusalameva vajjapaṭipakkhattā anavajjalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1003_8: na aññanti ayamattho siddho hoti. Vodānabhāvarasanti vodānabhāvasampattikaṃ, kilesamalehi
tika-abh08t0:1003_9: asaṃkiliṭṭhabhāvena sampajjanakanti attho. Paccupaṭṭhāpīyati upanīyati kāraṇena,
tika-abh08t0:1003_10: attano vā kāraṇaṃ paṭicca, tappaṭibaddhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ vā upaṭṭhātīti paccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1004_0: Asati yonisomanasikāre kusalassa anuppajjanato, sati ca tasmiṃ uppajjanato tassa
tika-abh08t0:1004_1: so āsannakāraṇanti āha “yonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti. Tattha yoniso pathena upāyena
tika-abh08t0:1004_2: manasikāro yonisomanasikāro, atthato pana sānusayasantānavato channaṃ dvārānamāpāthagatesvārammaṇesu
tika-abh08t0:1004_3: patirūpadesavāsādisampattiyā kusaladhammānaṃ paccayabhāvena bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppannamāvajjanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1004_4: yonisomanasikāro nāma. Vuttapaṭipakkhavasena ayonisomanasikāropi daṭṭhabbo. Yaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1004_5: niranusayasantānasamaṅgissa kiriyacittānaṃ paccayabhāvena uppannaṃ, taṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t0:1004_8: uppattimattaṃ vinā na kassaci kusalākusalabhāvassa paccayo hotīti tadubhayavasena
tika-abh08t0:1005_0: Sāvajjāniṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇamakusalanti etthāpi “vajjā rāgādayo, te yassa santi, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1005_1: sāvajjaṃ, aniṭṭho vipāko yassa, taṃ aniṭṭhavipāka”ntiādinā vuttanayānusārena paṭipakkhayojanā
tika-abh08t0:1005_2: daṭṭhabbā. Rasādito panetaṃ anatthajananarasaṃ, saṃkilesapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Atha vā
tika-abh08t0:1005_4: ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Vacanatthato pana na kusalanti akusalaṃ, kusalapaṭipakkhanti
tika-abh08t0:1005_5: attho. Paṭipakkhatthe hi ayaṃ akāro, na pana aññatthe, nāpi abhāve. Itarathā hi tikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1005_6: na siyā, dukaṃ, catukkaṃ vā āpajjeyya. Tathā hi yadi kusalato aññamakusalaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1005_7: tadā abyākatassāpi tato aññabhāvena akusala-saddasaṅgahoti kusalākusalajātibhedato
tika-abh08t0:1005_8: duvidhanti dukaṃ vattabbaṃ. Yadi ca kusalābhāvo akusalaṃ, tena na kāci jāti gayhatīti
tika-abh08t0:1005_9: kusalābyākatajātibhedato dukameva vattabbaṃ. Atha siyā “abhāvopi visuṃ gahetabbo”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1005_10: evaṃ sati tassa jātiyā abhāvato jāti-saddena saha sambandho na siyā. Vijjamānassa
tika-abh08t0:1005_11: hi jāti nāma hoti. Yatheva vā kusalassa abhāvo, evaṃ abyākatassāpi abhāvo atthīti
tika-abh08t0:1005_12: anabyākatajātipi vattabbāti catukkaṃ āpajjeyya. Na cetamiṭṭhaṃ kusalādivasena tividhajātiyā
tika-abh08t0:1005_13: eva icchitattā, pāḷiyañca “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”ti tikavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:1005_14: vuttattā “kusalapaṭipakkha”nti pana vuccamāne mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya, lobhapaṭipakkho
tika-abh08t0:1005_15: alobho viya ca yaṃ dhammajātaṃ kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ, taṃ akusalanti tassa
tika-abh08t0:1005_16: vasena tikaṃ upapannaṃ hoti, ujuvipaccanīkatā cassa sāvajjāniṭṭhavipākattā, tena
tika-abh08t0:1005_17: pahātabbabhāvato ca veditabbā, na pana kusalavināsanato. Na hi akusalena kusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1005_18: pahīyati, mahābalattā pana kusalameva taṃ pajahati. Kusalañhi mahābalaṃ, akusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1005_19: dubbalaṃ. Tenevāha “abalā naṃ balīyanti, maddantenaṃ parissayā”ti, tasmā kusalameva
tika-abh08t0:1005_20: yathāvuttanayena akusalassa pahāyakaṃ, nākusalaṃ itarassāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1006_0: Tadubhaya…pe… abyākatanti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ kusalaṃ viya na anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1006_1: nāpi akusalaṃ viya sāvajjāniṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ, atha kho avipākattā tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1006_2: taṃ abyākatanti attho. Nanu ca “tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇa”nti vutte sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1006_3: viparītā upekkhāvedanā viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākānaṃ viparīto añño koci vipāko yassa
tika-abh08t0:1006_4: atthi, taṃ abyākatanti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati tathā asambhavato. Yathā hi ālokandhakārānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1006_5: viparīto añño koci natthi, evamiṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākānaṃ viparīto na koci vipāko atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:1006_6: Atha vā taṃ-saddo idha iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākanirapekkhaṃ kusalākusalamattameva paccāmasatīti
tika-abh08t0:1006_7: kusalākusalānaṃ savipākattā tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ avipākalakkhaṇanti atthoti
tika-abh08t0:1006_8: alamettha anuyogena. Kusalākusalabhāvena na byākatanti abyākataṃ. Kusalākusalañhi
tika-abh08t0:1006_9: vatvā abyākatassa vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva avuttattāti viññāyati, na pakārantarena.
tika-abh08t0:1006_10: Tathā avacanañca tassa tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇattāyeva, na pana avattabbattāmattenāti
tika-abh08t0:1006_11: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā vi-saddo virodhivacano. Ā-saddo abhimukhabhāvappakāsano, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1006_12: attano paccayehi aññamaññaṃ virodhābhimukhataṃ kataṃ lakkhaṇavirodhato pahāyakappahātabbabhāvato
