tika-abh08t0:1006_13: vāti byākataṃ, kusalākusalaṃ. Tato aññaṃ abyākataṃ. Tañhi lakkhaṇato aññamaññaṃ kusalākusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1006_14: viya na tassa viruddhaṃ. Na hi avipākataṃ aniṭṭhavipākatā viya, iṭṭhavipākatāya iṭṭhavipākatā
tika-abh08t0:1006_15: viya ca aniṭṭhavipākatāya iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākatāhi virujjhati, na cāpi abyākataṃ kusalākusalesu
tika-abh08t0:1006_16: kiñci pajahati, na ca kenaci pahātabbanti. “Tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇamabyākata”nti
tika-abh08t0:1006_17: viññāyamāne ahosi kammaṃ, nāhosi kammavipāko, natthi kammavipāko, na bhavissati kammavipākoti
tika-abh08t0:1006_18: iminā tikena saṅgahitassa gatiupadhikālappayogavipattīhi avipākassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādikammassa
tika-abh08t0:1006_19: bhāvanāyapahātabbassa akusalassa ca abhiññākusalassa ca vipākuppādanābhāvato “siyā
tika-abh08t0:1006_20: nu kho abyākatabhāvo vā”ti kadāci koci cinteyyāti tannivāraṇatthamāha “avipākārahaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1006_21: vā”ti, vipākaṃ dātuṃ nārahati tattha sāmatthiyābhāvatoti avipākārahaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1006_22: hoti – diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādayo tāva paccayavekallādīhi kāraṇehi avipākā, sace panete
tika-abh08t0:1006_23: tabbidūrā assu, tadā vipākadāne samatthatāya vipākārahāyeva, taṃ pana na tathā, atha
tika-abh08t0:1006_24: kho yena kenaci ākārena vipākadāne asamatthatāyeva vipākārahaṃ na hoti, taṃ abyākataṃ nāmāti.
tika-abh08t0:1007_0: Idāni evaṃ tikavasena niddiṭṭhesu kusalādīsu paṭhamaṃ tāva kusalacittaṃ vibhajanto
tika-abh08t0:1007_1: “tattha kusalacitta”ntiādinā tassa gaṇanaparicchedaṃ dasseti. Ekavīsatividhanti aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:1007_2: kāmāvacarāni, pañca rūpāvacarāni, cattāri arūpāvacarāni, cattāri lokuttarānīti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1007_4: catunnaṃ bhūmīnaṃ vasena tattha pavattamānaṃ cittampi catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha bhavanti
tika-abh08t0:1007_5: etthāti bhūmi, ṭhānaṃ, avatthā ca. Avatthāpi hi avatthavantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya
tika-abh08t0:1007_6: gayhati. Evañhi nesaṃ sukhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Avatthāti cettha dhammānaṃ kāmataṇhādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1007_7: paricchinnāparicchinnabhāvo. Tattha purimā tisso bhūmiyo ubhayavasena veditabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1007_8: itarā avatthāvaseneva. Na hi lokuttaradhammānaṃ kāmabhavādito aññaṃ ṭhānamupalabbhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1008_0: Aññattha pavattamānassāpi vakkhamānanayena kāmabhūmipariyāpannattā bhūmito ekavidhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1008_1: Savatthukāvatthukabhedatoti cakkhādīni pañca, hadayañcāti cha vatthūni. Kusalassa
tika-abh08t0:1008_2: pana cakkhādinissitattābhāvato hadayavatthu idha vatthūti adhippetaṃ. Tena sahitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1008_4: Tattha hi arūpassa rūpapaṭibandhappavatti, arūpadhātuyaṃ pana rūpābhāvato vatthuvirahitameva
tika-abh08t0:1008_5: pavattatīti tattha pavattamānaṃ avatthukaṃ. Hīna…pe… tividhanti ettha paccayato,
tika-abh08t0:1008_6: phalato ca majjhimapaṇītehi nihīnaṃ, tesaṃ vā guṇehi parihīnanti hīnaṃ, attano paccayehi
tika-abh08t0:1008_7: padhānabhāvaṃ nītanti paṇītaṃ, ubhinnaṃ vemajjhe bhavaṃ majjhimaṃ. Tattha hīnena
tika-abh08t0:1008_8: chandena cittena vīriyena vīmaṃsāya vā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ, majjhimehi chandādīhi pavattitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1008_9: majjhimaṃ, paṇītehi paṇītaṃ. Chandādīnaṃ pana hīnādibhāvo adhimuttivasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1008_10: Hīnādhimuttivasena hi nesaṃ hīnatā, paṇītādhimuttivasena paṇītatā, tadubhayavemajjhavasena
tika-abh08t0:1008_11: majjhimatā. Yasakāmatāya vā kataṃ kusalaṃ hīnaṃ, puññaphalakāmatāya majjhimaṃ, “puññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1008_12: nāmetaṃ sādhūhi kattabbamevā”ti evaṃ ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya kataṃ paṇītaṃ. “Ahamasmi
tika-abh08t0:1008_13: dānapati, ime panaññe dānadāsādayo”tiādinā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāhi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1008_14: pavattitaṃ vā hīnaṃ, tathā anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ majjhimaṃ, maggaphalapadaṭṭhānaṃ paṇītaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1008_15: Bhavabhogasampattinimittaṃ vā kataṃ hīnaṃ, sāvakapaccekabodhipāramitāvasena attano
tika-abh08t0:1008_16: vimokkhatthāya kataṃ majjhimaṃ, sammāsambodhipāramitāvasena sabbesaṃ vimokkhatthāya kataṃ paṇītanti.
tika-abh08t0:1009_1: ñāṇabhedato payogabhedato”ti. Tattha payogabhedatoti saṅkhārabhedatoti attho. Nanu
tika-abh08t0:1009_2: ca somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā. Ñāṇappayogabhedo pana
tika-abh08t0:1009_3: kathanti? Vuccate – ñāṇappayogakato bhedo ñāṇappayogabhedo tesaṃ bhāvābhāvamupādāya
tika-abh08t0:1009_4: pavattattā. Idāni tameva somanassupekkhādibhedaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “seyyathida”nti
tika-abh08t0:1009_5: pucchitvā “somanassasahagata”ntiādinā vissajjeti. Tattha seyyathidanti taṃ katamaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1010_0: Sobhanaṃ mano, sobhanaṃ vā mano etassāti sumano, tassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, mānasikasukhavedanāyetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1010_1: adhivacanaṃ, somanassena uppādato yāva nirodhā sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttanti
tika-abh08t0:1010_2: attho. Atha vā somanassena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatanti somanassasahagataṃ. Jānāti
tika-abh08t0:1010_3: yathāsabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhatīti ñāṇaṃ, tena samaṃ ekuppādādīhi pakārehi yuttanti ñāṇasampayuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1010_4: Nāssa saṅkhāro atthīti asaṅkhāraṃ, asaṅkhārameva asaṅkhārikaṃ. Saha saṅkhārena pavattamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1010_5: sasaṅkhāraṃ, tadeva sasaṅkhārikaṃ. Saṅkhāroti cettha attano, parassa vā pubbappayogo
tika-abh08t0:1010_6: “saṅkharoti tikkhabhāvasaṅkhātena maṇḍanavisesena sajjeti, saṅkharīyati vā sajjīyati
tika-abh08t0:1010_7: cittaṃ etenā”ti katvā. Tattha dānādipuññakaraṇakāle maccheramalathinamiddhādīhi upakkilesehi
tika-abh08t0:1010_8: saṃsīdamāne citte upakkilesavūpasamavasena, cittassa ca ussāhajananavasena tīsu dvāresu
tika-abh08t0:1010_9: pavatto sammāvāyāmo attano payogo nāma. Kusalakaraṇe nirussāhassa pana “ambho, sappurisa,
tika-abh08t0:1010_10: kusalakaraṇaṃ nāma paṇḍitehi āsevitamaggo, tattha tayāpi paṭipajjituṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1010_11: dānaṃ dehi, sīlaṃ rakkha, tañhi te atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”tiādinā kusalakaraṇatthāya
tika-abh08t0:1010_12: ussāhajananavasena paresaṃ kāyavacīdvāresu pavattā āṇatti parappayogo nāma. Tesu
tika-abh08t0:1010_13: pana purimo pubbabhāgappavattacittasantāne, pacchimo paresaṃ cittasantāneyeva sambhavatīti
tika-abh08t0:1010_14: tannibbattito cittassa tikkhabhāvasaṅkhāto viseso idha upacārato saṅkhāroti veditabbo. Tenāhu ācariyā –
tika-abh08t0:1013_0: Atha vā “sasaṅkhārikamasaṅkhārika”nti ca etaṃ kevalaṃ saṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvamattāpekkhāya
tika-abh08t0:1013_1: vuttaṃ, na tassa sahappavattisabbhāvābhāvatoti bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa
tika-abh08t0:1013_2: idamatthitāya taṃvasena nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ saha-saddassa
tika-abh08t0:1013_3: vijjamānatthaparidīpanato “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu viya. Tabbiparītaṃ pana tadabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1013_4: yathāvuttavaseneva asaṅkhārikaṃ. Atha vā saṅkharaṇaṃ, saṅkharīyati vā etena āgantukasambhūtena
tika-abh08t0:1013_5: cittasaṃsīdanasabhāvāpanayanavaseneva sajjīyati, saṅkharoti vā taṃ yathāvuttavasenevāti
tika-abh08t0:1013_6: saṅkhāroti ujukameva pubbappayogajanito tikkhabhāvo vuccati, tadabhāvato asaṅkhārikaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1013_7: sabhāvatikkhanti attho. Taṃsahagatāya sasaṅkhārikaṃ, atha vā maccheramalādīhi saṅkharīyatīti
tika-abh08t0:1013_8: saṅkhāro, cittassa saṃsīdanasabhāvo, so yassa natthīti asaṅkhārikaṃ, itaraṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1013_9: Paṇītautubhojanādiko vā balavapaccayo saṅkhāro “saṅkharoti cittaṃ tikkhabhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:1013_10: saṅkharīyati vā taṃ etenā”ti katvā. A-kārassa vuḍḍhatthavuttitāya vuḍḍhippatto saṅkhāro
tika-abh08t0:1013_11: assāti asaṅkhārikaṃ, balavapaccayavantanti attho. Vuḍḍhiparidīpakena pana a-kārena
tika-abh08t0:1013_12: avisesitattā sasaṅkhārikaṃ sappaccayaṃ dubbalapaccayanti adhippāyo. Ñāṇena vippayuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1014_0: Upekkhatīti upekkhā, vediyamānāpi ārammaṇaṃ ajjhupekkhati, majjhattākārasaṇṭhitiyāti
tika-abh08t0:1014_1: attho. Atha vā iṭṭhe, aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito yuttito ikkhati
tika-abh08t0:1014_2: anubhavatīti upekkhā. Atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti
tika-abh08t0:1014_3: upekkhā. Aviruddhattāyeva hesā tesaṃ anantarampi pavattati. Sukhadukkhavedanā pana
tika-abh08t0:1014_4: visuṃ visuṃ viruddhasabhāvattā nāññamaññaṃ anantaraṃ pavattanti. Teneva hi paṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:1014_5: somanassassa anantaraṃ domanassassa, domanassassa anantaraṃ somanassassa ca uppatti
tika-abh08t0:1014_6: paṭisiddhā. Ayañca attho lobhasahagatacittasampayuttavedanāyapi labbhati, purimā
tika-abh08t0:1014_7: pana dve na tathā. Na hi lobhasahagatādīnaṃ majjhattākārena ajjhupekkhanaṃ, upapattito
tika-abh08t0:1014_8: ikkhanaṃ vā atthīti. Upekkhāsahagatanti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-abh08t0:1015_0: Nanu ca aññepi phassādayo sampayuttadhammā atthīti somanassādīnaṃ vaseneva pana aṭṭhavidhatā
tika-abh08t0:1015_1: kasmā gahitāti? Bhedakarabhāvato. Phassādīnañhi sabbacittasādhāraṇattā, saddhādīnañca
tika-abh08t0:1015_2: sabbakusalasādhāraṇattā na tehi cittassa vibhāgo, somanassādayo pana katthaci citte
tika-abh08t0:1015_3: honti, katthaci na hontīti pākaṭova tehi cittassa vibhāgoti. Kasmā panete katthaci
tika-abh08t0:1015_4: citte honti, katthaci na hontīti? Kāraṇassa sannihitāsannihitabhāvato. Kiṃ pana nesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1015_5: kāraṇanti? Vuccate – tattha somanassasahagatabhāvo tāva ārammaṇavasena hoti. Iṭṭhārammaṇasmiñhi
tika-abh08t0:1015_6: somanassasahagatacittamuppajjati. Nanu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ lobhassa vatthu rajjanīyattāti
tika-abh08t0:1015_7: kathaṃ tattha kusalaṃ uppajjatīti? Nayidamekantikaṃ iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe niyamitādivasena
tika-abh08t0:1015_8: kusalassa uppajjanato. Yassa hi “kusalameva mayā kattabba”nti kusalakaraṇeyeva cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1015_9: niyamitaṃ hoti, akusalappavattitova nivattetvā kusalakaraṇeyeva pariṇāmitaṃ, abhiṇhakaraṇena
tika-abh08t0:1015_11: yoniso ca ābhogo pavattati, tassa iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe alobhasampayuttameva cittamuppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1018_0: Apica saddhābahulatādīhi ca kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatatā veditabbā. Assaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1018_1: hi micchādiṭṭhikānañca ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇabhūtaṃ tathāgatarūpampi disvā somanassaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1018_2: na uppajjati. Ye ca kusalappavattiyaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ na passanti, tesaṃ parehi ussāhitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1018_3: kusalaṃ karontānampi somanassaṃ na uppajjati, tasmā saddhābahulatā visuddhidiṭṭhitā
tika-abh08t0:1018_4: ānisaṃsadassāvitāti imehipi kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatatā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1019_0: Apica ye te ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti. Seyyathidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1019_1: – buddhānussati dhammānussati saṃghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati
tika-abh08t0:1019_3: tadadhimuttatāti imehipi kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatabhāvo veditabbo. Buddhādiguṇe
tika-abh08t0:1019_4: anussarantassa hi yāva upacāruppādā sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā pīti uppajjati. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:1019_5: dīgharattaṃ akkhaṇḍatādivasena attanā rakkhitaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paccavekkhantassa,
tika-abh08t0:1019_6: gihino dasasīlaṃ pañcasīlaṃ paccavekkhantassa, dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1019_7: sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā “evaṃnāma dānaṃ adāsi”nti attanocāgaṃ paccavekkhantassa, gihinopi
tika-abh08t0:1019_8: tathārūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassa, yehi guṇehi samannāgatā
tika-abh08t0:1019_9: devā devattaṃ gatā, tathārūpānaṃ guṇānaṃ attani atthitaṃ paccavekkhantassa, samathavipassanāhi
tika-abh08t0:1019_10: vikkhambhitakilese saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni asamudācarante disvā “aho mayhaṃ kilesā
tika-abh08t0:1019_11: na samudācarantī”ti cintentassa, cetiyadassanatheradassanesu asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsucitalūkhabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1019_12: buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena gadrabhapiṭṭhe rajasadise lūkhapuggale parivajjantassa,
tika-abh08t0:1019_13: buddhādīsu pasādabahule muducitte siniddhapuggale paṭisevantassa, ratanattayaguṇaparidīpake
tika-abh08t0:1019_15: pavattentassa yebhuyyena pīti uppajjati. Pītiyā ca somanassena saha avinābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1019_16: taduppattiyā tassāpi uppatti niyatāti evaṃ pītikāraṇānipi somanassakāraṇānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1019_17: Kiñca – agambhīrapakatitā, somanassapaṭisandhikatāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi somanassasahagatatā
tika-abh08t0:1019_18: hoti. Yo hi agambhīrapakatiko hoti, appamattakepi hitopakaraṇe tussati, yo ca somanassapaṭisandhiko
tika-abh08t0:1019_19: appasannesu ārammaṇesupi appaṭikkūladassāvī, tassa yebhuyyena somanassasahagatacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1019_20: uppajjati. Yathāvuttānaṃ pana somanassakāraṇānamabhāvena majjhattārammaṇatāya ca
tika-abh08t0:1020_0: Ñāṇasampayuttassa pana kammato upapattito indriyaparipākato kilesadūrībhāvatoti imehi
tika-abh08t0:1020_1: kāraṇehi hoti. Yo hi paresaṃ hitajjhāsayena dhammaṃ deseti hīnukkaṭṭhādīni ca naḷakāramuddāgaṇanādīni
tika-abh08t0:1020_2: sippāyatanāni, vaḍḍhakīkasivāṇijjādīni ca kammāyatanāni, visaharaṇādīni ca vijjāyatanānīti
tika-abh08t0:1020_3: evaṃ niravajjasippāyatanādīni sikkhāpeti, sayaṃ vā sikkhati, dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1020_4: katvā dhammaṃ kathāpeti, “āyatiṃ paññavā bhavissāmī”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nānappakāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1020_5: puññakammaṃ karoti, tassevaṃ nānappakāraṃ paññāsaṃvattanikakammaṃ sampādentassa taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1020_6: kammaṃ upanissāya uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati. Tathā abyāpajje
tika-abh08t0:1020_7: loke uppannassa uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1021: “Tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadāni pilavanti, dandho, bhikkhave, satuppādo, atha so satto khippameva visesabhāgī hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1022_0: Tathā paññādasakaṃ sampattassa indriyaparipākaṃ nissāya uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1022_1: hoti. Yena pana samathavipassanābhāvanāhi kilesā vikkhambhitā, tassa kilesadūrībhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1022_2: nissāya uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1024_0: Apica ye te dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti. Seyyathidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1024_3: ñāṇasampayuttabhāvo hoti. Tathā hi yo paññavante upasaṅkamma khandhadhātuāyatanaindriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgasamathavipassanādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1024_4: paripucchābahulo hoti, tassa taṃvasena uppannaṃ sutamayañāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā uppajjamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1024_5: cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti. Yena pana nakhakesacīvarasenāsanādīni ajjhattikabāhiravatthūni
tika-abh08t0:1024_6: pubbe avisadāni chedanamalaharaṇādinā visadāni katāni, tassevaṃ visadavatthukassa
tika-abh08t0:1024_7: uppannesu cittacetasikesu visadaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakādīni nissāya
tika-abh08t0:1024_8: uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya. Yassa ca saddhindriyādīsu aññataraṃ balavaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1024_9: itarāni mandāni, tato tāni sakasakakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā so tassa bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge
tika-abh08t0:1024_10: āgatanayena tena tena ākārena samattaṃ paṭipādeti, tassevaṃ indriyānaṃ samattaṃ paṭipādentassa
tika-abh08t0:1024_11: vipassanāñāṇādīnaṃ vasena cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti. Yo pana duppaññapuggale parivajjeti,
tika-abh08t0:1024_12: paññavantapuggale vā payirupāsati, khandhādīsu ogāḷhaṃ bhagavato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1024_13: vā paccavekkhati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu tadadhimuttacitto vā viharati, imesampi uppajjamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1024_14: kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. Apica buddhādiguṇānussaraṇenapi cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1025_0: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye
tika-abh08t0:1025_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa
tika-abh08t0:1025_2: tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha. Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako
tika-abh08t0:1025_3: labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pamuditassa
tika-abh08t0:1025_4: pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1026_1: Kiñca – tihetukapaṭisandhikatā ñāṇuppattikāraṇaṃ. Paṭisandhipaññā hi ādito paṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:1026_2: bhavaṅgasantativasena bahulaṃ pavattamānā santānaparibhāvanena ñāṇuppattiyā savisesaupanissayo
tika-abh08t0:1026_3: hoti. Asaṅkhārikattaṃ pana sappāyautubhojanaāvāsādipaccayehi hotīti. Honti cettha –
tika-abh08t0:1039: Evaṃ vedanāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacaracittaṃ niddisitvā idāni taṃ nigamento āha “idaṃ…pe… nāmā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1040_0: 12. Yena panatthena idaṃ “kāmāvacara”nti vuccati, taṃ dāni dassetuṃ “uddānato”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:1040_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha uddānatoti uddesato, saṅkhepatoti attho. Kiñcāpi avasiṭṭhakilesādayo
tika-abh08t0:1040_2: viya kilesakāmopi assādetabbatāya vatthukāme saṅgahito ñāṇaṃ viya ñeyyeti saṅkhepato
tika-abh08t0:1040_3: ekoyeva kāmo siyā, tathāpi kilesakāmo vatthukāmabhāvaṃ gacchanto kāmanīyaṭṭhena gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:1040_4: na kāmanavasena. Kāmanavasena ca pana kilesakāmova hoti, na pana vatthukāmoti āha
tika-abh08t0:1040_5: “klesavatthuvasā”tiādi. Ko panettha vatthukāmo, ko kilesakāmoti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya
tika-abh08t0:1040_6: “chando kāmo, rāgo kāmo, chandarāgo kāmo, saṅkappo kāmo, rāgo kāmo, saṅkapparāgo
tika-abh08t0:1040_7: kāmo”ti evaṃ niddesapāḷiyaṃ āgatā niddiṭṭhā kāmataṇhāva idha kilesakāmo. Vatthukāmoti
tika-abh08t0:1040_8: ca “manāpikā rūpā…pe… manāpikā phoṭṭhabbā…pe… sabbepi kāmāvacarā dhammā…pe… sabbepi
tika-abh08t0:1040_9: rūpāvacarā…pe… sabbepi arūpāvacarā…pe… kāmā”ti tattheva niddiṭṭhā saviññāṇāviññāṇappabhedā
tika-abh08t0:1040_11: kilesabhāvena niruḷhesu lobhadosamohādīsu dasasu dosamohādayo nava kilese paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh08t0:1040_12: Kāmarūpārūpataṇhāya vatthu patiṭṭhānaṃ, kāraṇabhūtanti vā vatthu.
tika-abh08t0:1041_0: 13. Kathaṃ pana kilesakāmo nāma, kathañca vatthukāmoti āha “kilesakāmo”tiādi. Kāmetīti
tika-abh08t0:1041_1: vatthukāmaṃ pattheti. Kāmīyatīti kilesakāmena patthīyati. Iti-saddo “tasmā”ti imassa
tika-abh08t0:1041_2: atthe. Ca-saddo eva-kāratthe, tena yasmā kilesakāmo kāmetīti kāmo, vatthukāmo ca
tika-abh08t0:1041_3: kāmīyatīti, tasmā eva kilesakāmo, vatthukāmo cāti duvidhopi esa kāmo kārakadvaye
tika-abh08t0:1041_4: kattari, kammani ca sijjhati, kattubhāvaṃ, kammabhāvañca paccanubhotīti attho. Atha
tika-abh08t0:1041_5: vā duvidhoti dvinnaṃ kāmānaṃ vācakato duvidho. “Kāmo”ti ayaṃ saddo kārakadvaye sijjhati
tika-abh08t0:1041_6: yathāvuttakārakayugaḷe nipphajjati, kattari, kammani ca “kāmo”ti padasambhavo hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1041_7: attho. Vo-kāro pana nipātamattaṃ “evaṃ vo kālāmā”tiādīsu viya. Atha vā vokārakadvayeti
tika-abh08t0:1041_8: khandhadvayeti attho. Kilesakāmo hi saṅkhārasabhāvattā saṅkhārakkhandhe, vatthukāmo
tika-abh08t0:1041_9: ca vakkhamānanayena pañcakāmaguṇabhūto rūpasabhāvattā rūpakkhandheti evaṃ duvidhopesa
tika-abh08t0:1041_10: kāmo khandhadvaye sijjhati nipphajjati, antobhāvaṃ gacchatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1042_0: 14. Sampajjanāni sampattiyo, tāsaṃ vasena visayavisayībhāvena aññamaññaṃ samosaraṇavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1042_1: sampāpuṇanavasenāti attho. Iminā pana idaṃ dīpeti – yattha duvidhopi kāmo visayavisayībhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1042_2: sahito pavattati, soyeva ekādasavidho padeso kāmāvacarasaññito. Yattha pana rūpārūpadhātuyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1042_3: kevalaṃ vatthukāmova pavattati, na so padeso kāmāvacaro nāmāti. Nanu ca duvidhopi
tika-abh08t0:1042_4: sahito rūpārūpadhātūsu pavattati, rūpārūpāvacaradhammānaṃ vatthukāmattā, tadārammaṇabhūtānañca
tika-abh08t0:1042_6: bahalakilesasseva kāmarāgassa idha kilesakāmabhāvena adhippetattā. “Uddānato duve
tika-abh08t0:1042_7: kāmā”ti sabbe kāme uddisitvāpi hi “padeso catupāyāna”ntiādinā visayaniyamanena “duvidhopi
tika-abh08t0:1042_8: aya”nti ettha kāmekadesabhūto nīvaraṇāvatthāya kathito kāmarāgo kilesakāmabhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:1042_9: tabbatthukāyeva dhammā vatthukāmabhāvena gahitā, na rūpārūpataṇhā, tabbatthukadhammā
tika-abh08t0:1042_10: cāti ñāpīyati. Evañca katvā upari vakkhamānā sasatthāvacarūpamā upapannā hoti, yathāvuttānameva
tika-abh08t0:1042_12: kāmāvacaradhammesu pavatto chandarāgo kilesakāmo nāma na hoti, na ca tabbatthubhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1042_13: vimānakapparukkhādiparittadhammajātaṃ vatthukāmo nāmāti siddhaṃ. Tenevāha “kāmo vā
tika-abh08t0:1042_14: kāmasaññā vā brahmaloke na vijjatī”ti. Kāmāvacarasattasantānagatataṇhāya visayabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1042_15: sati pana taṃyogena rūpārūpadhātūsupi pavattamāno parittadhammo vatthukāmoyevāti
tika-abh08t0:1042_16: veditabbaṃ. Atha vā niddese āgatanayena niravaseso kilesakāmo kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhānirodhataṇhāpabhedo
tika-abh08t0:1042_17: idha pavattati. Vatthukāmesupi appakaṃ rūpārūpavipākamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabboyeva idha
tika-abh08t0:1042_18: pavattatīti anavasesappavattiṃ sandhāya “kāmoyaṃ duvidhopi cā”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi
tika-abh08t0:1042_19: evaṃ vuttaṃ, tesu pana bahalakilesakāmabhūto bahalakāmarāgo ca tabbatthukā pañca
tika-abh08t0:1042_20: kāmaguṇā ca idha gahitāti dassanatthaṃ “sampattīnaṃ vasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Sampajjanavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1042_21: samijjhanavasenāti attho. Avacaratīti pavattati. Iti-saddo hetumhi, yasmā duvidhopi
tika-abh08t0:1042_22: ayaṃ kāmo avacarati, tasmā kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacarasaññitoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1043_0: 15. Saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā yebhuyyena apetāti apāyā. Nirayādivasena
tika-abh08t0:1043_2: channaṃ devalokānaṃ. Merupādavāsino pana asurā tāvatiṃsesuyeva saṅgayhantīti na tehi
tika-abh08t0:1043_3: saddhiṃ sattannanti vuttaṃ. Manaso ussannatāya manussā, satisūrabhāvabrahmacariyayogyatādiguṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1043_4: upacitamānasatāya ukkaṭṭhaguṇacittatāyāti attho, te pana nippariyāyato jambudīpavāsino
tika-abh08t0:1044: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse. Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1045_0: Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi “manussā”icceva
tika-abh08t0:1045_1: paññāyiṃsu. Lokiyā pana manuno apaccabhāveneva “manussā”ti vadanti. Ekādasavidhoti
tika-abh08t0:1045_2: caturāpāyesu tiracchānapettivisayānaṃ visuṃ paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvepi yattha
tika-abh08t0:1045_3: te araññasamuddapabbatapādādike nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti, tādisassa ṭhānassa gahitattā ekādasavidho.
tika-abh08t0:1046_0: 16. Nanu cettha aññesampi dhammānaṃ pavattisambhavato kāmasseva avacaraṇavasena kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1046_1: nāmalābhoti āha “assābhilakkhitattā”tiādi. Tattha assāti imassa duvidhassa kāmassa.
tika-abh08t0:1046_2: Abhilakkhitattāti ekādasavidhe padese pākaṭattā. Atha vā assāti karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1046_3: tasmā anena duvidhena kāmena ekādasavidhassa padesassa abhilakkhitattā, paññāpitattāti
tika-abh08t0:1046_4: attho. Atha vā upayogatthe sāmivacanavasena assa ekādasavidhassa padesassa tena duvidhena
tika-abh08t0:1046_5: abhilakkhitattāti attho. Saha satthehīti sasatthā, yattha te avacaranti, so sasatthāvacaro,
tika-abh08t0:1046_6: padeso. So viya. Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā purisā avacaranti, so vijjamānesupi
tika-abh08t0:1046_7: aññesu dvipadacatuppadādīsu avacarantesu tesaṃ tattha pākaṭattā, tehi vā abhilakkhitattā
tika-abh08t0:1046_8: “sasatthāvacaro”tveva paññāyati, evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu avacarantesu
tika-abh08t0:1046_9: abhilakkhaṇavasena ayaṃ padeso “kāmāvacaro”tveva saññitoti. Esa nayo rūpārūpāvacaresu.
tika-abh08t0:1047_0: 17-8. Nanu ca cittaṃ kāmāvacaranti vuttaṃ, yathāvuttanayena pana padesassa gahitattā
tika-abh08t0:1047_1: kathaṃ tattha avacarantaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nāmāti āha “svāya”ntiādi. So ayaṃ kāmāvacaro
tika-abh08t0:1047_2: “kāmo”ti saññitoti sambandho. Rūpabhavo rūpanti yathā rūpabhavo rūpaṃ. Avuttopi hi
tika-abh08t0:1047_3: yathāsaddo evaṃ-saddasanniṭṭhānato labbhati. Yathā “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1047_4: ettha “rūpabhavūpapattiyā”ti vattabbe rūpabhavo “rūpa”nti saññitoti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh08t0:1047_5: Kathaṃ panesa evaṃ saññitoti āha “uttarassā”tiādi. Atha vā yathā uttarassa padassa
tika-abh08t0:1047_6: lopaṃ katvā udīrito esa rūpabhavo “rūpa”nti saññito, evaṃ svāyaṃ kāmāvacaro kāmoti
tika-abh08t0:1047_7: sambandho. Tasmiṃ kāmeti tasmiṃ uttarapadalopavasena kāmasaññite padese. Idanti idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1047_8: aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ. Adhikāravasena pana tassa gahaṇepi sabbesameva parittacittānamayamattho
tika-abh08t0:1047_9: labbhati sabbesampi kāme avacaraṇato. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ, bāhulyenāti adhippāyo. Iminā
tika-abh08t0:1047_10: pana idaṃ dīpeti – yathā saṅgāme yebhuyyena avacaranto “saṅgāmāvacaro”ti laddhanāmo
tika-abh08t0:1047_12: evamidaṃ aññattha avacarantampi kāmaloke bāhullavuttito “kāmāvacara”micceva vuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1047_13: Tena pana nanu cetaṃ rūpārūpabhavesupi avacaraṇato rūpāvacarādināmampi labheyyāti
tika-abh08t0:1050_0: Iti-saddo hetumhi. Ca-saddo vattabbantarasamuccaye. Tena yasmā uttarapadalopena kāmāvacaro
tika-abh08t0:1050_1: “kāmo”ti saññito, yasmā ca tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ sadā avacarati, tasmā “kāmāvacara”micceva
tika-abh08t0:1050_2: kathitaṃ, na pana kāmāvacarāvacaraṃ, nāpi rūpārūpāvacaranti vāti adhippāyo. Kāmaghātināti
tika-abh08t0:1051_0: 19. Paṭisandhiṃ …pe… avacārayatīti vāti atha vā yasmā yattha katthaci uppannampi
tika-abh08t0:1051_1: kāme bhaveyeva paṭisandhiṃ avacārayati, tasmā idaṃ kāme avacārayatīti “kāmāvacara”nti
tika-abh08t0:1051_2: kathitaṃ cā-saddassa rassattaṃ katvāti attho. Evaṃ uttarapadalopavasena padasambhavaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1051_3: dassetvā idāni vināpi uttarapadalopaṃ kāmāvacara-saddassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyāpannanti
tika-abh08t0:1051_4: tatra vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tatrāti tasmiṃ kāmabhave. Pariyāpannanti antogadhaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo –
tika-abh08t0:1052_0: “Katame dhammā kāmāvacarā? Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī
tika-abh08t0:1052_1: deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā
tika-abh08t0:1052_2: rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ. Ime dhammā kāmāvacarā”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1053_0: Vuttattā yathā manussitthiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattopi tiracchānagatiko tiracchānayoniyameva
tika-abh08t0:1053_1: pariyāpannattā “tiracchāno”tveva vuccati, evamidaṃ rūpārūpabhavesu uppannampi kāmabhavapariyāpannattā
tika-abh08t0:1053_3: kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvatoti veditabbā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-abh08t0:1053_5: visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti. Padasambhavo panettha evaṃ veditabbo – kāmataṇhā
tika-abh08t0:1053_6: kāmo, so ettha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avacaratīti kāmāvacaranti. Nanu cettha katamā
tika-abh08t0:1053_7: kāmataṇhā, yā kāmāvacaradhammārammaṇā taṇhā. Katame kāmāvacaradhammā, ye kāmataṇhāvisayāti
tika-abh08t0:1053_8: evaṃ itarītaranissayatādoso āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, avīciādiekādasokāsaninnatāya yaṃkiñci
tika-abh08t0:1053_9: taṇhaṃ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṃsabhāvāya taṇhāya visayabhāvena kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1053_10: upalakkhetabbabhāvato. Atha vā kilesavatthuvasena duvidhopi kāmo yathārahaṃ sahajātavasena
tika-abh08t0:1053_11: ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā duvidhepi kāme etaṃ avacaratīti
tika-abh08t0:1053_12: kāmāvacaraṃ. Atha vā mañcanissitakesu ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontesu nissayanissitānaṃ abhedassa
tika-abh08t0:1053_13: buddhiyā gahitattā nissitakesu nissayūpacāravasena “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1056_0: 20. Pujjaphalanibbattanato, attasantānaṃ punanato ca puññāni, kattabbatāya kiriyā,
tika-abh08t0:1056_1: tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthutāya vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni. Gaṇanato dasaparimāṇattā
tika-abh08t0:1056_2: dasa ca tāni puññakiriyavatthūni cāti dasa puññakiriyavatthūni, tesaṃ vasenāti dasapuññakriyavatthuvasena,
tika-abh08t0:1056_3: dasapuññakiriyavatthubhāvena taṃmayaṃ hutvāti attho. Eva-kārena pana rūpārūpalokuttaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1056_4: viya na kevalaṃ bhāvanāvasenevāti dasseti. Atha vā dasapuññakiriyavatthuvaseneva
tika-abh08t0:1057_0: 21. Kāni pana tāni dasapuññakiriyavatthūni, yesaṃ vasena idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1057_1: pavattatīti vuttanti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “dānaṃ sīla”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:1057_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha diyyati etenāti dānaṃ, pariccāgacetanā. Idha pana cittādhikāravasena
tika-abh08t0:1057_3: taṃsampayuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Tathā “sīlā”dīsupi. Sīlatīti sīlaṃ, kāyavacīkammāni samādahatīti
tika-abh08t0:1057_4: attho. Susilyavasena hi kāyakammādīni avippakiṇṇāni sampati, āyatiñca hitasukhāvahāni
tika-abh08t0:1057_5: sammā ṭhapitāni samāhitāni honti, sīlayati upadhāretīti vā sīlaṃ. Upadhāraṇaṃ panettha
tika-abh08t0:1057_6: kusalānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Bhāveti kusaladhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāyāti bhāvanā.
tika-abh08t0:1057_7: Attano santāne nipphannā patti diyyati etenāti pattidānaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe byāvaṭassa
tika-abh08t0:1057_8: bhāvo veyyāvaccaṃ. Deseti etāyāti desanā. Pattiṃ anumodati etenāti pattānumodo. Pubbapadalopena
tika-abh08t0:1057_9: pana “anumodo”ti vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhiyā ujubhāvo diṭṭhijuttaṃ, sammādiṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1057_10: attho. Attano, parassa vā hitajjhāsayavasena sammā suṇanti etāyāti saṃsuti. Pūjāvasena
tika-abh08t0:1057_11: apacāyati sāmīciṃ karoti etenāti apacāyo. Puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ pabhedo puññakiriyavatthuppabhedo.
tika-abh08t0:1057_12: Majjhapadalopavasena pana “puññavatthuppabhedo”ti vuttaṃ yathā ājaññayutto ratho
tika-abh08t0:1058_0: Ayaṃ pana vinicchayo – tattha sekhaputhujjanānaṃ paraṃ uddissa pūjānuggahakāmatāya
tika-abh08t0:1058_2: nāma. Khīṇāsavānampi tathā pavattā dānameva, sā pana puññakiriyā nāma na hotīti na
tika-abh08t0:1058_3: idha adhippetā. Pujjaphalanibbattanato, hi attasantānaṃ punanato ca puññaṃ, na ca
tika-abh08t0:1058_4: khīṇāsavasantāne pavattā phalanibbattikā hoti, na ca taṃ punāti visuddhasantānappavattattāti. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh08t0:1059_0: Yā pana niccasīlauposathasīlādivasena pañcasīlaṃ aṭṭhasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādiyantassa,
tika-abh08t0:1059_2: saṃvaraṃ samādiyantassa, pātimokkhaṃ paripūrentassa, āpāthagatavisayesu cakkhādīni
tika-abh08t0:1059_3: indriyāni thakentassa, cīvarādike ca paccaye paccavekkhantassa, kuhanādivatthuto
tika-abh08t0:1059_4: ājīvaṃ parisodhentassa pavattā cetanā, ayaṃ sīlamayapuññakiriyavatthunāma. Etthāha
tika-abh08t0:1059_5: – “dānaṃ nāmetaṃ mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulacāritta”nti evaṃ cārittasīle ṭhatvā dentassa
tika-abh08t0:1059_6: pavattā dānamayapuññakiriyavatthu kiṃ, udāhu sīlamayanti? Sīlamayameva cārittasīlabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1059_7: Deyyadhammapariccāgavasena pavattāpi hesā pubbābhisaṅkhārassa aparabhāge cetanāya
tika-abh08t0:1059_8: ca tathā pavattattā sīlamayameva puññakiriyavatthu, na dānamayaṃ. Pūjānuggahakāmatāya
tika-abh08t0:1060_0: “Cakkhu anicca”ntiādinā pana cakkhādike tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sammasantassa pavattā
tika-abh08t0:1060_1: gotrabhuvodānapariyosānā vipassanācetanā, kasiṇādīsu ārammaṇesu appanaṃ appattā gotrabhupariyosānā
tika-abh08t0:1060_2: parikammacetanā cāti ayaṃ bhāvanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma. Appanāppattāpi bhāvanāyeva,
tika-abh08t0:1060_3: sā pana na kāmāvacarāti idha na gahitā. Niravajjavijjāyatanakammāyatanasippāyatanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1060_4: sikkhanacetanāpi bhāvanāmayeyeva samodhānaṃ gacchatīti ācariyā. Yā cettha deyyadhammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1060_5: khayato vayato sammasitvā dadato pavattā, sāpi pubbe viya ubhayabhāge cetanānaṃ tathā
tika-abh08t0:1061_0: Dānādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci sucaritakammaṃ katvā “asukassa ca nāma patti hotu, sabbasattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1061_1: vā hotū”ti evaṃ attanā katassa parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ paccāsīsanavasena pavattā pattidānamayapuññakiriyavatthu
tika-abh08t0:1061_2: nāma. Kiṃ panevaṃ pattiṃ dadato puññakkhayo hotīti? Na hoti, yathā pana ekaṃ dīpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1061_3: jāletvā tato dīpasahassaṃ jālentassa paṭhamadīpo khīṇoti na vattabbo, purimālokena
tika-abh08t0:1061_4: pana saddhiṃ pacchimālokassa ekībhāve atimahāva hoti, evameva pattiṃ dadato parihāni
tika-abh08t0:1061_5: nāma na hoti, vuḍḍhiyeva pana hotīti daṭṭhabbā. Kathaṃ panesā dinnā nāma hotīti?
tika-abh08t0:1061_6: “Idaṃ me puññakammaṃ sabbasattānaṃ, asukassa vā pariṇamatū”ti evaṃ pubbabhāge, pacchāpi
tika-abh08t0:1061_7: vā vacībhedaṃ karontena manasā eva vā cintentena dinnā nāma hoti. Keci pana “yaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1061_8: mayā kataṃ sucaritaṃ, tassa phalaṃ ‘dammī’ti vuttepi patti dinnāva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1061_9: Kusalakammādhikārattā pana parehi ca kammasseva anumoditabbattā kammameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1061_10: anumodentenapi kammameva anumoditabbanti idamettha ācariyānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1062: Cīvarādīsu paccāsārahitassa asaṃkiliṭṭhena ajjhāsayena samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇavasena, gilānupaṭṭhānavasena ca pavattā veyyāvaccamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1063_0: Āmisakiñcakkhādinirapekkhacittassa attano paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā
tika-abh08t0:1063_1: desentassa, tatheva niravajjavijjāyatanādikaṃ upadisantassa ca pavattā desanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu
tika-abh08t0:1063_2: nāma. Parehi kataṃ yaṃ kiñci sucaritakammaṃ dinnamadinnampi vā issāmaccheramalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1063_3: pahāya “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti anumodantassa pavattā anumodanapuññakiriyavatthu nāma, “atthi
tika-abh08t0:1063_4: dinna”ntiādinā kammassakatāñāṇavasena diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karontassa pavattā diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyavatthu
tika-abh08t0:1063_5: nāma. Yadi evaṃ ñāṇavippayuttacittassa diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyatā na labbhatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1063_6: No na labbhati purimapacchimacetanānampi taṃtaṃpuññakiriyāsveva saṅgaṇhanato. Tathā hi vakkhati –
tika-abh08t0:1065: Hoti dānamayaṃ puññaṃ, evaṃ sesesu dīpaye”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1066: Tasmā kiñcāpi ujukaraṇavelāyaṃ ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti, purimapacchābhāge pana ñāṇavippayuttampi hotīti tassāpi diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyabhāvo uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1067_0: Apare panāhu – viññāṇapaññāṇavasena dassanaṃ diṭṭhi, cittaṃ paññā ca. Diṭṭhiyā ujubhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1067_1: diṭṭhijuttaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Kusalañca viññāṇaṃ kammassakatāñāṇādi ca sammādassanaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:1067_3: saṅgaho, kammassakatāñāṇena kammapathasammādiṭṭhiyāti. Dānādisampayuttaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1067_4: dānādīsveva antogadhanti veditabbaṃ. “Evamimaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tattha vuttanayena paṭipajjanto
tika-abh08t0:1067_5: lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesaṃ adhigamissāmi, bahussuto vā hutvā pare dhammadesanāya
tika-abh08t0:1067_6: anuggaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ attano, paresaṃ vā vimuttāyatanasīsena saddhammaṃ suṇantassa
tika-abh08t0:1067_8: saṅgayhati. Pūjārahe, garuṭṭhāniye, mahallake ca disvā āsanā vuṭṭhahantassa pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇamaggadānaabhivādanaañjalikammakaraṇaāsanapupphagandhādiabhihāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1067_9: karontassa ca pavattā bahumānacetanā apacitisahagatapuññakiriyavatthu nāma. Veyyāvaccāpacāyanānañhi
tika-abh08t0:1067_10: ayaṃ viseso – vayasā, guṇena ca jeṭṭhānaṃ, gilānānañca taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1068_0: 22-3. Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāya āgatanayena dasapuññakiriyavatthūni dassetvā idāni sutte
tika-abh08t0:1068_1: āgatanayena dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanāti tīṇiyeva dassetuṃ tesu itaresampi saṅgahaṃ dīpento
tika-abh08t0:1068_2: āha “gacchanti saṅgaha”ntiādi. Tattha pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t0:1068_3: Dānampi hi issāmaccherānaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ, etepi, tasmā samānapaṭipakkhatāya dānena
tika-abh08t0:1068_4: saha ekalakkhaṇattā ete dānamayapuññakiriyavatthumhi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Veyyāvaccāpacāyanā
tika-abh08t0:1068_5: sīlamaye puññe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti cārittasīlasabhāvattā. Desanāsavanadiṭṭhiujukā
tika-abh08t0:1068_6: pana kusaladhammāsevanato bhāvanato bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Keci pana “desento,
tika-abh08t0:1068_7: suṇanto ca desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjha deseti, suṇāti ca, tāni
tika-abh08t0:1068_8: ca desanāsavanāni paṭivedhameva āharantīti desanāsavanaṃ bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1068_9: vadanti. Dhammadānabhāvato “desanā dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”tipi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1068_10: Tathā diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbatthāpi sabbesaṃ niyamanalakkhaṇattāti. Dānādīsu hi yaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1068_11: kiñci “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyāva visodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti
tika-abh08t0:1068_12: mahānisaṃsanti. Evañca katvā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “diṭṭhijukammaṃ pana sabbesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1068_13: niyamanalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Mahāsaṃghiyā pana abhayagirivāsino ca diṭṭhijukammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1068_14: visuṃ puññakiriyabhāvena na gaṇhanti. Tathā hi te dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā saṃsuti desanānussatimodanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1068_15: veyyāvaccapūjāsaraṇappattipasaṃsā cāti attanā katapuññānussaraṇaṃ buddhādīsu saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1068_16: paraguṇapasaṃsāti imāni tīṇi pakkhipitvā diṭṭhijukammaṃ aggahetvā dvādasa puññakiriyavatthūni
tika-abh08t0:1068_17: paññāpenti. Puna tīṇevāti paṭhamaṃ dasāpi samānā puna saṅkhepato tīṇeva sambhonti.
tika-abh08t0:1069_0: 24. Idāni parehi niddisiyamānānaṃ puññānussaraṇādīnaṃ attanā niddiṭṭhesveva samodhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1069_1: dassetuṃ “sabbānussatipuññañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sabbasseva attanā katasucaritassa
tika-abh08t0:1069_2: anussaraṇaṃ sabbānussatipuññaṃ nāma. Pasaṃsāti parehi katāya puññakiriyāya, sammāpaṭipattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1069_3: ca vippasannacittena pasaṃsanaṃ, santussananti attho. Saraṇattayanti ettha saranti
tika-abh08t0:1069_4: hiṃsantīti saraṇāni, buddhādīni tīṇi ratanāni. Tāni hi saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena
tika-abh08t0:1069_5: bhayaṃ santāsaṃ duggatiparikkilesaṃ hiṃsanti vināsenti. Tayo avayavā assāti tayaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1069_6: tīhi avayavehi yuttasamudāyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, saraṇānaṃ tayaṃ saraṇattayaṃ, tīṇi
tika-abh08t0:1069_7: saraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Na hi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci atthīti. Idha pana
tika-abh08t0:1069_8: saraṇattayaggahaṇena upacārato, uttarapadalopato vā saraṇagamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. Na
tika-abh08t0:1069_9: hi saraṇattayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma hoti. Atthato panetaṃ “sammāsambuddho vata
tika-abh08t0:1069_10: so bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṃgho”tiādinā buddhādīsu pasādapaṭilābhavasena
tika-abh08t0:1069_11: pavattā cetanā diṭṭhijukammasmiṃ saṅgahaṃ yanti taṃvaseneva tesaṃ ijjhato. Na hi
tika-abh08t0:1069_12: viparītadiṭṭhikassa imāni tīṇi sambhavanti, tasmā te ekantena diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyavatthusmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1069_13: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, na visuṃ puññakiriyabhāvena gahetabbāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “natthi
tika-abh08t0:1069_14: saṃsayo”ti. Diṭṭhijukammassa bhāvanāmayasaṅgahepi saṅkhepanayena bhāvanāmaye saṅgayhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1069_15: vitthāranayena pana “kattha nu kho”ti saṃsayo siyāti imesaṃ bhāvanāmayasaṅgaho na
tika-abh08t0:1069_16: vutto. Diṭṭhijukammassa vā sabbesaṃ mahapphalabhāvaniyāmakattena mūlabhūtattā tassa
tika-abh08t0:1069_17: padhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ visuṃ tattha saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ. Apare pana “saṅgaṇhanto
tika-abh08t0:1069_18: saṅgaṇhāti, gaṇhanto ‘muñcatī’ti vacanato saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādāne viya gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1069_19: sambhavatīti sīlamaye saṅgayhatī”ti vadanti. “Saraṇagamanaṃ paṇipātabhāvato apacitisahagate saṅgayhatī”ti keci.
tika-abh08t0:1070_1: cetanā tattha tattheva saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti dassetuṃ “purimā muñcanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1070_2: Tattha purimāti dānatthāya deyyadhammaṃ dhammena samena uppādentassa, uppannaṃ “pariccajissāmī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1070_3: cintentassa, dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesantassa ca yāva vatthuno paṭiggāhakassa hatthe vissajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1070_4: pariṇāmanaṃ vā, tāva pavattā pubbabhāgacetanā. Paṭiggāhakassa pana hatthe vissajjanacetanā,
tika-abh08t0:1070_5: pariṇāmanacetanā vā muñcanacetanā nāma. Sāyeva niggahītalopena “mucanā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1070_6: “Muñcanā”itiyeva vā pāṭho. Parāti attanā vissaṭṭhavatthumhi ālayaṃ akatvā “sādhu
tika-abh08t0:1070_7: suṭṭhu aggaṃ dānaṃ me dinna”nti somanassacittena paccavekkhantassa uppannā aparabhāgacetanā.
tika-abh08t0:1070_8: Tissopi cetanāti iti ayañca purimā cetanā, ayañca muñcanacetanā, ayañca aparacetanāti
tika-abh08t0:1070_9: tissopi cetanā ekato hutvā dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hoti, dānamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma
tika-abh08t0:1070_10: hotīti attho. “Puñña”nti padaṃ apekkhitvā “hotī”ti ekavacananiddeso. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1070_11: sesesupi atidisanto āha “evaṃ sesesu dīpaye”ti. Sesesūti sīlādīsu puññakiriyavatthūsu
tika-abh08t0:1070_13: gacchantassa pavattā purimacetanā, sīlaṃ samādiyantassa, pabbajantassa, sīlaṃ paripūrentassa
tika-abh08t0:1070_14: uppannā majjhimacetanā, ‘pūritaṃ me’ti paccavekkhantassa uppannā aparacetanāti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1070_15: tissopi cetanā ekato hutvā sīlamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāmā”tiādinā dīpaye, pakāseyyāti
tika-abh08t0:1070_16: attho. Nanu ca attanā katapuññānussaraṇacetanā diṭṭhijukammasaṅgahitā, ayañca aparacetanā
tika-abh08t0:1070_17: sāyevāti kathamassā tattha saṅgahoti? Nāyaṃ doso, visayabhedena ubhinnampi visesasabbhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1070_18: Puññānussaraṇañhi attanā katapuññavisayameva. Ayaṃ pana tabbatthuvisayāti pākaṭoyeva dvinnaṃ visesoti.
tika-abh08t0:1071_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ “dasapuññakiriyavatthuvaseneva pavattatī”ti, tattha dasapuññakiriyavatthūni
tika-abh08t0:1071_1: sarūpato, saṅgahato ca niddisitvā idāni tathāpavattamānassa cassa pāṭekkaṃ pavattākāravisayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1071_2: dassetuṃ “idānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ayanti vakkhamānanidassanaṃ. Dātabbo dhammo
tika-abh08t0:1074_0: Paṭiggāhako ādi yesaṃ desakālamittādīnaṃ te paṭiggāhakādayo, deyyadhammassa, paṭiggāhakādīnañca
tika-abh08t0:1074_1: sampatti sampannatā deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampatti. Tattha deyyadhammassa paṇītamanāpabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1074_2: dhammena samena uppannabhāvo deyyadhammasampatti. Paṭiggāhakānaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1074_3: paṭiggāhakasampatti. Dullabhaannapānādiko deso desasampatti. Tādisova kālo kālasampatti.
tika-abh08t0:1074_4: Dullabhaannapānādike hi dese, kāle vā dinnaṃ ajjhāsayassa balavatāya mahapphalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1074_5: somanassahetukañca hoti, tasmā te dānassa sampattivasena vuttā. Mittasampatti pana
tika-abh08t0:1074_6: kalyāṇamittabhāvo. Kalyāṇamittañhi nissāya dānādīsu cittaṃ odagyappattaṃ hoti. Paricārikasampatti
tika-abh08t0:1074_7: pana anāṇattiyāpi taṃtaṃkiccasampādane appamattassa paricārikajanassa paṭilābho.
tika-abh08t0:1074_8: Aññaṃ vā somanassahetunti saddhābahulatāvisuddhidiṭṭhitādibhedaṃ aññaṃ somanassakāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1074_9: vā. Āgammāti upāgamma, paṭiccāti attho. Haṭṭhapahaṭṭhoti somanassavasena haṭṭho ceva
tika-abh08t0:1074_10: pahaṭṭho ca. Ubhayenapi adhikasomanassaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthi…pe… pavattanti “atthi dinnaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1074_11: atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi
tika-abh08t0:1074_12: ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mātā, atthi pitā, atthi sattā opapātikā, atthi
tika-abh08t0:1074_13: loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā, ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1074_14: abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dasavidhaṃ sammādiṭṭhivatthuvasena
tika-abh08t0:1074_15: ceva dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyādīnaṃ vasena ca pavattaṃ. Ādi-saddena hi na
tika-abh08t0:1074_16: kevalaṃ navannaṃyeva sammādiṭṭhivatthūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ, atha kho dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyānampi
tika-abh08t0:1074_17: saṅgaho. Sammā ñāyena pavattā diṭṭhi, pasatthā vā diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhi, taṃ. Purakkhatvāti
tika-abh08t0:1074_18: pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. Tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1075_0: Anussāhitoti lobhamacchariyādivasena puññakiriyāya saṅkocaṃ anāpajjanato attanā,
tika-abh08t0:1075_1: parena vā kenaci anussāhito hutvā. Sabhāvato hi puññappavattidassanamidaṃ. Parehīti
tika-abh08t0:1075_2: pana parapākaṭussāhadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamanti desanākkamena, idha niddiṭṭhakkamena
tika-abh08t0:1075_3: vā paṭhamaṃ. Mahākusalacittanti somanassasahagatatādiaṅgapāripūriyā mahantaṃ kusalacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1075_4: Atha vā pacchimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanato mahantaṃ pūjitaṃ kusalacittanti
tika-abh08t0:1075_5: mahākusalacittaṃ. Sabbesampi hi sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhi mettāpubbaṅgamassa
tika-abh08t0:1076_1: evaṃ vuttanayena. Ussāhitoti deyyadhamme sāpekkhāditāya, sīlasampadādīsu anadhimuttatādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1076_2: ca puññakiriyāya saṅkocāpajjanato attanā, parena vā kenaci ussāhito. Parehīti pana
tika-abh08t0:1076_3: vuttanayameva. Karoti dānādīni puññānīti sambandho. Tamevāti somanassasahagatādinā
tika-abh08t0:1076_4: taṃsadisatāya vuttaṃ. Hoti hi taṃsadisepi taṃvohāro yathā ca “sāyeva tittirī, tāniyeva
tika-abh08t0:1076_5: osadhānī”ti. Ettha pana “ussāhito”ti iminā sasaṅkhārikataṃ dasseti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-abh08t0:1076_6: Imasmiṃ panattheti imasmiṃ sasaṅkhārikasaddābhidheyye, ussāhitabbacittasaṅkhāte atthe
tika-abh08t0:1076_7: taṃvisayeti attho. Pubbappayogassāti puññakiriyāya saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā
tika-abh08t0:1076_8: samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittappayogassa. Pubba-ggahaṇaṃ panettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena
tika-abh08t0:1076_9: so payogo hotīti katvā vuttaṃ, na tassa pubbakālikatāyāti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh08t0:1077_1: Balanti anantīti bālā, assāsitapassāsitamatteneva jīvanti, na paññājīvitenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1077_2: Bālāyeva bālakā. Te pana idha “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā abhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1077_3: asañjātabuddhino dārakā. Pākaṭavasena cettha bālaka-ggahaṇaṃ. Sahasā karaṇādikāle
tika-abh08t0:1077_4: pana itaresampi ñāṇavippayuttaṃ hotīti. Somanassaṃ jātaṃ etesanti somanassajātā,
tika-abh08t0:1077_5: jātasomanassāti attho. Sahasāti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ dātukāmatāya uppattisamakālameva.
tika-abh08t0:1078_0: Ettha ca “paṭipattidassanenā”ti iminā paresaṃ payogābhāvamāha, “jātaparicayā”ti attano
tika-abh08t0:1078_1: payogābhāvaṃ. Ubhayenāpi imassa asaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ dīpeti. “Bālakā, sahasā”ti ca imehi
tika-abh08t0:1078_3: paricayā”ti iminā asaṅkhārikabhāvassa “bālakā bhikkhū…pe… jātā”ti ca imehi ñāṇavippayuttasomanassasahagatabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1078_4: ca dīpitattā “sahasā”ti vacanena yathāvuttameva ñāṇavippayuttaasaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ pakāseti.
tika-abh08t0:1078_5: Evaṃ sati paṭilomato somanassasahagatādibhāvo dassito hoti. Anulomato pana “somanassajātā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1078_7: “Paṭipatti…pe… disvā”ti ettāvatā pana somanassasahagatādibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ vuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1078_8: Teti te ñātakā, te bālakāti vā attho. “Somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgammā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1078_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Majjhattārammaṇaṃ tathārūpe cetobhisaṅkhārādayopi hi upekkhāsahagatatāya
tika-abh08t0:1078_10: kāraṇamevāti. Cittassa somanassābhāve puggalassapi somanassarahitatā hotīti “catūsupi…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1078_11: hontī”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, somanassarahitā honti puññaṃ karontāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1079_0: Imesu pana aṭṭhasu viññāṇesu somanassasahagatato upekkhāsahagataṃ balavataraṃ, ñāṇavippayuttato
tika-abh08t0:1079_1: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ, sasaṅkhārikato asaṅkhārikaṃ sadisaṃ balavataraṃ. Visadisaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1079_5: balavataraṃ, tato aṭṭhamacittaṃ, tato sattamacittaṃ, tato dutiyacittaṃ, tato paṭhamacittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1079_6: tato chaṭṭhacittaṃ, tato pañcamacittanti evamimesaṃ balavabalavatarabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1080_0: 26. Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena vedanāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhataṃ niddisitvā idāni
tika-abh08t0:1080_1: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatapuññakiriyādīnaṃ vasenapi pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “dasa puññakriyādīna”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:1080_2: vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena channaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ, catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ, hīnādibhedassa
tika-abh08t0:1083_0: 27. Idāni tathāpavattamānassa tassa yo yo tesaṃ tesaṃ vasena labbhamāno gaṇanaparicchedo,
tika-abh08t0:1083_1: taṃ sampiṇḍitvā dassetuṃ “sattarasa sahassānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthevaṃ gaṇanā veditabbā
tika-abh08t0:1083_2: – imāni tāva aṭṭha viññāṇāni dasannaṃ puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ vasena pavattanato paccekaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1083_3: dasa dasāti katvā asīti cittāni honti, tāni ca chasu ārammaṇesu pavattanato chagguṇitāni
tika-abh08t0:1083_4: sāsītikāni cattāri satāni honti, tāni catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ sahayogavasena catugguṇitāni
tika-abh08t0:1083_5: sahassaṃ, vīsādhikāni ca nava satāni honti, tāni ca kāyavacīmanosaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1083_6: kammānaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni sasaṭṭhisattasatādhikāni pañca sahassāni honti, tāni ca
tika-abh08t0:1083_7: hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedato tiguṇitāni sāsītikadvisatādhikāni sattarasa sahassāni hontīti.
tika-abh08t0:1083_8: Nanu ca ñāṇavippayuttacittānaṃ vīmaṃsādhipatisahayogābhāvato adhipativasena sahassaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1083_9: sāsītikāni ca cha satāni hontīti tāni kammādīnaṃ vasena sampiṇḍitāni vīsasatādhikāni
tika-abh08t0:1083_10: pannarasa sahassāni bhavantīti? Saccametaṃ, sotapatitavasena pana taṃ anādiyitvā
tika-abh08t0:1083_11: adhipatigaṇanā gahitāti na tassa vasena gaṇanahāni katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1084_0: Nanu ca “savipākaṃ kusala”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana kathaṃ, kuhiṃ, kiṃ phalatīti codanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1084_1: sandhāyāha “taṃ panā”tiādi. Yasmā tihetukaṃ kusalaṃ tihetukaṃ vā duhetukaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1084_2: deti, nāhetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ deti. Yadā ca tihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janeti, tadā pavatte
tika-abh08t0:1084_3: soḷasa vipākāni abhinipphādeti. Yadā dvihetukaṃ, tadā dvādasa. Duhetukaṃ pana duhetukamahetukañca
tika-abh08t0:1084_4: paṭisandhiṃ janeti, na tihetukaṃ. Yadā ca duhetukaṃ janeti, tadā pavattiyaṃ dvādasa.
tika-abh08t0:1084_5: Yadā ahetukaṃ, tadā aṭṭha. Ye pana āgamanato vipākassa saṅkhārabhedamicchanti, tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1084_6: matena tihetukaṃ dvādasa, dasa vā vipaccati, duhetukaṃ dasa, aṭṭha vā, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1084_7: “yathānurūpa”nti. Nānāvidhasampattiṭṭhānabhāvato sobhanā, gantabbato gati cāti sugati,
tika-abh08t0:1084_8: kāmāvacarabhavova sugati kāmāvacarasugati. Tassaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ. Bhavabhogasampattinti
tika-abh08t0:1084_9: ettha ca bhavatīti bhavo, upapattibhavasaṅkhātānaṃ vipākakkhandhakaṭattārūpānametaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1084_10: gahaṇaṃ, bhuñjitabbato bhogo, pavattiyaṃ paṭilabhitabbasampatti, bhavoti vā paṭisandhi,
tika-abh08t0:1084_11: bhogo sesavipākakaṭattārūpehi saha pavattiyaṃ paṭilabhitabbā sampatti, bhavo ca bhogo
tika-abh08t0:1084_12: ca bhavabhogo, teyeva sampannabhāvato sampatti, tesaṃ vā sampatti bhavabhogasampatti,
tika-abh08t0:1084_13: taṃ abhinipphādeti, janakavasena ca upanissayavasena ca sādhetīti attho. Ettha ca
tika-abh08t0:1084_16: ekaccabhogasampattiñca, bhogasampadameva vā avisesena sugatiyaṃ duggatiyampi abhinipphādetiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1084_17: Nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi hissa devasampattisadisaṃ manuññaṃ bhogajātaṃ, tabbisayāni ca
tika-abh08t0:1084_18: vipākacittāni, suvaṇṇatāsussaratādi ca taṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarakusalasseva phalaṃ. Na
tika-abh08t0:1084_19: hi akusalassa iṭṭhaphalaṃ atthi. Vuttañhetaṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ akusalassa
tika-abh08t0:1087_0: Idāni yasmā kāmāvacarakusalānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhassa rūpāvacarakusalassa niddesāvakāso
tika-abh08t0:1087_1: anuppatto, tasmā taṃ dassanatthaṃ “itaresū”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha itaresūti yathāvuttakāmāvacarakusalato
tika-abh08t0:1087_2: itaresu, rūpāvacarādīsūti attho. Savatthukato ekavidhaṃ ekantena vatthusannissitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1087_3: Na hi arūpadhātuyaṃ rūpāvacaradhammā labbhanti rūpavirāgabhāvanāya nibbattattā puna
tika-abh08t0:1088_0: Hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedatoti ettha pubbe viya adhipatīnaṃ hīnādibhāvehi jhānassa hīnādibhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1088_1: yojetabbo. Atha vā paṭiladdhamattamanāsevitaṃ hīnaṃ paridubbalabhāvato, nātisubhāvitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1088_2: aparipuṇṇavasibhāvaṃ majjhimaṃ, ativiya subhāvitaṃ pana sabbaso paripuṇṇavasibhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1088_3: paṇītaṃ. Tathā uḷārapuññaphalakāmatāvasena pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ, lokiyābhiññatthāya pavattitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1088_4: majjhimaṃ, vivekakāmatāya ariyabhāve ṭhitena pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ. Attahitāya vā pavattitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1088_5: hīnaṃ, kevalaṃ alobhajjhāsayena pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ, parahitāya pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1088_6: Vaṭṭajjhāsayena vā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ, vivekajjhāsayena pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ, vivaṭṭajjhāsayena
tika-abh08t0:1089_1: vā tadavinābhāvato abhiññāpi labbhati. Tathā hettha paṭipadācatukkanti voharantīti
tika-abh08t0:1089_2: ādi-saddena adhipatiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, tasmā paṭipadādibhedatoti paṭipadābhedato,
tika-abh08t0:1089_3: adhipatibhedato, ārammaṇabhedato, hānabhāgiyādibhedatoti attho. Tattha paṭipadābhedato
tika-abh08t0:1089_4: tāva dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, dukkhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññaṃ, sukhapaṭipadaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1089_5: dandhābhiññaṃ, sukhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññanti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha dukkhā
tika-abh08t0:1089_6: paṭipadā assāti dukkhapaṭipadaṃ. Dandhā abhiññā assāti dandhābhiññaṃ. Esa nayo “dukkhapaṭipadaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1090_0: Tattha appahīnanīvaraṇassa, avikkhambhitajhānanikantikassa ca ñāṇakiccassa aparibyattatāya
tika-abh08t0:1090_1: pariniṭṭhitasakalapubbakiccassa “pathavī pathavī”ti vā “āpo āpo”ti vā evaṃ pavattapaṭhamasamannāhārato
tika-abh08t0:1090_2: paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāruppattiyā nīvaraṇappahānaṃ, nikantivikkhambhanañca
tika-abh08t0:1090_3: hoti, tāva pavattā pubbabhāgabhāvanā paṭipadā nāma “paṭipajjati jhānaṃ etāyā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1090_4: Pahīnanīvaraṇassa, pana vikkhambhitajhānanikantikassa ca ñāṇakiccassa paribyattabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1090_5: upacārajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva appanāya uppatti, tāva pavattā paññā pubbabhāgapaññāya
tika-abh08t0:1090_6: visiṭṭhabhāvato abhiññā nāma, tasmā yo ādito kilese jhānanikantiñca vikkhambhento
tika-abh08t0:1090_7: dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti, vikkhambhitakilesajhānanikanti
tika-abh08t0:1090_8: ca appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa dukkhapaṭipadaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1090_9: dandhābhiññañca jhānaṃ hoti. Yo pana sasaṅkhārena kilesādike vikkhambhetvā na cirena
tika-abh08t0:1090_10: aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa dukkhapaṭipadaṃ, khippābhiññañca. Yo kilesādike vikkhambhento
tika-abh08t0:1090_11: sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti, appanāparivāsaṃ pana cirāyati, tassa sukhapaṭipadaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1090_12: dandhābhiññaṃ. Yo pana sukheneva kilesādike vikkhambhetvā sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:1091_0: So panāyaṃ paṭipadābhiññānaṃ bhedo kilesindriyādhikāravasena veditabbo. Yassa hi
tika-abh08t0:1091_1: rāgādayo kilesā tibbā honti, saddhāpañcamakāni ca indriyāni mudūni. Yo ca samathavipassanāsu
tika-abh08t0:1091_2: akatādhikāro, tassa pavattajhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadaṃ, dandhābhiññañca hoti. Tassa hi
tika-abh08t0:1091_4: paṭipadā dukkhā asukhā, tasseva saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ mudutāya abhiññāpi dandhā
tika-abh08t0:1091_5: mandā asīghappavattinī hoti. Bhavantare vā samathe akatādhikārattā paṭipadā dukkhā,
tika-abh08t0:1091_6: vipassanāya akatādhikārattā abhiññāpi dandhā. Yo pana vuttaviparīto hoti, tassa kilesānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1091_8: yathākkamaṃ sukhapaṭipadā, khippābhiññā ca hoti. Bhavantare kataparicayassa hi yathā
tika-abh08t0:1091_9: paguṇaṃ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena suppavatti vācuggato ca hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1091_10: evaṃ bhāvanā appakasireneva ijjhatīti. Svāyaṃ akato, kato ca adhikāro samathanissito
tika-abh08t0:1091_11: paṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya. Vipassanānissito abhiññāya ñāṇappadhānattā
tika-abh08t0:1092_0: Yo pana tibbakileso tikkhindriyo vipassanāyameva vā katādhikāro hoti, tassa vuttanayena
tika-abh08t0:1092_1: dukkhā paṭipadā, khippā pana abhiññā hoti, tabbiparītassa sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññāti.
tika-abh08t0:1092_2: Tasmā kilesānaṃ tibbamandabhāvato, indriyānaṃ tikhiṇamudubhāvato, pubbaparicayassa
tika-abh08t0:1092_3: ca sambhavāsambhavavasenāti evaṃ kilesindriyādhikāravasena imāsaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1093_0: Apica yāni parato sappāyāsappāyāni, palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni, appanākosallāni
tika-abh08t0:1093_1: ca āgamissanti, tesu yo upacārādhigamato pubbe, pacchā ca asappāyasevī hoti, tassa
tika-abh08t0:1093_2: dukkhā paṭipadā, dandhā ca abhiññā hoti. Ubhayattha sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā,
tika-abh08t0:1093_3: khippā ca abhiññā. Yo pana tato pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī
tika-abh08t0:1093_4: hoti, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā, khippā abhiññā. Tabbiparītassa sukhā paṭipadā, dandhā
tika-abh08t0:1094_1: dukkhā paṭipadā, vipariyāyena aparipanthatāya sukhā. Appanākosallāni asampādentassa
tika-abh08t0:1094_2: ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti, sampādentassa vipariyāyato khippā abhiññāti.
tika-abh08t0:1094_3: Kiñca – taṇhāvijjātibhavanavasena etāsaṃ bhedo veditabbo. Taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā
tika-abh08t0:1094_4: paṭipadā hoti tassā samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthakabhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1094_5: anabhibhūtassa tadabhāvato sukhā. Avijjābhibhūtassa ca tassā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1094_6: dandhā abhiññā, itarassa khippā abhiññāti. So panāyaṃ paṭipadābhedo kevalaṃ samathabhāvanāvasena
tika-abh08t0:1094_7: paṭiladdhajjhānassa, maggādhigamavasena paṭiladdhajjhānassa pana natthi dukkhapaṭipadādibhedo.
tika-abh08t0:1094_8: Keci pana maggavaseneva tassa paṭipadādibhedaṃ vaṇṇenti “maggassa hi dukkhapaṭipadādibhāve
tika-abh08t0:1095_0: Adhipatibhedādīsu pana chandādhipateyyaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ vīriyādhipateyyaṃ vīmaṃsādhipateyyanti
tika-abh08t0:1095_1: evaṃ adhipatibhedato, parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ, parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, appamāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1095_2: parittārammaṇaṃ, appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti evaṃ ārammaṇabhedato, hānabhāgiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1095_3: ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ visesabhāgiyaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyanti evaṃ hānabhāgiyādibhedato ca catubbidhatā
tika-abh08t0:1095_4: veditabbā. Tattha “chandavato ce jhānaṃ nibbattissati, mayhampi nibbattissatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1095_5: evaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā uppannaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ. Esa nayo “cittādhipateyyā”dīsupi.
tika-abh08t0:1095_6: Appaguṇaṃ pana uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ parittaṃ, suppasarāvamattesu
tika-abh08t0:1095_7: avaḍḍhitārammaṇesu nibbattaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ. Vuttapaṭipakkhato pana yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1096_0: Jhānaṅgayogabhedatoti katthaci pañca jhānaṅgāni, katthaci cattāri, katthaci tīṇi,
tika-abh08t0:1096_1: katthaci dve, katthaci aparāni dveti evaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ sampayogabhedato. Nanu cettha
tika-abh08t0:1096_2: kāmāvacarakusale viya saṅkhārabhedo kasmā na gahito. Idampi hi kevalaṃ samathānuyogavasena
tika-abh08t0:1096_4: dasavidha”nti vattabbanti? Nayidamevaṃ, maggādhigamavasena sattito paṭiladdhassāpi
tika-abh08t0:1096_5: aparabhāge parikammavaseneva uppajjanato, tasmā sabbassapi jhānassa parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhārena
tika-abh08t0:1096_6: vinā kevalaṃ adhikāravasena anuppajjanato “asaṅkhāra”ntipi vattuṃ na sakkā, adhikārena
tika-abh08t0:1096_7: ca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkhāreneva anuppajjanato “sasaṅkhāra”ntipi vattuṃ na
tika-abh08t0:1097_0: Kāmacchando byāpādo thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchāti imāni pañca nīvaraṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1097_1: vippahīnāni etassāti kāmacchanda…pe… vippahīnaṃ. “Agyāhito”ti ettha āhita-saddassa
tika-abh08t0:1097_2: viya vippahīna-saddassettha paravacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmacchandādīhi vā vippahīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1097_3: visaṃyuttaṃ tesaṃ pahāyakabhāvenāti kāmacchanda…pe… vippahīnaṃ. Tattha kāmetīti kāmo,
tika-abh08t0:1097_4: chandanaṭṭhena chando cāti kāmacchando, bahalakāmarāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Byāpādādīnamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1097_5: vakkhati. Yasmā kāmacchandādīsu appahīnesu jhānaṃ nuppajjati, tasmā tānissa pahānaṅgānīti
tika-abh08t0:1097_6: veditabbāni. Nanu aññepi akusalā dhammā iminā jhānena pahīyanti, atha kasmā pañceva
tika-abh08t0:1097_7: pahānaṅgavasena vuttānīti? Visesena jhānantarāyakarattā. Kāmacchandavasena hi nānāvisayapalobhitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1097_8: cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati. Kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ vā nānāvisayasamupabyūḷhāya
tika-abh08t0:1097_9: kāmadhātuyā pahānapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipajjati, byāpādena ca ārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1097_10: na samāhitaṃ pavattati, thinamiddhābhibhūtaṃ akammaññaṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaparetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1097_11: avūpasantameva hutvā paribbhamati, vicikicchāupahataṃ jhānādhigamapaṭipadaṃ nārohati
tika-abh08t0:1097_12: “sammāsambuddho nu kho, na nu kho, pathavī pathavī”tiādinā pavattamanasikārena “jhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1097_13: siyā nu kho, na nu kho”tiādinā vicikicchantassa jhānādhigamapaṭipadāya asaṃsijjhanato. Yato vakkhati –
tika-abh08t0:1100: Tasmā samādhiādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvena visesena jhānādhigamassa antarāyakaraṇato etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttāni. Hoti cettha –
tika-abh08t0:1103_0: Evamidaṃ pahānaṅgavasena dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgavasena dassetuṃ “vitakka…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1103_1: sampayutta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha vitakkādayo vacanatthalakkhaṇādivasena upari āgamissanti.
tika-abh08t0:1103_2: Yasmā pana imesu uppannesu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti, tenassa imāni sampayogaṅgānīti
tika-abh08t0:1103_3: veditabbāni, tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1103_4: Yathā pana nemiādiaṅgasamudāye rathādivohāro hoti, evaṃ jhānaṅgasamudāye jhānavohāro.
tika-abh08t0:1103_5: Vuttampi hetaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1103_6: Kasmā pana aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu imāniyeva pañca jhānaṅgavasena
tika-abh08t0:1103_8: ca. Vitakko hi ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti, vicāro anubandhati. Evaṃ jhānādhigamassa
tika-abh08t0:1103_9: visesapaccayabhūtehi tehi avikkhepāya samādahitapayogassa cetaso payogasampattisamuṭṭhānā
tika-abh08t0:1103_10: pīti pīṇanaṃ, sukhañca upabrūhanaṃ karoti. Atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānubandhanapīṇanaupabrūhanehi
tika-abh08t0:1103_11: anuggahitā ekaggatā samādhānakiccena attānaṃ anuvattāpentī ekattārammaṇe samaṃ, sammā
tika-abh08t0:1103_12: ca ādhiyati, indriyasamatāvasena samaṃ, paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena līnuddhaccābhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1103_13: sammā ca ṭhapetīti evametesameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ āveṇikaṃ. Kāmacchandādipaṭipakkhabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1103_14: pana sayameva vakkhati. Evaṃ upanijjhānakiccavantatāya, kāmacchandādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1103_15: ca imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgabhāvena vavatthitāti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh08t0:1106_0: Desanākkamato, mahaggatadhammesu paṭhamaṃ adhigantabbato ca paṭhamaṃ, paṭhamaṃ samāpajjitabbantipi
tika-abh08t0:1106_1: paṭhamanti vadanti. Taṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ jhānapaṭilomādivasena samāpajjane asambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1107_0: Purimapacchimacittesu uppajjamānassāpi appanākkhaṇe anuppajjanato vitakko vippahīno
tika-abh08t0:1107_1: etassa, tato vā etaṃ vippahīnanti vitakkavippahīnaṃ. Bhāvanāya hi pahīnattā vitakko
tika-abh08t0:1107_2: jhānakkhaṇe nuppajjati. Asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā pana upacārabhāvanāya ca taṃ pahātuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1107_3: asamatthabhāvato purimabhāge, pacchābhāge ca apaccanīkacittappavattito uppajjatiyevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1108_0: Nanu ca “asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā”ti vuttaṃ, atha kathaṃ jhānena esa pahīyati? Na hi
tika-abh08t0:1108_1: kusalehi asaṃkiliṭṭhadhammassa pahānaṃ atthi rāgādisaṃkiliṭṭhānaṃ pāpadhammānametassa
tika-abh08t0:1108_2: ujupaṭipakkhabhāvatoti? Vuccate – asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvassāpi etassa oḷārikatāya dubbalabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1108_4: hotīti tassā balena taṃ jhānakkhaṇe anuppajjantaṃ nikantivikkhambhanavasena vā vikkhambhitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1108_5: pahīnaṃ nāma hoti. Yadi evaṃ upacārenapi nikanti vikkhambhīyatīti tatthapissa pahānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1108_6: siyā, yathā paṭhamajjhānassa upacāre nīvaraṇānīti? Nayidamevaṃ, nīvaraṇappahānassa
tika-abh08t0:1108_7: viya vitakkārammaṇikanikanti vikkhambhanassa upacārena sātisayaṃ anipphajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1108_8: Sātisayañhi tattha nikantippahānaṃ appanāya eva hoti, tasmā yadavocumhā “upacārabhāvanāya
tika-abh08t0:1108_9: ca taṃ pahātuṃ asamatthabhāvato”ti, taṃ suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1109_0: Yathāsambhavanti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yassa yassa sambhavati, tadanatikkamato.
tika-abh08t0:1109_1: Kasiṇānāpānesu hi pañceva jhānāni pavattanti, asubhakāyagatāsatīsu paṭhamajjhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1110_0: Pathavīkasiṇādīsūti ettha ādi-ggahaṇena kevalaṃ āpokasiṇādīnameva, atha kho asubhādīnampi
tika-abh08t0:1110_1: appanāvahakammaṭṭhānānaṃ saṅgahoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca abhibhāyatanavimokkhajhānāni
tika-abh08t0:1110_2: pavattākāramattato bhinnāni, ārammaṇato pana kasiṇāyatanāneva hontīti kasiṇāyatanajhāneheva
tika-abh08t0:1110_3: tāni saṅgahitāni. “Yathāsambhavaṃ…pe… anekavidha”nti vā vacanena rūpāvacarajjhāne
tika-abh08t0:1110_4: sabbopi labbhamānakabhedo saṅgahitoti abhibhāyatanavimokkhajhānāni visuṃ na vuttāni,
tika-abh08t0:1111_0: Tattha ñāṇuttarassa yogāvacarassa pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ abhibhavitvā “na mettha
tika-abh08t0:1111_1: appanānibbattane bhāro”ti paṭipannassa nimittuppattito uddhaṃ dutiyatatiyavīthiyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1111_2: catutthapañcamavīthiyaṃ vā paṭiladdhaṃ jhānaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma. Tañhi ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1111_3: abhibhavatīti abhibhū, yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānatāya, manāyatanadhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya
tika-abh08t0:1111_4: vā āyatananti abhibhāyatanaṃ, abhibhavitabbaṃ vā abhibhū, ālambaṇaṃ, taṃ āyatanamassāti
tika-abh08t0:1111_5: abhibhāyatanaṃ. Atha vā ālambaṇābhibhavanatoyeva abhibhū, parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1111_6: āyatanaṃ kāraṇamassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ. Parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā ālambaṇaṃ abhibhavitvā
tika-abh08t0:1111_7: pavattamānaṃ upacāruppattito pañcamavīthimanatikkamitvā appanaṃ nibbatteti. Pañcamavīthito
tika-abh08t0:1111_8: paraṃ nibbattaṃ pana abhibhavitukāmatāya nibbattitampi abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1111_9: Sāmaññagatiyā pana kasiṇāyatanameva hoti. Imameva hi sīghatarappavattiṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:1111_10: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ nibbattetī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1111_11: vuttaṃ. Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yathārutavaseneva attho kasmā na gayhati. “Saha nimittuppādenevā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1111_12: hi vuttattā nimittuppattiyā sahuppannaṃ jhānamabhibhāyatananti viññāyatīti? Nayidamevaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1111_13: nimittuppādena saha appanāya asambhavato. Nimittuppādoti hi idha paṭibhāganimittassa
tika-abh08t0:1111_14: uppatti tadārammaṇassa vā upacārajjhānassa, kiṃ tāva paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saha
tika-abh08t0:1111_15: appanāya nibbatti upacārajjhāne asati tassā asambhavato, nāpi upacārajjhānena saha
tika-abh08t0:1111_16: ekavīthiyaṃ nibbatti tassā upacārabhāvanāpabandhasevitabbabhāvena tadā asambhavato,
tika-abh08t0:1111_18: tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yadi nimittuppattito nāticirappavattamabhibhāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1111_19: kathaṃ tassa dandhābhiññākhippābhiññābhedo pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti? Vuccate – catutthapañcamajavanavīthiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1111_20: uppannaṃ cirakālanibbattitāya dandhābhiññaṃ, dutiyatatiyavīthiyaṃ uppannaṃ tabbiparītalakkhaṇatāya
tika-abh08t0:1111_21: khippābhiññanti. Keci pana “abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma vasibhāvappattameva, netara”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1111_22: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, vasibhāvappattiyā nimittuppattito dūratarabhāvena “saha nimittuppādenevettha
tika-abh08t0:1112_0: Apica vasibhāvappattaṃ jhānaṃ abhibhavanakāraṇanirapekkhaṃ vasibhāvabaleneva sakkaccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1112_1: samāpajjituṃ na sakkāti na taṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā appattavasibhāvā paṭhamuppannāyeva
tika-abh08t0:1112_2: abhibhāyatananti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ “appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1112_3: appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇa”nti abhibhāyatanadesanāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vasibhāvappattañhi jhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1112_4: appamāṇanti vuccati. Idañca uppannamattattā parittamevāti? Nāyaṃ doso. Paṭhamaṃ abhibhāyatanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1112_5: paṭiladdhajjhānaṃ pacchā vasibhāvappattampi abhibhāyatananāmameva labhatīti vasibhāvappattamabhibhāyatanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1113_0: Atha vā vasibhāvappattaṃ appamāṇanti ukkaṃsagatipariggahavasena vuccati. Taṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1113_1: yaṃ balavataraṃ, taṃ appamāṇanti imassa atthassa upalakkhaṇaṃ katvā vadanti. Balavabhāvanibandhanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1113_2: appamāṇattaṃ. Balavabhāvo ca paṭhamaappanāvārato pacchimapacchimaappanāvārānaṃ balavatāya
tika-abh08t0:1113_3: avasitāpattepi jhāne sambhavatīti balavantaṃ appamāṇaṃ, itaraṃ parittanti evaṃ avasitāpattepi
tika-abh08t0:1113_4: jhāne appamāṇādibhāvo veditabbo. Atha vā appanāya balavabhāvo nāma upacārassa balavatāya
tika-abh08t0:1113_5: sati hoti. Upacārañca taṃ balavaṃ, yaṃ sahasā appanaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkuṇeyya, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1113_6: khippābhiññānaṃ dvinnaṃ abhibhāyatanajhānānaṃ upacāravīthiyā anantaraṃ dutiyavīthiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1113_7: uppannaṃ upacārajjhānassa balavatāya sayampi balavataranti appamāṇaṃ nāma hoti. Dutiyavīthimatikkamitvā
tika-abh08t0:1113_8: tatiyavīthiyaṃ uppannaṃ taditarasabhāvatāya parittaṃ. Tathā dandhābhiññānaṃ catutthavīthiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1113_9: uppannaṃ appamāṇaṃ. Pañcamavīthiyaṃ uppannaṃ parittanti. Atha vā yattha katthaci
tika-abh08t0:1113_10: appanāvīthiyaṃ pañcamaṃ uppajjanakaappanāto catutthaṃ uppajjamānāya balavabhāvoti
tika-abh08t0:1114: Taṃ panetaṃ gaṇanato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1115_0: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni, ‘tāni abhibhuyya jānāmi
tika-abh08t0:1115_1: passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni
tika-abh08t0:1115_2: suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni. Ajjhattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1115_3: arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya
tika-abh08t0:1115_4: jānāmi passāmi. Nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni, tāni abhibhuyya
tika-abh08t0:1115_5: jānāmi passāmi. Pītāni pītavaṇṇāni pītanidassanāni pītanibhāsāni. Lohitāni lohitavaṇṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1115_6: lohitanidassanāni lohitanibhāsāni. Odātāni odātavaṇṇāni odātanidassanāni odātanibhāsāni,
tika-abh08t0:1116_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattesu kesādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1116_1: parikammaappanāsaññāvirahito. Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu,
tika-abh08t0:1116_2: catūsu bhūtakasiṇesu eva vā kataparikammakatāya parikammavasena ceva appanāvasena
tika-abh08t0:1116_3: ca tāni bahiddhā aṭṭha, cattāri vā kasiṇarūpāni passati. Parittānīti amahantāni.
tika-abh08t0:1116_4: Abhibhuyyāti yathā mahagghaso sampannagahaṇiko puriso kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā
tika-abh08t0:1116_5: “kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ bhattaṃ atthī”ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā sabbaṃ ekakabaḷameva karoti,
tika-abh08t0:1116_6: evameva ñāṇuttariko puggalo visadañāṇo “kiṃ ettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1116_7: atthi, nāyaṃ mama bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni parikammena, ñāṇena vā abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1116_8: Heṭṭhā vuttanayena sīghaṃ appanaṃ nibbatteti. “Jānāmi passāmī”ti iminā panassa pubbābhogo
tika-abh08t0:1116_9: kathito, tadāgamanato ca antosamāpattiyaṃ cittābhisaṅkhāro. Itarathā anena ābhogamatte
tika-abh08t0:1116_10: kathite tena sādhitabbaṃ jhānaṃ na vuttaṃ hoti, abhibhāyatanadesanāvāyaṃ jhānavisayāti.
tika-abh08t0:1116_11: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1117: “Iminā panassa ābhogo kathito. So ca kho samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa, na antosamāpattiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1118: Dutiye suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇāni. Parisuddhāni hi nīlādīni suvaṇṇāni, aparisuddhāni dubbaṇṇānīti idha adhippetāni.
tika-abh08t0:1119_0: Tatiye appamāṇānīti vuddhippamāṇāni vipulāni khalamaṇḍalādīni. Vaḍḍhanavasena panettha
tika-abh08t0:1119_1: appamāṇatā na gahitā kasiṇavaḍḍhanassa idha asambhavato. Kasiṇassa hi dve vaḍḍhanabhūmiyo
tika-abh08t0:1119_2: upacārabhūmi, appanābhūmi vā. Tattha na tāva idha upacārabhūmiyaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t0:1119_3: Nimittuppattiyā samakālaṃ viya uppajjamāne jhāne kuto tassa okāsoti, nāpi appanābhūmiyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1119_4: Vaḍḍhitassa paṭhamuppannajhānārammaṇatā na yujjati, tasmā sabhāvamahantāneva ālambaṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1119_5: idha appamāṇānīti adhippetāni. Keci pana “vaḍḍhitavaseneva appamāṇānīti gahetvā paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1119_6: abhibhavanicchāya abhāvena vaḍḍhetvā pacchā abhibhavanicchāya sati abhibhavanākārena
tika-abh08t0:1119_7: pavatto tasmiṃ appanaṃ nibbattetīti appanaṃ paṭilabhitvā vaḍḍhitanimittesu idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1120_0: Catutthe abhibhuyyāti abhibhavitvā. Yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko mahagghaso puriso
tika-abh08t0:1120_1: ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā “‘aññopi hotu, aññopi hotū’ti kiṃ esa mayhaṃ karissatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1120_2: na taṃ mahantato passati, evameva ñāṇuttaro visadañāṇo puggalo “‘kiṃ ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1120_3: nayidaṃ appamāṇa’nti mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro”ti abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1121_0: Pañcame nīlāni…pe… nīlanibhāsānīti etāni pariyāyanāmānīti tattha “nīlānī”ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena
tika-abh08t0:1121_1: vuttaṃ. Ettakeyeva pana vutte taṃyogato tabbohārena guṇayuttepi pasaṅgo siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1121_2: “nīlavaṇṇānī”ti vaṇṇavasena vuttaṃ. Evampi hi bahubbīhivasena guṇopi pasaṅgo hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1121_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ rūpaṃ. Tato setādinivāraṇatthaṃ nīla-saddena saha samāso katoti apaññāyamānacīvarāni
tika-abh08t0:1121_5: asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva hutvā dissamānānīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Nīlanibhāsānī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1121_6: idaṃ pana obhāsavasena vuttaṃ, nīlobhāsāni nīlappabhāyuttānīti attho. Etena tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1121_7: suvisuddhattaṃ dasseti. ‘Pītānī”tiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Aṭṭhasu
tika-abh08t0:1121_8: cetesu purimaṃ abhibhavanākārena vaṇṇābhogarahitāni aṭṭhapi kasiṇāni parittāni ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1121_9: katvā uppannaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatiyaṃ tathā appamāṇāni. Dutiyacatutthāniyeva dve
tika-abh08t0:1121_10: vaṇṇābhogasahitāni ārabbha uppannaṃ, na pana vaṇṇakasiṇavasena uppannaṃ tassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:1122_0: Pañcamādīni pana tesu katādhikāre sandhāya suvisuddhavaṇṇavaseneva desitāni. Na hi
tika-abh08t0:1122_1: tesaṃ abhibhavanassa parittatā, appamāṇatā vā kāraṇaṃ, atha kho suvisuddhanīlādibhāvo.
tika-abh08t0:1122_2: Tattha hi te katādhikārāti. Nanu ca āgamaṭṭhakathāsu “suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1122_3: vā, parittaappamāṇavaseneva imāni abhibhāyatanāni desitānī”ti vuttanti? Saccaṃ, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1122_4: pana āgame abhibhāyatanānaṃ aññathā āgatattā vuttaṃ. Tattha hi –
tika-abh08t0:1123_0: “Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, appamāṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1123_1: suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:1124_0: Evaṃ cattāriyeva abhibhāyatanāni āgatāni, tasmā tadaṭṭhakathāsu vaṇṇābhoge vijjamāne
tika-abh08t0:1124_1: avijjamānepi parittaappamāṇatāvaseneva imesaṃ desitabhāvo vutto. Parittaappamāṇatā
tika-abh08t0:1124_2: hi imesu catūsu abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ vaṇṇābhoge vijjamāne avijjamānepīti. Nanu
tika-abh08t0:1124_3: ca sabbattha “suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vacanato vaṇṇābhogasahitāniyeva tattha gahitānīti?
tika-abh08t0:1124_4: Taṃ na, vaṇṇābhogarahitāni, sahitāni ca sabbāni parittāni ekato katvā “parittāni
tika-abh08t0:1124_5: suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni, tathā “appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1124_6: visiṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇābhogarahitānaṃ, sahitānañca ekajjhaṃ manasikāro, na ekajjhaṃ, visuṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1124_7: tesaṃ manasikāro. Yadi evaṃ visuṃ kathamekattanti? Parittabhāvasāmaññato. Yadi evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1124_9: Atthi hi esa pariyāyo, yadidaṃ vaṇṇābhogajanitājanitaṃ visesaṃ aggahetvā parittabhāvasāmaññena
tika-abh08t0:1124_10: ekattaṃ netvā “parittāni abhibhuyyā”ti vatvā puna tadantogadhameva pabhedaṃ vineyyavasena
tika-abh08t0:1124_11: dassetuṃ tāni ca kadāci vaṇṇavasena āvajjitāni honti, “suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1124_12: vattabbatāya vaṇṇābhogarahitāni, sahitāni ca visuṃ manasi katvā ubhayatthāpi vaṇṇābhogarahitaparittābhibhavane,
tika-abh08t0:1124_13: taṃsahitaparittābhibhavane ca parittābhibhavanasāmaññaṃ gahetvā ekattaṃ katanti.
tika-abh08t0:1124_14: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni, sahitāni ca visuṃ vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1124_15: Atthi hi ubhayatthābhibhavanavisesoti. Hotu tāva, evaṃ suttābhidhammapāṭhavisesato
tika-abh08t0:1124_16: aṭṭhakathāya pāṭhabhede pana ko adhippāyoti? Vuccate – suttante hi paṭhamavimokkhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1124_17: dvedhā bhinditvā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanāni vuttāni, pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi
tika-abh08t0:1125_1: ca abhibhavanappavattito saṅgahito, idha pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni
tika-abh08t0:1125_2: asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni. Sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni
tika-abh08t0:1125_3: vimokkhadesanāya vuttāni, tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti sutte āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa
tika-abh08t0:1125_5: vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati. Avassañcetaṃ eva sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, na sampaṭicchantehi
tika-abh08t0:1125_6: suttābhidhammapāṭhabhede aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. Atha kimettha vattabbaṃ, nanu aṭṭhakathāyameva
tika-abh08t0:1125_7: “kasmā pana yathā suttante ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī’tiādi
tika-abh08t0:1125_8: vuttaṃ, evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1125_9: vatvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttanti? Na taṃ tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1125_10: atha kho katthaci “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhā
tika-abh08t0:1125_11: rūpāni passatī”ti, tassa ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. Teneva hi tattha vā idha vā “bahiddhā
tika-abh08t0:1125_12: rūpāniyeva abhibhavitabbānī”ti tattheva vuttaṃ, anabhibhavanīyatā ca ajjhattarūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1125_13: bahiddhā rūpāni viya avibhūtattā. Na hi suṭṭhu vibhūtabhāvamantarena ñāṇuttarānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1125_14: ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ sambhavatīti. Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāṭhadvayavisesassa desanāvilāso
tika-abh08t0:1125_15: kāraṇabhāvena vuttoti? Saccaṃ vutto, so ca yathāvuttavavatthānavaseneva veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1125_16: Desanāvilāso hi nāma vineyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vijjamānasseva pariyāyassa vibhāvanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1125_17: na yassa kassacīti. Evaṃ tāva abhibhāyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1126_1: pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa viya dārakassa ārammaṇe nirāsaṅkameva hutvā paṭhamakappanā
tika-abh08t0:1126_2: viya ca lahuṃ avuṭṭhahitvā antamaso catupañcacittakkhaṇato anosakkitvā ārammaṇe abhirativasena
tika-abh08t0:1126_3: pavattassa vasibhāvappattassa jhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tañhi kasiṇāyatanavasena vā
tika-abh08t0:1126_4: abhibhāyatanavasena vā uppannaṃ paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttattā, ārammaṇe adhimuttatāya
tika-abh08t0:1127_0: “Kenaṭṭhena pana vimokkho veditabboti? Adhimuccanaṭṭhena. Ko ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho
tika-abh08t0:1127_1: nāma? Paccanīkadhammehi ca suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭho, ārammaṇe ca abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1128_0: Yadi vasibhāvappattameva vimokkho, kathamassa ārammaṇacatukke parittatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1128_1: Avasitāpattañhi jhānaṃ parittanti vuccatīti? Nāyaṃ doso, paripuṇṇavasibhāvappattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1128_2: sandhāya aparipuṇṇavasibhāvappattassa parittabhāvena tattha adhippetattā, tasmā vasibhāvappattameva
tika-abh08t0:1128_3: jhānaṃ vimokkho nāma, na itaraṃ. Itaraṃ pana yadi kasiṇāyatanavasena uppannaṃ, kasiṇāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1128_4: Atha abhibhāyatanavasena, abhibhāyatanamevāti. Keci pana “paṭhamaappanāto pacchimapacchimāya
tika-abh08t0:1128_5: paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu vimuttattā kasiṇāyatanavasena, abhibhāyatanavasena ca uppannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1130: “Rūpī rūpāni passati, ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati, subhanteva adhimutto hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1131_0: Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ, tadassa atthīti rūpī.
tika-abh08t0:1131_1: Rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati. Iminā ajjhattabahiddhavatthukesu
tika-abh08t0:1131_2: kasiṇesu jhānapaṭilābho dassito. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti ajjhattaṃ narūpasaññī, attano
tika-abh08t0:1131_3: kesādīsu anuppāditarūpāvacarajjhānoti attho. Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva
tika-abh08t0:1131_4: paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā. “Subha”nti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu
tika-abh08t0:1131_5: jhānāni dassitāni. Tattha kiñcāpi antoappanāyaṃ “subha”nti ābhogo natthi, yo pana
tika-abh08t0:1131_6: suvisuddhaṃ subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati, so yasmā “subha”nti adhimuccanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1131_7: paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajjitvā viharati, tathā dutiyādīni, tasmā evaṃ desanā katāti.
tika-abh08t0:1131_8: Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1131_9: brahmavihāravasena subhavimokkho vutto. Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pana brahmavihārānaṃ visuṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1131_10: āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sunīlakādivaseneva subhavimokkho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātoti
tika-abh08t0:1131_11: idhāpi tattha vuttanayeneva vavatthānaṃ katanti evaṃ tāva vimokkhajhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1132_0: Yathānurūpanti hīnādianurūpaṃ. Paṭhamajjhānañhi hīnaṃ kappassa tatiyabhāgāyuke brahmapārisajje
tika-abh08t0:1132_1: upapattiṃ nipphādeti, majjhimaṃ upaḍḍhakappāyuke brahmapurohite, paṇītaṃ ekakappāyuke
tika-abh08t0:1132_2: mahābrahme. Tathā dutiyajjhānaṃ, tatiyajjhānañca hīnaṃ dvikappāyuke parittābhe, majjhimaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1132_3: catukappāyuke appamāṇābhe, paṇītaṃ aṭṭhakappāyuke ābhassare. Catutthajjhānaṃ hīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1132_4: soḷasakappāyuke parittāsubhe, majjhimaṃ dvattiṃsakappāyuke appamāṇasubhe, paṇītaṃ
