tika-abh08t0:1132_5: catusaṭṭhikappāyuke subhakiṇhe. Pañcamajjhānaṃ pana tividhampi pañcakappasatāyuke
tika-abh08t0:1132_6: vehapphale upapattiṃ nipphādeti, tadeva titthiyehi saññāvirāgavasena bhāvitaṃ pañcakappasatāyukeyeva
tika-abh08t0:1132_7: asaññasatte. Anāgāmīhi pana puthujjanādikāle pacchāpi bhāvitaṃ saddhādiindriyādhimuttatānukkamena
tika-abh08t0:1133_0: Yasmā pana rūpabhavepi pavattiyaṃ labhitabbā upabhogasampatti kāmāvacarasseva phalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1133_1: tasmā idha “bhavabhogasampattiṃ nipphādetī”ti avatvā upapattinipphādanameva vuttanti
tika-abh08t0:1133_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca dutiyajjhānabhūmiṃ upādāya sabbattha paripuṇṇassa mahākappassa
tika-abh08t0:1133_3: vasena paricchedo daṭṭhabbo, paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ pana asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena. Na
tika-abh08t0:1133_4: hi tattha itaravasena paricchedo sambhavati ekakappepi avināsābhāvena mahākappassa
tika-abh08t0:1136_0: Idāni arūpāvacarakusalassa niddesāvakāso anuppattoti tanniddesatthamāha “sesesu panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1136_1: Ākāsakasiṇavajjitassa yassa kassaci kasiṇassa ugghāṭanato laddhamākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1136_2: Tattha pavattaṃ viññāṇanti ākāsānañcāyatanamāha. Tañhi dutiyāruppassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1136_4: pathavīkasiṇādirūpanimittesu tadārammaṇajjhānesu ca dosadassanākārena, tesu eva vā
tika-abh08t0:1136_5: rūpanimittesu nikantippahānaasamāpajjitukāmatādinā ākārenāti attho. Atha vā sabbasoti
tika-abh08t0:1136_6: sabbāsaṃ, kusalādibhedena anavasesānanti attho. Rūpasaññānanti saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānānañceva
tika-abh08t0:1136_8: rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu viya. Tadārammaṇampi kasiṇarūpaṃ purimapadalopena “devena
tika-abh08t0:1136_9: dattoti, bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu viya, tasmā idha rūpe rūpajjhāne taṃsahagatasaññā
tika-abh08t0:1136_11: saññā assāti rūpasaññaṃ, rūpanāmavantanti attho. Taṃgahitena pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa
tika-abh08t0:1136_12: tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ nāmanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Rūpasaññāna”nti hi sarūpekasesavasena niddeso
tika-abh08t0:1136_13: kato. Samatikkamāti virāgā, nirodhā ca. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Etāsaṃ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena
tika-abh08t0:1136_14: pañcadasannaṃ jhānasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ, etesañca pathavīkasiṇādivasena navannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1136_15: ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ anavasesānaṃ sabbākārena ca, tesu eva vā nikantippahānaasamāpajjitukāmatādinā
tika-abh08t0:1136_16: ākārena virāgā, nirodhā ca jigucchanato ceva tappaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhanato
tika-abh08t0:1136_17: ca nibbattaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāya sahagataṃ arūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ. Na hi sakkā
tika-abh08t0:1137_0: Na kevalaṃ etāsaṃyeva samatikkamanato idaṃ nibbattaṃ, atha kho paṭighasaññādīnamatthaṅgamāditopīti
tika-abh08t0:1137_1: āha “paṭighasaññāna”ntiādi. Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ, rūpādīnañca ārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1137_2: paṭighātena aññamaññasamodhānasaṅkhātena paṭihananena uppannā saññā paṭighasaññā,
tika-abh08t0:1138: “Tattha katamā paṭighasaññā? Rūpasaññā saddasaññā gandhasaññā rasasaññā phoṭṭhabbasaññā, imā vuccanti paṭighasaññāyo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1139_0: Tāsaṃ kusalākusalavipākabhūtānaṃ atthaṅgamā pahānā asamuppādā appavattikaraṇenāti
tika-abh08t0:1139_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Nanu ca etā rūpāvacarajjhānasamāpannassāpi na santi. Na hi paṭhamajjhānādisamāpannakāle
tika-abh08t0:1139_2: pañcadvāravasena cittaṃ pavattatīti? Saccametaṃ, yathā pana “sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa
tika-abh08t0:1139_3: ca pahānā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1139_4: ettha pasaṃsāvasena aññattha pahīnānampi sukhadukkhānaṃ catutthajjhāne, “sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1139_5: pahānā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmimaggaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti ettha paṭhamamaggeyeva
tika-abh08t0:1139_6: pahīnānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ dutiyamagge ca vacanaṃ, evameva imasmiṃ jhāne paṭipajjanakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1139_7: ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1139_8: Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacarasamāpannassāpi na santi, na pana pahīnattā na santi.
tika-abh08t0:1139_9: Kiñcarahi paccayābhāvena. Na hi rūpāvacarabhāvanā rūpavirāgāya saṃvattati, rūpāyattā
tika-abh08t0:1139_10: eva tāsaṃ pavattīti. Arūpabhāvanā pana rūpavirāgāya saṃvattati, tasmā “tā ettha pahīnā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1139_11: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Tathā hi etāsaṃ ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa
tika-abh08t0:1139_12: saddo kaṇṭako”ti vutto bhagavatā. Idha ca pahīnattā eva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhāravacanādīhi,
tika-abh08t0:1139_13: “ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe arūpā”tiādinā ca āneñjatā, santavimokkhatā ca vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1140: Nānattasaññānanti nānatte gocare pavattānaṃ, nānattānaṃ vā saññānaṃ, vuttāvasesānaṃ catucattālīsakāmāvacarasaññānanti attho. Etā eva hi –
tika-abh08t0:1141: “Tattha katamā nānattasaññā? Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ, imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1142_0: Evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā vuttā. Tā pana yasmā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1142_1: ārammaṇe pavattanti, yasmā ca aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā, dvādasa akusalasaññā,
tika-abh08t0:1142_2: ekādasa kāmāvacarakusalavipākasaññā, dve akusalavipākasaññā, ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti
tika-abh08t0:1142_3: evaṃ catucattālīsappabhedā nānāsabhāvā, aññamaññaṃ asadisā, tasmā “nānattasaññā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1142_4: vuccanti. Amanasikārāti sabbaso anāvajjanā asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇahetu javanapaṭipādakena
tika-abh08t0:1142_5: vā bhavaṅgacittassa anto akaraṇā ṭhapetvā kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ nānārammaṇe cittassa
tika-abh08t0:1142_6: asaṅkharaṇatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Iminā hi nānattasaññāmanasikārahetūnaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1142_7: samatikkamopi vutto, rūpajjhāne pana tadabhāvato “nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1142_8: na vuttaṃ. Atha samatikkamādīnaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti? Vuccate – yasmā rūpasaññā, paṭighasaññā
tika-abh08t0:1142_9: ca iminā jhānena nibbattitabhavepi na vijjanti, arūpasaññāya bhāvanāya abhāve cutito
tika-abh08t0:1142_10: uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānaṃ yāva attano vipākuppatti, tāva anuppattidhammataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1142_11: āpādiyamānattā, pageva pana imaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannakāle, tasmā “samatikkamā, atthaṅgamā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1142_12: ubhayathāpi tāsaṃ abhāvoyeva dassito. Nānattasaññāsu pana yā tasmiṃ bhave na uppajjanti
tika-abh08t0:1142_13: ekantarūpanissitattā, tā anokāsatāya na uppajjanti, na arūpabhāvanāya nivāritattā,
tika-abh08t0:1142_14: anivāritattā ca kāci uppajjanti, tasmā tāsaṃ amanasikāro anāvajjanaṃ apaccavekkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1142_15: javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ appavesanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatra pavattamānānampi
tika-abh08t0:1142_16: hi jhānaṃ samāpannassa tāsaṃ amanasikāroyeva itarathā jhānasamāpattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1142_17: Iti saṅkhepato “rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti iminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ pahānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1142_18: vuttaṃ, “paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”ti sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1142_19: pahānaṃ, amanasikāro ca vutto, tīhi panetehi samādhissa thirabhāvo kathitoti.
tika-abh08t0:1143_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana nāssa antoti anantaṃ, anantaṃ ākāsaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1143_1: ākāsānantaṃ, kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ, anantatā pana uppādavayantābhāvato anantamanasikāravasena
tika-abh08t0:1143_2: vā veditabbā. Na hi etassa uppādanto, vayanto vā paññāyati asabhāvadhammattā. Sabhāvadhammo
tika-abh08t0:1143_3: hi ahutvā sambhavanato, hutvā ca vinassanato uppādavayantaparicchinno, netaro. Na
tika-abh08t0:1143_4: ca panetaṃ manasi karonto yogāvacaro tassa paricchedasaṅkhātamantaṃ gaṇhāti, atha
tika-abh08t0:1143_5: kho rūpavivekamattasseva gahaṇena anantapharaṇākāreneva manasikāraṃ pavatteti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1143_7: ca vattabbe ananta-saddassa paranipātavasena “ākāsānanta”nti vuccati. Ākāsānantameva
tika-abh08t0:1143_8: ākāsānañcaṃ saṃyogaparassa ta-kārassa ca-kāraṃ katvā, tadeva āyatanaṃ sasampayuttadhammassa
tika-abh08t0:1143_9: jhānassa ārammaṇabhāvato adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena devāyatanaṃ viyāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1143_10: appanāpattā saññā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññā, tāya sahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1143_11: Atha vā ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanamassā sasampayuttadhammāya saññāyāti ākāsānañcāyatanā,
tika-abh08t0:1143_12: sāyeva saññā, tāya jhānaṃ sahagatanti ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1144_0: Viññāṇa…pe… sahagatanti yadetaṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ, taṃsabhāvadhammattā uppādādiantavantampi
tika-abh08t0:1144_1: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anantākāse pharaṇato attānaṃ ārabbha antassa aggahaṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1144_2: pavattamanasikārato vā anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇānantaṃ, “viññāṇānañca”nti vattabbe
tika-abh08t0:1144_3: viññāṇañca-saddo tadatthe nirūḷho ā-kāra na-kāralopoti vā katvā “viññāṇañca”micceva
tika-abh08t0:1146: Atha vā dutiyāruppaviññāṇena añcitabbaṃ ārammaṇavasena pāpuṇitabbanti viññāṇañcaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-abh08t0:1147_0: Ākiñcaññā…pe… sahagatanti nāssa paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ, antamaso
tika-abh08t0:1147_1: bhaṅgamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sati hi bhaṅgamattepi tassa sakiñcanatā
tika-abh08t0:1147_2: siyā. Akiñcanassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇābhāvassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1148_0: Nevasaññā…pe… sahagatanti heṭṭhimajhānesu viya oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato nevassa
tika-abh08t0:1148_1: saññā atthīti nevasaññaṃ, sukhumāya ca saññāya atthitāya nāssa saññā natthīti nāsaññaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1148_2: nevasaññañca taṃ nāsaññañceti nevasaññānāsaññaṃ, catutthāruppajjhānaṃ. Yadi evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1148_3: “nevasaññanāsañña”nti vattabbaṃ? Saccametaṃ. Vacanasobhanatthaṃ pana dīghaṃ katvā
tika-abh08t0:1148_4: vuttaṃ. Atha vā nevassa saññā nāsaññāti evaṃ ekajjhaṃ bahubbīhisamāsavasena “nevasaññānāsañña”nti
tika-abh08t0:1148_7: Atha vā saññāyeva paṭusaññākiccakaraṇe asamatthatāya nevasaññā, uṇhodake tejodhātu
tika-abh08t0:1148_8: viya saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā, sā eva sesadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1148_9: nissayapaccayatāya, adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena dhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya eva vā āyatananti
tika-abh08t0:1149_1: dutiya”ntiādinā attano anurūpavasena catūsu arūpabhūmīsu upapattisādhakaṃ. Tāsu pana
tika-abh08t0:1149_2: paṭhamā vīsatisahassakappāyukā hoti, dutiyā cattālīsasahassakappāyukā, tatiyā saṭṭhisahassakappāyukā,
tika-abh08t0:1152_0: Evaṃ tividhampi lokiyakusalaṃ niddisitvā idāni lokuttarakusalaṃ niddisanto āha “itaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1152_1: panā”tiādi. Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko, so tividho – saṅkhāraloko sattaloko bhājanalokoti.
tika-abh08t0:1152_2: Tato idaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ. Cattāropi hi maggā upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātasaṅkhāralokato
tika-abh08t0:1152_3: uttaranti anāsavabhāvena. Sattalokesu ca sotāpattimaggo anariyalokato uttarati, sakadāgāmimaggo
tika-abh08t0:1152_4: sotāpannalokato, anāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmilokato, arahattamaggo anāgāmilokato uttarati.
tika-abh08t0:1152_5: Bhājanalokesu pana paṭhamamaggo apāyalokato uttarati, sakadāgāmimaggo kāmalokekadesato,
tika-abh08t0:1152_6: anāgāmimaggo sakalakāmalokato, arahattamaggo rūpārūpalokato uttarati. Iti catubbidhampi
tika-abh08t0:1152_7: maggacittaṃ tividhalokato uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ, kucchitasalanādito pana kusalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1152_8: cintanādito cittañcāti lokuttarakusalacittaṃ. Phalaṃ pana lokato uttiṇṇattā lokuttaraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1152_9: ubhayampi vā saha nibbānena upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātalokato uttaraṃ visiṭṭhataranti
tika-abh08t0:1152_10: lokuttaraṃ. Yathāha “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1153_1: arūpabhave sambhavo natthīti taṃ niyatavatthukaṃ, itaraṃ pana sattavidhampi paratoghosaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1153_2: vināpi vipassanābaleneva nipphajjanato tatthāpi sambhavatīti aniyatavatthukaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1154_0: Tīhi…pe… tividhanti lokuttaravimokkhānaṃ dvārabhāvato vimokkhamukhasaṅkhātāhi suññatānupassanādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1154_1: tīhi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāhi pattabbato idaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ tividhaṃ suññataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1154_2: animittaṃ appaṇihitanti. Katame pana te lokuttaravimokkhāti? Nava lokuttaradhammā.
tika-abh08t0:1154_3: Yathāha “cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca, ayaṃ anāsavo
tika-abh08t0:1154_4: vimokkho”ti. Imāni hi saṃkilesadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttattā vimokkhā nāma. Tāni pana
tika-abh08t0:1154_5: paccekaṃ suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkhoti tividhāni. Yathāha
tika-abh08t0:1154_6: “tayome, bhikkhave, vimokkhā – suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1154_7: Idha pana kusalādhikārattā catumaggasaṅkhātāyeva lokuttaradhammā adhippetā.
tika-abh08t0:1155_0: Suññatādināmalābho ca nesaṃ āgamanato, saguṇato, ārammaṇato ca veditabbo. Tathā hi
tika-abh08t0:1155_1: āgacchati maggo, phalañca etenāti āgamanaṃ. Tañhi duvidhaṃ maggāgamanaṃ, phalāgamanañca.
tika-abh08t0:1155_2: Tesu vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā maggāgamanaṃ, ariyamaggo phalāgamanaṃ. Tattha maggassa
tika-abh08t0:1155_3: āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṃ gahetabbaṃ, phalassa āgataṭṭhāne phalāgamanaṃ. Idha pana
tika-abh08t0:1155_4: maggassa āgatattā maggāgamanaṃ gahitanti. Tato āgamanato. Saguṇatoti sabhāvato. Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇadhammato.
tika-abh08t0:1156_0: Yo hi sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ anattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya anattānupassanāya vasena
tika-abh08t0:1156_1: maggaṃ paṭilabhati, tassa sā anupassanā asuññattakarānaṃ attābhinivesapaccayānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1156_3: gahaṇato suññatānupassanā nāma hoti. Tāya pana paṭiladdhamaggo suññatāya āgatattā
tika-abh08t0:1156_4: suññato nāma. Tenāha “anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhena vimuccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1157_1: maggaṃ paṭilabhati, tassa sā anupassanā niccanimittādigāhakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā
tika-abh08t0:1157_3: pana laddhamaggo animittāya āgatattā animitto nāma. Tenāha “aniccato manasikaronto
tika-abh08t0:1158_1: vasena maggaṃ paṭilabhati, tassa sā anupassanā taṇhāpaṇidhānassa vikkhambhanena paṇidhivirahitattā
tika-abh08t0:1158_2: appaṇihitānupassanā nāma. Tāya pana laddhamaggo appaṇihitāya āgatattā appaṇihito
tika-abh08t0:1158_3: nāma. Tenāha “dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhena vimuccatī”ti. Ayaṃ tāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1159_0: Attano pana rāgādīhi suññatattā, niccanimittādivirahitattā, taṇhāpaṇidhiabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1159_1: ca saguṇato, rāgādisuññasseva, niccanimittādivirahitassa, paṇidhivippamuttassa ca
tika-abh08t0:1159_2: nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇato ārammaṇato ca suññatādivimokkho nāma hotīti evamassa
tika-abh08t0:1159_3: saguṇārammaṇehi nāmalābho daṭṭhabbo. So ca kho suttantapariyāyeneva, no abhidhammapariyāyena.
tika-abh08t0:1159_4: Suttantakathā hi pariyāyadesanā, itarā nippariyāyadesanā, tasmā saguṇārammaṇato nāmassa
tika-abh08t0:1159_6: āgamanato pana abhidhammapariyāyenapi vavatthānakarabhāvena nippariyāyattā. Teneva
tika-abh08t0:1159_7: hi ācariyena “tīhi vimokkhamukhehi pattabbato tividha”nti vimokkhamukhameva dhuraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1159_8: katvā vuttaṃ, na “suññatādināmato tividha”nti. Animittanāmaṃ panettha āgamanatopi
tika-abh08t0:1159_9: suttantapariyāyeneva labbhati abhidhamme maggaṃ pati animittanāmassa anuddhatattā.
tika-abh08t0:1159_10: Anuddhaṭattaṃ pana na anuddharitabbatāmattena, atha kho nippariyāyato tassa magge
tika-abh08t0:1159_11: alabbhanato. Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ vipassanā niccanimittaṃ ugghāṭentī pavattati, saṅkhāranimittassa
tika-abh08t0:1159_12: pana anissajjanato na nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ labhati. Yaṃ panetaṃ sutte –
tika-abh08t0:1162_0: Maggassa animittabhāvavacanaṃ, taṃ yathāvuttapariyāyavasena labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1162_1: Abhidhamme pana yā sayampi nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ na labhati, sā kathaṃ maggassa
tika-abh08t0:1162_2: taṃ dadeyyāti maggassa animittanāmaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ. Yadi evaṃ suññatanāmenapi idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1162_3: samānaṃ. Anattānupassanāpi hi kiñcāpi puggalasuññataṃ gaṇhāti, dhammasuññataṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1162_4: na gaṇhātīti sayaṃ nippariyāyena suññatānupassanā nāma na hotīti suññatanāmampi maggassa
tika-abh08t0:1162_5: na dadeyya. Atha puggalasuññatāggahaṇamattena sayaṃ suññatānupassanā hutvā maggassa
tika-abh08t0:1162_6: taṃ dadeyya, aniccānupassanāpi saṅkhāranimittassa gahaṇepi niccanimittādiugghāṭanato
tika-abh08t0:1162_7: sayaṃ animittānupassanā hutvā maggassa animittanāmaṃ dadeyyāti? Na idamevaṃ, niccādinimittugghāṭanena
tika-abh08t0:1162_8: animittabhāvassa nippariyāyena magge alabbhanato niccādinimittugghāṭanassapi pariyāyabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1162_9: Nanu idampi sabbattha samānaṃ. Suññataappaṇihitabhāvopi hi nippariyāyena amagge na
tika-abh08t0:1162_10: labbhati puggalasuññataggahaṇassa, paṇidhisosanassa ca ujukaṃ maggeneva nipphajjanato,
tika-abh08t0:1162_11: tasmā suññatānupassanāpi appaṇihitānupassanāpi pariyāyeneva taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ labhantīti
tika-abh08t0:1162_12: maggassa nippariyāyato nāmaṃ na dentīti? Na, tato laddhaariyamaggassa nippariyāyato
tika-abh08t0:1162_15: eva gocarabhāvato anattānupassanāya anupassanato maggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1162_16: hoti. Yathāha – “anattato manasikaroto paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1163_0: Tañca pana sayaṃ attābhinivesasamugghāṭanato, ariyamaggapariyāpannattā ca nippariyāyatova
tika-abh08t0:1163_2: sosanato tassā vasena anupassantassa maggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1163_3: Yathāha – “dukkhato manasikaroto samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti. Tañca pana sayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1163_4: paṇidhisosanato, ariyamaggapariyāpannattā ca nippariyāyatova appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati.
tika-abh08t0:1163_5: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ pana aniccabhāvaṃ āgamanato sutvā pacchā sayaṃ paccakkhato passato
tika-abh08t0:1163_6: “aniccameva vata so bhagavā ‘anicca’nti āhā”ti bhagavati saddhābāhullapaṭilābhato
tika-abh08t0:1163_7: aniccānupassanāya manasikaroto maggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Yathāha
tika-abh08t0:1163_8: – “aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti. Taṃ pana sayaṃ saṅkhāranimittato
tika-abh08t0:1163_9: vuṭṭhahantampi ariyamaggapariyāpannaṃ na hotīti nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t0:1163_10: tasmā yathā kāyakammādhikaṃ cittaṃ “kāyakamma”nti vuccati, evaṃ suññatasaṅkhātapaññindriyādhimatto
tika-abh08t0:1163_12: saddhindriyādhimatto pana saddhāya animittanāmālābhato sayampi taṃ na labhati. Yadi
tika-abh08t0:1163_13: sampayuttadhammavasena suññatādināmālābho, atha kathaṃ “āgamanato”ti vuttaṃ? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1163_14: āgamanato adhimattassa pana indriyassa vasena laddhanāmampi āgamanatova laddhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1164_0: Atha vā abhidhammapariyāyenapi suññatabhāvo nāma puggalasuññatāyevāti puggalasuññataggāhitāya
tika-abh08t0:1164_1: anattānupassanāya suññatanāmaṃ nippariyāyatova labbhati. Paṇidhi nāma rāgādikā evāti
tika-abh08t0:1165_0: Nimittanti pana ṭhapetvā suttantapariyāyaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena saṅkhāranimittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1165_1: hotīti saṅkhāranimittaggāhitāya aniccānupassanāya animittanāmaṃ nippariyāyato na
tika-abh08t0:1165_3: vasena paṭiladdhamaggo āgamanato suññataappaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati, animittanāmaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1165_4: pariyāyatova labhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “animittanāmaṃ panettha āgamanatopi suttantapariyāyeneva
tika-abh08t0:1165_5: labbhati abhidhamme maggaṃ pati animittanāmassa anuddhaṭattā”ti. Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1165_7: anukkamena balavabhāvaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanābhūtā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti
tika-abh08t0:1166_0: “Tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṃvattanti, sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato
tika-abh08t0:1166_1: samanupassanatāya animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbasaṅkhāresu
tika-abh08t0:1166_2: manosamuttejanatāya appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbadhamme
tika-abh08t0:1166_3: parato samanupassanatāya suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, imāni tīṇi
tika-abh08t0:1167_0: Ettha hi paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato
tika-abh08t0:1167_1: ca. Aniccānupassanā hi “udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthī”ti paricchinditvā tesaṃ gatiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1167_2: samannesamānā vayato paraṃ na gacchanti, ettheva antaradhāyantīti parivaṭumato pariyantato
tika-abh08t0:1167_3: samanupassati. Samanupassanatāyāti sammadeva anupassanatāya saṃvattantīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1167_4: Manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāya. Dukkhānupassanena hi saṅkhāresu cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1167_5: saṃvijjati. Parato samanupassanatāyāti “nāhaṃ, na mama”nti evaṃ anattato samanupassanatāya.
tika-abh08t0:1167_6: Iti imāni tīṇi padāni aniccānupassanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena vuttānīti veditabbāni. Teneva
tika-abh08t0:1168: “Aniccato manasikaroto khayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti, dukkhato manasikaroto bhayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti, anattato manasikaroto suññato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1169_0: Vuttaṃ. Nanu cettha abhidhammāvatārassa bhāsamānattā abhidhammapariyāyeneva vimokkhamukhāni
tika-abh08t0:1169_1: ca vavatthapetuṃ yuttanti? Saccaṃ, aniccānupassanāyapi pana maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1169_2: pakāsanatthaṃ suttantapariyāyenapi ekaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ, tathā vuṭṭhito pana maggo
tika-abh08t0:1170_0: Catumaggayogabhedatoti sotāpattiādīhi catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayogappabhedato. Ariyamaggānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1170_1: pana sammādiṭṭhādiaṭṭhaṅgasabhāvattā, tesañca sabbalokuttare atthitāya bhaṅgavasena
tika-abh08t0:1170_2: abhedepi indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavataratamabhāvena sacchikiriyāvisesato kilesānaṃ pahānabhedo
tika-abh08t0:1170_4: Sati vijjamāne pañcakkhandhasaṅkhāte kāye diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, sayaṃ vā tattha sati
tika-abh08t0:1170_5: diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, pañcasu khandhesu attattaniyābhinivesavasena pavattāya micchādiṭṭhiyā
tika-abh08t0:1170_6: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sā pana ekekasmiṃ khandhe catudhā abhinivesanavasena vīsatividhā
tika-abh08t0:1170_7: hoti. Tathā hi koci rūpaṃ attato samanupassati “yaṃ rūpaṃ, so attā, yo attā, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1170_8: rūpaṃ, yathā dīpassa vaṇṇoyeva acci, acciyeva vaṇṇo”ti. Rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ samanupassati,
tika-abh08t0:1170_9: chāyāvantaṃ viya rukkhaṃ. Attani vā rūpaṃ, pupphe viya gandhaṃ. Rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1170_10: samugge viya maṇi. Evaṃ vedanādīsupi “vedanaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1170_11: Tattha yo pañcavidho abyatirittaattābhiniveso, sā ucchedadiṭṭhi. Yo pana pannarasavidho
tika-abh08t0:1171: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto tāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā, tikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vā vigatā cikicchā ñāṇapatikāro imissāti vicikicchā. Sā pana –
tika-abh08t0:1172: “Satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya, pubbante, aparante, pubbantāparante, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhati vicikicchatī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1174_0: “Ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahosiṃ, kiṃ nu kho ahosiṃ, kathaṃ nu
tika-abh08t0:1174_1: kho ahosiṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1174_2: na nu kho bhavissāmi, kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi, kathaṃ nu kho bhavissāmi, kiṃ hutvā
tika-abh08t0:1174_3: kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ, etarahi vā pana paccuppannamaddhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1174_4: ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hoti, ahaṃ nu khosmi, no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi, kathaṃ nu
tika-abh08t0:1174_5: khosmi, ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1175: Evaṃ pubbantādayo ārabbha pavattivasena soḷasavatthukā ca niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t0:1176_0: Tattha satthari kaṅkhanto tassa rūpakāyadhammakāyānaṃ vijjamānataṃ, avijjamānatañca
tika-abh08t0:1176_1: kaṅkhati, dhamme kaṅkhanto tassa svākkhātadvākkhātabhāve kaṅkhati, saṅghe kaṅkhanto
tika-abh08t0:1176_2: tassa suppaṭipannavippaṭipannatādibhāve kaṅkhati, sikkhāya kaṅkhanto tassā supaññattaduppaññattabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1176_3: kaṅkhati, pubbante kaṅkhanto sassatākāraṃ, adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya atīte
tika-abh08t0:1176_4: attano vijjamānataṃ, avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati, aparante kaṅkhanto sassatākāraṃ, ucchedākārañca
tika-abh08t0:1176_5: nissāya anāgate attano uppattiṃ, anuppattiñca kaṅkhati, pubbantāparante kaṅkhanto
tika-abh08t0:1176_6: paccuppanne attano atthibhāvaṃ, natthibhāvañca kaṅkhati. Paccuppanno hi addhā pubbabhāgāparabhāgakoṭṭhāsavantatāya
tika-abh08t0:1176_7: “pubbantāparanto”ti vuccati, yuttaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha kaṅkhājanananti? Yuttaṃ, ayuttanti
tika-abh08t0:1176_8: kā ettha cintā. Ummattako viya hi bālaputhujjano. Tasmā so yaṃ kiñci kaṅkhatiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1176_9: Teneva ca soḷasavatthukavicikicchāniddese “etarahi vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ācariyā
tika-abh08t0:1176_10: pana “pubbantāparantoti atītānāgate ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tadubhayamārabbha kaṅkhanto
tika-abh08t0:1176_12: kaṅkhanto pana avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ, saṅkhārādīnañca paccayuppannānaṃ hetuhetusamuppannabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1176_13: sabbhāvāsabbhāvaṃ kaṅkhatīti evaṃ tāva aṭṭhavatthukakaṅkhāya pavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1177_0: Soḷasavatthukā pana “ahosiṃ nu kho…pe… na nu kho ahosi”nti kaṅkhanto vuttanayeneva
tika-abh08t0:1177_1: atīte attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ kaṅkhati. Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo
tika-abh08t0:1177_2: nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ, brāhmaṇādīsu gahaṭṭhādīsu devādīsu aññataro nu kho”ti
tika-abh08t0:1177_3: kaṅkhati. Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ, rassaodātakāḷādīnañca
tika-abh08t0:1177_4: aññataro”ti kaṅkhati. Issaranimmānādīni nissāya “kena nu kho pakārena ahosi”nti nibbattanākārato
tika-abh08t0:1177_5: kaṅkhatīti vadanti. Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho
tika-abh08t0:1177_6: brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe… devo hutvā nu kho manusso ahosi”nti attano aparāparaṃ pavattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1177_7: kaṅkhati. Bhavissāmi nu kho, na nu khoti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anāgate attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1177_8: kaṅkhati. “Kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmī”tiādi vuttanayameva. Ahaṃ nu khosmi, na nu khosmīti
tika-abh08t0:1177_9: idāni attano atthibhāvaṃ, natthibhāvañca kaṅkhati. Tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Kiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1177_10: nu khosmīti khattiyādikova samāno attano khattiyādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Eseva nayo sesesupi.
tika-abh08t0:1177_11: Kathaṃ nu khosmīti “abbhantare jīvo nāma atthī”ti gahetvā tassa dīghādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1177_12: Paccuppannaṃ pana attano sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi. Kuto āgato, kuhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1177_13: gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatagataṭṭhānāni kaṅkhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1178_0: Sīlañca vatañca sīlabbataṃ, tattha gosīlādiasuddhimaggo samādānavasena sīlaṃ, avītikkamavasena
tika-abh08t0:1178_1: vataṃ. Ubhayathāpi vā sīlaṃ, tapokammabhāvena gahitattā vataṃ. Gavādipakatibhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1178_2: attano vā gavādibhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ, “gacchanto bhakkheti, tiṭṭhanto muttetī”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1178_3: gavādikiriyāya karaṇaṃ vataṃ. Taṃtaṃakiccasammasato vā nivatti sīlaṃ, taṃsamādānavato
tika-abh08t0:1178_4: vesabhojanakiccacaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti vataṃ. Sabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato āmasanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1178_5: gahaṇanti parāmāso, sīlabbatassa parāmāso sīlabbataparāmāso. Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1178_6: sīlena suddhi, vatena suddhi, sīlabbatena suddhīti evaṃ asuddhimagge “suddhimaggo”ti
tika-abh08t0:1178_7: pavattassa micchābhinivesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi ca vicikicchā ca sīlabbataparāmāso
tika-abh08t0:1178_8: cāti sakkāya…pe… parāmāso, teyeva kammavipākesu, vaṭṭasmiṃ vā satte saṃyojenti bandhantīti
tika-abh08t0:1178_9: saṃyojanāni, tesaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiādīhi tadaṅgavasena pahīnānaṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanena
tika-abh08t0:1179_0: Nibbānaṃ pati savanato sandanato soto vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgikamaggo, tassa ādito
tika-abh08t0:1179_1: pajjanaṃ sotāpatti, nibbānaṃ maggati, nibbānatthikehi maggīyati, kilese mārento gacchatīti
tika-abh08t0:1179_2: vā maggo, sotāpatti eva maggo sotāpattimaggo. Atha vā sotaṃ ādito pajjati adhigacchatīti
tika-abh08t0:1179_3: sotāpatti, paṭhamo ariyapuggalo, tassa maggo sotāpattimaggo, sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni,
tika-abh08t0:1180_0: Rajjati abhisajjatīti rāgo, so idha pañcakāmavisayā, kāmabhavavisayā ca taṇhā. Dussatīti
tika-abh08t0:1180_1: doso, dasavidhaāghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno byāpādo. Muyhatīti moho, dukkhādīsu aṭṭhasu
tika-abh08t0:1180_2: aññāṇaṃ. Etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanuttaṃ tanubhāvaṃ karotīti rāga…pe… tanuttakaraṃ. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:1180_3: dvīhi kāraṇehi tanuttaṃ abhiṇhānuppattito, pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya cāti. Sakadāgāmissa
tika-abh08t0:1180_4: hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti, kadāci viraḷākārā hutvā
tika-abh08t0:1180_5: uppajjanti, tathā uppajjantāpi maddantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1180_6: Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandamandā tanukatanukā uppajjanti. Keci pana sakadāgāmissa
tika-abh08t0:1180_7: kilesā cirena uppajjantāpi bahalāva uppajjanti. Tathā hissa puttadhītaro dissantīti
tika-abh08t0:1180_8: vadanti. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ, vatthupaṭisevanena vināpi gabbhaggahaṇasabbhāvato, tasmā vuttanayeneva
tika-abh08t0:1180_9: dvīhi kāraṇehi nesaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo. Kasmā panettha mohassa tanubhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1180_10: nanu tatiyamaggavajjhānameva iminā tanuttakaraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ, itarathā heṭṭhā tīhipi
tika-abh08t0:1180_11: maggehi uparimaggavajjhakilesānaṃ bahalābahalāvatthāya pahīyamānattā idha sabbesameva
tika-abh08t0:1180_12: uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ tanubhāvo vattabbo, teneva ca pāḷiyampi “kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1180_13: tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā”ti vuttanti. Saccametaṃ, sutte pana uparimaggavajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1180_14: tanubhāvapariyāyaṃ gahetvā “rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hotī”ti hetuttayatanubhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1180_15: āgatattā idhāpi tadanulomena vuttaṃ. “Kāmarāgabyāpādāna”micceva vā pāṭho. Tathā hi
tika-abh08t0:1180_16: ettheva upari dutiyamaggañāṇaniddese “byāpādakāmarāgānaṃ, tanubhāvaṃ tu sādhaya”nti
tika-abh08t0:1180_17: vuttaṃ. Paṭisandhivasena sakideva imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī, tassa
tika-abh08t0:1180_18: maggo sakadāgāmimaggo. Kiñcāpi hi maggaṭṭhassa paṭisandhivasena āgamanāsambhavato
tika-abh08t0:1180_19: phalaṭṭhoyeva sakadāgāmī nāma hoti, tassa pana āgamanabhūto maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1180_20: tadāyattabhāvūpanayanena sakadāgāmimaggoti vuccati, taṃsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sakadāgāmimaggacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1181_0: Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu, kāmabhave ca rāgo kāmarāgo. Byāpajjati tena cittanti byāpādo.
tika-abh08t0:1181_1: Paṭisandhivasena imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī. Rūpabhave chandarāgo rūparāgo.
tika-abh08t0:1181_2: Arūpabhave chandarāgo arūparāgo. Māno idha arahattādhigamaṃ paṭicca uṇṇatimattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1181_3: Uddhaccampi “ko me bhāro kilesasamucchedane”ti evamākārappavattaṃ cittassa avūpasamamattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1181_4: Avijjāpi asukhe sukhasaññāvipallāso. Ārakattā kilesehi, micchāpaṭipannehi vā, rāgādiarīnaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1181_5: saṃsāracakkassa arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, rahopi pāpākaraṇena pāpakaraṇe
tika-abh08t0:1181_6: rahassa abhāvā, rahitabbato jahitabbato “rahā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ vā pāpadhammānaṃ abhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1181_7: sādhūhi arahitabbato apariccajitabbato, rahasaṅkhātassa vā gamanassa saṃsāre abhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1181_8: arahā, aṭṭhamo ariyapuggalo, tassa bhāvo arahattaṃ, aggaphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1181_9: Tañhi “arahā”ti abhidhānassa, buddhiyā ca pavattinibandhanattā arahato bhāvoti katvā
tika-abh08t0:1181_10: “arahatta”nti vuccati, tassa āgamanabhūto maggo arahattamaggo, taṃsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1182_0: Jhānaṅgayogabhedatoti rūpāvacaraṃ viya pañcahi jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedato. Kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1182_1: panassa bhedoti? Ettha tāva aṭṭhakathāvādo, tayo ca theravādāti cattāro vādā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1182_2: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva “saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāmaggassa
tika-abh08t0:1182_5: ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamenti. Yañhi jhānaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti, taṃsadisova hotī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1182_6: āha. Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero pana “puggalajjhāsayo niyameti, ‘aho vata pañcaṅgikaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1182_7: caturaṅgikaṃ vā maggaṃ pāpuṇeyya’ntiādinā yathā yathāssa ajjhāsayo hoti, tathā tathā maggo hotī”ti āha.
tika-abh08t0:1183_0: Yasmā pana aṭṭhakathāvādo pamāṇaṃ, tayo ca therā paṇḍitā byattā, tasmā cattāropi
tika-abh08t0:1183_1: vādā aññamaññaṃ appaṭibāhanavasena evaṃ veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Kāmāvacaradhamme tāva
tika-abh08t0:1183_2: sammasitvā sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t0:1183_3: uppāditamaggopi vipassanāniyāmena paṭhamajjhānikāva honti. Sace pana kiñci jhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1183_4: pādakaṃ katvā uppādito hoti, tassa vasena aṅgapariṇāmo hotīti taṃtaṃjhānasadiso hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1183_5: Yasmā panettha kāmāvacarakkhandhe ārabbha pavattā vipassanā kāmāvacaradhammesu ca
tika-abh08t0:1183_6: mahaggatadhammesu viya bhāvanāvisesato jhānaṅgaviseso natthi, tasmā “vipassanāya
tika-abh08t0:1183_7: ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī”ti evaṃ pavatto dutiyattheravādo imaṃ vādaṃ na pavisati.
tika-abh08t0:1183_8: Jhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sace pādakajjhānaṃ natthi, sammasitajjhānaniyāmena
tika-abh08t0:1183_9: taṃtaṃjhāniko hoti. Sace paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya dutiyādijhāne sammasitvā uppādito,
tika-abh08t0:1183_10: puggalajjhāsayaniyāmena dvīsu aññatarajjhānasadiso hoti. Sace pana puggalassa tathāvidho
tika-abh08t0:1183_11: ajjhāsayo natthi, tadā kathanti? Ettha tāva keci “nānāvajjanavīthiyameva nivattamānapādakajjhānato
tika-abh08t0:1183_12: ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ gotrabhubhāvaṃ patvā nivattamānāya vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhāyeva
tika-abh08t0:1183_13: balavanto, tasmā sammasitakkhandhaniyāmena taṃsadiso maggo hotī”ti vadanti. Evañca
tika-abh08t0:1183_14: sati “pādakajjhānaniyāmena hotī”ti evaṃ pavatto paṭhamattheravādo pādakajjhānato
tika-abh08t0:1183_15: vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacarakkhandhe sammasitvā uppāditamaggameva sandhāya tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1184_0: Apare pana “pādakajjhānaṃ maggassa mūlakāraṇavasena paccayo hoti āsannakāraṇavasenapi,
tika-abh08t0:1184_1: sammasitakkhandhā pana mūlakāraṇavaseneva paccayā honti, tasmā sammasitakkhandhato
tika-abh08t0:1184_2: pādakajjhānameva balavataranti pādakajjhānasadiso maggo hotī”ti vadanti. Evaṃ sante
tika-abh08t0:1184_3: pana “sammasitakkhandhaniyāmenā”ti evaṃ pavatto dutiyattheravādo samāpattiṃ pādakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1184_4: akatvā kevalaṃ jhānadhammeyeva sammasitvā uppāditamaggameva sandhāya tiṭṭhati. Yasmā
tika-abh08t0:1184_5: pana heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijhānaṃ balappattaṃ hoti, tasmā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato
tika-abh08t0:1184_6: vuṭṭhāya uparūparijhānadhamme vipassato uppannamaggo pādakajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā sammasitajjhānavasena
tika-abh08t0:1184_7: taṃtaṃjhāniko hoti. Uparūparijhānato pana vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānadhamme sammasitvā
tika-abh08t0:1184_8: uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā pādakajjhānasadiso hotīti idamettha sārataraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1184_9: Evañhi sati dvinnampi therānaṃ vādā nippadesavisayā samaphalā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1185_0: Tatiyattheravādo cettha pādakajjhānaṃ, sammasitajjhānaṃ vā vinā ajjhāsayamatteneva
tika-abh08t0:1185_1: na ijjhati. Tīsupi vādesu ṭhapetvā sesajhānaṅgapariṇāmaṃ vedanāpariṇāmo vipassanāniyāmeneva
tika-abh08t0:1185_2: hoti. Tayopi theravādā vipassanāniyāmena vinā na hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca vedanāpi
tika-abh08t0:1185_3: jhānaṅgameva, tasmā tāyapi pādakajjhānaniyāmeneva bhavitabbanti? Taṃ na, vedanāyapi
tika-abh08t0:1185_4: pādakajjhānaniyāmena pariṇāme sati vipassanāniyāmaṃ anapekkhitvā pādakajjhānaniyāmeneva
tika-abh08t0:1185_5: maggakkhaṇe sesajhānaṅgāni pariṇāmaṭṭhāneyeva vedanāyapi pariṇāmo bhaveyya, tathā
tika-abh08t0:1185_6: pana ahutvā ekāvajjanavīthiyā āditova pariṇāmanato maggavuṭṭhānavīthiyā āsannatarappavattāya
tika-abh08t0:1186_0: Atha vā pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānānaṃ sambhave tesu anuppannā vedanā vipassanāya
tika-abh08t0:1186_1: na hotīti pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānaniyāmena pariṇamatītipi na sakkā vattuṃ. Ettha
tika-abh08t0:1186_2: siyā – yattha tāva pādakajjhānaṃ atthi, tattha taṃ niyameti. Yattha pana tikacatukkapādakajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1186_3: natthi, tasmiṃ arūpabhave kiṃ niyametīti? Tatthāpi pādakajjhānameva niyameti. Yo
tika-abh08t0:1186_4: hi bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaphalāni
tika-abh08t0:1186_5: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā arūpabhave nibbatto paṭhamajjhānikāya sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1186_6: vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā upari tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbatteti, tassa tāni paṭhamajjhānikāneva
tika-abh08t0:1186_7: honti. Dutiyajjhānikādīsupi eseva nayo. Arūpepi hi lokuttaraṃ tikacatukkajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1186_8: uppajjatīti evamettha ekekassa lokuttarakusalassa jhānaṅgayogabhedo veditabboti.
tika-abh08t0:1187_0: Maggā…pe… nipphādetīti tebhūmakakusalaṃ viya paṭisandhippavattīsu avipaccavantampi
tika-abh08t0:1187_1: attano attano anurūpassa phalassa nipphādanena taṃtaṃphalappatte sotāpanno sakadāgāmī
tika-abh08t0:1187_2: anāgāmī arahāti sāmaññato cattāro ariyapuggale abhinipphādetīti. Visesato pana sattakkhattuparamatādike
tika-abh08t0:1190: 28. Evaṃ catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ sarūpato niddisitvā idāni taṃ nigamento āha “kāme aṭṭhevā”tiādi. Tattha kāmeti kāmabhave. Tathā “rūpe”tiādīsu.
tika-abh08t0:1191_0: 29. Kusalākusalāpagatenāti kusalākusalakammato apagatena. Aggamaggassa hi uppannakālato
tika-abh08t0:1191_1: paṭṭhāya arahato sabbāni kusalākusalakammāni pahīnāni nāma honti paccayavekallena
tika-abh08t0:1191_2: paṭisandhidāne asamatthabhāvato. Yato ca ariyamaggañāṇaṃ “kammakkhayakara”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1191_3: Atha vā ahetuapaccayavisujjhanassa abhāvato kilesasamucchedakena maggakusalena akusalehi
tika-abh08t0:1191_4: apagatena. Kusale kusalenāti kucchitānaṃ salanādīhi kusalasaṅkhātāya paṭipattiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1191_5: desanuppādanādīsu chekena. Munināti ubhayalokamunanakena aggaphalañāṇena, sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-abh08t0:1192: “Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1193: Vasināti chaḷabhiññatāya paramena cittavasibhāvena samannāgatattā, jhānādīsu pañcavidhavasisabbhāvato ca vasibhūtena vasibhāvūpagatindriyena.
tika-abh08t0:1196_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ “kusalākusalābyākatajātibhedato tividha”nti ettha vuttaṃ kusalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1196_1: taṃ sarūpato niddisitvā idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ niddisanto āha “akusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1196_2: panā”tiādi. “Bhūmito ekavidha”nti vuttamatthaṃ niyametvā dassento āha “kāmāvacaramevā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1196_3: Nikāyantarikā pana rūpārūpāvacarampi akusalaṃ icchantīti tesaṃ matinisedhanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1196_4: avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ. Mahaggatabhūmiyaṃ uppajjantampi hetaṃ tattha rūpadhātuyaṃ pavattivipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1196_5: dentampi ekantena kāmāvacaramevāti. Kuto panesa niyamoti? Kāmataṇhāvisayabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1196_6: Kāmataṇhāvisayatā hi kāmāvacarabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ yathā rūpārūpataṇhāvisayatā rūpārūpabhāvassa.
tika-abh08t0:1196_7: Ekaṃsena cetaṃ evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Itarathā byāpitalakkhaṇaṃ na siyā. Yadi hi
tika-abh08t0:1196_8: ālambitabbadhammavasena bhūmivavatthānaṃ kareyya, evaṃ sati anārammaṇānaṃ saṅgaho
tika-abh08t0:1196_9: na siyā. Atha vipākadānavasena, evampi avipākānaṃ saṅgaho na siyā, tasmā ālambaṇadhammavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:1196_10: pariyāpannānaṃ sā kātabbā. Apariyāpannānaṃ pana lokato uttiṇṇatāya lokuttaratā, uttaritarābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1197_0: Domanassassa anīvaraṇāvatthāya abhāvena taṃsahagatacittuppādo kāmabhūmiyaṃyeva pavattatīti
tika-abh08t0:1197_1: so niyatavatthuko, itare arūpabhūmiyampi pavattanato aniyatavatthukāti āha “niyatā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1197_3: dvihetukattā āha “ekahetukaduhetukato”ti. Ādito ekādasannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ paṭisandhijananato,
tika-abh08t0:1197_5: pavattivipākaṃ dentampi paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhati. Yato vakkhati –
tika-abh08t0:1200_0: Yena pana kāraṇena taṃ paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhati, taṃ paṭisandhivinicchayakathāhi imissā
tika-abh08t0:1200_1: gāthāya vaṇṇanāpadeseyeva vakkhāma. Tīhi vedanāhīti sukhadukkhopekkhāsaṅkhātāhi tīhi
tika-abh08t0:1200_2: vedanāhi. Yathāha – “tisso imā, bhikkhave, vedanā. Katamā tisso? Sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1200_3: Yaṃ pana katthaci sutte “dvemā, bhikkhave, vedanā sukhā dukkhā”ti vacanaṃ, taṃ kusalapakkhikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1200_4: upekkhaṃ sukhe, akusalapakkhikañca dukkhe pakkhipitvā pariyāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1200_5: Suppatiṭṭhitabhāvakāraṇattā mūlamivāti mūlaṃ, lobho mūlaṃ etassāti lobhamūlaṃ. Kiñcāpi
tika-abh08t0:1200_6: hi mohopi lobhamūlesu atthi, so pana sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā vavatthānakaro na hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1200_8: “dosamūla”nti etthāpi. Mūlantaravirahato moho eva mūlaṃ imassa, nāññanti mohamūlaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1201_0: Micchāvasena dassanaṃ diṭṭhi, diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhigataṃ yathā “ākāsagataṃ thāmagata”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1201_1: Atha vā vipariyesaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā gatameva, na ettha gantabbavatthu tathāsabhāvanti
tika-abh08t0:1201_2: diṭṭhigataṃ, dvāsaṭṭhiyā vā diṭṭhīsu antogadhanti diṭṭhigataṃ, tena samaṃ pakārehi
tika-abh08t0:1202_1: micchādiṭṭhiṃ. Tāya hi vipallattacittā tāva kodhavisayo, yāva indriyagocaroti paralokaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1207_0: Ādinā nayena puttamukhadassanaṃ saggamokkhamaggoti evamādikaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1207_1: Kāme vāti ettha vā-saddo aniyamattho. Tena “brāhmaṇānaṃ suvaṇṇaharaṇameva adinnādāne
tika-abh08t0:1207_2: sāvajjaṃ, itaraṃ anavajjaṃ, gurūnaṃ, gunnaṃ, attano jīvitassa, vivāhassa ca atthāya
tika-abh08t0:1207_3: musāvādo anavajjo, itaro sāvajjo, guruādīnaṃ atthāya pesuññakaraṇaṃ anavajjaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1207_4: sāvajjaṃ, bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādikathā pāpavūpasamāya hotī”ti evamādike micchāgāhe
tika-abh08t0:1207_5: saṅgaṇhāti. Diṭṭhamaṅgalādīnīti diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalāni. Sārato paccetīti vuḍḍhiyā
tika-abh08t0:1207_6: pubbanimittabhāvena aggahetvā “idameva vuḍḍhikāraṇa”nti evaṃ sāravasena gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1207_7: Sabhāvatikkhenevāti lobhassa, micchābhinivesassa vā vasena saraseneva tikhiṇena kururena.
tika-abh08t0:1207_8: Mandenāti dandhena atikhiṇena. Tādisaṃ pana attano, parassa vā samussāhanena pavattatīti
tika-abh08t0:1207_9: āha “samussāhitenā”ti. Parassa bhaṇḍaṃ vā haratīti vā-saddena tathāpavattanakamusāvādādīnampi
tika-abh08t0:1207_10: saṅgaho veditabbo. Kāmānaṃ vāti anubhuyyamānānaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ. Vā-saddena parasantakassa
tika-abh08t0:1207_11: ayathādhippetatāya yaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ gahetabbanti gahaṇādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1208_1: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayutta”nti vuttaṃ? Asādhāraṇadhammehi
tika-abh08t0:1208_2: tassa cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṃ. Pāṇassa atīva, atikkamitvā vā pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto.
tika-abh08t0:1208_4: hi kāmesumicchācāraabhijjhāmicchādiṭṭhisaṅkhātā tayova kammapathā iminā na sijjhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1208_5: Sabhāvatikkhaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhārameva hoti, itaraṃ sasaṅkhāranti
tika-abh08t0:1208_6: adhippāyenāha “tikkhamandappavattikāle”ti. Mandaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānaṃ ekaṃsena
tika-abh08t0:1208_7: sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkāva viññātuṃ. Yaṃ sasaṅkhārena sappayogena pavattati, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1208_8: mandameva hotīti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1209_0: Mohamūlaṃ cittaṃ mūlantaravirahato atimūḷhaṃ vicikicchuddhaccayogato cañcalañcāti
tika-abh08t0:1209_1: upekkhāsahagatameva hoti, na tassa kadācipi sabhāvatikkhatā atthi. Ārammaṇe hi saṃsappanavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1209_2: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kiṃ tādise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1209_3: ussāhetabbatāya vā bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā na tattha saṅkhārabhedo atthi. Nanu ca uddhaccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1209_4: sabbākusalasādhāraṇaṃ, kasmā pana etameva tena visesetvā vuttaṃ “uddhaccasahagata”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1209_5: Visesato balavabhāvato. Idañhi etasmiṃ citte balavaṃ, tasmā sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1209_6: hutvā pavattatīti idameva tena visesitabbaṃ. Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ sesākusalesu uddhaccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1209_7: yevāpanakavasena āgataṃ, idha pana sarūpatoyeva niddiṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ asādhāraṇappadhānadhammavasena
tika-abh08t0:1209_8: mohamūlaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ uddhaccasampayuttanti duvidhaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1209_9: Asanniṭṭhānaṃ saṃsayo, vikkhepo avūpasamo, bhantatāti attho. Tattha vicikicchāsahagatassa
tika-abh08t0:1209_10: asanniṭṭhānakāle, uddhaccasahagatassa vikkhepakāle ca pavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1210_1: Atha vā yathānurūpanti yo yassa hetu, tadanurūpato. Yebhuyyena hi lobhamūlakena khuppipāsādinirantarapetavisaye
tika-abh08t0:1210_2: uppajjanti, dosamūlakena doso viya caṇḍajātatāya taṃsarikkhake niraye, mohamūlakena
tika-abh08t0:1210_3: niccasammūḷhāya tiracchānayoniyaṃ, tasmā lobhādihetuanurūpato tattha tattha apāye
tika-abh08t0:1210_4: upapattiṃ nipphādetīti āha “yathānurūpaṃ…pe… upapattiyā”ti. Akusalavipākānaṃ dukkhappadhānatāya
tika-abh08t0:1211_0: 31. Apāpena alāmakena pāpāpāpappahīnena pāpāpāpesu mānasesu yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1211_1: pāpāpāpesu puggalesu apāpena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti vā sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1211_2: Atha vā pāpāpāpesu mānasesu pāpena pāpamānasena pāpavasena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1211_3: pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti yojanā. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – asammāsambuddhena tāva dhammasabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1211_4: dubbijānīyattā kusalampi akusalato, akusalampi kusalato vucceyya, bhagavato pana
tika-abh08t0:1211_5: saha vāsanāhi viddhaṃsitākusalassa kammakkhayakarañāṇena paccayavekallato viddhaṃsitakusalakammassa
tika-abh08t0:1214_1: Yathā hi loke sālibījādīnaṃ phalāni taṃsadisāni nibbattāni vipakkāni nāma honti,
tika-abh08t0:1214_2: vipākaniruttiñca labhanti, na mūlaṅkurapattadaṇḍanaḷādīni, evaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ phalāni
tika-abh08t0:1214_3: arūpadhammabhāvena, sārammaṇabhāvena ca taṃsadisāni vipakkabhāvamāpannānīti vipākaniruttiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1214_4: labhanti, na pana kammābhinibbattāpi rūpadhammā kammavisadisattā. Vipākameva cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1214_5: vipākacittaṃ. Karaṇamattaṃ kiriyā phaladānāsambhavato. Yena pana kāraṇena tassa phaladānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1214_6: na sambhavati, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Kiriyā eva cittaṃ kiriyacittaṃ. Vipākassa kāmāvacarādibhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1214_7: kusale vuttanayena yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbo. Alobhādisampayuttahetūhi saha vattanato
tika-abh08t0:1214_8: sahetukaṃ. Tadabhāvato ahetukaṃ. Nibbattakahetuvasena sijjhamānampi hetaṃ sampayuttahetuvaseneva
tika-abh08t0:1215: Sakakusalaṃ viyāti attano janakaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya. Janakajanitabbasambandhavasena hi taṃ taṃ kusalaṃ tassa tassa vipākassa sakaṃ nāmaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1216_0: “Sakakusalaṃ viyā”ti vuttattā pavattākāraārammaṇādito cassa taṃsadisatā āpajjeyyāti
tika-abh08t0:1216_3: bhavassa aṅganti bhavaṅgaṃ. Nibbattitabhavato parigaññatāya cutihetutāya cuti. Parittadhammapariyāpannesūti
tika-abh08t0:1216_5: parittānubhāvatāya, oḷārikāhi vā kāmataṇhādīhi parito gahitattā “parittā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:1216_6: Vipākassa saṅkappetvā ārammaṇaggahaṇābhāvato kammānurūpameva pavattatīti parittakammavipāko
tika-abh08t0:1216_8: Yadi evaṃ mahaggatavipākopi mahaggatārammaṇeyeva āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, saññāyattārammaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1216_9: samādhippadhānassa kammassa appanāpattassa tādiseneva vipākena bhavitabbattā. Vaṇṇalakkhaṇādikañhi
tika-abh08t0:1216_10: aggahetvā lokasaññānurodheneva gahite pathavādike parikammasaññāya samuppāditaṃ paṭibhāganimittasaṅkhātamārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1216_11: saññāvasaṃ saññāyattaṃ hoti, tasmā tadārammaṇassa samādhippadhānassa appanāpattassa
tika-abh08t0:1216_12: kammassa vipākena samādhippadhānaappanāpattehi viya saññāyattārammaṇatāya nibbiseseneva
tika-abh08t0:1217_0: Mukhanimittaṃ viyāti mukhaṃ paṭicca uppannanimittaṃ viya. Yathā hi taṃ nirīhaṃ aparaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1217_1: mukhanimittaṃ uppādetuṃ, aññaṃ vā kiñci attano balena kātuṃ na sakkoti, evametampi
tika-abh08t0:1217_2: vipākuppādanādīsu na ussahati. Tenāha “nirussāha”nti. Ussāhoti cettha anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmānānusayasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1217_4: ca byāpāro. So vipāke natthi kammavegukkhittattā patitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānassa
tika-abh08t0:1218_1: catukiccānametesaṃ pavattiokāsoti attho. Tattha cutibhavaṅgānaṃ antarāḷaṃ paṭisandhikiccānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1218_4: bhavaṅgapaṭisandhīnaṃ vā antarāḷaṃ cutikiccānaṃ ṭhānaṃ, javanabhavaṅgānaṃ antarāḷaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1218_5: tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ ṭhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ ṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃkiccavasena
tika-abh08t0:1218_6: pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmā ṭhānaṃ veditabbanti ṭhānaṃ uddharitvā pākaṭakiccavaseneva taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1218_7: pakāsetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā kiccampi kiccavantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1218_8: gayhatīti ṭhānantipi kiccameva uddhaṭanti taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1219_2: hetū yesaṃ te duhetukā. Esa nayo tihetukesupi. Tattha duhetukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttāni
tika-abh08t0:1219_3: cattāri, tihetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttāni cattāri paṭisandhiyo honti, tathā bhavaṅgacutiyopi.
tika-abh08t0:1219_4: Yena yena hi cittena paṭisandhi hoti, taṃ tadeva bhavaṅgacutivasenapi pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1219_5: Tadārammaṇaṃ pana avisesena daṭṭhabbaṃ duhetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇassa icchitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1219_6: Nanu cetaṃ asamapekkhitābhidhānaṃ ācariyeneva imassa paṭisiddhattā. Tathā hi vakkhati –
tika-abh08t0:1222_1: Yena hi kammena yā paṭisandhi ādinnā, na taṃ tato adhikataraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ pavatte
tika-abh08t0:1222_2: abhinipphādeti. Yaṃ pana aññampi kiñci kammaṃ tadāladdhāvakāsaṃ siyā, na taṃ tattha
tika-abh08t0:1222_3: tato adhikatarampi vipākaṃ na nibbattetīti atthi. “Sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa
tika-abh08t0:1222_4: bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti hi paṭṭhānavacanena ahetukassāpi nānākammena
tika-abh08t0:1224_0: Yathā ca ahetukassa sahetukaṃ, evaṃ duhetukassa tihetukampi icchanti. Ācariyajotipālatthero
tika-abh08t0:1224_1: pana “sahetuka”nti avisesena vuttattā ahetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ icchati.
tika-abh08t0:1224_2: Vuttañhi tena “sahetuka”nti avisesopadesena duhetukaṃ, tihetukañca gahetabbaṃ. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:1224_4: ahetukānaṃ tihetukaphalāni detī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ? So eva pucchitabbo, yo tassa
tika-abh08t0:1224_5: kattāti. Apare pana “mūlasandhiyā jaḷattā tassa tihetukatadālambaṇaṃ na labbhatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1225_0: 33-4. Tatoti paṭisandhito paraṃ, dutiyacittato paṭṭhāya. Satipi antarantarā vīthicittuppāde
tika-abh08t0:1225_1: tadavasāne uppajjamānassa yāvatāyukaṃ anivattanato vuttaṃ “yāvatāyuka”nti. Balavārammaṇeti
tika-abh08t0:1225_2: atimahantavibhūtārammaṇe. Pañcadvāre hi atimahantārammaṇe manodvāre vibhūtārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1225_3: tadārammaṇamuppajjati, na aññesu. Ekārammaṇappavattiyā paṭisandhādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi ekaṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:1225_4: dassanatthaṃ uddese tadārammaṇassa avasānakaraṇaṃ, idha pana pavattikkamavasena cutiyā
tika-abh08t0:1226_0: 35-6. Kammadvāranti kāyavacīkammadvārassa janakavasena na pavattantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1226_1: Tattha kāyoti kāyaviññatti. Kammanti taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā, kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1226_2: kāyakammaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi kāyo kammassa catuvīsatiyā paccayesu na kenaci paccayena paccayo
tika-abh08t0:1226_3: hoti, tathāpi taṃsamuṭṭhānassa tassa sabbhāveyeva kāyakammādivohāroti taṃ tena katanti
tika-abh08t0:1226_4: vuccati. Kāyakammassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ dvāraṃ kāyakammadvāraṃ. Yadi evaṃ kammadvāravavatthānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1226_5: na siyā. Kāyadvārena hi siddhaṃ kammaṃ “kāyakamma”nti vuccati. Taṃ pana “dvāre caranti
tika-abh08t0:1226_6: kammānī”ti vacanato vacīdvārepi sijjhatīti dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ na siyā, tathā
tika-abh08t0:1226_7: vacīkammaṃ kāyadvārepi sijjhatīti kammena dvāravavatthānampi na siyāti? Taṃ na, tabbahulavuttiyā
tika-abh08t0:1226_8: ceva yebhuyyena vuttiyā ca vavatthitattā. Kāyakammañhi kāyadvāreyeva bahulaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1226_9: appaṃ vacīdvāre, tasmā kāyadvāre bahulappavattanato etassa kāyakammabhāvo siddho
tika-abh08t0:1226_10: vanacarakādīnaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya. Tathā kāyakammameva yebhuyyena kāyadvāre
tika-abh08t0:1226_11: pavattati, na itaraṃ, tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattito assa kāyakammadvārabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1226_12: siddho brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo viyāti nettha kammadvāravavatthāne koci
tika-abh08t0:1226_13: vibandhoti. Vacīkammadvārepi esa pabandho yathāsambhavaṃ daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1227_0: Manokammadvāraṃ pana sayaṃ manoyeva samānaṃ attanā sahagatacetanāanabhijjhādikammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1227_1: pavattidvārabhāvena manodvārasaṅkhaṃ labhatīti na taṃ cittassa uppattidvāravasena
tika-abh08t0:1227_2: gaṇhāti. Na hi sayaṃ attatova pavattati. Yadi pana cittasampayuttā kammadvārabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1227_3: adhippetā, tadā tesaṃ kammadvārabhāvo manasmiṃ na upacārīyatīti sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1227_4: cittādhipatibhāvo citte viyāti cittaṃ “manokammadvāra”nti vuccati. Sabhāvato pana
tika-abh08t0:1227_5: kammadvāraṃ nāma sampayuttadhammāyevāti cittaṃ tato pavattanato manokammadvāravasena
tika-abh08t0:1227_6: pavattati. Anantarapaccayabhūtassa pana manokammadvārabhāve vattabbameva natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1227_7: Idha pana “aviññattijanattā”ti vacanena kāyavacīkammadvāravaseneva appavattiyā sādhitattā
tika-abh08t0:1227_8: manokammadvāraṃ na gahitameva. Na hi “aviññattijanattā”ti kāraṇaṃ manokammadvāravasenapi
tika-abh08t0:1227_9: appavattiṃ sādheti. Atha vā “avipākasabhāvato”ti vacanena manokammadvāravasenapi
tika-abh08t0:1227_10: appavatti sādhitā hoti. “Kammadvāra”nti ettha kammaggahanena nānakkhaṇikakammassa
tika-abh08t0:1227_11: adhippetattā tassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iti imesu kāyavacīkammadvārasaṅkhātesu dvīsu
tika-abh08t0:1227_12: dvāresu, manokammadvārena saha tīsu eva vā yathā kusalaṃ pavattati, na evaṃ vipāko,
tika-abh08t0:1227_13: yathā ca kusalaṃ kāyavacīmanokammassa āyūhanavasena dānādipuññakiriyavatthuvasena
tika-abh08t0:1227_14: pavattati, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana neva kāyavacīkammadvāresu pavattati viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1227_15: na kammavasena, manokammadvāravasenāpi ca pavattati vipākuppādanabhāvābhāvato, na
tika-abh08t0:1228_1: karuṇāmuditā ca paññattārammaṇā sattapaññattiyaṃ pavattanato, tasmā dvinnamālambaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1228_2: ekacittassa visayabhāvānanugamanato na tesu karuṇāmuditā kadācipi jāyantīti ayamettha
tika-abh08t0:1229_0: 38. Dutiyagāthāya pana hi-saddo yasmāti imassa atthe. Yasmā “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1229_1: vuttā, tasmāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhagavatā hi sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadā
tika-abh08t0:1229_2: kusalā”ti evaṃ “pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”tiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ kusalabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1229_3: vutto, te ca viratisabhāvā eva ādito tiṇṇaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ, pacchimassa ca sammākammante,
tika-abh08t0:1229_5: pavattānaṃ sammāājīve ca antobhāvato, tasmā tā ekantakusalabhūtānaṃ kadāci abyākate
tika-abh08t0:1229_6: labhanti, itarathā saddhāsatiādayo viya “siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā”ti vucceyyunti.
tika-abh08t0:1229_7: Yadi evaṃ lokuttaraphalesu aṭṭha, satta vā maggaṅgā na labbhantīti? No na labbhanti
tika-abh08t0:1229_8: lokiyaviratīnameva tattha ekantakusalabhāvassa vuttattā, lokuttaraviratiyo pana phalassa
tika-abh08t0:1229_9: maggapaṭibimbabhūtattā maggasadisato aṭṭhaṅgikatāya, sattaṅgikatāya ca bhavitabbanti
tika-abh08t0:1229_10: na ca ekantakusalabhāvena vavatthāpetuṃ yuttā. Evañca katvā upari lokuttaraphalesupi
tika-abh08t0:1230_1: añño āyūhanakālo, añño vipaccanakālo, tasmā na tāni attano vipākehi adhipatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1230_2: sakkontīti na te chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā pavattanti. Lokuttarakusalāni ca pana āyūhanakālassa,
tika-abh08t0:1230_3: vipaccanakālassa ca antarābhāvato attano chandādīnaṃ balassa avūpasantakāleyeva vipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1230_4: nibbattentīti anantarapaccayā hutvā vipākehi adhipatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ sakkontīti. Evañca
tika-abh08t0:1231_1: icchito, tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherena paccayato, tasmā ubhinnampi matidassanatthamāha
tika-abh08t0:1231_2: “asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhāna”ntiādi. Purimatthero hi yathā mukhe calite ādāsatale
tika-abh08t0:1231_3: mukhanimittaṃ calati, evaṃ asaṅkhārikassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāriko, sasaṅkhārikassa
tika-abh08t0:1231_4: vipāko sasaṅkhārikoti āha, tasmā tassa matidassanatthaṃ “asaṅkhāra…pe… puññato”ti
tika-abh08t0:1231_5: vuttaṃ. Dutiyatthero pana asaṅkhārikādīsu yena kenacipi cittena kamme āyūhite āsannamaraṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1231_6: attano, paresaṃ vā payogena vinā asaṅkhārena appayogena kammakammanimittagatinimittapaccupaṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:1231_7: paṭisandhi uppajjamānā asaṅkhārikā. Yassa kassaci sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kammādipaccupaṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:1231_9: anantaraniruddhakusalākusalassa vasena vā asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāranti evaṃ paccayato asaṅkhārikādividhānatamāha,
tika-abh08t0:1231_10: tasmā tassa matidassanatthaṃ “ñeyyaṃ paccayato cevā”ti vuttaṃ. Idameva ca pana ācariyā pasaṃsanti.
tika-abh08t0:1232_0: 41-2. Hīnādīnaṃ vipākattāti adhipatiyogābhāvepi hīnamajjhimapaṇītānaṃ kusalānaṃ vipākattā.
tika-abh08t0:1232_1: Etena āgamanato hīnādibhāvaṃ vibhāveti. Vineyyasantānagatakilesamalavidhamanena tassa
tika-abh08t0:1232_2: punanato puñño vādo vacīghoso etassa, vuttanayeneva puññaṃ vadatīti vā puññavādī,
tika-abh08t0:1232_3: tena puññavādinā. “Ekantena savatthuka”nti vuttepi rūpaloke pavatti anivāritāti āha
tika-abh08t0:1232_4: “kāmalokasmi”nti. “Na panaññattha jāyate”ti iminā pana byatirekato laddhamatthaṃ dassetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1233_0: Evaṃ tāva sahetukavipāke niddisitvā idāni ahetuke niddisituṃ “ahetukavipākacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1233_1: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kasmā pana sahetukassa kammassa ahetukavipāko hotīti? Vuccate
tika-abh08t0:1233_2: – cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ ārammaṇābhinipātamattattā alobhādisampayogo na
tika-abh08t0:1233_3: sambhavati, tathā mandatarakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti evaṃ hetūnaṃ uppattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1233_4: asambhavato ca nesaṃ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā. Upekkhādiyoge pana cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva
tika-abh08t0:1233_6: upekkhāsahagatatā, kāyaviññāṇassa ca tāya balavabhāvato sukhasahagatatā hoti. Sampaṭicchanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1233_8: ca dubbalamattano nissayena saha asamānajātikañca cakkhādivatthuṃ nissāya uppannehi
tika-abh08t0:1233_10: dubbalanti iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu upekkhāsahagatameva. Santīraṇaṃ pana vuttaviparītato
tika-abh08t0:1233_11: iṭṭhārammaṇe sukhasahagataṃ, iṭṭhamajjhatte ca upekkhāsahagatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Manoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh08t0:1233_12: viya visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato manomattā nissattanijjīvādiatthehi dhātu cāti manodhātu.
tika-abh08t0:1233_13: Sā hi satipi viññāṇabhāve manoviññāṇato sambhavassa visiṭṭhamananakiccassa akaraṇato
tika-abh08t0:1233_14: mananamattāyeva hoti. Vuttalakkhaṇaviparītato pana mano ca taṃ viññāṇañcāti manoviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1234: Viññāṇapañcakaṃ niyatārammaṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ rūpādiekekasseva ārammaṇakaraṇato. Sesattayamaniyatārammaṇaṃ pañcārammaṇikachaḷārammaṇikabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1235_0: Daṭṭhabbatāya diṭṭhaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ. Sotabbatāya sutaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ. Munitabbatāya
tika-abh08t0:1235_1: mutaṃ, sampattasseva gahetabbatāyāti attho, gandhādittayassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Cakkhādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1235_2: vinā kevalaṃ manasā eva vijānitabbatāya viññātaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ. Anāmaṭṭhakālavisesavacanattā
tika-abh08t0:1235_3: ca nesaṃ atītānāgatāpi rūpādayo diṭṭhādisaddehi vuccanti. Teneva hi “daṭṭhabbatāyā”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1235_4: kālasāmaññena nesaṃ nibbacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yassa taṃ diṭṭhārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1236_0: Cakkhuto pavattanti cakkhudvāratova pavattaṃ sabbavākyānaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā. Tena
tika-abh08t0:1236_1: manodhātuādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇabhāvo nivārito hoti tesaṃ dvārantaratopi pavattisambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1236_2: Atha vā “cakkhuto pavatta”nti idaṃ sañjātippavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sañcaraṇappavattiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1236_3: tasmā yathā kuṇḍamukhato udakaṃ sañcaraṇavasena pavattati, na evaṃ pavattamidha gahitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1236_4: Yathā pana candakantapāsāṇato udakaṃ sañjātivasena pavattati, evaṃ pavattameva cakkhuto
tika-abh08t0:1236_5: pavattanti gahitaṃ. Yathā ca kiṃ? Yathā kucchito samuṭṭhitaṃ pittasemharuhirādi mukhato
tika-abh08t0:1236_6: sandantampi “mukhassavo”ti na vuccati, mukhatoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato savantaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1236_7: kheḷaṃ “mukhassavo”ti vuccati, evaṃ hadayavatthusannissayato samuṭṭhahitvā cakkhuto
tika-abh08t0:1236_8: pavattamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma na hoti. Cakkhutoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato pavattamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1236_9: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāmāti. Yo pana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanamattasseva abhinivisitvā
tika-abh08t0:1236_10: taṃdvārappavattānaṃ sesānampi cakkhuviññāṇabhāvaṃ maññeyya, taṃ nivāretuṃ pakārantarenapi
tika-abh08t0:1236_11: viggahaṃ dassento āha “cakkhumhi sannissita”nti. Yathā cakkhuto pavattaṃ, cakkhusannissitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1236_12: vā viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, evaṃ sotaviññāṇādīsupi “sotato pavattaṃ, sotasmiṃ sannissitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1236_13: vā viññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇa”ntiādinā yojanaṃ atidisanto āha “tathā sotaviññāṇādīnī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1237_1: Tattha cakkhusannissitavacanena dibbacakkhādikaṃ aññaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ nivatteti.
tika-abh08t0:1237_3: nissayato, ārammaṇato ca cittaṃ vibhāveti ubhayādhīnavuttikattā. Yadi hi cakkhu nāma
tika-abh08t0:1237_4: na siyā, andhāpi rūpaṃ passeyyuṃ, na ca passanti. Yadi ca nīlādirūpaṃ nāma na siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1237_5: desādiniyamena na bhavitabbaṃ, attheva ca niyamo. Ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti
tika-abh08t0:1237_6: ārammaṇena vinā nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti evaṃ pavatto vādo micchāvādoti gahetabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1237_7: Tenāha bhagavā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādi. Ettha siyā
tika-abh08t0:1237_8: – kiṃ panetaṃ cakkhu, rūpañca viññāṇassa paccayo hontaṃ ekameva paccayo hoti, udāhu
tika-abh08t0:1237_9: anekanti? Cakkhu tāva ekampi, rūpaṃ pana anekameva saṅgataṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Paccayabhāvavisesato.
tika-abh08t0:1237_10: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1237_11: atthibhāveneva hoti tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati abhāvato. Yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa
tika-abh08t0:1237_12: paccayoti vuttaṃ, svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhuviññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1237_13: paccayo hoti. Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo
tika-abh08t0:1237_14: hoti puretaraṃ uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā, tathāpi anekameva
tika-abh08t0:1237_15: saṅgataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato. Yañhi taṃ ārammaṇaṃ tassa yathā tathā
tika-abh08t0:1237_17: ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavasena hoti, nāpi katipayakalāpagatavaṇṇavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1237_18: atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1237_19: paccayo hotīti. Amumeva hi visesaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1237_20: vacanabhedo katoti. Evaṃ sotaviññāṇepi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. Ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1237_21: sampattaggāhatāya attano nissayena saha allīnasseva gahaṇato ekakalāpagatampi gandhādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1238_1: ārammaṇantaraṃ nivatteti, evaṃ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti. Na
tika-abh08t0:1238_2: hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vaṇṇamattato aññaṃ kiñci nīlādivisesaṃ tattha gahetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_3: Tenāha bhagavā – “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_4: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gaṇhātīti
tika-abh08t0:1238_7: upakārakā, nissayārammaṇā dhammā viya āsannakāraṇāti dassento āha “rūpārammaṇāya
tika-abh08t0:1238_8: kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhāna”nti. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1238_10: gahitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṃ katvā sampaṭicchantaṃ gaṇhantaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1239_0: Chasu ārammaṇesu kadāci pañcannaṃ jaccandhādivasena tatopi ūnānaṃ, brahmaloke ca
tika-abh08t0:1239_2: chasveva vā itaresaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ antogadhattā. Santīraṇādirasāti yathāsambhavaṃ santīraṇatadārammaṇādikiccā,
tika-abh08t0:1239_4: idaṃ imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ anibaddhaṭṭhānatāya nibaddhakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1239_6: vaṭṭatiyeva. Ahetukacittānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ lakkhaṇādikassa dassitattā parisesato sahetukacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1239_7: ekasadisameva lakkhaṇādikanti viññāyati. Taṃ pana heṭṭhā vibhāvitameva.
tika-abh08t0:1240_0: Idāni imāsaṃ ārammaṇādito bhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha paṭhamā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇeti
tika-abh08t0:1240_1: ekanteneva iṭṭhārammaṇe, atiiṭṭhārammaṇeti attho. Pañcasu ṭhānesūti sahetukavipākānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1240_3: pañcasu ṭhānesu, pañcasu kiccesūti vā attho. Kiñcāpi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassajavanāvasāne
tika-abh08t0:1240_4: tadārammaṇasambhave asati yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇamārabbha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇamuppajjatīti
tika-abh08t0:1240_5: icchitaṃ, tathā pana uppajjamānassa kadāciyeva sambhavato yebhuyyappavattiṃ gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:1240_6: cha ṭhānāni avatvā pañceva vuttāni. Atha vā taṃ uppajjamānaṃ tadārammaṇaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-abh08t0:1240_7: nibbattatīti taṃvaseneva tassāpi ṭhānaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Acakkhusaṃvattanikakammanibbattatāya
tika-abh08t0:1240_8: jātiyā andho jaccandho. Kiñcāpi hi jātikkhaṇe aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ sabbesampi cakkhu
tika-abh08t0:1240_9: natthi, yassa bhāvābhāvato andhānandhavicāraṇā bhaveyya, tathāpi cakkhussa uppajjamānārahakālepi
tika-abh08t0:1240_11: vā kammena tassa anupādiyamānattā satto “jaccandho”ti vuccati. Atha vā jaccandhoti
tika-abh08t0:1240_12: pasūtiyaṃyeva andho, mātukucchiyaṃyeva andho hutvā nikkhantoti attho. Tena duhetukatihetukānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1240_13: mātukucchigatakālepi cakkhussa avipajjanaṃ siddhaṃ hoti, evaṃ jātibadhirādīsupi yathārahaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1240_14: vattabbaṃ. Jaccajaḷoti jātiyā aññāṇako. Kiñcāpi duhetukapaṭisandhikopi jātiyaṃ aññāṇako,
tika-abh08t0:1240_15: tassa pana pavattiyaṃ paññā sambhavatīti vuttanayena yebhuyyato pavattiyampi paññāyāsambhavato
tika-abh08t0:1240_18: gahitapaṭisandhiko. So pañcavidho āsittapaṇḍako usūyapaṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako opakkamikapaṇḍako
tika-abh08t0:1240_19: napuṃsakapaṇḍakoti. Idha pana opakkamikapaṇḍakassa sahetukassāpi bhāvato, napuṃsakassa
tika-abh08t0:1240_20: ca visuṃ gahaṇato tayo paṇḍakā adhippetā. Ādi-saddena jātimūgajātipaṅgulamammanādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1240_21: saṅgaho. Keci pana “ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikāpi
tika-abh08t0:1240_22: honti, tasmā tādisānampi idha ādi-saddena saṅgaho”ti vadanti. Ettha ca jaccandhādīnameva
tika-abh08t0:1240_23: ayaṃ paṭisandhīti na gahetabbā. Jaccandhādayo pana iminā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1241_0: 43. Tihetukapuññassāti tihetukassapi ukkaṭṭhapuññassa. Duhetukammassa pana sabbathāpi
tika-abh08t0:1241_1: soḷasannaṃ vipākānaṃ asambhavato tappaṭikkhepaparattā cetanāya “tihetukapuññassā”ti avisesato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1244: Mahaggatavipākānaṃ taṃtaṃkusalāgamanavaseneva jhānaṅgahāni, na pana bhāvanāvisesenāti tesaṃ pahānaṅgāni anuddhaṭāni. Upapattiyanti upapattibhave.
tika-abh08t0:1246_0: 44. Kusalānugataṃ katvāti kusalānurūpaṃ kusalasadisaṃ katvā. Yathā kāmāvacaravipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1246_1: kusalato visadisampi katvā vibhattaṃ, evamakatvā kusalasadisameva katvāti atthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1246_2: vadanti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kusalānantaraṃ katvā mahaggatavipākānaṃ bhājitapāḷiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1247: “Katame dhammā abyākatā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā –
tika-abh08t0:1249_0: “Katame dhammā abyākatā? Yasmiṃ samaye rūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti, vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1249_1: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1249_2: avikkhepo hoti, ime dhammā kusalā, tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā
tika-abh08t0:1249_3: upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1250_0: Evaṃ kusalaṃ uddisitvā tadanantaraṃ katvā mahaggataṃ vipākaṃ vibhattaṃ, tasmā yathā
tika-abh08t0:1250_1: kāmāvacaravipākaṃ, evaṃ avibhajitvā idaṃ kusalānantaraṃ katvā vibhattanti imamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1250_2: jotetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kusalānugataṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ. Imināpi ca ācariyena parihāramukhena
tika-abh08t0:1250_3: vakkhamānaatthavisesavacanicchāya tattha vuttanayeneva codanā katā. Evañhi sati kusalānantaraṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1250_4: phalaṃ uppajjatīti ñāpanaṃ suṭṭhūpapannaṃ hotīti ayamettha amhākaṃ ācariyassa maggo.
tika-abh08t0:1251_0: Mahaggatanti mahaggatavipākaṃ. Tañhi idha adhigataṃ. Kāmā…pe… yatoti yasmā kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1251_1: asamānaphalaṃ hoti tihetukassa duhetukāhetukavipākānaṃ, duhetukassa ca ahetukavipākānampi
tika-abh08t0:1251_2: jananato, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana ekanteneva sadisavipākajananato samānaphalameva,
tika-abh08t0:1251_3: tasmāti attho. Ettha ca “kusala”nti avuttepi kāmāvacarapuññaṃvāti upamitattā upameyyassapi
tika-abh08t0:1251_4: kusalabhāvo viññāyati. Kasmā panetaṃ sadisavipākaṃ, na kāmāvacaraṃ viya visadisavipākampīti?
tika-abh08t0:1251_6: ācinati, tasmā tadūpanissayakusalaṃ tadanurūpato nānāvatthukaṃ vipākaṃ janeti. Mahaggataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1251_7: pana ācinanto ekavatthukāyeva bhavataṇhāya vasena ācinatīti tadanurūpato taṃ nānāvatthuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1252_0: 45-6. Sabbathāti dhammato ārammaṇato paṭipadādito ca. Tathā hi ye phassādayo kusale
tika-abh08t0:1252_1: ca labbhanti, te vipākepi labbhanti, yasmiñca ārammaṇe kusalaṃ pavattati, tattheva
tika-abh08t0:1252_2: idaṃ vipākampi. Yāva paṭipadādayo kusalassa labbhanti, tāva imassa vipākassapīti.
tika-abh08t0:1252_3: Kāmaṃ yassa kassaci chāyā taṃtaṃvatthusadisāva, mahantassa pana kusalavipākassa mahantāhiyeva
tika-abh08t0:1252_4: upamāhi bhavitabbanti “gajādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Apare apare attabhāve bhavaṃ vedanamassāti
tika-abh08t0:1252_5: aparāpariyavedanaṃ. Yadi aparāpariyavedanaṃ na hoti, kathañcarahi imassa phaluppattīti
tika-abh08t0:1253_0: 47. Kusalānantaranti kusalabhavānantaraṃ. Yasmiñhi bhave taṃ kusalaṃ kataṃ, so idha
tika-abh08t0:1253_1: kusala-saddena upacārato gahito kammānantaraṃyeva phalassa asambhavato. Na hi taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1253_2: lokuttarakusalaṃ viya anantaraphalanipphādakaṃ, atha kho ekaccakāmāvacarakusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1253_3: viya aparāpariyavedanaṃ ahutvā satipi anekeyeva kāmāvacarakamme mahogho viya parittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1253_4: udakaṃ tamajjhottharitvā attanoyeva vipākadānena ekantena anantarabhaveyeva phalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1253_5: nibbatteti. Nanu ca aparihīnajjhānasseva kassaci nikantivasena kāmabhave paṭisandhi
tika-abh08t0:1253_6: hoti. Tathā hi tissamahābrahmā uparibrahmalokūpapattiyā bhāvitamaggo bhikkhūhi yācito
tika-abh08t0:1253_7: tato cavitvā moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ aggahesīti vuttanti taṃ kathanti?
tika-abh08t0:1253_8: Nikantibaleneva jhānaṃ parihāyatīti tato parihīnajjhāno nibbattatīti vadanti. Apare
tika-abh08t0:1253_9: pana ācariyā “anīvaraṇāvatthāya nikantiyā jhānassa parihāni vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1253_10: vatvā “satipi mahaggatakammuno vipākaṃ paṭibāhanasamatthasseva parittakammassa abhāve
tika-abh08t0:1253_11: ‘ijjhati, bhikkhave, sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā’ti vacanato kāmabhave cetopaṇidhi
tika-abh08t0:1253_12: mahaggatakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā parittakammuno vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1253_13: taṃ yuttaṃ. Etassāti imassatthassa ñāpanatthanti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1254_0: 48-9. Evaṃ avisesena kusalasadisataṃ atidisitvā idāni visesaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭipadākkamo
tika-abh08t0:1254_1: cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā hi dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā punappunaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1254_2: samāpajjantassa taṃ jhānaṃ taṃpaṭipadameva hoti, evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ aparihīne tassa
tika-abh08t0:1254_3: tassa vipāko nibbattamāno taṃtaṃpaṭipadova bhavituṃ arahati. Chandādhipateyyādibhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1254_4: pana tasmiṃ khaṇe vijjamānānaṃ chandādīnaṃ adhipatipaccayabhāvena hoti, na āgamanavasena.
tika-abh08t0:1254_5: Tathā hi ekameva jhānaṃ nānakkhaṇesu nānādhipateyyaṃ hoti, tasmā vipākassa āgamanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1254_6: chandādhipateyyāditā na gahitā. Tenāha “abhāvodhipatīna”nti. Tadabhāvatova sarasato
tika-abh08t0:1254_7: tassa hīnāditā na sambhavatīti sāpi jhānāgamanatova vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1257_0: Maggacittassa viya phalacittassa maggayogato bhedābhāvena “catumaggayogato”ti avatvā
tika-abh08t0:1257_3: phalaṃ cittaṃ sotāpattimaggaphalacittaṃ. Evaṃ sesesu. Maggavīthiyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1257_4: tikkhattuṃ vā phalasamāpattiyā aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsveva ṭhānesu
tika-abh08t0:1257_5: pavattiyā duvidhameva hotīti āha “maggavīthiphalasamāpattivasena pavattito duvidha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1258_0: 50-1. Maggassānantare phale labbhanti maggāgamanatoti adhippāyo. Maggo hi āgamanato
tika-abh08t0:1258_2: nāmattayampi deti, tathā āgamanato appaṇihito maggo saguṇārammaṇavasena animittasuññataappaṇihitanāmakoti
tika-abh08t0:1258_3: phalassa nāmattayampi deti. Evañca katvā abhidhamme ekekassa phalassa tīṇi tīṇi nāmāni
tika-abh08t0:1258_4: vuttāni. Nanu ca abhidhamme “saguṇārammaṇato nāmaṃ anadhippeta”nti vuttaṃ? Saccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1258_5: vuttaṃ, taṃ pana nāmalābhaṃ sandhāya, na nāmadānaṃ. Tattha hi vavatthānakarattābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1258_6: tathā anadhippetaṃ, na alabbhanato. Idha pana ekekassa phalaṃ nāmattayampi labhatīti
tika-abh08t0:1258_8: nāmaṃ deti. Ekantena cetaṃ evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, itarathā vipassanāpi vipassato
tika-abh08t0:1258_9: laddhanāmamaggassa taṃ na dadeyyāti. Parabhāgasminti aparabhāge. Vaḷañjanaphalesūti
tika-abh08t0:1258_12: nibbattatīti tassa taṃvasena nāmalābho. Yadi evaṃ maggassa viya animittanāmalābho
tika-abh08t0:1258_13: na siyā? Taṃ na, yathā maggānantarassa phalassa viya vaḷañjanakaphalasamāpattiyāpi
tika-abh08t0:1258_14: maggāgamanato ca jhānapaṭipadābhedo hoti, evaṃ animittanāmampi labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1259_0: 52-3. Honti sādhipatīnevāti ettha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Maggabhāvenāti soḷasahi ākārehi
tika-abh08t0:1259_2: maggitabbabhāvasaṅkhātena vā maggabhāvena. Phalaṃ…pe… vuccatīti sayaṃ phalabhāvampi
tika-abh08t0:1259_3: maggassa phalattā, taṃsadisatāya vā tamupādāya maggoti vuccati “maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”ntiādīsūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1262_0: Yathā atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasambhavato kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh08t0:1262_1: duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā, upekkhāsahagatāti, evaṃ atianiṭṭhe aniṭṭhamajjhatte
tika-abh08t0:1262_2: ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo natthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ekavidhāvāti “sattākusalavipākānī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1262_3: vuttaṃ. Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena bhavitabbaṃ, na ca paṭighena
tika-abh08t0:1262_4: vinā domanassaṃ uppajjatīti. Kāyaviññāṇassa dukkhasahagatā kusalavipāke vuttavipariyāyena
tika-abh08t0:1262_5: veditabbā. Ettha ca akusalavipākesu labbhamānadukkhaṃ viya nātikaṭukāpi upekkhā ekantanihīnassa
tika-abh08t0:1262_6: akusalassa vipākabhāvato dukkhasabhāvattā hīnā eva. Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho
tika-abh08t0:1262_7: hoti, upekkhābhāvo panassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭipaharituṃ asakkontassa dubbalapurisassa
tika-abh08t0:1262_8: tena kariyamānabādhassa upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imāni…pe… cittānīti imāni satta
tika-abh08t0:1262_9: ekekassa akusalassa vipākacittāni, na pana kusalavipāke viya tihetukādipuññavisesena.
tika-abh08t0:1262_10: Uddhaccasahagatassapi hi pavattiyaṃ satteva vipākā labbhanti. Kasmā panettha yathā
tika-abh08t0:1262_11: kusalavipākaṃ sahetukampi uddhaṭaṃ, na evaṃ akusalavipākanti? Hetūnaṃ asambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1262_12: Lobhādīnañhi ekantasāvajjatāya ayonisomanasikārahetukānaṃ natthi vipākabhāvo, alobhādīnampi
tika-abh08t0:1262_13: ekantamanavajjasabhāvānaṃ vā kāraṇassa tabbidūratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvo.
tika-abh08t0:1262_14: Na hi alobhādīnaṃ paṭipakkhalobhādayo te abhinipphādenti, tasmā idaṃ sabbathā sahetuppavattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1263_1: upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā kammaṃ kammaṃ nāma. Kammakaraṇakāle cetanāya gahitamārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1263_2: kammanimittaṃ nāma. Upapajjitabbabhavapariyāpanno narakādīsu aggijālādivaṇṇo gatinimittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1264_0: 54. Imeti akusalavipākā. Tesaṃ aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu pavattivacanena tabbipariyāyena
tika-abh08t0:1264_1: kusalavipākānaṃ iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu pavatti atthato āpannāti sā visuṃ na
tika-abh08t0:1268_0: 55. Pākassa asurakaññānaṃ gabbhaparipākassa sāsanato vināsanato, pākasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh08t0:1268_1: vā asurassa vināsanato pākasāsano vuccati sakko devarājā, tena pūjito pākasāsanapūjito.
tika-abh08t0:1268_2: Pākaṃ vā paripakkaṃ sāsanametesūti pākasāsanā, khīṇāsavā, tehi pūjitoti pākasāsanapūjito.
tika-abh08t0:1270: Dānādivasenāti pavattākāramattato dānādivasena, na pana puññakiriyavatthuvasena khīṇāsavasantānagatassa puññakiriyabhāvābhāvatoti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh08t0:1271_0: Āvajjatīti āvajjanaṃ, ābhuñjati oṇojeti pariṇāmeti vāretīti vā attho. Tañhi āpāthagataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1271_2: oṇojeti, cittasantānaṃ vā purimākārato aññathā pariṇāmeti, anuppabandhato pavattanakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1271_3: bhavaṅgacittasantānaṃ parato pavattituṃ adatvā āpāthagataṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ aññattha
tika-abh08t0:1271_4: gantuṃ adatvā vāreti. Hasitaṃ uppajjati, uppādīyati vā etenāti hasituppādaṃ, tadeva
tika-abh08t0:1271_5: cittanti hasituppādacittaṃ. Voṭṭhapetīti voṭṭhabbanaṃ. Kasmā panettha āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanāni
tika-abh08t0:1271_6: upekkhāsahagatāni, hasituppādañca somanassasahagatanti? Vuccate – āvajjanaṃ tāva
tika-abh08t0:1271_7: apubbārammaṇe sakideva ca pavattamānasantativicchedavasena pavattanato, dubbalabhavaṅgapaccayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1271_8: vā sabbathā visayarasamanubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttameva
tika-abh08t0:1271_9: hoti. Voṭṭhabbanañca vuttavipariyāyena vedanābhedārahampi samānaṃ vipākappabandhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1271_11: byāvaṭattā vipākaṃ viya ārammaṇarasassāde asamatthamevāti sabbattha upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh08t0:1271_12: Hasituppādaṃ pana vuttaviparītato parihīnavipallāsānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ santāne iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva
tika-abh08t0:1272_0: Lakkhaṇādito panetāsu purimaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purecaraṃ rūpādivijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1272_2: arahataṃ anoḷārikesu vatthūsu hasituppādarasaṃ, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ekantato
tika-abh08t0:1273_0: Bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭayamānāti bhavaṅgasantānaṃ āvaṭṭayantī viya. Sādhāraṇāti sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1273_1: sādhāraṇā. Asādhāraṇāti asekkhānaṃyeva āveṇikā. Tenāha “khīṇāsavassā”ti. Chasu dvāresu…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1273_2: ārammaṇesūti cakkhādīsu chasu dvāresu, padhānasāruppaṭṭhānādigatesu chasu rūpādiārammaṇesu.
tika-abh08t0:1273_4: mayā laddha”nti tusantassa cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe, bhaṇḍabhājanaṭṭhāne mahāsaddaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1273_5: sutvā “evarūpā loluppataṇhā me pahīnā”ti tusantassa sotadvāre saddārammaṇe, gandhehi
tika-abh08t0:1273_6: vā pupphehi vā cetiyapūjanakāle “evarūpena vata sugandhena bhagavantaṃ pūjemī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1273_7: tusantassa ghānadvāre gandhārammaṇe, rasasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saha
tika-abh08t0:1273_8: bhājetvā paribhuñjanakāle “sāraṇīyadhammo vata me pūrito”ti tusantassa jivhādvāre
tika-abh08t0:1273_10: kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇeti evaṃ pañcadvāresu pañcārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1274_0: Manodvāre pana yathāvuttesveva pañcasu paccuppannārammaṇesu ghaṭikārasuttādīsu viya
tika-abh08t0:1274_1: bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇena pariññāte atītārammaṇe, “aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho
tika-abh08t0:1274_2: bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhānādīsu viya anāgataṃsañāṇena paricchinne anāgatārammaṇe cāti
tika-abh08t0:1274_3: evaṃ chasvevārammaṇesu hasitaṃ uppādetīti veditabbaṃ. Nanu ca atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1274_4: appaṭihatañāṇaṃ vatvā “imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1274_5: kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatta”nti vacanato vicāraṇapaññārahitāya etāya
tika-abh08t0:1274_6: kathaṃ bhagavato uppatti yujjeyyāti? Hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato
tika-abh08t0:1274_8: evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷivirodho. Evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1274_9: “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Avassañcetaṃ evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1274_10: icchitabbaṃ, itarathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa bhagavato
tika-abh08t0:1274_11: uppatti na yujjeyya. Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāyakammādibhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1274_12: āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti. Evañca katvā pañcadvāre iminā cittena somanassuppādanamattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1274_13: daṭṭhabbaṃ, na hāsuppādanaṃ pañcadvārikacittānaṃ aviññattijanakattā. Manodvāre pana
tika-abh08t0:1274_14: hāsuppādanaṃ. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pañcadvāre “somanassito hotī”ti ettakameva
tika-abh08t0:1274_15: vuttaṃ, manodvāre ca “hāsayamāna”nti. Idha pana “hasituppādakiccā”ti avisesavacanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1274_16: pañcadvāre somanassakaraṇavasena pavattassapi manodvāre hāsajananassa paccayabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1274_17: sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Hasituppādakiccāti hasitasseva uppādanakiccā. Teneva
