tika-abh08t0:1274_18: hi taṃ “hasituppāda”nti vuccati, na pana aññesaṃ hasituppādacittānaṃ abhāvato. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:1275_1: mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, anāvaraṇañāṇanti imāni cha paccekabuddhādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1275_2: asādhāraṇāni ñāṇāni. Nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, itarathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1275_3: asabbaññutasāvaraṇañāṇatā ca āpajjeyya, tathā hi yadi sabbaññutaññāṇato aññamanāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1275_4: siyā, tassa sāvaraṇattā sāvaraṇe ca visaye sabhāvapaṭivedhābhāvato sabbaññubhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1275_5: na sijjheyya, anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāvena yattha taṃ na pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1275_6: tatthāvaraṇasambhavato anāvaraṇabhāvopi na siyāti? Saccametaṃ, ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1275_8: nissaṅgavāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti evaṃ visayapavattibhedena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1276: “Sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1277_0: Idha ṭhatvāti hasitassa uppādanato hasitassa uppādananti vuttacittassa āgataṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:1277_1: ṭhatvā. Pariggaṇhitabbānīti paricchinditvā gaṇhitabbāni. Kiñcāpi rūpāvacarakiriyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1277_2: jhānaṅgappahānaṃ vipāke viya āgamanato ahutvā kusale viya bhāvanāvisesena pavattākāramattaṃva
tika-abh08t0:1277_3: hoti, paṭhamajjhānassa pana pahānaṅgasambhavābhāvato ekassa vaseneva niddisituṃ sesānampi
tika-abh08t0:1278_0: 57. Yasmā pana bhāvanāvasena pavattākāramattaṃ vinā bhāvanāya kātabbassa nīvaraṇappahānādikiccassa
tika-abh08t0:1278_1: abhāvato ujukaṃ bhāvanā nāma na hoti, tasmā “bhāvanākāravasappavattānī”ti ākāra-ggahaṇaṃ katanti.
tika-abh08t0:1279_0: 58-9. Nanti taṃ yathāvuttarūpārūpasamāpattiṃ. Samāpannā sace kriyāti ettha kiñcāpi
tika-abh08t0:1279_1: sā eva samāpatti samāpajjituṃ na sakkā, niruddhānaṃ anuppannato, paṭiladdhasamāpattikasseva
tika-abh08t0:1279_3: dutiyajjhānādikaṃ samāpajjituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato ca, pubbe paṭiladdhasamāpattisadisaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1279_4: puna samāpajjanato puthujjanakālasmiṃ abhinibbattitasamāpattisadisā ettha sā eva tathā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1280_0: 61. Ekacittakkhaṇattāti ekacittakkhaṇeyeva pavattanato. Yadi hi so punappunaṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1280_1: tadāssa arahato uppattiyā kiriyabhāvo icchitabbo siyā. Sakiṃyeva pana pavattati catusaccapaṭivedhakiccassa
tika-abh08t0:1280_2: ekavāreneva pariniṭṭhānato, takkiccena ca vinā tassa anupalabbhanīyattā. Tenāha –
tika-abh08t0:1280_3: “na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti, tasmā natthi lokuttaraṃ kiriyacittanti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1281_0: 62. Kriyā…pe… desakoti yā āpattiyo kāyavācāhi akātabbaṃ katvā āpajjati, tā kiriyā,
tika-abh08t0:1281_1: yā pana āpattiyo kāyavācāhi kātabbaṃ akaronto āpajjati, tā akiriyā, kiriyā ca akiriyā
tika-abh08t0:1281_2: cāti kiriyākiriyā, kiriyākiriyā ca tā āpajjitabbato āpattiyo cāti kiriyākiriyāpattiyo,
tika-abh08t0:1281_3: tāsaṃ vibhāgaṃ desetīti kiriyā…pe… desako. Atha vā kiriyājhānabhūtā samāpattiyo kiriyāpattiyo,
tika-abh08t0:1281_4: kusalabhūtā pana samāpattiyo akiriyāpattiyo, tāsaṃ vibhāgaṃ desetīti kriyā…pe… desako.
tika-abh08t0:1281_5: Yaṃ kiriyākiriyaṃ cittanti sambandho. Pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ jitattā jino. Hitāhitānanti
tika-abh08t0:1281_6: atthānatthānaṃ. Sāti so jino. Kriyākriyāratoti sabbasattānaṃ hitassa karaṇe, ahitassa
tika-abh08t0:1281_7: ca akaraṇe nirato. Atha vā ekantamiṭṭhavipākattā hitāti kusalānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1281_8: Tappaṭipakkhattā ahitāti akusalānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathākkamaṃ tesaṃ kiriyāyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1281_9: akiriyāyañca ratoti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato. Atha vā hitāhitāti kusalākusalā eva, tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1281_10: kiriyākiriyāmattamavipākabhāvaṃ kātuṃ icchatīti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato. Atha vā hitāhitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1281_11: puggalānaṃ sakiriyākiriyāya attano attano kiccassa idhalokaparalokanipphādanassa
tika-abh08t0:1282_0: 64-6. Sabbe lokuttare aṭṭha katvā ye ekūnanavuti cittuppādā vuttā, tāni cittāni mayā
tika-abh08t0:1282_1: niddiṭṭhānīti sambandho. Pāṭavaṃ atthenti patthenti, pāṭavasaṅkhāto vā attho etesanti
tika-abh08t0:1282_2: pāṭavatthino. Uggahetabboti savanapaṭipucchāvasena uggahitabbo, uggaṇhitvā pana na
tika-abh08t0:1282_3: kevalaṃ uggahaṇamatteyeva ṭhātabbanti dassento āha “cintetabbo punappuna”nti, na
tika-abh08t0:1282_4: hi sakkā uggahaṇamattenevettha sabbathā sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantunti adhippāyo. Abhidhammamahodadhinti
tika-abh08t0:1282_6: ṭhitaṃ paramatthamahaṇṇavaṃ vā. Tarantīti atthaggahaṇavasena uttaranti, sutamayañāṇamūlakena
tika-abh08t0:1282_7: vā bhāvanāñāṇena otarantīti attho. Imaṃ lokanti paccuppannabhavaṃ. Paraṃ lokanti
tika-abh08t0:1282_8: anāgatabhavaṃ. Tarantīti atikkamanti. Idha lokasmiñhi chandarāgappahānavasena imaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1282_9: lokaṃ taranti, āyatiṃ bhavūpapādakassa kammassa kammakkhayakarañāṇena vināsanato
tika-abh08t0:1288_0: 67. Ettāvatā ca cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhesu catūsu dhammesu
tika-abh08t0:1288_1: cittaṃ tāva jātibhūmisampayogappavattākārādivasena vibhāgena niddisitvā idāni tadanantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1288_3: jātibhūmiādivasena vibhāgaṃ, tesu tesu cittesu yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena visuṃ visuṃ bhājanañca.
tika-abh08t0:1289_0: Katame pana cetasikā, yesaṃ vibhājanaṃ vuccatīti te saha nibbacanena sarūpato dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1289_2: Tena ye cittena saha sampayogalakkhaṇena yuttā, teyeva cetasikāti dasseti. Kiṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1289_4: Samaṃ pakārehi yuttāti hi sampayuttā. Tattha yadi ekuppādatāmatteneva ca sampayuttatā
tika-abh08t0:1289_5: adhippetā, sahuppattikānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññasampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha-ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1289_8: hotīti tasmā tāni ekavatthukānīti, cakkhādīnaṃ nissayabhūtāni vā bhūtāni ekaṃ vatthu
tika-abh08t0:1289_9: etesu nissitanti ekavatthukānī”ti kappentassa tesaṃ sampayuttatāpatti siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1290_0: Paṭilomato vā “ekārammaṇā”ti vutte ekavīthiyaṃ pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanādīnaṃ, nānāvīthiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1290_1: parasantāne ca ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ bhinnavatthukānaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti
tika-abh08t0:1290_3: āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha-ggahaṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana nānuppādāpi evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1290_4: atha ekuppādā evāti vicāraṇāya ekuppādā eva evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā hontīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1290_5: “ekuppādā”ti vuttaṃ. Iti imehi catūhi sampayogalakkhaṇehi ye cittasampayuttā, te
tika-abh08t0:1290_6: cetasikā nāmāti evaṃ cetasikalakkhaṇaṃ ṭhapitaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ panete cetasikā nāmāti
tika-abh08t0:1290_7: āha “citte bhavā”ti. “Cetasi bhavā cetasikā”ti vattabbe citta-saddassapi ceto-saddena
tika-abh08t0:1290_8: saha samānatthatāya atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “citte bhavā cetasikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1291_0: Niyatāti niyatuppattikā, karuṇāmuditādayo viya kadāci anuppajjitvā yadā yadā taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1291_1: cittaṃ uppajjati, tadā tadāva tena avinibhuttā hutvā jāyamānāti attho. Sarūpena āgatāti
tika-abh08t0:1291_2: chandādayo viya “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino
tika-abh08t0:1291_3: dhammā”ti evaṃ yevāpanakavasena anāgantvā “phasso hoti, vedanā hotī”tiādinā sarūpeneva
tika-abh08t0:1291_4: pāḷiyaṃ āgatā. Yevāpanāti evaṃ desanā etesanti yevāpanakā. Ekūnatiṃsa dhammāti kiccabhedaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1291_5: anāmasitvā kevalaṃ asambhinnadhammavaseneva ekenūnā tiṃsa dhammā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana cittena
tika-abh08t0:1291_6: saha tiṃsa dhamme gahetvā tesaṃ kiccabhedato gahaṇena chappaññāsa dhammā vuttā. Seyyathidanti
tika-abh08t0:1291_7: sarūpapucchā. Phasso…pe… cittujukatāti yathāpucchitānaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. Iti-saddo
tika-abh08t0:1291_8: parisamāpane, nidassane vā. Puna tettiṃsa hontīti sambandho. Tettiṃsa hontīti teyeva
tika-abh08t0:1292_0: “Kadāci uppajjantī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “imesū”tiādi. Karuṇāmuditāvasenāti
tika-abh08t0:1292_4: hutvāti attho. Evaṃ “muditāpubbabhāgo”ti etthāpi. Bhāga-saddassa drabyavuttitāya
tika-abh08t0:1292_6: Eta-saddassa pana guṇavuttitāya guṇavisesavati vattamāno tassa liṅgavasena pariṇamatīti
tika-abh08t0:1292_7: karuṇāmuditāpekkhāya “etā”ti itthiliṅgavasena vuttanti. Na panekato uppajjanti, kiñcarahi
tika-abh08t0:1292_8: visuṃ visuṃyevāti attho. Teneva hi “karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā muditāpubbabhāgo vā”ti vikappo
tika-abh08t0:1292_9: vuttoti. Kasmā panetā dve ekato nuppajjantīti? Bhinnārammaṇattā. Karuṇā hi dukkhitasatte
tika-abh08t0:1292_10: ārabbha tesaṃ dukkhāpanayanakāmatāvasena pavattati, muditā sukhitasatte ārabbha tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1292_11: sukhānumodanavasena, tasmā ubhinnampi bhinnavisayattā na ekasmiṃ citte uppatti sambhavatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1292_13: paripūrentīti sammākammantasammāvācāsammāājīvāni paripūrenti. Ko viratīti tīsu ekā
tika-abh08t0:1292_14: virati uppajjati, sammākammantaṃ pūrentī paṭhamā, sammāvācaṃ pūrentī dutiyā, sammāājīvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1292_15: pūrentī tatiyā virati uppajjatīti attho. Karuṇāmuditāhi saha na uppajjanti tāsaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1292_16: paññattārammaṇattā, viratiyā ca ekantaparittārammaṇattā. Aññamaññena ca na uppajjanti
tika-abh08t0:1292_17: aññamaññassapi bhinnavisayattā. Micchākammantādīnañhi ārammaṇāneva yathākkamaṃ sammākammantādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1292_18: ārammaṇāni tato viratibhāvato. Etesūti imesu pañcasu.
tika-abh08t0:1293_1: ādi-saddalopavasena “karuṇāmuditāsū”ti vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ “ekenā”ti, itarathā
tika-abh08t0:1294_0: 69-71. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ, catūsu brahmavihāresu dve idha niddiṭṭhā, na itarāti
tika-abh08t0:1294_1: codento āha “kasmā panā”tiādi. Upekkhā ca na uddhaṭāti sambandho. Navahi lokuttaradhammehi
tika-abh08t0:1294_2: janaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ anusāsatīti
tika-abh08t0:1294_3: satthā. Abyāpādena mettā gahitā tasseva hitākārappavattikāle mettābhāvūpagamanato.
tika-abh08t0:1294_4: Teneva hesa “mettā mettāyanā”tiādinā niddiṭṭho. Tatramajjhattatāya upekkhā gahitā
tika-abh08t0:1294_5: tāyeva sattesu majjhattākārappavattāya upekkhābrahmavihārabhāvato. Ādiccena saha
tika-abh08t0:1294_6: samānagottatāya, ariyasāvakabhāvena vā tassa bhagavato puttatāya ādicco bandhu imassa,
tika-abh08t0:1296_0: “Phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro
tika-abh08t0:1296_1: hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, saddhindriyaṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1296_2: hoti, satindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1296_3: somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, sammādiṭṭhi hoti, sammāsaṅkappo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1296_4: sammāvāyāmo hoti, sammāsati hoti, sammāsamādhi hoti, saddhābalaṃ hoti, vīriyabalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1296_5: hoti, satibalaṃ hoti, samādhibalaṃ hoti, paññābalaṃ hoti, hiribalaṃ hoti, ottappabalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1296_6: hoti, alobho hoti, adoso hoti, amoho hoti, anabhijjhā hoti, abyāpādo hoti, sammādiṭṭhi
tika-abh08t0:1296_7: hoti, hirī hoti, ottappaṃ hoti, kāyapassaddhi hoti, cittapassaddhi hoti, kāyalahutā
tika-abh08t0:1296_8: hoti, cittalahutā hoti, kāyamudutā hoti, cittamudutā hoti, kāyakammaññatā hoti, cittakammaññatā
tika-abh08t0:1296_9: hoti, kāyapāguññatā hoti, cittapāguññatā hoti, kāyujukatā hoti, cittujukatā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1296_10: sati hoti, sampajaññaṃ hoti, samatho hoti, vipassanā hoti, paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hotī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1297_0: Evaṃ dhammuddhāraṃ karontena bhagavatā phassādayo tiṃsa dhamme chappaññāsa katvā
tika-abh08t0:1297_3: yuganandhadukarāsi vīriyasamathadukarāsīti sattarasannaṃ rāsīnaṃ vasena vibhāgo kato.
tika-abh08t0:1298_0: Kathaṃ? Etesupi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā “cittaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ, indriyāni
tika-abh08t0:1298_1: patvā “manindriya”nti. Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā “vitakko hotī”ti vutto, maggaṅgāni
tika-abh08t0:1298_2: patvā “sammāsaṅkappo”ti. Saddhā indriyāni patvā “saddhindriyaṃ hotī”ti vuttā, balāni
tika-abh08t0:1298_3: patvā “saddhābala”nti. Hirī balāni patvā “hiribalaṃ hotī”ti vuttā, lokapāladukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1298_4: patvā “hirī”ti. Ottappepi eseva nayo. Alobho mūlaṃ patvā “alobho hotī”ti vutto, kammapathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1298_5: patvā “anabhijjhā”ti. Adoso mūlaṃ patvā “adoso hotī”ti vutto, kammapathaṃ patvā “abyāpādo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1298_6: Ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā. Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā “vedanā hotī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1298_7: vuttā, jhānaṅgāni patvā “sukha”nti, indriyāni patvā “somanassindriya”nti. Evamayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1298_8: eko dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto. Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā “vīriyindriyaṃ hotī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1298_9: vuttaṃ, maggaṅgāni patvā “sammāvāyāmo”ti, balāni patvā “vīriyabala”nti, vīriyasamathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1298_10: patvā “paggāho”ti. Satipi indriyāni patvā “satindriyaṃ hotī”ti vuttā, maggaṅgāni
tika-abh08t0:1298_11: patvā “sammāsatī”ti, balāni patvā “satibala”nti, upakāradukaṃ patvā “sati hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1298_12: Evaṃ ime dve dhammā catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattā. Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā “cittassekaggatā
tika-abh08t0:1298_13: hotī”ti vutto, indriyāni patvā “samādhindriya”nti, maggaṅgāni patvā “sammāsamādhī”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1298_15: patvā “avikkhepo hotī”ti. Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto. Paññā pana
tika-abh08t0:1298_16: indriyāni patvā “paññindriyaṃ hotī”ti vuttā, maggaṅgāni patvā “sammādiṭṭhī”ti, balāni
tika-abh08t0:1298_19: eko dhammo sattasu ṭhānesu vibhattoti evamete dvādasa dhammā indriyāditaṃtaṃkiccavantatāya
tika-abh08t0:1298_20: dviṭṭhānikādibhedena sattarasasu rāsīsu vibhattā. Itare aṭṭhārasa kiccavasena bhedābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1298_21: ekaṭṭhānikāyevāti imesu sattarasasu rāsīsu yevāpanakadhammā ekarāsimpi na bhajanti
tika-abh08t0:1299_0: Nanu cete kiñcāpi sesarāsayo na bhajanti tesaṃ sadisakiccasaṅgahavasena ṭhitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1299_1: Phassapañcakarāsi pana khandhasaṅgahavaseneva ṭhapitoti cetanāya viya nesaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahato
tika-abh08t0:1299_2: tattha samavarodho yuttoti? Taṃ na, khandhasaṅgahavasena ṭhapitopi hi phassapañcakarāsi
tika-abh08t0:1299_3: sabbacittasādhāraṇadhamme saṅgahetvā ṭhapitoti chandādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pakiṇṇakavasena
tika-abh08t0:1299_4: uppajjamānānaṃ sabbacittasādhāraṇatāya abhāvato, manasikārassa ca satipi sabbacittasādhāraṇatte
tika-abh08t0:1299_6: yuttanti. Kasmā pana manasikārassa nippariyāyato saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahābhāvoti?
tika-abh08t0:1299_7: Vuccate – ṭhapetvā cetanaṃ sesadhammānaṃ sakasakakiccesupi parādhīnabhāvena pavattanato
tika-abh08t0:1299_8: abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nippariyāyato na labbhati. Yadi labheyya, cittekaggatājīvitindriyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1299_9: sabbacittasādhāraṇattā vedanāviññāṇāni viya tāni phassapañcake vattabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1299_10: na panevaṃ vuttā, tasmā ṭhapetvā cetanaṃ sesadhammānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nippariyāyato
tika-abh08t0:1299_11: na labbhatīti na tesaṃ nippariyāyato khandhasaṅgaho labbhati. Cetanāyayeva pana sakiccaparakiccasādhanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1299_12: pavattanato nippariyāyato abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇassa atthitāya khandhasaṅgaho labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1299_13: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ phasso phassapañcake vuttoti? “Phassapaccayā vedanā, phuṭṭho vedeti,
tika-abh08t0:1299_14: phuṭṭho sañjānātī”tiādivacanato vedanā saññā cetanā viññāṇanti imesaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1299_15: uddesaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tesaṃ paccayassapi uddisitukāmatāya phasso tattha vutto. Dubbalāti
tika-abh08t0:1299_16: sakavisayepi parāyattabhāveneva pavattanato dubbalā. Adhimokkho hi samādhissa paribyattabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1299_17: paribyattabhāvato samādhāyattavutti, manasikāropi cetanāya paribyattabhāvato cetanāyattavuttīti
tika-abh08t0:1300_0: 73. Manasī ca kāroti manasikāro ca. Manasikārasaddassa hi atthamattasandassanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1300_1: gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ asamāsaniddeso, dīghakaraṇaṃ, majjhe ca ca-saddavacananti.
tika-abh08t0:1301_0: 74-80. Paṭhamābhinipātattāti ārammaṇe phusanavasena paṭhamameva abhinipatanato. Sabbepi
tika-abh08t0:1301_1: cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyabhāvena vuccantīti “cittassā”ti vuttaṃ. Kirāti arucisūcanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1301_2: Evaṃ mahāsaṃghikamataṃ dassetvā idāni tameva vitthāretuṃ “phusitvā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1301_3: Mahāsaṃghikā hi “paṭhamaṃ phasso ārammaṇaṃ phusati, atha tena phuṭṭhaṃ dutiyaṃ vedanā
tika-abh08t0:1301_4: vediyati, evaṃ etehi phuṭṭhaveditaṃ tatiyaṃ saññā sañjānāti, tehi pana phuṭṭhaveditasaññāte
tika-abh08t0:1301_5: catutthaṃ cetanāya sampayuttadhamme abhisandahatī”tiādinā vadanti. Balavapaccayattāti
tika-abh08t0:1301_6: yathā pāsādaṃ patvā thambhā sesadabbasambhārānaṃ balavapaccayā, evamesa yasmā sesasampayuttānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1302_0: Saheva cāti ca-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto, so “cittajāna”nti imassa anantaraṃ daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1302_1: Kasmā? Cittānaṃ, cittajānañca ekuppādādibhāvena saheva pavattitoti evamettha padasambandho
tika-abh08t0:1302_2: veditabbo. Idanti idaṃ yathāvuttavidhānaṃ, evaṃ “paṭhamābhinipātattā”ti kāraṇaṃ pariharitvā
tika-abh08t0:1302_3: idāni “balavapaccayattā”ti idaṃ pariharanto āha “balava…pe… dissatī”ti. Ca-saddo
tika-abh08t0:1302_4: avadhāraṇe, neva dissatīti attho. Sesadhammānampi hi sahajātapaccayabhāvassa sādhāraṇattā
tika-abh08t0:1302_5: tasseva balavapaccayabhāve na kiñci kāraṇaṃ dissatīti. Yadi sabbamidamakāraṇaṃ, kathañcarahi
tika-abh08t0:1302_6: phasso paṭhamaṃ vuttoti āha “desanākkamato”tiādi. “Vedanā hoti, phasso hoti, saññā
tika-abh08t0:1302_7: hoti, phasso hoti, cetanā hoti, phasso hoti, cittaṃ hoti, phasso hoti, vedanā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1302_8: saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, vitakko hotī”tiādīhi āharitumpi vaṭṭeyya, desanāvārena pana
tika-abh08t0:1302_9: phassova paṭhamaṃ vuttoti veditabbo. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sesadhammesupi pubbāparakkamo
tika-abh08t0:1302_10: nāma na pariyesitabbo. Vacanatthalakkhaṇādīhīti vacanatthato ca lakkhaṇādito ca.
tika-abh08t0:1303_0: Phusatīti kattuniddeso. Tattha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva, phusanti etena vāti phasso.
tika-abh08t0:1303_1: Sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṃ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena phusantā
tika-abh08t0:1303_2: viya honti, ārammaṇaphusanamattaṃ vā phassotipi sādhanattayampi yujjateva. Phusanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1303_4: attho. Saṃghaṭṭanarasoti manodvāre cittārammaṇānaṃ saṃghaṭṭanato saṃghaṭṭanakicco.
tika-abh08t0:1303_5: Ayañhi ārammaṇe anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittamārammaṇañca
tika-abh08t0:1303_6: ghaṭṭeti. Pañcadvāresu vā vatthārammaṇasaṃghaṭṭanena sampajjatīti saṃghaṭṭanasampattiko
tika-abh08t0:1303_7: phasso “saṃghaṭṭanaraso”ti vutto. Yathā “dve pāṇī vajjeyyu”ntiādīsu pāṇimhi ghaṭṭanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1303_8: tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā, evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe saṃghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko
tika-abh08t0:1303_9: cetasikadhammo daṭṭhabbo. Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātassa attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā
tika-abh08t0:1303_10: sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno. “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1303_11: saṅgati phasso”ti hi vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sannipātavasena gahetabbatāya
tika-abh08t0:1303_12: upaṭṭhānato sannipātasaṅkhātassa kāraṇassa vasena upaṭṭhānamassāti upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:1303_14: vedanā phalamassāti vedanāpaccupaṭṭhāno. Tajjasamannāhārena ceva indriyena ca parikkhate
tika-abh08t0:1303_15: visaye anantarāyeneva uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno. Ayañhi tassa phassassa
tika-abh08t0:1303_16: kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpabhūto samannāhāroti tajjasamannāhārasaṅkhātena āvajjanena ceva
tika-abh08t0:1303_18: abhisaṅkhāte āpāthagateyeva visaye ekantena uppajjanato āpāthagato visayo padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1304_0: Nanu cāyaṃ dhammo cetasiko, svāyaṃ arūpadhammo samāno kathaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1304_1: antolīnacodanaṃ manasi katvā tassā sodhanatthaṃ “arūpadhammopi samāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1304_2: Tattha “phusanākāreneva pavattatī”ti iminā arūpassāpi sato tassa dhammassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti
tika-abh08t0:1304_3: dasseti. Sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilaṃ ambapakkādiṃ khādantaṃ passantassa
tika-abh08t0:1304_4: parassa kheḷuppattiparaṃ bādhiyamānaṃ disvā dayālukassa sarīrakampanaṃ, rukkhasākhagge
tika-abh08t0:1304_5: duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa purisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ, pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1304_6: disvā ūrupatthambhoti evamādi viya daṭṭhabbā. Soti so yathāvuttalakkhaṇādiko phasso.
tika-abh08t0:1305_0: Sundaranti sukhavedanāsampayuttattā pasatthaṃ. Manoti viññāṇaṃ. Sumanassa bhāvoti
tika-abh08t0:1305_1: sumanasaṅkhātassa viññāṇassa bhāvo. Yvāyaṃ saddappavattinibandhano attho, so somanassaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1305_2: Somanassavedanāsampayuttattā hi sumana-saddo tasmiṃ viññāṇe pavattati. Vedena anubhavanākārena
tika-abh08t0:1305_3: ayitaṃ pavattaṃ vedayitaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇamassāti vedayitalakkhaṇā. Iṭṭhassa iṭṭhākāratova
tika-abh08t0:1305_4: anubhavanaṃ kiccamassāti iṭṭhākārānubhavanarasā. Sā hi sabhāvato iṭṭhamārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1305_5: iṭṭhavasena, itarañca iṭṭhākāreneva anubhavati, tattha iṭṭhākārānubhavanaṃ kusalākusalacittasampayuttavedanāya
tika-abh08t0:1305_6: labbhati tassā aniṭṭhassapi kappanāvasena iṭṭhākārena gahaṇato, sabhāvato pana iṭṭhānubhavanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1305_7: abyākatacittasampayuttāyapi labbhati tassā vipallāsaggāhābhāvato. “Rājā viya subhojanarasa”nti
tika-abh08t0:1305_8: iminā imaṃ dīpeti – phassassa phusanamattameva hoti, saññāya sañjānanamattameva,
tika-abh08t0:1305_9: cetanāya sañcetanāmattameva, viññāṇassa vijānanamattameva, ekaṃsato pana issaravatāya
tika-abh08t0:1305_10: sāmibhāvena vedanāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati, rājā viya sūdakārena sampāditasubhojanarasanti.
tika-abh08t0:1305_11: Assādīyatīti assādo, sukhavedanā. Tenāha bhagavā – “yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhe
tika-abh08t0:1305_12: paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhesu
tika-abh08t0:1305_13: assādo”ti. Cetosannissitattā cetasi bhavo assādoti cetasikaassādo, tathā paccupaṭṭhātīti
tika-abh08t0:1306_0: Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ tameva saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti
tika-abh08t0:1306_1: sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasāti pati abhiññāyati etenāti paccābhiññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1306_2: tadevetanti puna paccābhiññāṇanimittaṃ saṇṭhānādiko ākāro, tassa karaṇaraso kiccamassāti
tika-abh08t0:1306_3: paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasā. Sā hi uppajjamānā pacchā sañjānanassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ saṇṭhānādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1306_4: ākāraṃ gahetvā uppajjatīti. Idañca nimittakārikāya nimittena sañjānantiyā ca sabbāya
tika-abh08t0:1306_5: samānasaññāya yojetabbaṃ. Nimittena sañjānantīpi hi puna aparāya saññāya ca sañjānanassa
tika-abh08t0:1306_6: nimittaṃ karotīti. Tañca kusalākusalakiriyājavanasaññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1306_7: Taṃ panetaṃ abhiññāṇakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇakaraṇamivā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1306_8: Yathā vaḍḍhakissa dārūsu “idaṃ uddhaṃ, idaṃ adho”ti evaṃ pacchā sañjānanapaccayabhūtassa
tika-abh08t0:1306_9: saññāṇassa karaṇaṃ, evamassā puna sañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Hatthidassakaandho
tika-abh08t0:1306_10: viya “idameva sacca”nti saññāya yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesakaraṇato yathā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1306_11: paccupaṭṭhānā. Etena saññāya ākāraggahaṇaṃ katvā ṭhitassa diṭṭhiādīnaṃ uppajjanato
tika-abh08t0:1306_12: akusalasaññāya anurūpavasena phalapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Atha vā abhinivesakaraṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1306_14: abhinivesākārena upaṭṭhānato ākārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1306_16: ca ñāṇavippayuttasaññāya ākāraggahaṇavasena uppajjanakāle cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ saññānugatikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1306_17: hoti. Ñāṇasampayutte citte pana sasambhārapathaviyā anugatā sesadhātuyo viya saññācittañca
tika-abh08t0:1307_0: Abhisandahatīti pabandhati pavatteti, “gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti vadantī viya sampayuttadhamme
tika-abh08t0:1307_1: ārammaṇe payojeti, sakasakakicce ca paṭṭhapetīti attho. Cetayitalakkhaṇāti niddokkantassa
tika-abh08t0:1307_2: pabuddhakkhaṇe sambhamappavatti viya cetaso ussāhatāva lakkhaṇā. Atha vā “abhisandahatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1307_3: vuttattā payojanalakkhaṇātveva attho. Āyūhanarasāti cetasikairiyanarasā, payogarasāti
tika-abh08t0:1307_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Kusalākusalakiriyājavanasampayuttāyayeva panetaṃ labbhati. Saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānāti
tika-abh08t0:1307_5: “tvaṃ idaṃ karohī”ti vicārentī viya hotīti vicāraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā. Etāya hi pavattamānāya
tika-abh08t0:1307_6: sabbepi sampayuttadhammā yathā sakiccapasutā honti, teneva hesā sakiccaparakiccasādhikā
tika-abh08t0:1307_7: vuttā. Jeṭṭhasisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati. Tasmiñhi sajjhāyituṃ
tika-abh08t0:1307_8: āraddhe sesasissāpi sajjhāyanti. Mahāvaḍḍhakismimpi vaḍḍhakikammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe
tika-abh08t0:1307_9: itarepi karonti yevāti āha “jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viyā”ti. Ādi-saddena jeṭṭhantevāsikādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1308_0: Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1308_1: “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ. Ūhanaṃ ārammaṇassa parikappanaṃ, tasmiṃ abhiniropananti
tika-abh08t0:1308_2: vā vuttaṃ hoti. Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiruḷhaṃ viya hoti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1308_3: vuttaṃ “ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo”ti. Yathā hi koci gāmavāsī puriso
tika-abh08t0:1308_4: rājavallabhaṃ, taṃsambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati, evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1308_5: vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1308_6: ārohati, na hi dvipañcaviññāṇadutiyajjhānādike vitakko upalabbhati, yassa balena
tika-abh08t0:1308_7: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati, tasmā sabhāvato bhāvanābalena tattha anuppajjanako? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1308_8: tampi vitakkabalena ārohati. Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko
tika-abh08t0:1308_9: rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-abh08t0:1308_10: Paricayoti cettha santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattacittabhāvanāsaṅkhāto paricayo. Vitakkassa
tika-abh08t0:1308_11: hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhirohanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1308_12: tena taṃ cittaṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha vattateva. Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā
tika-abh08t0:1308_13: sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati, yathā
tika-abh08t0:1308_14: vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena
tika-abh08t0:1309_0: Atha vā dvipañcaviññāṇaṃ avitakkampi vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanassa balavatāya, dutiyajjhānādīni
tika-abh08t0:1309_1: ca heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimabhāvanāya balavatāya ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti. Ādito, abhimukhaṃ vā
tika-abh08t0:1309_2: hananaṃ paharaṇamattaṃ āhananaṃ, parito, parivattetvā vā hananaṃ visesena paharaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1309_3: pariyāhananaṃ, taṃ kiccamassāti āhananapariyāhananaraso. Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro
tika-abh08t0:1309_4: ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati. Ānayanaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1309_5: upanayanaṃ, ākaḍḍhanaṃ vā, tathā hutvā paccupaṭṭhānamassāti ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1310_0: Tenāti tena vicārena karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā cittaṃ ārammaṇe vicarati anuvicarati,
tika-abh08t0:1310_1: avicāracittassa pana avitakkacitte vuttānusārena pavatti veditabbā. Vicaraṇaṃ anusañcaraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1310_2: anuparigamanaṃ. Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno javanasantāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1310_3: Esa nayo sesesupi. Ārammaṇassa anumajjanaṃ anumasanaṃ parimajjanamassa lakkhaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1310_4: ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo. Tathā hi vicāro parimajjanahattho viya, saṃsaraṇahattho
tika-abh08t0:1310_5: viyāti vuccati. Tatthāti ārammaṇe. Sahajātānaṃ anuyojanaṃ ārammaṇe anuvicaraṇasaṅkhātaanumajjanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1310_6: veditabbaṃ. Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi. Tathāgahetabbākāro
tika-abh08t0:1310_8: visayasamāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati. Evañhi so suṭṭhu pakāsito hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1310_9: Anupabandhapaccupaṭṭhānoti ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavattipaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1311_0: Ettha ca vicārato oḷārikaṭṭhena tasseva pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena paṭhamaghaṇṭābhiravo viya
tika-abh08t0:1311_1: cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko, anuravo viya anusañcaraṇaṃ vicāro. Yathā hi ghaṇṭābhighātajo
tika-abh08t0:1311_2: paṭhamābhiravo anuravato oḷāriko, pubbaṅgamo ca hoti, evaṃ ārammaṇābhiropanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:1311_3: vitakko oḷāriko, pubbaṅgamo viya ca hoti. Tato sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1311_4: ca ghaṇṭānuravo viya anupabandho vicāro. Vipphāravā cettha vitakko cittassa paṭhamuppattikāle
tika-abh08t0:1311_5: cittassa paripphandanabhūto ākāse uppatitukāmassa sakuṇassa pakkhavikkhepo viya,
tika-abh08t0:1311_6: padumābhimukhapāto viya ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa. Santavutti vicāro cittassa
tika-abh08t0:1311_7: nātiparipphandanabhāvo, ākāse uppatitassa sakuṇassa pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya, padumassa
tika-abh08t0:1311_8: uparibhāge paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa. Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1311_9: pana vipariyāyena āgataṃ. Tathā ca vuttaṃ dukanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1312_0: “Ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā
tika-abh08t0:1312_1: gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko, vātaggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1312_2: pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1313_0: Tampi anupabandhena pavattiyaṃ yujjati. Tathā hi upacāre, appanāyaṃ vā santānena
tika-abh08t0:1313_1: pavattiyaṃ vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati, na paṭhamābhinipāte viya pākaṭo hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1314_0: Pinayatīti kāyacittaṃ appeti, vaḍḍheti vā. Sampiyāyanalakkhaṇāti ārammaṇaṃ kallato
tika-abh08t0:1314_1: gahaṇalakkhaṇā. Pīṇanarasāti kāyacittānaṃ paribrūhanakiccā. Pharaṇarasāti paṇītarūpehi
tika-abh08t0:1314_2: kāyassa byāpanarasā, attanā sampayuttacittasamuṭṭhānehi rūpehi sakalarūpakāyabyāpanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1314_3: karotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Na hi aññathā imissā pharaṇaṃ hoti, dhammānaṃ abyāpāratāya
tika-abh08t0:1315_0: Ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggametassāti ekaggaṃ, cittaṃ, yena pana dhammena yogato taṃ ekaggaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1315_1: nāma hoti, so ekaggabhāvo. So pana cittasseva hoti, na yassa kassacīti āha “cittassa
tika-abh08t0:1315_2: ekaggabhāvo”ti, nivāte dīpasikhāya ṭhiti viya cittassa ṭhitīti vuttaṃ hoti. Visārassa
tika-abh08t0:1315_3: byaggabhāvassa paṭipakkho sabhāvo avisāro, na visārābhāvamattaṃ, taṃ imassa lakkhaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1315_5: samādhānabhāvato atthato visesābhāvepi samukhena, sampayuttamukhena ca ubhayaṃ vuttanti
tika-abh08t0:1315_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena
tika-abh08t0:1315_7: paccupaṭṭhātīti upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno. Visesatoti yebhuyyena. Sukhavirahitopi hi atthi
tika-abh08t0:1315_8: samādhīti so yebhuyyena sukhapadaṭṭhāno hoti. Atha vā visesatoti atisayena. “Sukhino
tika-abh08t0:1315_9: cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato hi sukhaṃ samādhissa visesakāraṇaṃ sukhavirahitassapi
tika-abh08t0:1316_0: Saddahanti etāyāti kammaphalādisaddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha
tika-abh08t0:1316_1: ādhipaccabhāvena saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti. Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathā paccayabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1316_2: sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo “saddahatī”ti voharīyati. Saddahanaṃ saddheyyavatthuno pattiyāyanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1316_3: taṃ lakkhaṇametissāti saddahanalakkhaṇā. Kālusiyamalaṃ vidhametvā sampayuttānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1316_4: puggalasseva vā pasādaṃ anāvilabhāvakāraṇaṃ kiccametissāti pasādanarasā. Yathā kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1316_6: Ratanattayaṃ kammaṃ kammaphalañca saddheyyavatthu, taṃ imissā āsannakāraṇanti saddheyyavatthupadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1316_7: Na hi saddhāya avatthubhūtesu titthiyādīsu sā uppajjati. Sā panāyaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1316_8: ādāne hattho viya, sabbasampattisampadāne vittaṃ viya, amatakasiphalaphalane bījaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1316_9: viya ca daṭṭhabbā. “Saddhāhattho, mahānāma, ariyasāvako, saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa
tika-abh08t0:1316_10: seṭṭhaṃ, saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhī”tiādivacanañhettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1317_0: Saranti 237 etāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1317_1: satiyā paccayataṃ dasseti. Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathā paccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo
tika-abh08t0:1317_2: “saratī”ti voharīyati. Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa
tika-abh08t0:1317_3: ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇamassāti apilāpanalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1317_4: Sā hi ārammaṇe daḷhaṃ patiṭṭhitattā esikā viya vuccati. Sammosapaccanīkakiccaṃ asammosaraso,
tika-abh08t0:1317_5: na sammosābhāvamattaṃ. “Satārakkhena cetasā viharatī”ti vuttattā cetoguṇaratanahārakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1317_6: kilesacorānaṃ nivāraṇato āha “ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti. Tathā hesā cakkhudvārādirakkhanato
tika-abh08t0:1317_7: dovāriko viyāti vuccati. Paṭhamaṃ saññāya thiruppannabhāve pacchā satiyā patiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1317_8: āha “thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā”ti. Atha satisaññānaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti? Saññā tāva paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1317_9: aggahitanimittaṃ sañjānāti, gahitanimitte puna paccābhiññāṇapaccayanimittaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:1317_10: paṭhamaṃ aggahite pana saññākiccaṃ appadhānaṃ hoti, sati pana paṭhamaṃ aggahitanimittampi
tika-abh08t0:1317_11: sarati gahitanimittampi, gahitanimitte pana satikiccaṃ guṇabhūtaṃ hotīti idameva tāsaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1318_0: Vīrabhāvoti yena vīriyena vīro nāma hoti, so dhammo. Vīrānaṃ vā kammanti yena kammena
tika-abh08t0:1318_1: vīro nāma hoti, taṃ vīrānaṃ kammaṃ nāma. Vīriyaṃ panassa sādhakabhāvato tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1318_2: Dhammavinimuttaṃ vā kiñci kammaṃ natthīti vīriyameva kammabhāvena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1318_3: Vidhinā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā vīriyaṃ. Ussāho taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ samārambho, parakkamo
tika-abh08t0:1318_4: vā. Upatthambhanaṃ pana sampayuttadhammānaṃ kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1318_5: anubalappadānaṃ. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃsīdanabhāvanivārako dhammo, na saṃsīdanābhāvamattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1318_7: padahatī”ti vacanato saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃvegoti cettha saṃvegamayaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Asaṃvegapubbikāya
tika-abh08t0:1318_8: pana kusalakiriyāya vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha vīriyārambhavatthūni nāma –
tika-abh08t0:1319_0: “Maggo gantabbo hoti, maggo gato. Kammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti, kammaṃ kataṃ. Appamattako
tika-abh08t0:1319_1: ābādho uppanno hoti, gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti, aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā. Gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1319_2: vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati, lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ
tika-abh08t0:1320_0: Evaṃ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇasahitāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni, tammūlakāni
tika-abh08t0:1320_1: vā paccavekkhaṇāni. Ettha ca vitakko sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇaṃ āropeti. Cetanā te
tika-abh08t0:1320_2: taṃtaṃkiccesu niyojeti. Vīriyaṃ pana te saṃsīdituṃ adatvā ussāhetīti ayaṃ vitakkacetanāvīriyānaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1321_1: Visayassa ārammaṇassa obhāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ tappaṭicchādakasammohandhakārassa vidhamanatoti
tika-abh08t0:1321_2: visayobhāsanaṃ, taṃ kiccamassāti visayobhāsanarasā. Katthaci visaye asammuyhanākārena
tika-abh08t0:1321_3: sammohapaṭipakkhatāya vā paccupaṭṭhānato sammohābhāvassa paccupaṭṭhānato vā asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1322_0: Attanā anupāletabbānaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanaṃ jīvitassa byāpāro, tañca tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1322_1: jīvananti taṃ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ purakkhatvā vuttaṃ “jīvanti tenā”ti. Rūpārūpajīvitindriyassa
tika-abh08t0:1322_3: hi vuccamāne rūpadhammānaṃ sampayogābhāvato rūpajīvitindriyassa saṅgaho na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1322_4: “Avinibhuttāna”nti pana vuttattā yāni avinibbhogarūpāni rūpajīvitindriyena saddhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1322_5: avinibhuttāni avisaṃsaṭṭhāni. Ye ca arūpadhammā arūpajīvitindriyena sampayuttā, tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1322_6: sabbesaṃ saṅgaho hotīti. Pavattanarasanti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā anupālanato antarā
tika-abh08t0:1322_7: anivattanasabhāvasādhanena tesaṃ pavattanakiccaṃ. Keci pana “rūpajīvitindriyaṃ tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1322_8: ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya, arūpajīvitindriyaṃ uppādato paṭṭhāya pavattiyā paccayo”ti
tika-abh08t0:1322_9: vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Paṭṭhāne hi “abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1322_10: mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca indriyapaccayaṃ kammapaccayasadisa”nti asaññasattānaṃ indriyapaccayo
tika-abh08t0:1322_11: kammapaccayasadisaṃ katvā vutto, tasmā rūpajīvitindriyampi uppādato paṭṭhāya paccayo
tika-abh08t0:1322_12: hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uppādato yāva bhaṅgā ṭhapanato ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Anupālanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1322_13: yāpayitabbā pavattetabbā dhammā padaṭṭhānamassāti yāpayitabbadhammapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Yadi
tika-abh08t0:1322_14: evaṃ tesaṃ anupālanādisādhakaṃ, kathaṃ tesaṃ nirodho hoti. Evañhi sabbakālaṃ ṭhātabbanti
tika-abh08t0:1322_15: āha “santepi cā”tiādi. Anupālanalakkhaṇādimhīti ādi-saddena pavattanarasādimeva saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1322_16: Atthikkhaṇeyevāti attanā anupāletabbānaṃ, attano vā atthikkhaṇeyeva. Udakanti taḷākagatajalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1322_17: daṇḍagatajalaṃ vā. Tattha taḷākagataudakassa gahaṇe attanā anupāletabbadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1322_18: atthikkhaṇe anupālanaṃ sādhitaṃ hoti, daṇḍagatajalassa pana gahaṇe attano atthikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1322_19: anupālanaṃ. Attanā anuppāditadhamme kathaṃ pāletīti āha “dhāti viya kumāra”nti. Yadi
tika-abh08t0:1322_20: sesadhammānaṃ pavattikāraṇena kenaci bhavitabbaṃ, jīvitassa pana kiṃ pavattikāraṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1322_21: āha “sayaṃ…pe… pavattatī”ti. Yathā kathaṃ viyāti āha “niyāmako viyā”ti. Sopi attanā
tika-abh08t0:1322_22: pavattitanāvāsambandhena pavattati. Yadi dhammānaṃ pavatti jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1322_23: bhaṅgato uddhampi kiṃ pana pavattetīti āha “na bhaṅgato uddha”nti. Kasmāti āha “attano
tika-abh08t0:1322_24: ca pavattetabbānañca abhāvā”ti. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe pana kathanti āha “na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapetī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1323_0: Yasmā pana lobhapaṭipakkho alobho hoti, ye dhammā tena sampayuttā, taṃsamaṅgino vā
tika-abh08t0:1323_1: sattā, te na lubbhanti, sayampi kadāci na lubbhateva, atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva
tika-abh08t0:1323_2: ca so hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “na lubbhanti tenā”tiādi. Esa nayo “na dussanti tenā”tiādīsupi.
tika-abh08t0:1323_3: Alaggabhāvo ārammaṇaṃ nissāya pavattantassapi tattha anāsattatā. Tenāha “kamaladale
tika-abh08t0:1323_4: jalabindu viyā”ti. Apariggaho kassaci vatthuno mamattavasena asaṅgaho. Muttabhikkhu
tika-abh08t0:1323_5: viyāti khīṇāsavabhikkhu viya. So hi muttarāgattā katthaci mamāyanarahito hoti. Anallīno
tika-abh08t0:1323_6: bhāvo adhippāyo etassāti anallīnabhāvo. Evañhi “asucimhi patitapuriso viyā”ti upamāya
tika-abh08t0:1323_7: sameti. Yathā hi tassa purisassa satipi kāyena allīyane bhāvo anallīno, evaṃ alobhopi
tika-abh08t0:1323_8: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gahitepi ārammaṇe alaggabhāvena anallīnabhāvo anallīnākāroyeva
tika-abh08t0:1324_0: Caṇḍikassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ, pharusabhāvo, atthato pana kopoyeva, tappaṭipakkho apharusabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1324_1: acaṇḍikkaṃ. Avirodho aviggaho appaṭipakkho sabhāvo. Āghātavinayanarasoti ettha āghāto
tika-abh08t0:1324_2: nāma parassa attānaṃ, attano paraṃ uddissa, parasseva ca paraṃ uddissa pavatto upanāho
tika-abh08t0:1324_3: balavakopo. Tassa vinayanaraso apanayanaraso. Sommabhāvo majjanavasena hilādaniyatā
tika-abh08t0:1325_0: Kāyaduccarītādīhīti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Hirīyati lajjanākārena jigucchiyati. Tehiyevāti
tika-abh08t0:1325_1: kāyaduccaritādīhiyeva. Ottappatīti ubbijjati. Hirī pāpe gūthe viya passantī jigucchatīti
tika-abh08t0:1325_2: āha “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti. Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato uttasatīti
tika-abh08t0:1325_3: vuttaṃ “uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti. Ubhopi pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasāti lajjanākārena pāpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1325_4: akaraṇarasā hirī, uttāsākārena ottappaṃ. Pāpato saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttappakāreneva
tika-abh08t0:1325_6: hirī ajjhattasamuṭṭhānatāya, attādhipatitāya ca. Paragāravapadaṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1325_7: lokādhipatitāya ca. Attānañhi garuṃ katvā hiriyā pāpaṃ pajahati kulavadhū viya. Paraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1325_8: garuṃ katvā ottappena pāpaṃ pajahati vesiyā viya. Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca nesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1325_9: tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena veditabbā, na pana tesaṃ kadāci aññamaññaviyogato. Na
tika-abh08t0:1325_10: hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ vā pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti. Hiriyā balavabhāve pana
tika-abh08t0:1325_11: ottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ hoti, ottappassa balavabhāve hirī abbohārikā. Ime ca dve dhammā
tika-abh08t0:1326_0: “Dveme, bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Katame dve? Hirī ca ottappañca, ime
tika-abh08t0:1326_1: kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, nayidha paññāyetha ‘mātā’ti vā
tika-abh08t0:1327_0: Passambhanaṃ darathavūpasamo, kāya-saddo samūhavacano. So cettha vedanādikkhandhattayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1327_1: Vatticchāvasena hi saddo visiṭṭhavutti hotīti āha “kāyoti cetthā”tiādi. Vedanādayoti
tika-abh08t0:1327_2: vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandhoti tayo khandhā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ tattha
tika-abh08t0:1327_3: “katamā tasmiṃ samaye kāyapassaddhi hoti, yā tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1327_4: Daratho sārambho domanassapaccayānaṃ uddhaccādīnaṃ kilesānaṃ, tathā pavattānaṃ vā
tika-abh08t0:1327_5: catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tassa vūpasamaṃ lakkhaṇamassāti kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1327_6: Kāyacitta…pe… rasāti yathāvuttānameva paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ abhibhavanarasā. Darathanimmaddanena
tika-abh08t0:1327_9: kilesā. Tepi hi uddhaccavasena avūpasamakarā. Uddhaccaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā sabbeyeva kilesā
tika-abh08t0:1328: Garubhāvo dandhatā, thinamiddhādhikānaṃ tathā pavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Dandhatāya paṭipakkho adandhatā agarubhāvo.
tika-abh08t0:1329_0: Thaddhabhāvo thambho. Diṭṭhimānādhikānaṃ, tappadhānānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1329_1: nāmaṃ. Thaddhabhāvanimmaddanatoyeva katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭihatākārena paccupaṭṭhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1329_2: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha appaṭighātaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1330_0: Kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ, na kammaññaṃ akammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo akammaññabhāvo, dānasīlādipuññakiriyāya
tika-abh08t0:1330_1: asamatthatā. Atthato kāmacchandādisaṃkilesadhammā, tappadhānā vā cattāro akusalakkhandhā.
tika-abh08t0:1330_3: Vuttāvasesā kāmacchandādayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca saṃkilesadhammā sesanīvaraṇādayo. Imā
tika-abh08t0:1330_4: pana dve vinibandhanimmaddanena pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā, hitakiriyāsu viniyogakkhamabhāvāvahā
tika-abh08t0:1331_0: Gelaññaṃ assaddhiyādayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā, tappaṭipakkho agelaññabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1331_1: etāsanti agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā. Gelaññanimmaddaneneva natthi etāsaṃ ādīnavo doso
tika-abh08t0:1331_2: upaddavo vā, na vā etā ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā, tenākārena paccupaṭṭhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1332_0: Kāyasambandhī, cittasambandhī ca ujubhāvoti lakkhitabbatāya kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1332_3: sabbathāpi ajimhabhāvena paccupaṭṭhanti, sampayuttānaṃ vā ajimhataṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti
tika-abh08t0:1333_0: Nanu ca kāyapassaddhiādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekekapaṭipakkhattā darathanimmaddanādikiccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1333_1: ekekameva karoti. Kasmā pana dve dve dhammā vuttāti? Na kho panevaṃ cintitabbaṃ bhagavatāpi
tika-abh08t0:1333_2: tatheva desitattā. Kasmā pana bhagavatā tathā desitā? Sabhāvadhammabhāvato. Na hi
tika-abh08t0:1333_3: bhagavatā pubbe avijjamānā ete dhammā desanāvasena uppāditā, atha kho sabhāvato vijjamānāyeva
tika-abh08t0:1333_4: sayambhuñāṇena sammā sacchikatvā yathāsabhāvā desitā, tasmā kathamettha bhagavatā
tika-abh08t0:1333_5: sabhāvato vijjamānassa hāpanaṃ kātuṃ sakkā. Sabhāvato vijjamānatāya cettha bhagavato
tika-abh08t0:1333_6: vacanameva pamāṇaṃ. Na hi bhagavā yathādhammasāsanādhikāre ayathādhammaṃ katheyyāti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_7: yassa pana vijjamānassāpi akathanaṃ, taṃ aññahetukaṃ. Na cettha tādiso hetu upalabbhati,
tika-abh08t0:1333_8: yena imesu ekekadhammassa akathananti. Yathā pana dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ ekoyeva veriko
tika-abh08t0:1333_9: hoti, tassa te purisā otāraṃ disvā ekato hutvāva hananti, evameva dve dve dhammā
tika-abh08t0:1333_10: ekato hutvā ekaṃ paṭipakkhadhammaṃ hananti, yathā ca panete visuṃ disvāpi taṃ veriṃ
tika-abh08t0:1333_11: hananti, na evamete taṃ visuṃ hananti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvatoti, tasmā ete
tika-abh08t0:1333_12: paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ ekekabhāvepi dve dveyeva vuttāti, apica cittapassaddhiādīhi cittameva
tika-abh08t0:1333_13: passaddhi lahu mudu kammaññaṃ paguṇaṃ ujuñca hoti. Kāyapassaddhiādīhi pana rūpakāyopīti
tika-abh08t0:1333_14: tadatthadassanatthaṃ bhagavatā ettheva duvidhatā vuttā, na samādhiādīsu.
tika-abh08t0:1334_0: Chandanaṃ chando, ārammaṇena atthikatā. “Chando kāmo”tiādīsu pana taṇhāpi chandoti
tika-abh08t0:1334_1: vuccati. “Chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī”tiādīsu vīriyampīti tato nivattanatthaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1334_2: “kattukamyatāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Kattukamyatā vuccati karaṇicchā. Cetasikassa dhammassa
tika-abh08t0:1334_3: sārammaṇattā karaṇicchā nāma ārammaṇassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo
tika-abh08t0:1334_5: atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno”ti ca. Yadaggena panāyaṃ attano ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, tadaggena
tika-abh08t0:1334_6: sampayuttadhammānampi hotiyeva ekārammaṇatāya. Tena tesaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇe cetaso
tika-abh08t0:1334_7: hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyāti vuccati. Kathaṃ pana dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattamānacetanāsampayutto
tika-abh08t0:1334_8: chando ārammaṇena atthiko hotīti? Nanu avocumhā “ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo”ti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1334_9: saṅgāmagataissāsassa khipitabbausūnaṃ gahaṇe atthikatā viya dānavatthuvissajjanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1334_10: pavattacchandopi vissajjitabbena tena atthikoyevāti. Svāyaṃ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchando
tika-abh08t0:1334_11: nāma hoti yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā. Tabbiparītato pana akusalesu uppanno akusalacchando.
tika-abh08t0:1335_0: Adhimuccanaṃ ārammaṇe sanniṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṃ, na pasādanavasena. Tenāha “sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1335_1: Yathā tathā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu,
tika-abh08t0:1335_2: dānādīsu vā pavattiyā abhāvato, saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhoti ayametesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1335_3: viseso. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato
tika-abh08t0:1335_4: pavattamānānaṃ tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti. Yadi evaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttesu dhammesu
tika-abh08t0:1335_5: kathanti? Tesampi ekaṃseneva saṃsappanākārassa paccayatāya daṭṭhabbaṃ, dārakassa
tika-abh08t0:1335_6: viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa “karissāmi, na karissāmī”ti anicchayassa paṭipakkhakiriyā
tika-abh08t0:1335_7: asaṃsappanaṃ. Yesu cittuppādesu ayaṃ sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo adhimokkho, tesaṃ ārammaṇadhammoyeva
tika-abh08t0:1336_0: Tesu tesu dhammesūti yesu dhammesu sayaṃ uppannā, tesu attanā sampayuttesu cittacetasikadhammesu.
tika-abh08t0:1336_1: Anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsīnabhāvo “tatramajjhattatā”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1336_2: Samaṃ avisamaṃ vāhitaṃ attanā pavattitasampayuttānaṃ vā yathāsakakiccesu pavattanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1336_3: lakkhaṇametissāti samavāhitalakkhaṇā. Tattha samaṃ hutvā pavattanalakkhaṇāti atthe
tika-abh08t0:1336_4: apakkhapatitabhāvo vutto hoti, avisamaṃ katvā pavattanalakkhaṇāti atthe ūnādhikatānivāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1336_5: Udāsīnabhāvena pavattamānāpi hi esā sampayuttadhamme samaṃ katvā yathāsakakiccesu
tika-abh08t0:1336_6: pavatteti, yathā rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi adhikaraṇadhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu samaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1336_7: appamatte pavatteti. Alīnānuddhatappavattipaccayānaṃ dhammānaṃ ūnādhikatāya līnuddhatabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1336_8: nivāraṇakiccāti vuttaṃ “ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā”ti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sahajātādhipatīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1336_9: adhipatibhāvo. Ādhipaccañhi tesaṃ kiccato adhikabhāvoti? Nāyaṃ doso. Tampi tassa
tika-abh08t0:1336_10: kiccameva, yaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ adhipatibhāve pavattāpanaṃ. Yathā hi raṅgamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1336_11: gato naṭakācariyo te te naṭake yathāsakaṃ anurūpaṃ bhūmiyaṃ yojeti, evamesāpi attanā
tika-abh08t0:1336_12: sampayuttadhammesu adhipatibhāve ṭhite adhipatibhāve yojeti, indriyatte ṭhite indriyatte,
tika-abh08t0:1336_13: na pana sakasakakiccato ūnataṃ, adhikataṃ vā pattuṃ detīti. “Idaṃ nihīnakiccaṃ hotu,
tika-abh08t0:1336_14: idaṃ atirekakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātavasena viya pavatti pakkhapāto. Taṃ upacchindantī
tika-abh08t0:1336_15: viya hotīti pakkhapātupacchedanarasā. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanena samappavattesu
tika-abh08t0:1337_0: Kiriyā kāroti kāra-saddassa bhāvasādhanataṃ āha. Tena kāroti nāññaṃ, kiriyāyevāti
tika-abh08t0:1337_1: dīpitaṃ hoti. Manasmiṃ kāroti manasi ārammaṇassa karaṇaṃ. Yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati
tika-abh08t0:1337_2: ārammaṇenassa saṃyojanato, tato eva tena ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti. Manasikāroti
tika-abh08t0:1337_3: cettha aluttasamāso daṭṭhabbo. Purimamanatoti bhavaṅgamanato. Visadisaṃ mananti vīthijavanamanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1337_4: taṃ karotīti manasikāro, manasikārasāmaññena vīthijavanapaṭipādake dasseti. Ettha
tika-abh08t0:1337_5: pana upayogatthabhummavacane samāso daṭṭhabbo. Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1337_6: sārento payojento viya hotīti manasikāro sāraṇalakkhaṇoti vutto. Saṃyojanarasoti
tika-abh08t0:1337_7: payojanaraso. Vitakko sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇe abhiniropanasabhāvattā ārammaṇe cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1337_8: pakkhipanto viya hoti. Cetanā attano ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhantī sampayuttepi sakasakakiccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1337_9: kāretīti attanā karaṇena balaṃ niyojento balanāyako viya hoti. Manasikāro sampayutte
tika-abh08t0:1337_10: ārammaṇe payojetīti ājānīyappayojanakasārathi viyāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1338_1: Ettha satiyā appamussanacchandatā visayābhimukhapaccupaṭṭhānatā, manasikārassa pana
tika-abh08t0:1338_4: viññāṇabhāve sabbaññutaññāṇassa sabbavisayatā parihāyeyya, tasmā taṃ javanasampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannamevā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1338_5: vadanti. Tesañhi ayamadhippāyo – yadi taṃ visuṃ cittasabhāvaṃ siyā, paccuppannacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1338_6: ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattassa tassa anantaraṃ uppajjamānajavanānaṃ paccuppannārammaṇatā
tika-abh08t0:1338_7: na bhaveyya, aññadatthu atītārammaṇatāva siyā, evañca sati sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi paccuppannacittārammaṇatāya
tika-abh08t0:1338_8: abhāvato asabbavisayatā āpajjeyya, yadaggena ca taṃ asabbavisayaṃ, tadaggena sāvaraṇampi
tika-abh08t0:1338_9: hoti yattha na pavattati, tattha āvaraṇasambhavato, tasmāssa sakalalokasiddho sabbaññubhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1338_10: anāvaraṇabhāvo ca parihāyetha, javanasampayuttabhāve pana sati āvajjanassa nāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1338_11: iṭṭhavighāto āpajjatīti. Tayidaṃ tesamabhinivesamattaṃ “āvajjanā kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1338_12: akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanena tassānantaraṃ kusalākusaluppattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1338_13: dīpitattā. Sabbaññutaññāṇassa pana paccuppannacittārammaṇabhāvo evaṃ veditabbo –
tika-abh08t0:1338_14: atītādivasena hi vibhāgamakatvā “imassa cittaṃ jānāmī”ti pavattassa āvajjanaṃ sāmaññena
tika-abh08t0:1338_15: yaṃ kiñci abhimukhībhūtaṃ cittamāvajjati, tato javanānipi attano attano abhimukhībhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1338_16: cittamārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanti, na cettha javanānaṃ bhinnārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā
tika-abh08t0:1338_17: cittasāmaññena ārammaṇassa abhinnattā, tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇassa paccuppannacittārammaṇataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1338_18: paṭicca na kāci vihesā anubhavitabbāti. Kiṃ vā etena yuttivādena, nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā
tika-abh08t0:1338_20: āvajjanena vināpi visayaggahaṇe vibandhanābhāvato yattha katthaci pavatti appaṭihatāyevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1338_21: Keci panettha “āvajjanaṃ anāgatacittamārammaṇaṃ katvā nirujjhati, javanameva pana
tika-abh08t0:1338_22: paccuppannamārammaṇaṃ gaṇhātī”ti vadanti. Yasmā pana “anāgatārammaṇā āvajjanā paccuppannārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1338_23: khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti pāḷi natthi, tasmā taṃ appamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1339_0: Karotīti karuṇā. Kiṃ karoti, kesaṃ kiṃ nimittanti āha “paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampana”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1339_1: Kampananti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa asahanākārena cittassa aññathattaṃ, tadidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1339_2: sappurisānaṃyeva hotīti āha “sādhūna”nti. Sappurisā hi attahitaparahitasādhanena
tika-abh08t0:1339_3: “sādhū”ti vuccanti. “Kiṇātī”ti imassa atthamāha “vināsetī”ti, adassanaṃ gameti apanetīti
tika-abh08t0:1339_5: hotu vā, mā vā, so paradukkhāpanayanākāro, tathāpavattilakkhaṇāti para…pe… lakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1339_6: Apanetukāmatāya paresaṃ dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ paradukkhāsahanaṃ. Na vihiṃsā
tika-abh08t0:1339_7: avihiṃsā, sattānaṃ aviheṭhanaṃ, taṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti, vihiṃsāya vā paṭipakkhabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1340_1: usūyanassa paṭipakkhabhāvakiccā. Pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu ca aramaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1340_2: arati. Sā atthato issādhikaṃ domanassasahagataṃ, thinamiddhādhikañca uddhaccaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:1340_3: purimaṃ parasampattivisayaṃ, dutiyaṃ pantasenāsanādivisayanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aratiyā
tika-abh08t0:1340_4: vihananākārena paccupaṭṭhāti, tassā vighātaṃ vā vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1341_3: kāyaduccaritāditoyeva saṅkocanakiriyā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno
tika-abh08t0:1341_4: akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti, atha kho duccaritasseva, viratīnañca soraccavasena
tika-abh08t0:1341_5: saṅkocanaṃ, akiriyā ca hirottappānaṃ jigucchādivasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Saddhā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1341_6: padaṭṭhānāti ettha saddhādayo sabbeva dhammā kāyasucaritādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāti eke.
tika-abh08t0:1341_7: Apare pana “kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ saddahantassa kāyaduccaritādiakaraṇato, hirottappasampannassa
tika-abh08t0:1341_9: ca saddhādayo tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ yathākkamena padaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino.
tika-abh08t0:1341_10: Imāsūti imāsu tīsu viratīsu. Ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti aññaṃ ekaṃ catutthaniyataviratimicchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1341_11: Atha vā niddhāraṇatthe bhummavasena imāsaṃ antare ekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti
tika-abh08t0:1341_12: attho. Ubhayathāpi pana tesaṃ icchā na yujjati aparāya viratiyā dhammasenāpatināpi
tika-abh08t0:1341_13: adesitattā, visayassa ca sadā sannihitattābhāvena niyatāya eva ekissā abhāvato. Teneva
tika-abh08t0:1341_14: hi abhayagirivāsinoyeva ca keci imāsaṃ tividhattaṃ aniyatattameva ca icchanti. Vuttañhi tehi –
tika-abh08t0:1344: Ettha pana “yebhuyyato”ti vacanaṃ lokuttaracittesu sabbadā ekatoyeva ca labbhamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1345_0: Dutiyacittena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti sambandho. Yathā cittaṃ, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpīti
tika-abh08t0:1345_1: dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti āha “sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso”ti. Tathāti yathā
tika-abh08t0:1345_2: tatiye, tathā catutthepi pītiyā sukhapadaṭṭhānattā. Sukhassa cettha abhāvato āha
tika-abh08t0:1345_3: “ṭhapetvā pīti”nti. Nanu ca “karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagate na sambhavantī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1345_4: tasmā yathā pītiyā, evaṃ tāsampi paṭikkhepo kātabboti? Na kātabbo, appanāpattito
tika-abh08t0:1345_5: pubbe karuṇāmuditānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānampi sambhavato. Karuṇāmuditābhāvanākāle hi
tika-abh08t0:1345_6: appanāvīthito pubbe upekkhāsahagatacittenāpi parikammaṃ hoti, appanāvīthiyaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1345_8: karuṇāmuditānampi upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavo hotīti ācariyā. Apare pana sabbadāpi
tika-abh08t0:1345_9: tāsaṃ upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavaṃ na icchanti. “Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1347_1: dassetuṃ “avasesesu panā”tiādimāha. Tattha ṭhapetvā viratittayanti viratittayaṃ vajjetvā.
tika-abh08t0:1347_2: Kasmā panettha viratittayaṃ pariccattanti? Vuccate – suvisuddhakāyakammādikassa cittasamādhānavasena
tika-abh08t0:1347_3: rūpārūpāvacarakusalappavatti, na kāyakammādīnaṃ sodhanavasena, nāpi duccaritadurājīvānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1347_4: samucchindanavasena. Tathā hi nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ avatthattayaṃ hoti vītikkamāvatthā
tika-abh08t0:1347_5: pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā anusayāvatthāti. Tattha vītikkamāvatthāya paṭipakkhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1347_7: pana ṭhapetvā vītikkamāvatthaṃ, anusayāvatthañca vītikkamāvatthāya visuṃ pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā
tika-abh08t0:1347_8: na upalabbhati. Yassā vipaccanīkaṃ rūpārūpāvacarakusalaṃ siyā, tasmā taṃ neva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1347_9: viya tesaṃ vītikkamāvatthaṃ sodheti, na ca lokuttaraṃ viya anusayāvatthaṃ samucchindati,
tika-abh08t0:1347_10: paṭipassambheti vā. Sīlavisuddhiyaṃ sīlasodhanavasena kāmāvacarakusaleneva vigatavītikkamassa
tika-abh08t0:1347_12: viratīnaṃ asambhavoyeva. Imameva hi atthaṃ sādhetuṃ “viratiyo panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1347_13: Tettiṃsa vā karuṇādijhānavasena pavattanakāle. Tatoti tato tatiye vuttacetasikato.
tika-abh08t0:1348_0: Rūpāvacarapañcame vuttanayenāti tiṃsevāti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ rūpāvacarato ko visesoti
tika-abh08t0:1348_2: idha pana rūpasaññāsamatikkamena pattabbattā arūpāvacarabhāvoti ayamevassa tato visesoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1349_0: Paṭhamajjhāniketi paṭhamajjhānavati. Maggacitteti catubbidhepi maggañāṇe. Dutiyajjhānikādibhedeti
tika-abh08t0:1349_2: vuttanayena. Kiṃ avisesenāti ce, noti āha “karuṇāmuditāna”ntiādi. Maggadhammesu pādakajjhānādivasena
tika-abh08t0:1349_3: kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā, na pana virativiraho, kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchinnavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:1350_0: Evaṃ kusalacetasikānaṃ sampayogavacanatthalakkhaṇādīni dassetvā idāni akusalacetasikāni
tika-abh08t0:1350_1: dassetuṃ “akusalā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Cha yevāpanakāti kiñcāpi paṭhame aniyatayevāpanakā
tika-abh08t0:1350_2: na labbhanti, akusalesu pana labbhamānakayevāpanadhamme ekattha dassetuṃ tesampi
tika-abh08t0:1350_3: idheva vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca katvā upari dhammānaṃ uddesānantaraṃ “evaṃ yevāpanā”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:1350_4: vuttaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagate chandādhimokkhānaṃ, uddhaccasahagate chandassa ca abhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1351_0: 82. Niddiṭṭhāti nissesena dassitā. Hatā vihatā viddhastā pāpā apāyādidukkhapāpanato
tika-abh08t0:1351_1: “pāpā”ti saṅkhātā akusaladhammā yena so bhagavā hatapāpo, tena. Lābho alābho, yaso
tika-abh08t0:1351_2: ayaso, nindā pasaṃsā, sukhaṃ dukkhanti imesu aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu akampanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:1351_3: tādinā sammāsambuddhena. So hi lābhādīsu yādiso, alābhādīsupi tādisoyevāti “tādī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1352_0: Na hirīyatīti na lajjati. Ahirikoti puggalo dhammasamūho vā. “Ahirikka”nti vattabbe
tika-abh08t0:1352_1: ekassa ka-kārassa lopaṃ katvā “ahirika”nti vuttaṃ. Na ottappanti ottappassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1352_2: dhammamāha. Ajigucchanaṃ ahīḷanaṃ. Alajjanaṃ avilā. Ajigucchanalakkhaṇanti sabhāvavasena
tika-abh08t0:1352_3: vuttaṃ, alajjanalakkhaṇanti kusalābyākatassa sādhāraṇāya hiriyā paṭipakkhavasena.
tika-abh08t0:1352_4: Tehevāti kāyaduccaritādīhi eva. Asārajjanaṃ nibbhayatā. Anuttāso asambhamo. Rasādīni
tika-abh08t0:1352_5: hiriottappesu vuttapaṭipakkhavasena gahetabbānīti na tāni idha vuttāni. Tesu hi alajjanākārena
tika-abh08t0:1352_6: pāpānaṃ karaṇarasaṃ ahirikaṃ. Anuttāsākārena anottappaṃ. Vuttappakāreneva pāpato
tika-abh08t0:1352_7: asaṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāni. Attani, paresu ca agāravapadaṭṭhānāni. Gāmasūkarassa viya
tika-abh08t0:1352_8: asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti. Salabhassa viya aggito pāpato anuttāso
tika-abh08t0:1354: Na bhāyati anottappo, salabho viya pāvakā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1355_0: Ettha ca yathā hiriyā balavabhāve ottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ hoti, ottappassa balavabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1355_1: hirī abbohārikā, evaṃ ahirikassa balavabhāve anottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ, anottappassa
tika-abh08t0:1355_2: balavabhāve ahirikaṃ abbohārikaṃ hotīti keci, taṃ na yujjati. Yathā hi asucinā attānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1355_3: makkhento, sappamukhe hatthaṃ pavesento bāladārako tattha paṭikkūlabhāvassa, ādīnavassa
tika-abh08t0:1355_4: ca anupaparikkhanato neva jigucchati, na ca uttasati, evamevaṃ dhammasabhāvassa aññāṇato
tika-abh08t0:1355_5: moho pāpato neva jigucchati, na uttasati, tasmā taṃsampayuttacittuppāde ubhayampi balavataraṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1356_0: Lubbhantīti abhigijjhanti, allīyantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇoti ettha
tika-abh08t0:1356_1: ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ nāma “mama ida”nti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1356_2: avissajjanaṃ, na ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṃ. Abhisaṅgo atisayavatāya āsattiyā dummocanīyabhāvo.
tika-abh08t0:1356_3: Apariccāgo avijahanaṃ. Telañjanarāgo viyāti dhovitvāpi pariccajituṃ asakkuṇeyyo telamakkhitaañjanarāgo
tika-abh08t0:1356_5: Tattha assādavasena dassanaṃ assādadassanaṃ. Nanu ca assādadassanampi atthato lobhoyevāti
tika-abh08t0:1356_6: kathaṃ sayaṃ attano padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti? Saccaṃ, paṭhamaṃ nātibalavalobhavasena assādadassano
tika-abh08t0:1356_7: pacchā balavalobho hotīti tassa taṃpadaṭṭhānatā vuttā. Teneva ca “taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1356_8: vuttaṃ. Apare pana “assādo nāma sukhavedanā, assādadassananti assādadiṭṭhī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1356_9: Sukhavedanāya vā kāraṇabhūtaṃ subhanimittaṃ assādo nāma, asubhe “subha”nti pavattā
tika-abh08t0:1357_0: Muyhantīti na bujjhanti. Dhammasabhāvassa yāthāvato adassanaṃ cittassa andhabhāvo.
tika-abh08t0:1357_1: Aññāṇaṃ ñāṇapaṭipakkho dhammo. Tattha purimalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvavasena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1357_2: paṭipakkhavasena. Atha vā aññāṇalakkhaṇoti kiccavasena vuttaṃ. So hi asampaṭivedharasoti
tika-abh08t0:1357_3: vutto. Dhammasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthatā asampaṭivedho. Ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanarasoti
tika-abh08t0:1357_4: yathā aññāṇaṃ, mohasamaṅgipuggalo vā ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na labhati, mohassa
tika-abh08t0:1357_5: tathā pavatti ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaṃ. Ettha ca ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathāsabhāvato jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:1357_6: diṭṭhi yathāsabhāvaṃ vijahitvā ayāthāvato gaṇhāti, moho pana na kathañci vijānāti.
tika-abh08t0:1357_7: Yadi evaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇakālo kathaṃ tadā so ārammaṇaṃ jānātevāti? Tadāpi na jānāti.
tika-abh08t0:1357_8: Yathā pana phassādayo phusanākārādimattavaseneva ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanti, na jānanavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1357_9: evamayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppajjamāno paṭicchādanākāreneva gaṇhāti, na pana jānanākārenāti.
tika-abh08t0:1357_10: Yassa uppajjati, tassa andhakaraṇaṃ andhakāro, tathā paccupaṭṭhāti, taṃ vā paccupaṭṭhāpetīti
tika-abh08t0:1358_0: Micchā passantīti dhammasabhāvassa viparītavasena aniccādiṃ niccādivasena passanti.
tika-abh08t0:1358_1: Ayoniso abhiniveso uppathābhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato niccādito
tika-abh08t0:1358_2: vā parappaccayato vā āmasanaṃ parāmāso, viparītaggāhavasena “idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti
tika-abh08t0:1358_3: abhinivesanaṃ micchābhiniveso. Ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādīti ādi-saddena saddhammaasotukāmatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1359_0: Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttadhammā vā, so dhammo uddhaccaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1359_1: Tenāha “uddhatabhāvo”ti. Avūpasamoti asannisinnabhāvo. Vātā…pe… paṭākā viyāti yathā
tika-abh08t0:1359_2: paṭākā yottabalena dhajayaṭṭhiṃ amuñcantīpi vātābhighātena ettha avaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1359_3: evamidampi adhimokkhabalena ārammaṇaṃ amuñcantampi ayonisomanasikārabalena ārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1359_4: acalaṃ avaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkotīti vātappahāreneva caladhajapaṭākā viya anavaṭṭhānakiccaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1359_5: Bhantattaṃ paribbhamanākāro. Uddhaccassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā, aññesañca akusalasādhāraṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1359_6: visuṃ padaṭṭhānassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ “ayoniso…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti. Yenākārena
tika-abh08t0:1359_7: vā manasikaroto uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, tenākārena manasikaraṇaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro.
tika-abh08t0:1359_8: Atha vā uddhaccanimittassa ārammaṇassa manasikaraṇaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro.
tika-abh08t0:1360_0: Maññatīti abhimaññati, ahaṃkāraṃ karotīti attho. Seyyādivasena uccato namanaṃ uṇṇati.
tika-abh08t0:1360_1: Sampaggaharasoti uṇṇativaseneva attano, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā sampaggaṇhanakicco,
tika-abh08t0:1360_2: na vīriyaṃ viya taṃtaṃkiccasādhanena. Abhibhussahanavasena hīnassa attānaṃ nīcaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1360_3: katvā gahaṇampi paggaṇhanavasenevāti veditabbaṃ. Ketu…pe… paccupaṭṭhānoti ettha ketu
tika-abh08t0:1360_4: vuccati accuggatadhajo, idha pana ketu viyāti ketu, uḷāratamādibhāvo, taṃ ketubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1360_5: ketuṃ kamyatīti ketukamyaṃ, yassa dhammassa vasena taṃ ketukamyaṃ, so ketukamyatā.
tika-abh08t0:1360_6: “Aha”nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattatīti diṭṭhimānā ekacittuppāde na
tika-abh08t0:1360_7: pavattanti, dve kesarasīhā viya ekaguhāyaṃ, tasmā māno diṭṭhivippayuttacitte sabbadā
tika-abh08t0:1360_9: Māno dhammasamūhaggahaṇe balavaṃ hutvā attukkaṃsanabhāvena pavattati, diṭṭhi ekekadhammampi
tika-abh08t0:1360_10: niccādiākārena gaṇhantī pavattati. Attasinehasannissayo vā māno, attakilamathānuyogasannissayā
tika-abh08t0:1361: Issatīti usūyati. Tatthevāti parasampattīsuyeva. Issāvasena parasampattīsu atussanato vuttaṃ “anabhiratirasā”ti. Tenevetaṃ vuccati –
tika-abh08t0:1364_0: Maccharayogena maccharini pavattaṃ macchara-saddaṃ gahetvā āha “maccharabhāvo macchariya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1364_1: Niruttinayena pana “mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu, mayhaṃva hotū”ti macchariyanti
tika-abh08t0:1364_2: porāṇā. Niguhaṇaṃ attano sampattiyā paresaṃ adassanaṃ. Saṅkocanaṃ attasampattīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1364_3: parehi sādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇassa aruccanākārena paṭikuṭanaṃ. “Mā idaṃ parassa hotū”ti
tika-abh08t0:1364_4: paresu paṭihananavasena attasantakassa ārammaṇakaraṇato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesveva
tika-abh08t0:1364_5: labbhatīti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ ekasseva dhammassa aññattha paṭihaññitvā aññārammaṇabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-abh08t0:1364_6: Parehi sādhāraṇabhāve paṭihananavasena pana taṃ ārabbha pavattanato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesu
tika-abh08t0:1365_0: Kucchitaṃ katanti ettha katampi akatampi garahitabbattā kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1365_1: Evañhi vattāro honti “yaṃ mayā na kataṃ, taṃ kukata”nti. Tathā hi vakkhati “katākatānusocanarasa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1365_2: Evaṃ katākataṃ duccaritaṃ sucaritampi kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma. Sucaritampi hi garahantassa
tika-abh08t0:1365_3: kucchitaṃ katanti hoti. Yathā pana pathavīkasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1365_4: kukataṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya idha kukatanti
tika-abh08t0:1365_5: gahetabbaṃ. Atha vā katākataṃ ārabbha uppajjanakavippaṭisāracittaṃyeva garahitabbato
tika-abh08t0:1365_6: “kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukata”nti vuccati. Yassa dhammassa vasena taṃ cittaṃ kukataṃ nāma
tika-abh08t0:1365_7: hoti, so dhammo kukkuccaṃ. Tenāha “kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo”ti. Pacchā anutappanaṃ viheṭhanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1365_9: vata me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā anutappanaṃ, “akataṃ mayā pubbe kalyāṇakammaṃ, ito dāni
tika-abh08t0:1365_10: paṭṭhāya karomī”ti pavattaṃ pana kusalapakkhikaṃ vīriyameva, na katākatānusocanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1365_12: vippaṭisāro. Katākatānusocanañhi avaḍḍhisampādanato virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, taṃ parāyattatāhetutāya
tika-abh08t0:1365_13: dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti, evaṃ kukkucce
tika-abh08t0:1365_14: sati taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo. Na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti. Atha
tika-abh08t0:1365_15: vā katākatakusalākusalānusocanavasena āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī
tika-abh08t0:1366_0: Anussāhanāvasīdanavasena saṃhatabhāvo thinaṃ, tena yogato cittaṃ thinaṃ, tassa bhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1366_2: Tenāha “asattivighāto”ti. Yasmā middhavaseneva tena sampayuttadhammā medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā
tika-abh08t0:1366_3: honti, tasmā “middhatā middha”nti vuttaṃ. Na vijjati ussāho assāti anussāhaṃ, tabbhāvopi
tika-abh08t0:1366_4: anussāhaṃ. Anussāhasaṅkhāto saṃhananabhāvo anussāhasaṃsīdanatā, kusītabhāvoti vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1366_5: hoti. Asattivighātoti yasmā taṃ middhaṃ uppajjamānameva sattivināsavasena uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1366_6: tasmā natthi etassa sattīti taṃ sampayuttacittaṃ asatti, tassa bhāvopi, asattiyeva
tika-abh08t0:1367_0: Anussāhanalakkhaṇanti ussāhapaṭipakkhalakkhaṇaṃ. Vīriyassa vinodanaṃ khepanaṃ vīriyavinodanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1367_1: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃsīdanākārena paccupaṭṭhāti, tesaṃ vā saṃsīdanaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti
tika-abh08t0:1367_2: saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Akammaññatālakkhaṇanti ettha kāmaṃ thinampi akammaññatāsabhāvameva,
tika-abh08t0:1367_3: taṃ pana cittassa akammaññaṃ, middhaṃ vedanādikkhandhattayassāti ayamettha viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1367_4: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “tattha katamaṃ thinaṃ? Yā cittassa akallatā akammaññatā. Katamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1367_5: middhaṃ? Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”ti ca ādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto. Oṇahanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1367_6: viññāṇadvārānaṃ pidahanaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ bandhanaṃ vā. Līnatā līnākāro, ārammaṇaggahaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1367_7: saṅkoco. Yasmā thinena cittasseva saṃhananaṃ hoti, middhena pana vedanādikkhandhattayassa
tika-abh08t0:1367_8: viya rūpakāyassapi, tasmā taṃ pacalāyikāniddaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānantipi
tika-abh08t0:1367_9: vaṭṭati. Pottharūpapaṭicchādakapaṭo viya ārammaṇasabhāvāvacchādako moho. Mukhe bandhapaṭo
tika-abh08t0:1367_10: viya sampayuttadhamme pattharituṃ adentaṃ middhanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1368_0: Sesāti idha lakkhaṇādivasena vuttāvasesā phassādayo. Kusalesu vuttanayenāti lakkhaṇādito
tika-abh08t0:1368_1: vuttanayena. Na koci ettha viseso atthīti ce, no natthīti āha “ettha panā”tiādi,
tika-abh08t0:1368_2: vitakkādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ micchāsaṅkappādināmamattameva visesoti attho. Ekūnavīsatīti
tika-abh08t0:1368_3: ṭhapetvā mānādayo cha aniyatayevāpanake sesā sarūpenāgatā pannarasa chandādayo ca
tika-abh08t0:1368_4: cattāro niyatayevāpanakāti ime ekena ūnā vīsati cetasikā. Aniyatayevāpanakānaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1368_5: idha alabhantānampi ettha vacane kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-abh08t0:1369_0: Thinamiddhassa aniyatabhāvoti thinamiddhassa aniyatassa idha uppajjanakabhāvamāha,
tika-abh08t0:1369_1: na pana paṭhame niyatabhāvaṃ tattha sabbasova anuppajjanato. Na hi sabhāvatikhiṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1369_2: cittaṃ thinamiddhayogī hotīti. Tatiye mānassa aniyatassa sambhavepi niyatadhamme
tika-abh08t0:1369_3: sandhāya “aṭṭhārasā”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “māno panettha aniyato”ti. Diṭṭhiyā saha na
tika-abh08t0:1369_4: uppajjatīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Catutthe avasesāti aṭṭhāraseva, pañcame ṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t0:1369_5: pītiṃ diṭṭhiyā saha aṭṭhāraseva, tathā chaṭṭhepi. Sattame pītiyā, diṭṭhiyā ca abhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1370_0: Etepi tayoti na kevalaṃ karuṇāmuditā eva, etepi tayo ekato na uppajjanti aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1370_1: visayabhedatoyeva. Tathā hi issā parasampattivisayā, macchariyaṃ attasampattiyā parehi
tika-abh08t0:1370_2: sādhāraṇābhāvavisayaṃ, kukkuccaṃ katākatavisayanti, tasmā yaṃ abhayagirivāsino vadanti
tika-abh08t0:1370_3: “issāmaccheraṃ yadicchāvasena ekatopi uppajjatī”ti, na taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1371_0: Sabhāvato, parikappanato vā aniṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa aniṭṭhākāraṃ vā ārammaṇassa anubhavanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1371_2: Tenāha “aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasa”nti, yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena vā aniṭṭhākārena
tika-abh08t0:1371_3: ārammaṇassa sambhuñjanarasaṃ, paccānubhavanakiccanti attho. Titthiyādīnañhi sabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1371_4: iṭṭhe buddhādiārammaṇepi aniṭṭhākārato gahaṇavasena domanassaṃ uppajjati. Domanassassa
tika-abh08t0:1371_5: ekantena kāmadhātuyaṃyeva pavattanato āha “hadayavatthupadaṭṭhāna”nti. Tassa hi anīvaraṇāvatthāya
tika-abh08t0:1372_0: Attano pavattiākāravasena aniṭṭharūpasamuṭṭhāpanavasena vā virūpaṃ sappanaṃ visappanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1372_1: aniṭṭharūpasamuṭṭhāpanavaseneva vā visappanaṃ sarīrakampanaṃ, taṃ raso kiccaṃ, sampatti
tika-abh08t0:1372_2: vā assāti visappanaraso, nissayassa hadayavatthuno, sakalasseva vā kāyassa vijjhattabhāvāpādanato
tika-abh08t0:1372_3: āha “attano nissayadahanaraso vā”ti, vijjhattabhāvāpādanatoti ca milātabhāvāpādanatoti
tika-abh08t0:1372_4: attho. Yathā kathaṃ viyāti āha “dāvaggi viyā”ti. So hi vanaghaṭeyeva uppanno tameva
tika-abh08t0:1372_5: dahati. Dussanapaccupaṭṭhānoti attano, parassa ca dūsanākārena paccupaṭṭhāno. So
tika-abh08t0:1372_6: hi yassa santāne uppanno, taṃ ekantena antamaso virūpabhāvāpādanenapi dūseti, paraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1372_7: pana dūsetu vā, mā vā hatthena gahitaasuci viya. “Anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādīni nava
tika-abh08t0:1372_8: āghātavatthūni padaṭṭhānamassāti āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno. So upayogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā
tika-abh08t0:1372_9: visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhārasa vāti issādīsu aniyatesu ekena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasa vā.
tika-abh08t0:1373_0: Pavattiṭṭhitimattāti cetaso pavattisaṅkhātā ṭhitimattā, maggaṅgādibhāvaṃ na gacchati
tika-abh08t0:1373_1: adhimokkhavirahatoti attho. Atha vā pavattiṭṭhitimattāti khaṇaṭṭhitimattā. “Nivāte
tika-abh08t0:1373_2: dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viyā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Cittaṭṭhiti viya santānaṭṭhitiyā paccayo bhavituṃ
tika-abh08t0:1373_3: asamatthattā nicchayābhāvena asaṇṭhahanato cetaso pavattipaccayamattatāya pavattiṭṭhitimattā
tika-abh08t0:1373_4: khaṇaṭṭhitimattā pavattipaccayamattā ṭhiti pavattiṭṭhitīti katvā. Vigatā cikicchāti
tika-abh08t0:1373_5: nissakke paccattavacanaṃ “pisuṇā vācā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya, vigatā tikicchāyāti
tika-abh08t0:1373_6: attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho. “Vigatā cikicchā”ti cikicchituṃ dukkaratāya cetaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1373_7: na sabbathā cikicchāya abhāvato. “Evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho”tiādinā saṃsappanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1373_8: seti, samantato vā setīti saṃsayo. Kampanarasāti cittassa kampanakiccā. Uddhaccañhi
tika-abh08t0:1373_9: attanā gahitākāreyeva ṭhatvā bhamatīti ekārammaṇasmiṃ eva vipphandanavasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1373_10: vicikicchā pana yadipi ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjati, tathāpi “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho”ti
tika-abh08t0:1373_11: aññaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ apekkhatīti nānārammaṇe kampanaṃ hoti. Anicchayākārena dveḷhakākārena
tika-abh08t0:1374_1: Samādhīti cittekaggatā. Sā hi ārammaṇe cittassa sammā ādhānato “samādhī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1374_2: Balavā hotīti balavamittena dinnapiṭṭhibalo puriso viya balavā hoti, balādibhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1375_0: Sattārammaṇattāti sattapaññattārammaṇattā. Nanu paññattārammaṇāpi vipākā hontīti
tika-abh08t0:1375_1: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā”ti. Kuto pana viratīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1375_2: kusalattamevāti cāritanti āha “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāti hi vutta”nti. Yadi evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1375_3: lokuttaravipākesu viratiyo na labbhantīti? No na labbhanti sikkhāpadavibhaṅge lokiyaviratiyoyeva
tika-abh08t0:1375_4: sandhāya vuttattā. Tena lokiyavipākesuyeva viratiyo na sambhavantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1376: Kāyapasādasannissitattā kāye bhavo sātabhāvo lakkhaṇamassāti kāyikasātalakkhaṇā. Cetasikasukhe vuttanayena paccupaṭṭhānādayo netabbāti āha “sesā vuttanayā evā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1377_0: 84-6. Nanu ca iṭṭhe ārammaṇe sukhavedanā uppajjati, aniṭṭhe dukkhavedanā, iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhatte
tika-abh08t0:1377_1: upekkhāvedanā, cakkhuviññāṇādayo ca kusalavipākā iṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte vā ārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1377_2: uppajjanti, tattha yutto tāva iṭṭhamajjhatte upekkhāvedanāyogo, na pana iṭṭhārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t0:1377_3: na cāpi etaṃ sakkā vattuṃ parikappanāvasena iṭṭhārammaṇampi iṭṭhamajjhattato gaṇhanti
tika-abh08t0:1377_4: yathā “kammaviññāṇa”nti vipākānaṃ avañcanīyabhāvato, tasmā kathaṃ iṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte
tika-abh08t0:1377_5: ca uppajjamānesu cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇesu upekkhāvedanāyeva sambhavati, na sukhavedanā,
tika-abh08t0:1377_6: yato tesu upekkhāvedanā vuttāti imaṃ codanaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “iṭṭhārammaṇayogasmi”ntiādiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1377_7: vatvā puna tassā sodhanatthaṃ “upādāya ca rūpenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhūtarūpaṃ upādāya
tika-abh08t0:1377_8: nissāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. “Upādāya ca rūpenā”ti pana “manasī ca kāro”ti
tika-abh08t0:1377_9: ettha vuttanayameva. “Upādāyakarūpenā”ti vā pāṭho, cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthubhūtena
tika-abh08t0:1377_10: cakkhupasādena, tathā sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthubhūtena sotapasādādinā ca upādāyarūpenāti
tika-abh08t0:1377_11: attho. Upādārūpake panāti ya-kāralopaṃ katvā niddeso “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”tiādīsu viya,
tika-abh08t0:1377_12: yathākkamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūte rūpasaddādike upādāyarūpeti attho. Saṃghaṭṭanānighaṃsassāti
tika-abh08t0:1377_14: anurūpadesuppattisaṅkhātanighaṃso viyāti nighaṃsoti vuccati. Atha vā sampattāsampattaggahaṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1377_15: saṃghaṭṭanāya nighaṃsassa cāti attho. Cakkhurūpasotasaddā hi aññamaññaṃ asampattāyeva
tika-abh08t0:1377_16: anurūpadesuppattiyā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭanti nāma. Tato tesaṃ vasena ghaṭṭanākārabhūto
tika-abh08t0:1377_17: aññamaññābhimukhabhāvo “saṃghaṭṭanā”ti vutto. Ghānagandhā, pana jivhārasā ca aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1377_18: sampattāyeva āsannataradese uppannā aññamaññaṃ nighaṃsenti āhacca tiṭṭhanti. Tato
tika-abh08t0:1377_19: tesaṃ vasena nighaṃso vuttoti. Dubbalattāti adhikaraṇīmatthake picupiṇḍakaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t0:1377_20: picupiṇḍeneva pahatakāle viya phuṭṭhamattabhāvena dubbalattā. Dīpayeti evaṃ saṃghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa
tika-abh08t0:1377_21: dubbalattā vedanā majjhattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti upekkhāyogaṃ pakāseyya. Yadi evaṃ kāyaviññāṇepi
tika-abh08t0:1377_22: idaṃ samānanti, noti āha “pasādaṃ panā”tiādi. Yathā hi adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1377_23: ṭhapetvā kūṭena paharantassa kūṭaṃ picupiṇḍamatikkamma adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhāti, evamevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1377_24: kāyadvāre bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikakāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā taṃ atikkamma
tika-abh08t0:1377_25: pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati, nighaṃso balavā hoti, tasmā iṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1377_26: kāyaviññāṇasampayuttā sukhavedanā hoti, aniṭṭhārammaṇe pana vuttanayena dukkhavedanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1378_0: Manodhātunāti ettha kiñcāpi dhātu-saddo idha itthiliṅgeyeva dissati, imināyeva pana
tika-abh08t0:1378_1: ācariyassa vacanena pulliṅgo atthīti siddhaṃ. Keci pana “sakkaṭavohārena vutta”nti
tika-abh08t0:1378_2: vadanti. Sampayuttā dasa dhammāti sambandho. Tasmāvetthāti ettha va-kāro padasandhimattakaro.
tika-abh08t0:1379_0: Kāyaviññāṇe dukkhavedanāti kiñcāpi sukhādikanti ādi-saddena akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1379_1: dukkhavedanāsampayogo vutto, idha panassā lakkhaṇādidassanatthaṃ puna “kāyaviññāṇe
tika-abh08t0:1379_2: dukkhavedanā”ti upaññāso kato, rasādayo panassa kusalavipāke sukhavedanāya vuttavipariyāyena
tika-abh08t0:1379_3: yojetabbāti idha na vuttā. Sesāti sesacetasikā.
tika-abh08t0:1380_1: na pana balarāsippattoti attho. Yadi evaṃ kasmā cetasikavibhāganiddese “balāni dve
tika-abh08t0:1380_2: dvicittesū”ti vuttaṃ? Tattha hi kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇayugaḷaṃ sandhāya tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1381: “Katamā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ekaggatā hoti? Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhitī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1383: “Katamā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ekaggatā hoti? Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibala”nti –
tika-abh08t0:1385_0: “Katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye vīriyindriyaṃ hoti? Yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho
tika-abh08t0:1385_1: nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā
tika-abh08t0:1386_0: Balapariyosānaṃ katvā vibhajitattā vibhaṅgavāre āgataṃ samādhibalaṃ, vīriyabalañca
tika-abh08t0:1386_1: sandhāya “balāni dve dvicittesū”ti vuttaṃ, na pana dhammuddesavāre balarāsiyaṃ āgatabalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1386_2: sandhāya sabbāhetukacittesu dhammuddesassa maggarāsito paṭṭhāya parihīnattā.
tika-abh08t0:1387_0: 87. Vipākakiriyāhadayehīti vipākakiriyacittehi. Hadayaṃ mano mānasaṃ cittanti hi
tika-abh08t0:1387_1: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanamassāti sugato. Bhagavato hi vineyyajanūpasaṅkamanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1387_2: ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ, tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya
tika-abh08t0:1387_5: yāva mahābodhiṃ anavajjatāya sobhanamevāti. Atha vā sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena
tika-abh08t0:1387_6: sayambhuñāṇena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato, tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena
tika-abh08t0:1387_7: pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato, lokanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1387_8: nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato, lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1387_9: maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato pattoti sugato. Atha vā sammā gadatīti sugato.
tika-abh08t0:1387_10: Bhagavā hi bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ vineyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva dhammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1387_11: bhāsati, tasmā sammā gadatīti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā “sugato”ti vutto. Atha vā
tika-abh08t0:1387_12: sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ, nibbānameva vā gatoti sugato, tena sugatena.
tika-abh08t0:1388_0: 88. “Avagacchatī”tiādīsu yo bhikkhu anūnaṃ atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnaṃ suparipuṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1388_1: tatoyeva paramaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ avagacchati avabujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1388_2: sammāuggahaṇadhāraṇādisampādanavasena ogāhitvā jānāti. Atha vā paramanayadīpanato
