tika-abh08t0:1584_5: vuttaṃ. Tathā vipaccantassa ca ekassa kammassa soḷasa vipākāni dvādasamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampīti
tika-abh08t0:1584_6: ayaṃ vipākavibhāgo hetubhedavasena hotīti dassanatthaṃ “tihetukaṃ…pe… na ca hoti
tika-abh08t0:1584_7: tihetukā”ti sattamaṃ aṭṭhakathāya āgatahetukittanaṃ dassitaṃ. Taṃ pana hetukittanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1584_8: ekekassa kammassa vipākavibhāgadassanatthanti. Idāni tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherassa, moravāpivāsimahādattattherassa,
tika-abh08t0:1584_9: tipiṭakamahādhammarakkhitattherassāti tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ vādesu “ekāya cetanāya dvādasa
tika-abh08t0:1584_10: vipākāni ettheva dasakamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampī”ti āgatassa dutiyattheravādassa, “ekāya
tika-abh08t0:1584_11: cetanāya dasa vipākāni ettheva ahetukaṭṭhakampī”ti āgatassa tatiyattherassa vādassa
tika-abh08t0:1584_12: ca na sammāpatiṭṭhitattā suppatiṭṭhitassa paṭhamattheravādassa vasena dassetuṃ vipākesu
tika-abh08t0:1584_13: asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ paccayabalena hoti, no kammabalenāti dīpanatthaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1584_14: “asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāra”ntiādinā kammena saha asamānampi katvā saṅkhārabhedo vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1584_16: dassetuṃ “ārammaṇena…pe… parivattana”nti navamaṃ ārammaṇena vedanāparivattanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1584_17: Kammavasena ceva ārammaṇavasena ca aniyatassa tadārammaṇassa javanavasena niyamadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1585_0: Ekūnatiṃsa kammānīti kusalākusalavasena vīsati parittāni, nava mahaggatānīti ekūnatiṃsa
tika-abh08t0:1585_1: kammāni. Yasmā panesā vaṭṭavasena vipākakathā, tasmā lokuttarakusalaṃ vajjetvā ekūnatiṃseva
tika-abh08t0:1585_2: kammāni vuttāni. Evaṃ “pākā dvattiṃsā”ti etthāpi tevīsati parittā, nava mahaggatāti
tika-abh08t0:1585_3: pākā dvattiṃsa. Tīsu dvāresūti kāyavacīmanodvāravasena tīsu kammadvāresu. Kammadvāravavatthānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1585_4: heṭṭhā saṅkhepato dassitameva. Vitthārato panetaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya,
tika-abh08t0:1585_5: taṃsaṃvaṇṇanādito ca gahetabbaṃ. Kāmaṃ kammānipi chasu dvāresu pavattanti, pañcadvārappavattāni
tika-abh08t0:1585_6: pana avipākāni, manodvāradvārattayavasena bhinnānaṃ vipākadāyakānameva saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1585_7: “tīsu dvāresū”ti vuttaṃ. Chasūti cakkhudvārādīni pañca, manodvārañcāti chasu vipākadvāresu.
tika-abh08t0:1586: Taṃ taṃ paccayamāgammāti kālasampadādikaṃ taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:1589_0: Atha vā taṃ taṃ paccayanti somanassādihetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ sahakāripaccayaṃ. Vividhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1589_2: Ekāya cetanāyāti upapajjavedanīyabhūtāya, aparāpariyavedanīyabhūtāya vā ekāya cetanāya.
tika-abh08t0:1589_3: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā pana pavattivipākameva nibbatteti, no paṭisandhiṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1590_0: Kiñcāpi “tihetuka”nti avisesena vuttaṃ, ukkaṭṭhameva pana tihetukakammaṃ tihetukavipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1590_1: deti, tathā duhetukampi ukkaṭṭhameva duhetukavipākaṃ deti. Omakaṃ pana tihetukakammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1590_2: duhetukukkaṭṭhasadisaṃ, duhetukāhetukameva vipākaṃ deti. Tathā duhetukampi ahetukameva
tika-abh08t0:1590_3: vipākaṃ detīti. Ukkaṭṭhomakavibhāgo ca panesa kusalākusalaparivāralābhato, āsevanavippaṭisārappavattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1590_4: vā daṭṭhabbo. Yañhi kammaṃ attano pavattikāle purimapacchābhāgappavattehi kusaladhammehi
tika-abh08t0:1590_5: parivāritaṃ, pacchā vā āsevanalābhena samudāciṇṇaṃ, taṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ. Yaṃ pana karaṇakāle
tika-abh08t0:1590_6: akusaladhammehi parivāritaṃ, pacchā vā “dukkaṭaṃ mayā”ti vippaṭisāruppādanena paribhāvitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1591_0: Athettha yathāvuttavidhānaṃ kiṃ paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ avisesena, udāhu pavattivasenevāti
tika-abh08t0:1591_1: ce? Pavattivaseneva, paṭisandhiyaṃ pana ayaṃ visesoti dassento āha “tihetukenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1591_2: Etthāpi tihetukukkaṭṭhakammeneva tihetukapaṭisandhi hoti, omakena pana duhetukukkaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:1591_3: ca duhetukā paṭisandhi, duhetukomakena pana ahetukāvāti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. Yasmā
tika-abh08t0:1591_4: panettha ñāṇaṃ jaccandhādivipattinimittassa mohassa, sabbākusalassa vā paṭipakkhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1591_5: tasmā taṃsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ jaccandhādivipattipaccayaṃ na hotīti tihetukaṃ atidubbalampi
tika-abh08t0:1591_6: samānaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhimeva ākaḍḍhati, nāhetukanti āha “na ca hoti ahetukā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1591_7: Yasmā paṭisambhidāmagge sugatiyaṃ jaccandhabadhirādivipattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ vajjetvā
tika-abh08t0:1592_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti, gatisampattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1592_1: ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti? Kusalassa kammassa
tika-abh08t0:1592_2: javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena
tika-abh08t0:1592_3: vuccati kusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1592_4: jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati akusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1592_5: tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati
tika-abh08t0:1593_0: Evaṃ javanakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttavipākuppatti vuttā, na pana
tika-abh08t0:1593_1: “javanakkhaṇe dvinnaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā”ti, tasmā tihetukakammeneva tihetukapaṭisandhi
tika-abh08t0:1593_2: hoti, na duhetukenāti āha “duhetukena…pe… na ca hoti tihetukā”ti. Yadi hi duhetukakammena
tika-abh08t0:1593_3: tihetukapaṭisandhi siyā, yathā “aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti vatvā
tika-abh08t0:1593_4: tassa vibhaṅgo kato, evaṃ “gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā
tika-abh08t0:1593_5: upapatti hoti. Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā
tika-abh08t0:1593_6: upapatti hoti? Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:1593_7: nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū
tika-abh08t0:1593_8: abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… nāmarūpa”nti sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttūpapattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1593_9: vatvā tassa vibhaṅgo kātabbo siyā, na ca panevaṃ atthi, tasmā viññāyati “duhetukakammena
tika-abh08t0:1595_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti. Gatisampattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1595_1: ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṃ…pe… hoti? Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā
tika-abh08t0:1595_2: tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t0:1595_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… nāmarūpa”nti –
tika-abh08t0:1596_0: Evaṃ duhetukakammena duhetukūpapattiṃ uddharitvā “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte sattannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1596_1: hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti. Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṃ sattannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1596_2: hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti? Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1596_3: khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1596_4: dve hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… nāmarūpa”nti evaṃ tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhiyāpi
tika-abh08t0:1596_5: anuddhaṭattā sāpi na hotīti ce? No na hoti, duhetukomakakammena ahetukapaṭisandhiyā
tika-abh08t0:1597_0: Yadi evaṃ purimavuttehi idaṃ samānaṃ kammasarikkhakatābhāvatoti duhetukakammena tihetukapaṭisandhi
tika-abh08t0:1597_1: na uddhaṭā, na pana alabbhanatoti? Taṃ na, akusalakammassa alobhasampayogābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1597_2: alobhaphaluppādane viya ñāṇavippayuttassa ñāṇaphaluppādane asamatthabhāvato. Paññābalasampayogato
tika-abh08t0:1598_0: Etthāha – kiṃ panetaṃ kammameva paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ attanā sadisavedanameva deti,
tika-abh08t0:1598_1: udāhu visadisavedanampīti? Duhetukomakameva visadisavedanaṃ deti, itaraṃ pana sadisavedanameva.
tika-abh08t0:1598_2: Tathā hi papañcasūdaniyā majjhimaṭṭhakathāya mahākammavibhaṅgasutte sukhavedanīyādikammavaṇṇanāya –
tika-abh08t0:1599_1: catukkajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu sukhavedanāya jananato sukhavedanīyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1599_2: kammaṃ nāma. Kāmāvacarañcettha paṭisandhiyaṃyeva ekantena sukhaṃ janeti, pavatte
tika-abh08t0:1600: “Akusalacetanā pavatte kāyadvārappavattadukkhassa jananato dukkhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1601_1: catutthajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu tatiyavedanāya jananato adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1601_2: kammaṃ nāma. Ettha ca “kāmāvacaraṃ paṭisandhiyaṃyeva ekantena adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti,
tika-abh08t0:1602_0: Vuttaṃ. Nanu ca “ārammaṇena hoteva, vedanāparivattana”nti vacanato ārammaṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1602_1: vedanāniyamo hoti, na ca somanassasahagatakammena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantassa iṭṭhārammaṇameva
tika-abh08t0:1602_2: kammanimittādikamāpāthamāgacchatīti niyamo atthi, upekkhāsahagatakammena vā iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1602_3: na sakkā vattuṃ, tasmā kathaṃ kammavaseneva vedanāniyamoti? Vuccate – iṭṭhādiārammaṇampi
tika-abh08t0:1602_6: na na sakkā vattuṃ, tasmā kammavasena paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaniyamo, ārammaṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1602_7: vedanāniyamoti. Apica “ārammaṇena hoteva, vedanāparivattana”nti idaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1602_8: sandhāya vuttanti na tena paṭisandhiyā kammasarikkhakavedanābhāvo paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā,
tika-abh08t0:1602_9: duhetukomakaṃ pana somanassasahagatampi attano nihīnatāya duhetukaphaluppādane asamatthattā,
tika-abh08t0:1602_10: ahetukāya ca attanā sadisavedanāya paṭisandhiyā asambhavato upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhiyā
tika-abh08t0:1602_11: anurūpato iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇamupaṭṭhapetvā tadārammaṇaṃ upekkhāsahagatameva paṭisandhiṃ deti.
tika-abh08t0:1603_2: paṭisandhiṃ icchati. Vuttañhi tena “somanassasahagatato upekkhāsahagataṃ balavataraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1603_3: tena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti, tena gahitapaṭisandhikā hi mahajjhāsayā honti tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
tika-abh08t0:1603_4: viyā”ti, tasmā somanassasahagatakusalato upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhipi labbhati yathā
tika-abh08t0:1603_5: ca, evaṃ tathā upekkhāsahagatato somanassasahagatāpīti kathaṃ kammasadisavedanā paṭisandhīti?
tika-abh08t0:1603_6: Etthāpi ca kammampi upekkhāsahagatamevāti therassa adhippāyo siyāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1603_7: Apicāyaṃ vādo mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittova. Tathā hi vuttaṃ saṅgahakārehi “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1603_8: pana ayaṃ therassa manoratho, natthi eta”nti paṭikkhipitvā sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1603_10: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti vuttanti, tasmā paṭikkhittavādaṃ gahetvā na sakkā aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1604: Asaṅkhāranti asaṅkhārikakammaṃ. Asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārampi phalaṃ detīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1605_0: Ārammaṇenāti iṭṭhādiārammaṇena. Vedanāparivattananti tassa tassa ārammaṇassa anurūpato
tika-abh08t0:1605_2: vuttaṃ. Tāni hi iṭṭhārammaṇe somanassasahagatāni, iṭṭhamajjhatte upekkhāsahagatāni.
tika-abh08t0:1605_3: Akusalavipākaṃ pana santīraṇatadārammaṇaṃ aniṭṭhe, aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh08t0:1605_4: Na hi tassa ārammaṇavasena vedanābhedo atthi, heṭṭhā vuttanayena dvīsupi upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh08t0:1605_5: Dvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanesu ca ṭhapetvā kāyaviññāṇadvayaṃ sesāni iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha
tika-abh08t0:1605_6: heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇavaseneva upekkhāsahagatāni, tathā kāyaviññāṇaṃ iṭṭhādīsu sukhasahagataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1605_7: aniṭṭhādīsu dukkhasahagatanti. Javanena niyamitaṃ aṭṭhakathāyanti adhippāyo. Hetuniyamanameva
tika-abh08t0:1605_8: cettha javanavasena hoti vedanābhedassa ārammaṇeneva, saṅkhārabhedassa ca paccayavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:1605_9: niyamitattā. Ettha ca akusalavipākānaṃ vibhāgābhāvato kusalavipākatadārammaṇānameva
tika-abh08t0:1605_10: ārammaṇajavanapaccayavasena niyamanaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana sarūpato evaṃ veditabbaṃ – tihetukukkaṭṭhakammena
tika-abh08t0:1605_11: hi tadārammaṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ kammavasena niyamābhāvato sabbesupi kusalavipākatadārammaṇesu
tika-abh08t0:1605_12: sampattesu ārammaṇajavanapaccayavasena, ārammaṇajavanavaseneva vā niyataṃ ekameva
tika-abh08t0:1605_13: uppajjati. Kathaṃ? Tadārammaṇesu hi ārammaṇavasena vedanāniyamo hoti, javanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1605_14: hetuniyamo, paccayavasena saṅkhāraniyamo. Ahetukesu pana saṅkhārabhedābhāvato paccayavasena
tika-abh08t0:1605_15: niyamanaṃ natthi. Tattha ārammaṇena vedanāniyamanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1605_16: Javanavasena hetuniyamane pana kammasarikkhakahetuvasena tihetukāni duhetukāni ahetukānīti
tika-abh08t0:1605_17: tīṇi javanāni veditabbāni. Tattha kammasarikkhakahetuvasena tihetukajavanāni nāma
tika-abh08t0:1605_19: ahetukāni nāma akusalajavanāni ceva kiriyāhetukajavanañca. Akusalajavanānipi hi kusalakammasarikkhakahetuvasena
tika-abh08t0:1606_1: javite tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti, duhetukajavane javite duhetukatadārammaṇaṃ, ahetukajavane
tika-abh08t0:1606_2: javite ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ hotīti. Evaṃ javanavasena hetuniyamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1606_3: paccayavasena saṅkhāraniyamoti? Kālasampadādīnaṃ, utusampadādīnañca paccayānaṃ balavabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1606_4: sati asaṅkhārikatadārammaṇaṃ hoti, dubbalabhāve sasaṅkhārikaṃ. Ahetukatadārammaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1606_5: pana paccayavasena niyamo natthi, tasmā yadi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ hoti, tadā upekkhāsahagataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1606_7: aniyamena ārammaṇavasena sabbesu sampattesu javanassa tihetukabhāve duhetukāhetuke
tika-abh08t0:1606_8: paṭibāhitvā tihetukameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Tihetukatadārammaṇesupi aniyamena javanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1606_9: sabbesu sampattesu paccayassa balavabhāve sati sasaṅkhārikatadārammaṇaṃ paṭibāhitvā
tika-abh08t0:1606_10: asaṅkhārikameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Eteneva nayena sesaṃ tadārammaṇampi taṃtaṃjavanānurūpato
tika-abh08t0:1607_0: Ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ pana paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā ārammaṇavasena ceva javanavasena ca
tika-abh08t0:1607_1: niyamanaṃ hoti. Idamettha yebhuyyappavattivasena niyamanaṃ. Kadāci pana ārammaṇavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1607_2: paccayavasena, paricitavasena ca tadārammaṇaniyamo hoti. Tattha ārammaṇavasena ceva
tika-abh08t0:1607_3: paccayavasena ca niyamanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Paricitavasena pana niyamane yebhuyyena
tika-abh08t0:1607_4: tihetukakusalappavattiyā tesu paricitassa kadāci duhetuke, ahetuke vā javane javite
tika-abh08t0:1607_5: paricayavasena tihetukatadārammaṇameva hoti. Yebhuyyena ca duhetukajavanappavattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1607_6: tattha paricitassa kadāci tihetuke, ahetuke vā javane javite paricayavasena duhetukatadārammaṇameva
tika-abh08t0:1607_7: hoti. Tatheva akusalesu paricitassa kadāci tihetukaduhetukesupi javanesu javitesu
tika-abh08t0:1607_8: paricayavasena ahetukatadārammaṇameva hotīti. Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne –
tika-abh08t0:1608_0: “Kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, sahetuke khandhe
tika-abh08t0:1608_1: aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1609_1: ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tihetukomakena, pana duhetukukkaṭṭhena ca kammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1609_2: kammassa tihetukavipākadāne asamatthatāya tihetukajavanepi javite duhetukatadārammaṇameva
tika-abh08t0:1609_3: hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Duhetukomakena pana kammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ kammassa
tika-abh08t0:1610_1: Balavārammaṇeti atimahantārammaṇe. Catubbidhañhi ārammaṇaṃ atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1611: “Tathā hi visayaṃ āhu, catudhā ettha paṇḍitā;
tika-abh08t0:1613_0: Atimahantādibhāvo cassa āpāthagatakāle uppajjanakacittakkhaṇavasena veditabbo. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:1613_1: hi āpāthagatakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva soḷasacittakkhaṇā, tāva vijjamānāyukaārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1613_2: atimahantaṃ nāma. Pannarasacuddasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ mahantaṃ nāma. Terasacittakkhaṇato
tika-abh08t0:1613_3: paṭṭhāya aṭṭhacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ parittaṃ nāma. Tato paraṃ atiparittaṃ nāma. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:1613_4: atimahantārammaṇe tadārammaṇapariyosānāni vīthicittāni uppajjanti. Mahante javanapariyosānāni,
tika-abh08t0:1613_5: natthi tadārammaṇuppādo. Paritte javanampi na uppajjati, santīraṇānantaraṃ voṭṭhabbanameva
tika-abh08t0:1613_6: dvattikkhattuṃ pavattati. Atiparitte bhavaṅgacalanamattameva. Kathaṃ? Atimahante
tika-abh08t0:1613_7: hi ārammaṇe pañcadvāresu yathānurūpaṃ aññatarasmiṃ dvāre āpāthagate pasādaghaṭṭanānubhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1613_8: hadayavatthusannissitā bhavaṅgasantati vocchijjati, vocchijjamānā ca sahasā na occhijjati.
tika-abh08t0:1613_9: Yathā pana vegena dhāvanto puriso antarā ṭhātukāmopi ekadvepadavāre atikkamitvāva
tika-abh08t0:1613_10: ṭhātuṃ sakkoti, na pana ṭhātukāmatāya saddhiṃyeva, evameva dīpasikhā viya, gaṅgāsoto
tika-abh08t0:1613_11: viya, vegena javamānā bhavaṅgasantati antarā occhijjamānāpi pasādaghaṭṭanato paraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1613_12: dvattikkhattuṃ uppajjitvāva occhijjati. Tattha paṭhamacittaṃ bhavaṅgasantatiyā calanākārena
tika-abh08t0:1613_13: uppajjanato bhavaṅgacalanaṃ nāma, dutiyaṃ upacchijjanavasena uppajjanato bhavaṅgupacchedo
tika-abh08t0:1616_0: Yadi evaṃ dutiyassapi taṃ atthīti tampi bhavaṅgacalanamicceva vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1616_1: bhavaṅgassa pana upacchijjanavasena pavattivisesaṃ gahetvā purimassa nāmato visadisanāmaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1616_2: kātuṃ “bhavaṅgupacchedo”ti vuccatīti. Nanu ca rūpādīhi pasāde ghaṭṭite pasādanissitasseva
tika-abh08t0:1616_3: calanaṃ yuttaṃ, kathaṃ pana hadayavatthusannissitāya bhavaṅgasantatiyā calananti?
tika-abh08t0:1616_4: Santativasena ekābaddhattā. Yathā hi bheriyā ekasmiṃ tale ṭhitasakkharāya makkhikāya
tika-abh08t0:1616_5: nipannāya aparasmiṃ tale daṇḍādinā pahaṭe anukkamena bhericammavarattādīnaṃ calanena
tika-abh08t0:1616_6: sakkharāya calitāya makkhikāya palāyanaṃ hoti, evameva rūpādimhi pasāde ghaṭṭite
tika-abh08t0:1616_7: tannissayesu mahābhūtesu calitesu anukkamena taṃsambandhānaṃ sesarūpānampi calanena
tika-abh08t0:1616_8: hadayavatthumhi calite tannissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanākārena pavatti hoti. Vuttañca –
tika-abh08t0:1619_0: Evaṃ bhavaṅgacalanabhavaṅgupacchedesu uppajjitvā niruddhesu “kiṃ nāmeta”nti vadantī
tika-abh08t0:1619_1: viya vīthicittāni ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ paṭipādentī kiriyāmanodhātu uppajjati, tassānantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1619_2: yathārahaṃ dassanādikiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcaviññāṇadhātūsu aññatarā uppajjati, tadanantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1619_3: tāya gahitamevārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchamānā vipākāhetukamanodhātu uppajjati, tadanantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1619_6: kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyajavanesu yaṃ kiñci laddhapaccayaṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ ārabbha
tika-abh08t0:1619_7: javanaṃ hutvā yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ javati, tadanantaraṃ ekādasatadārammaṇacittesu
tika-abh08t0:1619_8: aññataraṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ paccayo paricitatāti imesaṃ anurūpavasena dvikkhattuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1620_0: Idha ṭhatvā imissā cittaparamparāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ ambopamā veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1620_1: Eko kira puriso phalitambarukkhassa heṭṭhā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipanno niddāyati, athekaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1620_2: ambapakkaṃ vaṇṭato muccitvā tassa kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānaṃ viya “ṭha”nti bhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1620_3: patati, so tassa saddena pabujjhitvā sīsato vatthaṃ apanetvā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokesi,
tika-abh08t0:1620_4: tato hatthaṃ pasāretvā phalaṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā pakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā paribhuñjitvā
tika-abh08t0:1620_5: mukhagataṃ saha semhena assādetvā puna tatheva niddāyati. Tattha tassa purisassa
tika-abh08t0:1620_6: ambarukkhamūle niddāyanakālo viya bhavaṅgasamaṅgikālo, ambapakkassa patitakālo viya
tika-abh08t0:1620_7: ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanakālo, patanasaddena pabuddhakālo viya manodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa
tika-abh08t0:1620_8: āvaṭṭitakālo, ummīletvā olokitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccaṃ sādhanakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_9: hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇasampaṭicchanakālo, gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:1620_10: madditakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo, upasiṅghitakālo
tika-abh08t0:1620_11: viya kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā vavatthāpitakālo, paribhuttakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasaanubhavitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_12: mukhagataṃ saha semhena assāditakālo viya tadārammaṇassa javanena anubhūtārammaṇaanubhavanakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_13: puna niddāyanaṃ viya puna bhavaṅgakāloti evamettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1621_0: Ayaṃ pana upamā kiṃ dīpeti? Ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanameva kiccaṃ, kiriyāmanodhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1621_1: bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanameva kiccaṃ, pañcaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ dassanādikameva kiccaṃ, vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1621_2: sampaṭicchanameva kiccaṃ, vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā santīraṇameva kiccaṃ, kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1621_3: vavatthāpanameva kiccaṃ, javanasseva pana ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ tadārammaṇassa etena
tika-abh08t0:1621_4: anubhūtasseva anubhavananti evaṃ kiccavasena dhammānaṃ aññamaññāsaṃkiṇṇataṃ dīpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1621_5: evaṃ pavattamānaṃ pana cittaṃ “tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma hohi, tvaṃ dassanādīsu aññataraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1621_6: tvaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ nāmā”tiādinā niyuñjake kārake asatipi cittaniyāmavaseneva pavattatīti
tika-abh08t0:1621_7: veditabbaṃ. Taṃ pana cittaniyāmaṃ saddhiṃ utuniyāmādīhi paricchedāvasāne vakkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1622_0: Mahantārammaṇe pana tadārammaṇuppādassa abhāvato tasmiṃ āpāthagate vuttanayena javanapariyosānesu
tika-abh08t0:1622_1: vīthicittesu uppannesu bhavaṅgapātova hoti, ārammaṇassa pana parikkhīṇāyukattā ekacittakkhaṇikappamāṇepi
tika-abh08t0:1622_2: vā āyumhi sati samāsannamaraṇo viya puriso dubbalabhāvato tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1622_3: Apica tadārammaṇamuppajjantaṃ niyamato dvikkhattumeva uppajjati, na ekavāraṃ. Ekacittakkhaṇāvasiṭṭhe
tika-abh08t0:1622_4: ca ārammaṇe ekasmiṃ tadārammaṇe uppannesu dutiyassa uppajjanakāle tassa niruddhattā
tika-abh08t0:1622_5: nuppajjati. Na hi dvīsu tadārammaṇesu ekaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ, ekaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1622_6: hoti, tasmā dutiyassa anuppattiyā paṭhamampi nuppajjatīti. Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1622_7: sakimpi tadārammaṇassa pavatti vuttā. Paramatthavinicchayepi ca tameva vādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
tika-abh08t0:1622_8: “sakiṃ dve vā tadālamba”nti vuttaṃ. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1622_9: sabbavāresu dve eva cittavārāni āgatānī”ti vatvā taṃ na sampaṭicchitaṃ, tasmā mahantārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1622_10: javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādo, ayañca tadārammaṇehi tucchatāya
tika-abh08t0:1623_0: Parittārammaṇe javanuppādassapi abhāvato santīraṇāvasānesu vīthicittesu uppannesu
tika-abh08t0:1623_1: tadanantaraṃ voṭṭhabbanameva āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā dvikkhattuṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1623_2: tato bhavaṅgapāto hoti. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana appatvā antarā cakkhuviññāṇādikaṃ patvā
tika-abh08t0:1623_3: nivattissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Javanaṃ pana ārammaṇassa appāyukabhāvena paridubbalattā
tika-abh08t0:1623_4: nuppajjati. Tañhi uppajjamānaṃ sattacittakkhaṇāyukeyeva uppajjati, katipayacittakkhaṇāyuke
tika-abh08t0:1623_5: pana paṭhamajavanameva nuppajjati. Tadanuppattiyañhi itarānipi nuppajjanti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1623_6: parittārammaṇe natthi javanuppādoti ayaṃ dutiyo moghavāro aṭṭhakathāya vutto. Ṭīkākāro
tika-abh08t0:1623_7: pana tathā asampaṭicchitvā aññathā dutiyamoghavāraṃ pakappeti. Vuttañhi tena tīsu
tika-abh08t0:1624_0: Yadi hi anulome vedanāttike paṭiccavārādīsu “āsevanapaccayā na magge dve, namaggapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:1624_1: āsevane dve”ti ca vuttaṃ siyā, sopi moghavāro labbheyya. Yadi ca voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo
tika-abh08t0:1624_2: siyā, kusalākusalānampi siyā. Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayabhāvī
tika-abh08t0:1624_3: dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti avutto atthi. Voṭṭhabbanassa pana kusalākusalānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1624_4: na vutto. “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā. Akusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1624_5: dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā”ti vacanato paṭikkhittova.
tika-abh08t0:1624_6: Athāpi siyā “asamānavedanānaṃ vasenevaṃ vutta”nti, evampi yathā “āvajjanā kusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1624_7: khandhānaṃ, akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ “āsevanapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1624_8: paccayo”tipi vattabbaṃ siyā. Jātibhedā na vuttanti ce, “bhūmibhinnassa kāmāvacarassa
tika-abh08t0:1624_9: rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo viya jātibhinnassapi bhaveyyā”ti vattabbo eva
tika-abh08t0:1624_10: siyā, abhinnajātikassa ca vasena yathā “āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1624_11: paccayo”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ “āsevanapaccayena paccayo”tipi vattabbaṃ siyā, na tu vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1624_12: tasmā vedanāttikepi saṃkhittāya gaṇanāya “āsevanapaccayā namagge ekaṃ, namaggapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:1624_13: āsevane eka”nti evaṃ gaṇanāya niddhāriyamānāya voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattābhāvā
tika-abh08t0:1624_14: yathāvuttappakāro dutiyo moghavāro vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana vīthivipākasantatiyā
tika-abh08t0:1624_15: āvaṭṭanato “āvajjanā”icceva vuttaṃ. Tato visadisassa javanassa karaṇato manasikāro
tika-abh08t0:1624_16: ca. Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “voṭṭhabbanaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:1624_17: na vuttaṃ, “āvajjanā”icceva vuttaṃ, tasmā voṭṭhabbanato catunnaṃ vā pañcannaṃ vā
tika-abh08t0:1624_18: javanānaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaṃ bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ rūpādiāvajjanādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ
tika-abh08t0:1624_19: na sakkoti, ayametassa sabhāvoti javanāpāripūriyā dutiyo moghavāro dassetuṃ yutto siyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1625_0: Ayañhi ācariyassa adhippāyo – yadi voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā, yathā “sukhāya
tika-abh08t0:1625_1: vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati
tika-abh08t0:1625_3: namaggapaccayā āsevanapaccayā”ti ca vuttaṃ hasituppādacittavasena, evampi voṭṭhabbanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1625_4: “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena
tika-abh08t0:1625_5: pāṭho siyā. Tathā ca sati vāradvayavasena gaṇanāya “āsevanapaccayā namagge dve, namaggapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:1625_6: āsevane dve”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, na pana vuttaṃ, “āsevanapaccayā namagge ekaṃ, namaggapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:1625_7: āsevane eka”nticceva vuttaṃ. Apica yadi hi voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā, dutiyamoghavāro
tika-abh08t0:1625_8: viya purimavāresupi siyā. Tathā ca sati attano viya kusalākusalānampi siyā. Na hi
tika-abh08t0:1625_9: āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayabhāvī dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1625_10: avutto atthi “purimā purimā kusalā khandhā”tiādinā anavasesato vuttattā, voṭṭhabbanassa
tika-abh08t0:1625_11: pana avutto “abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanassa
tika-abh08t0:1625_12: abhāvato. Na kevalaṃ avuttova, atha kho “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1625_13: akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjatī”ti phassādikusalākusaladhamme paṭicca
tika-abh08t0:1625_14: sahajātādipaccayavasena kusalākusalassa uppattiṃ vatvā paṭhamajavanassa voṭṭhabbanato
tika-abh08t0:1626_0: Athāpettha samodhānaṃ siyā, samānavedanānaṃ eva āsevanapaccayabhāvassa dassanato
tika-abh08t0:1626_1: voṭṭhabbanena asamānavedanānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ vasenāyaṃ paṭikkhepo katoti. Evampi
tika-abh08t0:1626_2: sati yathā “āvajjanā kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1626_3: paccayo”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ samānavedanāvasena “āsevanapaccayena paccayo”tipi vattabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1626_4: siyā. Atha voṭṭhabbanassa kusalākusalehi bhinnajātikattā tassa tesaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1626_5: na vuttoti ce. Yathā bhūmivasena bhinnassa gotrabhuvodānavasena ṭhitassa kāmāvacarassa
tika-abh08t0:1626_6: rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanabhāvo dissati, evaṃ jātivasena bhinnassa voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1626_7: na koci vibandho, apica abhinnavedanassa, abhinnajātikassa ca upekkhāsahagatamahākiriyacittassa
tika-abh08t0:1626_8: vasena yathā “āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1626_9: evaṃ “āsevanapaccayena paccayo”tipi vattabbaṃ siyā, na tu vuttaṃ, tasmā vedanāttikepi
tika-abh08t0:1626_11: vutto dutiyo moghavāro vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo. Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānaṃ pana anatthantarabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1626_12: āvajjanāya ca kusalākusalānaṃ anantarapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā sati uppattiyaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1626_14: na pana aññathāti muñchāmaraṇāsannavelādīsu javanāpāripūriyā mandībhūtavegatāya ayaṃ dassetabboti.
tika-abh08t0:1627_0: Ācariyadhammapālattherena panettha idaṃ vuttaṃ – “yaṃ javanabhāvappattaṃ, taṃ chinnamūlarukkhapupphaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1627_1: viyā”ti vakkhamānattā anupacchinnabhavamūlānaṃ pavattassa voṭṭhabbanassa kiriyabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1627_2: na siyā, vutto ca “yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā kiriyā nevakusalā, nākusalā,
tika-abh08t0:1627_3: na ca kammavipākā upekkhāsahagatā”ti, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1627_4: vacanaṃ javanassa uppajjanaṭṭhāne dvikkhattuṃ pavattitvā na javanabhāvenāti adhippāyena
tika-abh08t0:1627_5: vuttaṃ, “āsevanaṃ labhitvā”ti ca “āsevanaṃ viya āsevana”nti vutte na koci virodhoti.
tika-abh08t0:1627_6: Vipphārikassa pana sato dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyevettha āsevanasadisatā. Vipphārikatāya
tika-abh08t0:1627_7: hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattañcassa vuccati. Vipphārikampi javanaṃ viya anekakkhattuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1627_8: appavattiyā dubbalattā na nippariyāyato āsevanapaccayabhāvena pavatteyyāti na imassa
tika-abh08t0:1627_9: pāṭhe āsevanattaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pariyāyato vuttaṃ, yathā phalacittesu
tika-abh08t0:1627_11: paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotī”ti pana vuttattā cittappavattivasena paṭhamamoghavārato
tika-abh08t0:1628_1: manodhātuyā bhavaṅgāvaṭṭane pākaṭatāya kiriyāmanodhātuṃ paccāmasati. Āvaṭṭiteti santativasena
tika-abh08t0:1628_2: pavattituṃ adatvā nivattite, pariṇāmite vā. Jātesu jāyateti sambandho. Gateti niruddhe.
tika-abh08t0:1628_3: Tadevāti javanānubhūtameva iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ. Tenevāti javanaṃ hutvā niruddhena tena
tika-abh08t0:1628_5: “brahmassaro”tiādīsu viya tassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇamassāti majjhapadalopavasena tadārammaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1628_6: saññitaṃ. Tulyatoti ārammaṇato visadisabhāvepi somanassasahagatādinā sadisattā. Mūlasadisaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1628_8: yathā “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti. Ettha
tika-abh08t0:1628_9: hi paṭisandhicitte eva pavattiyaṃ “bhavaṅga”nti vuccamāne na tassa hetuvasena bhedoti
tika-abh08t0:1628_10: “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti na sakkā
tika-abh08t0:1628_11: vattuṃ. Nāpi cetaṃ “sahetukaṃ cutiṃ ahetukapaṭisandhiñca sandhāya vutta”nti sakkā
tika-abh08t0:1628_14: vuccatī”ti vuttattā nāmadvayampi imassa labbhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1629: 392. Tañcāti tadārammaṇañca. Etthāti imesu vīthicittesu. Gaṇanūpagacittānīti vipākagaṇanūpagacittāni.
tika-abh08t0:1631_0: 396. Purimāni pañca vipākacittāni iminā saddhiṃ cha hontīti sambandho. Ettha ca yebhuyyato
tika-abh08t0:1631_2: vuttaṃ. Javanassa pana pakappetvā ārammaṇaggahaṇasabbhāvato, vipākassa ca tadabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1631_3: iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatajavanesupi javitesu somanassasahagatameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1632_0: 399-403. Tasmiṃ dvāreti tasmiṃyeva cakkhudvāre. Vedanā parivattatīti kammassa somanassasahagatabhāvepi
tika-abh08t0:1632_1: ārammaṇassa iṭṭhamajjhattatāya somanassavedanā parivattitvā upekkhāvedanā hoti. Atha
tika-abh08t0:1632_2: vā heṭṭhā vipākavedanāya somanassabhāvepi iṭṭhārammaṇassa majjhattabhāvena taṃvasena
tika-abh08t0:1633_0: Javanesu javitesūti sambandho. “Javitesu catūsvapī”ti vā pāṭho. Jāyareti tadārammaṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1633_1: jāyanti. Vedanāyāti vedanāya karaṇabhūtāya. Asamānattāti paṭisandhiyā saha asamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:1633_2: Purimehīti heṭṭhā vuttatadārammaṇacatukkato. Atha vā “purimehi asamānattā” icceva
tika-abh08t0:1633_3: yojanā. Purimehi saha asamānabhāve vutte tesaṃ sandhiyā saha asamānabhāvopi vuttova
tika-abh08t0:1633_4: hotīti cattāri nāmato piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni ca hontīti yojanā. Ca-saddena āgantukabhavaṅgāni,
tika-abh08t0:1633_5: tadārammaṇāni ca hontīti dasseti. Etthāpi ca yebhuyyena iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatajavanassa
tika-abh08t0:1633_7: heṭṭhā vuttanayena pana upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Ñāṇasampayuttādīsu javitesu
tika-abh08t0:1633_8: ñāṇavippayuttatadārammaṇānaṃ sambhavo heṭṭhā vuttanayena veditabbo. Kiñcāpi asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1633_9: javanavasena vuttaṃ, tathāpi utubhojanādipaccayānaṃ dubbalabhāve javanasseva asaṅkhārikattābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1633_10: asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhārameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti, na sasaṅkhāranti niyamo. Paccayassa
tika-abh08t0:1633_11: pana balavabhāve satipi paresaṃ ussāhabalena sasaṅkhārassa javanassa sambhavato sasaṅkhārajavanāvasāne
tika-abh08t0:1633_12: sasaṅkhārameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti, sasaṅkhārikattābhāvato asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhāramevāti
tika-abh08t0:1633_13: niyamo natthīti asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhārampi sasaṅkhārampi tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1634_0: Pañcimānīti iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe vuttāni upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇādīni pañca vipākāni.
tika-abh08t0:1634_1: Purimehi sattahīti iṭṭhārammaṇe vuttehi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi sattahi viniddise cakkhudvārasminti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1635_1: samasaṭṭhi vipākāni uppajjantīti sambandho. Yasmā pana cakkhudvārādīsu anuppajjitvā
tika-abh08t0:1635_2: sotadvārādīsuyeva uppajjamānā sotaviññāṇādayo viya pañcasu dvāresu anuppajjitvā manodvāreyeva
tika-abh08t0:1635_3: uppajjamāno kāmāvacaravipāko natthi, tasmā manodvāre vipākappavatti na vuttā. Atha
tika-abh08t0:1635_4: vā cakkhudvāre gahitānameva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ sotadvārādīsupi gahaṇena
tika-abh08t0:1635_5: pañcadvāresu gahitāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā manodvārepi gahaṇanayadassanaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1635_6: evaṃ sati chasu dvāresupi samasattati vipākāni honti. Atha vā manodvāre labbhamānāyapi
tika-abh08t0:1635_7: pañcadvārappavattāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā manodvāre aggahaṇena sotadvārādīsu labbhamānānampi
tika-abh08t0:1635_9: kataṃ hoti, evaṃ sati pañcadvāresu soḷasa vipākāni honti. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ “gahitāggahaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1636_0: 408-9. Tīhi vipākehīti tehi tīhi kusalacittehi samānehi tīhi vipākehi dinnāya paṭisandhiyāti
tika-abh08t0:1636_1: sambandho. Upekkhāsahitadvayeti upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhiyugaḷe. Idha ṭhatvā nāḷiyantūpamā
tika-abh08t0:1636_2: veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Ucchupīḷanasamaye kira ekasmā gāmā ekādasa yantavāhā nikkhamitvā
tika-abh08t0:1636_3: ekaṃ ucchuvāṭaṃ disvā tassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā ucchusāmikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “yantavāhā
tika-abh08t0:1636_4: maya”nti ārocesuṃ. So “ahaṃ tumheyeva pariyesissāmī”ti ucchusālaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
tika-abh08t0:1636_5: Te tattha nāḷiyantaṃ yojetvā “mayaṃ ekādasa janā aparampi ekaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, vattanena
tika-abh08t0:1636_6: gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu. Ucchusāmiko “ahameva sahāyo bhavissāmī”ti ucchusālaṃ pūrāpetvā
tika-abh08t0:1636_7: tesaṃ sahāyo ahosi. Te attano attano kiccāni katvā phāṇitapācakena ucchurase pakke
tika-abh08t0:1636_8: guḷe baddhe ucchusāmikena tulayitvā bhāgesu dinnesu attano attano bhāgaṃ ādāya sālaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1636_9: sālasāmikaṃ paṭicchāpetvā eteneva upāyena aparāsupi catūsu sālāsu kammaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
tika-abh08t0:1636_10: Tattha pañca yantasālā viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā, pañca ucchuvāṭā viya pañca ārammaṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:1636_11: ekādasa vicaraṇakayantavāhā viya ekādasa vipākacittāni, pañca ucchusālasāmino viya
tika-abh08t0:1636_12: pañca viññāṇāni, paṭhamakasālāya sālasāmikena saddhiṃ dvādasannaṃ janānaṃ ekato hutvā
tika-abh08t0:1636_13: katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1636_14: ekato hutvā cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo, sālasāmikassa sālāya
tika-abh08t0:1636_16: dvādasannaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1636_17: kāyaviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1636_18: sāmikassa sampaṭicchitakālo viya kāyaviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1638_1: gahitaduhetukapaṭisandhikassa vipākappavattiyā samānāti taṃ ṭhapetvā duhetukakammena
tika-abh08t0:1639_1: javanāni dassetuṃ “somanassa…pe… duhetuke”ti vuttaṃ. Tihetukajavanāvasānepi panassa
tika-abh08t0:1639_3: javanassa ca kammasarikkhakahetuvasena duhetukabhāvato duhetukatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1640: 424. Imāni ca bhavaṅgānīti imāni cattāri mūlāgantukapiṭṭhibhavaṅgāni. Aṭṭha hīti aṭṭheva.
tika-abh08t0:1641_0: 426. Sotaghānādināti sotaghānādiviññāṇehi. Etthāpi ambopamā pākaṭikāva. Yantavāhopamāya
tika-abh08t0:1641_1: panettha satta yantavāhā tehi hatthayante nāma sajjite sālasāmikaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā
tika-abh08t0:1642_0: 434-6. Vuddhimupetassāti mātukucchito nikkhamitvā saṃvarāsaṃvare paṭṭhapetuṃ samatthabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1642_2: “duhetūnaṃ…pe… vasānasmi”nti vuttaṃ. Tihetukajavanampi pana tesaṃ javati, javanassa
tika-abh08t0:1642_3: duhetukabhāvepi kammassa duhetukavipākadāne asamatthatāya “ahetuka…pe… jāyate”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1643_1: paṭisandhito hīnatadārammaṇassa anipphannato tassa labbhamānaṭṭhānameva dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1643_2: “sugatiya”nti vuttaṃ, kāmāvacarasugatiyanti attho. Tenāti tena jātapaṭisandhivipākena.
tika-abh08t0:1643_3: “Catūsu apāyesu labbhatī”ti vatvā tassa visayadassanatthaṃ “thero nerayikāna”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:1643_4: vuttaṃ. Theroti nirayacārikāya pākaṭattā mahāmoggallānattheramāha. Niraye bhavā nerayikā.
tika-abh08t0:1643_5: Dhammaṃ desetīti niraye padumaṃ māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāya nisinno dhammaṃ deseti. Vassatīti
tika-abh08t0:1643_6: antohetvatthaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, vassāpetīti attho. Theraṃ disvāti therassa dassanahetu.
tika-abh08t0:1643_8: kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Esa nayo “dhammaṃ sutvā”tiādīsupi. Gandhanti tena māpitagandhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1643_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisinnassa cīvaragandha”nti vuttaṃ. Ghāyatanti
tika-abh08t0:1643_10: ghāyantānaṃ. Santīraṇadvayanti atiiṭṭhamajjhattassa gandhādino vasena santīraṇadvayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1643_11: Kusalavipākānaṃ, iṭṭhārammaṇassa ca niraye sambhavadīpanena sesāpāyattayepi sambhavo dassitova hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1644_0: 450. Niyamoyeva niyamattaṃ, tadārammaṇacittampi javanena niyāmitanti vuttaniyamoti
tika-abh08t0:1644_1: attho. Kusalaṃ pana sandhāyāti kusalajavanaṃ sandhāya dīpitaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, kusalassa
tika-abh08t0:1644_2: viya akusalassa sadisavipākābhāvatoti adhippāyo. Ettha ca kusalajavanānantaraṃ sahetukatadārammaṇasseva
tika-abh08t0:1644_3: vacanaṃ. Javanassa kammasarikkhakahetuvasena sahetukattā javanānurūpato vuttaṃ. Paricitavasena
tika-abh08t0:1644_4: pana aññakammenāpi taṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva
tika-abh08t0:1644_5: kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janeti, atha kho aññakammampi paṭisandhidāyakakammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato
tika-abh08t0:1644_7: kammasarikkhakahetukattā tadanurūpato vuttaṃ. Yathāvuttanayena pana sahetukatadārammaṇampi na hotīti natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1645_0: 456-7. Ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravāde soḷasa vipākacittāni saddhiṃ dvādasakamaggena
tika-abh08t0:1645_1: ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena ca vibhāvetvā moravāpivāsimahādattattheravāde visesābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1645_2: taṃ anāmasitvā mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde kusalākusalakiriyavasena piṇḍitvā dassitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1645_3: piṇḍajavanānaṃ vasena tadārammaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “somanassayute citte”tiādi vuttaṃ. Somanassa…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1645_4: javiteti iṭṭhārammaṇe kusalākusalakiriyābyākatavasena somanassayutesu terasasu javanacittesu
tika-abh08t0:1645_5: javitesu. Gavesitabbā…pe… mānasāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena somanassasahagatāni pañceva
tika-abh08t0:1645_7: cuddasasu upekkhāsahagatajavanacittesu javitesu. Cha gavesitabbānīti upekkhāsahagatāni
tika-abh08t0:1645_8: cha eva gavesitabbāni. Khīṇāsavānaṃ pahīnavipallāsatāya kiriyājavanaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1645_9: upekkhāsahagataṃ na hotīti somanassasahagatakiriyājavanesu javitesu somanassasahagatatadārammaṇameva
tika-abh08t0:1645_10: hoti. Iṭṭhamajjhatte, aniṭṭhādīsu ca somanassabhāvato upekkhāsahagatakiriyājavanesu
tika-abh08t0:1645_12: pana appahīnavipallāsatāya iṭṭhamajjhatte, aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe ca somanassasahagatajavanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1645_14: natthi upekkhāsahagatanti nāyaṃ niyamo. Iṭṭhārammaṇepi vuttanayānusārena yojetabbaṃ. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
tika-abh08t0:1650_0: 458-62. Duhetukāhetukānaṃ vipākāvaraṇehi samannāgatattā jhānuppādoyeva natthīti āha
tika-abh08t0:1650_2: Vippaṭisārinoti “mahantena vāyāmena uppādito me paṇītadhammo naṭṭho”ti uppannavippaṭisāravantassa.
tika-abh08t0:1650_3: Kiṃ…pe… mānasanti ayaṃ anumatipucchā, tadārammaṇamānasaṃ jāyate kiṃ, na vāti ayañhettha
tika-abh08t0:1650_4: attho. Bhavaṅgapāto vā hotu tadārammaṇaṃ vā, ko ettha vibandhoti āha “paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1650_5: Avacanameva paṭisedhoti katvā āha “paṭisiddhā”ti. Yadi somanassānantaraṃ domanassaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1650_6: domanassānantaraṃ somanassaṃ vā uppajjeyya, tadā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
tika-abh08t0:1650_7: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:1650_8: viya “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa
tika-abh08t0:1650_9: anantarapaccayena paccayo, dukkhāya vedanāya…pe… sukhāya vedanāya…pe… paccayo”ti
tika-abh08t0:1650_10: vattabbaṃ siyā, tathā gaṇanavāre ekekavedanāsampayuttassa attanā samānavedanāsampayuttassa,
tika-abh08t0:1650_11: itaravedanādvayasamaṅgissa ca paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya “anantare navā”ti vattabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1650_12: siyā, na ca panevaṃ pāḷi āgatā. Domanassasomanassavedanāya sampayuttānaṃ pana aññamaññaanantarapaccayavasena
tika-abh08t0:1650_13: gaṇanadvayaṃ parihāpetvā “anantare sattā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi
tika-abh08t0:1650_14: paṭisedhasadisaṃ abhāvasseva dīpanatoti vuttaṃ “paṭisiddhā”ti. Assa vā anantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1651_0: Evaṃ bhavaṅgapātābhāve kāraṇaṃ vatvā puna tadārammaṇābhāvaṃ dassento āha “mahaggata”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1651_1: Tattheva paṭisiddhanti “parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1651_2: paccayo”ti vacanābhāvato tattheva paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhaṃ. Kiṃ nu kātabbanti kiṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1651_3: Na hi sakkā ettakena “acittako”ti vattunti adhippāyo. Ettha ca mahaggatārammaṇameva
tika-abh08t0:1651_4: domanassajavanaṃ nidassanavasena vuttaṃ. Iṭṭhārammaṇabhūte pana buddhādiārammaṇepi
tika-abh08t0:1651_5: domanassajavane javite somanassapaṭisandhikassa tadārammaṇasambhavo, bhavaṅgapāto vā natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1652_1: abhāvato “upekkhāsahitā hetū”tiādinā ācariyena vutte puna codako anubandhanto āha
tika-abh08t0:1652_2: “āvajjanaṃ kimassā”ti. Ācariyo pana kimettha āvajjanagavesanena, tena vināva idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1652_3: cittaṃ uppajjatīti dīpento āha “natthi ta”nti. Puna codako āvajjanena vinā cittappavattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1652_4: avisahanto āha “taṃ jāyate katha”nti. Evaṃ pana vutte ācariyo kimettha āvajjanena,
tika-abh08t0:1652_5: kiñca āvajjanena vinā cittappavatti natthīti idaṃ na ekantikanti dīpetuṃ nirāvajjanacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1652_6: sambhavaṃ dassento āha “bhavaṅgāvajjanāna”ntiādi, bhavaṅgāvajjanānaṃ kiṃ āvajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1652_7: nanu natthevāti adhippāyo. Nanu ca bhavaṅgāvajjanāni tāva sakasakavisayesu ninnattā
tika-abh08t0:1652_8: āvajjanena vinā uppattiyaṃ bahulaṃ ciṇṇattāva uppajjanti, ayaṃ pana kathaṃ uppajjatīti
tika-abh08t0:1652_9: idaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya puna nirāvajjanacittāni dassento āha “maggassā”tiādi. Maggassa
tika-abh08t0:1652_10: lokuttaramaggassa cittassa. Anantarassa phalassa cāti maggānantarassa phalassa ca
tika-abh08t0:1652_11: atthāya kiṃ āvajjananti sambandho. Evaṃ natthīti yathā etesaṃ, evametassāpi natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1653_0: Ānandācariyo panettha ariyamaggacittaṃ, maggānantarāni phalāni ca parikammāvajjanena
tika-abh08t0:1653_1: sāvajjanāni samānāni asatipi nirāvajjanuppattiyaṃ ninnādibhāve uppattiyā nidassanamattavasena
tika-abh08t0:1653_2: vuttānīti vaṇṇeti. Ayaṃ hissa adhippāyo – yadi hi nibbānārammaṇāvajjanābhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:1653_3: vuttāni siyuṃ, gotrabhuvodānāni dassitabbāni siyuṃ teheva etesaṃ nirāvajjanatāsiddhito,
tika-abh08t0:1653_6: phalacittānīti evaṃ samāpattiphalacittāni na vajjetabbāni siyuṃ, gotrabhuvodānāni
tika-abh08t0:1653_7: pana yadipi nibbāne ciṇṇāni, samudācitāni ca na honti, ārammaṇantare ciṇṇasamudācitāneva.
tika-abh08t0:1653_8: Phalasamāpatticittāni ca maggavīthito uddhaṃ tadatthaṃ parikammasabbhāvāti tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1653_9: gahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. Anulomānantarañca phalasamāpatticittaṃ ciṇṇasamudācitaṃ, na nevasaññānāsaññānantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1653_10: maggānantarassa viya tadatthaṃ parikammābhāvāti “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā”ti tañca nidassitanti.
tika-abh08t0:1654_1: tabbhāvadassanena attano vacanaṃ sādhento āha “vinā ārammaṇenā”tiādi. Yaṃ kiñcīti
tika-abh08t0:1654_2: yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha. Nanu ca tadārammaṇikaṃ siyāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1654_3: tadārammaṇañca javanārammaṇameva gaṇhāti itarathā tadārammaṇabhāvāyogatoti kathamassā
tika-abh08t0:1654_5: mahaggatārammaṇabhāvo yutto, “tadārammaṇa”nti ca tadārammaṇaṭṭhāne uppattiṃ gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:1654_6: vuttaṃ, na tassā tadārammaṇakiccasambhavato. Kena carahi kiccenāyaṃ uppajjatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1654_7: Tadārammaṇakiccaṃ tāva yathāvuttakāraṇatova natthi, nāpi santīraṇakiccaṃ tathā appavattanato.
tika-abh08t0:1654_8: Paṭisandhicutīsu vattabbameva natthi. Pārisesato pana bhavassa aṅgabhāvato bhavaṅgakiccanti
tika-abh08t0:1654_9: yuttaṃ siyā, paṭisandhibhūtameva cittaṃ bhavaṅganti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1655_0: 468-73. Avijjamāne kārake kathaṃ kassaci nirāvajjanappavattikassa sāvajjanabhāvenāti
tika-abh08t0:1655_1: codanaṃ sandhāya cittaniyāmanibbattametanti dassetuṃ “utubījaniyāmo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1655_2: Utubījaniyāmo cāti utuniyāmo ceva bījaniyāmo ca, utusabhāvaniyāmo bījasabhāvaniyāmoti
tika-abh08t0:1655_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Kammadhammānaṃ niyāmo eva kammadhammaniyāmatā. Ekappahārenāti taṃ taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1655_4: utusamayamanatikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kāle. Phalapupphādīti ādi-saddena pallavādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1655_5: saṅgaho. Sabbesanti tasmiṃ samaye phalādinibbattanakānaṃ sabbesaṃ. Taṃtaṃtulyaphalubbhavoti
tika-abh08t0:1655_6: tehi tehi bījehi sadisānaṃ phalānaṃ nibbatti, tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ anurūpaphalanibbattīti
tika-abh08t0:1655_9: ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti. Chiddattanti chiddavantabhāvo, chiddaṃyeva vā. Bījajoti
tika-abh08t0:1655_10: bījasambhavo niyāmo. Yato detīti yato yato paccayabhāvaniyāmato deti. Ayanti ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1655_11: attano anurūpassa, sadisassa, visadisassa ca phalassa nibbattane niyāmo. Apica –
tika-abh08t0:1660_0: Imissā gāthāya aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgataṃ tiṇakalāpassa gahitaaggino uṭṭhahitvā ākāse
tika-abh08t0:1660_1: gacchato kākassa gīvāya paṭimuccanaṃ, nāvikassa bhariyāya vālukaghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bandhitvā
tika-abh08t0:1660_2: samuddudake pakkhipanaṃ, pabbatakūṭassa patitvā leṇe vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dvārapidahananti
tika-abh08t0:1660_4: paṭisandhiggahaṇe ceva mātukucchito nikkhamane ca, nidassanamattañcetaṃ abhisambodhidhammacakkappavattanādīsupi
tika-abh08t0:1660_7: tadā pātubhūtaṃ sabbaṃ acchariyaṃ. Uppattāvajjanādīnanti “tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ hohi, tvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1660_8: dassana”ntiādinā niyuñjakassa abhāvepi taṃtaṃkiccavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ uppatti.
tika-abh08t0:1661_0: 474. Hadaye andhakāro viyāti hadayandhakāro, sammohoti attho, tassa viddhaṃsanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1672_0: Aṭṭhakathāya āgatamātikāya vasena pakiṇṇakanayaṃ dassetuṃ “idāni panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1672_1: Tattha manasanti cittānaṃ. “Mānasa”ntipi paṭhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Panthamakkaṭakoti
tika-abh08t0:1672_2: pāṇakapaṭaṅgādīnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne jālaṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ maggarakkhaṇato “panthamakkaṭako”ti
tika-abh08t0:1672_3: laddhanāmo uṇṇanābhi. Disāsu pana pañcasūti upametabbānaṃ pañcapasādānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1672_4: Tatthāti magge, tattha jālamajjheti vā sambandho. Suttaṃ pasāretvāti jālabandhanamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1673_0: 478-80. Nti rudhiramāha. Disāsu dutiyādīsu sutte…pe… ghaṭṭiteti sambandho. “Pasādā
tika-abh08t0:1673_1: pañca daṭṭhabbā”tiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Cittaṃ…pe… viyāti hadayavatthuṃ nissāya pavattamānacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1674_0: 482-5. Pasādaghaṭṭananti pasāde ghaṭṭitaṃ. Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭananti bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭentaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1674_1: Dhammato aññā kāci kiriyā nāma natthīti dhammameva calanena saha upameti. Suttānusāraṃvāti
tika-abh08t0:1674_2: suttānusārena gamanaṃ viya. Javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanato tassa pavatti yūsapānena
tika-abh08t0:1674_3: saddhiṃ upametvā vuttā. Vatthuṃyevāti yathā purimacittāni hadayavatthunissitāni pasādavatthuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1674_4: anugatāni aññārammaṇāni ca honti, na evaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. Taṃ pana vatthārammaṇantararahitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1674_5: kevalaṃ hadayavatthumeva nissāya pavattatīti dīpeti. Parivattananti puna bhavaṅgabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1674_6: parivattanaṃ. Bhavaṅgāvajjanādīnaṃ dhammato bhedepi santativasena ekattaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:1675_0: 486-90. Upamā eva opammaṃ. Tato pasādavatthuto cittāti sambandho. Dīpitaṃ iminā opammena.
tika-abh08t0:1675_1: Ekekārammaṇanti rūpādīsu pañcasu ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Sabbasoti sabbesu cakkhādīsu yattha
tika-abh08t0:1675_2: katthacīti attho. Idāni ekekārammaṇassa dvīsu dvīsu āpāthagamanaṃ pakāsetuṃ “rūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1675_3: cakkhupasādamhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khe ākāse gacchatīti khago, pakkhi. Sākhinoti rukkhassa.
tika-abh08t0:1676_0: 492-3. Rūpassāti sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ, tassa pana ghaṭṭanaṃ, āpāthagamanampi cāti
tika-abh08t0:1676_1: dvīhi saha sambandho. Pasādassāti kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ, atthato āpāthagamanampi
tika-abh08t0:1676_2: cāti sambandho. Ārammaṇavasena, āpāthaṃ āgacchantassapi pasādaghaṭṭanena ca bhavaṅgacalanassa
tika-abh08t0:1677_0: 494-5. Tatoti bhavaṅgacalanato paraṃ, kusalaṃ javanaṃ cittanti kāmāvacarakusalajavanacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1677_1: Akusalameva vāti vā-saddena kiriyābyākatacittampi saṅgaṇhāti. Ettha siyā – ko panetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1677_2: javanaṃ kusalatāya vā akusalatāya vā niyametīti? Yonisomanasikāro ceva ayonisomanasikāro
tika-abh08t0:1677_3: ca. Yassa hi catucakkasampadāvasena yonisomanasikāro pavattati, āvajjanaṃ, voṭṭhabbanañca
tika-abh08t0:1677_4: yonisova āvaṭṭeti, vavatthāpeti ca, tassa akusaluppatti natthi. Yassa pana vuttavipariyāyena
tika-abh08t0:1677_5: ayonisomanasikāro ca hoti, āvajjanaṃ, voṭṭhabbanañca ayoniso ca āvaṭṭeti, vavatthāpeti
tika-abh08t0:1677_6: ca, tassa kusalajavanuppatti natthi, tasmā yonisomanasikāro kusalatāya, ayonisomanasikāro
tika-abh08t0:1677_7: akusalatāya ca niyametīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiriyājavanaṃ pana arahattameva niyameti. Keci
tika-abh08t0:1677_8: pana “kiriyājavanaṃ pana manasikāro ca niyameti. Yathā hi āvajjanaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1677_9: visuṃ visuṃ paccayo hoti, evaṃ kiriyājavanassāpī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1678_0: 497. Dovārikopamādīnīti ettha eko rājā sayanagato niddāyati, tassa paricārako pāde
tika-abh08t0:1678_1: parimajjanto nisīdi, badhiradovāriko dvāre ṭhito, tayo paṭihārā sayanassa, dvārassa
tika-abh08t0:1678_2: ca majjhe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā. Atheko paccantavāsī manusso paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya dvāraṃ ākoṭesi,
tika-abh08t0:1678_3: badhiradovāriko saddaṃ na suṇāti, pādaparimajjako saññaṃ akāsi, tāya saññāya dvāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1678_4: vivaritvā passi, paṭhamapaṭihāro paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā dutiyassa adāsi, dutiyo tatiyassa,
tika-abh08t0:1678_5: tatiyo rañño, rājā paribhuñji. Tattha rājā viya javanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, pādaparimajjako
tika-abh08t0:1678_6: viya āvajjanaṃ, badhiradovāriko viya cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tayo paṭihārā viya sampaṭicchanādīni
tika-abh08t0:1678_7: tīṇi vīthicittāni, paccantavāsino paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya dvārākoṭanaṃ viya ārammaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1678_8: pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ, pādaparimajjakena saññāya dinnakālo viya kiriyāmanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa
tika-abh08t0:1678_9: āvaṭṭitakālo, tena dinnasaññāya badhiradovārikassa dvāravivarakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1678_10: ārammaṇe dassanakiccasādhanakālo, paṭhamapaṭihārena paṇṇākārassa gahitakālo viya
tika-abh08t0:1678_11: vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo, paṭhamena dutiyassa dinnakālo viya
tika-abh08t0:1678_12: vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo, dutiyena tatiyassa dinnakālo
tika-abh08t0:1678_13: viya kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo, tatiyena rañño dinnakālo
tika-abh08t0:1678_14: viya voṭṭhabbanena javanassa niyyātitakālo, rañño paribhogakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanakāloti ayaṃ dovārikopamā.
tika-abh08t0:1679_0: “Idaṃ pana opammaṃ kiṃ dīpetī”tiādi ucchuyantūpamāya vuttanayena veditabbā. Sambahulā
tika-abh08t0:1679_1: gāmadārakā antaravīthiyaṃ paṃsuṃ kīḷanti, tatthekassa hatthe kahāpaṇo paṭihaññi.
tika-abh08t0:1679_2: So “mayhaṃ hatthe paṭihataṃ, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āha. Atheko “paṇḍaraṃ eta”nti āha.
tika-abh08t0:1679_3: Aparo saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gaṇhi. Añño “puthulaṃ caturassaṃ eta”nti āha. Aparo “kahāpaṇo
tika-abh08t0:1679_4: eso”ti āha. Atha āharitvā mātu adaṃsu, sā kamme upanesi. Tattha sambahulānaṃ dārakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1679_5: antaravīthiyaṃ kīḷantānaṃ sannisinnakālo viya cittappavatti daṭṭhabbā, kahāpaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1679_6: hatthe paṭihatakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo, “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vuttakālo
tika-abh08t0:1679_7: viya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyāmanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo, “paṇḍaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1679_8: eta”nti vuttakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccassa sādhitakālo, saha paṃsunā
tika-abh08t0:1679_9: gāḷhaṃ gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo, “puthulaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1679_10: caturassaṃ eta”nti vuttakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_11: “kahāpaṇo eso”ti vuttakālo viya kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_12: mātarā kamme upanītakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ veditabbanti ayaṃ gāmadārakopamā.
tika-abh08t0:1680_0: Idaṃ opammaṃ kiṃ dīpeti? Kiriyāmanodhātu adisvāva bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, vipākamanodhātu
tika-abh08t0:1680_1: adisvāva sampaṭicchati, vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu adisvāva santīreti, kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh08t0:1680_2: adisvāva vavatthāpeti, javanaṃ adisvāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati, ekantena pana cakkhuviññāṇameva
tika-abh08t0:1680_3: dassanakiccaṃ sādhetīti dīpeti. Jaccandhapīṭhasappīupamā upari āgamissati.
tika-abh08t0:1681_2: vātapittādīhi anupahatabhāvena ca. Vātapittādiupahatampi hi cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayabhāvānupagamanato
tika-abh08t0:1681_3: sambhinnameva nāma hoti, pañcindriyānaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva nissayabhāvūpagamanato khaṇavasena

tika-abh08t0:1703_5: na deti paṭṭhāne nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayassa anuddhaṭattā”ti, taṃ tesaṃ abhinivesamattamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1704_0: Yadi ca te vadeyyuṃ – yathā “vipākadhammadhammā”ti ettha vipāka-saddena vipākārahatā
tika-abh08t0:1704_1: vuccati, evaṃ idhāpi uddhaccasahagatānaṃ vipākārahataṃ sandhāya “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇa”nti
tika-abh08t0:1704_2: vuttaṃ. Yathā saddhindriyavinimuttassa adhimuccanaṭṭhassa abhāvepi saddhindriyassa
tika-abh08t0:1704_3: adhimuccanasattivisesaṃ gahetvā saddhindriyadhammo adhimuccanaṭṭho atthoti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1704_4: evamidhāpi dhammavinimuttassa vipākārahabhāvassa abhāvepi dhammānameva vipākārahasāmatthiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1704_5: gahetvā tassa atthibhāvo vutto. Yadi ca te pavattivipākaṃ dadeyyuṃ, yathā –
tika-abh08t0:1705: “Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo, nānakkhaṇikā”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1706_0: Pavattivipākassapi vasena nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayo vutto, evametthāpi nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1706_1: vattabbo siyā. Na hi labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ atthīti tasmā yathādhammasāsane
tika-abh08t0:1706_2: avacanampi abhāvameva dīpeti. Apica yadi uddhaccasahagatassa pavattivipākadānaṃ adhippetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1706_3: siyā, tadā “anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa na kammapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1706_4: paccayo”ti paṭisedho na kātabbo siyā. Na hi ṭhapetvā uddhaccaṃ añño koci anupādinnupādāniyo
tika-abh08t0:1706_5: dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamattho atthīti, tayidametesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1706_6: abhilāpamattaṃ. Tathā hi yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ “vipākārahabhāvaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ vipāketi
tika-abh08t0:1706_7: vutta”nti, tadeva tassa vipākasabbhāvaṃ dīpeti. Na hi vipākārahabhāve sati abhiññādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1706_8: viya tassa avipākatāya kāraṇaṃ atthīti. Yampi vuttaṃ “nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayassa
tika-abh08t0:1706_9: avacanaṃ vipākabhāvaṃ dīpetī”ti, tampi na sundaraṃ, labbhamānassāpi katthaci kenaci
tika-abh08t0:1706_10: adhippāyena avacanato. Tathā hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ labbhamānampi hadayavatthu na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1706_11: Tasmā yadi pavattivipākaṃ sandhāya nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vucceyya, tadā paṭisandhivipākadānampissa
tika-abh08t0:1706_13: na vuttoti. Yaṃ pana anupādinnupādāniyassa upādinnupādāniyaṃ pati kammapaccayapaṭikkhepavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1706_14: taṃ abhiññākusalādike sandhāyāti na ettāvatā uddhaccasahagatassa pavattivipākadānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1706_15: sabbathāpi paṭikkhipituṃ sakkāti. Yampi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yathā ca abhiññācetanā, evamuddhaccacetanāpi
tika-abh08t0:1706_16: ‘saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa’nti ettha apanetabbā”ti vuttaṃ, tampi uddhaccacetanāya tattha
tika-abh08t0:1706_17: niddisiyamānāya yathā itarā paṭisandhipavattivasena duvidhassapi vipākaviññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1706_18: paccayo, evamuddhaccacetanāpīti gaṇheyyunti vuttaṃ, na tassa pavattivipākābhāvatoti.
tika-abh08t0:1707_0: Ācariyabuddhamittādayo pana uddhaccasahagataṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā ekassa ubhayavipākadānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1707_1: ekassa sabbathāpi vipākābhāvaṃ vaṇṇenti. Tesañhi ayaṃ vinicchayo – atthi uddhaccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_2: bhāvanāyapahātabbampi, atthi nabhāvanāyapahātabbampi. Tesu bhāvanāyapahātabbaṃ sekhasantānappavattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1707_3: itaraṃ puthujjanasantānappavattaṃ. Phaladānañca puthujjanasantāne pavattasseva, netarassa.
tika-abh08t0:1707_4: Tathā hi dassanabhāvanānaṃ abhāvepi yesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ, sekhānañca dassanabhāvanāhi
tika-abh08t0:1707_5: bhavitabbaṃ, tesaṃ taduppattikāle tāhi pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā akusalā “dassanenapahātabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1707_6: bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti ca vuccanti. Puthujjanānaṃ pana bhāvanāya abhāvato bhāvanāyapahātabbacintā
tika-abh08t0:1707_7: natthi, tena tesaṃ pavattamānā te dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyāpi “bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1707_8: na vuccanti. Yadi vucceyyuṃ, dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kesañci keci
tika-abh08t0:1707_9: kadāci ārammaṇārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapaccayehi paccayā bhaveyyuṃ. Sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnañhi
tika-abh08t0:1707_10: kesañci sakkāyadiṭṭhādayo keci atītādīsu kismiñci kāle ārammaṇādhipatiupanissayehi
tika-abh08t0:1707_11: paccayā hontīti natthi, na ca paṭṭhāne “dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_12: kenaci paccayena paccayo”ti vuttā, tasmā natthi puthujjanesu pavattamānānamakusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_13: bhāvanāyapahātabbapariyāyo. Yadi tattha avacanameva pamāṇaṃ, evaṃ sati sekhasantānapavattānampi
tika-abh08t0:1707_14: akusalānaṃ bhāvanāyapahātabbapariyāyo natthīti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, sekhasantānappavattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_15: bhāvanāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā. Teneva ca kiñci katvā sekhānaṃ dassanenapahātabbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_16: akusalānaṃ pahīnabhāvena assādanābhinandanānaṃ vatthūni na honti. Pahīnatāya eva
tika-abh08t0:1707_17: somanassassa hetubhūtā, avikkhepahetubhūtā ca na domanassaṃ, uddhaccañca uppādentīti
tika-abh08t0:1707_18: na tesaṃ ārammaṇārammaṇādhipatipakatūpanissayabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Na hi pahīnakilese
tika-abh08t0:1707_19: upanissāya ariyā rāgadosavikkhepe uppādenti. Vuttañca “sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā
tika-abh08t0:1707_20: pahīnā, te kilese na puneti, na pacceti, na paccāgacchatīti sugato, sakadāgāmi…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1707_21: arahattamaggena…pe… sugato”ti. Puthujjanānaṃ pana dassanena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanena
tika-abh08t0:1707_22: pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayā na hontīti na sakkā vattuṃ, “diṭṭhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_23: assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1707_24: uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, vicikicchaṃ ārabbha vicikicchā uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1707_25: uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ uddhaccārammaṇabhāvassa vuttattā. Ettha
tika-abh08t0:1707_26: hi uddhaccanti uddhaccasahagataṃ cittuppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na dassanenapahātabbesupi
tika-abh08t0:1707_27: labbhamānacetasikaṃ uddhaccaṃ. Evañca katvā adhipatipaccayaniddese “diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_28: katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti ettakameva
tika-abh08t0:1707_29: vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti, tasmā sekhasantānappavattānamakusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_30: dassanenapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayattābhāvato puthujjanānaṃ santāneva
tika-abh08t0:1707_31: dassanenapahātabbānamakusalānaṃ paccayā na hontīti na sakkā vattunti paṭṭhāne dassanenapahātabbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_34: bhāvanāyapahātabbapariyāyabhāvaṃ na sādheti, tasmā dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_35: atītādibhāvena navattabbattepi yādisānaṃ tāhi anuppattidhammatā āpādetabbā, te puthujjanesu
tika-abh08t0:1707_36: pavattamānā dassanena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanamaggāpekkhāya tadappavattiyampi dassanenapahātabbā
tika-abh08t0:1707_37: nāma. Sekhesu pavattamānā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā tadappavattiyampi tadapekkhāya
tika-abh08t0:1707_38: bhāvanāyapahātabbā nāma. Dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyā pana puthujjanesu pavattamānā
tika-abh08t0:1707_39: heṭṭhā vuttanayena nevadassanenapahātabbā nabhāvanāyapahātabbā, tesu bhāvanāyapahātabbā
tika-abh08t0:1707_40: sahāyavirahato vipākaṃ na janenti. Tathā hi tesaṃ dassanenapahātabbasaṅkhātaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_42: vutto. Apekkhitabbadassanabhāvanārahitānaṃ pana puthujjanesu uppajjamānānaṃ sakabhaṇḍe
tika-abh08t0:1707_44: anupacchinnatāya aparikkhīṇasahāyānaṃ vipākuppādanaṃ na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti uddhaccasahagatadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1708_2: vuttattā, appahātabbaviruddhasabhāvattā ca akusalānaṃ. Yadi evaṃ te imasmiṃ tike
tika-abh08t0:1708_3: navattabbāti vattabbā āpajjantīti? Nāpajjanti, cittuppādakaṇḍe dassitānaṃ dvādasākusalacittuppādānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1708_4: dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā. Yathā hi uppannattike dhammavasena sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1708_5: saṅgahitattā kālavasena asaṅgahitāpi atītā “navattabbā”ti na vuttā cittuppādānurūpena
tika-abh08t0:1708_6: saṅgahitesu navattabbassa abhāvā, evaṃ idhāpi cittuppādabhāvena saṅgahitesu navattabbassa
tika-abh08t0:1708_7: abhāvā “navattabbā”ti na vuttā. Sabbena sabbañhi dhammavasena asaṅgahitassa tikadukesu
tika-abh08t0:1708_8: navattabbatāpatti. Yattha hi cittuppādo koci niyogato navattabbo atthi, tattha tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1708_9: catuttho koṭṭhāso atthīti yathāvuttapadesu viya tatthāpi bhinditvā bhājetabbe cittuppāde
tika-abh08t0:1709_0: Atha vā yathā sappaṭighehi samānasabhāvattā rūpadhātuyaṃ “tayo mahābhūtā sappaṭighā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1709_1: vuttā, yathāha “asaññasattānaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūta”nti, evaṃ puthujjanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1709_3: navattabbatāpasaṅgo. Evañca sati puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānāpi bhāvanāyapahātabbā sakabhaṇḍe
tika-abh08t0:1709_4: chandarāgādayo parabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ upanissayapaccayo, rāgo ca rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1709_5: adhipatipaccayoti ayamattho laddho hoti. Teneva hi –
tika-abh08t0:1710: “Bhāvanāyapahātabbo dhammo dassanenapahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo, ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1711: Imissā niddese dassanenapahātabbānaṃ upanissayapaccayabhāvīdhamme niddisantena bhagavatā –
tika-abh08t0:1712_0: “Pakatūpanissayo – patthanaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati…pe… saṅghaṃ bhindati, bhāvanāyapahātabbo
tika-abh08t0:1712_1: rāgo doso moho māno patthanā dassanenapahātabbassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa mānassa
tika-abh08t0:1712_2: diṭṭhiyā patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgo parabhaṇḍe
tika-abh08t0:1712_3: chandarāgassa upa…pe… sakapariggahe chandarāgo parapariggahe chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1714_0: Evampi yathā aphoṭṭhabbattā rūpadhātuyaṃ tayo mahābhūtā na paramatthato sappaṭighā,
tika-abh08t0:1714_1: evaṃ apekkhitabbabhāvanārahitā puthujjanesu pavattamānā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo
tika-abh08t0:1714_2: pana paramatthato bhāvanāya pahātabbāti bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayatā
tika-abh08t0:1714_3: na vuttā, na ca “dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayo”ti
tika-abh08t0:1714_4: vuttā. Ye hi dassanenapahātabbapaccayā kilesā, na te dassanato uddhaṃ pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1714_6: kataṃ, na tassa koci bhāvo dassanena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditoti tassa ekantabhāvanāyapahātabbatā
tika-abh08t0:1714_7: vuttā, tasmā uddhaccabhāvena ekasabhāvasseva tassa sati sahāye vipākuppādanavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1714_8: asati ca vipākānuppādanavacanaṃ na virujjhati. Tayidaṃ sabbametesaṃ ācariyānaṃ ahopurisikāramattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1714_9: Kasmā? Uddhaccasahagatassa ekantabhāvanāyapahātabbabhāvena vuttattā. Evañhi vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1714_10: bhagavatā “katame dhammā bhāvanāyapahātabbā. Uddhaccasahagato cittuppādo”ti. Yadi
tika-abh08t0:1714_11: ca uddhaccasahagataṃ nabhāvanāyapahātabbaṃ abhavissa, yathā atītārammaṇattike “niyogā
tika-abh08t0:1714_12: anāgatārammaṇā natthī”ti vatvā vibhajja vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi “niyogā bhāvanāyapahātabbā
tika-abh08t0:1714_13: natthī”ti vatvā “uddhaccasahagato siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbo siyā navattabbo ‘dassanenapahātabbo’tipi
tika-abh08t0:1714_14: ‘bhāvanāyapahātabbo’tipī”tiādi vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca tathā vuttaṃ. Yā ca “tamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1714_15: paṭipādentehi yadi vucceyyu”ntiādinā yutti vuttā, sāpi ayutti. Kasmā? Dassanenapahātabbārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1714_16: rāgadiṭṭhivicikicchāuddhaccānaṃ tena tena pahātabbabhāvavasena icchitattā. Yañca
tika-abh08t0:1714_18: uddhaccassa anuddharaṇaṃ kāraṇavasena vuttaṃ, tampi akāraṇaṃ aññatthāpi sāvasesapāṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1714_19: dassanato. Tathā hi “atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa, anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa
tika-abh08t0:1714_20: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅge cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ katvā
tika-abh08t0:1714_21: “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassā”ti imassa vibhaṅge labbhamānampi cetopariyañāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1714_22: na gahitaṃ. Yampi bhāvanāyapahātabbassa vipākadānamhi dassanenapahātabbassa sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1714_23: vuttaṃ, tampi vicāretabbaṃ – kiṃ avijjādi viya dānasīlādīnaṃ upapattiyaṃyeva vipākadānasāmatthiyā
tika-abh08t0:1714_24: ṭhānavasena dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hoti, udāhu
tika-abh08t0:1714_25: kileso viya kammassa paṭisandhidānamhīti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva purimo nayo, sekhasantāne
tika-abh08t0:1714_27: dānādi viya sahāyavekallena avipākasabhāvataṃ āpannattā. Atha dutiyo, bhāvanāyapahātabbattena
tika-abh08t0:1714_28: abhimatassāpi dassanenapahātabbabhāvo āpajjati, paṭisandhidāne sati apāyagamanīyasabhāvānativattanato,
tika-abh08t0:1714_29: tasmā amhehi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva uddhaccasahagatassa vipākadānaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1714_30: na yesaṃ kesañci vacanaṃ. Paṭṭhānānusārīhi bhavitabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:1715_0: 537-8. Yanti yaṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ. Karaṇamattattāti karaṇamattameva ṭhapetvā phaladānābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1715_1: Vātapupphasamanti moghapupphasamaṃ, yathā taṃ paṭhamasañjātaṃ acchinnamūlepi rukkhe
tika-abh08t0:1715_2: nibbattaṃ purimehi adinnaphalattā phalanibbattakaṃ na hoti, evamidaṃ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi
tika-abh08t0:1715_3: santāne nibbattaṃ anāsevanabhāvena phaladāyakaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Javanattaṃ tu
tika-abh08t0:1715_4: sampattanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ khīṇāsavāveṇikaṃ viññāṇamāha. Kiccasādhanatoti bhavataṇhāmūlassa
tika-abh08t0:1715_6: vā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā hi chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ pupphanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t0:1715_7: aphalameva hoti, evametampi taṃtaṃkiccasādhanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā samucchinnabhavataṇhāmūle
tika-abh08t0:1716_0: 539-40. Paṭiccāti hetudhammassa paṭimukhaṃ gantvā taṃ apaccakkhāya. Etīti pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1716_1: tiṭṭhati uppajjati vāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Etī”ti hi idaṃ uppattiṭṭhitīnaṃ sādhāraṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1716_2: pavattiparidīpakaṃ. Tenevāha “ṭhitiyuppattiyāpi vā”ti. Ekacco hi paccayo ṭhitiyā
tika-abh08t0:1716_3: eva upakārako hoti yathā pacchājātapaccayo, ekacco uppattiyā eva yathā anantarādiko,
tika-abh08t0:1716_4: ekacco ubhayassa yathā hetuādayo. Evaṃ paccaya-saddassa vacanatthaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-abh08t0:1716_5: paccayalakkhaṇaṃ dassento āha “yo dhammo”tiādi. Yoti hetudhammo. Yassāti yassa phaladhammassa.
tika-abh08t0:1716_6: Ṭhitiyuppattiyāpi vāti ṭhititthaṃ, uppattitthaṃ vā. Ṭhitiyāti vā ṭhitikkhaṇe, uppattiyāti
tika-abh08t0:1716_7: uppādakkhaṇe. Yassa dhammassa upakāro, yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyuppattiyāti vā sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1716_9: pariyāyadassanaṃ. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo. Tathā pabhavo. Hinoti patiṭṭhāti
tika-abh08t0:1716_10: etthāti hetu. Anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ hi-saddo mūla-saddo viya patiṭṭhattho veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1716_11: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1716_12: phalaṃ gacchati, vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ āpajjatīti hetu. Attano phalaṃ karotīti kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1716_13: Paccayo matoti paccayova “sambhavo”tiādito mato. Atthato ete samānā, byañjanamattaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1717_0: 541-5. Evaṃ paṭṭhāne āgatasabbapaccayānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena atthaṃ vatvā idhādhippetassa
tika-abh08t0:1717_1: hetupaccayasseva sarūpaṃ dassetuṃ “lobhādi pana yo dhammo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mūlaṭṭhenāti
tika-abh08t0:1717_3: tesameva āveṇikabhāvena ete chaḷeva. Jātitoti kusalākusalābyākatajātito. Navadhāti
tika-abh08t0:1717_4: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetūti navadhā. Dhammānaṃ…pe… sādhakoti
tika-abh08t0:1717_5: yathā sālivīhibījādīni sālivīhiādibhāvassa sādhakāni, maṇiādipabhāvatthūnañca nīlādivaṇṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1717_6: nīlādimaṇipabhāya sādhakāni, evaṃ hetupaccayo yathārahaṃ attano sampayuttānaṃ kusalādittasādhakoti
tika-abh08t0:1717_8: ayamettha attho. Eke ācariyāti revatācariyaṃ, tassa sissānusisse ca sandhāyāha. Atha
tika-abh08t0:1717_9: vā garumhi bahuvacanampi yujjatīti revatācariyameva sandhāya “eke ācariyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1718_0: Evaṃ santeti yadi mūlaṭṭho kusalādibhāvasādhako, evaṃ sati. Yathā cittaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1718_1: paccayo hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpīti āha “taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpisū”ti, hetusamuṭṭhānarūpesūti
tika-abh08t0:1718_2: attho. Neva sampajjatīti na sijjhati, “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca
tika-abh08t0:1718_3: rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti vutto hetupaccayabhāvo na sampajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1718_4: Yathā kusalākusalā hetū taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa kusalādibhāvāya na pariyattā, evaṃ abyākatopi
tika-abh08t0:1718_5: hetu taṃsamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa abyākatabhāvāya na pariyatto. Sabhāvena hi taṃ abyākatanti
tika-abh08t0:1718_6: āha “na hī”tiādi. Yadi kusalādibhāvaṃ na sādhenti, paccayāpi na hontīti vadeyyāti
tika-abh08t0:1718_7: āha “na tesa”ntiādi. “Hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1718_8: hetupaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato te alobhādayo tesaṃ rūpānaṃ paccayā na na honti, bhavantevāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1719_0: 546-7. Na gantabboti na paccetabbo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadi kusalādihetuyo attano
tika-abh08t0:1719_1: viya attahetukānaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhenti, kusalākusalahetupaccayasambhūtā
tika-abh08t0:1719_2: rūpadhammāpi te viya kusalādayo siyuṃ, hetuyo vā rūpānaṃ paccayā na siyuṃ, na ca
tika-abh08t0:1719_3: panetaṃ ubhayampi atthi, tasmā kusalādīnaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhako mūlaṭṭhoti na viññātabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:1719_4: Apica yadi hetupaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, tadā abyākatabhāvopi tappaṭibaddho siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1719_5: ahetukānaṃ abyākatabhāvo na sijjhati. Yadi ca hetupaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, hetūnampi
tika-abh08t0:1719_6: kusalādibhāvo appaṭibaddho siyā. Atha tesampi sesahetupaṭibaddho, evampi momūhacittasampayuttassa
tika-abh08t0:1719_7: hetuno akusalabhāvo na sijjheyya. Atha tassa so aññahetuko siyā, evaṃ sati sesahetūnampi
tika-abh08t0:1719_8: taṃhetukova siyā. Yathā ca sesahetūnaṃ, evaṃ avasesasampayuttadhammānampi taṃhetukova
tika-abh08t0:1719_9: siyā. Atha siyā hetūnaṃ sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo, sampayuttānaṃ pana hetupaṭibaddhoti,
tika-abh08t0:1719_10: evaṃ sati alobho kusalo vā siyā abyākato vā. Yadi hi so sabhāvato kusalo, taṃsabhāvattā
tika-abh08t0:1719_11: abyākato na siyā. Atha abyākato, taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1719_12: viya. Yasmā pana ubhayathāpi hoti, tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu saddhādīsu sampayuttesu
tika-abh08t0:1719_13: hetupaṭibaddhaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ pariyesatha, na sabhāvato, evaṃ hetūsupi kusalāditā
tika-abh08t0:1719_14: aññapaṭibaddhā pariyesitabbā, na sabhāvato. Sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā
tika-abh08t0:1719_15: hotīti hetūsu viya hetusampayuttadhammesupi yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1720: “Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1721_1: dhammānaṃ sammā patiṭṭhitabhāvassa thirabhāvassa sādhanena. Laddhahetupaccayā hi
tika-abh08t0:1721_2: dhammā viruḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā, ahetukā tilabījādisevālā
tika-abh08t0:1723_0: 550-1. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ abhāvato attanā sampayuttānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1723_1: kaṭattārūpānameva ca paccayabhāvoti āha “attanā…pe… jātāna”nti. Kammassa katattā
tika-abh08t0:1723_2: eva ca upacitattā ca na issarādihetuno sambhūtāni rūpāni kaṭattārūpāni, kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānīti
tika-abh08t0:1723_3: attho, kaṭattārūpāneva jātāni bhūtāni nibbattānīti kaṭattārūpajātāni. Tathevāti yathā
tika-abh08t0:1723_4: paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ, evanti attho. Cittajānañcāti ca-saddena “attanā sampayuttāna”nti ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh08t0:1724: 553. Lokuttaravipākānaṃ paṭisandhivasena appavattanato natthi kammasamuṭṭhānassa paccayabhāvoti āha “cittajāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1725_1: sambhavākāro vā. Sañjātasukhahetunāti sañjātañāṇena, sampajaññenāti attho. Ñāṇañhi
tika-abh08t0:1725_2: “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādivacanato sukhaṃ hetu etassāti,
tika-abh08t0:1731_0: 556. Lokassa adhipati lokādhipati, sakalalokanāyakenāti attho. Attādhīnānaṃ patinoti
tika-abh08t0:1731_1: adhipatī. Chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvāti “chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1731_2: purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne cittuppāde chando jeṭṭhakabhūto
tika-abh08t0:1731_3: sampayuttadhamme vase vattamāno hutvā pavattati, sampayuttadhammā ca tassa vase pavattanti
tika-abh08t0:1731_4: hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanatoti āha “chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā”tiādi. Katvā dhuranti
tika-abh08t0:1731_5: sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. Chandādhipati nāma so vā cittuppādo chandādhipati
tika-abh08t0:1731_6: nāma “chando adhipati imassā”ti katvā. Esevāti “cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā…pe… kālasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1731_7: cittādhipati nāmā”tiādinā yathāvuttova nayo. Sesesūti cittādīsu. Ettha ca “chandaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1731_8: kālasmi”ntiādinā kālassa niyamitattā cattāropete ekakkhaṇe adhipatī na hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1731_9: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca
tika-abh08t0:1731_10: rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”tiādinā catunnampi adhipatīnaṃ paccayabhāvo visuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1731_11: visuṃyeva uddhaṭo. Yadi hi te ekakkhaṇeyeva adhipatipaccayā siyuṃ, tadā yathā hetupaccayaniddese
tika-abh08t0:1731_12: “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”ntiādinā avisesena vuttaṃ mūlaṭṭhena upakārakabhāvassa vijjamānena
tika-abh08t0:1731_13: dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇampi hetūnaṃ ekakkhaṇe paccayabhāvūpagamanato, evaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva bahūnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1731_15: vattabbaṃ siyā. Yasmā pana evaṃ avatvā “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakāna”ntiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1731_16: cattārova visesetvā vuttā, tasmā ekekadhammoyeva ekakkhaṇe adhipatipaccayo hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1732_0: Sobhanā mati, sobhanaṃ vā mataṃ etesaṃ atthīti sumatino, sammādiṭṭhikāti attho, tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1732_1: matiṃ vibodheti pabodhetīti sumatimativibodhanaṃ. Kucchitā mati, kucchitaṃ vā mataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1732_2: etesanti kumatino, micchādiṭṭhikā, tesaṃ matibhūtā matibhāvena parikappitattāti kumatimati,
tika-abh08t0:1732_3: micchādiṭṭhi, sāyeva indhanasadisatāya indhanaṃ tassa pāvakaṃ aggi viyāti kumati…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1732_4: pāvakaṃ. Atimadhuranti nipuṇagambhīrena attharasena ceva suvimalasakhilena byañjanarasena
tika-abh08t0:1732_5: ca madhuraṃ. Avedīti ogāhetvā jānāti. Yo yoti theranavamajjhimesu yo koci. Jinavacanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1732_6: sakalaṃ avedīti tepiṭakassapi sakalajinavacanassa gahaṇasamatthatāpaṭilābhena taṃ avagacchati.
tika-abh08t0:1738_1: puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti tayo saṅkhārā. Tattha punāti
tika-abh08t0:1738_2: attano santānaṃ apuññaphalato, dukkhasaṃkilesato ca sodheti, pujjaṃ bhavaphalaṃ nibbattetīti
tika-abh08t0:1738_3: vā puññaṃ, attano phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena abhisaṅkhāro cāti puññābhisaṅkhāro,
tika-abh08t0:1738_4: puññapaṭipakkhato apuññaṃ, vuttanayena abhisaṅkhāro cāti apuññābhisaṅkhāro. Samādhipaccanīkānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1738_5: atidūratāya na iñjati na kampatīti āneñjaṃ, taṃ abhisaṅkharotīti āneñjābhisaṅkhāro.
tika-abh08t0:1738_6: Tattha dānasīlādivasena pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā, bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā
tika-abh08t0:1738_7: rūpāvacarakusalacetanā cāti terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Pāṇātipātādivasena
tika-abh08t0:1738_8: pavattā dvādasa akusalacetanā apuññābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā catasso
tika-abh08t0:1738_9: arūpāvacarakusalacetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Bhavādīsu yathā paccayā, tathā yesañca
tika-abh08t0:1738_10: vipākānaṃ paccayā, tepi viññātabbāti sambandho. Keci pana “tepīti saṅkhārānaṃ gahaṇa”nti
tika-abh08t0:1738_11: vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, evaṃ sati “yesa”nti aniyamaniddesassa niyamakavacanābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1739_0: 562. Katame pana te bhavādayoti āha “tayo bhavā”tiādi. Tattha kāmarūpārūpavasena
tika-abh08t0:1739_2: ca tayo bhavā ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti. Catasso yoniyoti aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikavasena
tika-abh08t0:1739_3: cattāro sattanikāyā. Tattha bījakapāle nibbatto sattanikāyo aṇḍajayoni nāma. Mātugabbhe
tika-abh08t0:1739_5: uppajjanakasattanikāyo saṃsedajayoni nāma. Kutoci anuppajjitvā kevalaṃ tattha tattha
tika-abh08t0:1739_6: paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgo hutvā uppajjanakasattanikāyo opapātikayoni nāma. Gatipañcakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1739_7: heṭṭhā vibhāvitameva. Paṭisandhiviññāṇassa vatthubhūtā ca viññāṇakkhandhā cha viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo
tika-abh08t0:1739_8: nāma. Tā pana nānattakāyādivasena sattavidhāti āha “viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sattā”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1740_0: “Sattimā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. Katamā satta? Santi, bhikkhave, sattā nānattakāyā
tika-abh08t0:1740_1: nānattasaññino. Seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā, ayaṃ paṭhamā
tika-abh08t0:1740_2: viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Santi, bhikkhave, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino. Seyyathāpi devā
tika-abh08t0:1740_3: brahmakāyikā paṭhamābhinibbattā, ayaṃ dutiyā viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Santi, bhikkhave, sattā
tika-abh08t0:1740_4: ekattakāyā nānattasaññino. Seyyathāpi devā ābhassarā, ayaṃ tatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhiti.
tika-abh08t0:1740_5: Santi, bhikkhave, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino. Seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhā, ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1740_6: catutthī viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā
tika-abh08t0:1740_7: paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t0:1740_8: ayaṃ pañcamī viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma
tika-abh08t0:1740_9: ‘anantaṃ viññāṇa’nti viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā, ayaṃ chaṭṭhī viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Santi, bhikkhave,
tika-abh08t0:1740_10: sattā sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t0:1741_0: Ettha hi aparimāṇacakkavāḷavāsino manussā kāmāvacaradevā punabbasumātupiyaṅkaramātādayo
tika-abh08t0:1741_1: vinipātikāsurā ca kusalavipākapaṭisandhikā vemānikapetā ceti ime dīgharassakisathūlakāḷaodātādivaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena
tika-abh08t0:1741_2: rūpakāyassa, ahetuduhetutihetuvasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca nānābhāvato nānattakāyanānattasaññino
tika-abh08t0:1741_3: nāma, ayaṃ paṭhamā viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Paṭhamajjhānatalavāsino pana tayo devā uparūparivāsīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1741_4: vaṇṇādikamapekkhitvā attano vaṇṇādīnaṃ nihīnatāya rūpakāyassa nānābhāvato, paṭhamajjhānavipākaviññāṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1741_5: samānasaññitāya ca nānattakāyaekattasaññino nāma, ayaṃ dutiyā viññāṇaṭṭhiti, caturāpāyavāsinopi
tika-abh08t0:1741_7: ekasabhāvattā ca dutiyaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃyeva samodhānaṃ gacchantīti veditabbaṃ. Dutiyajjhānatalavāsino
tika-abh08t0:1741_8: tayo devā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena samānattā rūpakāyassa visesābhāvato pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyajjhānasaññāvasena
