tika-abh08t0:1741_9: paṭisandhisaññāya nānābhāvato ekattakāyanānattasaññino nāma, ayaṃ tatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhiti.
tika-abh08t0:1741_10: Tatiyajjhānatalavāsino pana tayo devā rūpakāyavasena samānattā, pañcakanaye catutthajjhānavipākasaññāvasena
tika-abh08t0:1741_11: paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekattā ekattakāyaekattasaññino nāma, ayaṃ catutthī viññāṇaṭṭhiti.
tika-abh08t0:1741_12: Vehapphalavāsino ceva pañca suddhāvāsavāsino ca vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena rūpakāyassa,
tika-abh08t0:1741_14: bhajanti. Ākāsānañcāyatanādayo tisso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo pāḷivaseneva pākaṭā. Asaññasattā
tika-abh08t0:1741_15: pana viññāṇābhāvena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavāsino ca saññāya viya viññāṇassa sukhumabhāveneva
tika-abh08t0:1741_16: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu na gahitā, sattānaṃ nivāsatāya pana “sattāvāsā”ti vuccanti. Evañca
tika-abh08t0:1741_17: katvā tehi satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo samodhānetvā nava sattāvāsā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1742_0: 563-4. Idāni evaṃ vuttesu bhavādīsu dvattiṃsavipākānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ abhisaṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1742_1: dassetuṃ “kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Navannaṃ pākacittānanti sahetukāhetukavasena
tika-abh08t0:1742_2: navannaṃ sugatipaṭisandhivipākacittānaṃ. Nānakkhaṇika…pe… paccayehi cāti kusalākusalakammassa
tika-abh08t0:1742_3: atītasseva attanā janetabbavipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayena, tesameva
tika-abh08t0:1742_4: balavakāraṇabhāvato upanissayapaccayena ca. Vuttañhi tassa upanissayattaṃ “kusalākusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1742_5: kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti. Sabbattha upanissayabhāvo balavakammavasena
tika-abh08t0:1742_6: yojetabbo. Dubbalañhi kammaṃ upanissayo na hotīti paṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ dassitametaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1743_1: pañcannaṃ. Duggatiyaṃ kusalavipākapaṭisandhiyā abhāvato āha “na honti paṭisandhiya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1743_2: Evaṃ paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ asaṅkaravasena paccayavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni samodhānetvā
tika-abh08t0:1743_3: dassetuṃ “hontī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Soḷasannaṃ pavatte, paṭisandhiyaṃ navannanti yathālābhavasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1744_1: Kasmā pana abhiññāya parivajjananti? Vipākadānābhāvato, tañca kho panassā vipākassa
tika-abh08t0:1744_2: asambhavato, na pana vipākuppādanasabhāvābhāvato. Yadi hi abhiññācetanā vipākaṃ uppādeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1744_3: aññabhūmikakammassa aññabhūmikavipākuppādanāyogato sabhūmikameva uppādeyya. Taṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1744_4: kiṃ navattabbārammaṇaṃ vā uppādeyya parittādiārammaṇaṃ vā? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva
tika-abh08t0:1744_5: navattabbārammaṇaṃ uppādeti, taṃ na yuttaṃ rūpāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantena kammasamānārammaṇatāya
tika-abh08t0:1744_6: dassitattā, abhiññācetanāya ca sayaṃ parittādiārammaṇattā. Atha parittādiārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1744_7: uppādeti, tampi na yujjati rūpāvacaravipākānaṃ ekanteneva navattabbārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1745_0: “Rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca catutthassa jhānassa
tika-abh08t0:1745_1: vipāko ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. Ime dhammā navattabbā ‘parittārammaṇā’tipi
tika-abh08t0:1746_0: Apica samādhivijjāsambhārabhūtā abhiññā samādhissa ānisaṃsamattaṃ samādhiphalasadisā.
tika-abh08t0:1746_2: nipphādanamattaphalā abhiññācetanā. Tenāha “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādi tasmā samādhissa
tika-abh08t0:1746_3: phalasadisā abhiññācetanā na ca phalaṃ deti, dānasīlānisaṃsabhūto tasmiṃ bhave paccayalābho
tika-abh08t0:1746_4: viya natthi tassa vipākuppādananti. Keci pana “samānabhūmikato āsevanalābhena balavantāni
tika-abh08t0:1746_5: jhānāni vipākaṃ uppādenti samāpattibhāvato, abhiññā pana satipi jhānabhāve tadabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1746_6: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āgantukāyevāti dubbalā, tasmā vipākaṃ na detī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1748: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccatī”ti. ;
tika-abh08t0:1749_1: Na hi parittaṃ laddhāsevanameva tattha vipākaṃ detīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1749_2: samānāsevane laddheyeva jhānassa vipākadānaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Apica punappunaṃ parikammavasena
tika-abh08t0:1749_3: abhiññāyapi vasibhāvasabbhāvā tassāpi ca balavabhāvo atthevāti vipākaṃ uppādeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1750_0: Pañcannaṃ pākacittānanti pañcannaṃ rūpāvacaravipākacittānaṃ. Māpuññasaṅkhārāti apuññābhisaṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t0:1750_1: “Ime apuññasaṅkhārā”ti vā padacchedo. Ekassāti ekassa akusalavipākasantīraṇassa.
tika-abh08t0:1750_2: Channanti santīraṇavajjānaṃ channaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ. Pavatte paccayā honti aniṭṭharūpādiāpāthāgateti
tika-abh08t0:1750_3: adhippāyo. Sugatiyaṃ akusalavipākapaṭisandhiyā abhāvato āha “na honti paṭisandhiya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1750_5: pana ekantato aniṭṭhārammaṇāni. Rūpabhave ca kathaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti āha
tika-abh08t0:1750_6: “so cā”tiādi. Soti so paccayabhāvo. “Kāmabhave”ti idaṃ aniṭṭharūpādīnaṃ visesanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1750_7: na pana “upaladdhiya”nti imassa. Tenāha “aniṭṭha…pe… na vijjare”ti. Keci pana “upaladdhiyanti
tika-abh08t0:1750_8: imasseva visesanabhāvena gahetvā brahmūnaṃ kāmabhavaṃ āgatakkhaṇe rūpādiupaladdhiya”nti
tika-abh08t0:1750_9: vadanti. Aniṭṭha…pe… na vijjare ekantasukhavatthubhūte tattha vokiṇṇasukhadukkhakāraṇassa abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1751: 576. “Evaṃ tāvā”tiādi yathāvuttassevatthassa appanaṃ. Yathā cāti ca-saddena “yesañcā”ti saṅgaṇhāti. Tathāti etthāpi “te”ti saṅgaṇhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1752_0: 577-81. Yattha vitthārappakāsanaṃ kataṃ, tato bhavato paṭṭhāya mukhamattappakāsanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1752_1: kātukāmo āha “tatrida”ntiādi. Tatrāti tesu bhavādīsu. Idanti nidassitabbabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1752_2: āsannapaccakkhamāha. Ādito pana paṭṭhāyāti bhavato paṭṭhāya. Avisesenāti kāmāvacararūpāvacaravasena
tika-abh08t0:1752_3: visesābhāvena terasa puññābhisaṅkhārā. Dvibhavesūti kāmarūpabhavesu. Kesañci manussānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1752_5: vuttaṃ. Nānatta…pe… ṭhitīsupīti aluttasamāsavasena vuttaṃ, nānattakāyanānattasaññādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1752_6: catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsūti attho. Vuttappakārasminti nānattakāyādike, puññābhisaṅkhārassa
tika-abh08t0:1752_7: bhavādīsu ekavīsativipākānaṃ ekāvatthāya paccayo ahutvā duggatipariyāpannesu bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
tika-abh08t0:1752_8: paṭisandhiṃ adatvā pavatteyeva aṭṭhannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato, kāmāvacarasugatipariyāpannesu
tika-abh08t0:1752_9: paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte soḷasannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato, rūpāvacarabhūmipariyāpannesu
tika-abh08t0:1752_10: paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte dasannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato vuttaṃ “yathāraha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1753_0: 582-3. Kāme bhave, rūpe bhaveti sambandho. Tīsu gatīsūti devamanussavajjesu tīsu
tika-abh08t0:1753_1: gatīsu. Ekissāti nānattakāyaekattasaññīsaṅkhātāya ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā. Ekasminti
tika-abh08t0:1754_0: 584-6. Ekārūpabhaveti ekasmiṃ arūpabhave. Ekissā yoniyāti ekissāyeva opapātikayoniyā.
tika-abh08t0:1754_1: Tīsu cittaṭṭhitīsūti ākāsānañcāyatanādīsu tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu. Sattāvāse catubbidheti
tika-abh08t0:1754_2: ākāsānañcāyatanādikeyeva catubbidhe sattāvāse. Vijānitabbā…pe… paccayāti saṅkhārā
tika-abh08t0:1754_3: yathā paccayā yesañca paccayā, tathā tepi viññātabbāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1755_0: 587-90. Nanu ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsupi vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvo vutto. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:1755_1: paṭisandhiyeva tāva na sakkā viññātuṃ. Yadi hi purimabhavato paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ idhāgacchatīti
tika-abh08t0:1755_2: vucceyya, taṃ na yuttaṃ, rūpārūpadhammānaṃ kesaggamattampi desantarasaṅkamanābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1755_3: Atha atītabhavanibbattasaṅkhārato na nibbattati, tampi na yujjati ahetukadosāpattitoti
tika-abh08t0:1755_4: iminā adhippāyena codento āha “na rūpārūpadhammāna”ntiādi. Ācariyo tassādhippāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1755_5: sampaṭicchitvā taṃ saññāpetukāmo āha “natthi cittassā”tiādi. Tato hetuṃ vināti tattha
tika-abh08t0:1755_7: avijjādisahakārīkāraṇasahitassa saṅkhārassa vasena suṭṭhu avekallato paṭiladdhapaccayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1755_9: rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ. Tenāha “na ca satto”tiādi. Bhavantara…pe… pavuccatīti vohāramattena
tika-abh08t0:1755_10: bhavantaramupetīti pavuccati. Atthato pana paccayasāmaggiyā bhavantarabhāvena uppajjanamattanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1756: 591. Idāni taṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ pākaṭāya manussapaṭisandhiyā vasena pakāsetuṃ samārabhanto āha “tayida”ntiādi. Sudubbudhanti atidubbijāniyaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:1759_0: 592-3. Āsannamaraṇassāti parūpakkamena vā āyukkhayādivasena vā samāsannamaraṇassa.
tika-abh08t0:1759_1: Sussamāneti anukkamena upasussamāne. Gabbhaseyyakassa āyatanānaṃ anupubbuppatti viya
tika-abh08t0:1759_2: nirodhopi anupubbato hotīti vuttaṃ “naṭṭhe cakkhundriyādike”ti. Keci pana “nānākammasamuṭṭhitesu
tika-abh08t0:1759_3: cakkhundriyādīsu naṭṭhesū”ti vadanti. “Hadaya…pe… ke”ti iminā sesakāye kāyindriyassa
tika-abh08t0:1759_4: niruddhabhāvo vuttoti ekakammasamuṭṭhitampi nassatevāti apare. Ānandācariyo pana
tika-abh08t0:1759_5: “yamake” yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, tassa manāyatanaṃ nirujjhatīti. Āmantā.
tika-abh08t0:1759_6: Yassa vā pana manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhatīti. Sacittakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1759_7: acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh08t0:1759_8: Sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanañca nirujjhati, cakkhāyatanañca nirujjhatī’tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1759_9: cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ cuticittena saha nirodho vuttoti cakkhundriyādīni cutito pubbe
tika-abh08t0:1759_10: na nassanti. Atimandabhāvūpagamanaṃ pana sandhāya aṭṭhakathāya ‘niruddhesu indriyesū’ti
tika-abh08t0:1759_11: vuttaṃ, na anavasesanirodhaṃ sandhāya. Pañcadvārikajavanānantarampi cuti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1759_12: dassitā”ti vadati. Hadayavatthumattasminti hadayavatthupadesamatte. Na hi hadayavatthuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1760_1: mandabhāvato vā hadayavatthumattasannissitaṃ. Cittanti tadā kammakammanimittādīni
tika-abh08t0:1760_2: ārabbha pavattajavanaviññāṇaṃ. Taṃ pana sugatiyaṃ nibbattamānassa kusalaṃ hoti, duggatiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1761_0: “Nimittassādagadhitaṃ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭhati anubyañjanassādagadhitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1761_1: vā, tasmiṃ ce samaye kālaṃ karoti, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati, yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1761_2: gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1763_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1763_1: kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:1763_2: honti, tena vuccati kusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā. Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā
tika-abh08t0:1763_3: tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati akusalamūlapaccayāpi
tika-abh08t0:1763_4: saṅkhārā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:1763_5: honti, tena vuccati nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi nāmarūpa”nti –
tika-abh08t0:1764_0: Nikantikkhaṇe hetudvayapaccayāpi sugatipaṭisandhikassa kathaṃ dassitāti? Nayidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1764_1: maraṇāsannajavanasampayuttahetuyo sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho katakammassa taṃ kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1764_2: ārabbha assādavasena pavattajavanasampayuttahetuyo sandhāya. Katūpacitampi hi kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1764_3: taṇhāya assāditaṃ vipākābhinipphādane samatthanti. Keci pana “kammakaraṇakāle appahīnāvatthāya
tika-abh08t0:1764_4: santāne anusayitahetuyo sandhāya nikantikkhaṇe dve hetuyoti vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1764_5: na yujjati, tesaṃ sahajātapaccayattāyogato. Pubbānusevitaṃ puññaṃ vā apuññameva vā
tika-abh08t0:1764_6: kammaṃ, kammanimittaṃ vā ālambitvā cittaṃ pavattatīti sambandho. Pubbānusevitanti
tika-abh08t0:1764_7: pubbe āsevitaṃ. “Katattā upacitattā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Taṇhāya anusevitabhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:1764_9: pubbe āsevitaṃ, pubbe dinnapaṭisandhikanti attho. Dinnapaṭisandhikampi pana aparajātīsu
tika-abh08t0:1764_10: pavattivipākaṃ na nibbattetīti natthi. Puññāpuññaggahaṇena yathākammaṃ sugatiduggatipaṭisandhīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1764_11: ārammaṇaṃ dasseti. Kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ vāti vā-saddena gatinimittaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1764_12: Tattha kammaṃ, gatinimittañca manodvāreyeva āpāthamāgacchati, kammanimittaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:1764_13: pañcadvārepi. Evañca katvā pañcadvāraggahitepi ārammaṇe paṭisandhi hoti. Apare pana
tika-abh08t0:1764_14: gatinimittampi chadvāresu labbhatīti vaṇṇenti. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ saccasaṅkhepe –
tika-abh08t0:1766_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “gatinimittaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatī”ti vuttattā, tadārammaṇāya
tika-abh08t0:1766_1: ca pañcadvārikapaṭisandhiyā adassitattā, mūlaṭīkādīsu ca “kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1766_2: vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya, dibbacakkhukassa viya ca manodvāre eva gocarabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1766_3: gacchatī”ti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti ācariyā. Kammanimittañca
tika-abh08t0:1766_4: panettha paccuppannaṃ pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ cutikālāsanne katakammassa ārammaṇasantāne
tika-abh08t0:1766_5: uppannaṃ taṃsadisanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, itarathā tadeva paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇupaṭṭhāpakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1766_6: tadeva paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya, na ca paṭisandhiyā upacārabhūtāni viya, “etasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1766_7: tayā pavattitabba”nti paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ anuppadentāni viya ca pavattāni cutiāsannajavanāni
tika-abh08t0:1766_8: paṭisandhijanakāni bhaveyyuṃ. “Katattā upacitattā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tadā ca paṭisandhiyā
tika-abh08t0:1766_9: ekavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni kathaṃ katūpacitāni siyuṃ, assādanabhūtāya taṇhāya
tika-abh08t0:1766_10: aparāmaṭṭhāni kathaṃ paṭisandhinibbattakāni, na ca lokiyāni lokuttarāni viya samānavīthiphalāni
tika-abh08t0:1766_11: hontīti. Taṃ viññāṇanti taṃ javanaviññāṇaṃ. Ekattanayena paṭisandhiviññāṇañca sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:1767_0: Avijjāya paṭicchannādīnaveti anusayavasena pavattāya bhavataṇhāya, cittasampayuttāya
tika-abh08t0:1767_1: vā avijjāya chāditadukkhādīnave. Tathābhūte pana kammādivisaye paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1767_2: ārammaṇabhāvena uppattiṭṭhānabhūte. Taṇhāya appahīnattā eva purimuppannāya ca santatiyā
tika-abh08t0:1767_3: tathāpariṇatattā paṭisandhiṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ viññāṇaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāraṃ hutvā pavattatīti
tika-abh08t0:1767_4: āha “taṇhā nametī”ti. Sahajā pana saṅkhārāti cutiāsannajavanaviññāṇasahajātacetanā,
tika-abh08t0:1767_5: sabbepi vā phassādayo. Khipantīti khipantā viya tasmiṃ visaye paṭisandhivasena viññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa
tika-abh08t0:1767_6: hetubhāvena pavattanti. Tanti taṃ viññāṇaṃ. “Santativasā”ti vadanto tadeva viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1767_7: sandhāvati saṃsarati, na aññanti imañca micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipati. Sati hi nānattanaye
tika-abh08t0:1768_0: 599. Ārammaṇādīhi…pe… pavattatīti ārammaṇanissayapaccayādīhi pavattati. Kathaṃ? Āsannamaraṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1768_1: hi kammabalena manodvāre upaṭṭhāpitaṃ avijjāya paṭicchannādīnavaṃ kammādivisayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1768_2: ārabbha manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati, tato maraṇāsannavīthiyā vatthudubbalabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1768_3: mandappavattiyā cattāri, pañca vā javanāni pavattanti, tadanantaraṃ tadārammaṇe sati,
tika-abh08t0:1768_4: asati vā bhavaṅgavisayamālambitvā cuticittaṃ uppajjati. Bhavaṅgānantarampi cuti hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1768_5: vadanti. Cuticitte pana niruddhe tadeva āpāthagataṃ kammakammanimittādiṃ ārabbha
tika-abh08t0:1768_7: orimatīrarukkhavinibandhaṃ rajjuṃ ālambitvā mātikātikkāmako viya purimañca nissayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1768_8: jahati, aparañca kammasamuṭṭhitaṃ nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anassādayamānaṃ vā ārammaṇādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1768_9: paccayehi pavattati. Ettha ca orimatīraṃ viya purimabhavo daṭṭhabbo, tattha ṭhitarukkho
tika-abh08t0:1768_10: viya purimabhave pavattamānakkhandhā, rajju viya kammādiārammaṇaṃ. Keci pana “rajju
tika-abh08t0:1768_11: viya hadayavatthū”ti vadanti, “rajju viya taṇhā”tipi apare. Puriso viya viññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1768_12: tassa rajjuggahaṇaṃ viya taṇhāya ārammaṇābhimukhanamanaṃ, payogo viya khipanakasaṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:1768_13: mātikā viya cuticittaṃ, paratīraṃ viya paraloko.
tika-abh08t0:1769_0: 600. Yathā puriso paratīre patiṭṭhahamāno paratīrarukkhavinibandhaṃ kiñci assādayamāno
tika-abh08t0:1769_1: vā anassādayamāno vā kevalaṃ pathaviyaṃ sakabalappayogeheva patiṭṭhāti, evamidampi
tika-abh08t0:1769_3: vā catuvokārabhave anassādayamānaṃ vā kevalaṃ ārammaṇanissayasampayuttadhammeheva
tika-abh08t0:1769_4: pavattatīti taṃ viññāṇaṃ nāpi idhāgataṃ imasmiṃyeva bhave nibbattattā. Kammādinti
tika-abh08t0:1769_6: kammādivisayāya ādīnavapaṭicchādikāya ca avijjāya, daḷhaggāhādikarānaṃ upādānādīnañca
tika-abh08t0:1769_7: gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha kammaṃ nāma upapajjavedanīyabhūtaṃ, aparāpariyavedanīyabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1769_10: keci. Namanavasena pavattataṇhā nāma anusayāvatthāya pavattataṇhā. Esa nayo ādīnavapaṭicchādakaavijjāyapi.
tika-abh08t0:1769_11: Kammādivisayā pubbe vuttāyeva. Daḷhaggāhakaraupādānā nāma maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya upapattibhavassa
tika-abh08t0:1770_0: 601-5. Saddapaṭighosādīnaṃ satipi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve santānabandho na pākaṭoti
tika-abh08t0:1770_2: cā”tiādimāha. Etthāti imasmiṃ cutipaṭisandhādhikāre. Paṭighosadīpamuddādīti ādi-saddena
tika-abh08t0:1770_3: ādāsatalagatamukhanimittādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Aññattha agantvāti saddādipaccayadesaṃ anupagantvā.
tika-abh08t0:1770_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā saddādīnaṃ uppattipadesaṃ anupagantvā paṭighoso saddahetuko,
tika-abh08t0:1770_5: padīpo padīpantarādihetuko, muddā lañchanahetuko, mukhanimittādikaṃ ādāsādiabhimukhādihetukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1770_6: hoti tato pubbe abhāvā, evamidampi paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ na hetudesaṃ gantvā taṃhetukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1770_7: hoti tato pubbe abhāvā, tasmā na idaṃ hetudesato purimabhavato idhāgataṃ paṭighosādayo
tika-abh08t0:1770_8: viya saddādidesato, nāpi tato hetuṃ vinā uppannaṃ saddādīhi vinā paṭighosādayo viyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1770_9: Atha vā aññatra agantvāti pubbe paccayapadese sannihitā hutvā tato aññatra gantvā
tika-abh08t0:1770_10: tappaccayā na honti uppattito pubbe abhāvā, nāpi saddādipaccayā na honti, evaṃ idampīti
tika-abh08t0:1770_11: vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. Santānabandhato natthīti santānappabandhato natthi ekatā
tika-abh08t0:1770_12: santānekattepi aññasseva viññāṇassa pātubhavanato, nāpi nānatā apubbānaṃ apubbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1770_13: uppādepi paṭhamuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vinā pacchimassa anuppajjanato, padīpassa viya nānatā
tika-abh08t0:1770_14: na siyā. Khaṇikāpi hi padīpajālā santānekattaṃ upādāya sā evāti vuccati, attakiccañca
tika-abh08t0:1770_15: sādheti. “Sati santānabandhe”tiādinā santānabandhe ekantaṃ ekattāya ca nānattāya
tika-abh08t0:1770_16: ca aggahetabbataṃ, gahaṇe ca dosaṃ dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – santānabandhe sati
tika-abh08t0:1770_17: yadi ekantena ekatā siyā, khīradadhīnampi anaññabhāvato, attatoyeva ca sayaṃ anuppajjanato
tika-abh08t0:1770_18: khīrato dadhisambhūtaṃ na bhaveyya. Athāpi santānabandhe sati ekantaṃ nānatā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1770_19: khīradadhīnampi nānattā, aññassa ca sāmibhāvamattena aparassa sāmibhāvāyogato khīrasāmi
tika-abh08t0:1770_20: naro dadhisāmi na bhaveyya, na ca panevaṃ loke dissatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1771_0: 606. Tasmāti yasmā evaṃ lokavohāraparicchedo hoti, tasmā ekantaṃ ekatā, nānatāpi
tika-abh08t0:1771_1: vā na ceva upagantabbā. Ekatte pana adhippete dhammato aggahetvā santānatova gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1771_2: nānatte adhippete santānavasena aggahetvā dhammatova gahetabbanti adhippāyo. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:1774: Ettha ca ekantaṃ ekatāpaṭisedhena “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti, ekantaṃ nānatāpaṭisedhena “paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1775_0: 607-9. Nanu na sundaraṃ, nanu siyāti vā sambandho. Asaṅkantipātubhāveti saṅkantipātubhāvarahite,
tika-abh08t0:1775_1: asaṅkantivasena vā pātubhāve, asaṅkamitvāva pātubhāveti attho. Khandhābhisambhavāti
tika-abh08t0:1775_2: abhisambhūtakkhandhā, atha vā abhisambhavati kammaṃ etesūti abhisambhavā, khandhā,
tika-abh08t0:1775_3: evaṃ abhisambhavā kammādhiṭṭhānabhūtā khandhāti attho. Idha niruddhattāti phalādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1775_4: paralokaṃ agantvā idheva niruddhattā. Paratthāgamatoti paralokaṃ agamanato. Tassāti
tika-abh08t0:1775_5: kammassa. Aññassāti yena taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, tato aññassa. Aññatoti yaṃ taṃ kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1775_6: nibbattaṃ, tato aññato. Etaṃ vidhānanti idhalokato paralokaṃ gantvā natthi, tattha
tika-abh08t0:1776_1: vuttaṃ. Ekasmiṃ santāneti yasmiṃ dhammapuñje kammaṃ nibbattaṃ, tasseva santāneti
tika-abh08t0:1776_2: attho. Aññassātipi vā…pe… hoti. Tattha ekantaṃ ekattanānattānaṃ paṭisiddhattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1776_3: Etassatthassāti hetuphalānaṃ atthato aññattepi teneva hetuphalabhāvena sambandhattā
tika-abh08t0:1776_4: taṃ phalaṃ aññassa, aññatoti vā na vattabbanti etassa atthassa. Bījānanti ambamātuluṅgabījānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1776_6: Tassāti tassa paribhāvitabījassa. Paṭhamaṃ laddhapaccayoti madhurabhāvūpagamanato
tika-abh08t0:1776_7: paṭhamameva laddhapaccayo. Kālantareti phalakāle. Evaṃ ñeyyamidampi cāti yathā etaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1776_8: evaṃ idampi ñātabbaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā hi ambabījādīsu madhunā, catumadhurena
tika-abh08t0:1776_9: vā yojetvā ropitesu phalaraso madhuro hoti, mātuluṅgabīje ca alattakarasena rajitvā
tika-abh08t0:1776_10: ropite ambilabhaṇḍo ratto hoti, na ca taṃ bījaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ vā phalaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:1776_11: evaṃ santepi kālantare phalaviseso na aññabījasantāne hoti, na ca aññasmiṃ bīje abhisaṅkhārapaccayato
tika-abh08t0:1776_12: hoti, evameva ye idha loke nibbattakkhandhā, tesu nipphannaṃ kammaṃ vā paralokaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1776_13: na gacchanti. Evampi kālantare vipākakkhandhā aññasmiṃ santāne na nibbattanti, na
tika-abh08t0:1777_0: Ettha hi abhisaṅkhataṃ bījaṃ viya kammaṃ vā satto, abhisaṅkhāro viya kammaṃ, bījassa
tika-abh08t0:1777_1: aṅkurādippabandho viya sattassa paṭisandhiviññāṇādippabandho. Tatthuppannassa madhurarasassa
tika-abh08t0:1777_2: ambilabhaṇḍe rattassa ca tasseva bījassa tato eva ca abhisaṅkhārato bhāvo viya kammakārakasseva
tika-abh08t0:1777_3: sattassa tato eva ca abhisaṅkharaṇato bhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1778_0: 615. Bālakāle…pe… phaladāyināti bālasarīre kataṃ vijjāpariyāpuṇanaṃ, sippasikkhanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1778_1: osadhūpayogo ca na vuḍḍhasarīraṃ gacchati, atha ca tannimittaṃ vijjāpāṭavaṃ, sippajānanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1778_2: anāmayatādi ca vuḍḍhasarīre honti, na ca tāni aññassa honti taṃsantatipariyāpanne
tika-abh08t0:1778_3: eva sadise uppajjanato. Na ca yathā payuttena vijjāpariyāpuṇanādinā vinā tāni aññato
tika-abh08t0:1778_4: honti tadabhāve abhāvato, evaṃ idhāpi santāne yaṃ phalaṃ, etaṃ nāññassa, na ca aññatoti
tika-abh08t0:1778_5: yojetabbaṃ. Etena ca saṅkhārābhāve phalābhāvameva dasseti, na aññapaccayanivāraṇaṃ karoti.
tika-abh08t0:1779_0: 616-8. Evaṃ santepīti asaṅkantipātubhāve. Tattha ca yathāvuttadosapariharaṇe sati
tika-abh08t0:1779_1: siddhepīti attho. Vijjamānanti padīpassa vaṭṭikāsneho viya vijjamānaṃ aniruddhanti
tika-abh08t0:1779_2: attho. Avijjamānanti vaṭṭadukkhābhāvassa arahato cuticittaṃ viya avijjamānaṃ niruddhanti
tika-abh08t0:1779_3: attho. Tappavattikkhaṇeti kammassa pavattamānakkhaṇeyeva. Tenāha “saddhimeva ca hetunā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1779_4: Avijjamānanti pavattikkhaṇato pubbe vijjamānataṃ asampattaṃ. Niruddhanti khaṇattayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1781: Pubbeti kammāyūhanato pubbe. Avijjamānatāsāmaññena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. Pacchāti vipākappavattito pacchā ca.
tika-abh08t0:1782_0: 619-20. Kaṭattāpaccayoti kaṭattā eva paccayo, na vijjamānatāya avijjamānatāya vāti
tika-abh08t0:1782_1: attho. Tenāha “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1782_2: uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ arahatā katakammampi kaṭattāpaccayo siyāti? Nayidamevaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1782_3: Yathā hi acchinnamūlasmiṃ rukkhe pupphitaṃ bījasamatthampi kusumaṃ mūle chinnamatte
tika-abh08t0:1782_4: phaladāyakaṃ na hoti, evaṃ arahatopi kilesamūlassa abbocchinnakāle santāne pavattampi
tika-abh08t0:1782_5: kammaṃ kilesamūlacchinnamatteyeva phaladāne asamatthabhāvaṃ āpannanti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:1787_0: Kaṭattā ce paccayo, niccaphaladāyako vibandhoti āha “pāṭibhogādika”ntiādi. Pāṭibhogādikanti
tika-abh08t0:1787_1: mūlabhāvūpagamanādikaṃ. Ādi-ggahaṇena “pacchā mūlaṃ dassāmī”ti bhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ, iṇaggahaṇañca
tika-abh08t0:1787_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – pāṭibhogakiriyādīnaṃ vijjamānatā, avijjamānatā
tika-abh08t0:1787_3: vā niyyātane, paṭibhaṇḍadāne, iṇadāne ca paccayo na hoti, atha kho karaṇamattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1787_4: na ca taṃ niyyātanādīnaṃ niccameva paccayo hoti niyyātanādimhi kate paccayattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1787_5: evameva vipākuppādanepi kammassa vijjamānatā, avijjamānatā vā paccayo na hoti, atha
tika-abh08t0:1787_6: kho karaṇamattameva, karaṇamatte ca sati vipakkavipākānaṃ paccayo na hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1788: 621. Paramassa uttamassa atthassa pakāsanato paramatthappakāsano. Pītibuddhivivaḍḍhanoti pītiyā, ñāṇassa ca, pītisahagatassa vā ñāṇassa vivaḍḍhano.
tika-abh08t0:1794: 622. Ādimhīti uddesagāthāyaṃ. Idānīti cittacetasikavibhāvanānantaraṃ. Vibhāvananti niddesapaṭiniddesavasena sarūpato pakāsanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1795_0: 623. Ruppatīti sītuṇhādīhi vikāramāpajjati, āpādīyatīti vā attho. Vikārāpatti ca
tika-abh08t0:1795_1: sītādivirodhipaccayasannidhāne visadisuppattiyeva. Na hi yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjitvā
tika-abh08t0:1795_2: ṭhitadhammānaṃ aññena kenaci vikārāpādanaṃ sakkā kātuṃ, tasmā purimuppannarūpasantati
tika-abh08t0:1795_3: viya ahutvā pacchā uppajjamānānaṃ visabhāgapaccayasamavāyena visadisuppattiyeva idha
tika-abh08t0:1795_4: “ruppana”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca katvā saṅghiyānaṃ vipariṇāmavādo paccakkhato hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1795_5: Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamavāye visadisuppatti labbhatīti? Saccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1795_6: labbhati, na pana vibhūtatarā. Vibhūtatarā hettha visadisuppatti adhippetā ukkaṭṭhagativasena
tika-abh08t0:1796: Kuto etaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Sītādiggahaṇato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1797_0: “Kiñca, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ vadetha, ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā rūpanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1797_1: Kena ruppati? Sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi
tika-abh08t0:1797_2: ruppati, ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassenapi ruppati, ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave,
tika-abh08t0:1798_0: Ettha hi sītādiggahaṇaṃ sītādinā phuṭṭhassa ruppanaṃ vibhūtataraṃ, tasmā tadevettha
tika-abh08t0:1798_1: gahitanti ñāpanatthaṃ. Itarathā ruppatīti sāmaññavacaneneva siddhe sītādiggahaṇaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1799_0: Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ brahmaloke rūpasamaññā? Na hi tattha upaghātako sītādiphassaviseso
tika-abh08t0:1799_1: labbhatīti? Saccaṃ, tatthāpi taṃsabhāvānativattanato. Aruppanassāpi hi ruppanasabhāvānativattanato
tika-abh08t0:1799_2: rūpasamaññā hoti. Yathā aduddhampi khīraṃ taṃsabhāvānativattanato “duddha”nti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1799_3: Atha vā kiñcāpi tattha upaghātako sītādiphassaviseso natthi, anuggāhako pana atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1799_4: Tathā hi brahmānaṃ utujarūpaṃ atthi, tasmā attheva tattha ruppananti na koci tattha
tika-abh08t0:1800_0: Rūpayatīti vāti sayaṃ vijjamānameva attano santānaṃ vikāramāpādayatīti attho. Iti
tika-abh08t0:1800_1: purimaviggahena vikāruppatti “ruppana”nti dīpitaṃ. Iminā pana virodhipaccayasannipāte
tika-abh08t0:1800_2: vijjamānasseva yo attano santāne visadisuppattihetubhāvo, taṃ ruppananti dīpitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1800_3: hoti. Imasmiṃ pakkhe arūpassa rūpasamaññāpasaṅgo eva natthi. Niruddhameva hi taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1800_4: anantarādipaccayehi arūpaṃ uppādeti, na vijjamānanti. Ghaṭṭane vikārāpattiyaṃ rūpa-saddassa
tika-abh08t0:1800_5: ruḷhī, tasmā arūpadhammānaṃ ghaṭṭanābhāvato na tesu rūpasamaññāti keci. Paṭighāto
tika-abh08t0:1800_6: ruppananti apare, tesaṃ matena kiñcāpi sappaṭigharūpānameva rūpasamaññāpasaṅgo, atha
tika-abh08t0:1800_7: kho avayavavohārena samudāyopi voharīyatīti sabbameva rūpaṃ rūpasamaññaṃ labhati.
tika-abh08t0:1800_8: Keci panettha “rūpayatīti vaṇṇāyatanavasena vutta”nti vadanti. Tañhi vaṇṇavikāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1800_9: āpajjamānaṃ rūpayati, hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti. Tayidaṃ upari vaṇṇāyatananiddese
tika-abh08t0:1800_10: visuṃyeva vuccatīti na tassa idha saṃvaṇṇane payojanaṃ atthi. Surūpoti dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāketumālādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1800_11: alaṅkatattā sobhanarūpakāyo, sabhāvattho vā rūpa-saddo “yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa”ntiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1801_0: 624. Bhūtopādāyabhedatoti ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādārūpanti bhūtaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1801_1: Atha vā mahābhūtāyeva idha purimapadalopavasena bhūta-saddena vuttā. Tenāha “catubbidhā
tika-abh08t0:1801_2: mahābhūtā”ti. Bhūtāni upādiyateva, na pana sayaṃ tehi aññehi vā upādiyatīti upādāyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1801_3: Evañca katvā catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya pavattamānānampi upādāyarūpatāpasaṅgo
tika-abh08t0:1801_4: natthi. Na hi te kevalaṃ aññamaññaṃ upādiyanteva, atha kho sayaṃ upādāyarūpehi upādiyanti,
tika-abh08t0:1801_5: tasmā upādāya-saddaggahaṇasāmatthiyato na mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpatāpasaṅgoti. Atha
tika-abh08t0:1801_6: vā “catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanato catumahābhūtasannissitatāva upādāyarūpalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1801_7: na bhūtattayādisannissitatāpīti na tesaṃ upādāyarūpatāti. Bhūtañca upādāyañca bhūtopādāyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1801_8: tesaṃ vasena bhedatoti bhūtopādāyabhedato. Bhūtasaddassa ubhayaliṅgattā āha “mahābhūtā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1801_9: Upādāti upādāyarūpāni “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”tiādīsu viya ettha ya-kāralopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1802_0: 625. Katame pana cattāro mahābhūtā, kathañca te mahābhūtasaññitā, kāni ca upādāyarūpāni,
tika-abh08t0:1802_1: kathañca tāni “upādāyarūpānī”ti vuccantīti idaṃ codanaṃ hadaye katvā kamena sodhento
tika-abh08t0:1802_2: āha “pathavīdhātū”tiādi. Cattārometi cattāro ime. Mahā ca so bhūto cāti mahābhūto,
tika-abh08t0:1802_3: tena mahābhūtena sadevake loke mahantabhāvena pātubhūtena sammāsambuddhenāti attho. Atha vā –
tika-abh08t0:1807_0: Ādīsu viya bhūta-saddassa sattesu, khīṇāsavesu ca pavattanato mahābhūtenāti mahatā
tika-abh08t0:1807_1: sattena, mahākhīṇāsavenāti vā attho. Khīṇāsavopi hi parikkhīṇapaṭisandhikattā bhūtoyeva
tika-abh08t0:1807_2: na bhavati, na ca bhavissatīti bhūtoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1808: 626. Mahantā pātubhūtāti upādinnakasantānepi anupādinnakasantānepi sasambhāradhātuvasena mahantā hutvā bhūtā jātā nibbattāti attho. Tesaṃ anupādinnakasantāne –
tika-abh08t0:1811_1: daṭṭhabbā. Vuttampi hetaṃ “santi, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1812_0: Mahābhūtasamāti anekabbhutavisesadassanena, anekabhūtadassanena ca mahantā bhūtā,
tika-abh08t0:1812_1: mahantāni abbhutāni vā etesūti mahābhūtā, māyākārā, yakkhādayo vā jātivaseneva mahantā
tika-abh08t0:1812_2: bhūtāti mahābhūtā, tehi ete samāti mahābhūtasamā. Ete hi yathā māyākārā amaṇiṃ eva
tika-abh08t0:1812_3: udakaṃ maṇiṃ katvā dassenti, asuvaṇṇaṃyeva leḍḍuādikaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ katvā dassenti, yathā
tika-abh08t0:1812_4: ca sayaṃ neva yakkhā na pakkhino samānā yakkhādibhāvampi dassenti, evamevaṃ sayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1812_5: anīlāneva hutvā nīlaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ dassenti, sayaṃ apītāyeva…pe… sayaṃ anodātāyeva
tika-abh08t0:1812_6: hutvā odātaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ dassentīti māyākāramahābhūtasāmaññato mahābhūtā.
tika-abh08t0:1813_0: Yathā ca yakkhā mahābhūtā yaṃ gaṇhanti, nevassa antosarīre ṭhānaṃ upalabbhati, na
tika-abh08t0:1813_1: sarīrato bahi, na ca tassa aṅgamaṅgaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti. Yadi hi sarīrassa anto
tika-abh08t0:1813_2: ṭhitā, sakalasarīre byāpanaṃ na siyā. Atha bahi ṭhitā, yakkhaggahitakena katakusalākusalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1813_3: yakkhassa na siyā. Yadi cassa aṅgamaṅgaṃ nissāya na ṭhitā, yakkhaggahitake pahaṭe
tika-abh08t0:1813_4: yakkhassa dukkhavedanuppatti na siyā, na ca sarīre rājiuṭṭhānaṃ bhaveyya. Yasmā panetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1813_5: sabbaṃ atthi, tasmā te aniddisitabbaṭṭhānā, evametepi na aññamaññassa anto na bahi
tika-abh08t0:1813_6: ṭhitā upalabbhanti, na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti. Yadi hi te aññamaññassa
tika-abh08t0:1813_7: anto ṭhitā, na sakasakakiccakarā siyuṃ aññamaññaṃ anupavesanato. Atha aññamaññato
tika-abh08t0:1813_8: bahi ṭhitā, vinibbhuttā siyuṃ, tathā ca sati avinibbhuttavādo parihāyeyya, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1813_10: cete patiṭṭhānādinā yathāsakakiccavisesena sesānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upakārakā hontā sahajātādinā
tika-abh08t0:1813_11: paccayena paccayo hutvā aññamaññaṃ nissāyeva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1814_0: Vañcakattā abhūtenāti yakkhinīādayo viya abhūtena atacchena manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādinā
tika-abh08t0:1814_1: sattānaṃ vañcakattā mahantāni abhūtāni etesūti mahābhūtāti sammatā. Yathā hi yakkhinīādayo
tika-abh08t0:1814_3: ca attano bhayānakabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti, attano vasaṃ nenti, evametepi
tika-abh08t0:1814_4: itthipurisādīsu manāpena chavivaṇṇena, manāpena aṅgapaccaṅgasaṇṭhānena, manāpena
tika-abh08t0:1814_6: bālajanaṃ vañcenti, attano sabhāvaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na dentā taṃ attano vasaṃ nenti.
tika-abh08t0:1815_0: 627-30. Cakkhusotantiādīsu rūpameva rūpatā. Hadayañca taṃ vatthu ca manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnanti
tika-abh08t0:1815_1: hadayavatthu, hadayassa vā viññāṇassa vatthūti hadayavatthu, purimapadalopena pana
tika-abh08t0:1815_2: “vatthu”nti vuttaṃ. Kabaḷīkāro āhāroyeva āhāratā. Kiñcāpi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ rūpaniddese
tika-abh08t0:1815_3: kabaḷīkāro āhāro osāne uddiṭṭho, idha pana nipphannarūpānaṃ ekaṭṭhāne dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1815_4: hadayavatthuanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhoti. Lahutā ādi yāsaṃ mudutākammaññatānanti lahutādayo,
tika-abh08t0:1815_5: tāsaṃ tayaṃ lahutādittayaṃ, tattha lahubhāvo lahutā, tathā mudutāpi. Kammani sādhu
tika-abh08t0:1815_6: kammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo kammaññatā. Lahutādīnaṃ sayaṃ anipphannattā nipphannarūpavikārabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1815_7: dassetuṃ “rūpassā”ti visesanaṃ kataṃ. Catuvīsatīti gaṇanaparicchedo, balavarūpādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1815_8: nisedhanattho. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Nissāyāti nissāya
tika-abh08t0:1815_9: eva, na pana nissayavasenapi. Catūhi upādānehi nimuttatāya nikkhantaṃ upādānato mānasaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1816_0: 631-2. Patthaṭattāti puthuttā, tena puthubhāvato puthavī, puthavī eva pathavīti niruttinayena
tika-abh08t0:1816_1: saddasiddhi dīpitā hoti. Ayaṃ pana sambhārapathaviyā vasena yujjati. Sā hi puthubhūtā
tika-abh08t0:1816_2: patthaṭāti. Lakkhaṇapathaviyā vasena pana pathanaṭṭhena pathavī, sahajarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1816_3: pakkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti attho. Purimopi vā attho lakkhaṇapathaviyā vasena labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1816_4: Vāyanatoti samudīraṇato, desantaruppattihetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghāṭassa pāpanatoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1816_5: Tejeti paripāceti, niseti vā, tikkhabhāvena sesabhūtattayaṃ usmāpetīti attho. Gāthābandhavasena
tika-abh08t0:1816_6: cettha iti-saddalopato “tejeti”cceva vuttaṃ. Evaṃ “āpetī”ti etthāpi. Tasmā tejetīti
tika-abh08t0:1816_7: tejo, āpetīti āpoti vuttaṃ hoti. Āpeti pālanāti anupāletabbarūpapariyosānaṃ āpeti
tika-abh08t0:1816_8: pattharati. Tathā hetaṃ “ābandhanakicca”nti vuccati. Āpīyatīti āpo. Sosīyati pivīyatīti
tika-abh08t0:1816_9: atthoti keci. Ayaṃ panattho sasambhārāpe yujjatīti vadanti, lakkhaṇāpepi yujjateva.
tika-abh08t0:1816_10: Sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti. Āpāyatīti
tika-abh08t0:1816_11: vā āpo, brūheti vaḍḍhetīti attho. Tathā hesa paribrūhanaraso. Tesanti yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1816_12: bhūtopādāyabhedānaṃ rūpānaṃ. Vakkhāmīti kathessāmi. Kiṃ kāraṇāti āha “lakkhaṇādīsū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1816_13: Hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā lakkhaṇādīsu ñātesu dhammā āvi bhavissanti, tasmā tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1817_0: 633-4. Kāni pana tāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni nāma, yesu ñātesu dhammā
tika-abh08t0:1817_1: āvi bhavissantīti imaṃ codanaṃ sodhetuṃ lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni sarūpato
tika-abh08t0:1817_2: kathento āha “sāmaññaṃ vā”tiādi. Sāmaññaṃ sādhāraṇo aniccādiko. Sabhāvo kakkhaḷādiphusanādiko
tika-abh08t0:1817_3: asādhāraṇabhāvo. Kiccanti sandhāraṇādikiccaṃ. Sampattīti sampannabhāvo. “Suraso gandhabbo”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1817_4: hi gandhabbasampattiyā rasa-saddena vuccamānattā sampatti rasoti. Phalanti sahajātanānakkhaṇikavasena
tika-abh08t0:1817_5: ṭhitaṃ phalaṃ. Upaṭṭhānanayoti gahetabbabhāvena ñāṇassa upaṭṭhānākāro. Āsannakāraṇanti padhānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1818_0: Lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷattaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1818_1: Nanu ca kakkhaḷattameva pathavīdhātūti? Saccametaṃ. Tathā hi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena
tika-abh08t0:1818_2: asambhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato. Evañhi atthavisesāvabodho
tika-abh08t0:1818_3: hotīti. Atha vā lakkhīyatīti lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷā hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti
tika-abh08t0:1818_4: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesāsupi eseva nayo. Patiṭṭhānarasāti sahajātadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1818_5: patiṭṭhānabhāvakiccā. Asahajātānampi santativasena patiṭṭhānabhāvo hoteva. Tato eva
tika-abh08t0:1818_6: nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhātīti sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā. Iminā
tika-abh08t0:1818_7: kiccavasenevettha “paccupaṭṭhāna”nti dasseti. Padaṭṭhānaṃ panettha catunnampi ekato katvā vakkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1819_1: milātabhāvūpagamanaṃ adatvā vaḍḍhanakiccā. Tathā hi sā tesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti
tika-abh08t0:1819_2: vuccati. Saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhirakaudakaṃ viya nahāniyacuṇṇassa sahajātadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1819_3: vippakirituṃ adatvā sampiṇḍanavasena saṅgaṇhanapaccupaṭṭhānā. Paripācanarasāti pariṇatabhāvakaraṇarasā.
tika-abh08t0:1819_4: Maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1819_5: Vitthambhanalakkhaṇāti pūraṇalakkhaṇā. Samudīraṇarasāti kampanarasā. Abhinīhāro bhūtattayassa
tika-abh08t0:1819_6: desantaruppattihetubhāvo, nīharaṇaṃ vā bījato aṅkurādikassa viya. Ekekā…pe… tabbāti
tika-abh08t0:1820_0: Ārohapariṇāhavasena hi majjhime imasmiṃ sarīre pariggayhamānā paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā
tika-abh08t0:1820_1: sukhumarajabhūtā pathavīdhātu doṇamattā siyā. Sā ca tato upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpodhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1820_2: yathā na vikirati, evaṃ ābandhanavasena saṅgahitā. Yathā pana paggharaṇasabhāvāya
tika-abh08t0:1820_3: āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ picchalabhāvaṃ nāpajjati, evaṃ tejodhātuyā anupālitā.
tika-abh08t0:1820_4: Yathā pana tassā vasena na vikirīyati, evaṃ vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitā saṅghātabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1820_6: laddhapaccayā sinehena temitā, tejasā paripakkā, vāyunā vitthambhitā piṭṭhacuṇṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1820_7: viya na ito cito ca vikirīyati viddhaṃsīyati, avikiriyamānā aviddhaṃsiyamānā nānappakārakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1821_0: Yūsagatā ābandhanākārabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejānupālitā vāyovitthambhitā
tika-abh08t0:1821_1: na gaḷati, na paggharati, na parissavati. Evaṃ tīhi dhātūhi anupālitā apaggharamānā
tika-abh08t0:1821_2: aparissavamānā piṇḍitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Esā hi anubrūhanarasā.
tika-abh08t0:1822_0: Asitapītādiparipācitā cettha usumākārabhūtā uṇhattalakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā
tika-abh08t0:1822_1: āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti, vaṇṇasampattiñcassa āvahati.
tika-abh08t0:1822_2: Sā hi yathānubhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī
tika-abh08t0:1822_3: imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti, vaṇṇasampattiñca āvahati. Kammūpanissayāya hi cittapasādahetukāya
tika-abh08t0:1822_4: ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo, pageva utuāhārasamuṭṭhānāya rūpasampattiyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1822_5: Tāya ca pana paripācito ayaṃ kāyo na pūtibhāvaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh08t0:1823_0: Aṅgamaṅgānusaṭā cettha samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavīdhātuyā attani
tika-abh08t0:1823_1: patiṭṭhāpīyati. Yathā sahajātadhammehi visuṃ na hoti, evaṃ āpodhātuyā saṅgayhati.
tika-abh08t0:1823_2: Yathā sahajātadhammā na parissavanti, evaṃ tejodhātuyā anupālīyati. Sā evaṃ tīhi
tika-abh08t0:1823_3: dhātūhi yathārahaṃ anupāliyamānā imaṃ kāyaṃ vitthambheti. Tāya pana vitthambhito
tika-abh08t0:1823_4: ayaṃ kāyo na paripatati, ujukaṃ tiṭṭhati, iccevaṃ ekekāya dhātuyā tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1823_5: vaseneva pavattanato vuttaṃ “ekekā cettha sesabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1824_0: Evaṃ bhūtarūpānaṃ saddhiṃ vacanatthehi lakkhaṇādayo dassetvā idāni upādāyarūpāni
tika-abh08t0:1824_1: dassento āha “cakkhatī”tiādi. Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ cakkhati-saddassa vibhāvanatthatāpi
tika-abh08t0:1824_2: sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ “vibhāvetīti attho”ti. Cakkhatīti pana viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1824_3: samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya, abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ viya hotīti attho. Atha vā cakkhatīti
tika-abh08t0:1824_4: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti attho. Cakkhatīti hi ayaṃ saddo “madhuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1824_5: cakkhati, byañjanaṃ cakkhatī”tiādīsu viya assādattho. Vuttañhetaṃ – “cakkhuṃ kho,
tika-abh08t0:1824_6: māgaṇḍiya, rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasamudita”nti. Vakkhati ca “rūpesu āviñchanarasa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1824_7: Yadi evaṃ “sotaṃ kho, māgaṇḍiya, saddārāma”ntiādivacanato sotādīnampi saddādiassādakabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1824_8: atthīti tesampi cakkhusaddābhidheyyatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati niruḷhattā. Niruḷho
tika-abh08t0:1824_9: hi esa cakkhu-saddo locaneyeva padumādīsu paṅkajādisaddā viyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1825_0: 635-6. Cakkhurūpassa niddesappakaraṇepi cakkhu-saddasāmaññato āgataṃ sabbampi cakkhuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1825_1: pabhedato dassetuṃ “tattha cakkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ cakkhuniddese. Paññāmaṃsappabhedatoti
tika-abh08t0:1825_2: paññācakkhu maṃsacakkhūti evaṃ paññāmaṃsānaṃ vasena pabhedato. Tatthāti tasmiṃ duvidhe
tika-abh08t0:1825_3: cakkhumhi. Paññāyeva paññāmayaṃ. Nāmatoti nāmehi pañcavidhanti sambandho. Katamehi
tika-abh08t0:1825_4: nāmehīti āha “buddhadhammā”tiādi. Tattha buddhadhammasamantehīti buddhacakkhu dhammacakkhu
tika-abh08t0:1825_5: samantacakkhūti imehi nāmehi. Ñāṇadibbehīti ñāṇacakkhu dibbacakkhūti ca nāmehi. Yathānukkamatoti
tika-abh08t0:1825_6: yathāvuttaanukkamato. Nānattanti bhedaṃ. Meti mayhaṃ santikā, mayhaṃ vacanatoti vā
tika-abh08t0:1826_0: 637. Tattha “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe
tika-abh08t0:1826_1: mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye”tiādinā āgataṃ buddhacakkhu nāmāti dassento āha “āsayānusaye”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1826_2: Tattha āsayānusayeti sattānaṃ āsaye ceva anusaye ca, tasmiṃ pavattanti attho. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:1826_3: āgantvā seti cittaṃ etthāti āsayo. Byagghāsayo viya. Yathā hi byaggho gocaratthāya
tika-abh08t0:1826_4: pakkantopi puna āgantvā vanagahaneyeva sayati, teneva ca taṃ tassa āsayoti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1826_5: evaṃ aññatthāpi pavattaṃ cittaṃ āgantvā yattha sayati, taṃ tassa āsayoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1826_6: So pana sassatadassanādivasena catubbidho hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1829_0: Anusayakathā upari āgamissati. Indriyānaṃ paropareti saddhāpañcamakānaṃ indriyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1829_1: tikkhamudubhāve. Tikkhañhi indriyaṃ ukkaṭṭhagatattā paraṃ, mudu aparaṃ anukkaṭṭhagatattā.
tika-abh08t0:1829_2: Idaṃ pana buddhacakkhu chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu purimadvayanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1830_0: 638. Heṭṭhā…pe… saññitanti “tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1830_1: evaṃ vuttaṃ heṭṭhā tīsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ dhammacakkhunti saññitaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ sabbaññutā
tika-abh08t0:1830_2: panāti sabbaññubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Tañhi sabbaññūti abhidhānassa, buddhiyā ca pavattinimittatāya
tika-abh08t0:1830_3: sabbaññubhāvo nāma hoti. Ñeyyaṃ samantacakkhunti khandhādivasena samantato sabbaso
tika-abh08t0:1835_0: 639. Yaṃ cakkhuṃ udapādīti āgatanti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ “idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu
tika-abh08t0:1835_1: dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti evaṃ tattha tattha suttesu āgataṃ, catūsu
tika-abh08t0:1835_2: saccesu teparivaṭṭavasena “dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”nti evamādinā dvādasavidhena
tika-abh08t0:1835_3: ākārena pavattaṃ, idaṃ ñāṇacakkhu. Yā pana “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dibbena
tika-abh08t0:1835_5: ayaṃ dibbacakkhūti dassetuṃ “abhiññācittajā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamatatiyañāṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1835_6: kāmāvacarāniyeva. Catutthampi pana purimadvayamiva kāmāvacaranti ānandācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1835_7: Ñāṇacakkhuṃ sahaariyamaggavipassanāñāṇantipi yujjatīti apare. Aggamaggena saha vipassanāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇanti
tika-abh08t0:1836_0: 640-4. Evaṃ paññācakkhussa pabhedaṃ dassetvā puna maṃsacakkhussāpi pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1836_2: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena sambharīyati etehīti sambhārā, avayavā. Te pana upatthambhakabhūtā
tika-abh08t0:1836_3: catusamuṭṭhānikarūpasantatiyo daṭṭhabbā. Saha sambhārehīti sasambhāraṃ. Sasambhārañca
tika-abh08t0:1836_4: nāma maṃsapiṇḍo pavuccatīti sambandho. Akkhikūpaṭṭhinā heṭṭhāti heṭṭhāgataakkhikūpassa
tika-abh08t0:1836_5: aṭṭhinā paricchinnoti sambandho. Uddhanti akkhikūpato uddhaṃ. Ubhato akkhikoṭīhīti
tika-abh08t0:1836_6: akkhikūpassa ubhayabhāge akkhikoṭīhi. Matthaluṅgena antatoti akkhikūpassa abbhantare
tika-abh08t0:1836_7: ṭhitena matthaluṅgena. Nhārusuttena ābandhoti nahārurajjūhi anto matthaluṅgena saha
tika-abh08t0:1836_8: ābandho. Sakalopi ca lokoti sakalopi bālaputhujjanaloko. Yanti yaṃ maṃsapiṇḍaṃ. Kamalassa
tika-abh08t0:1836_9: dalaṃ viyāti puthulavipulanīlatāya nīluppaladalaṃ viya. Jānātīti gaṇhāti. Cakkhu
tika-abh08t0:1836_10: nāma na taṃ hotīti tathā gayhamānaṃ taṃ cakkhu nāma na hoti. Kiñcarahi tanti āha
tika-abh08t0:1836_11: “vatthu tassāti vuccatī”ti. Tassāti tassa yathādhippetassa paramatthacakkhuno. Idaṃ panāti nigamanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1837_0: 645-7. Taṃ pana sasambhāracakkhu yehi sambhārehi sambharīyati, te sarūpato, gaṇanato
tika-abh08t0:1837_1: ca dassetuṃ “vaṇṇo gandho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhāvoti itthiyā itthibhāvo, purisassa pumbhāvoti
tika-abh08t0:1837_2: labbhamānakabhāvo. Sambhavoti āpodhātumeva sambhavabhūtamāha. Saṇṭhānanti ca tena
tika-abh08t0:1837_3: tenākārena sanniviṭṭhesu mahābhūtesu taṃtaṃsaṇṭhānavasena viññāyamānaṃ vaṇṇāyatanamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1837_4: Āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanehi ca anatthantarabhūtānampi sambhavasaṇṭhānānaṃ visuṃ vacanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1837_5: tathābhūtānaṃ, atathābhūtānañca āpādīnaṃ yathāvuttamaṃsapiṇḍe vijjamānattā. Āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānañhi
tika-abh08t0:1837_6: santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ avatthāviseso sambhavo saṇṭhānañcāti. Daseteti catasso
tika-abh08t0:1837_7: dhātuyo, tannissitā vaṇṇādayo cāti ime dasa. Catusamuṭṭhānāti antogatahetvatthamidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1838: 648. Cakkhu…pe… jīvitameva cāti imāni ekantakammasamuṭṭhānāni, purimāni ca catusamuṭṭhānānīti cattālīsañca cattāri ca rūpāni bhavanti, catucattālīsa rūpāni hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1839_0: 649-52. Imesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ vasenāti yathāvuttānaṃ saṅkhepato cuddasannaṃ, vitthārato
tika-abh08t0:1839_1: catucattālīsānañca rūpānaṃ vasena. Paripiṇḍitanti samantato piṇḍitaṃ. Yattha setampi
tika-abh08t0:1839_2: atthi, kaṇhampi lohitampi pathavīpi āpopi tejopi vāyopi, idaṃ pana semhussadattā
tika-abh08t0:1839_3: setaṃ hoti, pittussadattā kaṇhaṃ, ruhirussadattā lohitakaṃ, pathavussadattā patthinaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1839_4: hoti, āpussadattā paggharati, tejussadattā pariḍayhati, vāyussadattā sambhamati.
tika-abh08t0:1839_5: Idaṃ sambhāravantatāya sambhāracakkhūti paṇḍitehi buddhādīhi pakāsitaṃ paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1839_6: Ettha sitoti etaṃ sasambhāracakkhuṃ nissito tadāyattabhūto. Tenāha “ettha paṭibaddho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1839_7: Catunnaṃ pana bhūtānaṃ pasādoti catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasannatāsabhāvo pasādo, “setena
tika-abh08t0:1839_8: maṇḍalenassā”ti pāṭho yujjati. Potthakesu pana “sete tu maṇḍale tassā”ti likhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1839_10: viya chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ vibhattilopaṃ katvā “kaṇhamaṇḍalamajjhe”ti vuttaṃ. Evañhi
tika-abh08t0:1839_11: attho ca yojanā ca suṭṭhu upapannā honti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi hi “setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa
tika-abh08t0:1839_12: kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe”ti vuttaṃ. Apare pana yathāṭhitavaseneva pāṭhaṃ gahetvā “sabbaso
tika-abh08t0:1839_13: parikkhittassa tassa sasambhārassa cakkhuno majjhe setamaṇḍale kaṇhamaṇḍale majjhe”ti
tika-abh08t0:1839_14: yojenti. Diṭṭhamaṇḍaleti abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte diṭṭhamaṇḍale.
tika-abh08t0:1840_2: catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ hutvā. Utucittādināti tīhi santatisamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi.
tika-abh08t0:1840_3: Ettha ca kalāpantaragatā utuāhārā adhippetāti vadanti. Āyunā katapālananti catudhātunissiteneva
tika-abh08t0:1840_4: jīvitindriyena rakkhiyamānaṃ. Tathā hetaṃ kammajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vaṇṇagandharasādīhīti
tika-abh08t0:1840_5: ādi-ggahaṇena ojaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, “vaṇṇagandharasojāhī”ti vā pāṭho. Vatthudvārañca sādhayanti
tika-abh08t0:1840_6: yathāyogaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇassa hi nissayabhāvato vatthubhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1840_7: pavattimukhabhāvato dvārabhāvañca sādheti. Sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pana tadārammaṇāvasānānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1840_8: aññanissitattā dvārabhāvameva sādheti, na vatthubhāvaṃ. Ūkāsirasamānena pamāṇenāti
tika-abh08t0:1840_9: ūkāsirasamānena padesappamāṇena lakkhitaṃ hutvā ūkāsirasamānappamāṇe ṭhāneti vā attho.
tika-abh08t0:1840_10: Tiṭṭhatīti satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ viya tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:1840_11: Evañca katvā cakkhussa anekakalāpagatatā siddhā hoti. Upaddavānaṃ paṭalanirākaraṇepi
tika-abh08t0:1840_12: hi cakkhu vijjatevāti. Yathā ca cakkhu, evamimassa nissayabhūtā catasso dhātuyo,
tika-abh08t0:1840_13: āyuvaṇṇādīni ca satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāneva avinibbhogavuttittāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1841_0: 656. Vuttanti dhammasenāpatinā vuttaṃ. Rūpāni manupassatīti ma-kāro padasandhikaro
tika-abh08t0:1841_1: “aññamaññaṃ samaṇamacalo”tiādīsu viya. Atha vā manūti maccoti attho. Kiñcāpi cakkhu
tika-abh08t0:1841_2: rūpaṃ na passati, kiñcarahi tannissitaṃ viññāṇameva. Tathā hi “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1841_3: viya nissitakiriyaṃ nissaye viya katvā vohārasambhavato “cakkhupasādena passatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1841_4: vuttaṃ. Ācariyajotipālattherenāpi hi imināva adhippāyena idaṃ vuttaṃ. Idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1841_5: kiṃ cakkhu rūpaṃ passati, udāhu viññāṇanti, kiñcettha – yadi cakkhu passeyya, aññaviññāṇasamaṅginopi
tika-abh08t0:1841_6: cakkhu passeyya. Atha viññāṇaṃ, kuṭṭādiantaritampi passeyya tassa appaṭighātattā?
tika-abh08t0:1841_7: Nāyaṃ doso. Yassa “cakkhu passatī”ti mataṃ, tassāpi na sabbaṃ cakkhu passati, atha
tika-abh08t0:1841_8: kho viññāṇādhiṭṭhitameva. Yassa pana viññāṇaṃ passatīti mataṃ, tassāpi na sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1841_9: viññāṇaṃ passati, atha kho cakkhunissitameva, tañca antarite nuppajjati. Yattha ālokassa
tika-abh08t0:1841_10: kuṭṭādīhi vinibandho, yattha pana so natthi phalikaabbhapaṭalādimhi, tattha antaritepi
tika-abh08t0:1841_11: uppajjati eva, tasmā taṃ anuppannattā antaritaṃ na passati. Idameva ca sanniṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1841_12: yaṃ kho cakkhuviññāṇaṃ passatīti. Tañhi dassanakiccaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cakkhunā
tika-abh08t0:1841_13: rūpaṃ disvāti. Tena dvārena karaṇabhūtenāti ayamettha abhisandhi. Atha vā nissitakiriyā
tika-abh08t0:1841_14: nissayassa pavuccati yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti. Ūkāsirasamūpamanti ūkāsirasamānūpamaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1841_15: ūkāsirappamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañcassa patiṭṭhānokāsavasena vuttaṃ, na pana attano
tika-abh08t0:1841_16: pamāṇavasena. Tañhi paramāṇupariyantena pamāṇena atisukhumamevāti. Ūkāsirappamāṇe
tika-abh08t0:1841_17: pana padese idaṃ pavattati. Na kevalañca idameva, sabbānipi sabbaṭṭhānikarūpāni tattha
tika-abh08t0:1841_18: pavattanteva. Idañca tattha nibbattantaṃ taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā eva nibbattati. Ekūnapaṇṇāsakalāpavasena
tika-abh08t0:1841_19: ca saheva pavattati, sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukattā rūpānaṃ, ekekassa ca cittassa tīsu
tika-abh08t0:1842_0: 657. Suṇātīti sotanti ettha kiṃ sotaṃ suṇāti, udāhu viññāṇantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-abh08t0:1842_1: yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tanutambalomāciteti sasambhārasotabilassa anto sukhumehi
tika-abh08t0:1842_3: padese. Vuttappakārāhīti sandhāraṇādikiccāhi. Āyunā paripāliyamānanti ettha vaṇṇādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1842_4: parivāritanti sambandhitabbaṃ. Tiṭṭhatīti pubbe vuttanayena taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:1842_5: Sesaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Ghāyatīti gandhopādānaṃ karoti. Sāyatīti rasaṃ vindati.
tika-abh08t0:1842_6: Jīvitamavhāyatīti ettha rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitanimittaṃ ajjhoharaṇaraso
tika-abh08t0:1842_7: jīvitaṃ, taṃ avhāyati tasmiṃ ninnatāya avhāyantamiva hoti. Uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:1842_8: padeseti majjhe chinnassa uppaladalassa aggabhāgasaṇṭhāne padese. Malānanti kilesādimalānañceva
tika-abh08t0:1842_10: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā
tika-abh08t0:1842_11: soyeva tesaṃ āyoti vuccati. Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
tika-abh08t0:1842_12: Atha vā kāyindriyavatthukā cattāro khandhā balavakāmarāgādihetubhāvato visesato malā,
tika-abh08t0:1842_13: tesamayaṃ āyo hetūti kāyoti vutto. Imasmiṃ kāyeti imasmiṃ sasambhārakāye. Sopi hi
tika-abh08t0:1842_14: kucchitānaṃ kesādimalānaṃ āyabhāvato kāyoti vuccati. Yāvatā upādinnakaṃ atthīti iminā
tika-abh08t0:1842_15: kesagganakhaggādīsu kāyapasādassa abhāvamāha. Kappāsapaṭale sneho viyāti imināssa
tika-abh08t0:1842_16: nirantarabhāvaṃ. Ime ca pana cakkhādayo rūpādigocaraninnatāya vammikaudakaākāsagāmasivathikāsaṅkhātagocaraninnatāya
tika-abh08t0:1842_17: ahisuṃsumārapakkhikukkurasigālā viya daṭṭhabbā. Visamajjhāsayatāya hi cakkhu vammikacchiddābhiratasappo
tika-abh08t0:1842_18: viya, bilajjhāsayatāya sotaṃ udakabilābhiratasuṃsumāro viya, ākāsajjhāsayatāya ghānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1842_19: ajaṭākāsābhiratapakkhi viya, gāmajjhāsayatāya jivhā gāmābhiratakukkuro viya, upādinnakajjhāsayatāya
tika-abh08t0:1842_20: kāyo āmakasusānābhiratasigālo viyāti. Visamajjhāsayatāyāti cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1842_21: viya hotīti katvā vuttā. Cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-abh08t0:1843_0: Daṭṭhu…pe… lakkhaṇanti ettha daṭṭhuṃ kāmetīti daṭṭhukāmo tassa bhāvo daṭṭhukāmatā,
tika-abh08t0:1843_1: rūpataṇhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sā pana anāgate cakkhādīsu ādīnavapaṭicchādikāvijjāmūlapatthanāsabhāvā
tika-abh08t0:1843_2: pākaṭā apākaṭāti duvidhā. Tattha yā ayaṃ “īdisaṃ īdisañca sukhumatamavisayaggahaṇasamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1843_3: cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ kammāyūhanato pubbe, pacchā vā uppannā pākaṭā. Indriyavisesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1843_4: pana anāmasitvā avisesena paripuṇṇāyatanabhavasampattiṃ patthetvā, apatthetvā vā
tika-abh08t0:1843_5: tattha avigatataṇhāvasena kammaṃ karontassa appahīnabhāvena anusayitā api kammasāmatthiyavicittahetubhūtā
tika-abh08t0:1843_6: apākaṭā. Sā duvidhāpi nidānaṃ upanissayo yassa taṃ daṭṭhukāmatānidānaṃ, tadeva kammaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1843_8: pasādo daṭṭhukāmatā…pe… pasādo, taṃ lakkhaṇamassa, tathā hutvā lakkhīyatīti vā daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānabhūtapasādalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1844_0: Ettha ca gabbhaseyyakānaṃ dinnapaṭisandhikaṃ, aññaṃ vā kammaṃ cakkhādīni nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t0:1844_1: Opapātikānaṃ pana paṭisandhikkhaṇeva paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ paṭisandhijanakameva
tika-abh08t0:1844_2: kammaṃ paripuṇṇasakalamattabhāvaṃ nibbattetīti gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana ekakammunā
tika-abh08t0:1844_3: nibbattamānānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visesoti? Kāraṇassa bhinnattā. Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā
tika-abh08t0:1844_4: hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1844_5: taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammassapi vicittabhedataṃ vidahati. Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ tathāvidhasamatthatāyogena
tika-abh08t0:1844_6: anekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekavisiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti, na cettha samatthatāsamatthatāsabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1844_8: ekasseva kammassa soḷasādivipākanibbattanahetubhāvena ca ayamattho sampaṭicchitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1844_10: Kiṃ vā etāya yutticintāya, na cintitabbamevetaṃ. Yato kammaphalaṃ cakkhādīni, kammavipāko
tika-abh08t0:1844_11: ca sabbaso buddhānaṃyeva ñāṇassa visayo, na aññesaṃ atakkāvacarattā. Teneva bhagavatā
tika-abh08t0:1844_12: “kammavipāko acinteyyo, na cintetabbo, yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”tiādīnavaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1845_0: Rūpesu āviñchanarasanti āviñchanaṃ puggalassa, āvajjanādiviññāṇassa vā tanninnabhāvappattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1845_2: kadāci uppajjamānānampi hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjanakāle cakkhuṃ nissāya eva uppajjatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1846_0: “Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya
tika-abh08t0:1846_1: dutiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya
tika-abh08t0:1846_2: tatiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati, iminā nayena yāvatāyukaṃ cittappavatti veditabbā”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1847_0: Maggāmaggañāṇaniddese vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ cakkhu rūpe ghaṭṭitvā viññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1847_1: nissayo hoti, tasmā dvīsu bhavaṅgacalanesu purimassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgacittena
tika-abh08t0:1847_2: saha uppannanti ayamattho idha sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ, visuddhimaggassa sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāyañca vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1848_1: bhavaṅgena vā saha uppannaṃ cakkhu”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ duvuttaṃ. Evañhi sati aññasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1848_2: ghaṭṭite aññaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti, evañca bhavaṅgacalanato
tika-abh08t0:1848_3: heṭṭhā tatiyacatutthehi yāva terasamacittena saha uppannampi nissayo hotīti āpajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1848_4: na cetaṃ vattabbaṃ, tatiyacatutthacittato paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ kesañci vīthicittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1848_5: dvārabhāvaṃ na gacchati niruddhattā, manodvārassa niruddhasseva dvārabhāvassa dassanato.

tika-abh08t0:1849_1: ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hotī”ti, katamaṃ pana tanti? Yaṃ tattha visadaṃ

tika-abh08t0:1853_0: 661-2. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ pasādānaṃ visesatāti āha “tasmā”tiādi. Yasmā vuttappakārena

tika-abh08t0:1853_4: honti, evaṃ cakkhādayopi bhūtavisesābhāvepi aññamaññavisadisā honti. So panāyaṃ visiṭṭhabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1853_5: kammavisesena viññātabbo. Ekampi hi kammaṃ pañcāyatanikattabhāvapatthanānipphannaṃ

tika-abh08t0:1853_8: mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1853_9: vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva kaṭattārūpānaṃ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.

tika-abh08t0:1854_0: 663. Evaṃ kammavisesato visiṭṭhesu ca etesu ārammaṇaggahaṇepi ayaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ

tika-abh08t0:1854_3: vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ sāntare adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato. Yadi

tika-abh08t0:1855_2: adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato”ti? Taṃ na, adhiṭṭhānato bahi indriyuppattiyā

tika-abh08t0:1855_5: ṭhitānaṃyeva cakkhusotānaṃ asampattavisayasseva gahaṇato nāsiddhametaṃ “sāntare adhike
tika-abh08t0:1858_0: Tassattho – sabbesaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ gocarena rūpādinā yoge ekakāriyasādhakattā sambandhe

tika-abh08t0:1859_1: Tathā akkhipuṭe añjanaṃ pakhumamūle akkhivaṇṇaṃ pakhumamūle ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ añjanasalākampi

tika-abh08t0:1859_4: kadācipi ārammaṇapaccayo na siyā. Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ uppatti atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1859_5: Paṭṭhāne ca “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti aviseseneva
tika-abh08t0:1859_6: saddassa sotaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvo vutto. Kiñca yadi sotaṃ sampattaggāhakaṃ siyā, attano
tika-abh08t0:1859_7: visayapadeseyeva gahetabbato gandhassa viya saddassāpi disādesavavatthānaṃ na siyā.

tika-abh08t0:1860_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyanti. Asampattaggāhakatte
tika-abh08t0:1860_1: hi dūrāsannadesavattīnaṃ samakameva savanena bhavitabbanti? Nayidamevaṃ dūrāsannānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1860_2: yathāpākaṭe sadde gahaṇavisesato. Yathā hi dūrāsannānaṃ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭeva
tika-abh08t0:1860_3: gahaṇavisesato akkharavisesanaṃ gahaṇaṃ, aggahaṇañca hoti, evaṃ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa

tika-abh08t0:1860_5: pavattipākaṭībhūte yathāpākaṭaṃ nicchayaggāhakānaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṃ

tika-abh08t0:1860_8: Yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi, kathaṃ paṭighosuppattīti?
tika-abh08t0:1860_9: Dūre ṭhitopi saddo aññattha paṭighosuppattiyā, bhājanādicalanassa ca paccayo hoti
tika-abh08t0:1861_0: Sesaṃ…pe… gāhakanti yaṃ pana avasesaṃ ghānajivhākāyasaṅkhātaṃ pasādattayaṃ, taṃ sampattaggāhakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1861_1: hoti nissayavasena ceva sayañca attano nissaye allīneyeva visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato.

tika-abh08t0:1862_0: Vaṇṇavikāramāpajjamānanti dosādīhi kāraṇehi amanāpavaṇṇassa uppattivasena vaṇṇavikāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1862_1: āpajjamānaṃ. Hadayaṅgatabhāvanti cittagataṃ ajjhāsayaṃ. Pakāsetīti rūpamiva pakāsaṃ

tika-abh08t0:1862_3: rūpa-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Taṃ pana rūpanti sambandho. Cakkhumhi, cakkhussa vā paṭihananaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1862_6: viyāti katvā. Yathā paṭighāte sati dubbalassa calanaṃ hoti, evaṃ visayābhimukhabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1862_7: sati visayino taṃsambandhassa ca vatthurūpassa, tannissitassa ca bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1862_8: hoti. So rūpassa cakkhumhi, cakkhussa vā rūpe hoti. Tenāha “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi
tika-abh08t0:1862_9: sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā, yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ
