tika-abh08t0:1862_11: ārammaṇapaccayatā. Gocarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānanti ettha anaññathābhāvo visayatā, tabbahulatā
tika-abh08t0:1862_12: gocarabhāvoti ayaṃ visayagocarānaṃ viseso. Saddāyatīti udāharīyati, sakehi vā paccayehi
tika-abh08t0:1862_13: sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ upanīyatīti attho. Attānaṃ gandhayatīti sugandhaṃ, duggandhanti
tika-abh08t0:1863_0: 664. Itthiyā eva indriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ. Yathā cakkhādīni indriyāni purisassapi honti,
tika-abh08t0:1863_1: nayidaṃ tathā. Idaṃ pana niyamena itthiyā eva hoti, tasmā “itthindriya”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1863_2: Evaṃ purisindriyepi. Itthiyā bhāvo, itthīti bhavati etena cittaṃ, abhidhānaṃ vāti
tika-abh08t0:1863_4: saha ekakkhaṇe samuṭṭhito. Etena ṭhapetvā liṅgaparivattanaṃ cakkhundriyādīni viya
tika-abh08t0:1863_5: imassa apātubhāvamāha. Yañcetaṃ itthiliṅgādīti yaṃ panetaṃ indriyaphalabhūtaṃ itthiliṅgādi.
tika-abh08t0:1863_7: saṇṭhānaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ. Itthīnañhi hatthapādagīvāuraādisaṇṭhānaṃ na purisānaṃ viya
tika-abh08t0:1863_8: hoti. Tathā hi tāsaṃ heṭṭhimakāyo visado, uparimakāyo avisado, hatthapādā khuddakā,
tika-abh08t0:1863_9: mukhaṃ khuddakaṃ, thanamaṃsā avisadā, tā nimmassudāṭhikā. Kesabandhavatthaggahaṇañca
tika-abh08t0:1863_10: itthinimittaṃ. Daharakālepi suppakamusalakādīhi kīḷā makacivākena suttakantananti
tika-abh08t0:1863_11: ca evamādi itthikuttaṃ, itthikiriyāti attho. Avisadaṭṭhānagamanādiākāro itthākappo.
tika-abh08t0:1863_12: Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatīti
tika-abh08t0:1863_13: vadanti. Idaṃ pana itthiliṅgādiparidīpanaṃ akusalanti vatvā aññathāpi vaṇṇenti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:1863_14: Kathaṃ? Yonipadeso itthiliṅgaṃ, sarādhippāyā itthinimittaṃ, avisadaṭṭhānagamanādayo
tika-abh08t0:1863_15: itthikuttaṃ, itthisaṇṭhānaṃ itthākappoti. Ettha ca adhippāyo nāma purisasmiṃ methunataṇhā.
tika-abh08t0:1863_16: Sā hi tāsaṃ niccaṃ balavatarā pavattati, ato sāpi itthīti sañjānanassa nimittatāya
tika-abh08t0:1863_17: “itthinimitta”nti vuccati. Kiñcāpi itthīti saññāṇassa nimittatāya kuttākappānampi
tika-abh08t0:1863_18: nimitteyeva antogadhatā, tathāpi tesaṃ visuṃ gahaṇato sarādhippāyā eva nimittabhāvena adhippetā.
tika-abh08t0:1864_0: 665. Kiṃ panetaṃ itthiliṅgādi itthindriyaṃ viya paṭisandhisamuṭṭhitaṃ hotīti āha
tika-abh08t0:1864_1: “itthindriyaṃ paṭiccevā”tiādi. Kiñcāpi hi itthiliṅgādīni yathāsakaṃ kammādinā paccayena
tika-abh08t0:1864_2: samuṭṭhahanti, yebhuyyena pana itthindriyasahiteyeva santāne taṃtadākārā hutvā sambhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:1864_3: itarattha ca na bhavantīti tesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitaṃ upādāya “itthindriyaṃ paṭicceva
tika-abh08t0:1864_4: jāyantī”ti vuttāni. Evañca katvā vakkhati “itthi…pe… kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1864_5: Īdiseneva kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā indriyasahite
tika-abh08t0:1864_6: santāne itthiliṅgādiākārarūpapaccayānaṃ aññathā anuppādanato, na pana indriyādipaccayasambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1864_7: Tathā hetaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ viya ekakalāpagatānaṃ āhāro viya kalāpantararūpānaṃ upatthambhakamanupālakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1864_8: vā na hoti. Evañca katvā jīvitindriyaāhārānaṃ viya imassa indriyapaccayatā, atthiavigatapaccayatā
tika-abh08t0:1864_9: ca pāḷiyaṃ na vuttā. Yasmā paccayantarādhīnāni itthiliṅgādīni, tasmā yatthassa ādhipaccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1864_10: taṃsadisesu matacittakatarūpesupi taṃsaṇṭhānatā dissati. Yasmā panete itthindriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1864_11: paṭicca jāyantāpi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ na samuṭṭhahanti, pavatteyeva samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:1865_0: 666-7. Saṃsedajaopapātikānaṃ pana kiñci itthindriyena saha paṭisandhiyameva nibbattati.
tika-abh08t0:1865_1: Na cāti ca-kāro vacanīyantarasamuccaye. “Kiñcā”ti imassa atthe daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā liṅgādiākāresu
tika-abh08t0:1865_2: rūpesu rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, tasmā āha “itthiliṅgādayo cakkhuviññeyyā hontī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1865_3: Yasmā pana tato aññāni yathāyogaṃ sotaviññeyyāni ceva manoviññeyyāni ca, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1865_4: “na vā”ti. Yathāvutto papañco purisindriyepi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabboti atidesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1865_5: karonto āha “esevā”tiādi. Sesepīti ettakeyeva vutte ito sesesu sabbesupīti kadāci
tika-abh08t0:1865_6: koci cinteyyāti āha “purisindriye”ti. Paṭhamakappānanti paṭhamakappikanarānaṃ. Tesañhi
tika-abh08t0:1865_7: ābhassaralokato cavitvā idhūpapannānaṃ dīghassa kālassa accayena oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1865_8: āharataṃ muttakarīsesu sañjātesu tesaṃ nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni bhijjanti, purisassa
tika-abh08t0:1865_9: purisabhāvo, itthiyā ca itthibhāvo pāturahosi. Tathā hi purimattabhāvesu pavattaupacārajhānānubhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1865_10: yāva sattasantāne kāmarāgavikkhambhanavego na paṭipassambhati, na tāva balavakāmarāgūpanissayāni
tika-abh08t0:1865_11: itthipurisindriyāni pāturahesuṃ. Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya balavakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro
tika-abh08t0:1865_12: ahosi, tadā tadūpanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ santāne sañjāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1866_0: 668. Paratoti paṭhamakappato aparabhāge. Pavatte…pe… parivattatīti yathā taṃ soreyyakaseṭṭhiputtassa
tika-abh08t0:1866_1: viyāti adhippāyo. Api-saddena paṭhamapārājikāyaṃ vinītavatthupāḷiyaṃ āgatabhikkhussa,
tika-abh08t0:1866_2: bhikkhuniyā viya ca paṭisandhiyaṃ samuṭṭhitassapi pavatte parivattanaṃ dīpeti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1867: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti. Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1868: Yassa pana paṭisandhiyaṃ dvīsu ekampi na samuṭṭhitaṃ, so abhāvako nāma, tassa pavattiyampi indriyuppatti na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1869_0: 669. Kiṃ panetassa ubhayassapi nibbattiyā, vināsanassa ca kāraṇaṃ, yato idaṃ samuṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1869_1: parivattatīti ca vuccatīti imaṃ anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “mahatā pāpakammenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1869_2: Tattha mahatāti paradārikakammādinā mahābalena. Pāpakammena upanissayabhūtena. Mahatā
tika-abh08t0:1869_3: kusalenevāti idaṃ sugatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Duggatiyaṃ pana ubhayampi akusalakammeneva jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1870_0: 670. Indriye vinaṭṭhe ekanteneva liṅgampi vinassatevāti āha “itthiliṅgaṃ vinassatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1870_1: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo – imesu dvīsu purisindriyaṃ uttamaṃ, itthindriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1870_2: hīnaṃ, purisindriyassa antaradhānaṃ mahantena akusalena kammena hoti, samuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1870_3: mahantena kusalakammena, itthindriyassa antaradhānaṃ dubbalākusalena, samuṭṭhānampi
tika-abh08t0:1870_4: dubbalakusalena, duggatiyaṃ pana ubhayassāpi antaradhānaṃ, samuṭṭhānañca akusaleneva
tika-abh08t0:1870_5: hotīti. Yadi sugatiyaṃ itthindriyampi kusaleneva nibbattati, kathañcarahi “paradārikakammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1870_6: katvā niraye paccitvā teneva pāpakammena pañcasatakkhattuṃ manussaloke itthī hutvā
tika-abh08t0:1870_7: nibbattatī”tiādivacananti? Nāyaṃ virodho nissandaphalavasena vuttattā. Tathā hi paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1870_8: tāva purisindriyanibbattanārahampi kammaṃ kadāci paradārikādinā balavapāpakammena
tika-abh08t0:1870_9: paṭibāhitasāmatthiyaṃ assa, tadā attano purisindriyanibbattane asamatthatāya itthindriyameva
tika-abh08t0:1870_10: nibbatteti. Pavattiyaṃ pana attano balavabhāvena itthindriyūpanissayaṃ paradārikamakusalakammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1870_11: paṭibāhitvā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya purisindriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ kadāci laddhasāmaggitāsañjātabalavisesena
tika-abh08t0:1870_12: paradārikādinā kammena paṭibāhitasāmatthiyaṃ bhaveyya, tadā attano dubbalatāya purisindriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1870_13: na nibbatteti, itthindriyameva nibbatteti. Evaṃ paradārikādikammūpanissayena itthindriyassa
tika-abh08t0:1870_14: nibbattanato taṃ tena nibbattitaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1871_0: 671-2. Yadā pana taṃ kammaṃ puna sāmaggipaṭilābhato, parikkhīṇapāpakammatāya vā balavappattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1871_1: abhavissa, tadā dinnavedhaṃ viya rukkhaṃ tadapagame attano balānurūpaṃ purisindriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1871_2: nibbatteti, itthindriyaṃ pana attano kāraṇābhāvato nuppajjati. Ubhayassa pana nibbattiyampi
tika-abh08t0:1871_4: taṃ taṃ indriyaṃ na janeti. Sattarasamacittena saha uppannaṃ visadisindriyuppattito
tika-abh08t0:1871_5: purimacittena saha nirujjhati. Yadi hi sattarasamacittuppādato parampi uppajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1871_6: itaraṃ nuppajjati ekasmiṃ santāne dvinnaṃ sahuppattiyā anicchitattā. Teneva hi “yassa
tika-abh08t0:1871_7: vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatī”ti imasmiṃ pañhe “no”ti
tika-abh08t0:1871_8: paṭikkhepo katoti. Evañca katvā vakkhati “ubhatobyañjanassāpī”tiādi. Ekasmiñca niruddhe
tika-abh08t0:1871_9: tappaṭibaddhāni liṅgādīni katipayadivasehi nirujjhanti, tesu niruddhesu itarāni anukkamena
tika-abh08t0:1871_10: jāyantīti ācariyā. Itthinimittuppādakakammato, purisanimittuppādakakammato vāti ubhato
tika-abh08t0:1871_11: duvidhaṃ byañjanamassāti ubhatobyañjano. Tassāpīti yassa duvidhaṃ byañjanamatthi,
tika-abh08t0:1871_12: tassāpi ekameva indriyaṃ siyā, kiṃ pana itarassāti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1872_0: Nanu ca duvidhe byañjane sati indriyadvayenāpi bhavitabbaṃ, byañjanañhi taṃ taṃ indriyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1872_1: paṭicca jāyatīti? Saccaṃ jāyati, etthāpi itthiubhatobyañjanassa itthindriyaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh08t0:1872_2: itthinimittameva yāvajīvaṃ pavattati, purisaubhatobyañjanassa purisindriyaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh08t0:1872_3: purisanimittameva, itaraṃ pana na tassa itthindriyapurisindriyahetuto jāyati. Taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1872_4: pana yena kāraṇena hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ sante”ti anuyogaṃ katvā “na cābhāvo”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1872_5: sodhanaṃ tu vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santeti ekasmiṃyeva indriye sati. Abhāvo cāti yaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh08t0:1872_6: jāyati, tassa abhāvato purisaubhatobyañjanassa itthibyañjanābhāvo, itthiubhatobyañjanassa
tika-abh08t0:1872_7: purisabyañjanābhāvoti attho. Na cābhāvo siyāti neva dutiyabyañjanassa abhāvo siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1872_8: Na taṃ byañjanakāraṇanti taṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ na hoti. Kasmā? Sadā
tika-abh08t0:1872_9: abhāvato. Itthiubhatobyañjanassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati, tadā purisabyañjanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1872_10: pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ guḷhaṃ hoti, tathā itarassa itaraṃ. Yadi
tika-abh08t0:1872_11: ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadāpi byañjanadvayaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
tika-abh08t0:1872_12: na pana tiṭṭhati, tasmā veditabbametaṃ “na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇa”nti. Kiñcarahi
tika-abh08t0:1872_13: kāraṇanti ce? Āha “tassā…pe… kāraṇa”nti. Tattha kammasahāyanti purimabhavasiddhassa
tika-abh08t0:1872_14: indriyanibbattakakammassa sahāyaṃ. Rāgacittanti itthiyā purisasmiṃ, purisassa itthiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1872_15: vā uppannaṃ methunarāgacittaṃ. Tasmiñhi uppanne taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ paṭippassaddhe
tika-abh08t0:1872_16: paṭicchannaṃ hoti. Yasmā panimassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako
tika-abh08t0:1872_17: sayampi paraṃ uddissa gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, attānaṃ uddissa parampi gaṇhāpeti. So hi itthindriyavantatāya
tika-abh08t0:1872_18: sayaṃ gaṇhāti, paresu upakkamakaraṇato paraṃ gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako paresu
tika-abh08t0:1872_19: upakkamakaraṇato paraṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti, sayaṃ pana purisindriyavantatāya gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1873_0: Yasmā itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādayo honti, tesu ca santesu itthīti pakāso hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1873_1: tasmā taṃ tassa pakāsanakāraṇanti āha “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti. Duvidhampi panetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1873_2: indriyaṃ kāyapasādo viya sakalasarīrabyāpakameva, na cassa kāyapasādena saṅkaro lakkhaṇabhedato, nissayabhedato ca.
tika-abh08t0:1874_0: 673. Sahajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇanti yathā attanā sahajātarūpāni tīsu khaṇesu pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1874_1: evaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Jīvitindriyassa ekantakammajattā sahajaggahaṇeneva anupāletabbānampi
tika-abh08t0:1874_2: kammajabhāvova siddhoti kammajaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇattayamattaṭṭhāyīnampi
tika-abh08t0:1874_3: kammajarūpānaṃ pavattihetubhāveneva taṃ anupālakaṃ. Tenāha “tesaṃ pavattanarasa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1874_4: Pavattanañcettha vuttanayena tesaṃ yāpanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ ṭhitihetukatā. Na hi kammajānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1874_5: kammameva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ sakkoti āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Taṅkhaṇābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1874_6: Kammañhi niruddhaṃ rūpassa paccayo hoti, tato taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpāni matapitikā viya
tika-abh08t0:1874_7: puttā cūḷapituādinissayena aññanissayeneva pavattanti, aññañca tesaṃ yāpanasamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1874_8: natthi aññatra jīvitindriyenāti tadeva tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ. Āhārajādayo pana dharamānakapitikā
tika-abh08t0:1874_9: viya puttā aññanirapekkhā sakasakapaccayavaseneva pavattanti. Āhārādayo hi attano
tika-abh08t0:1874_10: atthikkhaṇeyeva rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ ṭhitipavattiyāva tiṭṭhanti, tato taṃsamuṭṭhānāni
tika-abh08t0:1874_11: jīvitindriyanirapekkhāni. Sesānipi taṃtaṃpaccayavaseneva tiṭṭhantīti na aññaṃ ṭhapanakāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1874_12: paccāsīsanti. Kammasamuṭṭhānampi cetaṃ uppādato paṭṭhāyeva anupālakaṃ. Yāpetabbāni
tika-abh08t0:1875_1: Tenāha “pañcavokāre”ti. Pañcavokāre manodhātu, manoviññāṇadhātuyo ca yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya
tika-abh08t0:1875_2: pavattanti, taṃ “vatthū”ti pavuccatīti sambandho. Pañcavokāreti ca visesanaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuvasena
tika-abh08t0:1875_3: kataṃ, manodhātu pana catuvokārabhave nattheva. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatassāpi hadayavatthuno
tika-abh08t0:1875_4: āgamato, yuttito ca atthibhāvo viññātabbo. Tattha āgamo tāva –
tika-abh08t0:1876: “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti, taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1877_0: Evamādi paṭṭhānavacanaṃ. Yutti pana evaṃ veditabbā – nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1877_1: dhātudvayaṃ pañcavokārabhave rūpapaṭibaddhavuttittā. Yaṃ yañhi rūpapaṭibaddhavutti,
tika-abh08t0:1877_2: taṃ taṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dissati yathā cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tattha na
tika-abh08t0:1877_3: tāva rūpāyatanādīnaṃ, ojāya ca tannissayatā yujjati indriyapaṭibaddhato bahipi tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1877_6: na tannissayatā yujjati. Tañhi kiccantare pasutaṃ na imāsaṃ nissayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1877_7: tasmā pārisesato tesaṃ nissayo hadayavatthu nāma atthīti viññātabbaṃ. Hotu tāva dhātudvayanissayo
tika-abh08t0:1877_8: vatthu, upādāyarūpañca, taṃ panetaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ paṭiniyatakiccaṃ hadayappadese
tika-abh08t0:1877_9: ṭhitamekanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathametaṃ viññāyatīti? Vuccate – vatthurūpabhāvato kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1877_10: cakkhu viya. Yañhi viññāṇassa vatthubhūtaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ yathā cakkhupasādo,
tika-abh08t0:1877_11: tato eva paṭiniyatakiccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā
tika-abh08t0:1877_12: kiñci cintentassa hadayappadesassa khijjanato tatthedaṃ tiṭṭhatīti viññāyati. Yathāhu ācariyā –
tika-abh08t0:1879: Cintāya ca urokhedā, tatra tiṭṭhanti vijāniya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1880_0: Yadi manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthu nāma atthi, kasmā panetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1880_1: rūpakaṇḍe na vuttaṃ. Na hi labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ atthīti? No natthi kāraṇantarasambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1880_2: Kiṃ pana taṃ kāraṇaṃ? Desanābhedo. Yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇādīni ekantato cakkhādinissayāni,
tika-abh08t0:1880_3: na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantena hadayavatthunissitaṃ pañcavokārabhaveyeva tannissayattā,
tika-abh08t0:1880_4: ekantena nissitavaseneva ca vatthudesanā pavattā. “Atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu,
tika-abh08t0:1880_5: atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa na vatthū”tiādinā cakkhuviññāṇādīhi nissitehi visesitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1880_6: Yampi ekantena hadayavatthunissayaṃ tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1880_7: dukādīsu vuccamānesu na tadanuguṇā ārammaṇadukādayo sambhavanti. Na hi “atthi rūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1880_8: manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattunti
tika-abh08t0:1880_9: vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyuṃ, na ekarasā desanā bhaveyya, ekarasañca desanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1880_10: desetuṃ tattha bhagavato ajjhāsayo, tasmā tattha hadayavatthu na vuttaṃ, na alabbhamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:1880_11: Esā hi bhagavato pakati, yaṃ ekaraseneva desanaṃ desetuṃ labbhamānassāpi kassaci
tika-abh08t0:1880_12: aggahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi nikkhepakaṇḍepi cittuppādavibhāgena avuccamānattā avitakkāvicārapadavisajjane
tika-abh08t0:1880_13: vitakko vicāro cāti vattuṃ na sakkāti avitakkavicāramattapadavisajjane labbhamānopi
tika-abh08t0:1880_14: vitakko na uddhaṭo, aññathā “vitakko cā”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti. Nissayabhāvato upari
tika-abh08t0:1881_0: 675. Catūsu āhāresu idha rūpādhikārato kabaḷīkāro āhāro gahetabboti āha “āhāratāti
tika-abh08t0:1881_1: kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti. Tattha kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro. Āharīyatīti āhāro, kabaḷaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1881_2: katvā ajjhoharīyatīti attho. Idañca savatthukaṃ katvā āhāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Kabaḷīkārāhārassa
tika-abh08t0:1881_3: pana ojā idha āhāro nāma. Tenāha “yāya ojāyā”tiādi. So ca rūpāharaṇasabhāvo upatthambhanabalakaro
tika-abh08t0:1881_4: aṅgamaṅgānusārīrasāharaṇabhūto bhūtanissito eko viseso. Bāhirāhārapaccayaṃ paṭilabhitvā
tika-abh08t0:1881_5: eva ajjhattikāhāro rūpaṃ uppādetīti ayaṃ ajjhattikāhārassa upanissayabhāvenāpi rūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1881_6: āharatīti āha “ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharatī”ti. Ojā aṭṭhamī yassa taṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1881_7: Yāya ojāyāti attano udayānantaraṃ rūpajananato ojāsaṅkhātāya odanakummāsādivatthugatāya
tika-abh08t0:1881_8: yāya pharaṇaojāya. Yattha yatthāti yamhi yamhi janapade, nagarādīsu ca. “Kabaḷīkāro
tika-abh08t0:1882_0: 676. Kiṃ pana vatthuno kiccaṃ, kiṃ ojāyāti ce? Parissayaharaṇaṃ vatthussa kiccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1882_1: pālanaṃ ojāyāti dassento āha “annapānādika”ntiādi. Aggiṃ harati kammajanti kammajatejaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1882_2: gaṇhāti. Antokucchiyañhi odanādivatthusmiṃ asati kammajatejo uṭṭhahitvā udarapaṭalasaṅkhātamupādinnarūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1882_3: gaṇhāti, “chātomhi, āhāraṃ me dethā”ti vadāpeti, bhuttakāle udarapaṭalaṃ muñcitvā
tika-abh08t0:1882_4: anupādinnakavatthuṃ gaṇhāti, atha satto ekaggo hoti. Yathā hi chāyārakkhaso chāyāpaviṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1882_5: disvā gahetvā devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā attano bhavane modanto chātakāle āgantvā
tika-abh08t0:1882_6: sīse daṃsati, so daṭṭhattā viravati, taṃ viravaṃ sutvā sace aññepi manussā āgacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:1882_7: so āgatāgate gahetvā khāditvā sakabhavane modati, evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ annapānādikaṃ vatthu,
tika-abh08t0:1882_8: taṃ taṃ kammajatejo gahetvā jīrāpetvā puna udarapaṭalaṃ gaṇhāti, tasmā annapānādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1882_9: vatthu attano udarapaṭalaṃ paviṭṭhakāle upādinnakāyaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ tato mocetvā
tika-abh08t0:1882_10: attānaṃ gaṇhāpanavasena taṃ attano santikaṃ harati. Kevalanti ojāviyuttaṃ vatthu
tika-abh08t0:1882_11: jīvitaṃ kammajabhūtaṃ taṃ pāletuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:1883_0: 677. Ojā…pe… pācakanti ojā jīvitaṃ pāletuṃ sakkoti, kammajaṃ tejaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti
tika-abh08t0:1883_2: imassa kāyassa upatthambhanavasena paccupaṭṭhāti. Kāyenāti rūpakāyena. Attano bhāvanti
tika-abh08t0:1883_3: attano adhippāyaṃ. Viññāpentānanti paresaṃ saññāpentānaṃ. Kāyaggahaṇānusārenāti phandamānakāyagatavaṇṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1883_5: anussaraṇena tesaṃ anantaranti attho. Pañcadvāre hi rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate yathāpaccayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1883_6: kusalākusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe manodvārikajavanaṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1883_7: katvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre visayaṃ vavatthāpetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1883_9: tatiyavāre pavattāya manodvārajavanavīthiyā eva gahitāya etāya karaṇabhūtāya catutthavāre
tika-abh08t0:1883_10: manodvāre javaneneva bhāvo viññāyati. Etena viññatti-saddassa karaṇasādhanatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1884_0: Evaṃ viññatti-saddassa kārakadvaye sambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni kāya-saddena saha kammadhārayasamāsaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1884_1: dassetuṃ, “kāyo”ti vohārassa viññattiyampi ca pavattiṃ dassento “kāyena saṃvaro”tiādisuttamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1884_3: kāyena viññattītipi kāyaviññattīti sambandho. Ayaṃ panettha attho – viññattiyā kāyavipphandanassa
tika-abh08t0:1884_4: hetubhāvato taṃhetukaṃ kāyavipphandanasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaṃ gahetvā adhippāyajānanato viññatti
tika-abh08t0:1884_5: adhippāyaviññāpanassa kāraṇabhāvena gayhatīti kāyena adhippāyaṃ viññāpetīti. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:1884_6: kāyavipphandanaṃ gahetvā tassa kāraṇamettha atthīti viññattiyā gayhamānattā sayañca
tika-abh08t0:1884_7: kāyena viññāyati, tasmā kāyena viññattītipi kāyaviññattīti.
tika-abh08t0:1885_1: ākārabhūto vikāro. Kassa pana sā ākāravikāratāti? Sāmatthiyato vāyodhātuadhikānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1885_2: cittajamahābhūtānaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ sāmatthiyaṃ? Calanahetutā, cittajatā, upādāyarūpatā
tika-abh08t0:1885_3: ca. Atha vā cittajāniladhātuyā ekā ākāravikāratāti sambandho. Na kevalañhi sāmivacanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1886_0: Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ viññattiyā upādāyarūpattaṃ. “Cittajāniladhātuyā”ti hi vacanena
tika-abh08t0:1886_1: vāyodhātuyāva ākāravikāratā viññatti āpajjati, na ca ekabhūtanissitaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1886_2: nāma atthi “catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanatoti? Nāyaṃ doso, catunnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1886_3: vikāratā catūsu ekassapi hoti catusādhāraṇadhanaṃ viya. Aniladhātuadhikakalāpo vā
tika-abh08t0:1886_4: idha “aniladhātū”ti vuccati, tadadhike taṃvohārato yathā sambhāradhātuyā adhikabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1886_5: pathavīvohāro, tasmā vāyodhātuadhikānaṃ cittajamahābhūtānaṃ ekā ākāravikāratā kāyaviññattīti
tika-abh08t0:1886_6: na koci virodho. Adhikatā cassā sāmatthiyato daṭṭhabbā, na pamāṇato. Itarathā hi
tika-abh08t0:1886_7: tesaṃ avinibbhogavuttitā na yujjeyya. Adhikatā hi attano adhikavasena itarehi vinibbhogappavattito
tika-abh08t0:1886_8: hoti. Sāmatthiyādhikañca kāraṇānukāritāya. Kāraṇañhi abhikkamādipavattakaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1886_9: taṃ calanādhippāyasabhāvaṃ tato samuṭṭhite kalāpe anukaronte vāyodhātuyā eva adhikattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1886_10: yuttanti. Keci pana “vāyodhātuyā eva ākāravikāratā”ti gaṇhanti, tesaṃ matena upādārūpattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1886_11: durūpapannaṃ. Na hi ekassa vikāro catunnaṃ upādārūpanti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1887_0: Kīdisī panāyaṃ vikāratāti āha “sahajātassa rūpassa calane hetū”ti. Tattha sahajātassāti
tika-abh08t0:1887_1: attanā sahajātassa. Yasmā utucittāhārajānaṃ calanaṃ cittajarūpasambandheneva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1887_2: nadīsotacalanena tattha pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍādīnaṃ viya. Viññattivasena pana
tika-abh08t0:1887_3: cittajānameva calanaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “sahajātassā”ti. Rūpassāti rūpakāyassa. Calaneti
tika-abh08t0:1887_5: calananti yujjati. Hetūti hetubhūtā sahakārīkāraṇabhūtā. Ettāvatā ca kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti?
tika-abh08t0:1887_6: Kāyaviññatti nāma neva phandamānarūpakāyo, na ca phandamānā vāyodhātu, atha kho mahantaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1887_7: pāsāṇaṃ ukkhipantassa sabbathāmena gahaṇakāle sarīrassa ussāhanavikāro viya rūpakāyassa
tika-abh08t0:1887_8: paripphandanapaccayabhāvena labbhamāno eko ākāravikāro kāyaviññatti nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1888_0: Nanu ca phandamānavaṇṇādivinimutto koci vikāro atthi, tassa vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:1888_1: gahaṇaṃ hotīti kathametaṃ viññāyatīti? Adhippāyaggahaṇato. Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu
tika-abh08t0:1888_2: rukkhacalanādīsu adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, hatthacalanādīsu pana diṭṭhaṃ, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1888_3: phandamānavaṇṇādivinimutto koci vikāro atthi adhippāyassa viññāpakoti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1888_4: ekantena. Ñāpako ca hetu sayaṃ gahitoyeva attano ñāpetabbamatthaṃ ñāpeti, na vijjamānamattenāti.
tika-abh08t0:1888_5: Ñāpetabbavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ vikāraggahaṇampi anumānato siddhaṃ. Tathā hi vadanti –
tika-abh08t0:1893_0: Yadi vikāraggahaṇameva kāraṇamadhippāyaggahaṇassa, kasmā aggahitasaṅketānaṃ adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1893_1: na hotīti? Na kevalaṃ vikāraggahaṇameva adhippāyassa gahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ, atha kho
tika-abh08t0:1893_2: purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca imassa upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi araññe udakatitthe
tika-abh08t0:1893_3: ussāpetvā ṭhapitagosīsādīni udakanimittāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
tika-abh08t0:1893_5: atthī”ti jānanaṃ, evaṃ phandamānavaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tadanantappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
tika-abh08t0:1894_0: 681-2. Sahajarūpacalanassa viññattivikārasahitāya vāyodhātuyā hetubhāvo yutto, kiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1894_1: sabbā eva vāyodhātu sahajarūpaṃ cāletīti imaṃ codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “labhitvā panupatthambha”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:1894_2: vuttaṃ. Upatthambhetīti upatthambhaṃ, upatthambhakapaccayanti attho. Ekāvajjanavīthiyanti
tika-abh08t0:1894_4: Heṭṭhāhi chahi ca cittehīti sattasu javanesu heṭṭhimehi chahi javanehi samuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1894_5: vāyodhātuṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvāti sambandho. Keci pana potthakesu “vāyodhātusamuṭṭhita”nti
tika-abh08t0:1894_6: pāṭhaṃ disvā upatthambhanti bhāvasādhanavasena gahetvā heṭṭhā chahi cittehi uppannavāyodhātusamuṭṭhitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1894_7: upatthambhaṃ labhitvāti yojenti. Viññattisahitattanāti sayaṃ viññattisahitā attanā
tika-abh08t0:1894_8: sahajātaṃ cittajarūpaṃ desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati, na itarāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1895_0: Ayaṃ panetthādhippāyo – yathā nāma sattahi yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭe sattamayugayuttā
tika-abh08t0:1895_1: eva goṇā heṭṭhā chasu yugesu yuttagoṇehi laddhupatthambhā sakaṭaṃ cālenti, paṭhamayugādiyuttā
tika-abh08t0:1895_2: pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattameva sādhentā tesaṃ upatthambhakā honti, evamevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1895_3: sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahi javanehi samuṭṭhitavāyodhātuto laddhupatthambhā
tika-abh08t0:1895_5: sādhentā tassa upatthambhakā honti, desantaruppattiyeva cettha calanaṃ uppannadesato
tika-abh08t0:1895_6: kesaggamattampi dhammānaṃ calanābhāvato, itarathā dhammānaṃ abyāpāratā, khaṇikatā
tika-abh08t0:1895_7: ca na siyā. Kathaṃ panassa sahajarūpānaṃ desantaruppattiyā hetubhāvoti? Yathā attanā
tika-abh08t0:1895_9: evaṃ tehi saha tattha uppattiyevassa desantaruppattihetubhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1896_1: sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitāya eva ca visesitattā calanākārasahitāyeva vāyodhātu vikārasahitāti?
tika-abh08t0:1896_5: vikāraṃ viññattimācikkhanti. Teneva hi bhagavatā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññatti?
tika-abh08t0:1896_6: Yā kusalacittassa vā…pe… abyākatacittassa vā abhikkamantassa vā…pe… pasārentassa
tika-abh08t0:1896_7: vā kāyassa thambhanā santhambhanā santhambhitattaṃ viññatti viññāpanā viññāpitattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1896_8: Idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññattī”ti santhambhanasandhāraṇānampi paccayabhāvākāro kāyaviññattīti
tika-abh08t0:1896_9: vutto. Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatāvacanaṃ suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1897_0: 683-4. Cittajātāya pathavīdhātuyā upādinnakaghaṭṭane paccayo yo ākāravikāro, ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1897_1: vacīviññatti viññeyyāti sambandho. Tattha cittajātāyāti vacībhedappavattakacittasamuṭṭhānāya.
tika-abh08t0:1897_3: kicce ghaṭṭanassāti attho. Paccayoti tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto. Eko ākāravikāroti
tika-abh08t0:1897_4: ghaṭṭiyamānaupādinnarūpato, ghaṭṭanti yā pathavīdhātuto ca vinivaṭṭo pathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1897_7: Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ gayhati, evamidha
tika-abh08t0:1897_8: suyyamānasaddasavanānantaranti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idañca santhambhanādīnaṃ abhāvena ghaṭṭanena
tika-abh08t0:1897_9: saddhiṃyeva saddassa uppajjanato “labhitvā panupatthambha”ntiādinayo na labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1897_10: Ghaṭṭanañhi paṭhamajavanādīsupi labbhateva. Tenāha “saddavasā”ti. Atha ghaṭṭanacalanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1897_11: ko visesoti? Ghaṭṭanaṃ paccayavisesena bhūtakalāpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āsannataruppādatā,
tika-abh08t0:1897_12: calanaṃ ekassāpi desantaruppādanaparamparatāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Gosīsādiupamāpettha
tika-abh08t0:1897_13: yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbā. Sāvāti sā eva sahasaddā viññatti. Sakyakulindunāti suparisuddhagaganatalassa
tika-abh08t0:1897_14: sakkarājakulassa avabhāsakaṭṭhena tassa nisākarabhūtena. Atha vā indati paramissariyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1897_15: karotīti indu. Indu-saddassa uttamavācakattā sakkakuluttamenāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1898_0: 685. Atha viññatti tāva sahasaddāva, saddo pana cittajo aviññattiko atthīti ce? Natthīti
tika-abh08t0:1898_1: dassento āha “saddo na cittajo”tiādi. Viññattighaṭṭananti viññattipaccayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1898_2: ghaṭṭanaṃ. Dhātusaṅghaṭṭanenevātiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ samattheti. Yasmā dhātusaṅghaṭṭaneneva
tika-abh08t0:1898_3: saddo jāyati, na tena vinā, tasmāti attho. Anena ca ye vadanti “vitakkavipphārasaddo
tika-abh08t0:1898_4: na sotaviññeyyoti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā cittasamuṭṭhāno vitakkavipphārasaddo
tika-abh08t0:1898_5: viññattiyā vināpi uppajjati. ‘Yā tāya vācāya viññatti viññāpanā’ti hi vacanato asotaviññeyyena
tika-abh08t0:1898_6: saddena saha viññatti na uppajjati, tatova cittajopi saddanavako atthī”ti, tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1898_7: vādaṃ paṭikkhipati. Mahāaṭṭhakathāvādopi hi saddova hoti, na sotaviññeyyoti viruddhametanti
tika-abh08t0:1898_8: maññamānehi saṅgahakārehi paṭikkhittova. Ānandācariyo pana mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ appaṭikkhipitvāva
tika-abh08t0:1898_10: sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatī”ti sutte, paṭṭhāne ca oḷārikaṃ saddaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:1898_11: sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo vuttoti iminā adhippāyena vitakkavipphārasaddassa
tika-abh08t0:1899_0: 686-7. Viññāpanatoti vacīghosena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā. Sayaṃ viññeyyatoti gahaṇānusārena
tika-abh08t0:1899_1: vacīghosena vā hetunā sayaṃ viññeyyattā. Tassāti viññattisaddassa. Sambhavo kārakadvayeti
tika-abh08t0:1899_2: viññāpayatīti viññatti, viññāyatīti viññattīti evaṃ hetumhi, kammani vā tassa sambhavo
tika-abh08t0:1899_3: nibbatti hotīti attho. Kiṃ panetaṃ viññattidvayaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, udāhu kammādisamuṭṭhānanti
tika-abh08t0:1899_4: āha “na viññattidvaya”ntiādi. Aṭṭha rūpāni viyāti sakasakakalāpagataaṭṭharūpāni viya,
tika-abh08t0:1899_5: viññattidvayassa ekato vuccamānattā kāyaviññattisahajakalāpe saddo na labbhatīti
tika-abh08t0:1900_0: Yathāvuttavikāraggahaṇamukhena “ayaṃ idaṃ nāma kātukāmo”ti taṃsamaṅgino adhippāyo
tika-abh08t0:1900_2: vikārattā tassā kāyavipphandanassa hetubhāvākārena paccupaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “kāya…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1901_0: Keci panettha “ghaṭṭane paccayoti vuttattā ghaṭṭanānantaraṃ saddassa uppatti hotīti
tika-abh08t0:1901_2: utusamuṭṭhānova saddo uppajjati, so pana cittapaccayattā pariyāyena cittasamuṭṭhānoti
tika-abh08t0:1901_3: vuccatī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ matena cittajasaddoyeva na labbhati, tasmā evaṃ aggahetvā
tika-abh08t0:1901_4: udakatāpanakāle antoudakeyeva uppajjanakasaddo viya upādinne ghaṭṭetvā uppajjamānacittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1901_5: uppattisamakālameva tasmiṃ kalāpe navamaṃ hutvā antoyeva bhūtikasaddo uppajjatīti
tika-abh08t0:1901_6: gahetabbaṃ, tasmā cittasamuṭṭhānasaddopi vacīviññattivaseneva uppajjati, accharāpaharaṇādisaddo
tika-abh08t0:1902_0: 688. Viggahābhāvato na kassati, kasituṃ chindituṃ na sakkotīti akāso, soyeva ākāsoti
tika-abh08t0:1902_1: āha “na kassatīti ākāso”ti, ko panesoti āha “rūpānaṃ vivaro”ti, kaṇṇacchiddādirūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1902_2: antaranti attho. Anena ajaṭākāsamāha. Yo…pe… paricchedoti pana iminā idhādhippetamākāsaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1903_0: Rūpāni paricchindati, sayaṃ vā tehi paricchijjati, tesaṃ vā paricchedamattanti rūpaparicchedo,
tika-abh08t0:1903_1: taṃ lakkhaṇametassāti rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇo. Ayañhi taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindanto
tika-abh08t0:1903_2: viya hoti. Tenāha “rūpapariyantappakāsanaraso”ti. “Ayaṃ rūpānaṃ heṭṭhimo pariyanto,
tika-abh08t0:1903_3: ayaṃ uparimo”ti evaṃ vibhāvanakiccoti attho. Atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1903_4: hutvā gayhati, tasmā vuttaṃ “rūpamariyādapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti. Etthāha – kiṃ panesa rūpe
tika-abh08t0:1903_6: udāhu ekekasamuṭṭhānaekekakalāpato, ekekarūpato vāti? Ekekasamuṭṭhānaekekakalāpatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1904_0: Yadi hi catusamuṭṭhānakalāpato, ekasamuṭṭhānabahukalāpato vā paricchindati, evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1904_1: sati samphuṭṭhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā paricchindeyya, ekakalāpagatarūpānaṃ viya nānākalāpagatarūpānampi
tika-abh08t0:1904_2: avinibbhogavuttitā vā āpajjeyya. Atha vā ekekarūpato paricchindati, evaṃ sati ekekakalāpagatarūpānampi
tika-abh08t0:1904_3: nānākalāpagatarūpānaṃ viya aññamaññavinibbhogavuttitāpasaṅgo siyā, ubhayampi panetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1905_1: vā chiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1905_3: Kiñcāpi hi kalāpantarabhūtā kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhāva ekaghanapiṇḍabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1905_4: pavattattā, tathāpi dhammato aññamaññaṃ vivittattā asaṃkiṇṇā eva. Tesaṃ yā vivittatā
tika-abh08t0:1905_5: aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇatā, ayaṃ paricchedo. Bhūtantarehi viya tehi so asamphuṭṭhova,
tika-abh08t0:1905_6: itarathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito. Abyāpibhāvo hi asamphuṭṭhatā.
tika-abh08t0:1905_7: Tenāha bhagavā imassa niddese “asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1906_0: Atha vā kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena paccupaṭṭhānato asamphuṭṭhatāpaccupaṭṭhānabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1906_2: vuttā. Rūpaparicchede hi sati chiddavivarabhāvo hoti. Yesaṃ rūpānaṃ paricchedo, tattheva
tika-abh08t0:1907_1: imassa rūpalahutādittayassa niddese sampatte idaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo. Heṭṭhā vuttanayenevāti
tika-abh08t0:1907_3: lahubhāvo lahutā”tiādinā rūpasambandhībhāvena rūpavikārāpi viññātabbā. Rūpassa lahubhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1907_4: lahutā, sā rūpassa garubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā, garubhāvanimmaddanarasā, adandhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
tika-abh08t0:1907_5: lahurūpapadaṭṭhānā. Rūpassa mudubhāvo mudutā, sā rūpassa thaddhabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1907_7: Rūpassa kammaññabhāvo kammaññatā, sā rūpassa akammaññabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā, akammaññabhāvanimmaddanarasā,
tika-abh08t0:1907_9: tattha tattha amhehi vuttānusārena veditabbo. Imā pana tisso rūpānaṃ vikārabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1908_2: veditabbaṃ. Tattha dhātukkhobhoti vātapittasemhapakopo, rasādidhātūnaṃ vā vikārāvatthā,
tika-abh08t0:1908_3: dvidhā vuttāpi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃyeva vikāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭipakkhapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:1908_4: sappāyautuāhārāvikkhittacittatā, sā ca taṃtaṃvikārassa visesapaccayabhāvato vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1908_5: avisesena pana sabbesaṃ paccayā, tathā hi te kadācipi aññamaññaṃ na vijahanti. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:1908_6: avijahantānaṃ pana dubbijānīyaṃ nānattanti taṃpakāsanatthaṃ “etāsa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1908_7: Kamatova nidassananti sambandho. Lahutāya hi arogī nidassanaṃ, mudutāya madditacammaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1909_0: Nanu cettha arogino tāva nidassanaṃ yuttaṃ tassa indriyabaddhasantānattā, suparimadditacammasudhantasuvaṇṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1909_1: pana kathaṃ. Na hi anindriyabaddharūpasantāne lahutādīni sambhavanti tathā dhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayābhāvato?
tika-abh08t0:1909_3: Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ tūlapicuādīsu lahubhāvādikanti? Na tattha paramatthato lahubhāvādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1909_4: atthi, garubhāvādihetūnaṃ pana abhāvato tattha lahubhāvādivohāro.
tika-abh08t0:1910_0: Kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti ekantena tāsaṃ paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā, itarathā sabbadābhāvinīhi
tika-abh08t0:1910_1: lahutādīhi bhavitabbaṃ siyāti. Adandhatālakkhaṇāti agarubhāvalakkhaṇā. Garubhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1910_2: vinodanaṃ khipanaṃ apanayanaṃ kiccametissāti garubhāvavinodanarasā. Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1910_3: rūpānaṃ garubhāvaṃ vinodetuṃ na sakkoti, garurūpapaṭipakkhānaṃ pana adandharūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1910_4: vikārattā “jāti naṃ uppādetī”tiādīsu viya pariyāyena garubhāvaṃ vinodeti nāma. Tassañhi
tika-abh08t0:1910_5: vijjamānāyaṃ uppannarūpānaṃ agarubhāvoyevāti. Esa nayo mudutākammaññatāsu. Cetasikalahutādayo
tika-abh08t0:1910_6: pana attano attano paccanīkānaṃ taṃtaṃakusaladhammānaṃ viddhaṃsakabhāvena pavattantīti
tika-abh08t0:1910_7: vikāramattabhāvato nippariyāyeneva tāsaṃ taṃkiccatā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Lahuparivattitapaccupaṭṭhānāti
tika-abh08t0:1910_8: adandhassa arogīpurisassa aparāparaṃ saṅkanti parivattanaṃ viya adandhaparivattanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1910_9: hutvā paccupaṭṭhānāti attho. Yassa rūpassa lahutā, tattheva vikārabhāvena upalabbhanato
tika-abh08t0:1910_10: lahurūpapadaṭṭhānā. Evamitarāsupi. Athaddhatāti akathinatā. Attano mudubhāveneva
tika-abh08t0:1910_11: sabbakiriyāsu aviruddhā hutvā paccupaṭṭhātīti avirodhitāpaccupaṭṭhānā. Mudu hi katthaci
tika-abh08t0:1910_12: na virujjhati. Tīsupi ṭhānesu paṭipakkhatthe a-kāro. Dandhatādihetūnaṃ paṭipakkhasamuṭṭhānattā
tika-abh08t0:1910_13: lahutādīnanti keci. Apare pana sattāpaṭisedheti vadanti. Sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1910_15: Akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma hotīti kammaññatā adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1911_0: 692. Rūpānamācayo yotiādīsu yo nipphannarūpānaṃ ādito cayo, yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato
tika-abh08t0:1911_1: āgatassa viya cayoti vā ācayasaṅkhāto rūpānaṃ paṭhamuppādo vaḍḍhi ca, so upacayoti
tika-abh08t0:1911_2: uddese vutto “upaññattaṃ upasitta”ntiādīsu viya upa-saddassa paṭhamūpariatthadassanato.
tika-abh08t0:1911_3: Yā pana tesaṃyeva rūpānaṃ anuppabandhatā anuppabandhavasena pavatti, sā santatīti
tika-abh08t0:1911_4: pavuccati. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hi rūpuppattiādicayabhāvato ācayo nāma, tato paraṃ yāva
tika-abh08t0:1911_5: sattarasamacittuppādā vaḍḍhibhāvato upacayo nāma. Tadā hi rūpassa kammacittautūhi
tika-abh08t0:1911_6: cayoyeva, na hāni. Atha vā yāva āhārasamuṭṭhāna rūpuppādo, cakkhādiuppādo vā, tāva
tika-abh08t0:1911_7: upacayo nāma, tato paraṃ pana cutipariyosānaṃ santati nāma. Evañca katvā –
tika-abh08t0:1912: “Yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yo rūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa santatī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1913: Evaṃ upacayasantatīnaṃ atthato nānattābhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttāya pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1914_0: “Ācayo nāma nibbatti, upacayo nāma vaḍḍhi, santati nāma pavattī”ti vatvā “nadītīre
tika-abh08t0:1914_1: khatakūpasmiñhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo nibbatti, paripuṇṇakālo viya upacayo
tika-abh08t0:1914_2: vaḍḍhi, ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati pavattī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1915_0: Upamā vuttā. “Rūpānamācayo”ti cettha bahuvacananiddesena uppādo nāma uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1915_1: vikāro. Vikāratte ca sati attano vikāravantadhammabhedabhinnattā ekakkhaṇepi uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1915_2: bahūnampi rūpānaṃ visuṃ visuṃyeva uppādavikārabhāvo, na piṇḍassevāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1915_3: Na kevalañca rūpānameva uppatti īdisī, atha kho arūpadhammānampi uppādo rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1915_4: jaratā, aniccatā, rūpassa lahumudukammaññatā cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1916_0: 693. Jātirūpanti dīpitaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ubhayassapi rūpuppādasabhāvattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1916_1: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā vibhajja vuttaṃ? Bhagavatā tatheva desitattā. Bhagavatāpi kasmā
tika-abh08t0:1916_2: tathā desitanti āha “vuttamākāranānattā”tiādi. Ākāranānattaṃ heṭṭhā vibhāvitameva.
tika-abh08t0:1916_3: Akkharassa paṭhamuppatti upacayo, punappunaṃ uppatti santati. Evaṃ tisamuṭṭhānarūpānampi
tika-abh08t0:1916_4: daṭṭhabbanti evaṃ tesaṃ ākāranānattaṃ vaṇṇenti. Veneyyānaṃ vasena vāti tadā kira
tika-abh08t0:1916_5: sotūnaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, ayaṃ jāti sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhavo, sayaṃ pana na
tika-abh08t0:1916_6: kutoci jāyati, yathā taṃ “pakativādīnaṃ pakatī”ti. Tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ vidhamento “jāti
tika-abh08t0:1916_7: nāma na aññā, upacayasantativasena ṭhitā rūpuppattiyeva pana tathā vuccati, sā ca
tika-abh08t0:1916_8: yassa uppādo, tassa paccayeheva jātapariyāyaṃ labbhatī”ti dassanatthaṃ upacayo santatīti
tika-abh08t0:1917_0: Pubbantato pubbakoṭṭhāsato, anāgatabhāvatoti attho. Uppajjamāne rūpadhamme uppādo
tika-abh08t0:1917_1: anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ummujjāpanaraso”ti. “Ime rūpadhammā
tika-abh08t0:1917_2: sampaṭicchatha ne”ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti vuttaṃ “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1917_3: Paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā upari cayo upacayoti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1917_4: Yathā uppādakkhaṇappattaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti ādikamme tappaccayavasena, evaṃ uppādakkhaṇagataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1918_0: Pavattilakkhaṇāti anuppabandhato uppattivasena pavattamānarūpānaṃ pavattananti lakkhitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1918_1: Anuppabandhanarasāti pubbāparavasena anuppabandhanakiccā. Asati hi uppāde pubbāparavasena
tika-abh08t0:1918_2: anuppabandho na siyā. Anuppabandharasattāyeva anupacchedavasena gahetabbato āha “anupacchedapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1920_0: Pākaṭā rūpadhammesu khaṇḍiccādibhāvena dantādīsu vikāradassanato, itarā tadabhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1920_1: apākaṭā. Kāmaṃ rūpadhammānampi khaṇikajarā paṭicchannā eva, yā “avīcijarā”ti vā vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1920_2: Arūpadhammānaṃ pana jarāya suṭṭhu paṭicchannabhāvadassanatthaṃ “pākaṭā rūpadhammesū”ti
tika-abh08t0:1920_3: avisesena vuttaṃ. Khaṇḍiccādivikāro pana khaṇikajarāya natthi. Rūpaparipāko rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1920_4: jiṇṇatā, jaraṃ pattassa bhaṅgo avassaṃbhāvīti vuttaṃ “upanayanarasā”ti, bhaṅgūpanayanakiccāti
tika-abh08t0:1920_6: na ca tadā dhammasabhāvaṃ vijahati. Navabhāvo uppādāvatthā, tassā apagamabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1920_8: abhinavabhāvāpagamanakaro vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya. Vīhipurāṇabhāvo sabbāvatthāni apaneti,
tika-abh08t0:1920_9: ayaṃ pana kevalaṃ uppādāvatthameva apaneti. Parito sabbato bhijjananti lakkhitabbāti
tika-abh08t0:1920_10: paribhedalakkhaṇā. Niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ, rūpaṃ pana khaṇabhaṅgitāya na niccanti aniccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1920_11: tassa bhāvo aniccatā. Sā pana ṭhitippattarūpaṃ ṭhitiyameva vināsanabhāvena saṃsīdentī
tika-abh08t0:1920_12: viya hotīti saṃsīdanarasā. Yasmā ca sā bhaṅgabhāvato khayavayākāreneva gayhati, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:1920_13: vuttaṃ “khayavayabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti. Anukkamena vināso khayo nāma, dīpavaṭṭikāya
tika-abh08t0:1920_14: saha telassa viya saha nirodho vayoti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1921_0: 696-7. Samodhānatoti rāsito. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Middharūpassa vadanasīlā, middhavādo
tika-abh08t0:1921_1: vā etesanti middhavādino. Middharūpaṃ nāmāti utucittāhāravasena tisamuṭṭhānaṃ middhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1921_2: nāma rūpaṃ. Te paṭikkhipitabbāti sambandho. Kathaṃ paṭikkhipitabbāti āha “munīsī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1921_3: Natthi nīvaraṇāti sotāpattimaggena vicikicchānīvaraṇassa, anāgāmimaggena kāmacchandabyāpādakukkuccanīvaraṇānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1921_4: arahattamaggena thinamiddhanīvaraṇānañca pahīnattā. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yadi middhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1921_5: rūpaṃ siyā, appahātabbaṃ bhaveyya. Rūpakkhandho abhiññeyyo pariññeyyo na pahātabbo
tika-abh08t0:1921_6: na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo. “Katame dhammā nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1921_7: Catūsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ, catūsu bhūmīsu vipāko, tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ, rūpañca
tika-abh08t0:1921_8: nibbānañca, ime dhammā nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti vacanena rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1921_9: pahānābhāvato. Evañca sati tassa nīvaraṇabhāvo virujjheyya nīvaraṇānaṃ pahātabbattā.
tika-abh08t0:1922: “Yā me kaṅkhā pure āsi, taṃ me akkhāsi cakkhumā;
tika-abh08t0:1923: Addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti. –
tika-abh08t0:1924_0: Nīvaraṇappahānena bhagavato thomanaṃ yujjeyya. Yadi siyā, “rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1924_1: taṃ pajahathātiādivacanato rūpassa pahātabbatāpi paññāyatīti? Taṃ na, tabbisayachandarāgappahānassa
tika-abh08t0:1924_2: tattha adhippetattā. Tenāha bhagavā “yo, bhikkhave, rūpe chandarāgavinayo, taṃ tattha
tika-abh08t0:1924_3: pahāna”nti. Na ca panetaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ etthāpi “tabbisayachandarāgappahānavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:1924_4: vutta”nti sādhakavacanabhāvato, kāmacchandādīnaṃ tattha pahānassa anadhippetattā
tika-abh08t0:1924_5: ca, tasmā “natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādivacanehi virujjhanato na middhaṃ rūpanti.
tika-abh08t0:1925_0: Yadi pana paro daḷhamūḷhaggāhitāya taṃvisayachandarāgappahānavaseneva nīvaraṇappahānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1925_1: adhippetanti sakavādaṃ oḍḍeyya, tassa tannisedhanatthaṃ puna thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1925_3: Thinamiddhanīvaraṇañceva avijjānīvaraṇañca nīvaraṇena sampayuttanti sambandho. Idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1925_4: vuttaṃ hoti – “catūhi sampayogo”ti vacanato arūpadhammānameva aññamaññassa sampayogo
tika-abh08t0:1925_5: labbhati, na rūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññaṃ arūpena vā, tasmā yadi middhaṃ rūpaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1925_6: na taṃ sampayogavacanamarahatīti. Atha siyā – yathālābhavacanamettha sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1925_7: “sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tiādīsu viya. Yathā hi
tika-abh08t0:1925_9: caraṇāyogato macchagumbāpekkhāya caraṇaṃ, ubhayāpekkhāya ṭhānanti evaṃ yathālābho
tika-abh08t0:1925_10: yojīyati, evamidhāpi thināpekkhāya sampayogavacanaṃ, ubhayāpekkhāya nīvaraṇavacananti?
tika-abh08t0:1925_11: Tampi na, rūpabhāvasseva asiddhattā. Siddhe hi rūpabhāve asambhavato yathālābhayojanā
tika-abh08t0:1925_12: yujjeyyāti. Ettakeneva middhassa arūpabhāve siddhepi yathā dvikkhattuṃ bandhaṃ subandhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1925_13: hoti, evamanekasuttasādhitaṃ appadhaṃsiyaṃ hotīti paṭṭhānappakaraṇe “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1925_14: paṭicca…pe… paccayā”ti imassa vibhaṅge “arūpe…pe… uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ arūpabhavuppattimpi
tika-abh08t0:1926_0: Ettha siyā – “pañcime, bhikkhave, āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā”tiādīsu thinamiddhassa nīvaraṇabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1926_1: ekato āgatattā idhāpi “thinamiddhanīvaraṇa”nti ekato vuttaṃ, thinameva ca pana arūpabhave
tika-abh08t0:1926_2: uppajjati thinamiddhanti? Tayidamasāraṃ, kukkuccassa na gahitattā. Yadi hi ekato
tika-abh08t0:1926_3: gahitamatteneva idhāpi ekato gahaṇaṃ siyā, kukkuccassapi tattha ekato vuttassa idha
tika-abh08t0:1926_4: gahaṇaṃ sambhaveyya, na ca panevaṃ atthi uddhaccanīvaraṇantveva vuttattā, tasmā na
tika-abh08t0:1926_5: tassa arūpabhavuppattiṃ sakkā paṭibāhitunti. Ādi-saddena “kevalo hāyaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-abh08t0:1926_6: akusalarāsi, yadidaṃ pañca nīvaraṇā, ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya, vigatathinamiddhoti
tika-abh08t0:1926_7: tassa thinamiddhassa cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā, tena
tika-abh08t0:1926_8: vuccati vigatathinamiddhoti, idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā thinamiddhamhā sodheti visodheti

tika-abh08t0:1972_5: abhāvena visayo kiccabhāvadhammo na vutto. Yasmiñhi bhave visayī natthi, tasmiṃ taṃhetuko
tika-abh08t0:1972_6: nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ, yathā tattheva
tika-abh08t0:1972_7: rūpabhave pathavītejovāyodhātūnaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanabhāvena. Yassa pana yattha vacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1972_8: tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto, yathā tattheva
tika-abh08t0:1972_9: rūpāyatanassa. Yadi visayīsabbhāvahetuko visayassa nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo, kathamasaññasattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1972_10: dve āyatanāni pātubhavanti. Asaññasattānañhi cakkhāyatanaṃ natthi. Atha tadabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1972_11: rūpāyatanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayoti? Nāyaṃ virodho. Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1972_12: gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ, tena na rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ

tika-abh08t0:1972_14: atthi, tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena

tika-abh08t0:1972_16: katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Etadatthañhi dhammāyatananti sāmaññato nāmakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1972_17: piṭṭhivaṭṭakāni vā tāni katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ. Yena ca pana adhippāyena
tika-abh08t0:1972_18: asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ, tena saññīnaṃ, asaññīnampi gandhāyatanādīnaṃ visuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1972_19: gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni
tika-abh08t0:1973_0: Asatipi hi tattha attano indriyesu rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1973_1: rūpāyatanantveva vuccati. Iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1973_2: aṭṭha āyatanāni, asaññīnaṃ pañcāti ayamattho dassito hoti. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1973_3: aññathā rūpaloke phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ brahmūnaṃ vacīghoso eva ca
tika-abh08t0:1973_4: na siyā. Na hi paṭighaṭṭananighaṃsanamantarena saddappavatti atthi, na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1973_5: katthaci aphusanasabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanassa ca bhūtattayassa abhāve
tika-abh08t0:1973_6: rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā, tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi
tika-abh08t0:1973_7: pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto. Evañca katvā
tika-abh08t0:1973_8: rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighatāvacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi “asaññasattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1973_9: anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe… dve mahābhūtā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1974_0: Paṭigho ca nāma bhūtattayassa kāyapasādaṃ pati tannissayabhūtaghaṭṭanaṃ dvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1974_1: idha pana taṃsabhāvatā, so ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvo ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1974_2: Yadi tattha asatipi visayimhi rūpāyatanampi gahetvā “dve āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ, atha
tika-abh08t0:1974_3: kasmā gandhāyatanādīni gahetvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti na vuttanti? Nayadassanavasena desanā
tika-abh08t0:1974_4: pavattāti vuttovāyamattho. Atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1974_5: pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya, na pana itaresaṃ abhāvato, nāpi pariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1975_0: Asaññīnañhi rūpāyatanaṃ samānatalavāsīnaṃ vehapphalānaṃ, uparibhūmikānañca suddhāvāsānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1975_1: pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ gacchati, na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tattha avacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1975_2: Kathāvatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ parijānantaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:1975_3: paṭisedho kato. Yadipi cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na
tika-abh08t0:1975_4: hoti, atthibhāvadīpanampi pana aññavacanaṃ natthevāti? Nayidamevaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tattha
tika-abh08t0:1975_5: tesaṃ atthibhāvassa niddhāretvā vuttattā. Yañhi aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1975_6: taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ avigarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā.
tika-abh08t0:1975_7: Tattha siyā “yaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, taṃ pamāṇaṃ, idaṃ pana virujjhatī”ti?
tika-abh08t0:1975_8: Nayidamevaṃ, yathā na virujjhati, tathā paṭipāditattā. Cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ, tannissayānañca
tika-abh08t0:1975_9: viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1975_10: dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi tesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva, tasmā yathā pāḷiyā
tika-abh08t0:1975_11: avirodho hoti, tathā cakkhudasakādivasena idha rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya
tika-abh08t0:1976_0: 756. Jaccandhabadhirāti chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ dīghakaraṇaṃ. Na hi jaccandhabadhiraaghānarahite
tika-abh08t0:1976_1: napuṃsake vatthukāyajivhādasakavasena idha tiṃsāti yujjati, idañca “opapātikassa
tika-abh08t0:1976_2: jaccandhabadhiraghānarahite napuṃsake jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni
tika-abh08t0:1976_3: uppajjantī”ti aṭṭhakathāvādaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Ānandācariyo pana taṃ “pāḷiyā na sametī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1976_4: vatvā paṭikkhipati. Tathā cāha “netaṃ pāḷiyā sametī”ti. Na hi pāḷiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1978: “Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti, kassaci dasāyatanāni, kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni, kassaci navāyatanāni, kassaci sattāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1979_0: Vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti. Yadi hi aghānakassāpi upapatti
tika-abh08t0:1979_1: siyā, tikkhattuṃ “dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, tikkhattuñca “navāyatanāni
tika-abh08t0:1979_2: pātubhavantī”ti, na cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yamake ca ghānajivhānaṃ sahappavatti vuttāti taṃ
tika-abh08t0:1979_3: upaparikkhitvā gahetabbanti. Ayañhettha ācariyassa adhippāyo – dhammahadayavibhaṅgapāḷiyañhi
tika-abh08t0:1979_8: cakkhusotaghānavikalopi uppajjeyya, tassa aṭṭhevāyatanāni vattabbāni siyuṃ, na ca
tika-abh08t0:1979_9: vuttaṃ “aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti, tasmā nattheva cakkhusotaghānavikalo. Sati
tika-abh08t0:1979_10: aghānakaupapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1979_11: siyā. Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1979_12: ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ andhāghānakassa, badhirāghānakassa ca vasena “kassaci aparāni
tika-abh08t0:1979_13: navāyatanāni, kassaci aparāni navāyatanānī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Kāmabhave ajivhassa
tika-abh08t0:1979_14: sattassābhāvato, ghānajivhāyatanānaṃ sahappavattivacanato ca tattheva kāmadhātuyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1980_1: vasena tiṃsarūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ, na opapātikassa. Dhammahadayavibhaṅgapāḷiyañca
tika-abh08t0:1980_2: ‘upapattikkhaṇe’ti vuttattā opapātikasseva vasena nayo nīto. Yamakaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-abh08t0:1980_3: vuttaṃ ‘kāmadhātuyaṃ aghānako opapātiko natthi. Yadi bhaveyya, kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni
tika-abh08t0:1980_6: opapātika-ggahaṇameva kataṃ, na pana saṃsedaja-ggahaṇaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1980_7: saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1980_9: vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanaṃ yoniṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ ‘opapātikāna’nti vuttanti
tika-abh08t0:1980_10: ca, tasmā na koci pāḷivirodho”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1981_0: Apare panāhu – “kāmadhātuyaṃ aghānako opapātiko natthi. Yadi bhaveyya, kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni
tika-abh08t0:1981_1: pātubhavantīti vadeyyāti idaṃ manussesu saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, te paripuṇṇāyatanāva.
tika-abh08t0:1981_2: Kesañci pana aghānakakīṭānaṃ atthibhāvato apāyesu saṃsedajopapātike sandhāyetaṃ vutta”nti
tika-abh08t0:1982_1: vuttaavakaṃsaparicchedassa ca majjhe. Anurūpato…pe… vibhāvināti jātiandhassa saṭṭhi
tika-abh08t0:1982_2: rūpāni cakkhudasakābhāvato, tathā badhirassa sotadasakābhāvato, andhabadhirassa pana
tika-abh08t0:1982_3: paṇṇāsa cakkhusotadasakābhāvatotiādinā nayena aññamaññāpekkhāya paripuṇṇā paripuṇṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1982_4: rūpānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ vasena rūpānaṃ samuppatti viññātabbāti attho. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1983_0: 759-60. Evaṃ tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiyaṃ rūpappavattiṃ dassetvā idāni pavattiyaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1983_1: “sattavīsati rūpānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmāvacarasattassa hi paripuṇṇāyatanassa asati
tika-abh08t0:1983_2: andhabadhirādipasādavighāte yāva maraṇacittassa heṭṭhā sattarasamacittaṃ, tāva sattavīsati
tika-abh08t0:1983_3: rūpāni pavattanti. Aparipuṇṇāyatanassa pana jaccandhādikassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1983_4: hāyanavaḍḍhanāni veditabbāni. Nanu aṭṭhavīsatiyeva rūpāni kāmabhave pavattantīti
tika-abh08t0:1984_0: Ghānaṃ…pe… na vijjareti kāmavirāgabhāvanāvasena gandhādiggāhakesu pasādesu virattā
tika-abh08t0:1984_1: hontīti ghānādittayaṃ natthi. Cakkhusotesu pana anuttaradassanādiatthaṃ virattā na
tika-abh08t0:1984_2: hontīti tāni tesaṃ uppajjanti. Bhāvadvayaṃ kāmarāgūpanissayattā na uppajjati. Keci
tika-abh08t0:1984_4: hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhehi lahutādīhi bhavitabba”nti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1984_5: Na hi vūpasametabbapaccanīkāpekkho tabbirodhidhammuppādo. Tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu
tika-abh08t0:1984_6: kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvo eva siyā, tasmā pañceva rūpāni saññībrahmānaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1984_7: avasesāni tevīsati rūpāni uppajjanti. Asaññībrahmānaṃ pana pañca pasādarūpāni, bhāvadvayaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1984_8: hadayavatthu, viññattidvayaṃ, lahutādittayanti terasa rūpāni vajjetvā avasesāni pannarasa uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1985_0: 761. Catusantatīti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena catusantatirūpāni. Rūpe honti tisantatīti
tika-abh08t0:1985_1: brahmānaṃ anāhārabhāvena āhārajarūpānaṃ abhāvato tisso santatiyo. Dvisantatīti cittajāhārajānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1985_2: abhāvato dve santatiyo. Bahiddhā ekasantatīti kammajādīnaṃ tissannampi abhāvato utujasantatiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1986_0: 762-4. Evaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu rūpānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ vatvā idāni tattha nesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1986_1: uppattikkamaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ nibbattamāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbesanti kāmarūpabhavikānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1986_2: sabbasattānaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe panāti ettha dasakattayaṃ hotīti pāṭhaseso. Tenāha
tika-abh08t0:1986_3: “yathevā”tiādi. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dasakattayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttampi “tañca kho sandhicittassā”tiādikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1986_4: visesaṃ dassetuṃ puna vuttaṃ. Cittassa tīsu khaṇesu kammajarūpānaṃ samuppattito āha
tika-abh08t0:1987_0: Ānandācariyo pana “cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇameva natthi, bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca rūpuppādo natthīti
tika-abh08t0:1987_1: catusamuṭṭhānikānipi rūpāni cittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva hontī”ti āha. Vuttañhi tena
tika-abh08t0:1987_2: – yo cettha cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇo vutto, so ca atthi natthīti vicāretabbo. Cittayamake
tika-abh08t0:1987_3: hi “uppannaṃ uppajjamāna”nti etassa vibhaṅge “bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ no ca uppajjamāna”nti
tika-abh08t0:1987_4: ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe cā”ti. Tathā”na uppajjamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1987_5: na uppanna”nti ettha “bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ no ca na uppanna”nti ettakameva
tika-abh08t0:1987_6: vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe cā”ti. Evaṃ “na niruddhaṃ na nirujjhamāna”nti
tika-abh08t0:1987_8: atikkantakālavāre ca “bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkanta”nti vatvā “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti
tika-abh08t0:1987_9: avacanaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇābhāvaṃ cittassa dīpeti. Suttepi hi “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1987_10: tasseva ekassa aññathattābhāvato yassā aññathattaṃ paññāyati, sā santatiṭṭhitīti
tika-abh08t0:1987_11: na na sakkā vattuṃ. Vijjamānaṃ taṃkhaṇadvayasamaṅgī ṭhitanti. Yo cettha cittassa
tika-abh08t0:1987_12: nirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādo vutto, so ca vicāretabbo. Kasmā? “Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1987_13: nirujjhati, tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti? No”ti vuttanti, na ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva
tika-abh08t0:1987_14: sandhāya paṭikkhepo katoti sakkā viññātuṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpādhikārassa abhāvāti.
tika-abh08t0:1988_1: “cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ nāma natthī”ti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Na hi yathādhammasāsane
tika-abh08t0:1988_2: abhidhamme labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ dissati. Na kevalaṃ abhidhamme avacanameva
tika-abh08t0:1988_3: cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇabhāvajotakaṃ, apica kho “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evamāgatā
tika-abh08t0:1988_4: suttantapāḷipi. Aññathattaṃ nāma pubbāparaviseso. Apica yathā bhūto dhammo uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1988_5: kiṃ tathā bhūtova bhijjati, udāhu aññathā bhūto. Yadi tathā bhūtova bhijjati, na
tika-abh08t0:1988_6: jaratāya sambhavo. Aññathā bhūto, añño eva soti sabbathāpi ṭhitikkhaṇassa abhāvoyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1988_7: Yadi ca cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpaṃ uppajjeyya, taṃ dukkhasaccanti katvā “no”ti vattuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1988_8: na sakkā, vuttañca, tasmā viññāyati “cittassa nirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādo natthī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1989_1: uppādanirodhānaṃ añño uppādakkhaṇo, añño nirodhakkhaṇo. Uppādāvatthañhi upādāya uppādakkhaṇo,
tika-abh08t0:1989_2: nirodhāvatthaṃ upādāya nirodhakkhaṇo. Uppādāvatthāya ca bhinnā nirodhāvatthāti ekasmiṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1989_3: ca sabhāvadhamme yathā icchitabbā, aññathā aññoyeva dhammo uppajjati, añño nirujjhatīti
tika-abh08t0:1989_4: āpajjeyya, evaṃ nirodhāvatthāya viya nirodhābhimukhāvatthāyapi bhavitabbaṃ, sā ṭhiti
tika-abh08t0:1990_0: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā pāḷiyaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇo na vuttoti? Vineyyajjhāsayānurodhena nayadassanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1990_1: pāḷigatīti veditabbāti. Abhidhammadesanāpi hi kadāci vineyyajjhāsayānurodhena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1990_2: yathā rūpassa uppādo “upacayo santatī”ti bhinditvā desito. Hetusampayuttadukādidesanā
tika-abh08t0:1990_3: cettha nidassitabbā. “Yassa vā panā”tiādipucchāya vissajjane ca arūpalokaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ

tika-abh08t0:2064_2: kārako vedako”ti attano laddhitāya “tassa hi kārakassa vedakassā”ti vuttaṃ. Kusalākusalānamabhāvopi
tika-abh08t0:2064_3: siyā, itarathā ahetukadosāpattitoti adhippāyo. Tesaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ āyattā vutti
tika-abh08t0:2064_4: etesanti tadāyattavuttino. Tesanti kusalākusalādīnaṃ. Tasmāti kārakābhāve kusalākusalānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2064_5: tabbipākānañca abhāvato. Niratthikāti desetvāpi bodhetabbābhāvato niratthikā. “Nāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2064_6: niratthikā”ti vatvāpi “sātthikā”ti vacanaṃ pana parassa daḷhaggāhatthaṃ. Lokepi hi
tika-abh08t0:2064_7: evaṃ vohāraṃ voharanti, evameva bhavati, nāññathātiādi. Tatthāti kārakābhāvepi attā
tika-abh08t0:2064_8: atthīti gahaṇe. Anurodhoti anukūlapakkhapātoti attho. Idhāti kārakābhāvepi kusalādayo
tika-abh08t0:2065_0: Evaṃ kārakābhāvepi kusalādīnaṃ sabbhāvaṃ yuttito sādhetvā idāni lokasiddhena nidassanena
tika-abh08t0:2065_1: sādhetuṃ “athāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Athāpīti kārakābhāvepi. Pathavi-ggahaṇena pathavojaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2065_2: dasseti. Tathā āpa-ggahaṇena āpojaṃ. Tejoti sītuṇhavasena duvidhā tejodhātu. Utūti
tika-abh08t0:2065_3: hemantādiutu. Ādi-ggahaṇena bījādike saṅgaṇhāti. Janakapaccayo hetu, anupālanakapaccayo
tika-abh08t0:2065_4: paccayo nāmāti āha “hetupaccayasāmaggiyā”ti. “Phalanibbattako hetu, paccayo anupālanako”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2066_0: Evaṃ kārakābhāvepi kusalākusalappavattiṃ sādhetvā idāni paraparikappitaṃ attānameva
tika-abh08t0:2066_1: tāva paṭikkhipituṃ “athāpi cetthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Kāmaṃ paññāparibāhiradiṭṭhiyā eva
tika-abh08t0:2066_2: attā parikappīyati, paro pana “paññāya parikappemī”ti maññatīti tassa laddhivasena
tika-abh08t0:2066_3: “paññāya parikappito”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ upaparikkhissāma tāvāti tiṭṭhatu tāva cesā kārakābhāvepi
tika-abh08t0:2066_4: kusalādīnaṃ bhāvābhāvavicāraṇā paṭhamaṃ tameva attānaṃ upaparikkhissāmāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2066_5: Dosamettha vattukāmo pucchatīti adhippāyena paṭiññaṃ adatvāva pucchanto āha “kiñcetthā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2066_6: Sacetano vā udāhu acetano vāti ettha ko dosoti attho. Itaro ubhayathāpi dosoyeva.
tika-abh08t0:2066_7: Yañhi acetanaṃ attānaṃ, na taṃ kārakaṃ, vedakañca, yathā taṃ pākārataruādayo. “Acetanovāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2066_8: attā”ti anumānena kārakavedakattābhāvasiddhitoti dassetuṃ “yadi acetano”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2066_9: Anaññoti avinibbhogavasena anañño. Itarathā “sacetano”ti vacanameva na upapajjeyya.
tika-abh08t0:2066_10: Sahabhāvī nāma añño na hotīti. Attanopi nāso siyāti avinibbhogavuttirūpesu ekassa
tika-abh08t0:2066_11: nāse itarassāpi vināso viya. Cetanāyapi nāso na bhavati avinibbhogarūpesu ekassa
tika-abh08t0:2067_0: “Cetanāya anaññattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā tameva samatthetuṃ “cetanattāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2067_1: “Attano anāse sati cetanāyapi vināso na bhavatī”ti sutvāpi parassa niruttarabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2067_2: cetanāya nāse visesakāraṇābhāvatoti adhippāyenāha “atha cetanāyayevā”tiādi. Attāva
tika-abh08t0:2067_3: nassatu, tiṭṭhatu cetanā. Ko hi visesakāraṇābhāve attani anurodho, cetanāya virodhoti
tika-abh08t0:2067_4: adhippāyo. Paṭiññā hīnāti pubbe dinnapaṭiññā parihīnā. Atha na bhavati, “paṭiññā
tika-abh08t0:2067_5: hīnā”ti yadi attano vināse cetanāya avināso na bhavati. Cetanattānaṃ anaññabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2067_6: cetanāya nāse attanopi vināsappasaṅgato attā na nassatīti tava paṭiññā hīnā. Vuttappakārato
tika-abh08t0:2067_7: viparītaṃ vāti yathāvuttappakārato viparītaṃ. Cetanāya vināsepi attā na nassati,
tika-abh08t0:2067_8: attano pana avināsepi cetanā nassatīti evaṃ vā tava adhippāyo siyāti attho. Attā
tika-abh08t0:2067_9: nassatu, cetanā tiṭṭhatu aññabhāve ubhinnaṃ samānayogakkhamatāya bhavitabbatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2067_10: Paṭiññāhīno bhavasīti cetanāyeva nassati, attā na nassati paṭiññāya hīno bhavasi.
tika-abh08t0:2068_0: Idhāti aññattha pakkhe. Lakkhaṇakatanti aññamaññavisadisehi bhinnalakkhaṇehi kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2068_1: Desantarakatanti bhinnadesakataṃ. Jāto vedīyati ñāyatīti jātavedo, aggissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2068_2: Ḍayhamāneti uddhane pakkhipitvā paccamāne. Eko pavattipadeso imesanti ekadesā, tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2069_0: Avinibbhogatoti lakkhaṇato bhedepi ṭhānavasena avinibbhujjanato avisaṃsaṭṭhattā “ekadesatte”tiimasseva
tika-abh08t0:2069_1: vevacanavasena “avinibbhogabhāvepī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ ayuttanti taṃ “ubhinnaṃ ekadesatā
tika-abh08t0:2069_2: natthī”ti iminā saha na yujjati. Paṭiññā hīnāti yadi pubbapaṭiññā pamāṇaṃ, ayaṃ paṭiññā
tika-abh08t0:2069_3: hīnā. Yadi vā pana ayaṃ pamāṇaṃ, itarā hīnāti attho. Atha vā cetanāya attano padesavasena
tika-abh08t0:2069_4: nānatte attano acetanattabhāvappattito “sacetano attā”ti heṭṭhā tayā dinnapaṭiññā
tika-abh08t0:2070: Acetano attāti attā acetanoti katvā. Pubbe vuttadosatoti “yadi acetano siyā”tiādinā ādito vuttadosato. Tasmāti yasmā evaṃ upaparikkhiyamāne vimaddanasaho hoti, tasmā.
tika-abh08t0:2071: 779. Yadi evanti yadi paramatthato kusalākusalānaṃ kārako, tabbipākānañca vedako natthi, evaṃ sante atha kasmā bhagavatā vuttanti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2072: Sandhāvatīti saṃsarati. Attanā katakusalākusalakammapaccayattā vipākabhūtaṃ sukhadukkhampi attanā katameva nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “sukhadukkhaṃ sayaṃkata”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2076_0: Evaṃ vuttakhandhapaṭipāṭiādivasappavattaṃ saṃsāraṃ punappunaṃ pavattivasena paṭipanno.
tika-abh08t0:2076_1: Dukkhamassa mahabbhayanti assa saṃsārāpannassa sattassa jātiādidukkhaṃ mahabbhayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2077_0: 781. Bhārā have pañcakkhandhāti rūpādayo pañcakkhandhā bhārabhūtā, sīse nikkhittabhārasadisāti
tika-abh08t0:2077_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhārahāro ca puggalo tassa pañcakkhandhabhārassa hārako. Bhārādānanti
tika-abh08t0:2079: 783. Ekassa puggalassāti sambandho. Ekena kappenāti ekasmiṃ kappe.
tika-abh08t0:2081_0: “Tañca kho sammutivasena, na paramatthato”ti vatvā tadeva patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “nanu bhagavatā”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2081_1: vuttaṃ. “Kiṃ nu satto”ti gāthā vajirāya theriyā vuttāpi bhagavato adhippāyavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:2081_2: vuttattā bhagavatā vuttā nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “bhagavatā idampi vutta”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2082: 785. Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesīti rūpavedanādīsu kiṃ nāma satto puggaloti gaṇhāsi.
tika-abh08t0:2083: 786. Aṅgasambhārāti cakkādiavayavasambhāresu, cakkādiavayavānaṃ samodhānevāti attho. Saddoti vohāro.
tika-abh08t0:2084_0: Tasmāti yasmā evaṃ paramatthato sattassa abhāvo bhagavatā vutto, tasmā. Na vacanamattameva
tika-abh08t0:2084_1: ālambitabbaṃ adhippāyaṃ pahāyāti attho. Daḷhamūḷhova hutvā gaṇhātīti daḷhamūḷhaggāhī,
tika-abh08t0:2084_2: kāraṇe dassitepi apariccajanavasena gahaṇaṃ daḷhaggahaṇaṃ. Kāraṇasseva daṭṭhumasamatthatāvasena
tika-abh08t0:2084_3: gahaṇaṃ mūḷhaggahaṇaṃ. Tādisena na bhavitabbanti āha “na ca…pe… bhavitabba”nti. Suttapadānanti
tika-abh08t0:2085_0: Dve saccāni vuttāni tathā tathā vinetabbānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasenāti adhippāyo. Yesañhi
tika-abh08t0:2085_1: sammutidesanāya visesādhigamo hoti, tesaṃ sammutisaccavasena deseti. Yesañca paramatthadesanāya,
tika-abh08t0:2085_2: tesaṃ paramatthavasena deseti. Desabhāsākusalo viya ācariyo taṃtaṃdesavāsimāṇavānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2085_3: tāya tāya bhāsāya. Sammutisaccaṃ paramatthasaccañcāti ettha “puggalo satto itthī
tika-abh08t0:2085_4: puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo”tievamādi paramatthato avijjamānampi loke katasaṅketavasena
tika-abh08t0:2090_0: 787-8. Yo so imaṃ ganthaṃ accantaṃ satatampi cinteti, tassa tato siddhā paramā paññā
tika-abh08t0:2090_1: vepullabhāvaṃ gacchati. Adhiṃ cittasantāpaṃ nīharati apanetīti adhinīharaṃ. Vimatiyā
tika-abh08t0:2090_2: vicikicchāya, mohassa vā vināsaṃ karoti upanissayabhāvatoti vimativināsakaraṃ. Atthabyañjanasampadāya
tika-abh08t0:2090_3: manavaḍḍhanato piyakaraṃ. Vikasatīti dibbati. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane, abhidhamme vā.
tika-abh08t0:2096_0: 789. Evaṃ paramatthasammutivasena ubhayathāpi sabbadhamme saṅkhepato dassetvā idāni
tika-abh08t0:2096_1: yasmā tesu uggahaṇaparicchedādivasena kataparicayena atthakāmena kulaputtena ekaṃsato
tika-abh08t0:2096_2: bhāvanāya abhiyogo kātabbo, tasmā bhāvanānayaṃ saṅkhepato dassetumārabhanto āha “bhāvanānaya”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2096_4: attho. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ hitaṃ ānayati upanetīti hitānayo, taṃ hitānayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2096_5: Mānayanti mānento. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi anusāsanato sattānaṃ sukhaṃ ānetīti
tika-abh08t0:2096_6: sukhānayo, taṃ sukhānayaṃ. Paramaṃ byākaromi, paramaṃ bhāvanānayanti vā yojanā.
tika-abh08t0:2097_0: 790. Manussānaṃ dhammato uttaraṃ ñāṇadassananti sambandho. Tattha manussānaṃ dhammā
tika-abh08t0:2097_1: nāma manussānaṃ pakatidhammabhūtā dasa kusalakammapathā, tato uttaraṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2097_2: nāma mahaggatalokuttaradhammā. Te hi jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, paccakkhato viya dassanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2097_3: ca dassananti adhippetā. “Uttarimanussāna”nti vā yathāṭhitavaseneva sambandho. Bālamanussādito
tika-abh08t0:2098_0: 791. Saṅkassarasamācāretiādīhi sīlavisuddhiyā payojanadassanaṃ. Tattha saṅkāya saritabbo
tika-abh08t0:2098_1: samācāro assāti saṅkassarasamācāro. Yaṃ kiñci lāmakakammaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2098_2: bhavissatī”ti evaṃ pavattetabbāya saṅkāya attano vā pare yaṃkiñci mantente disvā
tika-abh08t0:2098_3: “mama idañcidañca asāruppaṃ jānitvā mantetī”ti evaṃ pavattasaṅkāya upagantabbasamācāroti
tika-abh08t0:2098_4: attho. Dussīleti etadeva vibhāvetuṃ “sīlavajjite”ti vuttaṃ. Dussīleti vā dūsitasīle
tika-abh08t0:2098_5: khaṇḍādibhāvaṃ upagatasīle. Sīlavajjiteti sabbena sabbaṃ sīlavirahite. Natthi jhānanti
tika-abh08t0:2098_6: lokiyajjhānampi tāva natthi. Kuto maggoti lokuttaramaggo kuto, kena kāraṇena lokuttaradhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2099_0: 792. Caranti tasmiṃ sīle paripūrakāritāya pavattantīti cārittaṃ. Vāritaṃ tāyanti
tika-abh08t0:2099_1: rakkhanti tena, vāritato vā attānaṃ tāyatīti vārittaṃ. Yaṃ bhagavatā “idaṃ kātabba”nti
tika-abh08t0:2099_2: paññattisikkhāpadapūraṇaṃ, idaṃ cārittaṃ nāma. Yaṃ “na kātabba”nti paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2099_3: tassa akaraṇaṃ vārittaṃ nāma. Acchiddantiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu majjhe
tika-abh08t0:2099_4: sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ, tassa sīlaṃ chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti, tabbiparītaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2099_5: acchiddaṃ. Yassa ādimhi vā ante vā bhinnaṃ, tassa pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2099_6: nāma hoti, tadaññaṃ akkhaṇḍaṃ. Kamassa ādarakaraṇavasena akkhaṇḍanti, kamavilaṅghanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2099_7: “akkhaṇḍamacchidda”nti vā pāṭho. Akammāsa-ggahaṇena asabalattampi vuttaṃ, sabalakammāsānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2099_8: bhedassa appamattakabhāvato. Ettako hi tesaṃ viseso. Yassa paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi sikkhāpadāni
tika-abh08t0:2099_9: bhinnāni, tassa piṭṭhiyā, kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarena
tika-abh08t0:2099_10: sabalavaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa antarantarā bhinnāni, tassa antarantarā
tika-abh08t0:2099_11: visabhāgavaṇṇabinducitragāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti. Yaṃ pana tathāvidhaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2099_13: saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi
tika-abh08t0:2099_14: devaññataro vā”ti evaṃ taṇhāya aparāmaṭṭhaṃ taṇhādāsabyato mocitattā bhujissaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2099_15: Adāsañhi loke bhujissoti vadanti. Yathāvuttaguṇapāripūriyā buddhādīhi viññūhi pasaṃsitabbanti
tika-abh08t0:2099_16: viññuppasatthaṃ. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Jhānādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2099_17: paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ visesabhāgiyaṃ samādhisaṃvattanikaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2100_1: dussīlassa suññāgārādīsu vasatopi bheravārammaṇādiāpāthagamanena dukkhasseva visesato
tika-abh08t0:2100_2: sampajjanato. Alaṅkāro anuttaroti devabrahmarājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ majjhe anaññasādhāraṇasobhāpaṭilābhahetutāya
tika-abh08t0:2100_3: niruttaro alaṅkāraviseso. Ratananti cakkavattīnaṃ cakkaratanāditopi savisesaṃ ratijananato
tika-abh08t0:2100_4: anuttaraṃ ratanaṃ. Cakkaratanādikañhi vaṭṭanissitameva ratiṃ janeti, idaṃ pana vivaṭṭanissitampi
tika-abh08t0:2100_5: janetīti visesato ratijanakaṃ hoti. Icchiticchitassa sampattivisesassa nipphādanato
tika-abh08t0:2100_6: cintāmaṇisamanti cintāmaṇi. Yānanti saṃsārakantārataraṇe yānaṃ. Sītalanti cittasītibhāvakaraṇena
tika-abh08t0:2100_8: dhovanaṃ. Guṇānaṃ mūlabhūtanti sabbesampi lokiyalokuttaraguṇānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ. “Sīle
tika-abh08t0:2100_9: patiṭṭhāya, ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca suvisuddha”nti ca ādivacanañhettha
tika-abh08t0:2100_10: nidassanaṃ. Dosānaṃ vītikkamavatthubhūtassa balassa vināsanato dosānaṃ balaghāti.
tika-abh08t0:2101_0: Tasmāti yasmā evaṃvidhānisaṃsasampannaṃ sīlaṃ, tasmā. Duvidhalakkhaṇanti okkhittacakkhuappasaddādivasena
tika-abh08t0:2101_2: patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇanti evaṃ duvidhalakkhaṇaṃ, cārittavārittavasena vā duvidhasabhāvanti
tika-abh08t0:2101_3: attho. Atthānaṃ kāmeti tassa hitāsīsanavasenāti atthakāmo. Piyaṃ sīlamassāti piyasīlo.
tika-abh08t0:2102_0: 798-9. Kātabbo palibodhassupacchedoti sambandho. Katividho panāyaṃ palibodho, kiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2102_1: sarūpo cāti āha “palibodhā dasā”tiādi, “āha mahāaṭṭhakathāya”nti adhippāyo. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:2102_2: āvāsoti ekampi ovarakaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva sakalopi saṅghārāmo, so tattha paṭibaddhacittassa
tika-abh08t0:2102_3: palibodho, na itarassa. Kulanti ñātikulaṃ vā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ vā, taṃ tehi saṃsaṭṭhaviharatova
tika-abh08t0:2102_4: palibodho. Lābhoti cattāro paccayā, tepi tattha sāpekkhasseva palibodhā. Gaṇoti suttantikagaṇo
tika-abh08t0:2102_5: vā ābhidhammikagaṇo vā. So uddesaparipucchādānena samaṇadhammassa okāsālābhino palibodho.
tika-abh08t0:2102_6: Kammanti navakammaṃ, taṃ karontena vaḍḍhakiādīhi laddhāladdhaṃ jānitabbaṃ, katākate
tika-abh08t0:2102_7: ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbanti sabbathāpi palibodho. Addhānanti maggagamanacittassa dubbinodanīyatāya
tika-abh08t0:2102_8: taṃ samaṇadhammassa palibodho. Ñātīti ettha kula-ggahaṇena ñātikulassapi gahitattā
tika-abh08t0:2102_9: ekekā ñāti idha gahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Ye pana vihāre ācariyupajjhāyādayo, ghare mātādayo,
tika-abh08t0:2102_10: te gilānā palibodhā. Ābādhoti yo koci rogo, so bādhayamāno palibodho. Ganthoti pariyattipariharaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2102_11: taṃ sajjhāyādīhi niccabyāvaṭasseva palibodho. Iddhīti pothujjanikaiddhi. Sā hi dupparihārā
tika-abh08t0:2102_12: appamattakeneva bhijjati, ayaṃ pana vipassanāya palibodho, na samādhissa samādhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2103_0: 800-2. Palibodhassupacchedaṃ katvāti ettha paṭhamo tattha nirapekkhacittatāya, dutiyo
tika-abh08t0:2103_1: asaṃsaggena, tatiyo lābhasakkāruppattiṭṭhānaṃ pahāya aññattha gamanena, catuttho
tika-abh08t0:2103_2: yathāraddhaganthasamāpanena, aññassa saṅgāhaṇena vā, pañcamo yathāraddhakammassa
tika-abh08t0:2103_3: niṭṭhāpanena, saṅghādīnaṃ niyyātanena vā, chaṭṭho gantvā kiccatīraṇena, sattamo upaṭṭhahitvā
tika-abh08t0:2103_4: ñātīnaṃ pākatikakaraṇena, aṭṭhamo bhesajjakaraṇena, vīriyādhiṭṭhānena vā, navamadasamā
tika-abh08t0:2103_5: tattha abyāvaṭatāya upacchinditabbā. Upasaṅkamitabboti yattha so vasati, tattha upasaṅkamanavidhiñceva
tika-abh08t0:2103_6: upasaṅkamantena paṭipajjitabbavidhānañca visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Ito
tika-abh08t0:2103_7: parañhi ganthavitthārapariharaṇatthaṃ visuddhimagge āgatavitthāraṃ pahāya padatthavaṇṇanamattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2103_8: karissāma. Kammaṭṭhānassāti ettha yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya, uparūparibhāvanākammassa
tika-abh08t0:2103_9: kāraṇabhāvato ca kammaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ pana sabbatthakapārihāriyavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:2103_10: mettā, maraṇassati, asubhasaññā ca sabbattha atthayitabbato icchitabbato sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2103_11: nāma. Cariyānukūlaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci kammaṭṭhānaṃ niccaṃ pariharitabbattā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2103_12: nāma. Imaṃ duvidhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ yo deti, ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānassa dāyako, sopi īdiso
tika-abh08t0:2103_13: pariyesitabboti dassetuṃ “piyo garū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Piyoti sīlasampadādīhi sattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2103_14: piyāyitabbo. Garūti tatoyeva garukātabbo pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ katvā daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2103_15: Bhāvanīyoti sambhāvanīyo. Vattāti kiñci ālasiyampi disvā codetvā ovādavasena vadanasīlo.
tika-abh08t0:2103_16: Vacanakkhamoti paṭipucchakkhamo, paṭipucchito asaṃhīro hutvā sambhāsanakkhamoti vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2103_17: hoti. Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattāti tiracchānakathaṃ akathetvā dasakathāvatthupaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2103_18: gambhīrameva kathaṃ kattā. No caṭṭhāne niyojakoti appavattitabbaṭṭhānabhūte ahite
tika-abh08t0:2103_19: na niyojako. Evamādiguṇopetanti ādi-saddena saddhāsampadādiguṇayogaṃ dasseti. Kālenāti
tika-abh08t0:2104_0: 803. Vattaṃ katvāti ācariyassa navakamahallakabhāvānurūpena khandhake āgataṃ ācariyavattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2104_1: katvā. Idāni ācariyena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “tenāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāpīti
tika-abh08t0:2104_2: kammaṭṭhānadāyakenapi. Caritaṃ ñatvā dātabbanti cetopariyañāṇalābhinā tassa cittācāraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2104_3: hadayalohitaṃ vā passitvā itarena “tvaṃ kiṃcaritosi, ke vā pana te dhammā bahulaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2104_4: samudācarantī”tiādinā paṭipucchitvā tassa caritaṃ jānitvā tadanurūpena dātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2105_0: 804. Iriyāpathāditopi kesañci caritaṃ jānituṃ sakkā, taṃ pana na ekantikaṃ, “caritaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2105_1: ñatvā”ti vuttaṃ, katamaṃ pana taṃ, katividhā vāti āha “caritaṃ panidaṃ rāgadosamohavasenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2105_2: Ussannabhāvena santāne caratīti caritaṃ, asati paṭipakkhabhāvanāyaṃ santāne pavattanārahā rāgādayo.
tika-abh08t0:2106: 805. Vomissakanayāti sampayogavasena, ekasantatipariyāpannatāvasena ca nesaṃ saṃsaggabhedā. Catusaṭṭhi bhavantīti –
tika-abh08t0:2109: Evaṃ vuttehi navahi sattakehi yathārahaṃ vibhajiyamānā tesaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ catusaṭṭhi bhavanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ upanandattherena –
tika-abh08t0:2110: “Rāgo doso ca moho ca, rāgena paṭighopi ca;
tika-abh08t0:2111: Saddhiṃ rāgena moho ca, mohopi paṭighena ca.
tika-abh08t0:2113: Saddhā buddhi ca takko ca, saddhiṃ saddhāya buddhi ca.
tika-abh08t0:2120: “Saddhiṃ rāgena saddhā ca, saddhiṃ teneva buddhi ca;
tika-abh08t0:2121: Teneva takkanaṃ tena, saddhābuddhi ca tena ca.
tika-abh08t0:2125: Saddhiṃ dosena saddhā ca, saddhiṃ teneva buddhi ca.
tika-abh08t0:2126: “Teneva takkanaṃ tena, saddhābuddhi ca tena ca;
tika-abh08t0:2130: “Saddhiṃ mohena saddhā ca, saddhiṃ teneva buddhi ca;
tika-abh08t0:2131: Teneva takkanaṃ tena, saddhābuddhi ca tena ca.
tika-abh08t0:2135: Ekamūle naye cevaṃ, ñeyyaṃ taṃ sattakattayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2137: Tehi saṅkappanaṃ tehi, saddhābuddhi ca tehi ca.
tika-abh08t0:2141: Missetvā rāgamohehi, saddhā teheva buddhi ca.
tika-abh08t0:2142: “Tehi saṅkappanaṃ tehi, saddhābuddhi ca tehi ca;
tika-abh08t0:2147: Tehi saṅkappanaṃ tehi, saddhābuddhi ca tehi ca.
tika-abh08t0:2151: Dvimūlamhi naye cevaṃ, ñeyyaṃ taṃ sattakattayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2153: Tehi saṅkappanaṃ tehi, saddhābuddhi ca tehi ca.
tika-abh08t0:2159_0: 806-7. Nanu ca “caritaṃ ñatvā dātabba”nti vuttaṃ, kiṃcaritassa pana kiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2159_1: anukūlanti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya taṃtaṃcaritānukūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā puna tassa
tika-abh08t0:2159_2: gaṇanato appanāvahato jhānappabhedato samatikkamato vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato ārammaṇato
tika-abh08t0:2159_3: bhūmito gahaṇato paccayato bhedaṃ dassetuṃ “asubhā cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha dasa
tika-abh08t0:2159_4: asubhāti uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2159_5: hatavikkhittakaṃ lohitakaṃ puḷavakaṃ aṭṭhikanti ime dasa. Tathā kāyagatāsati cāti
tika-abh08t0:2159_6: ime ekādasa rāgavikkhambhanassa upāyabhāvato rāgacaritassa anukūlā. Asubha-ggahaṇena
tika-abh08t0:2159_7: cettha tadārammaṇasamādhipubbaṅgamaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi yathārahaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2159_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Appamāṇasattārammaṇattā appamaññā, mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti catunnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2159_9: brahmavihārānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Te pana savaṇṇakasiṇā nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2159_10: odātakasiṇanti imehi catūhi vaṇṇakasiṇehi sahitā aṭṭha dosavikkhambhanupāyabhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:2160_0: 808. Taṃ…pe… panekakanti ettha ekakanti idaṃ anussatiapekkhaṃ, anussatīsu ekanti
tika-abh08t0:2160_1: attho, na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṃ tesaṃ aññassāpi anukūlassa labbhanato. Taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2160_2: pana mohacaritassa, vitakkacaritassa ca gaṇanabalena cittassa patiṭṭhānato anukūlaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2161_1: cāgānussati devatānussatī”ti idaṃ pāḷikkamena purimaṃ anussatichakkaṃ saddhācaritassa
tika-abh08t0:2161_2: atisappāyavasena anukūlaṃ. Maraṇūpasamāyuttā satīti maraṇe, upasame ca yuttā sati,
tika-abh08t0:2161_3: maraṇānussati, upasamānussati cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Āhāranissitā saññāti āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā.
tika-abh08t0:2161_5: Sesāni kasiṇānīti dosacaritassa anukūlesu vuttehi catūhi vaṇṇakasiṇehi avasesāni
tika-abh08t0:2161_6: pathavīāpotejovāyoālokākāsakasiṇāni, evaṃ purimāni cattāri, imāni chāti dasa imasseva
tika-abh08t0:2161_7: ujuvipaccanīkā, imassa asappāyanti gahetabbavisesassa abhāvato rāgādisabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāti vaṇṇitā.
tika-abh08t0:2162_2: ujuvipaccanīkavasena, atisappāyavasena ca idaṃ sabbaṃ visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ anukūlanti
tika-abh08t0:2162_3: vuttaṃ, na pana itarassa ananukūlabhāvato. Na hi rāgādīnaṃ avikkhambhikā, saddhādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2162_4: vā anupakārikā kusalabhāvanā nāma atthi. Tathā hi meghiyasutte –
tika-abh08t0:2163_0: “Cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā, asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya, mettā bhāvetabbā
tika-abh08t0:2163_1: byāpādassa pahānāya, ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāya, aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā
tika-abh08t0:2164_0: Ekasseva cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbāti vuttā. Tathā rāhulovādasuttepi “mettaṃ, rāhula,
