tika-abh08t0:2164_1: bhāvanaṃ bhāvehī”tiādinā satta kammaṭṭhānāni vuttāni, na cāyasmato meghiyassa cattāripi
tika-abh08t0:2164_2: caritāni santi, nāpi rāhulattherassa sabbacaritāni, tasmā vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2164_3: akatvā sabbattha adhippāyo pariyesitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2165_0: 813-4. Kiñcāpi vuttanayena kammaṭṭhānānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedopi sakkā ñātuṃ, saṅkarattā
tika-abh08t0:2165_1: pana sukhena viññātuṃ na sakkāti tesaṃ sāmaññato, visuṃ visuṃ jātito ca gaṇanaparicchedaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2165_2: dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānāni sabbānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cattālīsāti niddiseti pāḷito, aṭṭhakathāto
tika-abh08t0:2165_3: ca samodhānetvā “samacattālīsā”ti niddiseyya. Kathaṃ? Kasiṇāni dasa…pe… saññā cāhāratā
tika-abh08t0:2165_4: iti. Asubhānussatī dasāti dasa-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo “dasa asubhā, dasa anussatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2165_5: Dasa asubhā heṭṭhā kathitāva. “Purimānussatichakka”nti ettha vuttā cha, maraṇānussati
tika-abh08t0:2165_6: kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati upasamānussatīti imā dasa anussatiyo. Catudhātuvavatthānanti
tika-abh08t0:2165_7: pathavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vavatthānaṃ. Saññā cāhāratāti gāthābandhavasena ga-kārassa
tika-abh08t0:2165_8: lopaṃ katvā āhāragatā saññā “āhāratā saññā”ti vuttā. Āhāroyeva vā āhāratā, taggatā
tika-abh08t0:2165_9: ca saññā upacārato “āhāratā”ti vuttā, āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2166_0: 815-6. Kiṃ imesu sabbesuyeva kammaṭṭhānesu jhānaṃ nibbattatīti? Āma, nibbattati sabbesveva
tika-abh08t0:2166_1: upacārajjhānaṃ, appanājhānaṃ pana kesuci na nibbattati, tasmā kānici upacārameva
tika-abh08t0:2166_2: nibbattenti, kānici appanampi. Kathaṃ panetaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “etesū”tiādi. Upacārameva
tika-abh08t0:2166_3: āvahantīti upacārāvahā “apekkho”tiādīsu viya hettha avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:2166_4: ānāpānassatiṃ, kāyagatāsatiñca hitvā sesā buddhānussatiādayo aṭṭha anussatiyo, saññā,
tika-abh08t0:2166_5: vavatthānañcāti ete dasa nānappakārakattā, gambhīrattā, sabhāvadhammattā ca asati
tika-abh08t0:2167_0: 817-8. Evaṃ upacārappanāvahato dassetvā idāni jhānappabhedato dassetuṃ “appanāyāvahesū”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2167_2: ekekasseva ārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Pañcakanayavasena pana “pañcakajjhānikā”ti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2167_3: Paṭhamajjhānikāti paṭhamajjhānasseva ārammaṇabhūtā, paṭikkūlabhāvato pana itaresaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2167_4: ārammaṇāni na honti. Paṭikkūlepi hi visaye vitakkabalena paṭhamajjhānaṃ appeti caṇḍasotanadiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2167_5: arittabalena nāvā viya. Sesāni pana tadabhāvato na tesu appenti.
tika-abh08t0:2168_0: 819. Tikajjhānavahāti catukkanayena tikajjhānavahā, pañcakanayena pana catukkajjhānavahā,
tika-abh08t0:2168_1: mettākaruṇāmuditā hi mettādīnaṃ somanassasahagatānameva ārammaṇattā pañcamajjhānikā
tika-abh08t0:2168_2: na honti. Appanappattā hi mettādayo somanassena vinā nappavattanti. Catutthopi brahmavihāroti
tika-abh08t0:2168_3: sambandho. Brahmānaṃ uttamānaṃ vihāro, brahmabhūto vā vihāroti brahmavihāro, so upekkhābhāvanāvasena
tika-abh08t0:2168_5: netarassa. Kasmā? Mettādīnaṃ nissandattā. Yathā hi kasiṇānaṃ nissandā āruppā, yathā
tika-abh08t0:2168_6: ca samathavipassanānissandā nirodhasamāpatti, evaṃ mettādinissandā upekkhā. Āruppā
tika-abh08t0:2168_7: catutthajjhānikāti aṅgasamatāvasena āruppāpi catutthajjhānasseva pabhedāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2169_0: 820. Evaṃ jhānabhedato dassetvā puna samatikkamato dassetuṃ “vasenārammaṇaṅgāna”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:2169_1: vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇasamatikkamo aṅgasamatikkamoti atikkamitabbānaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ, aṅgānañca
tika-abh08t0:2169_2: vasena samatikkamo duvidho. Kiṃ sabbesveva duvidho labbhati, noti āha “gocarā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2169_3: tikkamo”ti. Catūsu hi āruppesu ārammaṇasamatikkamova hoti ākāsakasiṇavajjitesu navasu
tika-abh08t0:2169_4: ārammaṇesu aññataraṃ samatikkamitvā ākāsānañcāyatanassa, ākāsānañcāyatanādīni ca
tika-abh08t0:2169_5: samatikkamitvā viññāṇañcāyatanādīnaṃ pattabbattā, aṅgātikkamo pana arūpe natthi catunnañcāpi
tika-abh08t0:2169_6: aṅgānaṃ vasena samānattā. Rūpe jhānaṅgatikkamoti rūpāvacarikakammaṭṭhānesu vitakkādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2169_7: jhānaṅgānaṃ atikkamo, idañca labbhamānakavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamajjhānikesu duvidhopi
tika-abh08t0:2169_8: samatikkamo natthi, nīvaraṇasamatikkamo idha aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇattā na gahito.
tika-abh08t0:2170_0: 821. Evaṃ samatikkamavasena dassetvā puna vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanavasena dassetuṃ “daseva
tika-abh08t0:2170_1: kasiṇānī”tiādimāha. Imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:2170_2: Na ca…pe… asubhādayoti sesā asubhādayo pana neva vaḍḍhetabbā. Kasmā? Paricchinnākāreneva
tika-abh08t0:2170_3: upaṭṭhānato, ānisaṃsābhāvato ca. Tathā hi dasa asubhāni, kāyagatāsati ca attano ṭhitokāsena
tika-abh08t0:2170_4: paricchinnattā paricchinnākāreneva upaṭṭhahanti. Vaḍḍhitesupi kuṇaparāsi eva upaṭṭhātīti
tika-abh08t0:2170_5: na koci ānisaṃso atthi. Avaḍḍhitesupi hi tesu kāmarāgavikkhambhanā hotiyeva. Yadi
tika-abh08t0:2170_6: evaṃ, asubhajjhānānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatāvacanaṃ virujjhatīti? Na virujjhati. Ekacco
tika-abh08t0:2170_7: hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittaṃ gaṇhāti, ekacco appaketi iminā pariyāyena
tika-abh08t0:2170_8: ekaccassa parittārammaṇajjhānaṃ hoti, ekaccassa appamāṇārammaṇaṃ. Yo vā etaṃ ānisaṃsābhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2170_9: apassanto vaḍḍheyya, tassa vasena appamāṇārammaṇatā vuttā. Ānāpānanimittampi nāsikaggamukhanimittādiparicchinnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2170_10: upaṭṭhāti, vaḍḍhayatopi ca vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhati. Picupiṇḍādivasena upaṭṭhahantampi
tika-abh08t0:2170_11: hi nimittaṃ vātasaṅghāṭamattameva, tathā brahmavihāranimittampi vaḍḍhentassa sattarāsiyeva
tika-abh08t0:2170_12: vaḍḍheyya, na ca tena koci attho hoti, tasmā tadubhayampi na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2170_13: vuttaṃ “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādi, tampi pariggahavasena
tika-abh08t0:2170_14: vuttaṃ, na nimittavaḍḍhanavasena. Kiñci brahmavihāre paṭibhāganimittameva natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2170_15: kimayaṃ vaḍḍheyya, appamāṇārammaṇatā panettha pariggahitamattavasena veditabbā. Āruppārammaṇesu
tika-abh08t0:2170_16: ākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭamattattā kasiṇāpagamavaseneva manasi kātabbaṃ, tato paraṃ vaḍḍhayato
tika-abh08t0:2170_17: na kiñci hoti, viññāṇaṃ sabhāvadhammattā na sakkā vaḍḍhetuṃ, parikammameva hi vaḍḍhetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2170_18: sakkā, viññāṇāpagamo tassa abhāvamattattā, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanārammaṇampi sabhāvadhammattāyeva
tika-abh08t0:2170_19: na sakkā vaḍḍhetuṃ, tasmā tānipi na vaḍḍhetabbāni. Appamāṇārammaṇatā āruppānaṃ vipulakasiṇugghāṭimākāse
tika-abh08t0:2170_20: pavattiyā veditabbā. Buddhānussatiādayo ca animittattā na vaḍḍhetabbā. Paṭibhāganimittañhi
tika-abh08t0:2170_21: ayaṃ vaḍḍheyya, tañca nesaṃ natthi, tasmā ime asubhādayo tiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni paricchinnokāsattā,
tika-abh08t0:2171_0: 822-3. Evaṃ vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato dassetvā puna ārammaṇato dassetuṃ “daseva kasiṇānī”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2171_1: āraddhaṃ. Paṭibhāganimittāni honti ārammaṇānīti imāni dvāvīsa paṭibhāganimittabhūtāni
tika-abh08t0:2171_2: ārammaṇāni honti. Sesāti avasesā aṭṭhārasa neva paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2172_0: 824-5. Idāni bhūmito dassetuṃ “asubhānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Devesu nappavattanti tattha
tika-abh08t0:2172_1: asubhānaṃ, paṭikkūlassa ca āhārassa abhāvato. Tacapañcakampi hi tattha pavattamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2172_2: dibbānubhāvena paṭikkūlākārena nopaṭṭhāti. Assāsapassāsānaṃ brahmaloke abhāvato “ānāpānassati
tika-abh08t0:2172_3: cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Jhānānubhāvanibbattānañhi atthassa abhāvato natthi brahmaloke assāsapassāsā.
tika-abh08t0:2173_0: 827. Idāni gahaṇato dassetuṃ “catuttha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha catutthaṃ…pe… diṭṭheneva
tika-abh08t0:2173_1: gahetabbāti vāyokasiṇaṃ vajjetvā sesā nava kasiṇā, dasa asubhānīti imāni ekūnavīsati
tika-abh08t0:2173_2: diṭṭheneva vatthunā karaṇabhūtena gahetabbāni uggahetabbāni. Tathā ca vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2173_3: “diṭṭhena gahetabbāni, pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittaṃ nesaṃ gahetabbanti attho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2174_0: 828-31. Satiyampi ca kāyamhīti kāyagatāsatiyampi. Diṭṭhena tacapañcakanti tacapañcakamattameva
tika-abh08t0:2174_1: diṭṭhena gahetabbaṃ. Sesamettha sutenevāti ettha kāyagatāsatiyaṃ sesaṃ vakkapañcakādi
tika-abh08t0:2174_2: suteneva gahetabbaṃ. Iti kāyagatāsati diṭṭhasutena gahetabbā. Uttaroṭṭhanāsikaggesu
tika-abh08t0:2174_3: phuṭṭhassa assāsapassāsassa gahetabbato vuttaṃ “ānāpānassati ettha, phuṭṭhena paridīpitā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2174_4: Ucchusassādīnaṃ pattesu calamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena, sarīrasamphassavasena ca vātassa
tika-abh08t0:2174_5: gahetabbattā vuttaṃ “vāyokasiṇamevettha, diṭṭhaphuṭṭhena gayhatī”ti. Āditova gahetabbā
tika-abh08t0:2174_6: na hontītiādikammikena bhāvanārambhavasena na paṭṭhapetabbāni, heṭṭhime tayo brahmavihāre,
tika-abh08t0:2175_0: 832-5. Evaṃ gahaṇavasena dassetvā idāni paccayato dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānesu hetesū”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2175_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha etesu kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha yathārahaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ, jhānānañca gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2175_2: veditabbaṃ. Ākāsakasiṇassa ugghāṭetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ “ākāsakasiṇaṃ vinā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2175_3: Mettādiekekasmiṃ brahmavihāre tīṇi tīṇi jhānāni paṭilabhitvā ṭhitasseva upekkhābrahmavihāravasena
tika-abh08t0:2175_4: pañcamajjhānaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “tayo brahmavihārā”tiādi. Dvinnaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajavanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2175_5: samanantarā nirodhaṃ phusatīti katvā vuttaṃ “catutthamāruppa”ntiādi. Vipassanābhavasampattisukhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2175_6: paccayāti vipassanāya, bhavasampattiyā, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca paccayā hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2176_0: 836-9. Evaṃ pasaṅgena āgataṃ kammaṭṭhānavibhāgaṃ dassetvā puna ācariyena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2176_1: dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Santike vasantassāti ācariyena saddhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2176_2: ekagehe, ekavihāre vā vasantassa. Kathetabbanti pavattiṃ sutvā sutvā kathetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2176_3: Āgatassāgatakkhaṇeti sa-kāro padasandhimattakaro, āgatāgatakkhaṇeti attho. Atha vā
tika-abh08t0:2176_4: āgatassa āgatakkhaṇe kathetabbaṃ. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu āmeḍitasāmatthiyatova labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:2176_5: Na hi ekavārameva āgatassa tasmiṃ khaṇe kathetabbaṃ, tato paraṃ na kathetabbanti yujjati.
tika-abh08t0:2177_0: Nātisaṅkhepavitthāranti atisaṃkhittaṃ, ativitthārañca akatvā tassa sukhena uggaṇhanappamāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2177_1: kathetabbaṃ. Sace pana so pakatiyāva uggahitakammaṭṭhāno hoti, sajjhāyavasena vā
tika-abh08t0:2177_2: manasikāravasena vā kataparicayo, tassa ekaṃ, dve vā nisajjā attano sammukhāva sajjhāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2177_3: kāretvā dātabbaṃ. Evaṃ ācariyena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetvā puna gahitakammaṭṭhānena
tika-abh08t0:2177_4: tena yoginā uttari kātabbavidhānaṃ dassento āha “tenapī”tiādi. Sammaṭṭhānanti yattha
tika-abh08t0:2177_5: pahaṭo samati, taṃ sammaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ sammaṭṭhānaṃ viyāti sammaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā hi
tika-abh08t0:2177_6: sammaṭṭhāne gahite puggalaṃ attano verī abhibhavituṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ kammaṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:2177_7: gahite manobhusaṅkhāto kāmarāgo taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ abhibhavitvā attano vase kātuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2177_8: na sakkoti. Tena vuttaṃ “sammaṭṭhānaṃ viyāti sammaṭṭhāna”nti. Mano abhibhavatīti
tika-abh08t0:2179: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
tika-abh08t0:2184_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhārasahi vihāradosehi sabbakālaviyutte. Anurūpeti imesu aṭṭhārasasu
tika-abh08t0:2184_1: dosesu aññatarenapi samannāgato ananurūpo nāma, tadabhāvena attano yogakammassa anukūle.
tika-abh08t0:2184_2: Mahāvihārādayo hi yogakammassa anukūlā na honti, tasmā mahāvihāre tāva vattakaraṇādinā
tika-abh08t0:2184_3: palibodho hoti. Yattha pana sabbaṃ katameva, avasesāpi saṅghaṭṭanā natthi, evarūpo
tika-abh08t0:2184_4: mahāvihāropi anurūpova. Navavihāre bahuṃ navakammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti, tasmā so asati
tika-abh08t0:2184_5: aññasmiṃ anukūle kāraṇe ananurūpo hoti. Tathā jiṇṇavihāropi bahupaṭijaggitabbatāya
tika-abh08t0:2184_6: kammaṭṭhānantarāyiko. Panthanissitako āgantukehi rattindivaṃ samokiṇṇatāya. Yattha
tika-abh08t0:2184_7: soṇḍī nāma pāsāṇapokkharaṇī hoti, so soṇḍivihāro. Tattha bahū pānīyatthāya samosaranti,
tika-abh08t0:2184_8: tathā paṇṇapupphaphalavati vihāre taṃtadatthāya. Patthanīye lokasammate vihāre viharantaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2184_9: “arahā”ti sambhāventā bahū āgacchanti. Nagarasannissitepi vihāre visabhāgārammaṇāpāthagamanādīni
tika-abh08t0:2184_10: honti. Dārusannissite kaṭṭhahārikādīhi aphāsu hoti. Khettasannissite vihāramajjheyeva
tika-abh08t0:2184_12: te upavadanti. Paṭṭanasannissite abhiṇhaṃ nāvāsatthehi āgatamanussehi aphāsu hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2184_13: Paccantanissite manussā buddhādīsu appasannā honti. Rajjasīmasannissite dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2184_14: kalahe sati dvinnaṃ vijitesu piṇḍāya vicarantaṃ bhikkhuṃ “ayaṃ carapuriso”ti gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:2184_15: bandhanādikaṃ pāpeyyuṃ, asappāye amanussādiupaddavā honti. Kalyāṇamittānadhivutthe
tika-abh08t0:2184_16: uppannakaṅkhāya vinodake asati mahādosoyevāti etepi vihārā ananurūpā, tasmā tādise
tika-abh08t0:2184_17: vihāre parivajjetvā vuttadosavirahite anurūpe vihāre vihātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2185_0: Tassa pana vihārassa anurūpabhāvo evaṃ veditabboti dassetuṃ “gāmato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2185_1: Gāmatoti gocaragāmato. Nātidūreti gocaragāmassa aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya na atidūre.
tika-abh08t0:2185_2: Naccāsanneti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaragāmato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atisanne. Iminā
tika-abh08t0:2185_3: gamanāgamanasampannataṃ dasseti. Gocaragāmassa pana uttaradisāya vā dakkhiṇadisāya
tika-abh08t0:2185_4: vā nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ senāsanaṃ visesena gamanāgamanasampannaṃ hoti, nātidūranaccāsannatā
tika-abh08t0:2185_5: cettha nidassanamattaṃ. Pañcaṅgasaṃyuteti pana vuttattā nātidūranaccāsannatāya saha
tika-abh08t0:2185_6: divā appakiṇṇatādīni cattāri samodhānetvā pañcaṅgasaṃyuttatā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-abh08t0:2186_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2186_1: nātidūraṃ hoti naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā appakiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2186_4: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā
tika-abh08t0:2186_5: vinayadharā mātikādharā, te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati pañhaṃ ‘idaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2186_6: bhante, kathaṃ; imassa ko atthoti. Tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaranti, anuttānīkatañca
tika-abh08t0:2186_7: uttāniṃ karonti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-abh08t0:2186_8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2187_0: Ettha ca nātidūranaccāsannabhāvena gamanāgamanasampannatā paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ, divā mahājanasaṃkiṇṇatābhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:2187_3: catutthaṃ, bahussutatādiguṇasamannāgatānaṃ therānaṃ vasanabhāvo pañcamanti imehi
tika-abh08t0:2187_4: pañcahi aṅgehi saṃyutte samannāgate vihārasmiṃ vihātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2188_0: 840-1. Paṭhamaṃ vuttaāvāsādimahāpalibodhe upādāya khuddakapalibodho, idāni taṃ palibodhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2188_1: sarūpato dassetvā tassa upacchindanākāraṃ āvi kātuṃ “dīghā kesā”tiādi vuttaṃ. So
tika-abh08t0:2189_0: 842-5. Pavivitteti janavivitte okāse. Vajjetvā…pe… lohitanti ime cattāro kasiṇadosā,
tika-abh08t0:2189_1: tasmā evarūpā mattikā vajjetvā. Saṇhāyāti apanītatiṇamūlasakkharavālukāya sumadditāya
tika-abh08t0:2189_2: sukhumāya. Aruṇavaṇṇāyāti aruṇanibhāya, aruṇavaṇṇappabhāyāti attho. Bahiddhā vāpi
tika-abh08t0:2189_3: tādiseti bahiddhāpi vihārapaccante paṭicchannaṭṭhāne. Saṃhārimanti saṃharitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2189_4: gahetvā caraṇayogyaṃ. Tatraṭṭhakanti yattha kataṃ, tattheva tiṭṭhanakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2190_0: 847-50. Pamāṇatoti vakkhamānappamāṇato. Vaṭṭaṃ ākoṭetvāti parimaṇḍalaṃ katvā ākoṭetvā.
tika-abh08t0:2190_1: Tanti taṃ cammaṃ vā kaṭasāraṃ vā dussapaṭṭaṃ vā. Kaṇṇikanti kaṇṇikāsadisaṃ, parimaṇḍalato
tika-abh08t0:2190_2: padumakaṇṇikākāranti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “sama”nti. “Kaṇṇikāsama”nti vā pāṭho. Vidatthicaturaṅgulanti
tika-abh08t0:2190_3: caturaṅgulādhikavidatthippamāṇaṃ. Etadeva hi pamāṇaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “suppamatte
tika-abh08t0:2190_4: vā sarāvamatte vā”ti vuttaṃ. Vivaṭṭanti nibbānaṃ. Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontopi hi ettakeyeva
tika-abh08t0:2190_5: aṭṭhatvā nibbānatthāyeva vāyamati. Bherītalasamaṃ katvāti pāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā ninnatunnataṭṭhānābhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2190_6: bherītalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā. Sammajjitvāna taṃ ṭhānanti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2190_7: kasiṇaṃ oloketi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ sace uklāpaṃ hoti, sammajjitvā. Nhatvāti sarīradarathavinodanatthaṃ nhatvā.
tika-abh08t0:2191_0: 851-2. Tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalā hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ padeseti tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalassa,
tika-abh08t0:2191_1: ṭhapitaṭṭhānamhā aḍḍhateyyahatthantare padese, kasiṇamaṇḍalassa, pīṭhassa ca majjhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2191_2: hatthapāsappamāṇaṃ katvā paññatteti vuttaṃ hoti. Vidatthicaturaṅgule ucceti vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2191_3: hutvā ucce, vidatthicaturaṅgulapādaketi vuttaṃ hoti. Dūre nisinnassa hi kasiṇaṃ na
tika-abh08t0:2191_4: upaṭṭhāti, āsannatare nisinnassa hatthapāṇikāpadādayo kasiṇadosā paññāyanti. Uccatare
tika-abh08t0:2191_5: nisinnena ca gīvaṃ paṇāmetvā oloketabbaṃ hoti, nīcatare jaṇṇukāni rujjanti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2191_6: hatthapāsappamāṇe padese vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake pīṭhe nisīditabbaṃ. Yasmā catūsu
tika-abh08t0:2191_7: iriyāpathesu sayanaṃ kosajjapakkhiyaṃ, ṭhānacaṅkamanāni uddhaccapakkhiyāni, nisajjā
tika-abh08t0:2191_8: pana alīnuddhaccapakkhiyā, santo iriyāpatho, tasmā vuttaṃ “nisīditvā”ti, samantato
tika-abh08t0:2191_9: ūrubaddhāsanaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvāti attho. Yenākārena nisīdantassa nisajjā sukhā
tika-abh08t0:2191_10: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”ti. Uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t0:2191_11: aṭṭhārasapiṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvāti attho. Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanahārūni
tika-abh08t0:2191_12: na oṇamanti, athassa yā tesaṃ oṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na
tika-abh08t0:2191_13: uppajjanti. Tāsu anuppannāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati. Tato
tika-abh08t0:2191_14: ca pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati. Idāni ārammaṇapariggahupāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2191_15: dassento āha “katvā parimukhaṃ sati”nti, kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2191_16: Abhi-saddena hi samānattho idha pari-saddo, atha vā samīpatthena pari-saddena mukhassa
tika-abh08t0:2191_17: samīpe satiṃ katvāti attho. Yathāha – “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti supaṭṭhitā nāsikagge
tika-abh08t0:2191_18: vā mukhanimitte vā. Tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti. Atha vā “parīti
tika-abh08t0:2191_19: pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho, satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho. Tena vuccati ‘parimukhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2191_21: viya mukha-saddo niyyānaṭṭhoti katvā pariggahitaniyyānasatiṃ katvā sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2192_1: vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khematoti nekkhammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2192_2: khemato disvā kāmanissaraṇaṃ sabbadukkhasamatikkamassa upāyabhūtaṃ nekkhammanti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2192_3: nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ saupacārajjhānaṃ, nibbānaṃ, vipassanaṃ, sabbepi vā kusaladhamme
tika-abh08t0:2192_4: khemato nibbhayato disvā, tattha jātābhilāso hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Paramaṃ…pe… ratanattayeti
tika-abh08t0:2192_7: cittavivekādippavivekajassa sukhassa addhā ekantena bhāgī assaṃ, lābhī bhaveyya”nti
tika-abh08t0:2192_8: evaṃ paṭipattiyaṃ ānisaṃsadassanena tabbisayaṃ uttamaṃ mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā. Ākārena
tika-abh08t0:2192_10: samena ālocanākārena. Atiummīlayato hi atisukhumaṃ, avibhūtañca rūpagataṃ upanijjhāyato
tika-abh08t0:2192_11: viya cakkhu kilamati, attano sabhāvavibhāvanato ca maṇḍalaṃ ativibhūtaṃ hoti, tathā
tika-abh08t0:2192_12: vaṇṇato, lakkhaṇato vā upatiṭṭheyya, tenassa nimittaṃ nuppajjati. Atimandaṃ ummīlayato
tika-abh08t0:2192_13: ca gajanimīlakena pekkhantassa viya rūpagataṃ maṇḍalaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti. Dassane mandabyāpāratāya
tika-abh08t0:2192_14: kosajjapātato cittañca līnaṃ hoti, evampi nimittaṃ nuppajjati, tasmā yathā nāma ādāsatale
tika-abh08t0:2192_15: mukhanimittaṃ gaṇhanto na tattha atigāḷhaṃ ummīlati, na atimandaṃ, atha kho samena
tika-abh08t0:2192_16: ākārena gaṇhāti, evameva nātiummīlanādinā samena ākārena gaṇhantena bhāvetabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:2192_17: Nimittaṃ gaṇhatāti pathavīkasiṇe cakkhunā gahitaṃ nimittaṃ manasā gaṇhantena.
tika-abh08t0:2193_0: 856-7. Idāni nimittaggahaṇopāyaṃ dassetuṃ “na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na
tika-abh08t0:2193_1: vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo soti yo tattha pathavīkasiṇe aruṇavaṇṇo, so na cintetabbo vaṇṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:2193_2: manasikaroto vaṇṇakasiṇabhāvūpagamanato. Cakkhuviññāṇena pana gahitaggahaṇaṃ na sakkā
tika-abh08t0:2193_3: vāretuṃ, tenevettha “na oloketabbo”ti avatvā “manasānupekkhitā hotī”tiādīsu viya
tika-abh08t0:2193_4: manasā cintanavasena pekkhanaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Daṭṭhabbaṃ na ca lakkhaṇanti yaṃ tattha
tika-abh08t0:2193_5: pathavīdhātuyā thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ na manasikātabbaṃ tassa manasikāre dhātukammaṭṭhānassa
tika-abh08t0:2193_6: gahitattā. Vaṇṇaṃ pana amuñcitvāti disvā gahetabbattā pana vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā. Ussadassa
tika-abh08t0:2193_7: vasena hi cittaṃ paṇṇattidhammasminti pathavīdhātuyā sattito adhikabhāvena sasambhārapathaviyā
tika-abh08t0:2193_8: “pathavī”ti vohāro, tasmiṃ sasambhārapathaviṃ upādāya paññatte paṇṇattidhamme ādāsatalagatamukhanimitte
tika-abh08t0:2193_9: viya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā. Ekaggamānasoti puna nānārammaṇe cittaṃ avisāretvā ekaggamānaso
tika-abh08t0:2193_10: hutvā. Pathavī pathaviccevaṃ vatvāti ettha paṭhamasamannāhāre kassaci vacībhedopi
tika-abh08t0:2194_0: 858. Yadi vohāramatte cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, nāmantaravasena pathavī manasikātabbā bhaveyyāti
tika-abh08t0:2194_1: hotu, ko dosoti dassento āha “pathavī medanī”tiādi. Atha vā kiṃ pathavīnāmeyeva vutte
tika-abh08t0:2194_2: bhāvanā hoti, udāhu aññasmimpīti āha “pathavī medanī”tiādi. Ekaṃ vattumpi vaṭṭatīti
tika-abh08t0:2194_3: etesu yaṃ icchati, taṃ attano paguṇatāya vā pacuratāya vā āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ vattuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2194_4: vaṭṭati. Kiñcāpi evaṃ vaṭṭati, apica “pathavī”ti etadeva nāmaṃ pākaṭaṃ, tasmā pākaṭavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:2195_0: 859-60. Ummīlitvā…pe… tāva soti yāva vakkhamānākārena uggahanimittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2195_1: tāva kiñci kālaṃ cakkhuṃ ummīlitvā nimittaggahaṇavasena pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā
tika-abh08t0:2195_2: puna kiñci kālaṃ cakkhūni nimīlitvāti evaṃ vārasatampi vārasahassampi tato bhiyyopi
tika-abh08t0:2195_3: ummīlitvā so yogī āvajjeyya, yenākārena oloketvā gahitaṃ, tenākārena taṃ samannāhareyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2196_0: 861-3. Āpāthaṃ tu yāti ceti yadi manodvārikajavanānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ upagacchati, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2196_1: uggahanimittaṃ tadā uppannanti pavuccatīti yojanā. Yadi uggahanimittepi pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2196_2: oloketvā bhāveti, paṭibhāganimittuppatti na siyā. Samīpaṭṭhena ca na sakkā anoloketunti
tika-abh08t0:2196_3: vuttaṃ “nisīditabbaṃ no ceva”ntiādi. Yathāsukhaṃ nisinnena, yathāsukhaṃ vā bhāvetabbanti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2197_0: 864-5. Papañca…pe… dhovaneti passāvādinā kenaci karaṇīyena nisinnaṭṭhānato aññattha
tika-abh08t0:2197_1: gantvā puna āgamma nisīdantena pādā dhovitabbā honti. Adhotapādena hi senāsanaṃ akkamato
tika-abh08t0:2197_2: āpatti hoti, khaṇe khaṇe pādadhovane ca papañco hoti, tasmā tassa parihāratthaṃ dve
tika-abh08t0:2197_3: upāhanāyeva icchitabbā. Tāva bahutalikā saddampi janeyyuṃ, saddo ca jhānakaṇṭako,
tika-abh08t0:2197_4: tasmā vuttaṃ “ekatalikā”ti. Tathā “parissayavinodanatthaṃ kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo”ti
tika-abh08t0:2197_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Asappāyena kenacīti vakkhamānena āvāsādiasappāyesu kenacideva
tika-abh08t0:2197_6: asappāyena. Taṃ ṭhānanti kasiṇamaṇḍalassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ. Ādāya taṃ punāti yathājātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2197_7: uggahanimittaṃ puna gahetvā, puna uppādetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2198_0: 866-7. Pīṭhe sukhanisinnenāti puna vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vuttaniyāmena pīṭhe sukhanisinnena.
tika-abh08t0:2198_1: Bhāvetabbanti taṃ nimittaṃ manasikāravasena vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Samannāharitabbanti sammā
tika-abh08t0:2198_2: āvajjitabbaṃ, sammā vā anu āharitabbaṃ. Takkāhatanti “takkanato takko”ti evaṃ laddhanāmena
tika-abh08t0:2198_4: kammaṭṭhānaṃ āhataṃ, pariyāhatañca kātabbaṃ, balappattavitakko manasikāro bahulaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2199_0: 868-70. Taṃ icchatīti taṃ nimittaṃ manasikātuṃ icchati. Evaṃ karontassāti evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2199_1: takkāhataṃ karontassa. Yathā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahati, evaṃ anuyuñjantassa,
tika-abh08t0:2199_2: evaṃ karoto pana yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti, tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2199_3: dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhupatthambhāni vitakkādīni
tika-abh08t0:2199_4: kāmāvacarāneva jhānaṅgāni bahūni hutvā pātubhavanti. Tato ca tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā
tika-abh08t0:2199_5: kāmacchandādayo saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi dūrībhavanti. Tena vuttaṃ “vikkhambhanti…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2199_6: pañca nīvaraṇānipī”ti. Samādhiyati…pe… yoginoti tassa yogino paṭibhāganimittaṃ ārabbha
tika-abh08t0:2200_0: 871-4. Imassāti paṭibhāganimittassa. Purimassāti uggahanimittassa. Thavikāti ādāsathavikato.
tika-abh08t0:2200_1: Balākā viya toyadeti meghasamīpe balākā viya. Sā hi meghassa nīlattā sayaṃ atiparisuddhā
tika-abh08t0:2200_2: upaṭṭhāti, tadā taṃ upaṭṭhātīti sambandho. Evaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalūpamādīhi uggahanimittato
tika-abh08t0:2200_4: Uggahanimitte aṅgulipadapāṇikāpadādayo kasiṇadosā paññāyanti, idaṃ pana vuttanayena
tika-abh08t0:2200_5: tatopi sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ suvisuddhaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti attho. Tanusaṇṭhānavantantiādi
tika-abh08t0:2200_6: aparamatthasabhāvattā vuttaṃ. Yadi hi taṃ edisaṃ bhaveyya, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:2200_7: oḷārikaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ tilakkhaṇāhaṭaṃ, na panetaṃ tādisanti. Yadi panetaṃ na saṇṭhānādivantaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2200_8: kathaṃ jhānassa ārammaṇabhāvoti āha “upaṭṭhā…pe… maya”nti. Tattha paññajanti bhāvanāmayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2200_9: paññājanitaṃ, bhāvanāpaññāya sañjānanamattanti vuttaṃ hoti. Na hi asabhāvadhammassa
tika-abh08t0:2200_10: kutocisamuṭṭhānaṃ atthi. Tenāha “bhāvanāmayaṃ upaṭṭhānākāramatta”nti, kevalaṃ samādhilābhino
tika-abh08t0:2200_11: bhāvanāvisesajanitaṃ tammayaṃ upaṭṭhānākāramattameva bhāvanāvisesānubhāvena upaṭṭhātīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2201_0: 875-8. Vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāneva na puna tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2201_1: Paṭibhāganimitte hi uppajjamāneyeva taṃvisayaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ nīvaraṇe vikkhambhentameva
tika-abh08t0:2201_2: uppajjati. Kilesā sannisinnāvāti avasesā tadekaṭṭhakilesā ca sammadeva nisinnā, upasantāti
tika-abh08t0:2201_3: attho. “Upacārasamādhinā”ti vutte itaropi samādhi atthīti atthato āpannanti tampi
tika-abh08t0:2201_4: dassetuṃ “ākārehi pana dvīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dvīhi ākārehīti jhānadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2201_5: thirabhāvappatti cāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. Idāni tāni kāraṇāni samādhiavatthāmukhena
tika-abh08t0:2201_7: Tassa paṭilābheti yadatthāya ayaṃ paṭipanno, tassa appanāsamādhissa paṭilābhe adhigamāvatthāyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2201_8: Kathaṃ upacārabhūmiyaṃ samādhiyati, kathañca appanābhūmiyanti āha “nīvāraṇappahānenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2201_9: Upacārakkhaṇe yadipi jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni na honti, tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2201_10: paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena cittaṃ samādhiyati, paṭilābhabhūmiyampi appanāpattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2202_0: 879-80. Aṅgāni…pe… na cāti upacārakkhaṇe aṅgāni na ca thāmajātāni neva bhāvanābalappattāni
tika-abh08t0:2202_1: hontīti attho. Appanāyāti appanakkhaṇe. Tasmāti yasmā aṅgāni thāmajātāni jāyare,
tika-abh08t0:2202_2: tasmā. Appanācittaṃ divasampi pavattatīti yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:2202_3: divasampi tiṭṭheyya, evamevaṃ appanāsamādhimhi uppanne jhānacittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2202_4: chinditvā uppannaṃ kevalaṃ rattimpi divasampi kusalajavanapaṭipāṭivaseneva pavattatīti
tika-abh08t0:2202_5: attho. “Appanāpattaṃ divasampi pavattatī”ti vadatā upacārakkhaṇe na tathāti dassitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2202_6: hoti. Tattha hi aṅgānaṃ athāmajātattā yathā nāma daharo kumāro ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno
tika-abh08t0:2202_7: punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati, evamevaṃ cittaṃ kālena nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, kālena bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
tika-abh08t0:2203_0: 881-4. Teneva pallaṅkenāti yasmiṃ nisinno paṭibhāganimittaṃ adhigacchi, teneva pallaṅkena
tika-abh08t0:2203_1: karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā. Upacārabhūmiyañhi nimittavaḍḍhanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2203_2: yuttaṃ. Cakkavattiyagabbhovāti cakkavatti bhavituṃ puññavā gabbho viya. Parihāni
tika-abh08t0:2203_3: na vijjatīti laddhūpacārajjhānassa parihāni na vijjati. Nimitte hi aparihīne tadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2203_4: jhānaṃ aparihīnameva hoti, nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhajjhānampi vinassati
tika-abh08t0:2204_0: 885. Āvāsoti yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ nimittaṃ nuppajjati, uppannaṃ vā
tika-abh08t0:2204_1: vinassati, anupaṭṭhitā ca sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṃ na samādhiyati,
tika-abh08t0:2204_2: ayaṃ asappāyo āvāso, tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti, tattha ekekasmiṃ tīṇi
tika-abh08t0:2204_3: tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yattha cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti, taṃ pahāya tabbiparīte vasitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2204_4: Gocaroti gocaragāmo, so senāsanato atidūre accāsanne pubbadisāya vā pacchimadisāya
tika-abh08t0:2204_5: vā asulabhabhikkho asappāyo. Bhassanti dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāpariyāpannā asappāyakathā.
tika-abh08t0:2204_6: Sā hissa nimittantaradhānāya saṃvattati. Puggaloti tiracchānakathiko, sīlādiguṇavirahito
tika-abh08t0:2204_7: puggalo, yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ na samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thiraṃ na
tika-abh08t0:2204_8: hoti, evarūpo. So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva karoti. Bhojanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2204_9: pana kassaci ambilaṃ, kassaci madhuraṃ asappāyaṃ hoti. Utupi kassaci sīto, kassaci
tika-abh08t0:2204_10: uṇho. Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu na hoti, taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca
tika-abh08t0:2204_11: utu asappāyo. Iriyāpathoti ṭhānacaṅkamanādīsu yo imassa asamāhitacittassa samādhānāya,
tika-abh08t0:2204_12: samāhitacittassa ca thirabhāvāya na hoti, ayaṃ asappāyo iriyāpatho, tasmā tampi āvāsaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2205_0: 886. Sappāye satta seveyyāti vuttaviparītavasena sappāye āvāsādike satta seveyya.
tika-abh08t0:2205_1: Tattha bhassasappāyaṃ nāma dasakathāvatthusannissitaṃ, tampi mattāya bhāsitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2205_2: Evañhi paṭipajjatoti evaṃ vuttappakārena satta asappāye vajjetvā satta sappāye sevanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2206_0: 888-9. Yena vinā appanāya kusalo na hoti, so dasavidho vidhi, appanākosallaṃ, tannibbattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2206_1: vā ñāṇaṃ ganthavitthārabhayena idha na dassitaṃ, atthikena pana visuddhimaggato gahetabbanti
tika-abh08t0:2206_2: adhippāyo. Paṭiladdhe nimittasmiṃ, evañhi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ appanā sampavattatīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2207_0: 890-2. Sāti appanā. Evañhīti hi-saddo hetuattho, yasmā ṭhānametaṃ na vijjati, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2207_2: upadhārento samataṃ vīriyasseva vīriyassa samādhinā samataṃyeva yojayetha, kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2207_3: pana yojayethāti āha “īsakampī”tiādi. Tattha layanti līnabhāvaṃ, saṅkocanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2207_4: Yantanti gacchantaṃ, paggaṇhetheva samabhāvāyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “accāraddhaṃ nisedhetvā
tika-abh08t0:2208_1: ṭhapanavasena nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato tassa yogino. Samijjhissatīti uppajjissati.
tika-abh08t0:2208_2: Pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīti bhāvanāvasena upaṭṭhitaṃ tadeva paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Javanānīti
tika-abh08t0:2208_3: kāmarūpāvacarajavanāni. Tenāha “ekaṃ tu rūpāvacarikaṃ bhave”ti. Aññehīti pākatikehi
tika-abh08t0:2208_5: Parikammopacāratoti parikammattā, upacārattā ca. Tattha parikammattāti paṭisaṅkharaṇattā.
tika-abh08t0:2208_6: Upacārattāti yathā gāmādīnaṃ āsannadeso “gāmūpacāro, nagarūpacāro”ti vuccati, evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2208_7: appanāya āsannattā samīpacārittā. Upacārāni appanaṃ upecca carantīti katvā. Appanāyānulomattāti
tika-abh08t0:2208_8: nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ parikammatopi lahukaṃ appanānipphādakavasena, guṇavasena vā appanāya
tika-abh08t0:2208_9: anukūlattā. Etthāti etesu parikammopacārānulomasaññitesu. Sabbantimaṃ tatiyaṃ, catutthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2208_10: vā gotrabhūti pavuccati parittagottassa abhibhavanato, mahaggatagottassa bhāvanato ca.
tika-abh08t0:2209_0: 900-3. Avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhame naye gahitāgahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “gahitāgahaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2209_1: Ekekassa gahitanāmaṃ itaresaṃ aggahaṇato, ekekanāmavasena gahitassa itaranāmavasena
tika-abh08t0:2209_2: aggahaṇato vā nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena “paṭhamaṃ upacāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2209_3: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vāti vā-saddo aniyamo, so pana khippābhiññadandhābhiññavasena
tika-abh08t0:2209_4: veditabbo. Khippābhiññassa hi catutthaṃ appeti, dandhābhiññassa pañcamaṃ. Tato paranti
tika-abh08t0:2209_5: pañcamato paraṃ. Tenāha “chaṭṭhe vā”tiādi. Kasmā na jāyatīti āha “āsannattā bhavaṅgassā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2209_7: bhavaṅgassa āsannaṃ javanaṃ patati. Tāvadeti tāvadeva. Chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamaṃ vā javanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2210_0: 904-6. Atha kimetaṃ vuccati “chaṭṭhe sattame vāpi appanā na jāyatī”ti? Ābhidhammikagodattatthero
tika-abh08t0:2210_1: hi “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:2210_2: paccayo”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vatvā yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti,
tika-abh08t0:2210_3: laddhāsevanaṃ pana balavabhāvato dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ uppādeti, evaṃ laddhāsevanatāya
tika-abh08t0:2210_4: balavabhāvato chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamampi vā appetīti chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamampi vā appanā hotīti
tika-abh08t0:2210_5: vadatī”ti imaṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāya therassa taṃ mataṃ paṭikkhipitvā yathāvuttamatameva
tika-abh08t0:2211_0: Pariyante ṭhātuṃ neva sakkotīti papāte eva patatīti adhippāyo. Appetuṃ na sakkotīti
tika-abh08t0:2211_1: patiṭṭhātuṃ appanāvasena uppajjituṃ na sakkoti. Na cettha “purimā purimā”tiādisuttapadaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2211_2: sādhakaṃ āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā. Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi
tika-abh08t0:2211_3: paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti, laddhāsevanā dutiyacetanā yāva chaṭṭhacetanā
tika-abh08t0:2211_4: aparāpariyavedanīyā, tasmā laddhāsevanepi chaṭṭhasattame appanā na hoti āsannabhavaṅgatāya
tika-abh08t0:2211_5: dubbalattāti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā upapajjavedanīyā ānantariyā
tika-abh08t0:2211_6: hoti? Nāyaṃ viseso, āsevanapaccayalābhena balavappattiyā, kiñcarahi kiriyāvatthāvisesato.
tika-abh08t0:2211_7: Kiriyāvatthā hi ārambhamajjhapariyosānavasena tividhā. Tattha pariyosānāvatthāya
tika-abh08t0:2211_8: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhāvena upapajjavedanīyāditā hoti, na balavabhāvenāti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:2212_0: 907. Eka…pe… panāti ayaṃ appanā ekacittakkhaṇāyeva ekavārameva uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:2212_1: na samāpattivīthiyaṃ viya yathicchakaṃ pavattati. Sattasu hi ṭhānesu kālaparicchedo
tika-abh08t0:2212_2: nāma natthi, paṭhamappanāyaṃ, lokiyābhiññāsu, catūsu maggesu, maggānantare phale,
tika-abh08t0:2212_3: rūpārūpabhavesu bhavaṅgaṭṭhāne nirodhassa paccaye nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nirodhā
tika-abh08t0:2212_4: vuṭṭhahantassa phalasamāpattiyanti. Etesu hi katthaci atiittarā, katthaci appamāṇā
tika-abh08t0:2212_5: cittakkhaṇā honti, katthaci sampuṇṇajavanavīthi addhā labbhati. Tathā hi maggānantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2212_6: phalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upari na hoti, nirodhassa paccayo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ dvinnaṃ upari
tika-abh08t0:2212_7: na hoti, rūpārūpabhavesu bhavaṅgassa parimāṇaṃ natthi, sesesu pana catūsu ṭhānesu
tika-abh08t0:2212_8: ekameva cittanti tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva appanā hotīti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2213_0: 908. Paccavekkhaṇahetukanti paccavekkhaṇahetuṃ katvā. Nanu ca paccavekkhaṇaṃ āvajjanādīhi,
tika-abh08t0:2213_1: na pana tena āvajjanādi, tasmā kathaṃ paccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ hotīti yujjati? Nāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2213_2: doso bhavanakiriyāya paccavekkhaṇahetukattā. Na hi asati paccavekkhaṇe sā hoti nirodhassa
tika-abh08t0:2213_3: paccayabhūtajhānantaramiva, sati pana paccavekkhaṇe sā hoti, tasmā anvayabyatirekavasena
tika-abh08t0:2213_4: labbhati. Tassā paccavekkhaṇahetukatāti na na yujjati “paccavekkhaṇahetuka”nti vacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2213_5: Paccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ āvajjananti vā sambandho. Āvajjanañhi paccavekkhaṇañāṇānaṃ anantarapaccayabhāvena kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2214_0: 911-3. Nānāvisayaluddhassa, ito cito ca bhamantassa cetasoti sambandho. Samādhānevāti
tika-abh08t0:2214_1: samādhānā eva, samādhānakaraṇatoti attho. Pāmojjabhāvatoti pāmojjena samānayogakkhamatāya
tika-abh08t0:2214_2: tassā tabbhāvavuttittā. Atha vā byāpādena ghaṭṭiyamānassa cittassa pamuditabhāvakaraṇato
tika-abh08t0:2214_3: pītiyeva “pāmojja”nti vuccati, tassa bhāvo, tasmā pāmojjasabhāvattāti attho. Sītalattasabhāvatoti
tika-abh08t0:2215_0: 914-6. Savipphārikabhāvenāti yoniso saṅkappavasena kāmavitakkādiṃ madditvā pavattanato
tika-abh08t0:2215_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ gahitaṃ. Ādi-saddena tīsu brahmavihāresu paṭhamajjhānaṃ gahitanti
tika-abh08t0:2215_3: vadanti. Avūpasantabhāvassāti uddhaccassa sarūpakathanena taṃsahavattino anutāpasabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:2215_4: kukkuccassāpi sarūpaṃ kathitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā sayañcevātisantatoti uddhaccapaṭipakkhasabhāvavacanena
tika-abh08t0:2215_6: anurūpattāti paññāya anurūpattā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena “vicāro
tika-abh08t0:2215_7: vicikicchāya paṭipakkho ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpatirūpakasabhāvattā”ti. Potthakesu
tika-abh08t0:2215_8: pana “pītiyā anurūpattā”ti pāṭho dissati, tassa ca vicāro anumajjanasabhāvavantatāya
tika-abh08t0:2215_9: pīti viya ārammaṇe anivattanto ogāhetvā pavattatīti pītiyā anurūpattā sandehasabhāvattā
tika-abh08t0:2215_10: ārammaṇaṃ anajjhogāhetvā pavattamānāya vicikicchāya paṭipakkhoti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2216_1: tividhakalyāṇatāhi yuttaṃ. Yathāha “paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, upekkhānubrūhanā
tika-abh08t0:2216_2: majjhe, sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti. Tattha pubbabhāgapaṭipadāvasena jhānassa paripanthato
tika-abh08t0:2216_3: visujjhanaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma, sā pana yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe labbhati,
tika-abh08t0:2216_4: tasmā vuttaṃ “paṭipadāvisuddhi ādī”ti. Visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya
tika-abh08t0:2216_5: tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā upekkhānubrūhanā nāma. Sā panāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2216_6: visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati. Tena vuttaṃ “upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2216_7: Tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā
tika-abh08t0:2216_8: sampahaṃsanā nāma. Sā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2217_0: Abhayagirivāsino “paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma sasambhāriko upacāro, upekkhānubrūhanā nāma
tika-abh08t0:2217_1: appanā, sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā”ti evaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiādike vaṇṇenti, taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2217_2: ayuttaṃ. Evañhi sati ajhānadhammehi jhānadhammassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2217_3: Na hi bhūmantaraṃ bhūmantarapariyāpannaṃ hoti, antoappanāyameva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi,
tika-abh08t0:2217_4: tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiādīhi upekkhānubrūhanādayo ca veditabbā. Evañca
tika-abh08t0:2217_5: katvā vuttaṃ bhagavatā “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhantarañceva hoti
tika-abh08t0:2217_6: upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena sampahaṃsita”nti. Ettha hi ekattagataṃ cittanti indriyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2217_7: ekarasabhāvena, ekaggatāya ca sikhappattiyā tadanuguṇaekattagataṃ sasampayuttamappanācittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2218_0: Dasalakkhaṇasaṃyutanti “ādimhi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni, majjhe tīṇi, pariyosāne cattārī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2218_1: evaṃ dasaparimāṇehi appanāya lakkhitabbabhāvena lakkhaṇasaṅkhātehi paripanthato visuddhijhānādīhi
tika-abh08t0:2219_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi. Ādissa kati lakkhaṇāni? Ādissa tīṇi lakkhaṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:2219_1: Yo tassa paripantho, tato cittaṃ visujjhati, visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2219_2: paṭipajjati, paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati, yañca paripanthato cittaṃ visujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:2219_3: yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati, yañca paṭipannattā
tika-abh08t0:2219_4: tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati, paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, ādissa imāni
tika-abh08t0:2219_5: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañca.
tika-abh08t0:2220_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, majjhassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Majjhassa
tika-abh08t0:2220_1: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2220_2: ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati, yañca visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, yañca samathapaṭipannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2220_3: ajjhupekkhati, yañca ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati, paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā
tika-abh08t0:2220_4: majjhe, majjhassa imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva
tika-abh08t0:2221_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ. Pariyosānassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Pariyosānassa
tika-abh08t0:2221_1: cattāri lakkhaṇāni. Tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā, indriyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2221_3: sampahaṃsanā, paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ, pariyosānassa imāni cattāri
tika-abh08t0:2221_4: lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañcā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2222_0: Ettha ca gotrabhucittassa nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ uppajjanārahaparipanthato visujjhanato
tika-abh08t0:2222_1: tadāgamanavasena jhānacittassa visujjhanākāraṃ sandhāya “yo tassa paripantho, tato
tika-abh08t0:2222_2: cittaṃ visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Gotrabhucittasseva tathā visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2222_4: sandhāya “visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimasamathanimittaṃ paṭipajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:2222_5: hi khīrasseva dadhibhāvābhāvepi tadeva khīraṃ dadhisampannantiādīsu viya gotrabhucittassa
tika-abh08t0:2222_8: yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato nimittabhūtaṃ appanāsamādhiṃ paṭipajjati nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2222_9: tathā paṭipannattā pana samāhitabhāvūpagamanena ekattanayavaseneva tattha pakkhandanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2222_10: sandhāya “paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekattanayañhi vinā gotrabhussa
tika-abh08t0:2222_11: appanāpakkhandanaṃ natthi. Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākārassa idha nibbattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2222_12: jhānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tividhalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nāma. Yathā hi lokiyavipassanāya kiccanipphattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2222_13: lokuttaramaggo “vipassanā”ti vuccati, evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhane
tika-abh08t0:2222_16: puna samādhāne byāpārākaraṇato vuttaṃ “samathapaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2223_0: Evaṃ samathapaṭipannabhāvatoyeva pubbe “kathaṃ nu kho kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pajaheyya”nti
tika-abh08t0:2223_1: paṭipannassa idāni samathapaṭipattiyā tassa pahīnattā pāpamittasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekassa
tika-abh08t0:2223_2: viharato sappurisassa viya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa jhānacittassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:2223_3: byāpārākaraṇaṃ sandhāya “ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhāya
tika-abh08t0:2223_4: kiccavasena jhānaṃ majjhe tividhalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nāma hoti. Pubbabhāgappavattapārihāriyañāṇena
tika-abh08t0:2223_5: cittassa saṃkilesavodānakaradhammesu ādīnavānisaṃsaṃ disvā yathā tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2223_6: aññamaññānativattanaṃ hoti, tathā bhāvanāya sampahaṃsitattā visodhitattā tatramajjhattupekkhāya
tika-abh08t0:2223_8: pavattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2223_9: Saddhāpañcamakānaṃ indriyānaṃ nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttivasena ekarasataṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:2223_11: anurūpavasena alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ hutvā vīriyassa pavattiṃ sandhāya “tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2223_12: sampahaṃsanā”ti vuttaṃ. Yā panassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā, uppādato paṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:2223_14: sampahaṃsanā”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa
tika-abh08t0:2223_15: ñāṇassa kiccavasena jhānapariyosāne catūhi lakkhaṇehi sampannaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2224_0: 919-20. Visodhetvāna pāpaketi pāripanthike dhamme visesena sodhetvā sayaṃ pahānamatte
tika-abh08t0:2224_1: aṭṭhatvā atisayappahānavasena puna sodhetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Cittabhāvanavepullanti
tika-abh08t0:2224_2: samādhibhāvanāya vipulabhāvaṃ. Yathā hi bhāvanāvasena nimittassa uppatti, evamassa
tika-abh08t0:2224_3: bhāvanāvasena vaḍḍhanampi, tasmā ekaṅgulādivasena nimittaṃ vaḍḍhayantassa punappunaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2224_4: bahulīkārena jhānabhāvanāpi vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ, abhiññāvasena ca vepullaṃ āpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2225_0: 921-3. Vaḍḍhanābhūmiyo dvevāti vaḍḍhanaṭṭhānāni dveyeva. Dvīsu ṭhānesu avassaṃ ekattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2225_1: vaḍḍhetabbanti ācariyā. Tatrāti sāmiatthe bhummavacanaṃ, tassāti attho. Tatrāti vā
tika-abh08t0:2225_2: dvīsu bhūmīsu. Kasitabbaṃ…pe… yathicchakanti yathā nāma kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2225_3: naṅgalena paricchinditvā paricchedabbhantaraṃ kasituṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchindati, evamevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2225_6: paricchedavasena vaḍḍhayantena cakkavāḷaparicchedaṃ katvā vā tato vāpi uttari paricchinditvā
tika-abh08t0:2225_7: vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “yathicchakaṃ vaḍḍhetabba”nti. Aparicchinditvā pana na
tika-abh08t0:2225_8: vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Na hi aparicchede bhāvanā pavattati. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “santake no anantake”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2225_9: Evaṃ vaḍḍhitañca taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhitaṭṭhāne pathaviyā ukkūlavikūlanadīviduggapabbatavisamesu
tika-abh08t0:2226_0: 924-6. Tasmiṃ pana nimitte pattapaṭhamajjhānena ādikammikena idāneva dutiyajjhānādiadhigamāya
tika-abh08t0:2226_1: ussāhaṃ akatvā tasmiṃyeva paṭhamajjhāne pañcahākārehi suciṇṇavasinā bhavitabbanti
tika-abh08t0:2226_2: dassetuṃ “pattepī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suciṇṇo vaso vasibhāvo etenāti suciṇṇavasinā, suṭṭhu
tika-abh08t0:2226_3: āsevitavasināti attho. Katamā tā vasiyo, yāsaṃ vasenāyaṃ pañcahākārehi suciṇṇavasīti
tika-abh08t0:2226_4: āha “āvajjana”ntiādi. Tattha āvajjananti na āvajjanamattameva adhippetaṃ āvajjanavasitāya
tika-abh08t0:2226_5: adhippetattā. Āvajjanāya pana uppannāya javanehipi bhavitabbaṃ. Tāni ca kho āvajjanakapparatāya
tika-abh08t0:2226_6: cittābhinīhārassa yathāvajjitavasena honti. Adhigamena samaṃ, sasampayuttassa jhānassa
tika-abh08t0:2226_7: sammā āpajjanaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ samāpatti. Abhibhuyya ṭhapanaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti vā
tika-abh08t0:2226_8: adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Vasitāti etesu āvajjanādīsu yathāruci pavattiyo, yatthicchakaṃ, yadicchakaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2227_0: Tattha paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā
tika-abh08t0:2227_1: uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri, pañca vā javanāni javanti, tato
tika-abh08t0:2227_2: dve bhavaṅgāni, tato puna vicārārammaṇaṃ āvajjanaṃ vuttanayeneva javanānīti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2227_3: pañcasu jhānaṅgesu paṭipāṭiyā nirantaraṃ cittaṃ pesetuṃ samatthabhāvo, tattha adandhāyitattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2227_4: āvajjanavasitā nāma. Samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2227_5: upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjituṃ samatthatā samāpajjanavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2227_7: labbhati. Dhammasenāpatissa yakkhena sīse pahāradānasamaye, mahāmoggallānattherassa
tika-abh08t0:2227_8: nandopanandadamanasamaye vā labbhati, aññattha pana tato dandhāyeva, setu viya sīghasotāya
tika-abh08t0:2227_9: nadiyā oghaṃ bhavaṅgavegaṃ upacchinditvā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā,
tika-abh08t0:2227_10: bhavaṅgapātato rakkhaṇayogyatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma. Yathāparicchinnakālaṃ atikkamituṃ
tika-abh08t0:2228_0: Atha vā yathāparicchinnakālato upari gantuṃ adatvā ṭhapanasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā
tika-abh08t0:2228_1: nāma. Paricchinnakālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathākālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā
tika-abh08t0:2228_2: nāma. Atha vā vuttanayeneva paricchinnakālato anūnaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatāva
tika-abh08t0:2228_3: adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma. Kālaparicchedaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhitassapi niddālukassa paṭibujjhitvā
tika-abh08t0:2228_4: punappunaṃ niddokkamanaṃ viya vuṭṭhitasamāpattimeva punappunaṃ asamāpajjitvā vuṭṭhānasamatthatā,
tika-abh08t0:2229_0: Paccavekkhaṇavasitā pana āvajjanavasitāya eva saṅgahitā. Paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva
tika-abh08t0:2229_1: hi tesaṃ tesaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ āvajjanānantaraṃ pavattāni, tasmā yadaggena āvajjanavasiyā
tika-abh08t0:2229_2: siddhi, tadaggena paccavekkhaṇavasitā siddhāti veditabbaṃ. Keci pana jhānaṅgānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2229_3: apākaṭabhāvepi tesu nirantaraṃ āvajjanāya pavattanasamatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2229_5: nāma. Atha vā satipi sattannaṃ javanānaṃ pavattiyaṃ nirantaraṃ āvajjanasamatthatā
tika-abh08t0:2229_6: āvajjanavasitā nāma, vasitābalena sattamajavanaṃ appatvā catupañcajavaneheva paccavekkhaṇasamatthatā
tika-abh08t0:2229_7: paccavekkhaṇavasitā nāma. Atha vā ñāṇavippayuttacittehi paccavekkhituṃ asamatthabhāvepi
tika-abh08t0:2229_9: āvajjituṃ samatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma, vasitābalena, paccavekkhaṇabalena ñāṇavippayuttacittehipi
tika-abh08t0:2229_10: paccavekkhituṃ samatthatā paccavekkhaṇavasitā nāmāti vadanti. Yasmā panetā yathāvuttaniyāmena
tika-abh08t0:2230_0: 927. Imesu pana ādikammikena samāpajjanabahuleneva bhavitabbaṃ, na paccavekkhaṇabahulena.
tika-abh08t0:2230_1: Paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, athassa
tika-abh08t0:2230_2: tāni eva upaṭṭhitattā upari ussukkanāya paccayataṃ nāpajjanti, so appaguṇe jhāne
tika-abh08t0:2230_3: ussukkamāno paṭhamajjhānāva parihāyati, na ca sakkoti dutiyaṃ adhigantuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2230_4: “paṭhame avasippatte”tiādi. Ubhato bhaṭṭhoti puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjituṃ na
tika-abh08t0:2231_0: “Idhekacco bhikkhu bālo abyatto akhettaññū akusalo vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi
tika-abh08t0:2231_1: dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-abh08t0:2231_2: so taṃ nimittaṃ nāsevati, na bhāveti, na bahuliṃ karoti, na svādhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t0:2231_3: Tassa evaṃ hoti ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā…pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-abh08t0:2231_4: vihareyya’nti, so na sakkoti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā…pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-abh08t0:2231_5: viharituṃ. Tassa evaṃ hoti ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-abh08t0:2231_6: vihareyya’nti, so na sakkoti vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2231_7: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ubhato bhaṭṭho ubhato parihīno”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2232_0: 928-31. Kāmassahagatā…pe… carantīti ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññā ceva
tika-abh08t0:2232_1: manasikārā ca samudācaranti. Saññāsīsena cettha taṃsahagato cittuppādo gahito, manakkāra-ggahaṇena
tika-abh08t0:2232_2: āvajjananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena hānaṃ parihāniṃ
tika-abh08t0:2232_3: bhajatīti hānabhāgiyaṃ. Keci pana “saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyo dhammo’ti vacanato hānabhāgiyā
tika-abh08t0:2232_4: kāmasaññādikāti tehi parihāpiyamānaṃ jhānampi kāraṇūpacārena hānabhāgiyaṃ nāmā”ti
tika-abh08t0:2232_5: vadanti. Tadanudhammatā satīti tasseva jhānassa anudhammatā ārammaṇavasena tadanugatā
tika-abh08t0:2232_6: satipatirūpakā nikanti. Atakkasahitāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ pattukāmassa taṃ santato,
tika-abh08t0:2232_7: manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena taṃsahagatā. Visesabhāgiyanti visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa
tika-abh08t0:2232_8: padaṭṭhānatāya taṃ bhajatīti visesabhāgiyaṃ. Nibbidāsaṃyutāti vipassanārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:2233_1: āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā. Thūlaṃ nāma vipulampi pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyanti āha
tika-abh08t0:2233_2: “thūlattā…pe… dubbalā”ti. Tatoti dutiyajjhānato. Dubbalāni aṅgāni imissāti aṅgadubbalā.
tika-abh08t0:2233_3: Santato cintayitvāti paṭhamajjhāne viya oḷārikaṅgānaṃ abhāvato, santadhammasamaṅgitāya
tika-abh08t0:2233_4: ca santanti evaṃ santavasena manasi katvā. Kiñcāpi hi ye dhammā dutiyajjhāne pītisukhādayo,
tika-abh08t0:2233_5: te paṭhamajjhānepi santi, tehi pana te santatarā, paṇītatarā ca honti. Nikantinti
tika-abh08t0:2233_6: nikāmanaṃ apekkhanti attho. Pariyādāyāti khepetvā, vikkhambhetvāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2234_0: 943-4. Sampasādananti sampasādanasaṅkhātāya saddhāya yogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2234_1: nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya. Nanu cāyaṃ saddhā paṭhamajjhānepi atthi, kasmā
tika-abh08t0:2234_3: vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti, tasmā satipi saddhāya taṃ sampasādananti
tika-abh08t0:2234_4: na vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana vitakkavicārakkhobhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2234_5: balavasaddhāya samannāgatattā idameva “sampasādana”nti vuttaṃ. Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2234_6: attani jātaṃ, attano santāne nibbattanti attho. Tīṇi aṅgāni imassāti tivaṅgikaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2234_7: Sesanti pītiādīnaṃ aññehi balavabhāvo, tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ vā javanānaṃ parikammopacārānulomagotrabhubhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2234_8: chaṭṭhe sattame vā appanāyānuppatti ekacittakkhaṇatā, tato bhavaṅgapāto, puna bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2234_9: vicchinditvā paccavekkhaṇatthāya āvajjanaṃ, tato jhānapaccavekkhaṇanti idaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2235_0: 948-9. Piyatoti kāmayato. Uppilāpananti kāmañcāyaṃ pariggahesu apariccattapemassa
tika-abh08t0:2235_1: anādīnavadassino taṇhāsahagatāya pītiyā pavattiākāro, idha ca dutiyajjhānapīti adhippetā,
tika-abh08t0:2235_2: tathāpi sabbaso pītiyaṃ avirattassāpi anubandheyyāti uppilāpanaṃ idha ādīnavavasena
tika-abh08t0:2235_3: vuttaṃ. Atha vā dutiyajjhānasseva tatiyajjhānaṃ viya ahutvā uppilāpanākārena pavatti
tika-abh08t0:2235_4: uppilāpanaṃ viyāti uppilāpananti vuttaṃ. Tatiyaṃ santato disvāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2236_0: 957-8. Satiyā sampajaññena sampannanti saraṇalakkhaṇāya satiyā, asammohalakkhaṇena
tika-abh08t0:2236_1: sampajaññena ca sampannaṃ. Kāmaṃ purimajjhānesupi satisampajaññaṃ atthi, na hi muṭṭhassatissa,
tika-abh08t0:2236_2: asampajānato ca upacāramattampi sampajjati, pageva appanā, yebhuyyena pana avippayogībhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2236_3: pavattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa pahāne sukhumatāya idha sātisayo
tika-abh08t0:2236_4: satisampajaññabyāpāroti idheva satisampajaññasampannatā vuttāti veditabbā. Ekaṅgahīnanti
tika-abh08t0:2236_5: pītiyā pahīnabhāvena ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ. Sā panesā dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārā viya
tika-abh08t0:2237: 972. Somanassassa pahīnattā āha “ekaṅgavippahīna”nti. Tañca pana somanassaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesuyeva pahīyati.
tika-abh08t0:2238_1: idha labbhamānaṃ kañci visesaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āsevanaṃ na hotīti āsevanapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:2238_2: paccayo na hoti. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yasmā padantarasaṅgahitassa attano sabhāvaggāhāpanasaṅkhātaāsevanapaccayattābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:2238_3: sukhavedanā upekkhāvedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti, catutthajjhāneva upekkhāvedanāya
tika-abh08t0:2238_4: bhavitabbaṃ sātisayaṃ sukhavirāgabhāvanattā, tasmā idha appanāvīthiyaṃ upekkhāsampayuttajavaneheva bhavitabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:2239_0: 976. Evaṃ catukkanayavasena jhānappabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni pañcakanayampi dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2239_1: “yaṃ catukkanaye”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dvidhā pana katvānāti vitakkavicārānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2239_2: pahānaṅgavasena gaṇanato dvidhā katvā. Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ katanti avitakkavicāramattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2239_3: avitakkaavicāranti evaṃ dutiyajjhānañceva tatiyajjhānañca kataṃ abhidhammeti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2239_4: Suttantesu hi pañcakanayo sarūpato na gahito, kasmā pana abhidhamme gahitoti? Puggalajjhāsayato,
tika-abh08t0:2239_5: sannisinnadevaparisāya hi yesaṃ paṭhamajjhāne vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, itare
tika-abh08t0:2239_6: santato, tesaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ katvā pañcakanayena
tika-abh08t0:2239_7: desesi. Yesaṃ vitakkavicārā oḷārikato upaṭṭhitā, tato tesaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ tivaṅgikaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2239_8: katvā catukkanayena desesi. Yesaṃ vitakkova oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, tehi taṃ atikkamitvā
tika-abh08t0:2239_9: caturaṅgikaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkā. Yesaṃ vitakkavicārā, tehi dvepi ekato
tika-abh08t0:2240_0: 979. Atthabyañjanavasena suṭṭhu madhuraṃ, tatoyeva varataraṃ vacanaṃ yassa soyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2240_1: sumadhuravarataravacano. Kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati, na hi ekampi na rañjayati.
tika-abh08t0:2240_2: Atinisita …pe… nīyoyanti atitikhiṇabuddhippasādehi janehi vedanīyo ayaṃ gantho, paricchedoti vā adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2246_0: 980. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇavasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni dassetvā yasmā sesakasiṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:2246_1: niddisiyamāne ganthagāravo hoti, tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaraṃ vibhāvetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2246_3: rūpārūpabhavaṃ atikkantena, pageva kāmāvacarabhavaṃ. Rūpārūpādivedināti rūpārūpādibhūmantaravedinā.
tika-abh08t0:2247_0: 982-4. Yasmā ayaṃ arūpāvacarasamādhi nāma rūpavirāgabhāvanā rūpavirāgavaseneva abhinipphādetabbāva,
tika-abh08t0:2247_1: tasmā taṃ uppādetukāmassa rūpe virajjanākāraṃ, virattamānasena ca tadatthāya paṭipajjanavidhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2247_2: dassetuṃ “rūpe kho”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Daṇḍanaṭṭhena daṇḍo, muggarādi, parapīḷanādhippāyena
tika-abh08t0:2247_4: adinnādānādīnañca gahaṇaṃ. Cakkhurogādayoti ādi-saddena sotarogādīnaṃ. Rūpe ādīnavaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2247_5: disvāti karajarūpādioḷārikarūpe tannidānaṃ dosaṃ disvā. Nibbindamānasoti virattamānaso.
tika-abh08t0:2247_6: Arūpanti arūpāvacarabhāvanaṃ. Tamhā kasiṇarūpāti tamhā paṭibhāganimittasaṅkhātā kasiṇarūpā.
tika-abh08t0:2247_7: Nanu cāyaṃ rūpe ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ samatikkamatthāya paṭipajjati, paṭibhāganimittañca
tika-abh08t0:2247_8: arūpaṃ paṇṇattimattattāti kathaṃ tasmā nibbijjatīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya opammavasena
tika-abh08t0:2247_9: tamatthaṃ dassento āha “sūkarābhihatova sā”ti. Yathā hi vane sūkarena pahatamatto
tika-abh08t0:2247_10: sunakho tato bhīto rūpadassanavelāyaṃ bhattapacanaukkhaliṃ dūrato disvā sūkarapaṭibhāgatāya
tika-abh08t0:2247_11: tassaṃ sūkarāsaṅkaṃ uppādetvā utrasto palāyateva, evameva rūpe nibbindamānaso taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2247_12: atikkamitukāmo tappaṭibhāge kasiṇarūpepi nibbijjati, samatikkamitukāmoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2248_0: 985-6. Catutthe pana jhānasminti ṭhapetvā paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ navasu pathavīkasiṇādīsu
tika-abh08t0:2248_1: aññatarasmiṃ paṭiladdhacatutthajjhāne. Keci pana ālokakasiṇampi ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasūti
tika-abh08t0:2248_2: vadanti. Tassa pana ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Suṭṭhu ciṇṇo carito atippaguṇikato
tika-abh08t0:2248_3: āvajjanādilakkhaṇo vasībhāvo etenāti suciṇṇavasī. Karoti…pe… yatoti yasmā idaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2248_4: mayā nibbindakasiṇarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti. Āsannasomanassañcāti yato tatiyajjhānassa
tika-abh08t0:2248_6: etaṃ yato thūlaṃ oḷārikaṃ. Arūpajjhānañhi ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppantiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:2249_0: 987-91. Catuttheti catutthajjhāne. Paṭhamāruppañca santato disvāti sambandho, santavasena
tika-abh08t0:2249_1: manasi karitvāti attho. Santato manasikaraṇeneva cettha paṇītato, sukhumato ca manasikāro
tika-abh08t0:2249_2: siddhova hotīti na te visuṃ gahitā. Pattharitvānāti pageva vaḍḍhitaṃ, tadā vaḍḍhanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2249_3: vā pattharitvā. Pubbakālavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena naṃ ugghāṭetvā pacchā na vaḍḍhitabbanti
tika-abh08t0:2249_4: dasseti. Na hi taṃ pacchā vaḍḍhanatthāya vāyamiyamānampi vaḍḍhatīti. Tenāti kasiṇarūpena.
tika-abh08t0:2250_0: Idānissa ugghāṭanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ākāso iti vā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna taṃ samatthetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2250_1: “ugghāṭento hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Udayavasena, paricchedapharaṇavasena ca antābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:2250_2: ananto. Na saṃvelletīti kaṭasārakakilañjādayo viya na paṭisaṃharati. Nāvajjanto na
tika-abh08t0:2250_3: pekkhantoti anāvajjanto anapekkhanto. Aññadatthu tena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ vuttanayena manasikarontoyevāti
tika-abh08t0:2250_4: adhippāyo. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇarūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2250_5: sabbena sabbaṃ amanasikaroto, tena ca phuṭṭhokāsaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti manasikaroto yadā
tika-abh08t0:2250_6: taṃ bhāvanānubhāvena ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tadā so kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭeti nāmāti.
tika-abh08t0:2251_0: 992-5. Evaṃ kasiṇugghāṭanavasena paṭiladdhe ākāsanimitte puna paṭipajjanavidhiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2251_1: yassatthāya yesaṃ paṭipajjati, tadatthasiddhañca dassetuṃ “kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ nimitta”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:2251_2: vuttaṃ. Ākāsassa animittabhāvepi nimittena phuṭṭhokāsabhāvato “nimitta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2251_3: Pañca…pe… vikkhambhantīti nanu rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva nīvaraṇāni
tika-abh08t0:2251_4: vikkhambhitāni, tato paṭṭhāya ca na tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ atthi. Yadi siyā, jhānato
tika-abh08t0:2251_5: parihāyeyyāti? Saccametaṃ, imassa pana jhānassa vaṇṇabhaṇanavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ yathā
tika-abh08t0:2251_6: aññatthāpi heṭṭhā pahīnānaṃ upari pahānavacananti. Ye pana “sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2251_7: akusalānaṃ paṭipakkhāti katvā evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti, tehi dutiyajjhānūpacārādīsu
tika-abh08t0:2251_8: nīvaraṇavikkhambhanāvacanassa kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti. Yampi ceke vadanti “santeva
tika-abh08t0:2251_9: sukhumāni rūpāvacaraavikkhambhanīyāni, tāni sandhāyetaṃ vutta”nti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2251_10: Na hi mahaggatakusalesu lokuttarakusalaṃ viya odhiso pahānaṃ nāma atthi. Yo pana
tika-abh08t0:2251_11: rūpāvacarehi arūpānaṃ uḷāraphalatādiviseso, so bhāvanāvisesena santatarappaṇītatarabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2251_12: tesuyeva purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimānaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idhāpīti na kevalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2251_13: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne, “sesāni kāmāvacarānī”tiādīsu pana idha yaṃ vattabbaṃ avuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2252_0: 997-1001. “Puna bhāvetukāmenā”ti vutte paṭhamameva paṭhamāruppassa bhāvitattā kiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2252_2: bhāvetukāmenā”ti iminā ajjhāsayena. Na hi paṭhamaṃ dutiyāruppaṃ bhāvitanti. Rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2252_4: rūpāvacarajjhānametassa paccatthikanti katvā vuttaṃ “āsanna…pe… paccatthikanti cā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2252_5: Vīthipaṭipannāya bhāvanāya uparūparivisesāvahabhāvato, paṇītabhāvasiddhito ca paṭhamāruppato
tika-abh08t0:2252_6: dutiyāruppaṃ santatarasabhāvanti āha “dutiyāruppa…pe… panā”ti. Vakkhati hi “supaṇītatarā
tika-abh08t0:2252_7: honti, pacchimā pacchimā idhā”ti. Viññāṇamiccevaṃ manasā kātabbanti viññāṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2252_8: iccevaṃ manasā kātabbaṃ, kevalaṃ anantaṃ anantanti na manasi kātabbaṃ. Tenāha “anantanti…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2252_9: manasā nidhā”ti. Anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ viññāṇanti pana manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:2253_0: 1002-6. Tasmiṃ pana nimittasminti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇasaṅkhāte viññāṇanimitte.
tika-abh08t0:2253_1: Vicārentassa mānasanti bhāvanācittaṃ pavattentassa. Ākāsaphuṭaviññāṇeti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2253_2: pharitvā pavatte paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ārammaṇabhūte. Appetīti appanāvasena pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:2253_3: Sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanāvisesabhāvato idaṃ appanāpattaṃ hoti catutthāruppaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2253_4: viya. Appanā…pe… nayovāti dutiyāruppajjhāne purimabhāge tīṇi, cattāri vā javanāni
tika-abh08t0:2253_5: kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti. Catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā āruppamānasantiādinā
tika-abh08t0:2253_6: appanānayo paṭhamāruppajjhāne vuttanayova. Pharitvā pavattaviññāṇanti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2253_7: viññāṇañcanti vuccatīti ruḷhīsaddavasena vuttabhāvameva pakāsetuṃ “viññāṇā…pe… siyā”ti
tika-abh08t0:2253_8: vuttaṃ. Pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anantatāya “viññāṇañca”nti
tika-abh08t0:2253_9: vuttanti. Puna manasikāravasena vā anantatāya tathā vuttanti dassetuṃ “manakkāravasenāpī”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2253_10: vuttaṃ. Dutiyāruppaṃ bhāvento hi paṭhamāruppaṃ anantato anavasesato manasi karonto
tika-abh08t0:2254_0: 1010. Paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvoti kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāso viya ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2254_1: pahāya tassa abhāvo manasi kātabbo. Kasmā panettha dutiyāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṃ amanasikatvā
tika-abh08t0:2254_2: paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvo manasi kātabboti? Vuccate – tayidaṃ ārammaṇātikkamanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2254_3: pattabbaṃ, na pana aṅgātikkamanavasena. Tathā ca sati ārammaṇeyeva sātisayaṃ dosadassanena
tika-abh08t0:2254_4: taṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ, ārammaṇañca dutiyāruppassa paṭhamāruppameva, tasmā kasiṇe
tika-abh08t0:2254_5: ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ ugghāṭetvā tabbivittākāsassa viya paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ādīnavaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2254_6: disvā taṃ pahāya tadabhāvasseva manasikaraṇaṃ yuttanti. Abhayagirivāsino pana “viññāṇañcāyatanābhāvoyeva
tika-abh08t0:2254_7: manasi kātabbo”ti vadanti, te pana imesaṃ ārammaṇātikkamanavasena pattabbabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2254_8: asallakkhetvā kathenti. Yadi sallakkhenti, aññattha dosaṃ disvā aññassa samatikkame
tika-abh08t0:2255_0: Athāpi vadeyyuṃ – “viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ sato samāpajjati, sato samāpajjitvā sato vuṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2255_1: sato vuṭṭhahitvā taññeva viññāṇaṃ bhāvetī’ti vacanato viññāṇañcāyatanābhāvoyeva manasi
tika-abh08t0:2255_2: kātabbo”ti, tayidaṃ pāḷiatthaṃ virujjhitvā gahaṇavasena cintitaṃ. Na hettha taññeva
tika-abh08t0:2255_3: viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ adhippetaṃ. Yadi hi taṃ adhippetaṃ siyā, viññāṇañcāyatananti
tika-abh08t0:2255_4: tassa padhānabhāvena niddiṭṭhattā taññevāti vacaneneva pariyattaṃ, kiṃ viññāṇanti
tika-abh08t0:2255_5: vacanena. Atha sarūpaniddesatthaṃ viññāṇavacanaṃ, evaṃ sati taññeva viññāṇañcāyatananti
tika-abh08t0:2255_6: vuttaṃ siyā, tasmā viññāṇanti vacanena yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ, tasseva
tika-abh08t0:2255_7: ākāsānañcāyatanassa gahaṇaṃ, na itarassāti suṭṭhu vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2256_1: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Akatvā manasāti manasā ārammaṇaṃ akatvā sabbena sabbaṃ taṃ acintetvā.
tika-abh08t0:2256_2: “Ākāsaṃ ākāsa”nti manasi karontassa kasiṇavivittākāsaṃ viya “natthi natthī”ti, “suññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2256_3: suñña”nti vā manasi karontassa viññāṇavivittaṃ abhāvamattameva upaṭṭhātīti āha “natthī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2256_4: Vā-saddo aniyamattho, tena dvīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhi hotīti dasseti. Avuttavikappanattho
tika-abh08t0:2256_5: vā vā-saddo, tena “vivittaṃ vivitta”nti imassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Aniyamo panettha
tika-abh08t0:2256_6: tiṇṇampi visuṃ visuṃ pariyāyabhāvatova siddho. Pariyāyasaddā hi visuṃ visuṃyeva atthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2259_1: nimitte. Sati santiṭṭhatīti abhāvanimittārammaṇā sati sammā suppatiṭṭhitā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:2259_2: Satisīsena cettha upacārajjhānānuguṇānaṃ saddhāpañcamānaṃ indriyānaṃ sakiccayogaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2259_3: dasseti. Upacārajjhānaṃ pana “bhiyyopi samādhiyati mānasa”nti iminā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2259_4: Kasiṇugghāṭimā…pe… abhāvaketi evaṃ pavattaviññāṇassa natthibhāvasaṅkhāte vināsābhāvake
tika-abh08t0:2259_5: na pure abhāvādike. Appanānayo panettha pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayānusārena veditabboti
tika-abh08t0:2260_0: 1017-9. Evaṃ yaṃ tattha avasiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ atidisitvā idāni visesaṃ dassetuṃ “ākāsagataviññāṇa”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:2260_1: vuttaṃ. Parikammamanakkāre tasmiṃ antarahiteti “natthi natthī”ti pavattaparikammamanasikāre
tika-abh08t0:2260_2: amanasikaraṇena asmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe antarahite, na pana khaṇabhaṅgavasena,
tika-abh08t0:2260_3: jhānaparihānivasena vā antarahite. Khaṇabhaṅgavasena hi antaradhānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe
tika-abh08t0:2260_4: upalabbhati. Parihānivasena ca antaradhāne puna taṃ anuppādetvā uttari ñāṇādhigamoyeva
tika-abh08t0:2260_5: natthīti. Tassāpagamamattaṃva passanto vasatīti tassa paṭhamāruppassa abhāvamattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2260_6: passanto so yogāvacaro viharati. Yathā kathaṃ viyāti āha “sannipāta”ntiādi. Idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2260_7: vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma koci puriso maṇḍalamāḷādīsu katthaci kenacideva karaṇīyena
tika-abh08t0:2260_8: sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā katthaci gantvā sannipātakiccāvasāne uṭṭhāya pakkantesu
tika-abh08t0:2260_9: bhikkhūsu puna taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā olokento suññameva passati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:2260_10: Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – yathā so puriso sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato,
tika-abh08t0:2260_11: tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu apagatesu taṃ ṭhānaṃ tehi suññameva passati, na pana tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2260_12: kutoci apagatakāraṇaṃ, evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2260_13: disvā natthīti manasikārena tasmiṃ apagate tatiyāruppacakkhunā tassa natthibhāvameva
tika-abh08t0:2260_14: passati, na tassa apagatakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti.
tika-abh08t0:2261_0: 1020-4. Catutthā…pe… na ca santanti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacittaṃ saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2261_1: savisesaṃ santaṃ, evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti na ca santā tadabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2261_2: Ca-saddo panettha avuttasamuccayattho. Tena “saññā rogo, saññā gaṇḍo, saññā sallaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2261_3: etaṃ santaṃ, etaṃ paṇītaṃ, yadidaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti imassapi saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2261_5: ca santato disvā. “Santaṃ santamidaṃ citta”nti iminā bhāvanākāraṃ dasseti. Vibhaṅgepi
tika-abh08t0:2261_6: hi taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karotīti ayameva bhāvanākāro gahito. Apare
tika-abh08t0:2261_7: pana “pāḷiyaṃ imassa bhāvanākāro na gahito”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanti, tattha
tika-abh08t0:2263_0: 1029-31. Abhāvamattampīti suññatamattampi evaṃ sukhumampīti adhippāyo. Santārammaṇatāyāti
tika-abh08t0:2263_1: santaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti santārammaṇā, tabbhāvo santārammaṇatā, tāya, na jhānasantatāya.
tika-abh08t0:2263_2: Na hi tatiyāruppasamāpatti catutthāruppato santatarā. Codako yaṃ santato manasi karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2263_3: na tattha ādīnavadassanaṃ bhaveyya. Asati ca ādīnavadassane na samatikkamo eva siyāti
tika-abh08t0:2263_4: “santato ce manakkāro kathañca samatikkamo”ti āha. Itaro “anāpajjitukāmattā”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:2263_5: parihāramāha. Tena ādīnavadassanampi atthevāti dasseti. Yasmiñhi jhāne abhirati,
tika-abh08t0:2263_6: tattha āvajjanasamāpajjanādipaṭipattiyā bhavitabbaṃ. Sā panassa tatiyāruppe sabbasova
tika-abh08t0:2263_7: natthi, kevalaṃ suññabhāvato ārammaṇakaraṇamattameva. Tathā hesa kiñcāpi taṃ santato
tika-abh08t0:2263_8: manasi karoti, atha khvassa “ahametaṃ āvajjissāmi, samāpajjissāmī”ti ābhogo samannāhāro
tika-abh08t0:2263_9: na hoti. Kasmā? Ākiñcaññāyatanato nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā paṇītataratāya.
tika-abh08t0:2263_10: Yathā hi rājā mahatā rājānubhāvena nagaravīthiyaṃ caranto dantakārādayo kammakāre
tika-abh08t0:2263_11: cheke anekāni dantavikatiādīni sippāni karonte disvā “aho vata re chekā ācariyā,
tika-abh08t0:2263_12: īdisāni sippāni karissantī”ti evaṃ tesaṃ chekatāya tussati, na cassa evaṃ hoti “aho
tika-abh08t0:2263_13: vatāhampi rajjaṃ pahāya evarūpo sippiko bhaveyya”nti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Rajjasiriyā
tika-abh08t0:2263_14: mahānisaṃsatāya, so tesaṃ jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno te samatikkamitvā gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:2264_0: 1032. Sukhumaṃ paranti ukkaṃsato sukhumaṃ, paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya hi tacchentiyā
tika-abh08t0:2264_1: viya pavattamānāya bhāvanāya anukkamena saṅkhārā tattha antimakoṭṭhāsataṃ pāpitāti.
tika-abh08t0:2264_2: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ bhāvanā attano kiccaṃ sādheti, nanu cesā tadavatthaṃ pāpitā ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2264_3: na sammā upanijjhāyatīti? Nayidameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhāvanābalena sukhumabhāvaṃ pāpitāpi
tika-abh08t0:2264_4: cesā attano kicce dubbalattaṃ na pāpitā, atha kho vipphārikatābhāvaṃ gamitā, tena
tika-abh08t0:2264_5: tathā sukhumāpi attano kicce na dubbalā evāti na tattha tassā asāmatthiyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2265_0: 1033-4. Yāya saññāyāti yādisāya saññāya saddappavattihetubhūtāya. So nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamaṅgī
tika-abh08t0:2265_1: puggalo. Nevasaññī ca nāsaññī hoti nevasaññānāsaññāsamaṅgī hoti. Na kevalaṃ tu saññāva
tika-abh08t0:2265_2: edisī sukhumā nevasaññānāsaññā hoti, atha kho pana vedanādayopi sukhumā, vedanāpi
tika-abh08t0:2265_3: nevavedanānāvedanā, cittampi nevacittaṃnācittaṃ, phassopi nevaphassonāphasso. Esa
tika-abh08t0:2265_5: “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”tiādīsu viya. Nanu cettha yadi saññā atthi, kathaṃ nevasaññāti
tika-abh08t0:2265_6: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Yadi natthi, kathaṃ nāsaññāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya imamatthaṃ upamāhi
tika-abh08t0:2265_8: yāguyā saddhiṃ akappiyaṭṭhena telaṃ atthīti, nāḷipūrādīnaṃ vasena natthīti ca vattabbena
tika-abh08t0:2265_9: patte makkhitatelena. Maggasmiṃ udakena cāti upāhanatemanamattaṭṭhena udakaṃ atthīti,
tika-abh08t0:2265_10: nahānavasena natthīti ca vattabbena maggasmiṃ udakena.
tika-abh08t0:2266_0: 1035-7. Ayaṃ atthoti kiñci visesaṃ upādāya sabhāvato atthīti vattabbasseva dhammassa
tika-abh08t0:2266_1: kiñci visesaṃ upādāya natthīti vattabbatāsaṅkhāto ayamattho. Paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2266_2: asamatthatāya hi nevasaññatā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena nāsaññatā ca hoti. Tenāha
tika-abh08t0:2266_4: nibbidājananañca paṭusaññākiccaṃ kathamayaṃ saññāva samānā saññākiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti
tika-abh08t0:2266_5: āha “yathā dahanakicca”ntiādi. Nhātukāmassa uṇhasītabhāvaṃ akatvā sukhajananatāya
tika-abh08t0:2266_6: sukhodakaṃ, tasmiṃ. Tejodhātu yathā dahanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, evamesā atisantārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:2266_7: pavattattā ārammaṇasañjānanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, paramasukhumattaṃ gatāva. Teneva
tika-abh08t0:2266_8: hesā akatābhinivesassa vipassanāñāṇena sukhaggayhā na hotīti sesasamāpattīsu saññā
tika-abh08t0:2266_9: viya vipassanāya visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananampi kātuṃ na sakkoti, aññesu
tika-abh08t0:2266_10: hi khandhesu akatavipassanābhiniveso bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakkhandhe sammasitvā
tika-abh08t0:2266_11: nibbidaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma natthi, api āyasmā sāriputto. Pakativipassako pana
tika-abh08t0:2266_12: sāriputtasadiso bhikkhu khandhādimukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā dvārārammaṇehi
tika-abh08t0:2266_13: saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammānaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā ṭhito sakkuṇeyya tabbisayaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2266_14: uppādetuṃ, sopi kalāpasammasanavaseneva, no anupadadhammavipassanāvasena. Na hi sāriputtasadiso
tika-abh08t0:2266_15: bhikkhu catutthāruppapariyāpannesu phassādidhammesu vinibbhujitvā visuṃ visuṃ sarūpato
tika-abh08t0:2266_16: gahetvā aniccādivasena sammasituṃ sakkoti. Kevalaṃ pana avinibbhujja ekato gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:2266_17: kalāpato samūhatoyeva sammasituṃ samattho hoti, evaṃ sukhumattenesā vijjati.
tika-abh08t0:2267_1: Viññāṇanti ākāse pavattaviññāṇaṃ. Tadabhāvakanti tassa ākāse pavattaviññāṇassa abhāvakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2267_2: Kamatoti paṭhamāruppaṃ samatikkamitvā hotītiādinā anukkamato. Attanā vuttamatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2267_3: aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ āharitvā sādhento “āha cā”tiādimāha. Idhāti imāsu catūsu arūpasamāpattīsu.
tika-abh08t0:2267_4: Pacchimā pacchimā samāpattiyo hi purimāpurimāhi samāpattīhi supaṇītatarā suṭṭhu paṇītatarā,
tika-abh08t0:2267_5: sundarapaṇītatarāti vā attho. Pāsādatalasāṭikāti catubhūmakapāsādassa heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimato
tika-abh08t0:2267_6: uparūpari savisesā pañca kāmaguṇā, cattāro pāsādatalā ca thūlasaṇhasaṇhatarasaṇhatamasuttehi
tika-abh08t0:2268: 1042. Rūpārūpabhavaṃ abhibhuyya nibbānaṃ yāti, atha vā nīvaraṇe abhibhuyya rūpārūpabhavaṃ yātīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2274_0: 1043-7. Paranti visiṭṭhaṃ katvā, visesatoti attho. Catutthajjhānamattepīti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānamattepi,
tika-abh08t0:2274_1: nāvassaṃ arūpajjhānehīti adhippāyo. Arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ appaṭiladdhopi hi katādhikāro
tika-abh08t0:2274_2: bhikkhu abhiññā sampādetuṃ samattho hoti. Ettha catutthajjhānaggahaṇeneva heṭṭhā
tika-abh08t0:2274_3: tīṇi jhānāni gahitāni. Tesu hi aciṇṇavasī catutthajjhānaṃ uppādetumpi na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:2274_4: Abhiññāsu anuyogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vatvā tattha payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “abhiññā nāmā”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2274_5: vuttaṃ. Niṭṭhaṅgatāti adhigatānisaṃsatāya ceva bhāvanāsukhatāya ca niṭṭhaṃ nipphattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2274_6: gatā. Samādhibhāvanāya hi lokiyābhiññā udayaphalabhāvena pākaṭā. So abhiññāya ca
tika-abh08t0:2274_7: samādhinā ca samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ sampādessati.
tika-abh08t0:2275_0: 1048-9. Dibbānītiādi lokiyābhiññānaṃ sarūpato uddisanaṃ. Dibbāni cakkhusotānīti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2275_1: dibbasotañāṇañcāti dasseti. Iddhīti iddhividhañāṇaṃ. Imā pana abhiññāyo pattukāmena
tika-abh08t0:2275_2: ādikammikena yoginā yasmā odātakasiṇapariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu catutthajjhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2275_3: tabbasena ca arūpasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā vā na vā kasiṇānulomatādīhi cuddasahi ākārehi
tika-abh08t0:2275_4: cittaṃ dametabbaṃ. Na hi evaṃ adametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro
tika-abh08t0:2275_5: pañca abhiññāyo nipphādessatīti tasmā taṃ cittaparidamanaṃ avassaṃ kātabbanti dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2276_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu paṭipāṭiyā satakkhattuṃ sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjanaṃ, tatheva
tika-abh08t0:2276_1: uppaṭipāṭiyā, paṭipāṭiuppaṭipāṭivasena ca samāpajjananti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:2276_2: kasiṇānulomatādayo vuttā. Paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2276_3: ayaṃ jhānānulomatā nāma. Tesaṃ paṭilomato jhānapaṭilomatā nāma. Anulomapaṭilomato
tika-abh08t0:2277_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṃ samāpajjati, tato tadeva
tika-abh08t0:2277_1: ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ kasiṇaṃ anokkamitvā jhānasseva
tika-abh08t0:2277_2: ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ jhānukkantikatā nāma. Evaṃ āpokasiṇādimūlikāpi yojanā
tika-abh08t0:2277_3: kātabbā. Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe, tato nīlakasiṇe,
tika-abh08t0:2277_4: tato lohitakasiṇeti jhānaṃ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ kasiṇukkantikatā
tika-abh08t0:2277_5: nāma. Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā, tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2277_6: ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa
tika-abh08t0:2277_7: ceva kasiṇassa ca ukkamanaṃ jhānakasiṇukkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2278_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ aṅgasaṅkantikatā
tika-abh08t0:2278_1: nāma. Sabbakasiṇesu ekekasseva samāpajjanaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkantikatā nāma. Pathavīkasiṇe
tika-abh08t0:2278_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā, āpokasiṇe dutiyaṃ, tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ, vāyokasiṇe catutthaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2278_3: nīlakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, pītakasiṇato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ, lohitakasiṇato
tika-abh08t0:2278_4: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, odātakasiṇato nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ aṅgānaṃ, ārammaṇānañca
tika-abh08t0:2279_0: Paṭhamajjhānaṃ nāma pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ, tatiyaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2279_1: catutthaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ jhānaṅgamattasseva
tika-abh08t0:2279_2: vavatthāpanaṃ aṅgavavatthāpanaṃ nāma. Tathā “idaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, idaṃ āpokasiṇa”ntiādinā
tika-abh08t0:2279_4: eke icchantīti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṃ bhāvanāsukhaṃ na hoti. Imehi
tika-abh08t0:2279_5: pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaparidamanaṃ kātuṃ aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ satesu, sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:2280_0: 1050-1. Danteti cuddasahi ākārehi dante. Samāhiteti catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite.
tika-abh08t0:2280_2: sampāditasatipārisuddhiyā sabbhāvena vā suparisuddhe. Pariyodāteti sudhantasuvaṇṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2280_3: nighaṃsanena viya parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte, pabhassareti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā
tika-abh08t0:2280_5: samādhisampannassa īdisena bhavitabba”nti evaṃ jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānaṃ “aho vata
tika-abh08t0:2280_6: mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyā”tiādinayappavattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2280_7: pāpakānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ abhāvena anaṅgaṇe. Anupakkileseti upagantvā kilissanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2280_8: upakkilesasaṅkhātānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ, “abhijjhā cittassa upakkileso, byāpādo, kodho”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:2280_9: āgatānaṃ cittupakkilesānaṃ vā vigatattā vigatupakkilese. Mudubhūteti paguṇabhāvāpādanena
tika-abh08t0:2280_10: subhāvitattā mudubhūte, vasibhāvappatteti vuttaṃ hoti. Vasibhāvappattañhi cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2280_11: suparimadditaṃ viya cammaṃ suparikammakatā viya ca lākhā mudūti vuccati. Kammanīyeti
tika-abh08t0:2280_13: hoti. Mudujātañhi cittaṃ kammakkhamaṃ hoti, sudhantamiva suvaṇṇaṃ, ubhayampi cetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2280_14: subhāvitattāyeva hoti. Yathāha – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
tika-abh08t0:2280_15: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2280_16: Ṭhiteti etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu niccalaṃ avaṭṭhite, bhāvanāpāripūriyā vā paṇītabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2280_17: sammasitvā ṭhite. Acaleti ṭhitattāyeva akampe, āneñjappatteti vuttaṃ hoti. Mudukammaññabhāvehi
tika-abh08t0:2280_18: vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite, saddhādīhi pariggahitattā assaddhiyādīhi akampanato acale.
tika-abh08t0:2281_0: Aṭṭhaṅgasampanneti ṭhitiacalatānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ aggahaṇena samāhiteti visuṃ ekaṅgaṃ
