tika-abh08t0:2281_1: katvā. Tāsaṃ pana visuṃ visuṃ gahaṇe suvisuddhatādīnaṃ samāhitacittassa aṅgabhūtattā
tika-abh08t0:2281_2: samāhiteti imaṃ aṅgabhāvena aggahetvā suvisuddhatādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi sampannatā
tika-abh08t0:2281_3: veditabbā. Iddhividhāyāti iddhikoṭṭhāsatthāya, iddhippabhedāya vā. Atthato pana iddhividhā
tika-abh08t0:2281_4: nāma ekassa bahubhāvādianekavidhānapaccayabhūtaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃ. Abhinīharatīti abhiññādhigamatthāya
tika-abh08t0:2281_5: parikammacittaṃ kasiṇārammaṇato apanetvā abhiññābhimukhaṃ peseti. Iddhivikubbananti
tika-abh08t0:2281_6: ettha ijjhatīti iddhi, nipphajjati paṭilabbhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yañhi nipphajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2281_7: paṭilabbhati ca, taṃ ijjhatīti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:2283_0: Iddhiyeva vikubbanaṃ pakativaṇṇavijahanakiriyanti iddhivikubbanaṃ, idaṃ iddhīsu vikubbaniddhiyā
tika-abh08t0:2283_1: padhānabhāvato vuttaṃ, iddhi ca vikubbanañcāti vā iddhivikubbanaṃ. Visuṃ gahaṇampi
tika-abh08t0:2284_0: 1052-4. Yathā pana taṃ nipphādetabbaṃ, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “abhiññāpādakajjhāna”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:2284_1: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “anupubbena cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāyā”ti
tika-abh08t0:2284_2: keci, taṃ ayuttaṃ. Yadicchakaṃ samāpajjanatthañhi cittaparidamanaṃ, catutthajjhānameva
tika-abh08t0:2284_3: ca abhiññāpādakaṃ, na itarāni. Sataṃ…pe… mānasanti sace sataṃ icchati, “sataṃ homi,
tika-abh08t0:2284_4: sataṃ homī”ti, sace sahassaṃ icchati, “sahassaṃ homi, sahassaṃ homī”ti evaṃ parikammamānasaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2284_5: katvā. “Parikammamānasa”nti ca pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “sataṃ homī”tiādinā pavattitakāmāvacaracittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2284_6: pādakajjhānañca. Abhi…pe… punāti ettha pubbe abhiññāpādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ parikammacittassa
tika-abh08t0:2284_7: samādhānatthaṃ, puna samāpajjanaṃ adhiṭṭhānacittassa balaggāhatthaṃ. Adhiṭṭhātīti
tika-abh08t0:2284_8: sataṃ āvajjetvā tato paraṃ pavattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ, catunnaṃ vā pubbabhāgacittānaṃ anantarā
tika-abh08t0:2284_9: uppannena sanniṭṭhāpanavasena adhiṭṭhānanti laddhanāmena abhiññāñāṇena sanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2284_10: karoti, sataṃ nipphādetīti attho. “Adhiṭṭhāna”nti hi sabbattha abhiññāñāṇaṃ vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2285_1: ettha etesu parikammādhiṭṭhānesu parikammamānasāni “sataṃ homī”ti pavattāni kāmāvacaramānasāni
tika-abh08t0:2285_2: satārammaṇikāni ekekassa cittassa vasena satārammaṇikāni honti paccekaṃ “sataṃ homī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2285_3: pavattanato. Sahassārammaṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Tadādhiṭṭhānacittampīti tassa satādikassa
tika-abh08t0:2285_4: adhiṭṭhānacittampi. Satārammaṇikatā ca pana nesaṃ vaṇṇavasena, no sattapaññattivasena.
tika-abh08t0:2285_5: Rūpañhi sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā katvā dassetabbaṃ, na paññatti. Ettha ca yadi nīlavaṇṇameva
tika-abh08t0:2285_6: sataṃ abhinipphādeti, vaṇṇassa taṃtaṃsantānavasena nānattepi nīlavasena ekattā ekamekaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2286_0: Yadi pana nānāvaṇṇanānākiriyaparikammacittānampi bahubhāvo hoti, ekamekaṃ ekekavaṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2286_1: ekekavaṇṇesu ca nānākiriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti. Adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ pana vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2286_2: gahetvāpi parikammārammaṇaṃ nānāvaṇṇavantaṃ abhinipphādeti acinteyyānubhāvattā iddhivisayassa.
tika-abh08t0:2286_3: Appanācittaṃ viyāti viya-ggahaṇaṃ abhiññācittassa, jhānacittassa ca paṭhamuppattiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2286_4: sadisabhāvato vuttaṃ, na tassa appanābhāvato. Teneva hi pubbe vuttaggahaṇena visesitanti.
tika-abh08t0:2286_5: Catutthajjhānikanti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānavantaṃ, tena sampayuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ catutthajjhānassa,
tika-abh08t0:2286_6: imassa ca ko visesoti āha “parikammavisesovā”ti. Na hettha parikammavisesaṃ vinā
tika-abh08t0:2286_7: añño viseso atthi. Appanāya pubbabhāgappavattānipi tīṇi cattāri javanāni gahitaggahaṇena,
tika-abh08t0:2286_9: sesaṃ samānameva. Tenāha “sesaṃ pubbasamaṃ idhā”ti. Iddhividhañāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t0:2287_0: 1058. Dibbasotanti devatānaṃ pittasemhādīhi apalibuddhehi dūrepi ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthehi
tika-abh08t0:2287_1: dibbasotapasādehi samānattā, dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā, attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattā
tika-abh08t0:2287_2: dibbaṃ, savanaṭṭhena sotakiccakaraṇato, taṃsadisatāya ca sotaṃ. Idanti yaṃ uddese
tika-abh08t0:2287_3: “dibbāni cakkhusotānī”ti dibbasotaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ idanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2288_0: 1059-64. Paṭhamaṃ oḷārikasaddaṃ āvajjetvā pacchā sukhumasaddassa āvajjitabbato āha
tika-abh08t0:2288_1: “mahanto sukhumopi cā”ti. Paricayakaraṇatthañhi paṭhamaṃ araññe sīhādīnaṃ sadde ādiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2288_2: katvā sabbe oḷārikato paṭṭhāya yathānukkamena sukhumasaddā āvajjitabbā, tathā puratthimādīsu
tika-abh08t0:2288_3: disāsu oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ. Tassa te
tika-abh08t0:2288_4: saddā pakaticittassapi pākaṭā honti, parikammacittassa pana ativiya pākaṭā. Tassāti
tika-abh08t0:2288_5: tassa yogino. Saddassa nimittanti oḷārikassa, sukhumassa vā saddassa yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2288_6: upādāyupādāya labbhamānaoḷārikasukhumākāraṃ. Manasi kubbatoti “imissā disāya ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2288_7: saddo oḷāriko, sukhumo vā”ti evaṃ parikammacittena manasi karontassa. Saddesūti ye
tika-abh08t0:2288_8: parikammacittassa visayabhūtā oḷārikā, sukhumā vā saddā, tesu. Aññataranti yattha
tika-abh08t0:2288_9: parikammakaraṇavasena abhiṇhaṃ manasikāro pavatto, taṃ ekaṃ saddaṃ. Yadi abhiññācittampi
tika-abh08t0:2288_10: parikammena gahitameva ārammaṇaṃ karoti, ko pana tassa, imassa vā visesoti? Vuccate
tika-abh08t0:2288_11: – parikammacittaṃ asutassa gahaṇato saddamattaṃ gaṇhāti, abhiññācittaṃ pana asutampi
tika-abh08t0:2288_12: gaṇhantaṃ savanākārena gahaṇato atthāvabodhassa paccayabhāveneva gaṇhātīti ayametesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2289_0: 1065-6. Thāmajātanti jātathāmaṃ, daḷhabhāvappattanti attho. Vaḍḍhetabbaṃ pādakajjhānārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2289_1: kittakanti āha “etthantaragata”ntiādi. Pādakajjhānassa hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2289_2: “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharatū”ti manasi karitvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjantassa kasiṇanimittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2289_3: tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati. So samāpattito vuṭṭhāya puna pādakajjhānaṃ asamāpajjitvāpi
tika-abh08t0:2289_4: anekappabhedepi sadde āvajjati subhāvitabhāvanattā. Tattha aññataraṃ saddaṃ ārabbha
tika-abh08t0:2289_5: uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ cattāri, pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti, tesu pacchimaṃ iddhicittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2289_6: hoti. Evaṃ yattakaṃ saddaṃ icchati, tattakaṃ tattha gataṃ āvajjitvā abhiññāñāṇena
tika-abh08t0:2289_7: jānāti. Yena pana evaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ avaḍḍhitaṃ, tena punapi pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitabbameva.
tika-abh08t0:2289_8: So hi taṃ ṭhānagatasaddaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvāva tato vuṭṭhāya abhiññācittena
tika-abh08t0:2289_9: suṇāti. Tato eva hi “pādakārammaṇena…pe… suṇātīti sāsaṅkaṃ vadatī”ti vuttaṃ. Iddhividhalābhī
tika-abh08t0:2289_10: pana sesābhiññalābhino viya vijjamānasaddādiārammaṇamattameva akatvā āgantukarūpanimmāpanato
tika-abh08t0:2289_11: sabbathāpi dvikkhattuṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvāva taṃ nipphādeti. Ekaṅguladvaṅgula-ggahaṇañcettha
tika-abh08t0:2290_0: 1068. Suṇantoti evaṃ paricchinditvā paricchinditvā savanena vasikatābhiñño hutvā
tika-abh08t0:2290_1: yathāvajjite suṇanto. Pāṭiyekkampīti ekajjhaṃ pavattamānepi yāva brahmalokā ekakolāhalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2290_2: katvā uṭṭhite saṅkhabherīpaṇavādisadde paccekaṃ vatthubhedena vavatthāpetukāmatāya
tika-abh08t0:2290_3: sati “ayaṃ saṅkhasaddo, ayaṃ bherīsaddo, ayaṃ paṇavasaddo”tiādinā paccekaṃyeva vavatthāpetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2291_0: 1069-73. Cetopariyamānasanti pariyātīti pariyaṃ, sarāgādivasena paricchijja jānātīti
tika-abh08t0:2291_1: attho. Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gati attho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho hotīti. Cetaso pariyaṃ cetopariyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2291_2: manasi bhavanti mānasaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, cetopariyañca taṃ mānasañcāti cetopariyamānasaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2291_3: Dibbacakkhuvasenevāti dibbacakkhuupanissayeneva. Tañhi etassa uppādane parikammaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2291_4: Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ dibbacakkhuvaseneva pavattati, tasmā. Dibbena cakkhunāti dibbasadisatādīhi
tika-abh08t0:2291_5: “dibbacakkhū”ti laddhavohārena dibbacakkhuñāṇena disvāti sambandho. Hadayanti na
tika-abh08t0:2291_6: hadayavatthu, atha kho hadayamaṃsapesi. Yaṃ bahi kamalamakuḷasaṇṭhānaṃ anto kosātakīphalasadisanti
tika-abh08t0:2291_7: vuccati. Tañhi nissāya idāni vuccamānaṃ lohitaṃ tiṭṭhati. Hadayavatthu pana imaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2291_8: lohitaṃ nissāya pavattati. Lohitaṃ disvāti lohitassa vaṇṇaṃ disvā. Dibbacakkhunopi
tika-abh08t0:2291_9: hi vaṇṇameva dissati. Teneva hi taṃ cakkhusadisattā “cakkhū”ti vuccati. Parassāti
tika-abh08t0:2291_10: aññassa. Yathā hi yo paro na hoti, so attā, evaṃ yo attā na hoti, so paro. Kathaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2291_11: pana dibbacakkhunā lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena paracittaṃ viññeyyanti āha “somanassayute”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2291_12: Lohitanti rattaṃ nigrodhaphalasamānavaṇṇaṃ. Kāḷakanti jambusadisavaṇṇaṃ. Tilatelūpamanti
tika-abh08t0:2292_0: Kathaṃ pana citte somanassa sahagatādimhi sati kammajassa lohitassa vividhavaṇṇabhāvāpattīti?
tika-abh08t0:2292_1: Kiñcāpi hadayavatthusannissitabhūtāni kammajāneva, taṃ pana lohitaṃ kammajamevāti
tika-abh08t0:2292_2: natthi catusantatirūpassapi tattha labbhamānattā. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “idaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2292_4: parassa hadayalohitavaṇṇaṃ passitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Evampi yaṃ tattha acittajaṃ, tassa
tika-abh08t0:2292_5: yathāvuttavaṇṇabhedena na bhavitabbanti? Bhavitabbaṃ sesasantatirūpānaṃ tadanuvattanato.
tika-abh08t0:2292_6: Yathā hi gamanādīsu cittajarūpāni utujakammajāhārajarūpehi anuvattīyanti, aññathā
tika-abh08t0:2292_7: kāyassa desantarappattiyeva na siyāti, evamidhāpi cittajarūpaṃ sesasantatirūpehi
tika-abh08t0:2292_8: anuvattīyati, pasādakodhavelāsu ca cakkhussa vaṇṇabhedāpattiyeva tassatthassa nidassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2292_10: nānāvaṇṇatā hotiyevāti suṭṭhu vuttaṃ “lohitaṃ lohitaṃ siyā”tiādi. Disvā hadayalohitanti
tika-abh08t0:2292_11: paṭhamaṃ tāva anumānañāṇena lohitaṃ disvā. Kātabbaṃ thāmataṃ gatanti uppādetvā thāmabhāvaṃ gataṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2293_0: Cetopariyañāṇañhi uppādetukāmena yoginā dibbacakkhulābhinā eva satā heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-abh08t0:2293_1: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-abh08t0:2293_2: dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayamaṃsapesiṃ nissāya vattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena
tika-abh08t0:2293_4: vā nayaggāhavasena vavatthāpetvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “imassa cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2293_5: jānāmī”ti parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2293_6: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Tassevaṃ dibbena cakkhunā hadayalohitavaṇṇadassanādividhinā
tika-abh08t0:2293_7: paṭipajjantassa “idāni cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppajjissatī”ti yaṃ tadā pavattatīti vavatthāpitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2293_8: cittaṃ, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ tīṇi cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni
tika-abh08t0:2293_9: javanti. Catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā abhiññācittaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:2293_10: yaṃ tena appanācittena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ, idaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ. Tañhi yattha anena
tika-abh08t0:2293_11: parikammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ parassa cittaṃ paccakkhato paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventameva hutvā
tika-abh08t0:2293_12: pavattati, rūpaṃ viya ca dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, saddaṃ viya ca dibbasotañāṇaṃ. Tato paraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2293_13: pana kāmāvacaracittehi sarāgādivavatthāpanaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthāpanaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:2294_1: tadevettha ācariyena dassitaṃ. Evaṃ thāmagatetiādi thāmagamanānisaṃsadassanaṃ. Sabbamevāti
tika-abh08t0:2294_2: idaṃ “kāmāvacaracittaṃ, rūpārūpesu mānasa”nti ubhayapadenapi sambandhitabbaṃ, catupaṇṇāsavidhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2294_4: paccekaṃ sarāgādippabhedakaṃ vijānātīti attho. Puthujjanassa vasenāyaṃ abhiññākathāti
tika-abh08t0:2294_5: lokuttaracittaṃ idha anuddhaṭaṃ. Tampi hi uparimo, sadiso vā ariyo heṭṭhimassa, sadisassa
tika-abh08t0:2294_6: ca cittaṃ jānāti, heṭṭhimo pana uparimassa cittaṃ na jānāti. Yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ arūpāvacarajjhāne
tika-abh08t0:2294_7: akatābhiniveso puthujjano, sekhopi vā arūpāvacaracittaṃ na jānāti. Aṭṭhasamāpattikassa
tika-abh08t0:2294_8: pana vasena idhārūpāvacaracittassāpi jānanaṃ vuttaṃ. Arahā pana āruppe akatābhinivesopi
tika-abh08t0:2295_0: 1076-7. Pubbe atītajātīsu nivāsā nivutthā attano santāne pavattā, saparaviññāṇehi
tika-abh08t0:2295_1: gocarāsevanāya āsevitā ca khandhā pubbenivāsā. Paraviññāṇaviññātāpi hi pubbe nivasiṃsu
tika-abh08t0:2295_2: etthāti pubbenivāsāti vuccanti, te pana chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsu buddhānaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:2295_3: visayā, pubbe nivāsesu sarūpavibhāvakaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ. Tena. Tadanussatīti
tika-abh08t0:2295_4: tesaṃ pubbenivāsānaṃ anussati. Heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu yathārahaṃ pītisukhehi kāyacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2295_5: sampīṇanāya cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitabbānīti āha “jhānāni panā”tiādi. Aññathā pādakajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2295_6: samāpajjitvāyevāti vuttaṃ siyā. Yāya nisajjāya nisinnassa anussaraṇārambho, sā idha
tika-abh08t0:2296_0: 1078-80. Tato pabhuti…pe… kkamāti tasmiṃ bhave purimabhavādīsu kataṃ sabbampi saṅgahetvā
tika-abh08t0:2296_1: sabbamāvajjitabbantiādinā visuṃ visuṃ rattindivādivasena dasseti. Divase rattiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2296_2: katanti sabbapacchimanisajjāto paṭṭhāya āsanapaññāpanaṃ senāsanappavesananti paṭilomena
tika-abh08t0:2296_3: sakalaṃ rattindivaṃ katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Katamāvajjitabbanti yaṃ etthantare katakiccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2296_4: sabbaṃ taṃ paṭilomakkameneva āvajjitabbanti attho. Ettakaṃ pana pakaticittassapi
tika-abh08t0:2296_5: pākaṭaṃ, parikammacittassa pana atipākaṭameva. Sace panettha kiñci na pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2296_6: puna pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya āvajjitabbaṃ, ettakena dīpe jalite viya
tika-abh08t0:2296_7: pākaṭaṃ hoti. Pādakajjhānasamāpajjanañhi satthakassa viya nisānasilā satipaññānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2296_8: nisitabhāvāvahaṃ, tasmā tā taṃsamāpajjanena paramanepakkappattā honti. Purimasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2296_9: bhaveti imamhā bhavā anantare purimasmiṃ bhave.
tika-abh08t0:2297_0: 1081. Nibbattaṃ nāmarūpañcāti attano paccayehi nibbattanāmarūpaṃ. Sādhukanti suṭṭhu
tika-abh08t0:2297_1: aparihāpetvā āvajjitabbaṃ. Pahoti hi imissā abhiññāya katādhikāro bhikkhu paṭhamavāreneva
tika-abh08t0:2297_2: paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ, tathā asakkontenāpi
tika-abh08t0:2297_3: dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā pādakajjhānameva punappunaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ, tato ca vuṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:2297_4: punappunaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Āvajjantena ca pana paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ āvajjitvā pacchā nāmaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2297_5: āvajjitabbanti ācariyā. Apare pana vipariyāyena vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2298_0: Tattha pacchimanisajjāto pabhuti yāva paṭisandhito ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattañāṇaṃ atītajātīsu
tika-abh08t0:2298_1: nivutthadhammārammaṇābhāvato pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāma na hoti, taṃ pana parikammañāṇameva.
tika-abh08t0:2298_2: Yadā panassa paṭisandhiṃ atikkamma cutikkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
tika-abh08t0:2298_3: manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ niruddhe vuttanayena appanācittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2298_4: tena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāma. Tenāha “yadā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2299_0: Etthāha – kiṃ ekeneva abhiññācittena cutikkhaṇe pavattanāmarūpaṃ sabbampi ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2299_1: karoti, udāhu aññena aññenāti. Kiñcettha yadi ekeneva, dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa
tika-abh08t0:2299_2: viya anirūpitarūpena vavatthānaṃ hoti. Yadi ca aññena aññena, visuṃ visuṃ pādakajjhānasamāpajjanādinā
tika-abh08t0:2299_3: bhavitabbanti? Ubhayathāpi na doso. Iddhivisayassa hi acinteyyattā ekenapi abhiññācittena
tika-abh08t0:2299_4: nāmarūpe passanto nirūpitarūpeneva passati, na anirūpitarūpeneva passati, aññenapi
tika-abh08t0:2299_5: vā paṭhamameva pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya samāhitacittena kataparikammassa
tika-abh08t0:2299_6: pavattitattā puna samāpajjanaṃ vinā āvajjitvā ārammaṇaṃ karotiyevāti. Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t0:2300_1: ca dibbavihārasannissitattā mahājutikatādīhi vā dibbaṃ, rūpadassanaṭṭhena cakkhumivāti
tika-abh08t0:2300_2: cakkhu. Yathā hi maṃsacakkhu viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2300_3: idaṃ pana tato sātisayaṃ cakkhukiccakārīti dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu,
tika-abh08t0:2300_4: tena dibbacakkhunā. Kasiṇārammaṇanti aṭṭhannampi kasiṇānaṃ vasena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2300_7: kasiṇampi vā āsannaṃ kātabba”nti pāṭhaseso. Āsannaṃ kātabbanti dibbacakkhuñāṇuppattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2300_8: samīpabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ kātabbaṃ, tattha upacārajjhānaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā taṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-abh08t0:2300_9: icchitakkhaṇe upaṭṭhānayogyaṃ katvā ṭhapetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etthāti imasmiṃ dibbacakkhunā
tika-abh08t0:2301_1: Upacārajjhānuppattiyā hi saddhiṃ paṭibhāganimittuppatti. Yasmā pādakajjhānaṃ vijjamāneyeva
tika-abh08t0:2301_2: āloke appanāvasena pavattimattaṃ vinā attano balena ālokaṃ pharituṃ na sakkoti, nāpi
tika-abh08t0:2301_3: yathāpatthaṭaṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ, parikammaṃ pana tadubhayampi kātuṃ samatthaṃ, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2301_5: cettha ālokassa thāvarakaraṇavasappavattaṃ parikammacittamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Appananti
tika-abh08t0:2301_6: jhānavasena appanaṃ. Na hi akataparikammassa abhiññāvasena appanā sijjhati. Tenāha
tika-abh08t0:2301_8: parikammanissitaṃ parikammārammaṇaṃ hoti, tathā ca sati ālokavaḍḍhanābhāvato rūpadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2302_0: 1091-3. Anto…pe… bhaveti antogatameva rūpagataṃ passitabbaṃ bhave, na bahiddhā vikkhepuppattihetubhāvato
tika-abh08t0:2302_1: passitabbaṃ dibbacakkhunāti adhippāyo. Na hi āloke pharitepi maṃsacakkhussa āpāthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2302_2: hoti. Parikammassa vāro hi atikkamati tāvadeti idha parikammaṃ nāma yathāvuttakasiṇārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2302_3: upacārajjhānaṃ, taṃ rūpagataṃ passato na pavattati, kasiṇālokavasena ca rūpagatadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2302_4: kasiṇāloko ca parikammavasenāti tadubhayampi parikammassa appavattiyā na hoti. Tenāha
tika-abh08t0:2302_5: “ālokopī”tiādi. Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpagatampi na ca dissati, rūpagataṃ passato parikammassa
tika-abh08t0:2302_6: vāro atikkamati, parikammapasutassa kasiṇārammaṇañāṇaṃ hotīti rūpagataṃ dissati,
tika-abh08t0:2303_0: 1094-9. Evaṃ anukkamenāti punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya abhiṇhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2303_1: ālokapharaṇena. Āloko thāmavāti ālokagato ciraṭṭhāyī siyā, tathā ca sati tattha sucirampi
tika-abh08t0:2303_2: rūpagataṃ passateva. Tena vuttaṃ “āloko etthā”tiādi. Svāyamattho tiṇukkūpamāya vibhāvetabboti
tika-abh08t0:2303_3: dassento āha “tiṇukkāyā”tiādi. Eko kira rattiyaṃ tiṇukkāya maggaṃ paṭipajji, tassa
tika-abh08t0:2303_4: sā tiṇukkā vijjhāyi, athassa samavisamāni na paññāyiṃsu, so taṃ tiṇukkaṃ bhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2303_5: ghaṃsitvā puna ujjālesi, sā pajjalitvā purimālokato mahantaramālokaṃ akāsi, evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2303_6: punappunaṃ vijjhātaṃ ujjālayato kamena sūriyo uṭṭhāsi, sūriye uṭṭhite “ukkāya kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2303_7: natthī”ti taṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi agamāsi. Tattha ukkāloko viya parikammakāle kasiṇāloko,
tika-abh08t0:2303_8: ukkāya vijjhātāya samavisamānaṃ adassanaṃ viya rūpagataṃ passato parikammassa vārātikkamena
tika-abh08t0:2303_9: āloke antarahite rūpagatānaṃ adassanaṃ, ukkāya ghaṃsanaṃ viya punappunaṃ pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2303_10: ukkāya purimālokato mahantatarālokakaraṇaṃ viya puna parikammaṃ karoto balavatarālokapharaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2303_11: sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya thāmagatālokassa yathāvaḍḍhitaparicchedaṃ pharitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2303_12: tiṇukkaṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi gamanaṃ viya padittālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā thāmagatenālokena
tika-abh08t0:2303_13: divasampi rūpadassanaṃ. Ettāvatā ca dibbacakkhussa nānāvajjanaparikammañceva dibbacakkhuñāṇañca
tika-abh08t0:2303_14: dassitaṃ, na tassa uppattikkamoti taṃ dassetuṃ “uppādanakkamopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2303_15: heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva. Tāni cattāri pañca vāti potthakesu likhanti.
tika-abh08t0:2304_0: 1100. Tattha atthasādhakacittanti yadatthāyesa paṭipanno, tassa tadatthasādhanato
tika-abh08t0:2304_1: atthasādhakabhūtaṃ cittaṃ. Tasmiñhi uppanne maṃsacakkhussa anāpāthayogyaṃ antokucchigataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2304_3: idaṃ rūpaṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchati, maṃsacakkhunā dissamānaṃ viya hoti. Tadeva cettha rūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2304_4: sarūpato vibhāvanasamatthaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya. Na pana āvajjanaparikammavasena
tika-abh08t0:2304_5: pavattāni pubbabhāgacittāni. Tāni hi ārammaṇaṃ karontānipi na yāthāvato taṃ vibhāvetvā
tika-abh08t0:2305_0: 1101-2. Nanu ca anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇanti dve abhiññāñāṇāni atthi, kasmā
tika-abh08t0:2305_1: tāni idha na dassitānīti āha “anāgataṃsañāṇassā”tiādi. Ijjhanti dibbacakkhunāti visuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2305_2: parikammassa abhāvato dibbacakkhuñāṇapaṭilābheneva tassa parivārāni hutvā paṭiladdhāni
tika-abh08t0:2305_3: honti. Tatoyeva hi tāni tassa paribhaṇḍañāṇānīti vuccanti. Yathā hi sinerussa parivāraṭṭhāniyāni
tika-abh08t0:2305_4: taṃsiddhiyā siddhāni mekhalaṭṭhānāni paribhaṇḍānīti vuccanti, evaṃ imānipi dibbacakkhusiddhiyā
tika-abh08t0:2306_0: Hotu tāva evametaṃ, cutūpapātañāṇaṃ pana kiṃ na dassitanti āha “cutūpapātañāṇampī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2306_1: Dibbacakkhuñāṇameva hi cutiyaṃ, upapattiyañca rūpaṃ vibhāventaṃ cutūpapāte pavattattā
tika-abh08t0:2306_3: paramatthato nāmadvayena āgataṃ ekameva ñāṇaṃ, dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ cutūpapātañāṇanti
tika-abh08t0:2306_4: pana byañjanatoyeva nānanti. Katthaci manomayañāṇantipi visuṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2307: 1103. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Anena tarenāti anena abhidhammāvatāranāmakena tarena.
tika-abh08t0:2316_0: Evamāgatā pañca. Sattābhiññā imā panāti atītaṃsañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇe, manomayañāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2316_1: ca iddhividhañāṇe antogadhattā vuttaṃ. Atītaṃsañāṇaṃ nāma paresaṃ paccuppannabhave
tika-abh08t0:2316_2: yāva paṭisandhipariyosānaṃ pavattacittārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Manomayañāṇampi nāma manomayakāyābhinimmānādivasappavattaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2317_0: 1106. Idāni imesaṃ abhiññāñāṇānaṃ ārammaṇavinicchaye asammohatthaṃ taṃ dassetumārabhanto
tika-abh08t0:2317_2: atītārammaṇattiko ajjhattārammaṇattikoti ime cattāro ārammaṇattikā. Etthāti idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2317_3: paccāmasanaṃ kiṃ tikānaṃ, udāhu ārammaṇānanti, kiñcettha – yadi tikānaṃ, tadayuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2317_4: Na hi tikesu abhiññāñāṇāni pavattanti. Atha ārammaṇānaṃ, tampi ayuttaṃ. Na hi aññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2317_5: uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ yuttanti. Yathā icchasi, tathā hotu. Bhavatu tāva
tika-abh08t0:2317_6: tikānaṃ, nanu vuttaṃ “tikesu abhiññāñāṇāni nappavattantī”ti? Nāyaṃ virodho tikavohārena
tika-abh08t0:2317_7: ārammaṇānaṃyeva gayhamānattā. Atha vā pana hotu ārammaṇānaṃ, nanu vuttaṃ “aññaṃ uddisitvā
tika-abh08t0:2317_8: aññassa paccāmasanaṃ ayutta”nti. Ayampi na doso yathāvuttakāraṇenevāti.
tika-abh08t0:2318_0: 1107-10. Parittādīsu sattasūti asatipi vatthubhede bhūmikālasantānabhedavasena bhinnesu
tika-abh08t0:2318_2: Iddhividhañāṇassa maggārammaṇatāya abhāvato idha maggārammaṇattiko na labbhati. Kāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2318_3: cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gantukāmoti sambandho. Cittasannissitakaraṇañca
tika-abh08t0:2318_4: taṃ viya kāyassa adissamānasīghagatikatāvasena taggatikatāpādanaṃ. Yathā cittaṃ na
tika-abh08t0:2318_5: dissati sīghagamanañca, evaṃ kāyampi adissamānaṃ, sīghagamanañca katvā yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2318_6: gantukāmoti ayañhettha attho. Cittavasenāti mahaggatacittavasena pariṇāmetīti pāṭhaseso.
tika-abh08t0:2318_7: Tenāha “taṃ mahaggate ca cittasmiṃ samāropetī”ti. Pādakajjhānañhi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:2318_8: “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya adissamāno, sīghagamano ca hotū”ti parikammaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2318_9: parikammaṃ pana katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva parikammaṃ karonto kāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2318_10: gahetvā mahaggate pādakacitte samāropeti, taggatikaṃ karoti viya, adissamānaṃ, sīghagamanañca
tika-abh08t0:2318_11: karoti. Taṃ pana sīghagamanatthaṃ abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ appavattitvā katipayacittavāreheva
tika-abh08t0:2318_12: icchitaṭṭhānappattivasena daṭṭhabbaṃ, na ekacittakkhaṇeneva. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2318_13: ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti
tika-abh08t0:2318_14: hi ettha añña-ggahaṇeneva rūpadhammānaṃ gahitattā cittakkhaṇavasena rūpappavatti
tika-abh08t0:2318_15: na yuttā. Yattha yattha ca dhammā uppajjanti, tattha tattheva bhijjanti ca, na ca
tika-abh08t0:2318_16: iddhibalena dhammānaṃ kenaci lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ sakkā kātunti. Cittavasena rūpakāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2318_17: pādakajjhāne samāropentassa kāyameva ārammaṇanti āha “kāyārammaṇato”ti, kāye vaṇṇārammaṇatoti
tika-abh08t0:2318_18: vuttaṃ hoti. Kāyasannissitaṃ katvā cittanti ettha na cittaṃ kāyaṃ viya dandhaṃ dissamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2319_0: 1112-3. Anāgatamatītañca karoti visayaṃ yadāti mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2319_1: viya anāgataṃ adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, kāyavasena cittapariṇāmanakāle
tika-abh08t0:2319_2: tadeva ciraniruddhaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontānaṃ atītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2319_3: tadā atītārammaṇaṃ, anāgatagocarañca hoti, paccuppanno gocaro paccuppannassa rūpakāyassa
tika-abh08t0:2319_4: ārammaṇakaraṇato. Hatthiādayo abhinimminantassāpi hi kiñcāpi parikammaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2319_5: hoti, adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ pana paccuppannārammaṇameva. Upacārārammaṇaṃ viya hi paṭibhāganimittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2320_0: 1114-5. Kāyaṃ …pe… siyāti attano kāyaṃ cittavasena pariṇāmanakāle ajjhattassa kāyassa
tika-abh08t0:2320_1: ārammaṇakaraṇato, attano cittaṃ kāyavasena pariṇāmanakāle cittassa ārammaṇakaraṇato.
tika-abh08t0:2320_2: Vā-saddena avuttasamuccayatthena gahite attano kumāravaṇṇādiabhinimmānakāle kāyassa
tika-abh08t0:2320_3: ārammaṇakaraṇato ca ajjhattārammaṇaṃ siyā. Bahiddhā rūpadassaneti bahiddhā hatthiassādirūpadassanakāle.
tika-abh08t0:2321_0: 1116-8. Paccuppanne paritte cāti sarūpavibhāvanametaṃ. Dibbasotassa hi paccuppannova
tika-abh08t0:2321_1: saddo ārammaṇaṃ hoti, so ca sabhāvato parittova. Kucchisaddassāti kucchiyaṃ vātasaddassa.
tika-abh08t0:2321_2: Tattha pāṇakasaddassa pana savane bahiddhārammaṇameva. Vasitāpattassa attano vitakkavipphārasaddasavanepi
tika-abh08t0:2321_3: ajjhattārammaṇanti vadanti, taṃ pana ekādasabhavaṅgacittato upari bhavaṅgaṃ pavattitumadatvā
tika-abh08t0:2321_4: bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya āvajjanasamatthatāvasena vasitāpattasseva yujjati. “Parassa ca
tika-abh08t0:2321_5: saddassā”ti sambandhitabbaṃ. Na hi parassa kucchisaddasavaneyeva bahiddhārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2322_1: Parittānanti kāmāvacaracittānaṃ. Majjhimānanti parittaappamāṇānaṃ majjhe bhavattā
tika-abh08t0:2322_2: majjhimasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpārūpāvacaracittānaṃ. Majjhebhavatā ca desanāvasena, na sabhāvavasena.
tika-abh08t0:2322_3: Cetopariyañāṇaṃ parassa cittameva jānāti, avasesakkhandhattayaṃ pana na jānātīti
tika-abh08t0:2322_4: imaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ sandhāyāha “maggacittassa jānane”tiādi. Ayañhettha adhippāyo
tika-abh08t0:2322_5: – yasmā cetopariyañāṇaṃ cittameva jānāti, tasmā taṃ maggārammaṇaṃ na hoti, maggasampayuttacittajānanato
tika-abh08t0:2322_6: pana pariyāyena maggārammaṇatā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātāti. Paṭṭhāne pana –
tika-abh08t0:2323: “Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:2324: Vuttattā cattāropi khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ honti, tasmā nippariyāyeneva maggārammaṇatā labbhatīti idamettha saṅgahakārānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2325_1: cetopariyañāṇaṃ jānāti, tato paṭṭhāya pana paṭisandhipariyosānaṃ, cutipariyosānañca
tika-abh08t0:2325_2: pavattaṃ atītaṃsañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ca gocaranti adhippāyenāha “atīte”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2325_3: Atītassa, anāgatassa ca paracittassa jānanaṃ sambhavati, paccuppannassa pana na sambhavatīti
tika-abh08t0:2325_4: pucchati “kathañca panā”tiādi. Itaro yattha sambhavati, taṃ dassetuṃ paccuppannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2325_5: tāva vibhajitvā dassento “paccuppannaṃ tidhā vutta”ntiādimāha. Khaṇasantatiaddhatoti
tika-abh08t0:2325_6: khaṇapaccuppannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ addhāpaccuppannanti evaṃ khaṇasantatiaddhāvasena tidhā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2326_1: khaṇa-saddādikaṃ paccuppannaṃ khaṇapaccuppannanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekadvesantativārapariyāpannanti
tika-abh08t0:2326_2: ettha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na ca tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2326_3: yāva pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, etthantare pavattā rūpasantati, arūpasantati vā “ekadvesantativārā”ti
tika-abh08t0:2326_4: veditabbā. “Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2326_5: hoti, yāva taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, pubbeva tattha nisinnassa viya etthantare ekadvesantativārā
tika-abh08t0:2326_6: veditabbā. Dūre ṭhatvā pana rajakādīnaṃ hatthavikāraṃ, ghaṇṭibherīādiākoṭanahatthavikārañca
tika-abh08t0:2326_7: disvā na pana tāva saddaṃ suṇāti, yāva pana taṃ suṇāti, etthantare ekadvesantativārā
tika-abh08t0:2327_0: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana “rūpasantati arūpasantatīti dve santatiyo vatvā udakaṃ akkamitvā
tika-abh08t0:2327_1: gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati, addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye
tika-abh08t0:2327_2: usumabhāvo na vūpasammati, ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:2327_3: na vigacchati, antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa
tika-abh08t0:2327_4: yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati, ayaṃ rūpasantati nāma. Dve tayo javanavārā
tika-abh08t0:2327_5: arūpasantati nāmāti vatvā tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā”ti evaṃ ekameva santativāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2327_6: vadanti. Tattha majjhimabhāṇakavāde ekaccassa sīghampi pākaṭaṃ hotīti ekadvesantativārāti
tika-abh08t0:2328_0: 1127-8. Ekabbhavaparicchinnanti ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhicutivasena paricchinnaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2328_1: dhammajātaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yo cāvuso mano, ye ca dhammā, ubhayametaṃ paccuppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2328_2: tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇa”ntiādi, santatipaccuppannañcettha
tika-abh08t0:2328_3: abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu āgataṃ, addhāpaccuppannaṃ sutte. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino.
tika-abh08t0:2329_0: 1129-30. Yathā cātiādi ettha tesaṃ opammadassanaṃ. Ekapupphaṃ attano vaṇṭena ekassa
tika-abh08t0:2329_1: vaṇṭaṃ vijjhatīti sambandho. Mahājanassāpi…pe… vijjhatīti “atītaṃ cittaṃ, anāgataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2329_2: cittaṃ, imassa cittaṃ, asukassa citta”nti evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā parassa cittaṃ jānāmicceva
tika-abh08t0:2329_3: rāsivasena mahājanassa citte āvajjite ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena uppādakkhaṇe vā
tika-abh08t0:2329_4: ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā ekantena paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2330_0: 1131-2. Taṃ pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ ayuttanti dassetuṃ “yenāvajjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vassasahassampi
tika-abh08t0:2330_1: hi evaṃ āvajjayato āvajjanajavanānaṃ ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe ṭhānaṃ natthi, abhiññācittañca
tika-abh08t0:2330_2: sace khaṇapaccuppannaṃ jānāti, āvajjanena saha ekārammaṇe vattamānameva jānāti, no
tika-abh08t0:2330_3: aññathā, tasmā tesaṃ āvajjanajavanānaṃ dvinnaṃ saha ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe aṭṭhānābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:2330_4: taṃ na yujjati. Bhavatu tāva ko ettha dosoti ce āha “āvajjanajavanāna”ntiādi. Tattha
tika-abh08t0:2330_5: maggaphalavīthito aññaṃ aniṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Maggaphalavīthiyañhi āvajjanādīnaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇattā,
tika-abh08t0:2330_6: gotrabhuādīnañca nibbānārammaṇattā nānārammaṇatā iṭṭhā, aññattha pana aniṭṭhā, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2330_7: aniṭṭhe ṭhāne javanāvajjanānaṃ nānārammaṇatāpattidoso ayuttoti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2331_0: 1133-4. Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hotīti āha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2331_1: Yasmā evaṃ ayuttanti pakāsitaṃ, tasmā. Javanavāratoti ekajavanavāravasena. Idaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2331_2: khaṇapaccuppannānantaraṃ lahukaṃ katvā paccuppannadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, yaṃ pana vattamānajavanavīthito
tika-abh08t0:2331_3: atītānāgatavasena dvitijavanavīthiparimāṇakāle pavattaṃ paracittaṃ, taṃ sabbampi
tika-abh08t0:2331_4: “santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā javanavāratoti dvitijavanavāravasena
tika-abh08t0:2331_5: dīpetabbaṃ, na sakalena paccuppannaddhunāti adhippāyo. Niddiṭṭhaṃ saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2332_1: panā”ti. Ānandācariyo panettha abhidhammamātikāya āgatassa paccuppannapadassa addhāsantatipaccuppannapadatthatā
tika-abh08t0:2332_2: na katthaci pāḷiyaṃ vuttā, tasmā cittasāmaññena cittaṃ āvajjayamānaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2332_3: vijjamānacittaṃ āvajjeti, parikammāni ca taṃ taṃ vijjamānacittaṃ cittasāmaññeneva
tika-abh08t0:2332_4: ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittajānanaparikammāni hutvā pavattanti. Cetopariyañāṇaṃ pana vijjamānacittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2332_5: paṭivijjhantaṃ tena saha ekakkhaṇe uppajjati. Tattha yasmā santānaggahaṇato ekattavasena
tika-abh08t0:2332_6: āvajjanādīni cittanteva pavattāni, tañca cittameva, yaṃ cetopariyañāṇena vibhāvitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2332_7: tasmā samānākārappavattito na aniṭṭhe ṭhāne nānārammaṇatā hotīti khaṇapaccuppannavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:2332_8: imassa paccuppannārammaṇataṃ icchati. Itarānīti āvajjanaparikammacittāni. Cakkhudvāre
tika-abh08t0:2333_0: 1143-7. Parittādīsu aṭṭhasūti cetopariyañāṇassa vuttesu paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hitvā
tika-abh08t0:2333_1: navattabbārammaṇañca pakkhipitvā aṭṭhasu parittādīsu. Atīte…pe… phalampi vāti ettha
tika-abh08t0:2333_2: attanāti nidassanamattaṃ. Parehipi bhāvitamaggaṃ, sacchikataphalañca pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena
tika-abh08t0:2333_3: samanussarati. Vā-saddena vā avuttasamuccayatthena attanā bhāvitaṃ maggaṃ, phalampi
tika-abh08t0:2333_4: vā parehi bhāvitaṃ maggaṃ, phalampi vāti evamattho gahetabbo. Tathā ca vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2333_5: “attanā, parehi bhāvitamaggaṃ, sacchikataphalañca anussaraṇakāle”ti. Eva-kāraṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2333_6: padapūraṇamattameva. Phalampi vāti ettha “bhāvita”nti na sambandhitabbaṃ. Na hi phalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2333_7: bhāvetabbaṃ hoti, atha kho sacchikātabbamevāti. Samanussarato magganti etthāpi “attanā,
tika-abh08t0:2333_8: parehi vā bhāvita”nti sambandhitabbaṃ. Ekantatoti niyamato.
tika-abh08t0:2334_0: 1148-50. Nanu ca cetopariyañāṇayathākammūpagañāṇānipi atītārammaṇāneva, kiṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2334_1: tesaṃ, imassa ca ārammaṇe nānākaraṇanti āha “cetopariyañāṇampī”tiādi. Kiñcāpīti ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2334_2: nipātasamudāyo, eko vā nipāto visesānabhidhānanimitte upagamane daṭṭhabbo. Atha khoti
tika-abh08t0:2334_3: visesābhidhānasamārambhe. Cittamevāti idaṃ pubbe vicāritameva. Atīte cetanāmattanti
tika-abh08t0:2334_4: idampi pubbe viya mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ sandhāyeva vuttaṃ. Tattha hi yathākammūpagañāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2334_5: cetanāmattameva ārammaṇaṃ hoti, na cittaṃ, nāpi itare dhammā, yato taṃ yathākammūpaganti
tika-abh08t0:2334_6: vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena yathākammūpagañāṇaṃ atītacetanāmattameva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti
tika-abh08t0:2334_7: vuttaṃ, heṭṭhā dassitapāḷivasena sabbe cattāropi khandhā yathākammūpagañāṇassa ārammaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:2334_8: saṅgahakārānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Natthi kiñci agocaranti kiñci khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2334_9: nāmagottādiṃ vā agocaraṃ nāma natthi. Tañhi atītakkhandhakhandhapaṭibaddhesu dhammesu
tika-abh08t0:2335_1: “atīte vipassī bhagavā ahosi, tassa mātā bandhumatī, pitā bandhumā”tiādinā nayena
tika-abh08t0:2335_2: nāmagottādiṃ, pathavīnimittādiñca anussaraṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti. Navattabbagocaranti
tika-abh08t0:2335_5: avasesapaññattārammaṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ hoti. Nāmagottanti cettha khandhapaṭibaddho
tika-abh08t0:2335_6: sammutisiddho byañjanattho, na byañjanaṃ. Byañjanañhi saddāyatanasaṅgahitattā parittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2336_0: 1154. Dibbasotasamanti yasmā paccuppannaṃ, parittañca rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2336_1: paccuppannārammaṇaṃ, parittārammaṇañca hoti, attano kucchigatarūpadassane, parassa
tika-abh08t0:2337_0: 1155-6. Parittādīsu aṭṭhasūti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa vuttesu atītārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā
tika-abh08t0:2337_1: anāgatārammaṇaṃ pakkhipitvā aṭṭhasu. Nibbattissati…pe… pajānatoti iminā nibbattakkhandhajānanamāha.
tika-abh08t0:2337_2: Anāgataṃsañāṇassa anāgatamagocaraṃ natthi. Tampi hi anāgatakkhandhakhandhapaṭibaddhesu
tika-abh08t0:2338: 1163. Jānane nāmagottassāti “anāgate metteyyo nāma sammāsambuddho uppajjissati, tassa subrahmā nāma pitā bhavissati, brahmavatī nāma mātā”tiādinā nayena nāmagottādijānanakāle.
tika-abh08t0:2340: 1169. Vividhatthavaṇṇapadanti nānappakāraatthapadehi, byañjanapadehi ca sampannaṃ. Madhuratthamatinīharanti madhuratthaṃ atinīharañcāti padacchedo.
tika-abh08t0:2346_0: 1170-2. Idāni yasmā evaṃ abhiññāvasena adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya
tika-abh08t0:2346_1: samannāgatena bhikkhunā paññā bhāvetabbā hoti. Evañhi sā sabbākārena thiratarā sikhappattā
tika-abh08t0:2346_2: ca hoti, tasmā tassā bhāvanānayavibhāvanatthamārabhanto āha “samādhiṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2346_3: Kā paññāti sarūpapucchā. Ko catthoti imissā ko attho. Paññāti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2347_0: 1173-4. Paññā vipassanāpaññāti idhādhippetameva paññaṃ dasseti, aññattha pana bahuvidho
tika-abh08t0:2347_1: paññāpabhedo hoti. Puññacittasamāyutāti kusalacittasampayuttā. Ettha ca puñña-ggahaṇena
tika-abh08t0:2347_2: duvidhampi abyākataṃ nivatteti, tathā “atthi saṃkiliṭṭhā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvādaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2347_4: vā pakāratoti vutte “kimidaṃ pakārato jānanaṃ nāmā”ti anuyogaṃ manasi nidhāya sañjānanavijānanākāravisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2347_5: nānappakārato jānananti dassetuṃ “saññāviññāṇapaññānaṃ, ko viseso kimantara”nti kathetukamyatāpucchaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2347_6: katvā vissajjanamāha “saññāviññāṇapaññāna”ntiādinā. Jānanatte samepi cāti visayavijānanākāre samānepi.
tika-abh08t0:2348_1: saññānimittaṃ katvā jānanaṃ. Tathā hesā puna sañjānanapaccayakaraṇarasā. Matta-saddena
tika-abh08t0:2348_2: visesanivattiatthena vijānanappajānanākāre nivatteti, eva-kārena kadācipi imissā
tika-abh08t0:2348_3: te visesā na santiyevāti avadhāreti. Tenāha “lakkhaṇappaṭivedha”ntiādi. “Aniccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2348_4: dukkhamanattā”ti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ neva sakkoti, viññāṇakiccampi kātuṃ na
tika-abh08t0:2348_5: sakkoti, saññā kuto paññākiccaṃ kareyyāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoticceva
tika-abh08t0:2348_6: vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “maggaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2349_0: 1176. Viññāṇaṃ pana ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ na tattha saññā viya nīlapītādikassa sañjānanavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:2349_1: pavattati, atha kho taṃ tattha aniccatādivisesaṃ, aññañca tādisaṃ visesaṃ jānantameva
tika-abh08t0:2349_2: pavattatīti āha “viññāṇaṃ panā”tiādi. Kathaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ karotīti?
tika-abh08t0:2349_3: Paññāya dassitamaggena. Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṃ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā
tika-abh08t0:2349_4: pavattamānāya paguṇabhāvato paricayavasena ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi vipassanā sambhavati,
tika-abh08t0:2349_5: yathā taṃ paguṇassa ganthassa sajjhāyane ñāyāgatāpi vārā na viññāyanti. Lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2349_6: paṭivijjhitunti ca lakkhaṇānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na paṭivijjhanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2350_0: 1177. Ussakkitvāti 220 udayabbayādiñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā ārabhitvā maggaṃ pāpetumeva taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2350_1: viññāṇaṃ na sakkoti asambodhasabhāvattā. Vuttanayanti viññāṇe vuttanayaṃ. Sā hi ārammaṇañca
tika-abh08t0:2350_2: jānāti, lakkhaṇañca paṭivijjhati. Attano pana anaññasādhāraṇena ānubhāvena maggaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2350_3: pāpetuñca sakkoti. Bālagāmikaheraññikānaṃ kahāpaṇajānanamiva ca nesaṃ ārammaṇajānanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2350_4: veditabbaṃ. Yathā hi heraññikaphalake ṭhapitaṃ kahāpaṇarāsiṃ eko asañjātavohārabuddhi
tika-abh08t0:2350_5: bāladārako, eko gāmikapuriso, eko heraññikoti tīsu janesu passamānesu bāladārako
tika-abh08t0:2350_7: manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogāvahaṃ ratanasammata”nti na jānāti. Gāmikapuriso tadubhayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2350_8: jānāti, “ayaṃ cheko mahāsāro, ayaṃ kūṭo, ayaṃ aḍḍhasāro, ayaṃ pādasāro”tiādikaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2350_9: vibhāgaṃ na jānāti. Heraññiko sabbepi te pakāre jānāti, jānanto ca oloketvāpi jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:2350_10: ākoṭitasaddaṃ sutvāpi jānāti, gandhaṃ ghāyitvāpi rasaṃ sāyitvāpi hatthena dhārayitvāpi
tika-abh08t0:2350_11: “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā pabbate vā nadītīre vā kato”tipi “asukaācariyena
tika-abh08t0:2350_12: kato”tipi jānāti. Tattha saññā asañjātavohārabuddhino bāladārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2350_13: viya vibhāgaṃ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāti nīlādivasena ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānākāraggahaṇato,
tika-abh08t0:2351_0: 1178-80. Sabhāvapaṭivedhananti sako bhāvo, samāno vā bhāvo sabhāvo, tassa paṭivedhanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2351_3: Uppajjamānoyeva hi ñāṇāloko hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento uppajjatīti āha “sammohanandhakārassa,
tika-abh08t0:2351_4: viddhaṃsanarasā matā”ti. Tatoyeva sabbadhammesu asammuyhanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati,
tika-abh08t0:2351_5: kāraṇabhūtā vā sayaṃ phalabhūtaṃ asammohaṃ paccupatiṭṭhāpetīti āha “asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2351_6: Vipassanāpaññāya idhādhippetattā samādhi tassā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tathā hi “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2352_0: 1181-2. Dhammasabhāvapaṭivedho nāma paññāya āveṇiko sabhāvo, na tenassā koci vibhāgo
tika-abh08t0:2352_1: labbhatīti āha “lakkhaṇenekadhā vuttā”ti. Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko vuccati vaṭṭaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2352_2: tappariyāpannatāya loke niyuttā, tattha vā viditāti lokikā. Tattha apariyāpannattā
tika-abh08t0:2352_3: alokikā. Katamā panettha lokiyā, katamā lokuttarā cāti āha “lokiyenā”tiādi. Lokiyakusalacittuppādesu
tika-abh08t0:2352_4: maggasampayuttā lokiyena maggena yuttā. Visesato pana diṭṭhivisuddhiādivisuddhicatukkasaṅgahitamaggasaṃyuttā
tika-abh08t0:2352_5: samudāye pavattā paññā tadekadesesupi pavattatīti magga-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, paccekampi
tika-abh08t0:2352_6: vā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ maggasamaññāti katvā. Lokato uttarā uttiṇṇāti lokuttarā. Lokuttarāpi
tika-abh08t0:2352_7: hi maggasampayuttā bhāvetabbā, vipassanāpariyosāne labbhatevāti lokuttara-ggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2352_8: na virujjhati. Tenāha “lokuttarenā”tiādi. Sutamayāditotiādiggahaṇena bhāvanāmayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:2353_0: 1183-5. Attanova cintāyāti tassa tassa anavajjassa atthassa sādhane paropadesena
tika-abh08t0:2353_1: vinā attano upāyacintāvaseneva. Bhūripaññenāti mahāpaññena, patthaṭatāya pathavīsamānapaññena
tika-abh08t0:2353_2: vāti attho. Parato pana sutvānāti parato upadesaṃ sutvā. Suteneva ca nipphannāti
tika-abh08t0:2353_3: antogatahetvatthamidaṃ visesanaṃ, suteneva nipphannattāti attho. “Nipphannattā sutena
tika-abh08t0:2353_4: vā”ti vā pāṭho. Yathā vāpi tathā vāti parato sutvā vā asutvā vā. Appanāpattāti idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2353_5: sikhāpattaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, na pana appanāpattāva bhāvanāmayāti. Tissopi
tika-abh08t0:2354_0: “Tattha katamā cintāmayā paññā? Yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā sippāyatanesu
tika-abh08t0:2354_1: yogavihitesu vā vijjāṭhānesu kammassakataṃ vā saccānulomikaṃ vā rūpaṃ aniccanti vā,
tika-abh08t0:2354_2: vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṃ aniccanti vā, yaṃ evarūpaṃ anulomikaṃ khantiṃ diṭṭhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2354_3: ruciṃ mudiṃ pekkhaṃ dhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ parato asutvā paṭilabhati, ayaṃ vuccati
tika-abh08t0:2354_4: cintāmayā paññā. Tattha katamā sutamayā paññā…pe… sutvā paṭilabhati, ayaṃ vuccati
tika-abh08t0:2354_5: sutamayā paññā. Sabbāpi samāpannassa paññā bhāvanāmayā paññā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2355_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi kammāyatanādivasena cintāmayasutamayapaññā mahaggatalokuttaravasena
tika-abh08t0:2355_1: bhāvanāmayapaññā ca vuttā, idha pana antimabhavikānaṃ dvinnaṃ bodhisattānameva labbhamānā
tika-abh08t0:2355_2: cintāmayabhūtā saccānulomikā paññā, pūritapāramīnaṃ avasesamahāpaññānaṃ labbhamānā
tika-abh08t0:2355_3: sutamayā saccānulomikā paññā, lokuttarappanāpattāpi bhāvanāmayapaññāva adhippetā.
tika-abh08t0:2356_1: vasena. Nanu cettha vipassanāpaññā adhippetā, kasmā paṭisambhidā āhaṭāti? Vipassakānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2356_2: ñāṇapāṭavatthaṃ paññāppabhede niddisiyamāne paṭisambhidāpaññāpi vattukāmatāya, paṭisambhidāpaññāya
tika-abh08t0:2356_3: vā vipassanāphalabhūtattā lokiyalokuttarapaññādhikāre vā lokuttarapaññāya saha pāpuṇitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2356_4: paṭisambhidāpaññampi vattukāmatāya idheva vuttāti. Atthadhammaniruttīsu ñāṇanti “atthe
tika-abh08t0:2356_5: ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dhamme ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe
tika-abh08t0:2356_6: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti evamāgataṃ atthādīsu tīsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇattayaṃ. Tīsupīti
tika-abh08t0:2356_8: te ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti evaṃ pabhedagataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2356_9: ñāṇaṃ, parittamahaggataappamāṇavasena vā tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ. Paṭisambhidārammaṇampi
tika-abh08t0:2356_10: hi paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā hoti. Teneva ca suttantabhājanīyapāḷiyaṃ “ñāṇesu ñāṇa”nti,
tika-abh08t0:2356_11: aṭṭhakathāya ca “sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2356_12: ñāṇa”nti avisesena vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā mahaggatapaṭisambhidāñāṇassa abhāvepi niruttipaṭisambhidā
tika-abh08t0:2356_13: parittārammaṇā, tisso paṭisambhidā siyā parittārammaṇā, siyā mahaggatārammaṇā, siyā
tika-abh08t0:2358_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2358_1: rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā, yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso
tika-abh08t0:2358_2: hoti…pe… avikkhepo hoti. Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi arūpino dhammā, ime
tika-abh08t0:2358_3: dhammā kusalā. Tesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
tika-abh08t0:2358_4: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.
tika-abh08t0:2358_5: Yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānāti ‘imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī’ti, tesu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2359_0: Cittuppādakkamena desanāya pavattattā sāvaseso pāṭho kato. Cittuppādasaṅgahite atthe
tika-abh08t0:2359_1: asesetvā desanā hi abhidhammabhājanīye pavattā, na sabbañeyyeti yathādassitavisayavacanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2359_2: “yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ, na taṃ aññārammaṇataṃ paṭisedheti desanāya
tika-abh08t0:2359_3: atapparabhāvato. Evañca katvā tattha nibbāne, anāgatepi atthapaṭisambhidā siyā na
tika-abh08t0:2359_5: nibbānārammaṇatā vuttā. Ettha ca atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2359_6: Hetuphalañhi yasmā hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyati sampāpuṇīyati, tasmā atthoti
tika-abh08t0:2359_7: vuccati. Dhammotipi saṅkhepato paccayassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ dahati
tika-abh08t0:2359_8: pavatteti, sampāpuṇituṃ vā dhāreti, tasmā dhammoti vuccati. Niruttīti sattānaṃ mūlabhāsābhūtā
tika-abh08t0:2359_9: māgadhikabhāsā, yāya buddhānaṃ desanā hoti. Paṭibhānanti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ñāṇattayameva.
tika-abh08t0:2359_10: Vuttañhetaṃ abhidhamme “dukkhe ñāṇaṃ…pe… tassa vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2360_0: 1187. Yasmā panāyaṃ saṅkhepatthova, pabhedavasena ca vuccamāno pākaṭo hoti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2360_1: taṃ saṅgahetvā pabhedatova atthādike dassetuṃ “yaṃ kiñci paccayuppanna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2360_2: Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannanti yaṃ kiñci hetādipaccayato samuppannaṃ. Taṃ pana “idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2360_3: ito nibbatta”nti evaṃ hetuanusārena viññāyamānameva idha adhippetaṃ, tathā kusalākusalaphalabhūtā
tika-abh08t0:2360_4: vipākā abyāpārasantivasena viññāyamānā, sesā abyāpārabhūtā kiriyā dhammā avipākasantivasena,
tika-abh08t0:2360_5: asaṅkhataṃ nissaraṇabhūto nirodho nibbutisantivasena, buddhavacanatthabhūto khandhādiparamatthadhammo
tika-abh08t0:2360_6: imāya ayaṃ dīpitoti evaṃ pāḷianusārena viññāyamānova atthasamaññaṃ labhatīti āha
tika-abh08t0:2360_7: “yaṃ kiñci paccayuppanna”ntiādi. Tattha hetuphalaṃ, bhāsitattho ca sakasakahetupaṭibaddho,
tika-abh08t0:2360_8: bhāsitapaṭibaddho ca viññāyatīti pariyāyato, sesaṃ sakasakabhāvavaseneva viññāyatīti
tika-abh08t0:2360_9: nippariyāyatova attho nāma. Tattha pariyāyattho suttantabhājanīyavasena vutto, nippariyāyattho
tika-abh08t0:2360_10: abhidhammabhājanīyavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhāsitanti pāḷidhammamāha. Sesaṃ atthapañcakesu
tika-abh08t0:2361_0: Ettha ca nibbānaṃ pattabbo attho, bhāsitattho ñāpetabbo attho, itaro nibbattetabbo
tika-abh08t0:2361_1: atthoti tividho hoti attho. Maggo sampāpako hetu, bhāsitaṃ ñāpako hetu, itaraṃ nibbattako
tika-abh08t0:2361_2: hetūti evaṃ tividho hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiriyādhammānañcettha avipākatāya dhammabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:2361_3: na vutto. Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvo na vattabbo? Na, paccayuppannabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2361_4: Evaṃ sati kusalākusalānampi paccayuppannattā atthabhāvo āpajjati? Nāyaṃ doso appaṭisiddhattā.
tika-abh08t0:2361_5: Vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo eva tesaṃ vutto, kiriyānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2361_6: paccayabhāvā dhammabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Nāyaṃ doso appaṭisiddhattā. Kammaphalasambandhassa
tika-abh08t0:2361_7: pana hetubhāvābhāvato dhammabhāvo na yuttoti. Apica “ayaṃ imassa paccayo, ayaṃ paccayuppanno”ti
tika-abh08t0:2361_8: evaṃ bhedamakatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale vipākakiriyadhamme ca paccavekkhantassa dhammatthapaṭisambhidā
tika-abh08t0:2361_9: na hontīti tesaṃ atthadhammatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2362_0: 1189. Sabhāvaniruttīti aviparītanirutti, aviparītaniruttīti tassa tassa atthassa
tika-abh08t0:2362_1: bodhane sabbakālaṃ paṭiniyatasambandho abyabhicāravohāro māgadhabhāsāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2362_2: Sā hi sabbakālaṃ paṭiniyatasambandho, itarā bhāsā pana kālantarena parivattanti.
tika-abh08t0:2364_0: Apare pana – yadi sabhāvanirutti paññattisabhāvā, evaṃ sati paññatti abhilapitabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2364_1: na vacananti āpajjati, evañca sati “tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti
tika-abh08t0:2364_2: idaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ, abhilapitabboti abhilāpo. Na hi vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2364_3: uccāretabbaṃ atthi, atha phassādivacanehi bodhetabbaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ, evañca sati
tika-abh08t0:2364_4: atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati, apica aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2364_5: “phassoti ca sabhāvanirutti, phassā phassanti na sabhāvaniruttī”ti vacanato viññattivikārasahito
tika-abh08t0:2364_6: saddo niruttīti dassitameva, “taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
tika-abh08t0:2364_7: tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, evamayaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā
tika-abh08t0:2364_8: saddārammaṇā nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya
tika-abh08t0:2364_9: sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattati, evañca katvā “niruttipaṭisambhidā
tika-abh08t0:2364_10: parittārammaṇā”ti vacanaṃ upapannaṃ hotīti vadanti. Ācariyajotipālattherādayo panāhu
tika-abh08t0:2364_12: pacchājānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, evañca sati aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:2364_13: vuttanti āpajjati, yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussādisaddabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2364_15: taṃvibhāvakaṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho, taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2364_16: ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassāti ca paccuppannasaddārammaṇapaccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattentassāti
tika-abh08t0:2364_17: na na sakkā vattuṃ. Tampi hi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventameva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2364_18: taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayassa hetubhāvato niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti
tika-abh08t0:2365_0: 1190. Tividhanti idaṃ heṭṭhā vibhāvitanayamevāti. Paccavekkhatoti imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti
tika-abh08t0:2365_1: asammohavasena paccavekkhantassa. Nanu ca tīṇi ñāṇānipi atthadhammasabhāvaṃ nātivattantīti
tika-abh08t0:2365_2: ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dhammapaṭisambhidā ca hoti, kasmā pana “tesu…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2365_3: mata”nti visuṃ vuttanti? Sārammaṇesu tīsu ñāṇesu pavattañāṇassa adhippetattā. Yañhi
tika-abh08t0:2365_4: ñāṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ tassa ārammaṇampi asammohavasena paṭivijjhantameva pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2365_5: taṃ idha paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma. Evañca katvā vuttaṃ “imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2365_6: Ñāṇamattārammaṇaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāyeva. Ettha ca kiñcāpi ayaṃ paṭisambhidā
tika-abh08t0:2365_7: sārammaṇesu ñāṇesu pavattati, ārammaṇānaṃ pana pabhedaṃ heṭṭhā ñāṇattayameva vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t0:2365_8: Yathā kiṃ? Yathā dhammadesanāya asamattho bahussuto kiñcāpi dhammakathikena kathetabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2365_9: dhammaṃ jānāti, desanā pana dhammakathikasseva visayoti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2365_10: Imāsu pana pacchimānaṃ tissannaṃ sekhāsekhamaggakkhaṇe asammohavasena paṭivedho hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2365_11: atthapaṭisambhidāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi. Tathā hi sā maggaphalasabhāvāpi hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2365_12: Evañca katvā sā lokiyalokuttarā, sesā tisso lokiyāva. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:2367: Atthapaññā yathālambā, sā dvidhāññā tu sāsavā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2368_0: 1191. Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā pañcahi ākārehi visadabhāvaṃ gacchantīti dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2368_1: “pariyattī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha pariyatti nāma buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ, pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-abh08t0:2368_2: gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā paripucchā parito sabbato ñātuṃ pucchāti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2368_3: Savanaṃ sakkaccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā sotaviññāṇavasena gahaṇaṃ, adhigamo magguppatti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2368_4: pana “adhigamo nāma arahattamagguppattī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sekhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedagamanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2368_5: appavisayaṃ, asekhabhūmiyaṃ bahuvisayanti katvā vuttaṃ. Sātisayaṃ vā adhigamanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2368_6: sandhāyeva vuttaṃ. Sekhena pattānampi hi imāsaṃ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti.
tika-abh08t0:2368_7: Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na
tika-abh08t0:2368_8: hotīti pañcannampi yathāyogaṃ sekkhāsekkhapaṭisambhidāvisadatāya kāraṇatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2368_9: Pubbayogo nāma pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane gatapaccāgatikabhāvena yāva anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2368_10: tāva vipassanābhiyogo. Adhigamapubbayogā cettha anuppannaṃ uppādenti, uppannañca
tika-abh08t0:2368_11: visadaṃ karonti, sesāni pana suvisadabhāvasseva paccayāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2369_0: 1192-4. Evaṃ ekavidhādivasena paññāya pabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni bhāvanāvidhānaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2369_1: “kathaṃ bhāvetabbā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha yasmā imāya paññāya khandhādayo dhammā
tika-abh08t0:2369_2: bhūmi, sīlavisuddhi ceva cittavisuddhi cāti imā dve visuddhiyo mūlaṃ, diṭṭhivisuddhi
tika-abh08t0:2369_4: ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pañca visuddhiyo sarīraṃ, tasmā tesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu
tika-abh08t0:2369_5: uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā mūlabhūtā dve visuddhiyo sampādetvā sarīrabhūtā
tika-abh08t0:2369_6: pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbāti dassetuṃ “khandhādīsū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2369_8: lakkhaṇādiggahaṇavasena ñāṇassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtesu. Sīlaṃ cittavisuddhinti mūlabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2369_9: sīlavisuddhiṃ, cittavisuddhiñca. Sati hi sīlavisuddhiyaṃ, cittavisuddhiyañca ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2369_10: paññā mūlajātā nāma hoti, nāsatīti. Diṭṭhivisuddhādayo pañcāti upabrūhetabbattā sarīrabhūtā
tika-abh08t0:2369_11: diṭṭhivisuddhiādayo pañca. Imissā hi paññāya santānavasena pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā
tika-abh08t0:2369_12: diṭṭhivisuddhiādayo imā pañca visuddhiyo avayavena samudāyūpalakkhaṇanayena sarīranti
tika-abh08t0:2369_13: veditabbā. Tāya paññāyāti uggahaparipucchādivasena khandhādīsu dhammesu pavattapaññāya.
tika-abh08t0:2370_2: nāma hoti, tasmā vipassanāpaññāya bhūmibhūtesu khandhādīsu ekadesadassanatthaṃ “rūpañcā”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2370_3: vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tesu pañcasu khandhesu. Yaṃ kiñcīti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. Atītānāgatādikantiādinā
tika-abh08t0:2370_4: pana tadeva ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā dasseti. Ādi-ggahaṇena paccuppannassa gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2371_1: paṇītaṃ. Akusalavipākuppattihetubhūtatāya vā hīnaṃ, vipariyāyena paṇītaṃ. Duppariggahabhūtasukhumarūpādivasena
tika-abh08t0:2371_2: dūraṃ, itaravasena santikantiādinā attho veditabbo. Sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvāti atītādivibhāgabhinnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2371_3: sabbaṃ taṃ rūparāsivasena buddhiyā ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “mahāudakakkhandho”tiādīsu viya
tika-abh08t0:2371_4: “rāsaṭṭhena rūpakkhandho”ti vuccati. Suttepi hi vuttaṃ “tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhitvā
tika-abh08t0:2371_5: abhisaṅkhipitvā”ti. Vedanākkhandhotiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ekekesu pana vedanādīsu “samuddo
tika-abh08t0:2371_6: mayā diṭṭho”tiādīsu viya samudāyavohārassa avayavepi dissanato khandha-saddo ruḷhīvasena
tika-abh08t0:2371_7: pavattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ kiñci vedayitalakkhaṇanti sambandho. Vedanākkhandhoyeva
tika-abh08t0:2371_8: vedanākkhandhatā. Vedanāya atītādivibhāge vitthārakathā visuddhimaggato gahetabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2371_9: Abhisaṅkhāralakkhaṇanti saṅkhārakkhandhassa cetanāpadhānatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ, sampayuttadhamme
tika-abh08t0:2371_10: ārammaṇe rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ sampiṇḍanalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā “saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2371_11: vuttattā yathā attano phalasaṅkhataṃ sammadeva nipphannaṃ hoti, evaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇasabhāvanti
tika-abh08t0:2371_12: attho. Ayaṃ pana kusalākusalacetanāya vasena vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:2372_0: 1202-5. Evaṃ vipassanāpaññāya bhūmibhūte dhamme ekadesato dassetvā idāni sīlacittavisuddhīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2372_1: heṭṭhā vuttattā tā avatvā idaṃ paññābhāvanāya ādibhūtaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2372_2: “cattāro ca mahābhūtā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sampādetukāmena ca yogāvacarena catudhātuvavatthānavasena
tika-abh08t0:2372_3: vā dvādasāyatanavasena vā pañcakkhandhavasena vā ubhinnaṃ saṅkhepakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:2372_4: vā paṭiladdhajjhānavasena vā nāmarūpassa vavatthāpetabbabhāvepi tena tena mukhena
tika-abh08t0:2372_6: dassitaṃ. Ekāsītiyā cittenāti ekāsītiyā lokiyacittena. Lokuttaracittāni pana neva
tika-abh08t0:2372_7: sukkhavipassakassa, na samathayānikassa pariggahaṃ gacchanti anadhigatattā. Cattārorūpino
tika-abh08t0:2372_8: khandheti cattāro arūpino khandhe. Sītuṇhādivirodhipaccayasamavāye vikārāpajjanato
tika-abh08t0:2372_9: rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato nāmaṃ namanalakkhaṇaṃ. Parigaṇhatīti
tika-abh08t0:2373_0: 1206-9. Tālassa kandaṃ tu yamakanti dvīhi bījehi nibbattitaṃ ekībhūtaṃ yamakatālakandaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2373_1: Tañhi yamakaṃ bhinnasantānampi abhinnaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti, evaṃ rūpārūpadhammāti. Nāmañca
tika-abh08t0:2373_2: rūpañcāti eteneva tassa duvidhabhāve siddhe “dvidhā vavatthapetī”ti idaṃ nāmarūpavinimuttassa
tika-abh08t0:2373_3: aññassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tenevāha “nāmato rūpato”tiādi. Nāmarūpamattatāya avinicchitattā,
tika-abh08t0:2373_4: santānādighanabhedassa ca akatattā abhinivesena vinā samūhekattaggahaṇavasena “satto”ti
tika-abh08t0:2373_5: pavatto sammoho sattasammoho, tassa ghātatthaṃ vikkhambhanatthaṃ. Bahusuttavasenāti
tika-abh08t0:2373_6: “yathā hī”tiādinā idha dassitānaṃ, aññesañca “rūpañca hidaṃ, mahāli, attā abhavissa,
tika-abh08t0:2373_7: nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti evamādīnaṃ sambahulānaṃ suttantānaṃ vasena.
tika-abh08t0:2374_0: 1210-2. Aṅgasambhārāti aṅgasambhārahetu tannimittaṃ amuñcitvā sati eva tasminti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2374_1: Saddoti vohāro. Khandhesūti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu santesu te amuñcitvāva sattoti
tika-abh08t0:2374_2: sammuti vohāro. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā akkhacakkapañjaraīsādīsu aṅgasambhāresu
tika-abh08t0:2374_3: ekenākārena ekajjhaṃ rāsi hutvā saṇṭhitesu “ratho”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti, paramatthato
tika-abh08t0:2374_4: pana ekekasmiṃ aṅge upaparikkhiyamāne ratho nāma natthi, evameva upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātesu
tika-abh08t0:2374_6: vā vohāramattaṃ, paramatthato pana ekekasmiṃ dhamme upaparikkhiyamāne “asmī”ti vā
tika-abh08t0:2374_7: “aha”nti vā gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma natthi, kevalaṃ nāmarūpamattameva atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:2374_8: Evaṃ passato hi dassanaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ nāma hoti, yaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhīti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2374_9: Sace koci satto nāma natthi, kathañcarahi nāmarūpamatte gamanādiatthakiccasiddhatā
tika-abh08t0:2374_10: hotīti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “yathāpī”tiādi. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yathā dārumayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2374_11: yantaṃ nijjīvaṃ jīvavirahitaṃ abbhantare vattamānassa jīvassa abhāvato tatoyeva nirīhakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2374_12: nibyāpāraṃ, atha ca pana dārurajjusamāyoge paccayavisesavasena taṃ dāruyantaṃ gacchatipi
tika-abh08t0:2374_13: tiṭṭhatipi, sajīvaṃ sabyāpāraṃ viya gamanādikiccaṃ sādhentamiva khāyati, tathā idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2374_14: nāmarūpampi kiñcāpi nijjīvaṃ nirīhakañca, atha ca pana aññamaññasaṅkhatapaccayavisesassa
tika-abh08t0:2374_15: samāyoge sajīvaṃ sabyāpāraṃ gacchantaṃ tiṭṭhantañca khāyatīti.
tika-abh08t0:2375_0: 1213. Saccatoti bhūtato, paramatthatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2375_1: yantamiva suññaṃ jīvādinā. Paccayehi abhisaṅkhataṃ idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ yantamiva suññanti
tika-abh08t0:2375_2: vā sambandho. Dukkhassa puñjoti niccāturatāya dukkhassa rāsi. Tiṇakaṭṭhasādisoti
tika-abh08t0:2376_0: 1215. Yamakanti yugaḷaṃ. So ca yamakabhāvo aññamaññanissitabhāvenāti āha “ubho aññoññanissitā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2376_1: Tato eva ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ ubho bhijjanti. Na hi kadāci pañcavokārabhave maraṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:2376_2: rūpe nirujjhante arūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ, arūpe vā nirujjhante rūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t0:2376_3: Ekavokārabhavacatuvokārabhavesu pana tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anissāya pavattiyā kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2376_4: heṭṭhā vuttamevāti. So panāyaṃ bhaṅgo paccayavaseneva, paccayanirodheneva nāmarūpanirodhoti
tika-abh08t0:2376_5: attho. Paccayāti paccayabhūtā, aññamaññassa paccayā hontāpi ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2377_0: 1216-9. Nittejanti tejahīnaṃ ānubhāvavirahitaṃ. Yattha pana taṃ nittejaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2377_1: “na byāharatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na hi aññathā saddahanussāhanādīsu nāmaṃ nittejanti sakkā
tika-abh08t0:2377_2: vattuṃ, nāpi rūpaṃ sandhāraṇābandhanādīsu. Teneva hi “tathā rūpampi nitteja”nti vatvā
tika-abh08t0:2378_0: 1220-1. Nāmaṃ nissāyātiādinā byatirekavasenapi nāmarūpānaṃ nittejataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t0:2378_1: Rūpañhi gamanādikiriyāsu nāmaṃ nissāya pavattati, nāmaṃ dassanādikiriyāsu rūpaṃ nissāya.
tika-abh08t0:2378_2: Aññamaññaṃ sannissāya cassa attakiccasiddhipi paccekaṃ asamatthataṃ vibhāveti. Tathā
tika-abh08t0:2378_3: hi nāmarūpassa attasuññatā, nibyāpāratā ca suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭā hontīti. Kathaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2378_4: paccekaṃ asamatthānaṃ samuditabhāve sati samatthatā hoti asāmaggiyaṃ ahetūnaṃ sāmaggiyampi
tika-abh08t0:2378_5: ahetukabhāvāpattito. Na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontānaṃ satampi sahassampi samuditaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2378_6: daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti codanaṃ hadaye katvā āha “imassa panā”tiādi. Upamāyapi hi asiddho
tika-abh08t0:2378_7: attho sādhetabbo. Tenevāha “upamaṃ te karissāmi, upamāyapi idhekacce viññū purisā
tika-abh08t0:2378_8: bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānantī”ti. Ayaṃ panettha jaccandhapīṭhasappīnaṃ upamā – yathā
tika-abh08t0:2378_9: jaccandho ca pīṭhasappī ca disā pakkamitukāmā assu. Jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ evamāha
tika-abh08t0:2378_10: “ahaṃ kho, bhaṇe, sakkomi pādehi pādakaraṇīyaṃ kātuṃ, natthi ca me cakkhūni, yehi
tika-abh08t0:2378_11: samaṃ visamaṃ passeyya”nti. Pīṭhasappī jaccandhaṃ evamāha “ahaṃ kho, bhaṇe, sakkomi
tika-abh08t0:2378_12: cakkhunā cakkhukaraṇīyaṃ kātuṃ, natthi ca me pādā, yehi abhikkameyyaṃ paṭikkameyyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2378_13: vā”ti. So tuṭṭhahaṭṭho jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropesi, pīṭhasappī jaccandhassa
tika-abh08t0:2378_14: aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā evamāha “vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇha, dakkhiṇaṃ muñca, vāmaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2378_15: gaṇhā”ti. Tattha jaccandhopi nittejo dubbalo na sakena balena gacchati, tatheva pīṭhasappī
tika-abh08t0:2378_16: na sakena balena gacchati, na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya gamanaṃ na pavattati, evameva
tika-abh08t0:2378_17: nāmampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati, na tāsu tāsu kiriyāsu pavattati, rūpampi
tika-abh08t0:2378_18: nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati, na tāsu tāsu kiriyāsu pavattati, na ca tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2378_19: aññamaññaṃ nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na hotīti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:2385_0: 1222-3. Idāni nāvāyantikūpamāyapi nāmarūpānaṃ avasavattitaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādigāthādvayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2385_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha nissāyāti patiṭṭhāya. Yantīti gacchanti. Manusse nissāyāti netubhūte
tika-abh08t0:2385_3: vinā nāvā icchitadesaṃ pāpuṇāti, yathā pana ubhopi aññamaññaṃ nissāya aṇṇave gacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:2385_4: evaṃ nāmañca rūpañca ubho aññamaññaṃ nissitā pavattantīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2386_0: 1224. Sattasaññaṃ vinodetvāti yathāvuttanayehi anādikālabhāvitaṃ khandhapañcake sattaggāhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2386_1: vikkhambhetvā. Nāma…pe… vuccatīti “idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo. Idaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2386_2: rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti ca evaṃ sabbākārena tesaṃ lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇamukhena
tika-abh08t0:2386_3: tamatthabhāvadassanaṃ etaṃ attadiṭṭhimalavisodhanato diṭṭhivisuddhīti vuccati buddhādīhīti
tika-abh08t0:2386_4: attho. Na kevalañcetaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiyeva vuccati, nāmarūpavavatthāpanantipi etasseva
tika-abh08t0:2386_5: adhivacananti veditabbaṃ. Jātiāditoti jātijarābyādhiādito dukkhato. Yathāha “jātipi
tika-abh08t0:2386_6: dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, yampicchaṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t0:2386_7: tampi dukkhaṃ, saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti. Antadvayanti sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2386_8: antadvayaṃ. Atha vā sattassa accantaṃ atthibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ, tassa natthibhāvasaṅkhātañca
tika-abh08t0:2386_9: antadvayaṃ. Paramatthato anupalabbhanato hi satto atthīti vajjitabbameva, lokasaṅketatova
tika-abh08t0:2386_10: upalabbhanato natthītipi vajjitabbamevāti. Suṭṭhutaraṃ parisuddhaṃ karotīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2386_11: Diṭṭhigatāni malānīti diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātāni malāni. Asesaṃ nissesato nāsaṃ vināsaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2386_12: vikkhambhanaṃ upenti. Tathā hetaṃ diṭṭhimalavisodhanato diṭṭhivisuddhīti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2392_1: vuttaṃ, na tadaññato visesanatthaṃ tadaññassa ca abhāvato. Ajjhattaṃ vā hi vipassanābhiniveso
tika-abh08t0:2392_2: hotu bahiddhā vā, atthasiddhiyaṃ pana lakkhaṇato sabbampi nāmarūpaṃ anavasesato pariggahitameva
tika-abh08t0:2392_3: hotīti. Jānitvā hetupaccayeti hetupaccaye pariggaṇhitvā, hetupaccaye pariggaṇhanahetūti
tika-abh08t0:2392_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Paccayapariggahaṇahetu hissa addhattaye kaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ hotīti. Vitaritvāti
tika-abh08t0:2392_5: atikkamitvā, vikkhambhetvāti attho. Taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ tathāvigataṃ vasibhāvappattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2392_6: jhānaṃ viya yogino santāne pabandhavasena pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ “ṭhita”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2393_0: 1229-30. Nāmarūpassa…pe… āvajjitvāti yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṃ disvā tassa
tika-abh08t0:2393_1: samuṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati, yathā vā pana anukampako puriso kumāraṃ uttānaseyyaṃ rathikāya
tika-abh08t0:2393_2: nipannaṃ disvā “kassa nu kho ayaṃ puttako”ti tassa mātāpitaro āvajjati, evamevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2393_3: nāmarūpassa ko hetu, ko vā paccayo bhave. Na tāvetaṃ ahetukaṃ sabbattha, sabbadā,
tika-abh08t0:2393_4: sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito, na issarādihetukaṃ nāmarūpato uddhaṃ issarādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2393_5: abhāvato. Yepi nāmarūpamattameva issarādayoti vadanti tesaṃ issarādisaṅkhātanāmarūpassa
tika-abh08t0:2393_6: ahetubhāvāpattito, tasmā bhavitabbamassa hetupaccayehi, “ko nu kho”ti nāmarūpassa
tika-abh08t0:2393_7: hetupaccaye āvajjitvāti attho. Evaṃ tāva katvā imassa nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye pariggaṇhantena
tika-abh08t0:2393_8: oḷārikattā, supākaṭattā ca rūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti paṭhamaṃ tassa paccayapariggaho
tika-abh08t0:2393_9: kātabboti dassento āha “rūpakāyassā”tiādi. Tattha yathā nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho
tika-abh08t0:2393_10: ahetuvisamahetuvādanivattiyā hoti, evaṃ nibbidāvirāgāvahabhāvena tattha tattha abhiratinivattiyāpi
tika-abh08t0:2393_11: icchitabboti taṃ dvattiṃsākāravasena dassetuṃ “kesā lomā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2394_0: 1232-3. Avijjā…pe… matoti avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kammanti idaṃ catubbidhaṃ dhammajātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2394_1: etassa yathāvuttassa rūpakāyassa hetu, catubbidho āhāro paccayoti attho. Kasmā pana
tika-abh08t0:2394_2: purimaṃ hetu, itaro paccayoti codanaṃ sandhāya “janako”tiādiṃ vatvā taṃ lokavasena
tika-abh08t0:2394_3: samatthetuṃ “hetvaṅkurassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha janakoti, anupālakoti ca antogatahetvatthamidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2394_4: visesanaṃ, janakattā, anupālakattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha janakattāti nibbattakattā.
tika-abh08t0:2394_5: Iminā bījaṃ viya aṅkurassa avijjādayo rūpakāyassa asādhāraṇakāraṇatāya hetūti dassitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2394_6: Anupālakattāti upatthambhakattā. Iminā pana aṅkurassa pathavīsalilādayo viya āhāro
tika-abh08t0:2395_0: 1234-7. Itime…pe… gatāti evamete avijjādayo pañca dhammā yathārahaṃ hetubhāvaṃ, paccayabhāvañca
tika-abh08t0:2395_1: gatā. Mātāva upanissayāti avijjā bhavesu vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanabhāvena, taṇhā
tika-abh08t0:2395_2: patthanābhāvena, upādānaṃ daḷhaggāhabhāvenāti evaṃ saṅkhārabhavānaṃ hetubhūtā janakasahāyatāya
tika-abh08t0:2395_3: bhavanikantitaṃsahajātaāsannakāraṇattā abhisaṅkhārikā, apassayabhūtā vāti mātā viya
tika-abh08t0:2395_4: upanissayā honti. Yathā pitujanitasukke puttassa uppattīti pitā janako, evaṃ kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2395_5: sattassa uppādakattā janakanti āha. Yathā dhātī jātassa kumārassa vaḍḍhitā sandhārikā,
tika-abh08t0:2395_6: evaṃ āhāro uppannassa kāyassa brūhetā, sandhārako cāti vuttaṃ “dhātī…pe… bhave”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2395_7: Kāmañcettha avijjādayo nāmakāyassāpi paccayo, pakārantarena pana tassa pākaṭaṃ paccayapariggahavidhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2395_8: dassetuṃ “cakkhuñcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha cakkhuñcāti ca-saddo samuccayattho, tena
tika-abh08t0:2395_9: cakkhuviññāṇassa āvajjanādiṃ ajjhattaṃ sabbaṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Rūpamālokameva
tika-abh08t0:2395_10: cāti pana ca-saddena yathā bāhirarūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo, yathā ca
tika-abh08t0:2395_11: āloko upanissayapaccayo, evaṃ aññampi bāhiraṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Paṭiccāti
tika-abh08t0:2395_14: saddasaṅgahitānaṃ anantarādisahajātādivasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ādi-saddena phassādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2395_15: viya saha paccayehi sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Evaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2395_16: nāmaṃ saha paccayena saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “nāmakāyassa paccayaṃ parigaṇhatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2396_0: 1238-40. Disvānāti etarahi pavattiṃ disvā. Tathevidanti iminā na kevalaṃ sappaccayatāmattameva
tika-abh08t0:2396_1: paccāmaṭṭhaṃ, atha kho yādisehi etarahi pavattati, tādisehi avijjādipaccayeheva atītepi
tika-abh08t0:2396_2: pavattitthāti paccayasahitatāpi paccāmaṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pubbanteti atītakhandhappabandhakoṭṭhāse. Pañcadhāgatāti –
tika-abh08t0:2397_0: “Ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahosiṃ ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ nu kho
tika-abh08t0:2397_1: ahosiṃ ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2398: Pañcahi ākārehi āgatā, pavattā vā. Aparanteti anāgate khandhappabandhakoṭṭhāse. Pañcadhā samudīritāti –
tika-abh08t0:2399_0: “Bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho bhavissāmi ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2399_1: kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho bhavissāmi ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2399_2: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhāna”nti –
tika-abh08t0:2401_0: 1241. Paccuppannepi addhāneti etarahi paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā cutipariyante addhānepi.
tika-abh08t0:2401_1: Addhāna-ggahaṇena cettha paccuppannakhandhakoṭṭhāsameva vadati. Na hi tabbinimutto
tika-abh08t0:2401_2: añño koci kālo nāma atthīti. Chabbidhā parikittitāti –
tika-abh08t0:2402: “Ahaṃ nu khosmi, no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi, kathaṃ nu khosmi, ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī ca bhavissatī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:2403_0: Evaṃ chabbidhā vuttā. “Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassā”tiādīsu viya padesepi sabba-saddassa
tika-abh08t0:2403_1: pavattanato “sabbā”ti vatvāpi “anavasesā”ti vuttaṃ. Natthi etissā avaseso avasiṭṭhoti
tika-abh08t0:2403_2: anavasesā, soḷasavidhāpi cesā ekakaṅkhāvasenāpi anavasiṭṭhā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2403_3: Pahiyyatīti vikkhambhanavasena pahiyyati. Kāmaṃ nāmarūpamattaṃ vinā sattassa adassanena
tika-abh08t0:2403_4: diṭṭhivisuddhiyāva paccuppanne kaṅkhā pahīnā, atītānāgate kaṅkhānaṃ pahānena pana
tika-abh08t0:2403_5: paccuppanne kaṅkhāya atisayappahānaṃ dassetuṃ idheva sā vuttā. Atha vā paccuppanne
tika-abh08t0:2403_6: nissattanāmarūpassa paccayesu pavattakaṅkhāya idheva tīraṇato sā idha vuttā. Vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2403_7: vā etaṃ idha paccuppannakaṅkhāya pahānavacanaṃ yathā taṃ sotāpattimaggādīsu pahīnānampi
tika-abh08t0:2403_8: ca pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānātiādinā anāgāmimaggādīsu vacananti.
tika-abh08t0:2404_0: 1242. Kammavipākānaṃ vasenāpīti purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanaṃ saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:2404_1: nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2404_2: idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā, idha paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2404_3: phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ pure katassa
tika-abh08t0:2404_4: kammassa paccayā, idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā…pe… cetanā bhavo iti ime
tika-abh08t0:2404_5: pañca dhammā kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayāti evaṃ vuttānaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2404_6: vasena. Kilesavaṭṭopi cettha kammasahāyatāya kammavaṭṭeneva saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2405_0: 1243. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti ettha diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno
tika-abh08t0:2405_1: attabhāvo, tattha veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ. Upapajjāparāpariyāhosikammavasā
tika-abh08t0:2405_3: hi “upapajjāparāpariya”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha paccuppannabhavato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā
tika-abh08t0:2405_4: veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ. Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ aññasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2405_5: yatthakatthaci attabhāve veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ. Ahosi eva kammaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2405_6: na tassa vipāko ahosi, atthi, bhavissati cāti evaṃ vattabbakammaṃ ahosikammaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2406_0: Paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā
tika-abh08t0:2406_1: tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:2406_2: attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā nāma. Sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne
tika-abh08t0:2406_4: itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ, okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti
tika-abh08t0:2406_5: idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ ahetukaphalaṃ deti, sahetukaphaladāne
tika-abh08t0:2406_6: pana paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanampi āpajjeyya. Tathā asakkontanti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma
tika-abh08t0:2406_7: upadhippayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2406_8: dātuṃ asakkontaṃ. Ahosikammaṃ…pe… vipākoti ettha “ahosi kamma”nti padaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2406_9: yojetabbaṃ “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko,
tika-abh08t0:2406_10: ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko”ti. Tattha sakasakakālātikkantassa upapajjavedanīyassa,
tika-abh08t0:2406_11: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa ca vasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañhi kammassa, vipākakālassa ca
tika-abh08t0:2406_12: atītattā tathā vattabbattaṃ labhati, dutiyaṃ anāgate arahattaṃ pāpuṇantassa purimabhavesu
tika-abh08t0:2406_13: kataṃ adinnavipākaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tatiyaṃ pana anantarabhave
tika-abh08t0:2406_14: kataṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ, arahato atītabhavesu kataṃ aparāpariyavedanīyañca sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:2406_15: vuttaṃ. Apare pana “ekameva atītaṃ kammaṃ addhattaye vipākābhāvaṃ sandhāya tidhā
tika-abh08t0:2407_0: Atthasādhikāti dānādipāṇātipātādiatthassa nipphādikā. Kā pana sāti āha “sattamajavanacetanā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2407_1: Sā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā, paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino
tika-abh08t0:2407_2: vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena vā tathā abhisaṅkhatā samānā anantarattabhāve
tika-abh08t0:2407_4: vuttaṃ. Paccavekkhaṇavasitādipavattiyaṃ pana pañcamādikāpi hoti. Vipākaṃ detīti paṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2407_5: datvā pavattivipākaṃ deti, adinnapaṭisandhikaṃ pana pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthi.
tika-abh08t0:2407_6: Cutianantarañhi upapajjavedanīyassa okāsoti ācariyā. Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi
tika-abh08t0:2407_7: pavattivipākaṃ deti. Tenāha bhagavā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2407_9: pañca cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā okāsaṃ labhati, tadā paṭisandhivipākaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2407_10: pavattivipākaṃ vā deti. Sati saṃsārappavattiyāti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe
tika-abh08t0:2408_0: 1244. Evaṃ tāva vipākadānakālavasena catubbidhaṃ dassetvā idāni vipākadānapariyāyato,
tika-abh08t0:2408_1: kiccato ca catubbidhataṃ dassetuṃ “garuka”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha garukanti mahāsāvajjaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2408_2: mahānubhāvañca aññena kammena paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyakammaṃ. Bahulanti abhiṇhaso
tika-abh08t0:2408_3: kataṃ, ekavāraṃ katvāpi abhiṇhasamāsevitañca. Āsannanti maraṇāsannakāle anussaritaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2408_4: tadā katañca. Kaṭattākammanti garukādibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ katamattatoyeva kammanti
tika-abh08t0:2408_5: vattabbakammaṃ. Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā, garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ mātughātakādikammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2408_6: vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Tathā bahulābahulesu yaṃ bahulaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2408_7: susīlyaṃ dussīlyaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Dūrāsannesu yaṃ āsannaṃ maraṇakāle
tika-abh08t0:2408_8: anussaritaṃ, teneva upapajjati. Āsannakāle kate ca vattabbameva natthīti. Kaṭattā
tika-abh08t0:2408_9: pana kammaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ purimānaṃ abhāve paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati. Iti
tika-abh08t0:2408_10: garukaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Tathā hi taṃ “garuka”nti vuttaṃ. Garuke asati bahulīkataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2408_11: tasmimpi asati āsannaṃ, tasmimpi asati kaṭattākammanti vuttaṃ “purimajātīsu katakammaṃ vipaccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2409_2: upatthambheti, addhānaṃ pavattetī”ti. Sukhadukkhe pavattamāne bavhābādhatādipaccayūpanipātanena
tika-abh08t0:2409_3: saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ tassa vibādhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ. Tenāha “sukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati,
tika-abh08t0:2409_4: addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na detī”ti. Tathā paṭipakkhakammavipākassa appavattikaraṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:2409_5: upacchedakaṃ paṭibāhakaṃ upaghātakaṃ. Tenāha “tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2410_0: Rūpañca arūpavipākakkhandho cāti rūpārūpavipākakkhandho, kammajarūpassāpi vipākapariyāyo
tika-abh08t0:2410_1: atthīti “rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe”ti vuttaṃ. Aññena kammenāti kusalena vā akusalena
tika-abh08t0:2410_2: vā aññena kammena kattubhūtena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā vipāke janite. Tenāha “janite
tika-abh08t0:2410_3: vipāke”ti. Pavattivipākaṃ sandhāya “janite vipāke”ti vadanti. Uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_4: upatthambhetīti upatthambhakakammaṃ kusalaṃ samānaṃ aññenapi kusalakammena uppajjamānakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_5: sukhaṃ tassa paṭipakkhavibādhanavasena upatthambheti. Akusalaṃ aññena akusalakammena
tika-abh08t0:2410_6: upapajjamānaṃ dukkhaṃ tatheva upatthambheti. Evañca upatthambhentaṃ taṃ dīghakālaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_7: pavatteti nāmāti āha “addhānaṃ pavattetī”ti. Uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷetīti upapīḷakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_8: akusalaṃ samānaṃ sukhitassa rogādiantarāyakāraṇasampādakabhāvena sukhasantānaṃ upacchindantaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_9: pīḷeti, kusalañca rogādinā dukkhitassa bhesajjādisukhādikāraṇasampādakabhāvena dukkhasantānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_10: vicchindantaṃ pīḷeti. Keci pana “sukhadukkhassa kāraṇaṃ asampādentampi paṭisandhidāyakakammassa
tika-abh08t0:2410_11: pavattivipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ vipākadāyakakammaṃ upapīḷakakamma”nti vadanti. Evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_12: sante pana paṭisandhidāyakameva janakakammanti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:2411_0: Apica upaghātakena saha imassa visesabhāvo āpajjati, taṃ paṭisandhivipākassa paṭibāhakanti
tika-abh08t0:2411_1: ce? Taṃ na, avisesena vuttattāti. “Dubbalaṃ kammaṃ ghātetvā”ti vutte “nanu tassa
tika-abh08t0:2411_2: pubbeyeva siddhattā, niruddhattā ca kathamidaṃ tadupaghātakaṃ hotī”ti āpannaṃ codanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2411_3: sandhāya kammassa ghātanaṃ nāma tassa vipākapaṭibāhanamevāti dassento āha “tassa
tika-abh08t0:2411_4: vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti. Taṃpaṭibāhanañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2411_5: “attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti. Vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkameva nāma
tika-abh08t0:2412_0: Upapīḷakaṃ aññassa vipākaṃ upacchindati, na sayaṃ attano vipākaṃ deti, upaghātakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2412_1: pana dubbalakammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso. Keci
tika-abh08t0:2412_2: pana ācariyā aparenāpi nayena janakādikammaṃ icchanti. Kathaṃ? Yasmiṃ kamme kate
tika-abh08t0:2412_3: paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ uppatti hoti, taṃ janakaṃ. Yasmiṃ
