tika-abh08t0:2412_4: pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā,
tika-abh08t0:2412_6: taṃ upatthambhakaṃ. Janakena nibbattitaṃ kusalaphalaṃ, akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena
tika-abh08t0:2412_7: rogadhātuvisamatādinimittatāya bādhīyati, taṃ upapīḷakaṃ. Yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena
tika-abh08t0:2412_8: ciratarappabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalavicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati, taṃ upaghātakanti.
tika-abh08t0:2413_0: Ettha ca keci appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ, bavhābādhaappāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2413_1: pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ akusalabhāvañca vaṇṇenti, bhūridattādīnaṃ pana nāgādīnaṃ, ito
tika-abh08t0:2413_3: kammāni santīti catunnampi kusalākusalabhāvo na virujjhati. Kiñcāpi kammānaṃ kammantarañceva
tika-abh08t0:2413_4: vipākantarañca buddhānaṃ kammavipākañāṇasseva yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṃ hoti. Buddhāveṇikañhetaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2413_5: asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi, vipassakena pana ekadesato jānitabbaṃ. Na hi sabbena sabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2413_6: ajānantassa paccayapariggaho paripūrati, tasmā tādisaṃ pariggahaṃ sandhāya “iti ima”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:2413_7: vuttaṃ. Yādisehi paccayehi paccuppanne addhāne nāmarūpassa pavatti, tādiseheva itarasmimpi
tika-abh08t0:2413_8: addhadvayeti evaṃ yathā atītānāgate nayaṃ neti, taṃ dassetuṃ “yathā ida”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2413_10: vuttassevatthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Tassevaṃ…pe… pahiyyatīti tassevaṃ samanupassato
tika-abh08t0:2413_11: yā sā pubbantādayo ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā nayena pavattā vicikicchā pahiyyati.
tika-abh08t0:2414_2: Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ dānādīhi sādhitakiriyāya pavattamānāya kāraṇamatte kattuvohāroti
tika-abh08t0:2414_3: āha “kāraṇato uddhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na ca passatī”ti. Pāka…pe… paṭivedakaṃ na passatīti
tika-abh08t0:2414_4: sambandho. Pākapaṭivedakanti vipākavindakaṃ. Evaṃ apassanto pana kāraṇe sati kārakoti,
tika-abh08t0:2414_5: vipākappavattiyā sati paṭisaṃvedakoti samaññāmatteneva paṇḍitā voharanti. Iccevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2414_6: sammappaññāya passati. Suddhadhammāti kenaci sattena vā puggalena vā amissadhammā.
tika-abh08t0:2414_7: Evetanti evaṃvidhaṃ etaṃ dassanaṃ sammadassanaṃ, aviparītadassananti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2415_0: 1249. Bījarukkhādikānaṃ vāti yathā bījato rukkho, rukkhato bījanti evaṃ kāraṇaparamparagavesane
tika-abh08t0:2415_1: anādikālikattā bījarukkhasantānassa pubbā koṭi natthi, evaṃ kammapaccayā vipāko,
tika-abh08t0:2415_2: vipākapaccayā kammanti pariyesane anādikālikattā kammavipākasantānassa pubbā koṭi
tika-abh08t0:2415_3: na paññāyati. Ādi-saddena “kukkuṭiyā aṇḍaṃ, aṇḍato kukkuṭī, punapi kukkuṭiyā aṇḍa”nti
tika-abh08t0:2416_0: 1250-3. Anāgatepi saṃsāreti yathā atīte, evaṃ anāgatepi addhāne khandhānaṃ paṭipāṭītiādinā
tika-abh08t0:2416_1: vuttasaṃsāre sati. Appavatti na dissatīti kammato vipāko bhavissati, vipākato kammanti
tika-abh08t0:2416_2: anāgate kāriyaparamparāya gavesiyamānāya aparikkhīṇasaṃyojanassa kammavipākānaṃ appavattanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2416_3: na dissati, pavattati evāti attho. Hetuphalasambandhavasena pavattamāne saṃsāre “pubbā
tika-abh08t0:2416_4: koṭi na paññāyatī”ti vacanena kāraṇe ādissa abhāvo vutto, “appavatti na dissatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2416_5: vacanena phalassa avasānābhāvo vuttoti. Etamatthanti “kammassa kārako natthī”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:2416_6: vuttamatthaṃ. Asayaṃvasīti na sayaṃvasino, micchābhinivesaparavasāti attho. Aññamaññavirodhinoti
tika-abh08t0:2416_7: itarītaraviruddhā diṭṭhiyo vā diṭṭhiyā vā aññamaññena saha virodhino. Gambhīrañāṇagocaratāya
tika-abh08t0:2416_8: gambhīraṃ. Tathā nipuṇaṃ. Sattasuññatāya, aññamaññasabhāvasuññatāya ca suññaṃ. Paccayanti
tika-abh08t0:2416_9: nāmarūpassa paccayaṃ, tappaccayapaṭivedheneva ca sabbaṃ paṭividdhaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2417_0: 1254-6. Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhīti kuṭṭādīsu rajādi viya vipāke santiṭṭhamānaṃ kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2417_1: natthi. Pāko kamme na vijjatīti tathā kamme santiṭṭhamāno vipāko natthi. Yathāvuttamevatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2417_2: upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā na sūriye”tiādi vuttaṃ. Maṇimhīti sūriyakantamaṇimhi. Na
tika-abh08t0:2417_3: tesaṃ bahi so atthīti te muñcitvā tehi bahi so aggi natthi. Sambhārehīti samaṅgībhūtehi
tika-abh08t0:2417_4: ātapādīhi tīhi kāraṇehi. Na anto kammassātiādi atthato heṭṭhā vuttampi upamānigamanatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2418_0: 1257-8. Yadi hetu, phalañca aññamaññarahitaṃ, kathaṃ hetuto phalaṃ nibbattatīti āha
tika-abh08t0:2418_1: “kammañca kho upādāyā”ti. Na kevalaṃ kammaphalameva suññaṃ katturahitaṃ, sabbampi
tika-abh08t0:2418_2: dhammajātaṃ kārakarahitanti dassetuṃ “na hettha devo”tiādigāthā vuttā. Hetusambhārapaccayāti
tika-abh08t0:2418_3: ekena hetunā ekassa, anekassa vā phalassa anibbattito hetusamūhanimittaṃ, sambhāroti
tika-abh08t0:2419_0: 1259. Addhāsu taritvā kaṅkhanti tīsu addhāsu soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā. Na kevalametaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2419_1: soḷasavidhameva kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, atha kho “satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinayappavattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2419_2: aṭṭhavidhaṃ kaṅkhampi pajahati. Tathā hettha buddho dhammo saṅgho sikkhāti kaṅkhāya
tika-abh08t0:2419_3: gocarabhūtā lokiyā dhammā adhippetā. Na hi lokuttaradhamme ārabbha kilesā pavattituṃ
tika-abh08t0:2419_4: sakkonti. Pubbantoti atītā khandhāyatanadhātuyo, aparantoti anāgatā, pubbantāparantoti
tika-abh08t0:2419_6: gahito aṭṭhamo kaṅkhāvisayo nāmarūpamattaṃ, idappaccayatā-ggahaṇena pana tassa paccayo
tika-abh08t0:2419_7: gahito, tasmā soḷasavatthukāya pahīnāya aṭṭhavatthukā kaṅkhā appatiṭṭhāva hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2419_8: Etāsañca pahānena dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatānipi vikkhambhanti diṭṭhekaṭṭhattā vicikicchāya.
tika-abh08t0:2419_9: Yathā hi diṭṭhi samucchijjamānā vicikicchāya saddhiṃyeva samucchijjati, evaṃ vicikicchā
tika-abh08t0:2419_10: vikkhambhiyamānā diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃyeva vikkhambhīyati. Attābhinivesūpanissayā hi “ahosiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2419_11: nu kho aha”ntiādinayappavattā soḷasavatthukā kaṅkhā, sā eva ca pubbantādivatthubhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2419_12: vuttā, attābhinivesavatthukāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni, buddhādivatthukā ca tadekaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t0:2420_0: 1260-2. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ nāmāti yathāvuttakaṅkhāvitaraṇato kaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ nāma. Na
tika-abh08t0:2420_1: kevalaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ nāma, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇantipi yathābhūtañāṇantipi sammādassanantipi
tika-abh08t0:2420_2: idaṃ samudīritaṃ. Ettha ca dharīyanti attano paccayehīti dhammā, tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2420_3: tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhiti, dhammānaṃ ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayadhammā. Atha vā
tika-abh08t0:2420_4: dhammoti kāraṇaṃ “dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya, dhammassa ṭhitisabhāvo, dhammato
tika-abh08t0:2420_5: ca añño sabhāvo natthīti paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvo, dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2420_6: Saṅkhārānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ aniccatādi yathābhūtaṃ, tattha ñāṇanti yathābhūtañāṇaṃ. Sammā
tika-abh08t0:2420_7: passatīti sammādassanaṃ. Laddhappatiṭṭhoti sāsane patiṭṭhā nāma ariyamaggo. Ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2420_8: pana taṃ anadhigatopi tadadhigamupāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitattā laddhappatiṭṭho viya hotīti
tika-abh08t0:2420_9: “laddhappatiṭṭho”ti vutto. Tatoyeva cūḷako sotāpanno, lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāhi
tika-abh08t0:2420_10: samannāgatattā uttari appaṭivijjhanto sotāpanno viya niyato, sugatiparāyaṇo ca hotīti
tika-abh08t0:2420_11: cūḷasotāpanno. Sotāpanno hi khīṇāpāyaduggativinipātoti. Atha vā laddhappatiṭṭho kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisamadhigamena.
tika-abh08t0:2420_13: yathāsakapaccayeheva dhammappavattiṃ ñatvā sāsane patiṭṭhitasaddho laddhappatiṭṭho
tika-abh08t0:2420_14: nāma hotīti. Nāmarūpavavatthānena dukkhasaccaṃ, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2420_15: tasseva aparabhāge aniccato manasikārādividhinā maggasaccañca abhiññāya pavattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2420_16: dukkhabhāvaṃ disvā tassa appavatte nirodhe ekaṃseneva ninnajjhāsayatāya lokiyeneva
tika-abh08t0:2420_17: ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ adhigatattā apāyesu abhabbuppattiko, sotāpannabhūmiyañca
tika-abh08t0:2420_18: bhabbuppattiko hotīti cūḷasotāpanno nāmāti vuttaṃ “sotāpanno hi cūḷako”ti. Tasmāti
tika-abh08t0:2420_19: yasmā evaṃ mahānisaṃsametaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tasmā sapañño attano hitānupekkhanapaññāya samannāgato.
tika-abh08t0:2426_1: niddesakkamo anuppatto, sā pana yasmā obhāsādiupakkilesasambhave sati hoti, obhāsādayo
tika-abh08t0:2426_2: ca udayabbayañāṇe sambhavanti, udayabbayañāṇañca tilakkhaṇavipassanāya sati uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2426_3: tassa ca kalāpasammasanaṃ ādi. Tañhi atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā
tika-abh08t0:2426_4: vavatthānavasena pavattanato ādikammikassa sukarasammasanaṃ, tasmā paṭhamaṃ tattheva
tika-abh08t0:2426_5: abhiyogaṃ karontena kamato taṃ sampādetabbanti dassetuṃ “kalāpasammasanenevā”tiādi
tika-abh08t0:2426_6: āraddhaṃ. Atha vā dvinnaṃ visuddhīnamantare kalāpasammasanaṃ hoti, tañca kho dvīsu
tika-abh08t0:2426_7: ekāya visuddhiyā saṅgahetabbaṃ, maggāmaggañāṇassa ca ādibhūtattā tatthevassa saṅgaho
tika-abh08t0:2426_8: yuttoti ettheva naṃ saṅgahitukāmatāya vuttaṃ “kalāpasammasanenevā”tiādi. Keci pana
tika-abh08t0:2426_9: kalāpasammasanaṃ nāma ekavisuddhiyampi na antogadhanti taṃ anāmasitvāva vipassanācāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2426_10: vaṇṇenti. Kalāpasammasanenevāti atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena
tika-abh08t0:2426_11: kalāpato, kalāpānaṃ vā sammasanena maggāmaggañāṇadassanavipassanāya yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-abh08t0:2426_12: Atha vā bhummatthe karaṇaniddesavasena kalāpasammasane yogo karaṇīyoti attho. “Kalāpasammasaneneva
tika-abh08t0:2426_13: yogo karaṇīyo”ti vatvāpi taṃ pana visuddhimaggato gahetabbanti ganthavitthāraparihāratthaṃ idha na dassitanti.
tika-abh08t0:2427_0: 1264. Paccuppannassa dhammassāti santatipaccuppannassa, khaṇapaccuppannassa vā. Ādito
tika-abh08t0:2427_1: pana khaṇapaccuppannassa udayavayaṃ duppariggahaṃ, tasmā santatipaccuppannavasena
tika-abh08t0:2427_2: paṭhamaṃ udayabbayānupassanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Nibbattīti dvinnaṃ paccuppannānaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:2427_3: paṭhamābhinibbatti ca khaṇanibbatti ca. Vipariṇāmoti vināso.
tika-abh08t0:2428: 1265. Anupassanāpi ñāṇanti yā udayassa ca vayassa ca anupassanā, sā ñāṇanti varañāṇena sammāsambuddhena desitaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
tika-abh08t0:2429_0: “Kathaṃ paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:2429_1: Jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo.
tika-abh08t0:2429_2: Anupassanā ñāṇaṃ. Jātā vedanā…pe… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ… jātaṃ cakkhuṃ…pe… jāto
tika-abh08t0:2429_3: bhavo paccuppanno, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo. Anupassanā ñāṇa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2430_0: Ettha pana udayadassanaṃ yāvadeva khayadassananti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2430_1: “vipariṇāmānupassane paññā”ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti
tika-abh08t0:2431_0: 1266-8. Pubbe uppattitoti jananato pubbe anuppannassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nicayo rāsi
tika-abh08t0:2431_1: vā natthi, yato āgaccheyya uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:2431_2: Tenāha “tathā uppajjato”tiādi. Yathā anāgate addhāne ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2431_3: evaṃ atītepi addhānanti dassento “tathā nirujjhamānassā”tiādiṃ vatvā avijjamānānaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:2431_4: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ hetupaccayasamavāye uppādo, uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti
tika-abh08t0:2431_5: imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya upamāya vibhāvetuṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhakathāya
tika-abh08t0:2431_6: vīṇūpamā āgatā. Sā idhāpi āharitvā vattabbāti adhippāyena “ettha vīṇūpamā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:2431_7: Etassatthassāti avijjamānānaṃyeva uppādo, uppannānañca parato abhāvoti imassa atthassa
tika-abh08t0:2431_8: pakāsane. Vīṇūpamāti vīṇāvasena āgatā upamā. Sā panevaṃ daṭṭhabbā – yathā vīṇāya
tika-abh08t0:2431_9: vādiyamānāya uppannassa saddassa neva uppattito pubbe sannicayo atthi, na uppajjamāno
tika-abh08t0:2431_10: sannicayato āgato. Na nirujjhamānassa disāvidisāgamanaṃ atthi, na niruddho katthaci
tika-abh08t0:2431_11: sannicito tiṭṭhati, atha kho vīṇañca vīṇavādanañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh08t0:2431_12: ahutvā sambhoti, hutvā paṭiveti, evaṃ sabbepi rūpārūpadhammā ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventīti.
tika-abh08t0:2432_0: 1269-70. Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā puna yāni etasseva udayabbayañāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2432_3: rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati, nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2432_4: passati, rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati. “Avijjānirodhā
tika-abh08t0:2432_7: vayaṃ passati, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati, rūpakkhandhassa
tika-abh08t0:2432_8: vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati. Tathā “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti
tika-abh08t0:2432_10: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2432_11: nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passanto vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati, vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2432_12: passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati. “Avijjānirodhā…pe… taṇhānirodhā…pe… kammanirodhā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2432_13: phassanirodhā vedanānirodho”ti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2432_14: vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati, vedanākkhandhassa
tika-abh08t0:2432_15: vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati, vedanākkhandhassa viya saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇakkhandhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2432_16: Ayaṃ pana viseso – viññāṇakkhandhassa phassaṭṭhāne “nāmarūpasamudayā nāmarūpanirodhā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2433_0: Evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa udayabbayadassane dasa dasa katvā samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni
tika-abh08t0:2433_1: vuttāni, tesaṃ vasenapi “evampi rūpasamudayo, evampi rūpavayo, evampi rūpaṃ udeti,
tika-abh08t0:2433_2: evampi rūpaṃ vetī”ti paccayato ceva khaṇato ca vitthārena ca manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2433_3: “tasseva ñāṇassā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha avijjāsamudayāti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti
tika-abh08t0:2433_4: attho. Nirodhaviruddho hi uppādo atthibhāvo hoti, tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya
tika-abh08t0:2433_5: sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpasamudayo rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. Ādi-saddasaṅgahitesu
tika-abh08t0:2433_7: ca, tathā vayadassane “avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho, taṇhānirodhā… kammanirodhā… āhāranirodhā
tika-abh08t0:2433_8: rūpanirodho”ti ca ādīsu avijjādīhi tīhi atītakālikāni tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāni
tika-abh08t0:2434_0: Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito “āhārasamudayā”ti. Tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2434_1: pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
tika-abh08t0:2434_3: kammunā rūpakāyassa nibbatti, asati ca avijjūpanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavoyevāti.
tika-abh08t0:2434_4: Yathā rūpassa avijjātaṇhūpanissayatā, evaṃ vedanādīnampi daṭṭhabbā. Āhāro pana uppannassa
tika-abh08t0:2434_5: rūpassa posako kabaḷīkārāhārassa adhippetattā, kāmaṃ yathādhiṭṭhānattā vā desanāya.
tika-abh08t0:2434_6: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena vā āhāraggahaṇaṃ. Avijjānirodhāti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato
tika-abh08t0:2434_7: anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. “Taṇhānirodhā kammanirodho”ti
tika-abh08t0:2434_8: etthāpi eseva nayo. Āhāranirodhāti pavattipaccayassa kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāve. Rūpanirodhoti
tika-abh08t0:2434_9: taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hotīti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2434_10: pana viseso – “phuṭṭho vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetīti, phassapaccayā
tika-abh08t0:2434_11: vedanā, cakkhusamphassajā vedanā, saññā cetanā”ti vacanato phasso vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2434_12: pavattipaccayo, tannirodhā ca tesaṃ nirodho, mahāpadānamahānidānasuttesu, abhidhamme
tika-abh08t0:2434_13: ca aññamaññapaccayavāre “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2434_14: pavattipaccayo, tannirodhā ca tassa nirodhoti vuttaṃ “phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2435_0: 1271. Dasa dasāti rūpakkhandhassa udayadassane avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti imesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2435_1: paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇāni ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni pañca
tika-abh08t0:2435_2: lakkhaṇāni, vayadassane avijjādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho, rūpassa
tika-abh08t0:2435_3: khaṇanirodho cāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇānīti rūpakkhandhassa dasa lakkhaṇāni, tathā
tika-abh08t0:2435_4: vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ catunnaṃ cattālīsa lakkhaṇānīti evaṃ samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:2435_5: Tenāha “paññāsa lakkhaṇānī”ti. Lakkhaṇaṭṭho pana tesaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitā,
tika-abh08t0:2435_6: anuppādanirodho cāti aṭṭha lakkhīyati etehi rūpādīnaṃ udayo ca vayo cāti lakkhaṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:2435_7: Catunnañhi paccayānaṃ atthitāhi rūpādiudayo lakkhīyati, anuppādanirodhaaccantanirodhehi
tika-abh08t0:2435_8: vayo, nibbattivipariṇāmāni pana saṅkhatalakkhaṇānevāti. Dhamme samanupassatīti rūpādike
tika-abh08t0:2435_9: dhamme udayabbayavante samanupassati. Ettha ca keci tāva āhu “arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2435_10: addhāsantativasena, na khaṇavasenā”ti, tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva
tika-abh08t0:2435_11: na siyā. Apare panāhu “paccayato udayabbayadassanena atītādivibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā sabbasādhāraṇato
tika-abh08t0:2435_12: avijjādipaccayā vedanāya sambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati, na uppādaṃ. Avijjādiabhāve
tika-abh08t0:2435_13: ca tassā asambhavaṃ alabbhamānataṃ passati, na bhaṅgakkhaṇato. Udayabbayassa dassane
tika-abh08t0:2435_14: paccuppannānaṃ uppādaṃ, bhaṅgañca passatī”ti, taṃ ayuttaṃ. Santativasena hi rūpārūpadhamme
tika-abh08t0:2435_15: udayabbayato manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2436_0: 1272-5. Ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto pacchā avijjādike paccayadhamme
tika-abh08t0:2436_1: vissajjetvā udayabbayavante khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato udayabbayadassanamukhena
tika-abh08t0:2436_2: khaṇatopi udayabbayaṃ manasi karoti. Tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2436_3: tadā rūpārūpadhammā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantā, bhijjantā ca hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Tena
tika-abh08t0:2436_4: vuttaṃ “evaṃ rūpudayo hotī”tiādi. Tattha evaṃ rūpudayoti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2436_5: taṇhāsamudayā…pe… kamma…pe… āhārasamudayāpi rūpassa sambhavo. Evamassa vayoti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2436_6: vuttanayeneva avijjānirodhā…pe… taṇhānirodhā…pe… kamma…pe… āhāranirodhā rūpassa vayo
tika-abh08t0:2436_7: anuppādoti ayaṃ paccayato vitthārena manasikāro. Udeti evaṃ rūpampīti evaṃ samudayato
tika-abh08t0:2436_9: Evaṃ rūpaṃ tu vetīti kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi evaṃ veti
tika-abh08t0:2436_10: nirujjhatīti ayaṃ khaṇato vitthārena manasikāro. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ paccayatopettha
tika-abh08t0:2436_11: khaṇato udayabbaya”nti. Sabbadhammā pākaṭā hontīti iti ime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti,
tika-abh08t0:2436_12: hutvā paṭiventi. Yathā paccuppanne, evaṃ atītānāgatepīti nayavasena atītādidhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2436_13: dvedhā udayabbayaṃ passato saccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇabhedā pākaṭā honti. Tassevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2436_14: pākaṭībhūtasabbadhammasabhāvassa “evaṃ kira nāmime dhammā anuppannapubbā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:2436_15: uppannā nirujjhantī”ti niccanavāva hutvā saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti. Na kevalañca niccanavāva,
tika-abh08t0:2436_16: udake daṇḍakena katalekhā viya, āragge ṭhapitasāsapo viya, vijjusañcāro viya ca parittakālaṭṭhāyino
tika-abh08t0:2436_17: upaṭṭhahanti. Tenāha “udake daṇḍarājīvā”tiādi. Udake daṇḍarājiādayova kiñcāpi uttaruttari
tika-abh08t0:2436_18: atiparittaṭṭhāyibhāvanidassanatthaṃ dassitā, tathāpi dandhanirodhā eva nidassitā,
tika-abh08t0:2436_19: tatopi lahutaranirodhattā saṅkhārānaṃ. Tathā hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena
tika-abh08t0:2436_20: parimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi, pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātatopi sīghataro rūpanirodho
tika-abh08t0:2436_21: vutto, pageva arūpadhammānaṃ. Na kevalaṃ parittatarakālaṭṭhāyinova upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:2436_22: atha kho asārāpi khāyantīti āha “kadalī”tiādi. Tattha maṇḍalākārena āvijjhiyamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2437_0: 1276-7. Ettāvatāti yvāyaṃ kalāpasammasananiyojanato paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayapaṭivedhāya
tika-abh08t0:2437_1: bhāvanā vidhi āraddho, ettāvatā bhāvanāvidhānena kalāpasammasanampi udayabbayañāṇuppādasseva
tika-abh08t0:2437_2: parikammanti. Udayabbayadassanaṃ ñāṇanti sambandho. Lakkhaṇāni ca…pe… ṭhitanti vayadhammameva
tika-abh08t0:2437_3: uppajjati, uppannañca vayaṃ upetīti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā
tika-abh08t0:2437_4: ṭhitaṃ. Adhunā uppannaṃ na tāva balappattanti āha “taruṇa”nti. Kalāpasammasanādivasena
tika-abh08t0:2438_0: 1278-80. Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya vipassantassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā uppajjantīti
tika-abh08t0:2438_3: balavavipassanāyāti attho. Na hi tadā vipassanupakkilesā uppajjantīti. Vipassakassāti
tika-abh08t0:2438_4: ca vipassakassevāti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭho. Teneva vakkhati “sampattapaṭivedhassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2438_5: Diṭṭhiggāhādivatthubhāvena vipassanaṃ upakkilesantīti upakkilesā. Sampatto catusaccaphalapaṭivedho
tika-abh08t0:2438_6: yena so sampattapaṭivedho, so ca sotāpannādīnaṃ aññataro hotīti āha “sotāpannādino”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2438_7: Apicāti ayaṃ vakkhamānasamuccayattho. Idañca ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena vuttaṃ balavavipassanāpattassāpi
tika-abh08t0:2438_8: anuppajjanato. Sampattapaṭivedhassāti vā balavipassanāpattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sopi
tika-abh08t0:2438_9: hi paṭivedhappattiyā āsannārahadese ṭhitattā sampattapaṭivedho nāma hoti. Evañca
tika-abh08t0:2438_10: sati apicāti vuttasamuccayattho hoti. Atha vā api-saddo vuttasamuccayattho. Ca-saddo
tika-abh08t0:2438_11: avuttasamuccayattho. Tena nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
tika-abh08t0:2438_12: antarā vosānaṃ āpannassāpi vipassanupakkilesā na uppajjanti. Vippaṭipannassāti sīlavipattiādivasena
tika-abh08t0:2438_13: yathā tathā vippaṭipannakassa, garahitabbapaṭipannassāti attho. Atha vā vippaṭipannassāti
tika-abh08t0:2439_0: 1281. Vipassanāpaṭipattiyeva hi sasambhārā pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipatti, tadaññā vippaṭipatti,
tika-abh08t0:2439_1: tenevassa visuddhipakkhe “sammāva paṭipannassā”ti vuttaṃ. Sā ca nikkhittadhurassāpi
tika-abh08t0:2439_2: hotīti imasmiṃ pakkhe nikkhittakammaṭṭhānopi imināva saṅgahito hotīti. Sammāva paṭipannassāti
tika-abh08t0:2439_3: heṭṭhā vuttavidhānena sammā eva paṭipannassa, na vippaṭipannassa vā nikkhittadhurassa
tika-abh08t0:2439_4: vā. Yuttayogassāti yuttena yogena, ñāṇena vā bhāvanamanuyuñjanasīlassa. Sā pana yuttayogitā
tika-abh08t0:2439_6: etthāpi eva-kāro sambandhitabbo, tena na nuppajjantīti attho. Aññathā maggāmaggañāṇasseva
tika-abh08t0:2439_7: asambhavato. Kirāti anussutiyaṃ. Sā panesā anussuti pāḷivaseneva āgatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:2440_0: “Kathaṃ dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti? Aniccato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2440_1: obhāso dhammoti obhāsaṃ āvajjeti, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ, tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso
tika-abh08t0:2440_2: aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti. Dukkhato…pe… anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2440_3: nappajānāti. Tathā aniccato manasikaroto ñāṇaṃ uppajjati…pe… pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2440_4: adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhā nikanti uppajjati, nikanti dhammoti nikantiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2440_5: āvajjeti, tato vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ, tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2440_6: yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti. Dukkhato…pe… anattato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2441_0: 1282. Idāni tesaṃ obhāsādīnaṃ sarūpavibhāvanatthaṃ tesu uppannesu vipassanāya upakkilissanākārañca
tika-abh08t0:2441_3: yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2441_4: samantato pharati, taṃ tasseva paññāyati, tena phuṭṭhokāse rūpagatampi passati. Passanto
tika-abh08t0:2441_5: ca cakkhuviññāṇena passati, udāhu manoviññāṇenāti vīmaṃsitabbametanti vadanti. Ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-abh08t0:2441_6: pana “dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti yuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2442_0: 1283-4. Maggappatto phalappatto, ahamasmīti gaṇhatīti “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo
tika-abh08t0:2442_1: obhāso uppannapubbo, addhā ariyamaggaṃ pattosmi, phalaṃ sacchākāsi”nti amaggaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:2442_2: “maggo”ti gaṇhāti. Tassevaṃ pana gaṇhatoti tassa amaggaṃyeva “maggo”ti gaṇhantassa.
tika-abh08t0:2442_3: Vipassanāvīthīti paṭipāṭiyā pavattamānā vipassanāva ukkantā nāma hoti, yogino “maggaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2442_4: pattosmī”ti adhimānena vissaṭṭhattā. Vipassanāvīthintipi pāṭho, tassevaṃ gaṇhato
tika-abh08t0:2442_5: vipassanā tatoyeva vīthiṃ ukkantā nāma hotīti attho. Obhāsameva so bhikkhu, assādento
tika-abh08t0:2442_6: nisīdatīti so bhikkhu attanā āraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ vissajjetvā obhāsameva lobhavasena
tika-abh08t0:2442_7: vā diṭṭhivasena vā assādento nisīdati. So kho panāyaṃ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva
tika-abh08t0:2442_8: obhāsento uppajjati, kassaci antogabbhaṃ, kassaci bahigabbhaṃ, kassaci sakalavihāraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2442_9: gāvutaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ yojanaṃ dviyojanaṃ tiyojanaṃ, kassaci pathavītalato paṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:2442_10: yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā ekālokaṃ kurumāno, yathā samuddamhi yojanamatte macchakacchapā
tika-abh08t0:2442_11: paññāyanti, evaṃ uppajjanti. Bhagavato pana dasasahassilokadhātuṃ obhāsento udapādi.
tika-abh08t0:2443_0: 1285. Vipassanāpītīti vipassanācittasampayuttā pīti. Khuddikādikā heṭṭhā vaṇṇitāyeva,
tika-abh08t0:2443_1: ayañca pañcavidhā pīti udayabbayānupassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya anukkamena uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2443_2: Matthakappattena pana udayabbayañāṇena saddhiṃ pharaṇāpītiyeva hoti. Upacārappanakkhaṇato
tika-abh08t0:2443_3: aññadāpi hi pharaṇāpīti hotiyevāti. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā uppajjatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2444_0: 1286-7. Yogino…pe… honti hīti yassāyaṃ passaddhi uppannā, tassa yogino rattiṭṭhāne
tika-abh08t0:2444_1: vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisinnassa kāyacittāni passaddhāneva honti, neva daratho hotīti
tika-abh08t0:2444_2: attho. Passaddhiādīni cha yugaḷāni aññamaññayogīnīti passaddhiyā uppannāya itarāpi
tika-abh08t0:2444_3: uppannāyeva hontīti kiccadassanamukhena tā sabbāpi dassento “lahūni cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:2444_4: Ettha ca kāya-ggahaṇena rūpakāyassāpi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, na vedanādikkhandhattayasseva.
tika-abh08t0:2444_5: Kāyapassaddhiādayo hi rūpakāyassāpi darathādinimmaddakāti. Kammaññāneva hontīti na
tika-abh08t0:2444_6: kevalaṃ kammaññāneva suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti, avinābhāvitāya pana tadubhayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2444_7: visuṃ na vuttaṃ. Kāyacittānaṃ passaddhādibhāvo ca tesaṃ apassaddhādihetubhūtānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2445_0: 1288-90. Manussānaṃ ayanti mānusī, manussayogyakāmasukharati. Tādisehi manussavisesehi
tika-abh08t0:2445_2: dibbā rati vā mānusī, tassā atikkantatāya na mānusīti amānusī, taṃ amānusiṃ. Suññāgāranti
tika-abh08t0:2445_3: yaṃ kiñci vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ, vipassanaṃ eva vā, sāpi hi niccabhāvādisuññatāya, yogino
tika-abh08t0:2445_4: sukhasannissayatāya ca “suññāgāra”nti vattabbataṃ labhati. Cittassa anupasamakarānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2445_5: kilesānaṃ vigamena santacittassa saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanena bhikkhuno sammā ñāyena
tika-abh08t0:2445_6: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ udayabbayānupassanādivasena te vipassato sammasato sammāraddhavipassanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2445_7: manussānaṃ visayatāya amānusī vipassanāpītisukhasaññitā rati hotīti ayamettha gāthāya
tika-abh08t0:2445_8: saṅkhepattho. Dutiyagāthā pana udayabbayañāṇameva sandhāya vuttā. Tattha yato yatoti rūpato, arūpato vā.
tika-abh08t0:2446_0: 1291. Ñāṇādayoti ñāṇasaddhādayo satta. Vuttanayenāti “ñāṇanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ, saddhāti
tika-abh08t0:2446_2: Tattha ñāṇaṃ rūpārūpadhamme udayabbayānupassanāvasena tulayantassa tīrentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva
tika-abh08t0:2446_3: avigatavegaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ ativisadaṃ uppajjati. Tathā hi tena yogī “maggaṃ pattosmī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2446_4: maññati. Saddhāti kilesakālusiyāpagamena cittacetasikānaṃ atisayapasādabhūtā balavatī
tika-abh08t0:2446_5: saddhā, na pana kammaphalaṃ, ratanattayaṃ vā saddahanavasena pavattā. Satipi sūpaṭṭhitā
tika-abh08t0:2446_6: acalā pabbatarājasadisā uppajjati. Imissā ca uppannāya so yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2446_7: taṃ taṃ ṭhānamassa anupavisitvā okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā paribhaṇḍabhūtassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2446_9: viya satiyā upaṭṭhāti. Sukhaṃ pana sakalasarīraṃ abhisandamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2446_10: Tasmiñhi uppanne taṃsamuṭṭhitehi atipaṇītehi rūpehi sabbo kāyo pariphuṭo, paribrūhito
tika-abh08t0:2446_11: ca hoti. Upekkhā pana vipassanupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca. Tattha vicinitavicayattā
tika-abh08t0:2446_12: saṅkhārānaṃ vicinane majjhattabhāvena ṭhitā vipassanupekkhā. Sā pana atthato tathāpavattā
tika-abh08t0:2446_14: pavattiyā āvajjanupekkhāti vuccati. Duvidhā panesā tadā uppajjati. Tathā hi tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2446_15: samaye sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ udayabbaye majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhā balavatī uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2446_16: manodvāre āvajjanupekkhāpi. Sā hissa taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva,
tika-abh08t0:2446_17: pattapuṭe pakkhandatattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā pavattati. Vīriyampi asithilamanaccāraddhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2446_19: nikanti ca obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā bhāvanāya sātisayappavattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2446_20: sukhumā santākārā uppajjati. Yā kilesoti pariggahitumpi na yuttā. Yathā ca obhāse,
tika-abh08t0:2446_21: evaṃ etesupi aññasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā pīti uppannapubbā,
tika-abh08t0:2446_22: evarūpā passaddhi ñāṇaṃ saddhā sati sukhaṃ upekkhā vīriyaṃ nikanti uppannapubbā,
tika-abh08t0:2446_23: addhā maggaphalappattosmī”ti gaṇhāti, tassevaṃ gaṇhato vipassanā vīthiukkantā nāma
tika-abh08t0:2446_24: hoti. So teyeva assādento nisīdati. Ime ca pana vipassanupakkilesā yebhuyyena samathavipassanālābhino
tika-abh08t0:2446_25: uppajjanti. So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamudācārato “arahā aha”nti cittaṃ uppādetīti.
tika-abh08t0:2447_0: 1292-3. Upaklesassa vatthutoti nippariyāyato diṭṭhimānataṇhā idha upakkilesā tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2447_1: vatthuto uppattiṭṭhānatāya, na sabhāvato akusalattā. Yathā pana obhāsādayo, evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2447_2: nikantipi diṭṭhiggāhādīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vatthubhāvopissā yujjateva. Taṃtamāvajjamānassa,
tika-abh08t0:2447_3: bhāvanā parihāyatīti taṃ taṃ obhāsādikaṃ āvajjamānassa diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena “mama
tika-abh08t0:2447_4: obhāso”tiādiggāhaṃ pavattentassa bhāvanā vīthiṃ okkamitvā parivaṭṭati. Appaṃ sutametassāti appassuto.
tika-abh08t0:2448_0: 1294-7. Bahussuto pana obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me obhāso uppanno, so kho panāyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2448_1: anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti
tika-abh08t0:2448_2: vā, sace obhāso attā bhaveyya, attāti gahetuṃ vaṭṭeyya, anattā ca panāyaṃ attāti
tika-abh08t0:2448_3: gahito, tasmā “so avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena anicco, udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2448_4: dukkho”tiādinā samanupassati, so evaṃ samanupassanto upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo
tika-abh08t0:2448_5: dhammā na maggo, upakkilesavinimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggoti
tika-abh08t0:2448_6: maggañca amaggañca vavatthapeti. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbobhāsādayo”tiādi. Maggāmaggesu
tika-abh08t0:2448_7: ñāṇanti maggāmaggañāṇaṃ, maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhipattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2448_8: ca tena yoginā tiṇṇaṃ saccānañca vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Diṭṭhivisuddhiyā
tika-abh08t0:2448_9: tāva nāmarūpavavatthāpanena dukkhasaccavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti, kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā
tika-abh08t0:2448_11: kammañca samudayasaccaṃ, imissaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ sammā maggassa
tika-abh08t0:2448_12: avadhāraṇena maggasaccaṃ. Tadupāyabhūtassa hi maggassa avadhāraṇena taṃ avadhāritamevāti
tika-abh08t0:2448_13: evaṃ lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2454_0: 1298. Aṭṭhañāṇavasenevāti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasena. Vipassanācārassa
tika-abh08t0:2454_1: matthakappattiyā saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā. Sikhāpatti panassā udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2454_2: aṭṭhañāṇānaṃ vasenāti āha “aṭṭhañāṇavasenā”ti. Navamanti saccānulomikañāṇaṃ. Iti
tika-abh08t0:2454_3: udayabbayādīni aṭṭha, idañca navamañāṇaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassananti pavuccati. Paṭipajjati
tika-abh08t0:2454_4: etāya ariyamaggoti paṭipadā, udayabbayādīnaṃ jānanaṭṭhena, paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2455_0: 1299. Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “aṭṭha ñāṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha udayabbayānupassanāñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2455_1: kiñcāpi tīraṇapariññāya patiṭṭhaṃ, tathāpi yathāvuttaṭṭhena paṭipadāñāṇadassanampi
tika-abh08t0:2455_2: hotiyevāti tampi idha vuttaṃ. Itarattha pana uppannamattaṃ appaguṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2455_3: Appaguṇañhi niccasaññādipahānasiddhiyā pahānapariññāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Yato tadadhigamena
tika-abh08t0:2455_4: aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatāva honti. Na hi udayabbayānaṃ paccakkhato
tika-abh08t0:2455_5: paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṃ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhappahānaṃ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t0:2455_6: Asati ca paṭipakkhappahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṃ vajiramiva avihatavegatā tikhiṇavisadāditā
tika-abh08t0:2455_7: vā, tasmā paguṇabhāvappattaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ pahānapariññāpakkhiyameva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2456_0: 1300-2. Bhaṅgeti saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅge. Yathābhūtadassāvī bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ, tebhūmakadhammā,
tika-abh08t0:2456_1: tesu bhayato upatiṭṭhantesu bhāyitabbākāraggāhiñāṇaṃ bhayeñāṇaṃ. Tathā hetaṃ “bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇa”nti
tika-abh08t0:2456_2: vuccati. Muccituṃ icchatīti muccitukamyaṃ, cittaṃ, puggalo vā, tassa bhāvo muccitukamyatā,
tika-abh08t0:2456_3: taṃ pana ñāṇamevāti āha “ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatā”ti. Puna paṭisaṅkhānākārena pavattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2456_4: ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ. Nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṃ upekkhanavasena pavattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2456_5: ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ. Gāthābandhatthaṃ pana visandhiniddeso. Oḷārikoḷārikassa
tika-abh08t0:2456_6: saccapaṭicchādakatamassa vigamanena saccapaṭivedhānukūlattā saccānulomikaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2457_0: 1303. Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇassa pageva siddhattā kimatthaṃ puna tatthāpi abhiyogoti
tika-abh08t0:2457_1: ce? Aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṃ. Udayabbayañāṇañhi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi
tika-abh08t0:2457_2: upakkiliṭṭhaṃ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṃ sallakkhetuṃ nāsakkhi, upakkilesavinimuttaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2457_3: pana sakkoti, tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṃ puna tattheva yogo kātabbo. Lakkhaṇāni
tika-abh08t0:2457_4: cassa udayabbayādīnaṃ amanasikārā, santatiiriyāpathaghanachannatāya ca nopaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:2457_5: tasmā udayabbayaṃ manasi katvā santatiṃ ugghāṭetvā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, abhiṇhapīḷanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2457_6: pariggahetvā iriyāpathaṃ ugghāṭetvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, dhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhogaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2457_7: katvā anattalakkhaṇañca sallakkhetvā “aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti saṅkhārā punappunaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2457_8: sammasitabbā. Tassevaṃ tulayato tīrayato yadā saṅkhāragataṃ attano lahuupaṭṭhānena,
tika-abh08t0:2457_9: ñāṇassa ca tikkhatāya tirohituppādādibhedaṃ bhijjamānameva upaṭṭhāti, bhaṅgeyeva
tika-abh08t0:2457_10: tassa ñāṇaṃ santiṭṭhati, tadā bhaṅgānupassanā nāma vipassanāñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2457_11: Tassa tadeva saṅkhāranirodhārammaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṃ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsesu
tika-abh08t0:2457_12: saṅkhārā bhijjanasabhāvatāya yakkharakkhasādayo viya mahābhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:2457_13: tadāssa bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti. Kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhāyatīti? Na bhāyati.
tika-abh08t0:2457_14: Tañhi “atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti, anāgatā nirujjhissantī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2457_15: tīraṇamattameva hoti, byasanāpannānaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhitānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2458_0: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavagatesu saṅkhāresu tāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2458_1: vā leṇaṃ vā parāyaṇaṃ vā na paññāyati, ukkhittāsiko viya paccāmitto sādīnavā eva
tika-abh08t0:2458_2: saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti, tassa saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavameva passantassa ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma
tika-abh08t0:2458_3: uppannaṃ hoti. Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa yadā tibhavapariyāpannesu
tika-abh08t0:2458_4: nibbedo uppajjati, ukkaṇṭhā saṇṭhahanti, sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyutte santipade abhiratiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2458_5: paṭilabhati, tadāssa nibbidānupassanaṃ nāma ñāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti. Tassa yadā iminā
tika-abh08t0:2458_6: nibbidāñāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ekasaṅkhārepi cittaṃ na sajjati, sabbasmā
tika-abh08t0:2458_7: saṅkhārato sappamukhagatassa viya maṇḍūkassa muccitukāmatā uppajjati, tadā muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2458_8: nāma uppannaṃ hoti. Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhārehi muccitukāmassa niccasukhasubhaattākārena
tika-abh08t0:2458_9: pana upaṭṭhituṃ asamatthataṃ pāpetvā muccanassa upāyasampādanatthaṃ aniccantikatādīhi
tika-abh08t0:2458_11: tucchatādīhi anattalakkhaṇañca āropetvā sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ pariggaṇhantassa paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2458_12: nāma uppannaṃ hoti. Tena panevaṃ pariggahitasaṅkhārena yā sā “suññamidaṃ attena vā
tika-abh08t0:2458_13: attaniyena vā”tiādinā dvikoṭikādibhedā suññatā vuttā, sā pariggahetabbā. Tassevaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2458_14: suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sammasantassa yadā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya
tika-abh08t0:2458_15: vissaṭṭhabhariyassa viya saṅkhāragatesu upekkhā santiṭṭhati, tīsu bhavesu cittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2458_16: na sampasāriyati, tadāssa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti. Taṃ panetaṃ yāva
tika-abh08t0:2458_17: nibbānaṃ na passati, tāva disākāko viya kūpakayaṭṭhiṃ punappunaṃ saṅkhārameva anabhimatampi
tika-abh08t0:2458_18: nissāya saṅkhāravicinanepi majjhattameva hutvā tiṭṭhati. Tena vuttaṃ “etesu pana ñāṇesū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2459_0: 1306. Vipassanā…pe… vuṭṭhānagāminīti sikhaṃ uttamabhāvaṃ pattattā sikhāpattā. Vuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2459_1: gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī. “Vuṭṭhāna”nti hi bahiddhā nimittabhūtā abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto
tika-abh08t0:2459_2: ceva ajjhattappavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo vuccati, taṃ gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī,
tika-abh08t0:2460_0: 1307. Tanti yaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā saccānulomañāṇanti ca vuccati, taṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2460_1: Āsevantassāti punappunaṃ sammasanavasena sevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa.
tika-abh08t0:2460_2: Tassa hi adhimokkhasaddhā bhāvanāvasena balavatarā nibbattissati, vīriyaṃ supaggahitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2460_3: paṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthaṃ hoti, ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena sati supatiṭṭhitā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2460_4: passaddhisukhānaṃ sātisayatāya cittaṃ susamāhitaṃ, tatova anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo
tika-abh08t0:2461_0: 1308-12. Aniccā…pe… votarateva sāti aniccādīsu ekena ākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2461_1: pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇā nāma hoti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgavāroti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2461_3: na sammasitanayena. Tenāha “aniccādi…pe… kurumāna”nti. Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ katvāti bhavaṅgassa
tika-abh08t0:2461_4: nivattanaṃ katvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṃ adatvā. Parikammanti maggassa
tika-abh08t0:2461_5: parikammattā paṭisaṅkhārakattā. Upacāranti maggassa āsannattā, samīpacārittā vā.
tika-abh08t0:2462_1: saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattattā, “udayabbayavantānaṃyeva vata dhammānaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2462_2: uppādavaye addasā”ti ca “bhaṅgavantānaṃyeva vata bhaṅgānupassanaṃ bhaṅgamaddasā”ti
tika-abh08t0:2462_3: ca “sabhayaṃyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti ca “sādīnaveyeva vata
tika-abh08t0:2462_4: ādīnavānupassanaṃ ādīnavamaddasā”ti ca “nibbinditabbeyeva vata nibbidāñāṇaṃ nibbinda”nti
tika-abh08t0:2462_5: ca “muccitabbamhiyeva vata muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ muccitukāmaṃ jāta”nti ca “paṭisaṅkhātabbameva
tika-abh08t0:2462_6: vata paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena paṭisaṅkhāta”nti ca “upekkhitabbaṃyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya
tika-abh08t0:2462_7: upekkhita”nti ca atthato vadamānaṃ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ katakiccatāya
tika-abh08t0:2462_8: anulometi sabbāsaṃyeva vipassanānaṃ lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccattā, tathā upari ca
tika-abh08t0:2462_9: ariyamagge sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tāya paṭipadāya pattabbatāya. Na hi
tika-abh08t0:2462_11: uppajjati, gotrabhuñāṇe ca anuppanne maggañāṇaṃ na uppajjati, tasmā purimapacchimānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2462_12: bhāgānaṃ anulomattā “anulomanti saññita”nti. Tenevāti heṭṭhimañāṇānaṃ anulomamukhena,
tika-abh08t0:2462_13: upari bodhipakkhiyānaṃ anulomanato ca. Saccānulomañāṇanti pavuccati maggasaccassa
tika-abh08t0:2462_15: Pariyosānanti purimā koṭi. Saṅkhārārammaṇavipassanāsu hi ayaṃ visesato vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti.
tika-abh08t0:2462_16: Asaṅkhatārammaṇaṃ pana sabbena sabbaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchati upetīti.
tika-abh08t0:2462_17: Tatopi hi visesato “vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā”ti vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “ñeyyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2463_0: 1317-8. Kittitāti thomitā, ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanato
tika-abh08t0:2463_1: gavesanato mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. Santakilesatāya santā. Yoganti bhāvanaṃ, bhāvanābhiyogaṃ vā.
tika-abh08t0:2469_0: 1319-21. Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2469_1: uppajjati, taṃ tāva dassento “ito para”ntiādimāha. Ito paranti ito anulomañāṇato
tika-abh08t0:2469_2: upari. Āvajjaniyaṭhānattāti āvajjanakiccaṃ karontaṃ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa
tika-abh08t0:2469_3: āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abbohārikameva ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇābhāvato. Kiñcāpi evaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2469_5: sotasmiṃ, patitattā vipassanā”ti. Etenassa paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhibhajanaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:2470_0: 1322. Puthujjanesu bhavaṃ pothujjanikaṃ, tadeva gottaṃ ariyehi asammissā puthujjanasamaññāti
tika-abh08t0:2470_1: pothujjanikagottaṃ. Ekavaṃsajānañhi samānā samaññā “gotta”nti vuccati, gaṃ tāyati
tika-abh08t0:2470_2: buddhiṃ, abhidhānañca ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti katvā. Vā-saddo vakkhamānatthavikappane.
tika-abh08t0:2470_3: Abhibhuyya pavattito gotrabhūti sambandho. Gottaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ “ariyo”ti buddhiyā,
tika-abh08t0:2470_4: abhidhānassa ca tāyanato pavattanatoti adhippāyo. Tato bhavatīti tato gottato ārammaṇapaccayato
tika-abh08t0:2470_5: bhavati. Iti-saddo cettha hetuttho daṭṭhabbo. Tena yasmā tato bhavati, tasmā gotrabhūti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2471_0: 1323-5. Ñāṇadassanavisuddhi eva ñāṇadassanasuddhikaṃ. Taṃ sampādetuṃ panicchatā tena
tika-abh08t0:2471_1: bhikkhunā yaṃ aññaṃ kiñcipi kātabbaṃ, taṃ natthīti sambandho. Kasmā natthīti ce āha
tika-abh08t0:2472_0: 1326-7. Evaṃ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa etehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena
tika-abh08t0:2472_1: thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādakatamamhi antaradhāpite sabbasaṅkhāragate cittaṃ na pakkhandati,
tika-abh08t0:2472_2: na laggati, padumapalāsato udakaṃ viya patikuṭati pativaṭṭati, sabbaṃ nimittārammaṇampi
tika-abh08t0:2472_3: sabbaṃ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti, athassa sabbasmiṃ nimittappavattārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:2472_4: palibodhato upaṭṭhite dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2472_5: uppajjati. Tenāha “tassā”tiādi. Paṭhamāvajjanañceva paṭhamābhogatāpi cāti paṭhamāvajjanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2472_6: paṭhamābhogabhūtaṃ. Sakatthe hi ayaṃ tā-paccayoti. Tattha āvajjanaṃ cittasantānassa
tika-abh08t0:2473_1: paccayehi. Muddhanti muddhabhūtaṃ. Ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato punarāvattābhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2473_2: pana anāvattaṃ. Anāvajjanampi cāti anāvajjanampisamānaṃ. Saññaṃ datvā viyāti “evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2473_3: uppajjāhī”ti saññaṃ datvā viya. Anibbiddhapubbanti apadālitapubbaṃ. Viddhaṃsentovāti
tika-abh08t0:2473_4: vināsento eva. Jāyatīti nibbattati. Ettha ca imaṃ upamaṃ āharanti – eko kira issāso
tika-abh08t0:2473_5: aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannayhitvā
tika-abh08t0:2473_6: cakkayante aṭṭhāsi, añño puriso cakkayantaṃ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṃ abhimukhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2473_7: hoti, tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṃ deti. Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā
tika-abh08t0:2473_8: phalakasatanibbijjhati. Tattha daṇḍakasaññaṃ dento viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, issāso viya
tika-abh08t0:2473_9: maggañāṇaṃ, daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva phalakasataṃ nibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2473_10: gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2474_0: 1335-8. Anāmatagga…pe… mahodadhinti aṭṭhamabhavato paṭṭhāya nibbattakaṃ aññātakoṭiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2474_2: cāti sabbaverabhayāni. Anekepi ānisaṃseti ratanattaye niviṭṭhasaddhādike ānisaṃse.
tika-abh08t0:2475: 1339. Tassevānantaranti tassa anantaraṃyeva. Dvepi tīṇi vāti nātitikkhapaññassa dve, tikkhapaññassa tīṇi phalacittāni.
tika-abh08t0:2476_0: 1340-3. “Ajānitvā vadanti te”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ekassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2476_1: Pañcamaṃ maggacittanti imināva chaṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena “ekaṃ phalacitta”nti vadato
tika-abh08t0:2477_1: vuccatīti sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggaloti vuccati. So devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2477_2: āgamma bhusaṃ pamattopi hutvā kāmasugatiyaṃ sattakkhattumeva sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā
tika-abh08t0:2480: Rūpārūpalokesu pana na tathā niyamoti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:2481_0: 1347. Phalādīnanti ādi-saddena pahīnakilesādike saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā ca “iminā vatāhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2481_1: maggena āgato”ti paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ paccavekkhati, tato “ayaṃ me ānisaṃso laddho”ti
tika-abh08t0:2481_2: phalaṃ paccavekkhati, tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2481_3: tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2481_4: avasāne “ayaṃ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho”ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati. Iti
tika-abh08t0:2481_5: sotāpannassa pañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni honti. Yathā ca sotāpannassa, evaṃ sakadāgāmianāgāmīnampi.
tika-abh08t0:2481_6: Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ nāma natthi. Evaṃ sabbānipi ekūnavīsati
tika-abh08t0:2482_0: 1348-50. Yāsaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena imāni ñāṇāni pavattanti, tā dassetuṃ “maggo phalañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:2482_2: vā na vā. Na hi sabbeva tattha samatthā honti. Teneva hi mahānāmo bhagavantaṃ pucchi
tika-abh08t0:2482_3: “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
tika-abh08t0:2482_4: tiṭṭhantī”tiādi. Yogamārabhateti tasmiṃyeva vā āsane nisinno, aparena vā samayena
tika-abh08t0:2482_5: kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvakarāya sakadāgāmimaggasaṅkhātāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya
tika-abh08t0:2482_6: vipassanāyogaṃ karoti, dutiyabhāvo cassa desanāvasena, uppattivasena ca veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2482_7: Sampayuttānaṃ pana nissayabhāvena te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi, yasmā vā samānepi
tika-abh08t0:2482_8: lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati, na nibbānaṃ viya apātubhūtaṃ, tasmāpi “bhūmī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2482_9: Ñāṇena parimajjatīti tena tenākārena indriyānaṃ tikkhatarataṃ sampādetvā, balabojjhaṅgānañca
tika-abh08t0:2483_0: 1351-2. Tattha aparāparaṃ ñāṇaṃ cārento parivatteti. Tenāha “vipassanāvīthiṃ ogāhatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2483_1: Heṭṭhā vuttanayenāti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ uppādane vuttanayeneva. Gotrabhussa anantaranti
tika-abh08t0:2483_2: ettha gotrabhu viya gotrabhu. Paṭhamamaggapurecārikañāṇañhi puthujjanagottābhibhavanato,
tika-abh08t0:2483_3: ariyagottabhavanato ca nippariyāyato “gotrabhū”ti vuccati, idaṃ pana taṃsadisatāya
tika-abh08t0:2483_4: pariyāyato gotrabhu. Ekaccasaṃkilesavisuddhiyā, pana accantavisuddhiyā ārammaṇakaraṇato
tika-abh08t0:2483_5: ca “vodāna”nti vuccati. Tenāha paṭṭhāne “anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2483_6: Yasmā pana paṭisambhidāmagge “uppādādiabhibhavanaṭṭhaṃ upādāya aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā
tika-abh08t0:2483_7: samādhivasena uppajjanti, dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:2483_8: gotrabhunāmavaseneva āgataṃ, tasmā idhāpi “gotrabhussa anantara”nti vuttaṃ gottasaṅkhātanibbānato
tika-abh08t0:2484_0: 1355-7. Yanti yasmā. Sakidevāti ekavārameva. Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu
tika-abh08t0:2484_1: cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito. Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t0:2484_2: ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t0:2484_3: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatīti ime cattāropi idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:2484_4: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ayamekova
tika-abh08t0:2484_5: idha gahitoti. Antakaro bhaveti dukkhassantakaro bhaveyya, bhave vā antakaro bhavassa
tika-abh08t0:2484_6: antakaroti attho. Tatiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyāti sambandho. Byāpādakāmarāgānaṃ pahānāyāti
tika-abh08t0:2484_7: tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukarānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ niravasesappahānāya. Tatiyamaggañāṇavaṇṇanā.
tika-abh08t0:2485_0: 1363-7. Paṭisandhivasena kāmabhavassa anāgamanato anāgāmī. Tenāha “tattheva parinibbāyī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2485_1: Tatthevāti suddhāvāse vā aññattha vā yattha uppanno, tattheva parinibbāyi. Anāvattisabhāvoti
tika-abh08t0:2485_2: tasmā lokā idha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṃ lokaṃ punarāgamanābhāvato anāvattanasabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2486_1: “yathā mahāmoggallāno”ti. Na hi cūḷakhīṇāsavo nāma atthi. Anuppatto sadattho sakattho,
tika-abh08t0:2486_2: pūjattho vā etenāti anuppattasadattho, sadatthoti ca arahattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tañhi
tika-abh08t0:2486_3: attupanibandhanaṭṭhena, attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena, attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano
tika-abh08t0:2486_4: atthattā “sadattho”ti vuccati. Khīṇāni dasapi bhavasaṃyojanāni etassāti khīṇasaṃyojano.
tika-abh08t0:2486_5: Dakkhiṇaṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo. Catassopīti sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo
tika-abh08t0:2486_6: arahattamaggoti catassopi. Visuddhikāmenāti attano visuddhiṃ icchantena. Tapoyeva
tika-abh08t0:2492_1: yena ye dhammā pahātabbā, tesaṃ pahānañca abhisamayakāle pariññādikiccāni ca dassetuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2492_2: “etesu yena ye dhammā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ye dhammāti ye saṃkilesadhammā. Saṃyojanādīsu
tika-abh08t0:2492_3: khandhehi khandhānaṃ, phalena kammassa, dukkhena vā sattānaṃ saṃyojanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2492_5: ca kilesā. Abhinivesādivasena micchāviparītaṃ pavattanato micchāsabhāvāti micchattā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_6: Loke dhammā, lokapariyāpannā dhammā, lokappavattiyaṃ sati anuparamadhammattā vāti
tika-abh08t0:2492_7: lokadhammā. Maccherassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vāti macchariyaṃ. Viparītaṭṭhena vipallāsā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_8: Nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca ganthanato ganthā. Ariyehi agantabbā, ayuttā gatīti
tika-abh08t0:2492_9: vā agati. Āsavantīti āsavā, ābhavaggato sabbamokāsalokaṃ, āgotrabhuto sabbe dhamme
tika-abh08t0:2492_10: byāpetvā pavattantīti attho, āsavanti saṃsāradukkhanti vā āsavā, cakkhādīhi vā saṃvarāsaṃvaradvārehi
tika-abh08t0:2492_11: sattasantāne āsavanti vaṇato yūsāni sandanti viyāti āsavā, āsavanti vā etehi cittāni
tika-abh08t0:2492_12: visayesūti āsavā. Saṃsāramahāsāgarappattihananato oghā viyāti oghā. Heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-abh08t0:2492_13: yojanato yogā. Nivārenti lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesādhigamanti nīvaraṇāni. Aniccādidhammasabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2492_14: atikkamma parato asabhāvato āmasantīti parāmāsā. Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2492_15: bhusaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni. Appahīnabhāvena sattasantāne anusenti mūsikavisaṃ viya
tika-abh08t0:2492_16: anurūpakāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti anusayā. Cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena malā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_17: Akusalakammāni ca tāni duggatīnaṃ pathā cāti akusalakammapathā. Idha pana kammapathabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2492_18: appattānaṃ taṃsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cittaṃ uppajjati etthāti cittuppādo,
tika-abh08t0:2492_19: cetasikarāsi, akusalo ca so cittuppādo cāti akusalacittuppādo.
tika-abh08t0:2493_0: Kāmabhavato uparikoṭṭhāsabhāvato tatiyamaggappattiyā uddhaṃ bhajitabbato, sevitabbato
tika-abh08t0:2493_1: cāti uddhambhāgā, rūpārūpabhavā, tesaṃ hitāni tatthuppajjanakhandhādiyojanatoti uddhambhāgiyāni,
tika-abh08t0:2493_3: tatthuppādakilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvena tatiyamaggappattiyā heṭṭhā bhajitabbato vā adhobhāgā,
tika-abh08t0:2494: Imesu pana dasasu rūpabhavasaṃyojanaṃ, arūpabhavasaṃyojanaṃ, kāmabhavasaṃyojanañca atthato lobhova, sakkāyadiṭṭhisīlabbataparāmāsāpi diṭṭhiyeva, tasmā dhammato satta saṃyojanāni.
tika-abh08t0:2495_0: Micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhīti tathā pavattānaṃ vitakkavīriyasamādhīnamadhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2495_1: Micchāvācādayo tayo tathā pavattā cetanā. Micchāsati pana cittuppādo. Micchāñāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2495_2: tathā pavatto moho. Micchāvimutti lokathūpikādīsu mokkhoti pavattamicchāgāho.
tika-abh08t0:2496: Kāraṇūpacārenāti lābhahetuko lābho, alābhahetuko alābhotiādinā kāriyassa kāraṇavasena upacaraṇena. Lokadhammaggahaṇanti lokadhammaggahaṇena gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2497_0: Āvāse macchariyaṃ, āvāsahetukaṃ vā macchariyanti āvāsamacchariyaṃ. Evaṃ kulamacchariyādīnipi.
tika-abh08t0:2497_1: Tattha āvāsoti vihārādi. Kulanti upaṭṭhākakulaṃ, ñātikulañca. Lābhoti paccayalābhoyeva.
tika-abh08t0:2497_2: Vaṇṇoti sarīravaṇṇo ca guṇavaṇṇo ca. Dhammoti āgamo, adhigamo ca.
tika-abh08t0:2498: “Tayo”ti vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā ca pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
tika-abh08t0:2499_1: “Idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti evaṃ avatthumhi pavatto abhiniveso idaṃsaccābhiniveso.
tika-abh08t0:2499_2: Sīlabbataparāmāsaidaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā cettha atthato diṭṭhiyeva, tasmā dhammato tayo kāyaganthā.
tika-abh08t0:2500: “Chandadosamohabhayānī”ti agatikāraṇattā vuttaṃ, chandādīhi pana akattabbakaraṇaṃ, kattabbākaraṇañca agati nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2501: Āsavesu kāmarāgabhavarāgā atthato lobhoti dhammato tayo āsavā.
tika-abh08t0:2502: Tesamevāti kāmarāgādīnameva. Te hi ogho viya attani patite apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti, saṃsāradukkhato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti, khandhādīni ca khandhādīhi yojenti.
tika-abh08t0:2503: Kāmupādānādīnīti kāmupādānadiṭṭhupādānasīlabbatupādānaattavādupādānāni. Diṭṭhupādānādīni cettha tathā pavattā diṭṭhiyeva, kāmupādānaṃ lobhoti dhammato dve upādānāni.
tika-abh08t0:2504_0: Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena sattasantāne anusentīti anusayā. Kasmā satteva
tika-abh08t0:2504_1: vuttā, nanu aññesampi kilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvo vijjatīti? Na mayaṃ appahīnamattena
tika-abh08t0:2504_2: anusayaṃ vadāma, kintu appahīnabhāvena thāmagatakilesā anusayāti, thāmagamanañca
tika-abh08t0:2504_3: nesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena
tika-abh08t0:2504_4: imeyeva anusayā vuttā, kāmarāgoyeva anusayo kāmarāgānusayo. Evaṃ sesesupi. Apare
tika-abh08t0:2504_5: pana “kāmarāgassa anusayo”tiādinibbacanaṃ vatvā kāmarāgādīnaṃ bījabhūtā attabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:2504_6: kilesasambhūtā kilesuppādanasatti anusayāti vaṇṇenti, tesaṃ matapaṭikkhepo idha papañcāvahattā anāhaṭo.
tika-abh08t0:2505_0: Pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto, pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2505_2: Parabhaṇḍe tathāsaññino tadādāyakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Asaddhammakāmatāya
tika-abh08t0:2505_4: bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
tika-abh08t0:2505_5: So pana parassa atthabhedakarova kammapatho, itaro kammameva. Saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa
tika-abh08t0:2505_6: parabhedanakāmatāya, attapiyakamyatāya vā parabhedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā.
tika-abh08t0:2505_7: Sāpi dvīsu bhinnesuyeva kammapatho. Paramammacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā ekantapharusacetanā
tika-abh08t0:2505_9: nāma. So pana parehi gahiteyeva kammapatho hoti. “Aho vatedaṃ mama hotū”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā
tika-abh08t0:2505_10: abhijjhā. “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadosalakkhaṇo byāpādo. “Natthi
tika-abh08t0:2505_11: dinna”ntiādinā nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā micchādiṭṭhi. Ettha ca natthikaahetukaakiriyadiṭṭhīhiyeva kammapathabhedo.
tika-abh08t0:2506_0: Imesu ca pāṇātipātādi tividhaṃ kāyakammameva. Taṃ kāyavacīdvāresuyeva uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2506_1: na manodvāre. Tathā musāvādādi catubbidhaṃ vacīkammameva. Abhijjhādikaṃ pana tividhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2506_2: manokammameva. Taṃ tīsupi dvāresu pavattati. Dvārantaresupi pavattamānassa sakasakanāmāpariccāgo
tika-abh08t0:2506_3: vuttoyeva. Dhammato cettha ādito satta cetanāsabhāvā, itare tayo cetanāsampayuttāti
tika-abh08t0:2506_4: daṭṭhabbā. Mahāsāvajjaappasāvajjappayogādibhedo pana tattha tattha vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2508_0: Apāyaṃ gacchanti etehīti apāyagamanīyā. Sesāti na apāyagamanīyā. Oḷārikāti tatiyamaggena
tika-abh08t0:2508_1: pahātabbāvatthaṃ upādāya oḷārikā. Tenāha “sukhumā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā”ti. Sukhumā
tika-abh08t0:2508_2: kāmarāgapaṭighāti sambandho. Catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā evāti avadhāraṇena paṭhamamaggādivajjhataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2508_3: nivatteti. Na hi rūparāgādīnaṃ apāyagāminiyāvatthāpi atthi, yato te paṭhamañāṇavajjhāpi siyunti.
tika-abh08t0:2509_0: Yattha yattha pana eva-saddena avadhāraṇaṃ akatvā yaṃ yaṃ dutiyañāṇavajjhanti vā
tika-abh08t0:2509_1: tatiyañāṇavajjhanti vā catutthañāṇavajjhanti vā vakkhati, tattha tattha so so purimañāṇehi
tika-abh08t0:2509_2: hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo. Tena lobha…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2512_0: Agatiyo paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhāti kiñcāpi chandādayo taṇhādisabhāvā uparimaggavajjhā,
tika-abh08t0:2512_1: tathāpi tammūlakassa akattabbakaraṇassa, kattabbākaraṇassa ca apāyagamanīyatāya paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā.
tika-abh08t0:2513_0: Katākatakusalākusalavisayaṃ yaṃ vippaṭisārabhūtaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ idha tatiyañāṇavajjhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2513_1: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana “kukkuccapakatatāya āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ sandhāya
tika-abh08t0:2513_3: tasmā dvinnaṃ vacanānaṃ ayaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo. Aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesu adhippāyova
tika-abh08t0:2513_4: pariyesitabbo, na virodhato paccetabbaṃ. Oḷārikānavasesappahānaṃ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa
tika-abh08t0:2513_5: paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā vuttā. Yaṃ pana arahato uppajjamānaṃ “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2513_6: anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjitunti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2513_7: āgataṃ kukkuccaṃ, na taṃ nīvaraṇaṃ. Na hi nīvaraṇaṃ arahato uppajjati, nīvaraṇapatirūpakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2513_8: pana kappatīti vīmaṃsanabhūtaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma, taṃ tathāpavattacittuppādova.
tika-abh08t0:2514: Kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā anusahagatā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, oḷārikānaṃ pana dutiyañāṇavajjhatā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva.
tika-abh08t0:2516_0: 1376. Tena tenāti tena tena ghātakena saddhiṃ. Kiṃ panetāni ete dhamme ghātentāni
tika-abh08t0:2516_1: atītānāgate ghātenti, udāhu paccuppanneti. Kiṃ panettha, yadi tāva atītānāgate, aphalo
tika-abh08t0:2516_2: vāyāmo āpajjati. Kasmā? Pahātabbānaṃ tadā natthitāya. Atha paccuppanne, tathāpi aphalo
tika-abh08t0:2516_3: vāyāmena saddhiṃ pahātabbānaṃ atthitāya. Athāpi kathañci pahānaṃ siyā, saṃkilesikā
tika-abh08t0:2516_4: maggabhāvanā āpajjati pahātabbappahāyakānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhānato? Saccametaṃ, ye pana maggena
tika-abh08t0:2516_5: asamugghāṭitattā kāraṇalābhe sati avassaṃ uppajjanārahā kilesā, te attano uppattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2516_6: anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentāni etāni te anāgate ghātenti nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2517_1: Vuttānīti “dukkhaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā, “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passatī”tiādinā ca
tika-abh08t0:2518_0: Yathāsabhāvatoti aviparītasabhāvena. “Jānitabbānī”ti vatvā kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2518_1: kathaṃ nāma ekekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni sambhavanti. Na hi tādisaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2518_2: kiñci loke diṭṭhaṃ atthi, na ca vacanaṃ labbhatīti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya tesaṃ jānanavidhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2518_3: upamāvasena tāva dassetuṃ “padīpo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vidaṃsetīti dasseti. Pariyādiyatīti khepeti.
tika-abh08t0:2519_4: ariyamaggabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena abhisametīti aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ asammohato
tika-abh08t0:2519_5: paṭivijjhati. Tañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ attanipi sammohaṃ viddhaṃsetiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:2519_7: sacchikarotī”ti nirodhasaccamekaṃ ārammaṇapaṭivedhena cattāripi saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena
tika-abh08t0:2520_0: Evaṃ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṃ ekapaṭivedhaṃ āgamenapi sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi
tika-abh08t0:2520_1: vuttaṃ. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti hi “yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi
tika-abh08t0:2520_2: so passati, dukkhanirodhampi, dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadampi so passatī”ti ekasaccadassanasamaṅgino
tika-abh08t0:2520_4: vuttaṃ. Aññathā kamābhisamaye sati purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādipassato
tika-abh08t0:2520_5: dukkhādidassanaṃ puna avattabbaṃ siyā. Idāni panettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ karonto āha
tika-abh08t0:2520_8: ālokavidaṃsanasadisatā, tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā, tathā
tika-abh08t0:2521_0: 1385-6. Aparāyapi upamāya tamatthaṃ dassento āha “uggacchanto”tiādi. Obhāsetīti pakāseti.
tika-abh08t0:2521_1: Paṭihaññatīti paṭippassambheti. Etthāpi yathā sūriyo rūpagatāni obhāseti, evaṃ maggañāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2521_2: dukkhaṃ parijānāti. Yathā andhakāraṃ vināseti, evaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati. Yathā ālokaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2521_3: dasseti, evaṃ sahajātādipaccayatāya maggaṃ bhāveti. Yathā sītaṃ paṭippassambheti,
tika-abh08t0:2523_0: Ariyaphalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattiyopi panassā ānisaṃsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tā pana saṅkhepato
tika-abh08t0:2523_1: evaṃ daṭṭhabbā – “ariyaphalasamāpattī”ti hi catunnampi phalaṭṭhānaṃ attano attano
tika-abh08t0:2523_2: ariyaphalassa diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ nirodhe appanā. Cattāropi hi ariyapuggalā
tika-abh08t0:2523_3: sakaṃ sakaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanti. Keci pana “anāgāmiarahantova samāpajjanti
tika-abh08t0:2523_4: samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāyā”ti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ attanā paṭiladdhasamāpattisamāpajjane
tika-abh08t0:2523_5: samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāya kātabbābhāvato. Sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa hi puthujjanassāpi
tika-abh08t0:2523_6: attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ labbhati, kimaṅgaṃ pana samucchinnekaccakilesānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2523_7: ariyānaṃ. Uparimā pana heṭṭhimaṃ pubbe paṭiladdhampi na samāpajjanti puggalantarabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2523_8: upagatattā. Samugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhanena hi puthujjanehi viya sotāpannassa,
tika-abh08t0:2523_10: ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hotīti tassa tassa ariyassa
tika-abh08t0:2523_11: taṃ taṃ phalaṃ bhavaṅgasadisaṃ hoti, tasmā puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhattā
tika-abh08t0:2523_12: natthi uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṃ, heṭṭhimo pana uparimaṃ na
tika-abh08t0:2523_13: samāpajjati anadhigatattāti cattāropi puggalā sakasakaphalameva samāpajjanti. Taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2523_14: pana samāpajjitukāmena ariyasāvakena rahogatena paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena
tika-abh08t0:2523_16: phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṃ appeti. Phalasamāpattininnacittatāya cettha sekhassa
tika-abh08t0:2523_17: phalameva uppajjati, na maggo. Añño eva hi vipassanācāro ariyamaggāvaho, añño phalasamāpattiāvaho.
tika-abh08t0:2524_0: Tathā hi ariyamaggavīthiyaṃ anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṃ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2524_1: sātisayaṃ padālanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapāramippattāni maggānukūlāni hutvā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:2524_2: phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā
tika-abh08t0:2524_4: parikammappattāni hutvā uppajjantīti na tesaṃ kutoci vuṭṭhānasambhavo. Yato nesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2524_5: pacchimo saṅkhāranimittato vuṭṭhahitvā maggassa anantarapaccayo bhaveyya, teneva
tika-abh08t0:2524_6: ca phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva hoti, na nibbānārammaṇanti
tika-abh08t0:2525_1: dhammānaṃ appavatti. Anāgāmiarahantoyeva hi kāmacchandādisamucchindanena samādhismiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2525_2: paripūrakāritāya samathaphalasamannāgatattā nirodhaṃ samāpajjanti. Tathā hetaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2525_3: yuganandhabhāvappavattanavasena dvīhi balehi samannāgatasseva sambhavati, tasmā taṃ
tika-abh08t0:2525_4: samāpajjitukāmena anāgāminā, khīṇāsavena vā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinā rahogatena paṭisallīnena
tika-abh08t0:2525_5: paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhārā aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassitabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2525_6: tato dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:2525_7: tatheva tattha saṅkhārā sammasitabbā, atha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
tika-abh08t0:2526_0: Tattha sarīrato visaṃyuttā mañcapīṭhādayo sattāhabbhantare yathā na nassanti, tathā
tika-abh08t0:2526_1: adhiṭṭhānaṃ nānābaddhāvikopanaṃ. Sarīrasaṃyutte visuṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Saṅgho
tika-abh08t0:2526_2: pana ñattikammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṃ kattukāmo “yāva maṃ na pakkosati, tāvadeva vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2526_3: pubbābhogakaraṇaṃ saṅghapaṭimānanaṃ. Satthā ca “sikkhāpadapaññāpanādīsu yāva maṃ
tika-abh08t0:2526_4: na pakkosati, tāvadeva vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti pubbābhogakaraṇaṃ satthupakkosanaṃ. Sattāhabbhantare
tika-abh08t0:2526_5: attano āyusaṅkhārassa pavattanasamatthatāvalokanaṃ addhānaparicchedo. Evaṃ katapubbakiccena
tika-abh08t0:2526_6: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ. Athekaṃ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā
tika-abh08t0:2526_7: acittako hoti, nirodhaṃ phusati, tato yathāparicchedaṃ tatiyacatutthaphalānaṃ aññatarena
tika-abh08t0:2526_8: nirodhā vuṭṭhahissatīti. Evamayaṃ duvidhā samāpatti lokuttarapaññāya ānisaṃso.
tika-abh08t0:2527_0: 1392-4. Sadevakalokato uttiṇṇena, uttaritarena vāti lokuttarena sammāsambuddhena.
tika-abh08t0:2527_1: Paññāya bhāvananti sambandho. Hitabhāvananti idhalokaparalokahitavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2527_3: yogakammassa hitaṃ. Uttamanti uggatatamaṃ, accuggataṃ balavantampīti adhippāyo. Aviggahakampadanti
tika-abh08t0:2527_4: viggahañca kampañca na detīti aviggahakampadanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2534_0: Paṭicca enaṃ phalameti pavattati, tiṭṭhati, uppajjati vāti paccayo, hinoti patiṭṭhāti
tika-abh08t0:2534_1: etthāti hetu, anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ hi-saddo mūla-saddo viya patiṭṭhattho veditabbo,
tika-abh08t0:2534_2: hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ atiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2534_3: phalaṃ gacchati viruḷhiṃ āpajjatīti hetu, hetu ca so mūlaṭṭhena, paccayo ca upakārakaṭṭhenāti
tika-abh08t0:2534_4: hetupaccayo, hetu hutvā paccayo hetubhāvena paccayoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2535_0: Evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Svāyaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ, pavattiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2535_1: cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ, ubhayattha sahajātanāmadhammānañca paccayo. Sabbalokiyalokuttaranti
tika-abh08t0:2535_2: iminā paññattiyāpi loke viditabhāvena lokiyapadena saṅgahitattā rūpādibhedesu chabbidhesu
tika-abh08t0:2535_3: saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammesu na koci dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo na hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:2535_4: Teneva “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti aniyato katoti. Nanu ca “yaṃ yaṃ dhamma”nti vuttattā
tika-abh08t0:2535_5: paññattiyā gahaṇaṃ na hotīti? Nāyaṃ doso dhammasaddassa ñeyyavacanattā. Ārabbhāti
tika-abh08t0:2535_6: ālambitvā, gahetvāti attho. Uppajjantīti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. Te pana taṃ ārabbha
tika-abh08t0:2535_7: uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca. Yathā hi dubbalo puriso daṇḍaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā ālambitvā
tika-abh08t0:2535_8: uṭṭhahati ceva tiṭṭhati ca, evaṃ cittacetasikā dhammā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ālambitvā uppajjanti
tika-abh08t0:2536_0: Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo adhipatipaccayo. Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhenāti ca pamukhabhāvena.
tika-abh08t0:2536_1: Attādhīnānañhi patibhūto dhammo adhipatīti so tesaṃ pamukhabhāvena pavattati. “Chandādhipati
tika-abh08t0:2536_2: chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato
tika-abh08t0:2536_3: chandādayo cattāro dhammā sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ sahajātādhipatīti dassento āha “tattha
tika-abh08t0:2536_4: sahajātādhipatī”tiādi. “Chandavato kiṃ nāma kammaṃ na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2536_5: labhitvā uppajjamāne cittuppāde chandādayo dhurabhūtā jeṭṭhakabhūtā sampayuttadhamme,
tika-abh08t0:2536_6: taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpe ca sādhayamānā vase vattayamānā hutvā pavattanti, te ca tesaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:2536_7: vattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato. Tena te adhipatipaccayā honti, no ca kho
tika-abh08t0:2536_8: ekato. Yadā hi chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattati, tadā chandova
tika-abh08t0:2536_9: adhipati, na itare. Esa nayo sesesupi. Adhipatibhāvopi hi nesaṃ attano pavattinivārake
tika-abh08t0:2536_10: abhibhuyya pavattanato hoti. Avasesanti yathāvuttānaṃ tesaṃ garukātabbatābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:2536_11: garukatasseva ca ārammaṇādhipatibhāvavacanato. Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ
tika-abh08t0:2536_12: katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2536_13: adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti. Tattha garuṃ katvāti garukāracittīkāravasena vā assādanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2536_14: vā garuṃ bhārikaṃ laddhabbaṃ anavaññātaṃ katvā. Garukātabbañhi ārammaṇaṃ tanninnapoṇapabbhārānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2536_15: assādanapaccavekkhaṇamaggaphalānaṃ attano vase vattayamānaṃ viya paccayo hoti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2536_16: ayaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakattā adhipatipaccayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2537_0: Antarayatīti antaraṃ, byavadhāyakanti attho, nāssa antaraṃ vijjatīti anantaro, soyeva
tika-abh08t0:2537_1: paccayoti anantarapaccayo, anantarabhāvena upakārako dhammoti adhippāyo. Anantaraniruddhāti
tika-abh08t0:2537_2: attano nirodhānantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādassa uppattipaccayabhāvena tassa uppattiyā
tika-abh08t0:2537_3: purimabhāge anantaraṃ hutvā niruddhā, rūpadhammā pana anantarapaccayā natthi.
tika-abh08t0:2538_0: Samanantarabhāvena upakārako dhammo samanantarapaccayo, tathā samanantarapaccayopīti
tika-abh08t0:2538_1: ṭhapetvā upasaggamattaṃ na ettha koci viseso. Yo hi anantarapaccayo, sova samanantarapaccayoti.
tika-abh08t0:2538_3: rūpakalāpānaṃ viya saṇṭhānābhāvato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sahaṭṭhānābhāvato ca “idamito
tika-abh08t0:2538_4: uddhaṃ heṭṭhā tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attano ekattamiva upanetvā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2538_5: uppādetuṃ samatthatā samanantarapaccayatā, tasmā dhammato avisesepi vineyyavasena
tika-abh08t0:2538_6: byañjanatthamattato visesaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ visuṃ desanā katā. Yampi “atthānantaratāya
tika-abh08t0:2538_7: anantarapaccayo, kālānantaratāya samanantarapaccayo”ti ācariyānaṃ mataṃ, taṃ “nirodhā
tika-abh08t0:2539_0: Uppajjamānova sahuppādanavasena upakārako dhammo sahajātapaccayo pakāsassa padīpo
tika-abh08t0:2539_1: viya, so panāyaṃ “cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ, sahajātarūpānañca, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2539_2: upādārūpānañca, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamañña”nti ca tividho hoti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2539_3: vuttaṃ “cittacetasikā”tiādi. Yampi hi pāḷiyaṃ arūpakkhandhādivasenassa chabbidhataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2539_4: vuttaṃ, tampi ettheva saṅgahitaṃ. Yo panettha sesarūpadhammānaṃ, ubhayattha vatthuno
tika-abh08t0:2539_5: ca pavattiyā arūpadhammānaṃ, upādārūpānañca aññamaññaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ sahajātapaccayattābhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2540_0: Aññamaññaṃ uppādanupatthambhanabhāvena attano upakārakassa upakārako dhammo aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2540_1: Aññamaññupatthambhakatidaṇḍakaṃ viya upakārakatā ca aññamaññatāvaseneva daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2540_2: na sahajātādivasena. Sahajātādipaccayo hontoyeva hi koci kassaci aññamaññapaccayo
tika-abh08t0:2540_3: na hoti cittacetasikānaṃ cittajarūpe sati, mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpe sati aññamaññapaccayattābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2540_4: Yathāha “cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññapaccayena paccayo, cattāro mahābhūtā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2540_5: okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo”ti. Ācariyena pana paccayuppannadhamme
tika-abh08t0:2541_0: Taruādīnaṃ pathavī viya adhiṭṭhānākārena, cittakammādīnaṃ paṭādayo viya ca nissayākārena
tika-abh08t0:2541_1: upakārako dhammo nissayapaccayo. Vatthurūpānīti sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ adhiṭṭhānākārena
tika-abh08t0:2541_2: nissayapaccayabhūtāni vatthurūpāni. Mahābhūtā cittacetasikā cāti aññamaññaṃ, upādārūpānañca
tika-abh08t0:2541_3: tatheva nissayabhūtāni mahābhūtāni aññamaññaṃ, sahajātarūpānañca nissayākārena paccayāni
tika-abh08t0:2541_4: cittacetasikāni, tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissito na paṭikkhittoti nissayo.
tika-abh08t0:2542_0: Yathā pana bhuso āyāso upāyāso, evaṃ bhuso nissayo upanissayo, balavakāraṇanti attho,
tika-abh08t0:2542_1: tasmā balavakāraṇabhāvena upakārako dhammo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo. So ārammaṇūpanissayo
tika-abh08t0:2543_0: “Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2543_1: pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2543_2: sekhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, sekhā
tika-abh08t0:2543_3: maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:2544_0: Evamādinā nayena ārammaṇūpanissayo tāva ārammaṇādhipatinā saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvāva
tika-abh08t0:2544_1: vibhatto. Tenāha “ārammaṇūpanissayo ārammaṇādhipatiyevā”ti. Kiñcāpi nānattaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t0:2544_2: vibhatto, tathāpi ayaṃ tesaṃ viseso – yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ garuṃ katvā cittacetasikā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:2544_3: taṃ niyamato tesaṃ ārammaṇesu balavārammaṇaṃ hoti. Iti garukātabbamattaṭṭhena ārammaṇādhipati,
tika-abh08t0:2544_4: balavakāraṇaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanissayoti ca evametesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2545_0: Anantarūpanissayopi “purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2545_1: khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena anantarapaccayena saddhiṃ nānattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2545_2: akatvāva vibhattoti āha “anantarūpanissayo pana anantarapaccayovā”ti. Evaṃ santepi
tika-abh08t0:2545_3: attano anantarā anurūpacittuppādavasena anantarapaccayo, balavakāraṇavasena anantarūpanissayapaccayoti
tika-abh08t0:2546_0: Pakatiyā eva paccayantararahitena attano sabhāveneva upanissayo pakatūpanissayo,
tika-abh08t0:2546_1: ārammaṇaanantarehi amissova puthageva koci upanissayoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā pakato
tika-abh08t0:2546_2: upanissayo pakatūpanissayo. Pakatoti cettha pa-kāro upasaggo, so attano phalassa
tika-abh08t0:2546_3: uppādanasamatthabhāvena santāne nipphāditabhāvaṃ, upasevitabhāvañca dīpeti, tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2546_4: attano santāne nipphanno vā kāyikasukhadukkhasaddhāsīlādi upasevito vā utubhojanādi
tika-abh08t0:2546_5: pakatūpanissayoti attho. Upasevanañcettha duvidhaṃ upayogopasevanaṃ ārammaṇūpasevanañca.
tika-abh08t0:2546_6: Evañca katvā anāgatassāpi upanissayapaccayatā laddhā hoti. Kāyikasukha…pe… yo cāti
tika-abh08t0:2546_7: ettha kāyikasukhadukkhāni rāgasaddhādīnaṃ, utubhojanādayo cittasamādhānādīnaṃ, saddhāsīlādayo
tika-abh08t0:2546_8: saddhāsīlādīnañca upanissayā honti. Ādi-saddena yaṃ yaṃ upanissāya yassa yassa sambhavo,
tika-abh08t0:2546_9: taṃ taṃ tassa tassa upanissayapaccayabhūtaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Paccayamahāpadeso hesa, yadidaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2547_0: Paccayuppannato paṭhamataraṃ uppajjitvā vattamānabhāvena upakārako dhammo purejātapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2547_1: So ca rūpadhammova samāno arūpadhammasseva hoti. Tenāha “vatthupurejāto nāmā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2547_3: dhammārammaṇassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca pañcārammaṇāneva ārammaṇapurejātabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2547_4: āgatānīti? Saccaṃ āgatāni, pañhāvāre pana “sekhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato
tika-abh08t0:2547_5: dukkhato anattato vipassantī”tiādinā avisesena paccuppannacakkhādīnampi gahitattā
tika-abh08t0:2547_6: dhammārammaṇassa ārammaṇapurejātabhāvo na sakkā paṭibāhituṃ. Atthatopi hetaṃ siddhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2547_7: “yaṃ yaṃ paccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodvāre cittaṃ pavattati, taṃ tassa ārammaṇapurejātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2547_8: hotī”ti. Ettha ca nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2547_9: agacchantānaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ purejātākārena upakārakatā purejātapaccayatāti ayamassa
tika-abh08t0:2548_0: Gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsā cetanā viya purejātānaṃ rūpānaṃ upatthambhakabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2548_1: upakārako dhammo pacchājātapaccayo. Manosañcetanāhāravasena hi pacchājātacittacetasikehi
tika-abh08t0:2548_2: vinā santānaṭṭhitihetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ pacchājātākārena cittacetasikānaṃ upakārakatā
tika-abh08t0:2548_3: vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā pacchājātapaccayatāti evaṃ sabbapaccayānaṃ paccayantarākāravisiṭṭhā
tika-abh08t0:2548_4: upakārakatā daṭṭhabbā. So pana “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa
tika-abh08t0:2548_5: kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti āgatattā ekavidhoti āha “cittacetasikāvā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2549_0: Purimapurimaparicitagantho viya uttaruttarassa ganthassa kusalādibhāvena attasadisapaguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2549_1: attasajātiyatāgāhakaṃ āsevanaṃ, tena paccayā sajātiyadhammāva āsevanapaccayo. Bhinnajātikā
tika-abh08t0:2549_3: attano gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ na sakkonti, na ca sayaṃ tato gaṇhanti. Te pana anantarātītāni
tika-abh08t0:2549_4: lokiyakusalākusalāni ceva anāvajjanakiriyājavanāni cāti āha “ṭhapetvā āvajjanadvaya”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2549_5: “Na maggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti vacanato ahetukakiriyāsu hasituppādasseva āsevanabhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:2549_6: āvajjanadvayaṃ āsevanapaccayo na hoti, lokuttarampi kusalaṃ bhinnajātikasseva phalassa
tika-abh08t0:2549_7: purecarattā na tena, āsevanaguṇaṃ gaṇhāpeti, vipākābyākatampi kammavasena. Vipākabhāvappattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2549_8: kammapariṇāmitaṃ kammavegakkhittaṃ patitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānaṃ attano sabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2549_9: gāhetvā paribhāvetvā neva aññavipākaṃ pavatteti, na ca purimavipākānubhāvaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:2549_10: uppajjati. Lokuttaravipākampi hi kiñcāpi javanavasena uppajjati, āsevanaguṇaṃ pana
tika-abh08t0:2549_11: gaṇhāti, na ca aññaṃ gāhāpeti. Yampi “āsevanavinimuttaṃ javanaṃ natthī”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-abh08t0:2549_12: vuttaṃ, tampi “yebhuyyavasena vutta”nti viññāyati, itarathā pana ācariyassa asamapekkhitāvidhāyakattappasaṅgato.
tika-abh08t0:2549_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lokuttaro pana āsevanapaccayo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2549_14: Maggo pana gotrabhuto āsevanaṃ na gaṇhātīti natthi bhūmiādivasena nānājātikatāya
tika-abh08t0:2549_15: anadhippetattā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭṭhāne “gotrabhu maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:2550_1: dhammo kammapaccayo. Kammanti hi cetanā vuccati, sā ca āyūhanabyāpārā. Paccayuppannena
tika-abh08t0:2550_2: saha uppannā sahajātā, paccayuppannato nānakkhaṇe bhavā nānakkhaṇikā. Sahajātā lokiyalokuttarā
tika-abh08t0:2550_3: cetanāti sambandho. Sā sahajātanāmānaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ paccayo, itarā
tika-abh08t0:2550_4: pana vipākakaṭattārūpānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sāsavakusalākusalacetanāti attano uppādavisiṭṭhe
tika-abh08t0:2550_6: upakārikā kāmarūpārūpakusalacetanā, akusalacetanā ca. Tassā hi tathā kiriyābhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2550_7: pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti, na aññathā. Itarā pana sahajātānaṃ āyūhanakiriyābhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2550_8: pavattamānā upakārikāti vattabbaṃ. Avadhāraṇena panettha cetanāsampayuttaṃ abhijjhādikammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2550_9: paṭikkhipati satipi vipākadhammasabhāve cetanāvajjānaṃ ataṃsabhāvattā. Anāsava…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2550_10: paccayoti iminā lokiyakusalacetanāya visesamattaṃ dasseti, na nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayatābhāvaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2550_11: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “arūpāvacaracetanā, pana lokuttaracetanā ca uppajjitvā
tika-abh08t0:2550_12: niruddhā attano attano vipākakkhandhānaṃ nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2551_1: arūpadhammāva vipākapaccayo. Tenāha “vipākacittacetasikā”ti. Te hi payogena asādhetabbatāya
tika-abh08t0:2551_2: kammassa katattā nipphajjanamattato nirussāhasantabhāvā honti, na kilesavūpasamasantabhāvā.
tika-abh08t0:2551_3: Nirussāhasantabhāvato eva hi bhavaṅgādayo duviññeyyā. Pañcadvārepi hi javanappavattiyāva
tika-abh08t0:2551_4: rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā viññāyati. Abhinipātasampaṭicchanasantīraṇamattā pana vipākā duviññeyyā eva.
tika-abh08t0:2552_0: Rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakaṭṭhena upakāro āhārapaccayo. Satipi hi janakabhāve upatthambhakattameva
tika-abh08t0:2552_1: āhārassa padhānakiccaṃ, janayantopi ca āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhentova janetīti
tika-abh08t0:2552_2: upatthambhanabhāvova āhārabhāvoti. Tattha kabaḷīkāro āhāro rūpakāyasseva upatthambhako,
tika-abh08t0:2552_3: sesā tayo rūpārūpakāyassa. Na kevalañhi te nāmadhammānameva avicchedahetukā, atha
tika-abh08t0:2553_0: Tesu tesu kiccesu paccayuppannadhammehi attānaṃ anuvattāpanakasaṅkhātaādhipaccaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2553_2: pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho, indriyānaṃ pana dassanādikiccesu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi,
